Pathianin a phut taka irnêng le irvân a: rammual hi mumalboi le a korong ringot a nia; tui inthûk tak chung khom an thim khaka; Pathian irtha khan tui chunghai chu a op maia.
Khan Pathianin, “Vâr hong om ri se” a tia; khanchu vâr a hong om ta.
Khan Pathianin vâr chu a ena, a sa a ti oka; khanchu Pathianin vâr le inthim chu a’rsentir ta.
Pathianin vâr chu “Sûn” a tia, inthim chu “Zân” a tia. Khanchu a sûn khatna zîng le khohloi a om tâka.
Khan Pathianin, “Tui le tui kâra khan boiruak liantak om sianlân, kha khan tui le tuihai chu irsen ri se,” a tia.
Khanchu, Pathianin, boiruak lian tak chu a siama, boiruak lian tak hnuaia tui omhai le boiruak lian tak chunga tui omhai chu a’rsentir tâka. Khaang tak khan a hong ni ta.
Khan Pathianin boiruak lian tak chu “Irvân” a tia, khanchu khohloi a oma, zîng tiang a oma, kha kha sûn hnina.
Khan Pathianin, “Irvân hnuaia tui omhai chu hmunkhata luang khôm sianlân, mual le tâng chu inlang ri se,” a tia. Khanchu khaang tak khan a hong ni tâka.
Pathianin mual le tâng chu “Irnêng” a tia, tui om khômhai chu “Tuipuihai” a ti tâka, khan Pathianin kha kha a ena, a sa a ti zapa.
Khan Pathianin, “Irnêngin hloisûl, chîmu, thei kunghai, irnênga an chi om dân hrang anga ra, a ra sûnga a chi omhai chu hong ra suak ri se,” a tia. Khanchu, khaang tak khan a hong ni ta.
Khanchu irnêngin hloisûlhai, chîmuhai an mâni chi om dân hrang anga chi neihai, thing an mâni chi om dân hranga ra, a ra sûnga a chi omhai chu an suak ta. Khan Pathianin a ena, a sa a ti zapa.
Khanchu khohloi a oma, zîng a oma, kha kha sûn thumna.
Khan Pathianin, “Sûn le zân irsentir hrangin irvân boiruak lian taka khan vârhai om sianlân; khahai kha irsinsiana hai, zoro hai, sûn hai le kumhai inhriatna hrang ni ri se,
irnêng invâr hrangin irvân boiruak lian taka khan vârhai om ri se,” a tia. Khanchu khaang tak khan a hong ni tâka.
Khan Pathianin vâr roiinpuitak inhni khi a siama, vâr roiinpui ual kha sûn roirêltu hrangin a tia, vâr roiinpui loi ual kha zân roirêltu hrangin; ârsihai khom khi a siam sa.
Khan Pathianin an nihai kha irnêng invârtir hrangin irvân boiruak liantak chunga khin a siaa;
sûn le zân chunga roirêl hrang le vâr le inthim chu irsentir hrangin, Pathianin kha kha a ena, a sa a tia.
Khanchu khohloi a oma, zîng a oma, kha kha sûn minlina.
Khan Pathianin, “Tuihaiin thilsiam hringna nei tamtak insua mai sianlân, vatehai khom irnêng chunga irvân boiruak liantak inhonga hin vuang sup sup ri sehai,” a tia.

Khanchu Pathianin tuipuia sa liantak takhai a siama, thilsiam hringna neia châng thei tinrêng, tuia insua tâkhai kha, an mâni chi om dân hrang ang takin a siama, va mitha nei tinrêng khom an mâni chi omdân hrang ang sengin a siam. Pathianin kha kha a ena, a sa a tia.
Khan Pathianin, “Irchi tamtak nin irchi ata hong pung unglân, tuipuihaia hong sip roi, vâhai khom irnênga pung ri sehai,” tiin sat a vura.
Khanchu khohloi a oma, zîng a oma, kha kha sûn ringana.
Khan Pathianin, “Irnênga thilhringhai chu an mâni chi omdân lam angin sa murdi an omdân ang chitin om ri se,” a tia. Khanchu an hong om tâka.
Khanchu Pathianin ram sa, insûng sa an chi omdân hrang siamin le irnênga bokvâka thilhring murdi a isiamhai kha a ena, khan Pathianin a sa a ti tâka.
Khanchu Pathianin, “Ama irangpuiin mihriama siam inlân, tuipui sûnga nga le chunglêng vahai, le sa murdihai chunga irnênga bokvâka thilhring murdihai chunga ircham inneitir ki ti,” a tia.
Khanchu Pathianin ama irangpuiin mihriam a siama, ama ang zekin pasal le nupang a siama.

Khanchu Pathianin sat a vurhaia, Pathian ngêtin an kuang khan, “Irchi tamtak sema pung hrangin, irnêng chung hi lua sipin, nin ircham takin inomtir roi, tuipui sûnga ngahai chunga, chunglêng vahai chunga khom, thilhring irnêng chunga bokvâka fe murdihai chunga ircham nei roi,” a tia.
Khanchu Pathian ngêtin, “Irngai roi, irnêng chunga chîmu tinrêng le thing tinrêng thing ra nei murdi nangni ki ipêk a ni, nin bu hrangin.
Khan irnênga sa murdihai kôla khom, chunglêng va murdihai laia, thil irnênga bokvâka fehai laia khom, hringna nei murdihai kuanga khom, an bu hrangin sûlhringhai ki ipêk a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu Pathianin a thilsiam murdi a ena, irngai ro, a sân a sa a ti oka. Khanchu khohloi a oma, zîng khom a hong om tâk a ni, a sûn rukna chu.
Kha zoiin chu irnêng irvân le a sûnga om hrang murdi siam zoi a ni tâka.
Khanchu Pathianin sûn sari nî tena chu a thilsiam hranghai siam zoiin, a sûn sari nî chu a thilsiam mâkin a’rngam tâka.
Khanchu Pathianin sûn sari nî sûn chu sat a vurin a ser ir-up tâka. Kha nî sûn chu Pathianin a thilsiamhai thu ringot le a kuta a isiamhai mâkin a’rngamsanhai tâk sikin.
Irnêng le irvân siam dân chu hiang hin a ni,
Irnênga sûl hringhai hi ite la om maka, irnênga anhringhai khom ite la mông thei maka.
khannisianlân irnêng ata sûm a hong suaka irnêng pumpui a bit zoi tâka.
Khan
Khan
Khan irnêng ata
Khan Eden irhuan ata tuidung, irhuan irziltir hrangin a inluangtira, khatak ata irsem darin, iva minliin a’rsem suak ta.
Inkhat irhming chu Pison a ni; Havila ram pumpui hual suaktu a ni, kha khan rângachak a oma;
kha rama rângachak kha a satak a ni, kha khan Bedolak le berul lung khom a om.
Vadung inhnina irhming chu Gihon a ni, hi hi Kus ram pumpui hualtu a ni.
Vadung inthumna irhming chu Hiddekal a nia; Assuria ram nisua tianga luang a ni. Khan vadung minlina chu Eufrates a ni.
Khan
Khan
khan a sia le sa inhriatna thing ra hi chu ni ifâk hrang ni ma: ni fâkin chu, ni fâk nî sûn le zoro taka ni ithi ngêt hrang a ni,” tiin thu a pêka.
Khan
Khan
Khan Adama’n ramsa murdi, chunglêng vahai tinrêng irhming an neitirhai vinga; khannisianlân Adama chu a changpui hrang le a’rkoppui hrang ite a’rhloppui hrang om maka.
Khanchu
Khan
Khan Adama’n, “Hi ngêt hi keima ru ang ru neia,
ki taksa anga taksa nei ngei chu a ni:
Pasal ata lâksuak a ni sikin.
‘Nupang’ ti hrang ni a ti,” a tia.
Khasikin pasalin a nu le a pa masan a ta, a dôngma chel a ti: khanchu taksa pumkhat hong ni ta an ti.
Khan Adama le a dôngma kha korongboiin an oma, inzak ual mahai.
Khan
Khan nupangnu khan mirûl kuang, “Ti ma, irhuana thing rahai hi kin fâk thei,
irhuan lâitaka thing ra hi chu Pathianin, ‘Nin ifâk hrang ni ma, an them khom nin inthem hrang ni ma, nin inthema nin fâkin chu nin ithi hrang kêng;’ a iti a ni,” a tia.
Khan mirûlin nupangnu kuang khan, “Thi viat no chin ni;
nin fâk nî renga khan nin mit hong vâr a ta, a sia le a sa inhriatin Pathian hong ang nin ta, ti Pathianin nangni a inhriat chian a ni khate,” a tia.

Khanchu nupangnu khan thing ra kha fâk thei zât a nih ti le mit lâktak a nih ti le, mihai invârtir theitu thing ra irzukom tak a nih ti an hriatin chu, a ra senkhat irhmalin a fâk tâka; khan, a pasal khom a pêka a fâk sa tâka.
Khanchu an ruaiin an mit a hong vâra, korongboi an nih ti an irhriat suak tâka; khanchu theipui hnâ insui irkopin puanbom hrangin an siam tâka.
Khan,
Khan,
Khan ama khan, “Irhuana ni’rhâi kin hriata, korongboia om ki nih sikin, ki chi tâka; khasika khan ki irbîk tâk a ni,” a tia.
Khan, ama khan, “Korongboi ni nih ti tu’n mo nang a inhril? Thei ra faloi hrang tia nang ki ihril kha ni ifâk tâk ma ni?” a tia.
Khan Adama’n, “Keima ni ompui hranga nupang ni ni ipêk khan thei ra a ni pêka, ki ifâk tâk a ni,” a tia.
Khan,
Khan,
Khan, nang le nupang hi nangni irdoitir ki ta, ni’rchihai le a’rchihai khom la’rdoitir ki ti: kha khan ni lu zêmirnôitir a ta, nangin a ke ârtui lei inchuk pe ni ti,” a tia.

Nupangnu kuang khan, “Ni dengtheina le ni nâi vongna kha a saterengin nang inpungtir pe ki ta; intak takin nâi nei ngai ni ta; khannisianlân ni nuamlam chu ni pasal tiang ni a ta, ama khan ni chunga ircham nei ngai a ti,” a tia.

Khan, Adama kuang khan, “Ni dôngma thu ni zôm ta, thing inkhat, ‘A ra ni ifâk hrang ni mah’ tia thu nang ki ipêk kha, a ra ni fâk sikin irnêng hi nangma sikin khosâl tongin a iom tâk a ni; ni dam sûngin intak taka sinin a ra kha fa ta ni ti.
Ilhling le hloisûlhai khom nang inpung pe ki ta; khan, irnênga ansûl hloihna fâkin om ta ni ti.
Khan, irnênga ni kîr nôk mâka chu ni hmâia irthântui luang zon zonin bu ne ta ni ti; irnêng pil ata lâksuak ni ni sikin: Pil ni nia, pila dên ni ikîr nôk hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khan, Adama khan a dôngma kha mihring murdihai nu a ni sikin a’rhminga Evi a tia.
Khan,
Khan,
Khasikin
Khanchu, mihriam kha an hnotsuak tâka; khan, hringna thing lampui kha enkol hrangin Eden irhuan nisua tiang pang cherubhai le mei khandai irvêl lop lop kha an omtir tâka.
Khanchu Adama’n a dôngma Evi kha a’rpôlpuia an râi tâka, “
Kha zoiin Abela a hong suak nôka. Abela chu belra enkolpu sin a thoa, Kaina chu loi sin thopua a om ta.
Khanchu inhnunga chu hiang hin a hong ni tâka, Kaina’n a loimâna thil,
Abela khomin a belra pâl laia a martak le a suak masatak a hong chôia. Khan,
Kaina le a thilinhlan kha chu lôm maka. Khanchu Kaina chu a sate’n a ning an mur pe tâka, a hmêl kha an khukhak tâka.
Khanchu
Thil ni tho insa’n chu lôm ni ihlo hrang mo ni ma? Ni tho’n sa no’n chu sual chu mikot kôla a iom chian a ni: a nuam lam chu nangma nang inhnê hi a nia, a chunga thu ni inei hrang a ni,” a tia.
Kaina’n a sangpa Abela kuang, “Loia fe ei ti” a tia. Khanchu hiang hin a nia, loia an om laiin a sangpa Abela kha a’rsualpuia, a thatpai tâka.
Kha zoiin chu
Khanchu
Khasikin, irnêng, ni kut ata ni sangpa thisen dong hrang a bâi lei ângtu ata hi khosâl tong ni ta;
irnêng ni tuk khomin a satna kha nang pe phal ta no nia; irnênga chaninvâi le inlêng hong ni ta ni ti,” a tia.
Khan, Kaina’n

A vuan hin irnêng chung ata ni nin hnotsuak tâka, ni mithmu phâk loina ithuprûkin om ta ki ti, irnênga hin inlêng le chaninvâi ki hong ini hrang a ni ta; khanchu hiang hin ni a ta, mi tukhomin an ni hmupu dôrin ni that an ti,” a tia.
Khanchu
Khanchu Kaina kha
Khan, Kaina’n a dôngma a pôla, khanchu an inrâia, Enoka an neia. Khan, khua a chuana, a khua irhming khom a nâipa irhming chôiin Enoka a tia.
Khan Enoka’n nâipasal Irada a neia, Irada’n nâipasal Mehujaela a neia, Mehujaela’n nâipasal Methusaela a neia, Methusaela khan nâipasal Lameka a neia.
Khanchu, Lameka’n dôngma inhni a neia, inkhat irhming chu Adaii a nia, inkhat nôk chu Zillaii, a ni.
Khan Adaii leh khan Jabala an neia, ama chu puan ina om ngaihai sa vâi ngaihai irchibul a ni.
A sangpa irhming chu Jubala a nia, ama hi chu perkhuang le theihle tum theihai irchibul a ni.
Zillaii khomin Tubal-kaina, dâr le thîr hriamhrei tinrêng incher ngaitu a neia; khan Tubal-kaina farnu chu Naamaii a ni.
Khanchu Lameka’n a dôngmahai kuang khan,
“Adaii le Zillaii haio, ki’rhâi inhre unglân:
Lameka dôngmahaio, ki thu’nsîr hi irngai roi,
A nin phop sikin mi ki thata,
A ni vîk irdul sikin ruatharte ki ithat a ni.
Kaina phuba kha a bâk sariin an lâkin chu,
Lameka phuba chu a bâk sômsari le sariin an ilâk ngêt hrang kêng,” a tia.
Khan, Adama’n a dôngma a’rpôlpui nôka, nâipasal an nei nôka, a’rhming chu Setha a iphua a ni: “Pathianin Abela irthûla a ni ipêk a ni, Kaina’n a lei thatpai tâk sikin,” a tia.
Khan, Setha khomin nâipasal a neia, a’rhming khom Enosa a phuaa. Kha rengata chu mihaiin
Hi hi Adama irchihai chuangna bu chu a ni. Pathianin thu ringota mihriam a siam nî khan, Pathianin ama ir-angpuiin ama kha a siama;
Thu ringotin pasal le nupang kha a isiamhai a ni. Thu ringota siam an ni lai khan sat a vurhaia, an irhming khom “Mihriam” a tihai ta.
Khanchu Adama kha kum 130 a ni kumin, ama irangpuiin nâipasal a neia; a’rhming khom Setha a phuaa.
Setha a nei zoiin Adama chu kum 800 a la dama nâi nupang le pasal dang a la neihaia.
Khanchu Adama dam sûng kum chu 930 a ni zoiin a thi tâka.
Khan Setha khom kum 105 a ni’n nâipasal Enosa a neia,
Enosa a nei zoiin Setha chu 807 a la dama nâinu le nâipa a la neihaia,
kha zoiin Setha dam sûng kum chu 912 a niin a ithi a ni.
Khan Enosa chu kum 90 a ni kumin nâipasal Kenana a neia,
khan, Kenana a nei zoiin Enosa chu kum 815 a la dama, nâinu le nâipa a la neihaia;
khanchu Enosa dam sûng kum chu 905 niin a ithi a ni.
Khan, Kenana khan kum 70 a niin nâipasal Mahalalela a neia.
khan, Mahalalela a nei zoiin Kenana chu kum 540 a la dama, nâinu le nâipa a la neihaia.
Khanchu Kenana dam sûng kum 910 a niin a ithi a ni.
Khan, Mahalalela’n kum 65 a niin nâipasal Jareda a neia,
khan Jareda a nei zoiin Mahalalela chu kum 830 a la dama, nâinu le nâipa a la neihaia,
khanchu Mahalalela dam sûng kum chu 895 niin a ithi a ni.
Khan Jareda khan kum 162 a niin nâipasal Enoka a neia;
khan, Enoka a nei zoiin Jareda chu kum 800 a la dama, nâinu le nâipa a la neihaia,
khanchu Jareda dam sûng kum chu 962 niin a ithi a ni.
Khan Enoka khom kum 65 a niin nâipasal Methusela a neia,
Methusela a nei zoiin Enoka chu kum 300 chu Pathian le omsuamin, nâinu le nâipa a la neihaia,
khanchu Enoka dam sûng kum chu 365 a nia.
Khan Enoka chu Pathian leh omsuamin om ta maka, Pathianin a hruaipai tâk sikin.
Khan Methusela khom kum 187 a niin nâipasal Lameka a neia,
khan Lameka a nei zoiin Methusela chu kum 782 a la dama, nâinu le nâipa a la neihaia,
khanchu Methusela dam sûng kum chu 969 niin a ithi a ni.
Khan Lameka khan kum 182 niin nâipasal a neia,
khan, “Hi mi ngêt hin
Khan Nova a nei zoiin Lameka chu kum 595 a la dama, nâinu le nâipa a la neihaia;
khan Lameka dam sûng kum chu 777 niin a ithi a ni.
Khan Nova chu kum 500 mi a nia, Nova khom nâipasal Sema, Hama le Jafeta a neihai a ni.
Khanchu irnêng chunga mihriam an hong punga, nâilete an hong tamin chu,
Pathian nâihai khan, mihriam nâihai kha an hmêl a sa ti’n an hmuhaia, khanchu an indit murdihai chu dôngma’n an luahaia.
Khanchu

Kha zoro khom khan rammuala hin mi lian an oma, kha zoi khomin Pathian nâihai khan mihriam nâihai irpôlpuiin nâi an neipuihai lai khom khan an oma, hihai hi chu tianlaia mi hrât, mi irhming inthanghai kha an ni.
Khan
Kha tena chu irnênga om hrang mihriam a lei isiam tâk hi a sate’n a’rsîra, lungrîl natna’n a neipui tâka.
Khanchu
Nikhomsianlân, Nova kha chu
Hiang hin Nova thurchi chu a ni. Nova chu mi feltak a nia, kha laia mihriam sûnga chu Nova chu Pathian le hmunkhata lêngsuam ngai a ni.
Khan Nova chu nâipasal inthum a neia, Sema, Hama le Jafeta hai an ni.
Khan, irnêng chung hi Pathian mithmuin a porinche zoi tâka, hnarsana’n a sip tâk sikin.
Khanchu Pathianin irnêng chung hi a ena, irngai roi a isiat zoi tâk kêng, taksa om murdihai hin an omdân a isiat zoi tâk a ni hi teh a tia.
Khanchu Pathianin Nova kuang khan, “Taksa murdi hek hrang nikhua chu ki kuang a om ta, annihai sikin irnêng chung hi hnarsana’n a sipa, khasikin irnêng chung hi ki insiatpai hrang tâk kêng, a tia.
Ni ta hrangin meisâr thingin irkuang siam ro; irkuanga khan banglâi siamin lân; a sûng tiang le a pên tiang meisâr hnâi ni ipol hrang a ni.
Hiang hin ni isiam hrang a ni, irkuang a dung mûk irzathuma sei ni sianlân, a khang lian chu mûk sômringa ni ri se, a’rsâng lam chu mûk sômthum ni ri se.

Irkuanga khan tukver khom ni isiam hrang a ni. A chung tiang mûk khat kâra a dâp ni itho hrang a ni. Irkuang inkhat chu a sîr tiang ni inhong hrang a ni. Irkuang chu irchuan inthumin ni isiam hrang a ni.
Khanchu irngai ro, keima’n taksa nei murdi hringna pai hrangin irnêng chung hi tui ki indîl zit hrang a ni. Irnênga hringna nei murdi that vingna hrangin,
khannisianlân ki thuthung chu nangma hrangin indet ual ki ta, irkuanga ni ilût hrang a ni, nangma lût ni ta; ni nâihai le ni dôngma le ni moinuhai ni kuang an ilût sa hrang a ni.
Khan taksa nei murdi, le thilhring laia mi chi tin bop khatin ni kuang an hring theina hrangin irkuanga ni ihruai inlûthai hrang a ni; nupang le pasal an ini hrang a ni.

Vâhai khom chi tin an irkip hrang a ni. Sa khom chi tin an omdân angin an irkip sa zit hrang a ni. Thilhring murdi a bop irkipin an pung thei nôkna hrang le an hring theina hrangin ni kuang an ihong hrang a ni.
Khan bu nin inêk le fâk thei zât lâk khômin buk zit ro; nang le annihai fâk hrangin,” a tia.
Khaang khan Nova’n a thoa, Pathianin a kuanga thu a ipêk murdi zômin a itho tâk a ni.
Khan
Sa irthiang murdi laia mi, a chal le pui bop sariin,
sa irthiang loi laia mi a chal le pui bop khatin, chunglêng vâhai laia mi khom a pui le chal bop sariin, irnêng chunga irchi nei hrangin ni ihruai inhringhai hrang a ni.
Sûn sari a la’rsam, hi zoi hin chu irnêng chunga hin sûn sômminli zân sômminli rua inthotir ki ta; ki thilhring siam murdi irnêng chunga an hek theina hrangin,” a tia.
Khanchu Nova khan
Hi tui a lêt lai hin Nova chu kum 600 mi a ni.
Khan tui a lêt hrang sikin Nova chu irkuanga a lûta, a dôngma, a nâihai le a moihai an rêngin an lûta.
Pathianin a kuanga thu a ipêk angin sa irthiang laia mi le, sa irthiang loi laia mi khom chunglêng vâhai khom irnênga bokvâka om murdi le,
Nova kuanga irkuanga khan an lût ving tâka.
Khan sûn sari zoia chu irnênga hin tui a hong lêt tâka.
Nova chu kum 600 a ni kum, tha hni le sûn sôm hleisari nî chu, tuipui inthûk tak sipin a sinthônaa omin, irvân tukver a’rhong pe tâka.
Khan sûn sômminli zân sômminli sûng chu ropuivânsâng a tho tâka.
Hi laia hin Nova nâihai Sema, Hama le Jafeta, Nova dôngma irkuanga an lûta, an moinuhai inthum an lût saa.
Annihai le sa tinrêng le ramsa murdi an lût vinga, thilhring le chunglêng vâ mitha neia vuang murdihai an lûta.
Khanchu taksa nei murdi a chal a pui an rêngin Nova irkuang sûnga an lûta.
Khanchu a lûthai chu Pathianin thu a ipêk angin an lût zoiin chu irkuang a khâra.
Khan, tui kha irnêng chunga hin sûn sômminli a lêt tâka, tui chu a sip zut tâka, irkuang chu a’rhlân maia.
Sûn tin tui a lian intam maia, irkuang inhlânin a om maia,
tui chu a sate’n a bit zoi tâka khomual irsâng ite inlang thei ta maka.
Tâng irsânghai chunga mûk sôm hleiringaa irsângin a om tâka,
khanchu taksa neihai, ram sahai, vâhai, sahai, thilhring irnênga bokvâka irlôihai le mihriam om murdi an thi zoi ving tâk a ni.
An hnâra hringna phûksân lâk murdi an thi zoi tâk a ni.
Pathianin a thilsiam hai, mihriam, ramsa, sahai, vahai le irnênga bokvâk murdihai an thi zoia. Nova le irkuanga lût ti no chu zôkin hmu hrang om ta mahaia.
Khan tui chu sûn sôm irzakhat sûn sômringa chu irkai loiin a lêt tâka.
Khanchu Pathianin Nova le irkuanga thilhringhai ramsa le sahai, bokvâka irvâk murdihai kha irnghilhai maka, Pathianin irnêng chunga phâivua an zâptira, tui lianpa kha a’rkai thiai tâka,
tui inthûk tak hnârhai le vân tukver khom a’rkhâra om kha, rotho irvân ata a chan tâk sikin, tuilian khom a’rkaia.
Khanchu sûn sôm irzakhat le sûn sôm ringa a kâi zoiin chu tui a tôm ok tâka,
khanchu irkuang kha a tha sarina sûn sôm hleisari nî tena chu, Ararat tânga irkuang a’rngam thei tâk a ni.
Khan tui chu a tha sômna tena chu a hong tôm tâk sikin, a tha sômna sûn khat nî tena chu tâng sîp irzumhai an lang thei ta.
Khan sûn sômminli a hek tena chu hiang hi a hong nia, Nova’n irkuang inkhâr a isiam kha an honga,
vaâk inkhat an suaktira, irnênga tui a kang zoi mâka chu a vuang irvêl maia,
khan tui a tôm le tômloi inhriatna hrangin vasu an suaktir nôka,
khannisianlân vasute khan chuangna hrang ite a la hmu no sikin, irkuang tiang ngêt a hong kîr nôka, tui a la om pe sikin. Khanchu Nova’n a kut leh a hon pûra a chela irkuang sûnga a hruai lût nôka.
Khan sûn sari dang a nghâk nôka, vasu kha irkuang ata an vuangtir nôka,
vasu chu a vuangin khohloi tiang chu a hong kîr nôka; khan irngai ro, a hmûra khan Oliv hna tharte a hong sê khap pea, khanchu Nova’n tui a tôm tah ti an hriat thei ta.
Khan sûn sari dang a nghâk zoiin chu vasu an vuangtir nôka, a kuang hong kîr nôk pe ta maka.
Khan Nova kha kum 601 a ni kum, tha khat sûn khat nî tena chu irnênga tui a kang tâk sikin, Nova’n irkuang irkhûna puan a paia, a thîr vêla tui chu kangin rammual a’rlang ving ta.
Khan tha hnina le sûn sôminhni sûn sari ni tena chu ite tui hmu hrang om viat ta maka.
Khanchu Pathianin Nova kha,
“Irkuang ata suak ta ro, nang le ni dôngma, ni nâihai le an dôngmahai khom hmunkhatin suak roi.

Taksa nei murdi le thilhring ni iompuihai khom, sahai, ramsahai irnênga bokvâka fehai le vâhai khom hmunkhatin hruai suakhai vingin lân, irnênga hin nâilete nei intamin, irchi tamtak neia an hong pung theina hrangin,” tiin a hrila.
Khanchu Nova kha a dôngma le a nâihai le a moinuhai an rêngin an suaka,
sa tinrêng le thilhring murdi vahai irkuang ata an mâni irchi om dân ang takin an suak ta.
Khan Nova’n
Khan
Irnêng om sûng chu bu’nrît le bu âtin, kholum le khodâi, phalbi le kholum, sûn le zânhai, khom boi no ni,” a tia.
Khan Pathianin, Nova le a nâihai kha bor a pêkhaia, an kuang khan, “Irchi tamtak thâka hong pungin irnêng chung lua insip roi.
Nangnihai hi irnêng ramsahai le vâhai khomin chitna nangni nei an ti; annihai le bokvâka fâk zong murdi le tuipui sûnga ngahai khom, nin kuta pêk an ni zit ta.
Thilhring châng thei murdi khom nin hrangin fâk thei ni an ta, anhring nangni ki ipêk ang khan itinrêng nangni ki pêk zit ta.
Khannisianlân sahai hi a thisen om pumin nin ifâk hrang ni ma.
Khan nin thisen, nin hringnahai chu keiin phuba ki ilâk ngêt hrang a ni, sa murdihai laia khom mihriam laia khom, mi tin an urêng laia khom phuba chu ki ilâk ving hrang a ni.
Mi tukhom mihriam thisen insuaktu chu, mihriam ngêtin ama thisen an insuaktir hrang a ni. Pathian irangpuia siam an ni sikin.
Khan, nangni chu irchi suanpâr tam takin hong pung unglân; irnênga hin nâi tamtak nei unglân; irnêng hong sip roi,” a tia.
Khan Pathianin Nova le a nâihai kuanga khan,
“Irngai roi, keima ngêtin nangni le nin irchi la hong om hranghai kuanga ki thuthung chu ki indet a ni,
nin kuanga vahai, sahai le ram sahai, irkuang ata suak murdihai laia.
Nin kuang ki thuthung chu indet ki ta, taksa nei murdihai khom tuilêtin indîlin irhmang ta no nihaia, irnêng insiat hrangin tui khom lêt ta no ni,” tiin a hrila.
Khan Pathian ngêtin, “Hi hi kei le nangni le nin laia thilhring om murdihai laia khom mongni nei loia om mai hranghai laia thuthung irsinsiana a ni.
Sûmphâi kâra sumrisâng inkûi a ta, kha kha kêng kei le nangni kâra thuthung irsinsiana a ini hrang.
Khan, hiang hin ni a ta, irnêng chunga sûmphâi ki’rzâmtirin chu, sumrisâng chu sûm laia inlang a ta,
kei le nangni le taksa nei murdihai thilhring tinrêng kâra ki thuthung om hi inhre mai ki ta, khanchu tuihai chu taksa nei murdi insiat ta loi hrangin hong lêt ta no ni.
Khan sumrisâng chu sûmphâi laia inlang ta a ta. Khanchu Pathian le irnêng chunga taksa om murdi thilhring tinrêng kâra kumtuanga ki thuthung om chu kin hriat maina hrangin en hen ki ti,” a tia.
Khan Pathian ngêtin Nova kuanga khan, “Hi hi kêng kei le irnêng chunga taksa nei murdi laia ki thuthung det irsinsiana a ni,” a ti nôka.
Nova nâihai irkuang ata zôkhai chu Sema, Hama le Jafeta an ni. Hama chu Kanaana pa a ni.
Hi mi inthumhai hi Nova nâihai chu an ni. Anni inthumhai irchi hi irnêng chung an isip tâk a ni.
Khan, Nova chu loi sinthopu a nia, grep irhuan siam masatakpu a ni.
Uain kha a ina, an ruia, a puan ina khan korongboiin a zâla,
khan Hama, Kanaana pa khan a pa korongboia om chu a va hmua, pên tianga a urênghai ruai kha a hrilhaia.
Khanchu Sema le Jafeta’n puan an lâka, an tuama an hnung tiang an irzôna, hnung tianga irheiin an pa korongboi kha, an irkhû en loiin,
khan Nova uain inrui a hong harin chu, a nâi mitumtakpa thiltho chu a hon hriat suaka.
Khanchu, “Kanaana chu khosâl tongin om ri se;
a urênghai siahlohai siahlo ni ri se,” a tia.
Kanaana chu siahlo’n om ri se.
Pathianin Jafeta chu mi lian inchangtir sianlân,
Sema puan ina om ri se;
khan Kanaana chu siahlo’n om ri se. a ti nôka.
Khan Nova chu tuisâng a lian zoiin kum 350 a dama,
khanchu Nova dam sûng kum chu 950 a ni, khanchu a thi ta.
Khan, Nova nâihai Sema, Hama le Jafeta hai irchi chu hiang hin a ni. Tuilian zoia chu nâilete an hong neihaia.
Jafeta nâihai chu Gomera, Magoga, Madaia, Javana, Tubala, Meseka, le Tirasa hai an ni.
Khan Gomera nâipasalhai chu Askenaza, Rifata le Togarma hai an ni.
Khan Javana nâipasalhai chu Elisa, Tarsisa, Kitima, le Dodanima-hai an ni.
Annihai ata irthoka hin kêng, Jentail ramchârna hmuna an ram omna hrang hmun chita an indara; an chong hmang ang hrang le an nam om hrang ang chitin an om tâk.
Khan Hama nâihai chu Kusa, Mizraima, Puta le Kanaana hai an ni,
khan Kusa nâihai chu Seba, Havila, Sabta, Raama le Sabteka hai an ni, khan Raama nâihai chu Seba le Dedana an ni.
Khan Kusa khan chu nâipasal Nimroda kha a neia, ama hi irnênga hin mi hrâttak a hong ni tâka.
makunga sa kâp hrâttak a nia; khasikin, “
Khan, a rêng chang phutna ram chu Sinar ram Babel khua, Erek khua, Akad khua le Kalne khuahai a nia;
kha ram ata a suak zoiin, Assuria rama a lûta, Ninevi khua, Rehobot-ir khua, Kala khua,
Ninevi le Kala khua kâra Resen khua a chuana. (Resen khua hi khua inthang tak a ni.)
Khan Mizraima khan Lud hai, Anam hai, Lebab hai, Nafta hai,
Pathros mihai, Kaslu mihai. Hi mihai hi Filistia le Kaftor mihai irchihai an ni.
Khan, Kanaana khan nâilutîr Sidona a neia, Hetha khom a nei nôka;
Jebus hai, Amor hai, Girgas hai le
Hiv mihai, Arka hai, Sin mihai, le
Arvad hai, Zemar hai, Hamath mihai an hong irzira: kha zoiin chu Kanaana namhai chu an irthek indarh zoi tâka.
Khan, Kanaana hai ramri chu Sidon khua ata Gerar sim tiang pang Kaza khua dênin; Sodom le Gomora le Adma le Zeboim sim tiang Lasa khua dênin a ni.
Hihai hi kêng Hama irchihai an ini, an nam omdân hrang angin, an chong hmang hrang angin an nam le an irchi om hrang angin an om ta.
Khan Sema, Ebera nâihai irchibul, Jafeta upa khomin nâi a neia,
Sema nâihai chu Elama, Asura, Arpaksada, Luda, le Arama hai an ni.
Khan Arama nâihai chu Uza, Hula, Gethera, le Masa hai an ni.
Khan Arpaksada’n chu nâipasal Sela a neia; khan Sela’n nâi Ebera a neia.
Khan Ebera’n nâipasal hni a neia: inkhat irhming chu Pelega a nia, a dam laiin a ram kha senin a oma; a sangpa irhming chu Joktana a ni.
Khan Joktana’n nâi Almodada, Selefa, Hazarmavetha, Jera le
Hadorama, Uzala, Dikla le
Obala, Abimaela, Seba le
Ofira, Havila le Jababa hai a neia: hihai murdi hi Joktana nâihai chu an ni.
Khan an omna chu Mesa ata nisua tiang Sefar lam panna lam a nia.
Hihai hi kêng Sema irchihai an ini, an nam om hrang dân angin, an chong hmang hrang lam angin, an irchi om hrang le ram om hrang angin an oma.
Hihai hi Nova irchihai le nam omhai an ni, an irchihai angin, an irchihai laia, tuilêt zoi ata irnêng chunga chi tin nam tin a hong indarh a ni ta.
Khanchu irnêng chunga mi murdi hi chong hmunkhat, thuhril lam hmunkhat an ni vinga.
Khan hiang hi a nia, nisua tiang an irthon laiin Sinar rama phâizôl an hmua; kha hmun khan om hmun an khuara,
khan “Tho pilrôngar siam ei ta, a sate’n hâl inhmin ei ti,” an irtia. Khanchu lung irthûlin pilrôngar hmangin âlkatara leh inluanin.
Khanchu, “Tho khopui siam ei ti, in irsâng a sîp irzumin irvân sun rakin siam ei ta, ei irhming an thang theina hrangin, khano’nchu irnêng chunga hin irthek indarh zoiin om ei ti,” an tia.
Khan,
khan,
Tho zu fe ei ta, chong an irhlet thei loina hrangin an chong zu’ndanglam pehai ei ti,” a tia.
Khatak ata
khasikin a’rhming khom Babel an phuaa;
Hi hi Sema irchihai chu an ni. Sema chu kum 100 mi a nia, tuilêt zoi kum hni tena chu nâipasal Arpaksada a neia:
khan Arpaksada a nei zoiin Sema chu kum 500 a la dama nâipasal le nâinupang a la neihai sa.
Khan Arpaksada’n kum sômthum ringa a ni le nâipasal Sela a neia;
khan Sela a nei zoiin Arpaksada chu kum 403 a la dama, nâinupang le nâipasal a la neihai sa.
Khan, Sela kha kum 30 a ni le nâipasal Ebera a neia;
khan Ebera a nei zoiin Sela chu kum 403 a la dama, nâinupang le nâipasal a la neihai sa.
Khan, Ebera’n kum 34 a ni le nâipasal Pelega a neia;
khan, Pelega a nei zoiin Ebera chu kum 430 a la dama, nâinupang le nâipasal a neihai sa.
Khan, Pelega khan kum 30 a ni le nâipasal Reua a neia;
khan Reua a nei zoiin Pelega chu kum 209 a la dama, nâinupang le nâipasal a neihai sa.
Khan Reua khan kum 32 a ni le nâipasal Seruga a neia:
khan Seruga a nei zoiin Reua chu kum 207 a la dama, nâinupang le nâipasal a neihai sa.
Khan Seruga khan kum 30 a ni le nâipasal Nahora a neia:
khan Nahora a nei zoiin Saruga chu kum 200 a la dama, nâinupang le nâipasal a neihai sa.
Khan Nahora kha kum 29 a ni le nâipasal Tera a neia;
khan Tera a nei zoiin Nahora chu kum 119 a la dama, nâinupang le nâipasal a neihai sa.
Khan Tera kha kum 70 a ni le nâipasal Abrama, Nahora, le Harana a neihai sa.
Khan, hihai hi Tera irchihai chu an ni, Tera khan nâipasal Abrama, Nahora le Harana hai a neihaia: khan Harana khan nâipasal Lota a neia.
Khan Harana chu a’rzirna rama, Kaldai hai khua Ur, a pa Tera kôla a thia.
Khan Abrama le Nahora hai chu dôngma an neia: Abrama dôngma irhming chu Saraii a ni; Nahora dôngma irhming chu Harana nâinu Milkaii a ni, Harana chu Milkaii pa le Iskaii pa chu a ni.
Khan Saraii chu nâi boiin a chinga.

Khan Tera’n a nâipa Abrama chu a tupa Lota, Harana nâipahai kuanga a moinu Saraii chu a hruaihaia; khan Kanaan fe hrangin Kaldai hai khua, Ur-ah irthokin an suaka; Haran khua an tunga, kha hmun khan om hmun an khuara.
Khan Tera dam sûng chu kum 205 a nia; khanchu, Tera chu Haran khuaa khan a thi ta.
Khan
khanchu irchi tamtakin nang siam ki ta, sat tinrêng nang vur ki ti, ni’rhming inthangtir ki ti; khan, nang satvurna ni ro.
Khan sat nang vurtu murdihai satvurhai ki ti.
Khua nang sâltu chu khuasâlhai ki ti,
nangmaa khan irnênga nam tin satvurin la om an ti,”
a tia.
Khan Abrama khomin
Khan Abrama dôngma Saraii le a sangpa nâi Lota le an sum nei murdi le Haran khuaa an mi nei takhai a hruaia: Kanaan rama fe hrangin an suaka; Kanaan ram chu an tung tâka.
Khan Abrama chu, kha rama Sekem hmun dênin, More tâng seso thing hmun dênin a fe zêla; kha zoro khan Kanaan mihai chu kha rama khan an lei oma.
Khan
Khan khatak ata Bethel nisua tiang tânga a’rsona, kha khan puan in a sunga, nisua tiang Bethel a oma. Nitâk tiang Ai khua a oma: kha hmuna khan
Khan Abrama chu sim tiang ram panin a’rson nôk thiaia.
Khan kha rama khan châm a hong tâka: kha rama châm kha a nahrai sikin, Abrama chu Aigupta rama zu om viat hrangin a suak tâka.
Khan hiang hin a nia, Aigupta rama an lût hrangin a dôngma Saraii kuanga khan, “Irngai ro, nupang hmêl satak ni nih ti kin hriat.
Khanchu hiang hin ni a ti, Aigupta mihaiin an ni hmuin chu, hi hi a dôngma a ni, ti an ta; keima chu an ni ithat hrang a ni, nang chu nang hruaipai an ti.
Nangma sikin a dama ki om theina hrangin, a farnu ki ni, lungkham takin ni irti mai hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khan hiang hi a hong nia, Abrama khan Aigupta ram a lûtin chu, Aigupta-haiin nupangnu kha an hmua, a hmêl a sa pehai hraia an indita.
Faroa milianhai khomin an hmua, Faroa ina an hruai inlûta.
Khan, ama’n chu Saraii sikin Abrama chu satakin a dona, belra, sehrât, sakuartunghai, suaknu suakpa le saringseihai a neipui tâka.
Khan
Khanchu Faroa’n Abrama kha a koia, “Ki chunga hin i sin tak mo ni itho tâk? Ni dôngma a nih ti itho mo ni ni inhril loi?
ki farnu kêng, itho mo ni iti? Ni ti no sika kêng dôngma’n ki inei a ni hi te: a dik atûn chu ni dôngma hi hruaiin lân, fe pat roi,” a tia.
Khanchu hi thu sikin Faroa’n a mihai kuang thu a pêkhaia, hi mihai hi hong thakhai ta roi, a dôngma le an neinun nei murdihai leh a tia.
Khan Abrama chu Aigupta ram ata a suaka, Kanaan ram sim tiang a oma, a dôngma le an neinun murdi le Lota hai khom an rêngin an om suama.
Khan Abrama chu sahai, sum le puan, rângachakhai a nei intamin a sân a’rchonga.
Khan sim tiang ata irthonin Bethel hmun dênin a fea. Bethel le Ai khua kâra a phuta a puan in sungna hmun khan:
a phuta a maichâm siamna hmuna khan
Khan Lota, Abrama zuitu khom khan belra pâl, sehrât pâl le puan in a nei saa.
Khan hmunkhata omsuam hrangin chu a ram a chîn tâk sikin; an neinunhai lak an pung pehai sikin, om suam thei ta mahaia.
Khanchu Abrama sa enkoltuhai le Lota sa enkoltuhai kâra irsêlna a suak tâka; kha lai khan Kanaan mihai le Periz-hai khom, kha rama om an nia.
Khanchu Abrama’n Lota kuanga khan, “Lungkham takin, nang le keima kâra ei sa enkoltuhai laia khom irsêlna ite om no ri se, ulenâi ei ni sikin.
Ram irzât tak lak hin a iom mo ni ma? Lungkham takin keima kuang ata a bingin om ta ro: nangma vei tiang ni omin chu, keima chang tiang, nang chang tiang ni fe le keima vei tiang,” a tia.
Khanchu Lota chu ram a en vêla, Zoar khua tiang pan balamin, Jordan phâizôl murdi chu
Khanchu Lota khan Jordan phâizôl kha an thang tâka; khan nisua tiang depin a oma; an irsen tâka.
Abrama chu Kanaan rama khan a oma, Lota chu phâizôl khuaa a oma, a puan in chu Sodom khua dênin a son zêla.
Khan, Sodom khua mihai chu
Khan Lota a bingin a om zoi ata chu
ni ram hmu murdi hi nang le ni’rchihai a vuan ata kumkhuain nang pe ki ti.
Khan ni’rchihai khom irnêng chunga la tam an ta, tûte itep zoi loiin om an ti.
Thoiin lân ram hi a dung a khang irfang suak ro: nang ki ipêk hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu Abrama’n a puan in a sona, Hebron-a om, Mamre saso thing kôla khan omhmun a khuara; khataka khan
Khan Sinar khuaa rêng Amrafela hai, Elasar khuaa rêng Arioka hai, Elam khua rêng Kedorlaomera hai, Goiim khua rêng Tidala hai dam lai khan hiang hi a nia,

anni’n chu Sodom khuaa rêng Bera kha an doia, Gomora khuaa rêng Birsa hai, Adma khuaa rêng Sinaba hai, Zeboim khuaa rêng Semebera hai, Bela khuaa rênghai kha an doia. (Bela khua chu Zoar khua a ni ta.)
Khahai murdi kha Sidim hual sûnga khan an irsan irhlôma (hi hual sûng hi Tuipui Al a ni.)
Kum sômhleihni sûng chu Kedorlaomera hnuaia an oma, a kum sômhleithum changna’n chu an hong tehel an zong tâka.
Khanchu kum sômhlei minlina’n chu Kedorlaomera le a kôla rêng omhai an honga, Asterot-Karnaim rama Refa-hai, Ham rama Zuzim-hai, Seva-kiriathaim rama Enim-hai leh
ramchâr kôla om El-paran dung, Seir tângrama om Hor-hai dênin an hong inhnêhaia.
Khanchu an kîr nôka En-mispat an tunga, (hi hi chu Kades a ni ta) Amalek rama mi murdi le Amor-hai Zazon-tamar khuaa omhai khom kha an thathai nôka.

Khanchu Sodom khuaa rênghai Gomora khuaa rênghai, Adma khuaa rênghai, Zeboim khuaa rênghai, Bela khuaa rênghai an suaka, (Bela chu Zoar khua a ni ta.) Khan Sidim hualsûnga khan annihai doi hrangin irnak an lâk irruala,
Elam khuaa rêng Kedorlaomera hai, Goiim khuaa rêng Tidala hai, Sinar khuaa rêng Amrafela hai, Ellasar khuaa rêng Arioka-hai doi hrangin; rêng minli’n, rêng ringa an doihaia.
Khan Sidim hual chu âlkatara khuri’n a sipa, khan Sodom le Gomora khuaa rênghai chu an intâna, âlkatara khura khan an tâka, a tâk banhai kha tâng tiang an rota.
Khanchu Sodom le Gomora khua mi le an sumpuan le fâk nêk omhai an lâka, an fea.
Lota Abrama sangpa nâi, Sodom khuaa om chu, a sumhai le ama khom lâkin an fe nôk ta.

Khan mi inkhat hong intân chu a hong lûta, Hebrai mi Abrama kha a hrila: Abrama chu Amor mi Mamre thing irkhang kôla om ngai kha a ni. Mamre chu Eskola sang le Anera sanghai an ni; annihai hi chu Abrama hai leh irkop an ni.
Abrama’n a nâi kha suak hrangin an hruai ti an hriatin chu, a ina irzira mihriamhai, irchu sai tâk 318 a hruaihaia, Dan khua dênin a’rzûlhai ta.
Khan zâna chu anni doi hrangin ama le a mihai kha a’rsempuihaia; an thathai ta. Hoba khua dênin an irzûlhaia. (Hoba chu Damaska khua hmâr tianga om a ni.)
Khan sumpuan murdi chu a hong chôi nôk vinga, a nâi Lota le a sumhai khom, nupanghai khom a hong hruaihai nôka, mi dang om murdihai le.
Khan Kedorlaomera le a kôla rêng omhai a thathai zoiin chu Sodom rêng chu Save hualsûnga khan Abrama don hrangin a fea, (Save hual chu rêng hualsûng a ni ta.)
Khan Salem khuaa Rêng Melkisedeka’n bai le uain a lâka, Abrama a pêka. Ama chu Pathian inchungtak a ni.
Melkisedeka’n Abrama chu sat a vura, “Irnêng le irvân siamtu, Pathian inchungtakin, Abrama chu satvur ri se!
ni râlhai ni kuta nang pêktu, Pathian inchungtak chu inpâkin om ri se,” a tia. Khan Abrama’n ama kha itinrênga sôma inkhat a pêka.
Khan Sodom khuaa rêngin Abrama kuang, “Mihriamhai hi ni pe’n lân, sumhai hi chu nangin la ro,” a tia.

Khan, Abrama’n Sodom khuaa rêng kuang khan, “Pat malkhat khom, kekok insuina hruite khom, ni inei ite la no ning, itinrêng irvân neitu Pathian inchungtak makunga ki kut ki iphar a ni ta, anino’nchu, ‘Abrama chu keima irchongtir kêng ni itih hrang mo ni ma’
ruathartehai fâk inhek hrang le a ni zuihai mantum ti no chu ite la no ning; Anera hai, Eskola hai, Mamre haiin an mantumhai chu la ri sehai,” a tia.
Kha zoiin chu Abrama kuang Pathianin, “Abram chi no ro, kei hi ni pho le lômman hlutak ki ni,” tiin
Khan Abrama’n, “O
Khan Abrama’n, “Irngai roh irchi ni pe mak chea: en roh ki ina suak hi kêng ki’rchon lua hrang a ini ta,” a tia.
“Khan irngai ro, kha mi khan ni’rchon lua thei no ni; nangma rîla ra ngêtin kêng nir chon chu a ilua hrang,” tiin
Khan pên tiang a hruaia, “Irvân khi en ro, ârsihai khi ni tep theiin chu tep ro, a tia. Khanchu
Khan
Khan a kuang, “Hi ram lua hranga Kaldaihai khua, Ur ata hruai suaktu
Khan Abrama’n, “O
Khan ama khan, “Sehrât irla kum thuma le kêlpui kum thum mi le belrachal kum thum mi le vasu le phervalite ni hong chôi pe ta,” a tia.
Khanchu a hong chôi pea, a laitaka a tuk tanhaia, phalkhatin a’rboptirhai vinga, vatehai chu tuk loiin.
Irmuhai saruak fâk hrangin an chuma khan, Abrama’n a le’nhnotpaihai ngai.
Khan khohloi misa tâk tôn chu Abrama chu a inmusu tâka; khan irngai ro, zîng irkhêltak hin a hong zîng dela.
Khan Abrama kuang Pathianin, “Ni’rchihai chu an ram ni loina hmuna chu mikhualin la om an ta, an sin an la itho pehai hrang a ni kha; kum 400 dengthei tuang an ta;
khan an sintho pehai chungthu khom ngaitua ki ti: khanchu sumpuan tamtak neiin suak an ti.
Nangma chu ni’rchibulhai kuang irtharngam takin fe ni ti, ni sam chuak vinga tarin nang phûm an ti.
Khan irlo minlinahai khom hin hong an ta; Amor-hai sualna hi a la’rkip no sikin,” a tia.
Khan, hiang hi a nia, misa a tâka rammual a hon thimin chu, irngai ro, meikhu senduk irzâmin kôlirtêk angin meichok luai luai inlôi a oma;
kha nî tena chu
Ken-hai, Keniz-hai, Kadmonhai,
Hit-hai, Periz-hai, Refaim-hai,
Amor-hai, Kanaan-hai, Girgas-hai le Jebus-hai khom ki pêk sa,” tiin Abrama kuanga thu a thung tâka.
Khan Abrama dôngma Saraii khan chu nâi a neipui no sikin: Saraii khan Aigupta mi suaknu inkhat an idôn a oma, a’rhming chu Hagari a ni.
Khan, Saraii khan Abrama kuang, “Irngai ro duah,
Khanchu Abrama dôngma Saraii khan Abrama chu Kanaan rama kum 10 a om hnungin a suaknu Hagari chu a hruaia; a pasal Abrama kuanga a dôngma hrangin a pêka.
Khan, Hagari kha a’rpôlpuia; an râia, khan an râi ti a’rhriatin chu a pi kha a theimâk tâka.
Khanchu Saraii khan Abrama kuang, “Ki thil tuang hi nangin a mô pêl ro: ki suaknu chu nangma ompui hrang ki tia, an râi ti a’rhriatin chu a ni theimâka;
Abrama’n Saraii kuanga khan, “Irngai ro, ni suaknu chu ni kuta om kêng a ini, a sa ni iti lam takin lo ta ro,” a tia. Khanchu Saraii khan deng an theitira, a rotsan tâka.
Khan
“Hagari, Saraii suaknu, khô rengata ni ihong mo, khôna fe hrang mo ni ni?” a tia. Khan, ama’n, “Ka pi Saraii kuang ata ki hong irot a ni,” a tia.
Khan
Vântîrtôn ngêtin a kuang, “Ni’rchi chu tep zoiloi rakin nang la’ntam pe ki ti,” a ti pe nôka.
Vântîrtônin a kuang, “Irngai ro, nâi ni vong ta, nâipasal nei ni ta; Pathianin ni dengthei lam an hriat tâk sikin, a’rhming khom Ismaela ni iphua hrang a ni.
Ama chu mihriam laia om loiin ram sakuartung angin; mi murdi doi a ta, mi tinin ama khom doi an ti; a urênghai leh khom omsuam no nihai,” a ti pe nôka.
Khan Hagari chu a chongpuitu
Khasikin kêng tuisunsuak chu Beer-lahai-roi, iti a ni. “Tuisunsuak hring hmutu a ni,” Kades le Bered khua kâra om a ni.
Khan Hagari’n Abrama kha nâipasal a neipuia; khan Abrama’n Hagari leh an nâi chu a’rhming Ismaela a phuaa.
Khan Hagari’n Abrama nâi a nei lai hin Abrama chu kum 86 mi a ni.
Khan Abrama kha kum 99 mi a niin
Khanchu nangma le ei kâra thu thung ki ta, ni’rchi inpungtir ki ti,” a tia.
Khan, Abrama chu khûksadelin a oma, Pathianin a chongpuia;
“Irngai ro, keima’n ki thuthung chu nangma kuang ki intung a ni hi, atûn ata nam tin chi tin inpungpu ni ta ni ti.
Ni’rhming khom Abram ni ta no nia; Abrahama ni ta ni ti; nam dang dang inpungpu’n nang ki isiam a ni ta.
Nam tin chi tin nangma ata suak an ta, senkhat chu rêng ni an ta, rammual bitin pung ta ni ti.
Khan kei le nangma le ni’rchi hong pung hranghai Pathian ni hrangin kumtuanga hek ta loi hranga thuthung ki indet a ni ta.
Khan ni kôl le ni hnunga ni’rchi la hong om hranghaiin chu ni mikhualna ram, Kanaan ram murdi hi kumkhua irchon hrangin nangni ki pêk; khan keima hi an Pathian ni ki ti,” a tia.
Khanchu Pathian ngêtin Abrahama kuanga khan, “Nangma’n chu ki thuthung hi ni izôm hrang a ni; nangin ni izôm ngêt hrang a ni. Ni hnunga ni’rchihai dênin an izôm ving hrang a ni.
Hi hi nang le keima le ni’rchihai kâra thuthung chu a ni, nin laia pasal murdi chu ser nin itan hrang a ni.
Khanchu, nin servun taksa kha tanin nin iom hrang a ni; hi hi kêng nangma le keima kâra thuthung irsinsiana a inih hrang a ni.
Khanchu a suak ata sûn riat ni sûnga chu nangma nâi mo, mi nâi ni iompui mo, mikhual mo, suma ni irchôk a ni khomin, pasal murdi chu a ser ni itan hrang a ni.
Ni ina suak khom, suma ni irchôk khom a ser ni itan hrang a ni: khan kêng ki thuthung kha kumtuang thuthung a nih ti nin taksa khan a iom hrang.
Khan, pasal ser tanloi, a vun tan loia om chu, a’rchihai lai ata thatpai a ini hrang a ni; ama’n chu ki thuthung a insiat a ni,” a ti nôka.
Khan Pathian ngêtin Abrahama kuanga khan, “Ni dôngma Saraii khom a’rhming Saraii ti ta no chi nia; a’rhming chu Sari ni ta a ti.
Khan ama khom satvur ki ta, ama rengata nâipa nang ki ipêk hrang a ni, ama chu satvur ki ta, nam chi tin irchinu ni ta a ti; ama ata nam chi tin le rêng khom la suak an ti,” a ti nôka.
Khanchu Abrahama chu an boka, a lungrîla, a minui an za pea, “Kum irzakhat mi hin mo, nâi a la inei hrang? Sari kum sômkuak mi hin mo nâi a la inei hrang?” a tia.
Khan Abrahama’n Pathian kuang, “Ismaela hi ni makunga om thei ni sianlân!” a tia.

Khan Pathianin, “Ni thei no ni, ni dôngma Sari’n nâipasal nang neipui a ti; a’rhming khom Isaka phua ni ti: iti’n ki thuthung chu hi zoia irchihai hrang khomin kumkhua thuthung ni hrangin ki indet a ni.
Ismaela chungthu khom irngaitua ki ti: irngai ro, ama chu sat ki vur ta, irchi tamtak inpung a ta; ama’n chu rêng sômkhat inhni nei a ta, ama khom chi inpungtu lian takin siam ki ti.
Ki thuthung hi chu Isaka, nakuma Sari’n atûn lai zoroa a inei hrangpa kuanga vai kêng ki indet ual hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu a kuanga thuhril chu a monga, khan Pathianin Abrahama kha a suaksan ta.

Khan, Abrahama chu a nâipa Ismaela le a ina suakhai le sum le puana a irchôkhai murdi, Abrahama urênghai laia pasal murdi a hruaihaia, Pathianin a ihril pe ang takin, kha ni sûn zel khan an servun a tan pehaia.
Khan, Abrahama khom a servun taksa an tan lai hin kum 99 mi a ni.
Khan, a nâipa Ismaela servun taksa an tan lai hin kum 13 mi a ni.
Hi ni sûn ata hi Abrahama le a nâipa Ismaela khom sertan an ni ta.
A urênghai le a ina suakhai le sum le puana a irchôkhai khom an rêngin sertan an hong ni ving ta.
Abrahama chu sûn lum laitaka puan in mikot kôla a toi lai takin,
khan a hong tanga, a ena, khan irngai ro, a kôla khan mi inthum ngîr a hmua; a hmu infelhaiin chu, anni lômhai hrangin a van tâna, khûksadelin chubai a va mûkhaia;
“Ka pu lung nin khamin lân, ni siahlo hi ni lôi no hrâm roh.
Tui tômte hong la ki ta, nin kehai irsu unglân, thing dâihlîm hnuaia hin sôl irngam roi.

Bai fâk zât chînte va la ki ta, nin fena lama nin hrât theina hrangin, ki in nin ni lômpuina le keima’n nin sin ki thôna nin chang pe roi,” a tia. khan anni khomin, “Ni iti angin va tho ta ro,” an tia.
Khanchu Abrahama chu Sari omna puan in sûnga a lût lata, “Bai indiap sai, danh thum siamin lân, hmet inzôiin changpêr angin siam ro,” a tia.
Khanchu Abrahama chu sehrât omna tiang a fea, sehrâtchal satak hi a hong kaia, a sin thotuhai kuanga a pêka, an siam pe lata.
Sehrât dût le sehrâtchal suang sai a lâka, a va darhaia; khan thing kôla a ngîr chiana, anni’n an nêk pe tâka.
Khan anni’n a kuanga khan, “Ni dôngma Sari teh khôn mo a om?” an tia. khan ama’n, “So puan in sûnga son,” a tia.

Khan anni laia inkhatin, “Zoro hi a hong tung nôk tika chu ni kuanga hong nôk ki ti, khan irngai ro, ni dôngma Sari’n nâipasal nei a ti,” a tia. khan a hnung tiang puan in mikot ata Sari’n an hriat chiana.
Abrahama le Sari chu ulian tak tartak anni tâka; nupang ihmu ngai khom ite hmu ta maka;
khanchu Sari’n, “Tar ki ni zoi hin lômna mo la nei ning, ki rêngpa lak a ulian ok tâka?” iti insâpin a minui an za pea.
Khan,
Khanchu Sari’n, “Innui lua ma ung duah” tiin chit le rumrâiin a tia. khan ama’n chu a ni lo loi kha ti no ro, “Nin nui kha te,” a tia.
Khan, mi murdi an thoia, Sodom khua tiang an ena: Abrahama’n annihai thak hrangin a om saa.
Khan
Abrahama lak hi irchi tamtak le sinthothei a la ini hrang a nia; ama rengata hi rammual mi tin sat la vur ki ti.
hnung an zui theina hrangin a hnunga a nâihai le a in mihai, thil fel le roirêl indik hrangin kin kung tâk sikin, khanchu ama chungchânga hrila
Khanchu
atûn zu fe ki tah an irhû a isiat ang hin an sual le sualloi zu’nfel ki ta, inhre thei ni a ti,”
khan mi inhni an suaka Sodom mâksanin, khan
Khan Abrahama’n a va pana, “Mi felhai khom hi mi dik loihai laia hin ni ithathai sa hrang ma ni?
kho sûnga hin chu mi fel sômringa vêl chu an om khom a ni thei: a sûnga mi fel sômringa omhai khom hôihai loiin an khua hi ni insiat hrang ma ni?
nangma’n chu khaanga mi felhai mi suala an lût thei loina hrangin, mi felhai hi a sualhai le thathai hrangin chu tak nang sôn ma unga; irnêng chunga roirêltu’n fel takin a irêl ngai mo ni ma?” a tia.
Khanchu
Khan Abrahama’n, “
mi fel chu ringa irsamin sômringa an kâi no khomin ni ithathai hrang mo?” a ti nôka. Khan
Kha hnung chu a’rdon nôka, “Sômminli vai mi fel ni hmu’n te,” a tia. Ama’n, “Sômminli vai an om khomin thathai no ning,” a tia.
Khan Abrahama’n, “O
Khan ama’n irngai ro, nang ki ichongpui thei a ni sikin: “Sômhni vai an omin te,” a tia. Khan, ama’n, “Sômhni vai an om khomin irhmangtir no ning,” a tia.
Khan ama’n, “O
Khanchu
Khan, vântîrtôn inhni khohloi tiang Sodom khua an tunga; Lota chu Sodom khua dâimitzînga a lei toia: Lota’n a hmuhaia, lômhai hrangin a ngîra; khûksadelin chubai a mûkhaia;

“khan lungkham takin puhaio, nin sinthotu ina hin irngam unglân, nin ke nin kut irsûkin zân riak unglân, zîng nôka nin thoi le nin fena hranga la fe ta roi,” a tia. Khannisianlân anni’n chu, “Ni no ni, keini chu kholaidunga riak kin ti,” an tia.
Khannisianlân a ngênhai hrai sikin, an zuia, a ina an lûta, bu anh a suanga, bu anh tuitak fâkin an oma.
Khannisianlân, an zâl mân Sodom khuaa mi, bunglu bungdop, a lian a chînin an irhuala;
Khan Lota kuanga khan, “A vuana ni ina mi hong lûthai kha khôn mo an om? anni kin irpôlpuihai theina hrangin kin kuang zuang tuanghai ro,” an tia.
Khan, Lota chu mikot a van honga a enhaia, in a khâr nôka.
Khan, “Urênghaio lungkham takin hi angpa hrai hin chu sual no roi ba!

irngai roi, pasal la irpôlpui ngai loi nâi dôngmate inhni ki nei: lung nin kham unglân, anni hi nangni kuta nin izo zôt lôhai roi, a sa nin iti angin ompuihai roi; hi mihai chunga vai hin ite dengintheihai no roi, khasikin kêng ki ina an hong irngam,” a tia.

Khan anni’n chu, “Irkhâi zel ro,” an tia. Khanchu, “Hi mi hi mo, hitaka om hranga hong lût, roirêltu chang nuam a la ni sa rêk: atûn chu annihai nêkin, nangma chunga kêng nang kin isoisak ual hrang,” an tia. Khan, Lota kha inkhâr insiatin an irbuanpuia.
Khannisian, mihai khan an selhaia, Lota chu in sûnga an kai lûta in an khârkhuma;
khan inkhâr kôla omhai, a chîn a lianhai mit an incho pehaia: khanchu inkhâr hmu thei loiin an siahai ta.
Khan, mi inhnihai khan Lota kuang, “Hi mihai ti no hi ni irnâipui mo an la om? Nâipasal, nupang, ni moi ni mâk murdi hruai suakhaiin lân, hi khua hi suaksan ta roi,
inhriatin an sualzia an thang tâk sikin, hi khua hi insiat hrang kin ni ta: insiatpai hrangin
Khanchu, Lota chu a suaka, a mâkpahai a va hrilhaia; “Thoi unglân, hi khua hi suaksan ta roi,
Khan zîng kôl a hong irsalin chu, “Thoiin lân, ni dôngma le ni nâi dôngmate inhnihai hi hruaihai ro; khano’nchu, hi khua siatna hin thina nin ti,” tiin Lota chu an tuar tâka.
Khannisianlân irhnot loiin, ar ial maia; khanchu

Khan hiang hi a nia, kho pên tiang an om zoiin, “Ni hring theina hrangin intân ta ro; ni hnung khom irhei no ro, phâizôla khom hin irngam viat no’n lân, tâng tiang intân ro; khano’nchu ni ithi sa hrang kêng,” an tia.
Khannisian Lota’n “Ka pu hiang bâk hin chu ni no ri se ba.

Irngai ro, ni sintho hin chu ni mit ki itung mo ni ma. Nangma khonzâna chu a liana, kha khonzâna kha ki chunga hin ni saninzôkin nin lang pe’n lân, so tânga son chu intân thei no ning; thil saloi tongin ki ithi hrang kêng.
Irngai ro, so khua chînte so kêng intâna tung lat theina anaitak a ini; kho chînte ni khomsian ki zôk theina hrangin so son nin tântir ro,” a tia.
Khan anni khan, “Irngai ro, hi thil ni iti khom hi nang ki pom pe, khua ni iti khom so nang hâl pe no ning.
Irhnotin lân, so son van tân ro, ni tung mâka chu ite la ti thei ual no ning,” a tia. Khasikin kha kho’rhming khom kha Zoar an ti ta.
Lota’n Zoar khua a tung tena chu, irnêng chung chu misa a hong ir-al suak tâka,
khan
khanchu kha khua le phâizôl lian dôr le a mi omhai le thil ite mông thei loiin a hâl irhmang zit tâka.
A dôngma chu Lota hnunga omin a hnung tiang a’rheia, lungmichi a chang zel tâka.
Khan Abrahama chu zînga a thoiin
khan Sodom le Gomora phâizôl murdihai chu a thîra, a ena; kha rama meikhû kha hâlirhmang chit angin a khû irzâm hlut hlutin a oma.
Khan hiang hi a nia, Pathianin phâizôl a hâl irhmang laia, Lota omna hmun kha Pathianin Abrahama kha an hriat maia, Lota chu irhmangna hmun ata a sansuak a ni.
Khan Lota kha Zoar khua ata a suaka, tânga a oma; a nâi dôngmatehai inhni leh Zoar khuaa om ngam mahaia: an parêngin rôla an oma.
Khan a unu’n a sangnu kuang khan, “Ei pa laka hi a tar tâka, irnêng chunga hin dân ang taka ni’rpôlpui hrang lak pasal inkhat lua om ta mahaia;
tho ei pa hi uain in intir ei ta, irchi ei pung theina hrangin zâlpui ei ti,” an tia.
Khanchu kha ni zân chu uain an in intira: a unu kha a pa kôla lûtin a va zâlpuia, an pa’n a zâlpui khom inhre loiin a thoi nôka.
Khanchu zîng nôka chu a unu’n, a sangnu kuang khan, “Irngai ro, mizân zân khan ei pa ki zâlpuia, a vuan zân khom uain in intir ei ta; nangma lûtin lân, ei pa irchi pung hrangin va zâlpui ro,” a tia.
Khan hi nî zân khom hin an pa chu uain an in intira: a sangnu kha a va lûta a pa leh an zâlsuama, a zâlpui le a thoi nôk khom inhre loiin.
Khaang khan Lota nâinuhaiin an pa irpôlpuiin nâi an vonga;
a unu’n nâipasal a neia, a’rhming chu Moab a tia: hi mi hi atûna Moab-hai irchibul chu a ni.
Khan, a sangnu khomin nâipasal a neia, a’rhming chu Ben-amona a tia, hi mi hi atûn laia Amona-hai irchibul hi a ni.
Khan, Abrahama chu kha ram ata kha sim tiang a’rsona, Kades le Sur khua kâra omhmun a khuara, Gerar khuaa om pumin.
Khan a dôngma Sari kha Abrahama’n, ki farnu a ni a tia: khanchu Gerar khuaa rêng Abimeleka’n mi a tîra, Sari a van hruaitira.
Khannisianlân, Pathianin zâna a’rmangin Abimeleka kuang khan hiang hin a hrila, “Irngai ro, ni nupang hruai sikin mithi ni ni ta, mi dôngma kêng a ini,” a tia.
Abimeleka’n chu la’rpôlpui maka: “Khanchu
ama rengin ki nuchapa a ni a tia. Lungrîl fel le porinche loiin hi thu hi nang ki ihril a ni,” a tia.

Khan Pathianin a’rmang tiang, “A lungrîl porinche loia hi thu hi ni iti a ni, nang kin hriat, keima khomin ki chunga sin saloi tho loi hrangin nang ki ikhap a ni; khasikin, hi nu hi inthem hrang khomin nang phal ma ung.

Khasikin atûn zel mi dôngma kha pepai nôk ta ro; ama chu deipu kêng a ni, khan kêng nang chongchai pe a ta, ni hong idam hrang: ni pêk kîr nôk no’n chu ni ithi ngêt hrang a nih ti inhre ro, nang le ni inei murdihai le,” a tia.
Khanchu Abimeleka chu zînga a thoia, a sin thotuhai a bukhai zita, anni inhriatin thil tung murdi a hrilhaia; khan mihaiin an chi tak taka.

Khanchu Abimeleka’n Abrahama kha a koia, a kuang khan, “Kin chunga hin itho mo hiang sin hi ni itho? i ang sin mo ni chunga kin inchâina om, kei le kin khua kin tuihai chunga thil saloi tak ni hong intungtir hi? Thil tho loi hrangtak ni itho tâk hi,” a tia.
Khan Abimeleka’n Abrahama kuang, “Imo ni ihmu, hi thil ni itho ngam hi?” a ti nôka.
Khan, Abrahama’n, “Hi kho sûnga hin Pathian chitna nei mi nin om viat no sikin, ki dôngma ki ti’n teh kei nin ni ithat ngam hrang a nih ti kin hriat sika a ni.
Khakhêla, ka pa tianga ki farnu khom a ni. Ka pa farnu nâi a nia, dôngma’n ki inei a ni ta:

khan hiang hi a nia, Pathianin ka pa in ata kin vâi lai khan, hiang hin ni lungthungna chu ki chunga ni inlangtir hrang a ni, ei tungna in hmun tina; ki nuchapa a ni, ni iti mai hrang a ni, ki iti pe tâk kêng,” a tia.
Khan Abimeleka’n belrahai, sehrâthai le suaknu le suakpahai a hruaihaia, Abrahama kha a pêka, a dôngma Sari khom a pêk kîr nôka.
Khan Abimeleka’n, “En ro, ram lian tak ki nei, ni iom nuamna taka om ro,” a tia.
Khan Sari kuang khan, “En ro, ni nuchapa hi sum sângkhat ki pêk ta: a ni hmutuhai murdi mithmua, mi dikloi ni loiin, mi dik ni nih ti inhriatna hrangin, nangma chunga ite dik loina om ma,” a tia.
Khanchu Abrahama kha Pathian kuang a chongchaia; khan Pathianin Abimeleka le a dôngma le a suakhai khan damna an chang zela; nâi an hong nei tâka.
Abrahama dôngma Sari sikin Abimeleka in sûng mihai chu nâi boiin an iching tâk a ni.
Khan,
Khanchu Sari chu an râia, Pathianin hunbi a lei inkung nî taka chu, Abrahama tar hnungin nâipasal a neipui ta.
Khan Abrahama, Sari ineipui irhming khom Isaka a phua ta.
Khan Abrahama’n Pathian thupêk ang takin a nâipa Isaka chu sûn riat a chukin a ser a tan pea.
Khan Abrahama’n, Isaka a nei lai hin kum 100 mi a nia.
Khan Sari khan, “Pathianin a nin nuitir ta; mi tin a nin hriat murdihai khom an raifân ta a ti,” a tia.
Khan ama ngêtin, “Sari’n nâite la pom a tah ti tu’n mo Abrahama kuang lei hril ngam om hrang? a tar hnunga nâi ki ineipui tâk hi,” a tia.
Khan nâite chu a hong liana, irhnu pe ta maka: khan Isaka irhnu nêk ta loi hrang nî taka chu Abrahama’n hruai an thêa.
Khan Aigupta mi, Hagari nâipa, Abrahama hranga a ineipui khan an nuisan lai tak Sari’n a hmua.
Khanchu Abrahama kuanga khan, “Hi suaknu le a nâipa hi irzûlpaihai ro: hi suaknu nâipa hin, ki nâipa Isaka irchon luapui thei no ni,” a tia.
Khan, hi chongbâi sik hin Abrahama hrangin chu a nâi a’rkôk pe sikin a irngai hoi pe thei maka;

khannisianlân Pathianin Abrahama kuang khan, “Nâipang chungchâng thu le ni suaknu thu hi nangma irngai khomin thil saloiin bê no ro; Sari’n ni kuanga thu a insîrhai kha zôm ro; Isaka ata kêng ni’rchihai an la iti hrang.
Khan ni suaknu nâipa khom hi ni’rchi a ni sikin, irchi suanpâr chu inpung ki ti,” a tia.
Khanchu Abrahama chu zînga a thoia, bai le tui bêla tui bitin a chôia; Hagari a pêka, a dârsuama toiin, nâipang khom an fetira; khanchu Beerseba tâng châra a’rvâk hena.
Khanchu tui bêla tui chu om ta maka, nâite chu chînribuk hnuaia a sia raka.
Khan “Nâipang thi hrang kha en ngam ma ung,” a tia. A chi sikin hla rak loi, thal kâp tung thei hrang tena ang khan a mân tiang a va toi ngota; inring takin a chap tâka.
Khan Pathianin nâipang irhâi kha an hriata, khan Pathian vântirtônin irvân ata Hagari chu a zuang koia, a kuang, “Hagari imo ni ingaitua? chi no ro, nâipang irhâi chu Pathianin a omna ata an hriat,
thoiin lân, nâipang kha a kuta kaithoi ro, ama chu irchi tam takin ki isiam hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khan Pathianin a mit an vâr pea; tuisunsuak kha a hmu tâka; khanchu a va fea, tui bêla khan tui a thun insipa, nâipang kha an intira.
Khan, Pathian chu nâipang kôla khan, a ompui ngaia, a hong lian dênin, tângchâra a om ngaia. thal kâp thei mi a hong ni tâka.
Paran ramchâra omin, a nu’n Aigupta ram mi a dôngma hrangin an neitir ta.
Kha laia khan Abimeleka le sipai hruaitu Fikola haiin Abrahama kuang khan, “Ni sinthônahai hin Pathianin nang a sâm mai ngaia.

Khasikin atûn hi hmuna hin Pathian irhming sâmin, kei le ki nâipa le ki tupa, hnuaisia loia lung ki lei inkham tâk ang khan keima le ni omna ram lungkhamna indong hrangin ki kuang hin chong nin kung pe ro ba!” tiin a hrila.
Khan Abrahama’n, “O chonginkung ki ti,” a tia.
Khan Abimeleka siahlohaiin tuisunsua an suthai sikin Abrahama’n Abimeleka kha a’rchua.
Khan Abimeleka’n, “Kha thil lei thotu kha tu mo a ini, ite inhre ma ung,” a tia.
Khanchu Abrahama’n belra le sehrâtchal a hruaihaia, Abimeleka a pêka; khanchu an ruaiin chong an inkunga.
Khan Abrahama’n a belra pâl laia a sa, a’rthiang sari a khâia;
khanchu Abimeleka’n Abrahama kuang khan, “Belra irthiang sarihai hi itho mo a bingin ni ikhâihai?” a tia.
Khan ama’n chu, “Hi tuisunsuak hi keima kut ngeia ki ituk suak a nih ti ni nin hriatpui ti inhriatna’n hi belra irthiang sari hi ki kut ata ni ilâk hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khatak sikin hi hmun khom hi Beerseba a tia: hi hmuna hin an ruaiin khomâk an irsâm sikin.
Khanchu, Abimeleka kha a thoia, a sipai hruaitu Fikola leh khan Filistia rama an kîr nôk ta.
Khan Abrahama’n Beerseba khuaa khan meisâr kung a phuna, kha hmuna khan
Khanchu Abrahama chu zoro sôttak Filistian rama a oma.
Khan, hiang hin a nia, zoro sôtloite hnunga chu, Pathianin Abrahama chu a fiaa, “Abrahama,” a tia; khanchu ama’n “Hin ki om,” a tia.
Khan ama’n, “Ni nâi, ni nâikhât neisun, ni inrentak Isaka kha hruaiin lân, Moria rama khan fe ro, kha hmuna nang ki ihril hrang tâng inkhata khan hâlirvôm thilinhlan ro,” a tia.
Khan Abrahama chu zînga a thoia, thing a tuka, a neinun pêlna sakuartung le a siahlo ompuihai inhni leh a nâi Isaka a hruaihaia; Pathianin a ihril pena tiang khan a fe tâka.
Khan, sûn thum ni tena chu Abrahama kha a hong tanga, a fena hrang hmun chu hlavitin a la hmua.

Khanchu Abrahama’n a siahlohai ruai kuang khan, “Hi hmuna hin sakuartung leh hin lei om roi, kei le nâipang hi so hmuna son va fe kin ta, Pathian chubai va mûk kin ta, kha zoiin nin kuang hong kîr nôk kin ti,” a tia.
Khan Abrahama’n hâlirvôm thilinhlanna thing kha a lâka; a nâipa Isaka a’rputtira; ama’n mei le chemte chôiin a nâipa leh an fea.

Khan Isaka’n a pa Abrahama kha hiang hin a ti pea, “Ka pa,” a tia; khan ama’n, “Ki nâipa hin ki om,” a tia. Khanchu Isaka’n, “En ro, mei le thing chu a oma; khannisian hâlirvôm thil inhlan hrang belra tuai teh khôn mo a om?” a tia.
Khan Abrahama’n, “Ki nâipa, Pathianin ama ta hranga thilinhlan hrang chu a zoro taka ni pe a ti,” a tia. Khaang khan an irzui maia.
Khan, Pathianin a inhrilna hmun chu an va tunga; Abrahama’n maichâm a siam irfûka, thing a tana a buka, a nâipa Isaka kha a khita maichâm chunga an zâltira.
Khan, Abrahama’n chem an bana a nâipa thatna hrangin.
Khan,
Khan Pathianin, “Nâipang chunga khan ni kut insum no’n lân, ite tôn viat no ro: ni nâi neisun khom pêk hrangin nin hroi ta no sikin, Pathian ni chi ti kin hriat ta,” a tia.

Khan Abrahama khan a hnung a’rheia, a en vêla, a hnung tiang belrachal a’rki thinga inôk hi a ngîr pea; khanchu Abrahama’n belra kha a chela, a nâipa irthûlin hâlirvôm thilinhlanna hrangin a hmang tâka.
Khasikin Abrahama’n kha hmun irhming kha Jehova Jire a phua tâka; a vuan sûn tena,
Khan
“Hi thil hi ni tho tâk sikin, ni nâi neisun nin hroi ta no sikin, sat nang vur ngêt ki ti.
Irvâna ârsi zât le tuia chiai tam nêkin ni’rchihai la’npung ngêt ki ti, nir chihaiin an irdoipuihai kul mikot khom la nei an tih ti le.
Ki hê ni lâk tâk sikin, ni’rchi lai ata rammuala chi tin vânsatna la dong an ti; mâni le mâni irtiin thu ki inkung a ni ta,
Kha zoiin chu Abrahama chu a siahlo pasal hnihai omna khan a kîr nôka, khanchu Beerseba khan Abrahama chu a om ngai tâka.
Khan hiang hi a hong nia, Abrahama kuang khan, “Irngai ro, Milkaii khomin ni sangpa Nahora kha nâi a neipui ta,” iti an hrila.
A nâilutîr chu Uza a ni, a sangpa chu Buza a ni, Kemuela, Arama pa le;
Kheseda hai, Hazova hai, Pildasa hai, Jidlafa hai, Bethuela hai hi an nia.
Khan, Bethuela’n chu nâinupang Rebeki a neia, hi mi kiriathai hi Milkaii, Abrahama sangpa Nahora nâihai an ni.
Meithâinu irhming Reumi nu khomin Teba hai, Gahama hai, Tahasa hai, Maaka hai, a ineihai a ni.
Khan Sari dam sûng kum chu 127 a nia: hi hi Sari dam sûng kum chu a ni.
Khan Sari chu Kanaan ram Kiriath-arba khuaa khan a thia, (hi hi Hebron khua a ni): khan Abrahama chu Sari chûlpuia châ hrangin a honga.
Khan mithi ruak mâkin a thoia, Hit mihai kuanga khan,
“Kei chu nin laia mikhual anga om ki nia, ki mithi ruak hi ki hmu loina rama nin phûmtir hrangin hmun ni pe roi,” tiin a hrila.
Khan, Hit mihaiin Abrahama kha hiang hin an sâma,

“Ka pu irngai ro, nangma chu kin laia hin hruaitu inthangtak ni nia: kin thâna hin ni inuamna taka ni mithi ruak chu phûm ro: ni mithi phûmna hrangin, mi tukhomin mithi ruak phûmna hrangin inhroi ma ung,” an tia.
Khanchu Abrahama kha a thoia, kha mihai Hit mihai kha chubai a mûkhaia,
khan, ki mithi chu hmu loina rama ki phûm hrang hi a dik nin ti’n chu, Makpela khura loihnôm a om, kha kha ni pe hrangin Zohara nâipa Efrona kuang ni zong pe roi.
Nin laia irphûmna hmun irchon a man nin iti ang lamin ni pe roi, tiin a nghihaia.
Khan Efrona chu Hit mihai laia a om maia; khanchu Hit mi Efrona chu Hit mihai inhriatin, a khua dâimitzînga lût murdi inhriatin,
“Ni no ni, ka pu ni’rngai hi ro: loi khom nang ki pêk, loihnôma khur khom nang ki pêk; ni mithi chu phûm ro,” tiin Abrahama an hrila.
Khan Abrahama chu kha rama nâihai makunga khan chubai a mûkhaia,
khan, kha rama omhai inhriatpuiin Efrona kuang, “A sa ni ni tipuiin chu; loi man chu nang pe ki ti; ki kut ata la tan lân, kha hmuna khan ki mithi phûm ki ti,” tiin a hrila.
Khan Efrona’n Abrahama kha hiang hin a ti pea,
“Ka pu ni’rngai pe hi ro: irnêng hmun tangka irzaminli irnôi, nang le keima kâra irpêk ngêt mo a inang? ni mithi chu phûm zel ro,” a tia.
Khanchu Abrahama’n Efrona hê a lâk tâka; khan Abrahama’n Hit mihai inhriatin Efrona’n tangka sum a iti dôr chu sumru irzaminli, sum hlo mihai ihlo zât chu varin Efrona a pêk tâka.
Kha zoiin chu Efrona loi, Mamre irdîna Makpela rama om chu, a loi le a sûnga khur le, a loia thing om murdi, a ram kôla thing om murdi chu,
Hit mihai mithmua, a khuaa lût murdihai mithmua khan, Abrahama irchon hrangin pêk indetin a om tâka.
Kha zoiin chu Abrahama’n a dôngma Sari chu Kanaan ram Mamre kôla (Hebron khua a ni.) Makpela loi kôla khura khan a phûm ta.
Khanchu loi le a sûnga khur om kha irphûmna irchon hrangin Abrahama pêk indetin a om ta.
Khan, Abrahama chu a hong tar ok tâk sikin,
Khan, Abrahama’n a siahlopahai laia, a in mihai laia a uliantak, a neinunhai chunga ircham neitu kuanga khan, “Lungkham takin ni kut kha ki teêl hnuaia hin thun ro;
khanchu
kin rama, ki sûngsuakhai kuanga fein ki nâipa Isaka dôngma ni izong pe hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khan, a siahlopa khan a kuang, “Nupangnu hin hi rama om hrangin ni zui nuam ual ni moa? ni nâipa hi ni suakna ram tiang ki ihruai lût a inang kher mo?” a tia.
Khan Abrahama’n a kuang, “Ki nâipa hi, kha rama khan chu hruai kîr nôk loi hrangin irdîn ro.

vân Pathian, ka pa kuang ata le ki suakna ram ni hruai suaktu le a ni donsuitu le, hi ram hi nir chihai la pehai ki ti,” a tia. Ki kuanga chong le’nkungtu hin, “Ama ngêtin a vântirtôn chu ni kôla inlôitir a ta, kha ni rengata chu ki nâipa Isaka dôngma ni inneitir hrang a ni.
Khan, nupangin nang a zui nuam no’n chu, ki kuanga ni chonginkung ata ni izôk a ni, i khom nisianlân ki nâipa chu kha rama khan ni ihruai kîr nôk viat hrang ni ma,” a tia.
Khanchu a siahlopa khan a kut chu a pu Abrahama teêl hnuaia a rola, hi thua hin chong an kung tâka.
Khan a siahlopa khan a pu saringsei laia sômkhat a tuanghaia, a pu neinun sahai chôiin a fe ta: khanchu Mesopotamia ram Nahor-hai khuaa a fea.
Khan khohloi tiang dôngmatehai tui chôi zoro laitaka khan tuisunsuakna hmun kho kôla khan a saringseihai chu an kualtirhaia;
Khan “O
Ni en ro, tuikuang kôla omin, hi khuaa mi dôngmatehai tui chôi hrangin an izuang a ni:

khan hiang hin ni sianlân, dôngmate tu kuang khom ni ri se, ‘Ki in theina hrangin lungkham takin nin tuibêl kha ni’rhnuai pe ro,’ ki tia. Khan ama’n, ‘In ro, ni saringseihai khom in hrang pe ki ti,’ titu ka chu, kha mi kha ni nâi Isaka hranga inkung ni ri se; khanchu kha nu kha ka pu chunga lungkhamna inlangtir ti kin inhriat thei hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khan hiang hi a nia, a hril zoi mân reng, irngai ro, Abrahama nâi Nahora dôngma Milkaii nâipa Bethuela nâinu Rebeki chu a dârsuama tuibêl tiangin a hong suaka.
Kha mi kha a hmêl khom a satak taka, dôngmate irthiang a nia, tu pasal khomin an la ichâipui dop loi a nia; tuikuanga a fea, a tuibêl inbitin a fe nôka.
Khan, a siahlopa chu irtongpui hrangin an tâna, “Lungkham takin ni tuibêla tui kha nin intir ro ba,” a tia.
Khan ama khomin, “In ro ba, ka pu,” a tia. Khan inrang takin tuibêla tui a kut leh luakin tui an intir tâka.
Khan, tui a in zoiin chu, “Ni saringseihai khom tui an khop mâka chu tui chôi mai ki ti,” a tia.
Khan inrang takin a tuibêl kha an ronga, tui chôi hrangin tuisunsuak tiang a kîr nôka, saringseihai in hrangin tui a’rthak pehaia.
Siahlopa khan a en maia,
Khan, a saringseihai khom an khop ti an hriatin chu, siahlopa khan rângachak irthei a hnâra inkhâi zât le a kuta sum bânhrial inhni a kêlsuaa.
Khan a kuang khan, “Tu nâinu mo ni ini, nin hril theiin mo?. Ni pa inah kin riakna hrang hmun mo om ni?” a tia.
Khan kha nu khan a kuang, “Bethuela Milkaii nâipa Nahora hranga a inei pe nâinu ki ni,” a tia.
Khan ama ngêtin a kuang khan, “Fapôl le sa bu fâk hrang chu kin nei ngai, riakna hmun khom kin nei,” a ti pea.
Khanchu siahlopa khan a lu a suka,
khan, “Ka pu chunga chu a lungkhamna danglam ngailoi le a dikna khom irsamloi,
Khanchu dôngmatenu chu an tâna, kha thu kha a nu urênghai a hrilhaia.
Rebeki’n nucha a neia, a’rhming chu Labana a ni: khanchu Labana a suaka, tuikuang kôla mi ompa tiang a fea!

hiang hi a ni tâka, irthei le sum bânhrial a farnu kuta a hmua, “Mihaiin an ni irkôk sup supa,” a tia, a farnu Rebeki thuhril an hriatin chu, mihai kuang a fea, irngai roi, hi mi hi tuikuang kôla omin saringseihai leh khan.
Labana’n, “Nang
Khanchu kha ina khan a lûta, Labana’n saringseihai neinun kha a sûta; khan saringseihai hrang fapon le bu anh a pêkhaia; an kehai irsûkna hrang tui a pêkhaia,
khan Abrahama siahlopa kuang khan, fâk hrang an dôn pea; khannisianlân, “Ki hongna bitak thu ki hril mâka ite fâk fa no ning,” a tia. Khan ama’n, “Hril ro,” a tia.
Khan ama’n, “Kei Abrahama siahlopa ki ni,
khan
Ka pu dôngma Sari’n a tar hnungin, ka pu nâipasal a neipuia! ama kuanga a inei a’rchon lua hrangtu a nia.
Khan, ka pu’n, ‘Ki omna ram Kanaan dôngmatehai hi ki nâipa dôngma’n ni inneitir hrang ni ma,’ a tia.
Ka pa in tiang, ki urêng le ki sûngsuakhai laia mi kêng a dôngma hrang ni inneitir hrang tiin chong a nin kungtira,
khan keima’n chu, ‘Nupangin a ni zui nuam no duaiin te’? ki tia.
Khan ama’n ki kuang, ‘
Ki sûngsuakhai kuang ni tung tena kêng ki kuanga ni khomâk irsâm chong hi a irkât hrang, dôngmate nang an pêk no khomin ni khomâk irsâm chu irkât a ti,’ a tia.
“Khaangin, a vuan hin tuikuang chu ki hong itung a ni ta, O
en ro, tuikuang kôla ki om chian, hiang hin ni sian chu, dôngmate tui chôi hranga zuang tukhom ni ri se, ‘lungkham takin in hrangin nin tuibêla tui tômte ni pe ro,’ ki tia.
Khan ama’n ki kuang, in ro, ni saringseihai hrang khomin tui irthak ki ti, titu takin chu, ka pu nâipa hranga
Ki lungrîla ki sua zoi mân reng Rebeki hi tuibêl chôiin a honga, tui a zu thâl zoiin a honga: khan a kuang, ‘Lungkham takin tui nin intir ro ba,’ ki tia.
Khan inrangtakin a tuibêla tui chu a thâla, a nin intira, ‘Ni saringseihai khom hi tui pehai ki ti,’ a tia. Khanchu tui ki ina ki saringseihai khom an ina.
Khan keima’n, ‘Tu nâinu mo ni ni?’ tiin ki’rdona. khan ama’n, ‘Bethuela Nahora nâipa Milkaii inei nâinu ki ni,’ a tia: khan hnâra bet zât chu kin bettira, sum bânhrial khom a kuta kin buntira.
Khan ki lu kûnin chubai ki mûka,
Khasikin atûn ka pu nin inrena, nin nuam pe hrangin chu nin hril roi; khan kêng ki vei tiang mo ki chang tiang mo ki ipan thei hrang,” a tia.
Khan Labana le Bethuela’n hiang hin an sâma, “Hi thil hi
En roh Rebeki chu ni kôla om a ni, hruaiin lân, fepui ro,
Khan hiang hin a nia, Abrahama siahlopa khan an nuampui ti thu an hriatin chu, khûksadelin
Khan Abrahama siahlopa chu sumru irvôna hai, rângachak irvôna hai, puandiar sahai kêlsuain, Rebeki a pêka; a nuchahai le a nu khom thil man tam takhai a pêka.
Khan ama le a rualhai khomin an fâkin an nêka, an riaka; zînga an thoia, “Ka pu kuanga nin fetir ta roi,” a tia.
Khan a nuchapa le a nu’n, “Tôinu hi zoro sôtloite sûn sôm vêl chu la om ri se, kha zoi hong a ti,” an tia.
Khan ama’n an kuang khan, “Ni khap inhnung ta no roi,
Khan anni khomin, “Tôinu chu koi ei ta ama la’rdon rei,” an tia.
Khanchu Rebeki kha an koia, “Hi mipa kuanga hin ni fe nuam mo?” an tia. Khan ama khomin, “O ki fe nuam” a tia.
Khanchu an farnu Rebeki le an tîrtônnu le Abrahama siahlopa le a rualhai chu an fe an phalhaia.
Khan, Rebeki chu bor a pêka, a kuang khan, “Kin farnu nang chu a sîng a sâng tamtak nu hong ni’n lân, nir chihai khom a doituhai ram khom lua zit ri sehai,” an tia.
Khanchu Rebeki chu a thoia, a siahlonu le saringsei chunga chuangin, kha mi kha an zuia. Khaang khan Abrahama siahlopa’n Rebeki kha a hruaia, a fepui ta.
Khan Isaka chu Berla-hai-roi tiang ata a lei honga, sim tianga om a ni sikin,
khan Isaka chu khohloi tiang chu kholâi a va chaia: rammual a hei thîr vêla, en ro, saringseihai hong a hmua,
khan Rebeki’n Isaka a hei hmu’n chu, a saringsei ata a chum thâka.
Khan Abrahama siahlopa kuang khan, “So phâia a ni don hranga hong so tu ma ni?” a tia. Khan siahlopa khan, “Ka pu a ni so te,” a tia: khanchu irkhûna puan a lâka a sil irkhum nôka.
Khan siahlopa khan a va itong murdi chu Isaka kha a hrila;
khan Isaka’n Rebeki chu a nu puan ina a hruaia, Rebeki chu a lua tâka; a dôngma a ni ta; khan a sate’n lung a thunga; khasikin Isaka chu a nu thia beidong khom kha a’rtha a’rngam pe ta.
Khan, Abrahama’n dôngma dang a neia, a’rhming chu Keturi a ni.
Khan ama leh hin Zimrana, Joksana, Medana, Midian, Isbaka le Suaha a neipuia.
Khan Joksana’n nâipasal Seba le Dedana a neia. Khan Dedana nâipasalhai chu Asur-hai, Letus-hai, Leum-hai an ni.
Khan Midian nâipasalhai chu Efa, Efera, Hanoka, Abida le Elda-hai an ni. Hihai murdi hi Keturi nâihai chu an ni.
Khan Abrahama’n chu a inei murdi Isaka a pêk vinga,
nu dang leh a nâihai chu a dam laiin lômmanin thil a semhai; Isaka mithmua nâi danghai chu sim tianga rama om hrangin a tîrhai ta.
Khan Abrahama dam sûng kum chu 175 a nia.
Khan Abrahama chu tar lupôl bianga damin a thi ta, a’rchipuihai kuanga hruaiin a om ta.
Khan, a nâi Isaka le Ismaela’n Hit mi Zohara nâipa Efrona loia Mamre irdîna Makpela khura an phûm ta;
hi loi hmun hi Abrahama’n Hit mihai kuanga a irchôk a ni: hi hmuna hin Abrahama le Sari chu phûmin an om ta.
Khan hiang hi a nia, Abrahama a thi zoiin chu Pathianin a nâipa Isaka chu sat a vura; khan Isaka chu Beer-lahai-roi kôla a oma.
Khan, hihai hi Abrahama nâipa Ismaela, Sari suaknu, Aigupta mi Hagari’n Abrahama irchi hranga nâihai chu an ni:
an irhming le an irchi ang taka Ismaela nâipasalhai chu an ni: Ismaela nâilutîr tak chu Nebaiota a nia; a sanghai chu Kedara, Adbeela, Mibsama,
Misma, Duma le Masa, an ni;
Hadada le Tema, Jetura, Nafisa le Kedema-hai an ni:
hihai hi Ismaela nâihai chu an ni, an khua le an omna hmun ang zêla irziak a ni, an irchi ang takin chu rêng sômkhat inhni an ni.
Khan, Ismaela dam sûng kum chu, kum 137 a ni: khanchu a thi tâka, a’rchihai kuang hruaiin a om tâk a ni.
Khan a nâihai chu Havila ram ata Assuria ram panin Aigupta ram irdîn Sur dênin an oma.
Khan, hi hi Abrahama nâipa Isaka irchihai chu an ni.
Isaka’n Padana-ram-ah mi Suria mi Bethuela nâinu Labana farnu Rebeki leh an irlua lai hin kum 40 mi a nia. (Padana ti chu Mesopotamia ram le hmunkhat a ni.)
Khan, a dôngma kha nâi nei loiin a chinga, khasikin Isaka’n
Khan a nâi vonghai chu a phîng sûnga an irsuala; khan ama’n chu itho mo hianga om hrangin teh ki hringa? a tia, khanchu
Khan
“Ni sul sûnga khan mi nam hni an om,
nangma sûnga ngêt mi nam hniin irsen an ti:
nam khat hrât a ta,
nam khat dok a ti:
khan, a ulian ualpu khan a sangpa sin tho pe a ti,”
a tia.
Khan, a nâi nei zoro a hong nâiin chu, a sûnga khan inphîr an nia.
Khan a nâi ulian ual chu a senin, puan irmul anga irmul neiin a suaka; khanchu a’rhming khom Esaua an phuaa,
kha zoiin chu a sangpa a hong suak nôka, a kut leh Esaua keârtui a chela; khanchu a’rhming khom Jakoba an tia; khan Rebeki’n annihai a nei zoro hin Isaka chu kum 60 mi a ni.
Khan nâipanghai kha an hong lian tâka, Esaua chu sa kâp thei mi a nia; Jakoba rêk chu mi phûkdâi, puan ina om ngai a nia;
khan Isaka chu sakhi hme fâk ngai a ni sikin, Esaua chu a’rngaiinat uala; Rebeki’n chu Jakoba a’rngainat uala.
Khan, Jakoba’n sûn khat chu bu anh a lei suanga, khan Esaua chu ram ata châmsôl irveiin a hong lûta:
khan Esaua’n Jakoba kuang khan, “Lungkham takin ni bu anh suang kha nin netir ro ba; a sân ki sôl tâk,” a tia. Khasikin kêng a’rhming khom Edoma an iti a ni.
Khan Jakoba’n, “Ni nâilutîr nitna nir chotir bak ro,” a tia.
Khan Esaua’n, “Irngai ro, ki ithi va vâng kêng a ni ta, ki nâilutîr nitna ringotin ite a’rfena om ma!” a tia.
Jakoba’n, “Ki kôla khomâk irsâm bak ro,” a tia. Khanchu khomâk a’rsâm tâka; a nâilutîr nitna chu Jakoba kuang a zuar tâka.
Khan, Jakoba’n Esaua kha bai le a dâl suang kha a pêka; khanchu a fâkin a nêka, kha zoiin a thoia, a fe ta: hiang hin Esaua’n a nâilutîr nitna hi ite bea a ibe loi a ni.
Khan kha rama khan Abrahama dam laia châm tâk ti ang khan, châm a tâk nôka, khanchu Isaka chu Filistian-hai rêng Abime-leka kuang, Gerar khuaa a zu fea.
Khan
hi rama hin omin lân, ni kuang om ki ta, sat nang vur ki ti; hi ram murdi hi nangma le nir chihai pêkin, ni pa Abrahama kuanga ki chonginkung kha ki indet hrang a ni.
Khan, irvâna ârsi tam nêkin nir chi la’npung ki ti, hi ram murdi khom hi nir chihai la pe ki ti; khan nangma irchi ata rammual mi chi tin vânsatna dong an ti.
Abrahama’n chu ki hê a lâka, ki thuhril, ki thupêk le ki dânhai khom a zôm ngai ang khan,” a tia.
Khanchu Isaka chu Gerar khuaa khan omhmun a khuar tâka:

khan, a khuaa mihaiin a dôngma thurchi an irdona; khan ama’n chu, “Ki farnu a ni,” a tia; a hmêl a sa sikin, “Hi khua mihai hin Rebeki sikin an ni that itinin,” tihna sikin, ki dôngma a nih ti ngam maka.
Khanchu hiang hi a nia, kha hmuna khan zoro sôttak a om hnungin, Filistian-hai rêng Abimeleka’n tukver ata a hong vênga, irngai ro, Isaka’n a dôngma Rebeki leh an irsâi lai a hmuhaia.
Khanchu, Abimeleka’n Isaka kha a koia, “Irngai ro, ni dôngma kêng a ni hi te; itho mo ki farnu kêng ni iti hi?” a tia. Khan Isaka’n a kuang, “Ama sikin ki thi ngânin te ki ti sika a ni,” a tia.
Khan Abimeleka’n, “Kin chunga hin itho mo hianga ni iti? mihai tu khôkin mani ni dôngma hi an lei siatpui thei hrang anga, khatena chu keini kêng theiloi ni ni inchang hrang a ni hi te,” a tia.
Khan Abimeleka ngêtin, “Mi tukhomin ama mo, a dôngma moh an them puhai chu thatpaihai hrang a ni,” tiin mipuihai thu a pêkhaia.
Khanchu Isaka’n kha rama khan omin loi a thoa, hi kuma hin bu khom tamtak a nei:
Khanchu a hong roiinpuiin, mi’rchongpa a hong kâi tâka:
Belra le sehrât a hong neia; insûng mi khom tamtak an hong punga; khanchu Filistian-haiin an hong hnarsa tâka.
Khan a pa dam laia a sinthotuhaiin tuisunsuak hmunhai kha Filistian-haiin an hong nel inbit pehaia,
khan Abimeleka’n Isaka kuanga khan, “Kin kuang ata rot nôk ta ro, keini nêkin ni ihrât kêng a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu Isaka chu khatak ata a suaka, Gerar phâia a puan in a sung nôka, om hmun a khuar nôk ta.
Khan, Isaka’n a pa Abrahama dam laia tuisunsuak choi angin a choi nôka; Abrahama thi hnungin Filistianhaiin an nel inbit pehai sikin: khan, a pa’n irhming a iphuahai angin irhming an neitirhai nôka.
Khan, Isaka a sinthotuhaiin phâia khan an laih nôka, kha hmuna khan tuihnâr nei an choi doka.
Khanchu Gerar khuaa sa enkoltuhaiin, “Kha tui kha kin ta kêng,” tiin Isaka sa entuhai leh an irsêla: khanchu kha hmun khan an irsêl sikin a’rhming khom “Esek” tiin a phua ta.
Khan tuisunsuak dang an choi nôka, kha khom kha irchupuihai tumin an sêlhai nôka, khanchu a’rhming khom “Sitna” a tia.
Khan, khatak ata kha a’rsona, tuisunsuak dang a choi nôka; kha kha chu irsêlpui ta mahai: khanchu, “Atûn kêng R
Khan, khatak ata Berseba a hong fea:
kha ni zân khan
Khanchu kha hmun khan maichâm a siam irfûka,
Khan, Gerar khua ata Abimeleka chu a rualpa Ahuzatha le a sipai ulianpu Fikola leh a kuang an honga.
Khan Isaka’n an kuang, “Ni en nuam loia, nin kuang ata nin ni inhnot tâk kha, itho mo ki kuang nin la ihong?,” a tia.
Khan anni khan, “
keini le nangma kâra chonginkungna ni neipui ro, kin iti; atûn chu nang vai kêng Pathian satvur dongtu ni inih tâk hi,” an tia.
Khan ama’n chu an ta hrangin hruai an thê pehaia, an fâkin an ina:
khan zîng nôka chu an thoia, khomâk an irsâma, khan Isaka’n a tîrhai ta. Khanchu fel takin an ichîn a ni ta.
Khan, hiang hi a nia, hi nî ngêt hin Isaka sinthotuhai an honga, an tuisunsuak choi thu an hrila, a kuang, “Tui kin hmu ta,” an tia.
Khanchu kha tuisunsuak kha “Seba” a tia; khasikin kha kho’rhming kha atûn ten hin “Berseba” a la ni mai a ni.
Khan Esaua chu kum 40 mi a niin, Hit mi Beria nâinu Judithi le Hit mi Elona nâinu Basemathi dôngma’n a neia;
hihai hin Isaka le Rebeki lungrîl insôltirtu an ni.
Khan hiang hi a hong nia, Isaka a tar tâka, ite hmu thei loiin a om tena chu a nâi Esaua a koia, a kuang, “Ki nâipa,” a tia. Esaua khan, “Hin ki om,” a tia.
Khan Isaka’n, “Irngai ro a sân ki tar ta, ki thi hrang ni lak inhre ma ung;
khasikin atûn hin lungkham takin ni timmatuahai, chôiin lân ram va chai ro, sakhi ni va kâp pe roh.
Ki thi mân ngêt sat nang ki vur theina hrangin, ki indu tak anh suangin lân nin fatir ro,” a tia.
Khan Isaka’n a nâipa Esaua a chongpui lai chu Rebeki’n a lei inhriata, khan Esaua chu sakhi kâp hrangin ram chai a fe tâka.
Khan, Rebeki’n a nâipa Jakoba kuang, “Irngai ro, ni pa’n chu ni upa Esaua kuang
sakhi ni va kâp pe’n lân ki thi mân nin fatirin lân, Pathian kuang sat nang ki vur theina hrangin nin fatir ro, a iti kin hriat.
Khasikin, ki nâipa atûn hin thu nang ki pêk ang takin ki hê la’nlân,
ni kêlhai laia va fe’n lân, a sa, a mar inhni hong chôi ro, khanchu ni pa indu lam takin nang suang pe ki ta:
khan a thi mân ngêta sat nang a vur theina hrangin, fâk hrang kha ni pa ni va ipêk hrang a ni,” tiin a hrila.
Khan, Jakoba’n a nu Rebeki kuang khan, “Irngai ro, ka upa Esaua chu mul tama irmul a nia, keima lak irmul ma ung.
Ka pa’n ni le’nthem a ta a huang kêng ki ichang hrang, satvur dong nêkin khosâl tongin kêng omna ki ti,” a tia.
Khan, a nu’n a kuang khan, “Ki nâi ni khosâl tong hrang chu keima’n la chang rong: ki hê lâkin lân ni va la pe ro,” a tia.
Khanchu a fea, a va lâk pea; khanchu a nu’n a pa indu lam takin a suang pea.
Khan Rebeki’n a upa silkai satak, in sûnga om kha a lâka, a nâipa Jakoba an nghâktira;
khan kêl mulhai kha a kut leh a ring vêla an khop pea;
khan a anh suang le bai kha Jakoba a pêka.
Khan a pa kuang a fea, “Ka pa,” a tia. Khan ama’n, “Ki nâi hin ki om, ki nâi tu khôk mo nin ini?,” a tia.
“Ni nâi ulianpa Esaua ki ni, ni ni itîr ang khan ki tho zoi ta: lungkham takin thoiin lân, sat ni vur hrangin, ki sakhi hme hi fa ta ro,” a tia.
Khan Isaka’n a nâipa kuang khan, “Ki nâi itina mo ni va man inrang bâka?” a tia. Khan, ama’n, “
Khan Isaka’n Jakoba kuang khan, “Ki nâi lungkham takin ni hong nâi ro, nang le’nthem rong, ki nâi Esaua chu ni inih ma ni,” a tia.
Khan Jakoba’n a pa Isaka a va nâia; a le’nthema, “A’rhâi chu Jakoba a nia, a kut chu Esaua kut a nia,” a tia.
Khanchu a upa Esaua kut angin a’rmul pe sikin inhre thei maka; khanchu sat a vur tâka;
khan “Ki nâipa Esaua lele chu ni ni mo?” a tia. Khan ama’n, “O ki ni lele,” a tia.
“Ni hong nai ual ro, khan kêng sat nang ki vur theina hrangin ni sakhi hme kha fa ta ki ti,” a tia. Khan a pêka, a fâk tâka: Uain khom a pêka a in tâka.
Khan a pa Isaka’n a kuang khan, “Ki nâipa hong nâiin lân ni tum ro,” a ti pea,
khan a va nâia a tuma; khan ama’n a silkai mirim inhriatin sat a vur tâka.
“Irngai ro,
ki nâipa mirim hi
Khanchu Pathianin irvân irdo leh irnêng satna le,
bu tamtak le uain tamtak nang pe ri se:
nam tinin ni sin thohai sianlân;
chi dang danghaiin chubai nang mûk ri sehai.
Ni urênghai laia rêng angin omin lân;
ni nu nâihaiin chubai nang mûk ri sehai:
Khua nang sâltu chu khosâlin om sianlân,
sat nang vurtu chu satvurin om ri se,”
a tia.
Khan, hiang hi a nia, Isaka’n Jakoba sat a vur zoiin chu Jakoba chu a pa kuang ata a lei suak zoi chakin, a upa Esaua chu sakhi sa pêlin a hong tunga.
