Intuan phitin siamin lân, a sîr tiang khan dâr sen leh irzônna hmun irki minli inkhop roh.
Dâr intuan chu maichâm hmor hnuaia inkhopin lân, maichâm inlaina tena huap theina hrangin;
zônfunghai sitim thingin siamin lân dâr sen leh tuam roh.
Maichâm sîra irki neihaia khan a’rzôn zoro rikipa rolin lân.
Thingphêk leh maichâm chu inver ir-ôngin lân, tâng chunga a dûr nang ki irhmu lam tak khan ni isiam hrang a ni.
“Ki omna puan in dâi hrangin patzâi irhmi thûr sai puan không ni ihmang hrang a ni. Sim tiang mûk irzakhata sei ni izarh hrang a ni.
Dâr sen chopui sômhni le a toina dâr eng sômhni a iom sa hrang a ni, a chopuia khan puanzâr inkhâina hrang thil kôi le a zârna hrang thil intûn sumrua siam, ni isia hrang a ni.

Puan in hmâr tiang khom khan puan mûk irzakhata sei ni izâr sa hrang a ni, chopui sômhni le an toitirna dâr sen tum sômhni, inkhâina hrang thil kôi le a zârna hrang thil intûn, sumrua siam a iom sa hrang a ni.
Nitâk tiang khom mûk sômringaa sei puan zâr hrang a nia, chopui sômkhat le a toina sômkhat om a ta,
Nisua tianga mikot omna khom a dâi chu mûk sômringa lian a inang hrang a ni.
Mikot sîr tiang sûnga bang chu mûk sôm hleiringa sei ni a ti, chopui inthum le a toina inthum nei sa a ti.

A lûtna mikota zâr hrang patzâi irhmi thûr sai, samul dum, a senduk le a seninpôl irzêl enhoi tak puan khônga mûk sômhnia sei a iom hrang a ni. A zârna hrangin chopui minli an toitirna neiin a iom sa hrang a ni.
Dâi chopui murdi chu sumrua inluana irkoptir hrang a ni, an kuaikimhai chu sumrua siam le an toinahai chu dârsena siam a ini hrang a ni.
Dâi chu mûk irzakhata seiin, a khang mûk sômringa, a’rsâng lam mûk ringa ni a ta, a puan zâr chu patzâi irhmi thûr saia không, an toitirna chu dârsena siam a ini hrang a ni.
Puan in sûnga hmangrua murdi, puan in khârna hêmvuak le a dâi hmang hrang chu dârsena siam hrang a ni.
“Meisera inchok hrang oliv hriak irthît infâi hong chôi hrangin Israel mihai chu hril ro, a khohloi tina inchok mai theina hrangin.
Arona le a nâihaiin puan ina Thuthung Bôm omna puanzâr pên tiang khan meiser chu sehai sian, khohloia irthokin zîng dênin
“Ni upa Arona le a nâihai Nadaba, Abihua, Eleazara le Ithamara hai kha koihaiin lân, Israelhai lai ata keima ochai ni hrangin khâihai roh.
Ni upa Arona ta hrangin ochai tukfam songkol irfual mahripom tak siam pe roh.
Kut sin theithiamna ki inneitirhai murdi koihaiin lân, ki sin tho hranga ochai irthiang an ni theina hrangin.

Hi tukfamhai hi an inei hrang a ni, lungbom, Efod songkol irfual, songkol sûnga innghâk zât lukôm, diar le kongkhit hai, ni upa Arona le a nâipasalhai innghâk hrang ochai songkolhai nei ri sehai, keima ochai an ni theina hrangin.
Kut theithiam pâl khatin samul dum, a senduk le a sen le rângachak pat zâi irhmi thûr sai samul dum, an ihmang hrang a ni.
Efod chu rângachak patzâi irhmi thûr sai samul dum, a senduk le a sen le irpol enhoi taka không hrang a ni.
Dârsuama inhnia inkhâiin, a hnung tiang le a mân tianga inkhopin, a khilina siam ri se.
Khaang dên khan kongkhit a sa chi a không inkhat a ni theina hrangin Efod puana khan an inkhop sa hrang a ni.
Onik lung inhni la’nlân, Israel irchi nam sômhleihni irhming ni irziak hrang a ni.
A ulian dônin kiruk rukin ni irziak hrang a ni.
Lung man tam tianga inhriat thei mi inhrilin lân, Israel nâihai irhming lungphêk inhni sinin lân ni irziak hrang a nia, rângachak phûm hrang a ni.
Lung man tam inhnihai kha dârsuam chunga khan Israel nam sômhleihni inhriat maina hrangin belsa ni sianlân. Arona khan
Lung man tam inkhopna hrang rângachak inhni siamin lân,
rângachak irthît infâi hmangin zîngziri hrui siam sa’n lân, an khopna hranga khan inkhop roh.
“Patzâi irhmi thûr sai, samul dum, a senduk, a sen le rângachak pat anga efod anga khôngin, Pathian an koi zoroa ochaihai dâra bâng hrang puan insui theihai enhoi takin ni insuitirhai hrang a ni.
Thep pumin kil minli nei, khâpkhat vêla chêng ni ri se.
Lung man tam rân minli inkhop ni sianlân, a rân inkhatna khan Odam lung, Pitda lung, Berekot lunghai om sianlân;
A rân inhnina khan, emeral, safir le endonuk (lunghlu),
A rân inthumna khan Lasen, Agate, Amethist hai om sa sianlân;
A rân minlina khan Tarkois, Onik, Jasper, lunghai om sa sianlân, kha lung man tamhai kha rângachak phêka inkhop ving hrang a ni.
Lung man tam sômhleihnihai laia an rêngin Israel nam inkhat seng irziak hrang a ni. Israel nam sômhleihni entîrna a ni theina hrangin.
Rôpbel inkhâina hrang rângachak irthît infâi zîngziri hruiin siamin lân,
rângachak irkual inhni, rôpbel hmora inkhop hrang, siam sa roh.
Zîngziri hmor inhni chu rôpbel hmora irkuala khan inkhop hrang a ni.
A hmor inhni kha lung man tama inhni oma khan inkhopin lân, Efod puan irvâ leh khan irzom ri se.
Efod dep rôpbel sûng tiang hmora rângachak irkual inhni inkhop sa roh.
Efod puan irvâna irdîna kop sian, Efod khitna leh khan enhoi taka không sai hmora khan rângachak irkual dang inhni inkhop sa roh.
Rôpbel le efod rângachak irkual chu pat dum inhrual leh irzomin lân, rôpbel chu a kong irdîna det mat sianlân, a irthôl viat hrang ni mah.
“Hmun Irthianga khan Arona a hong lûtin rôpbela Israel namhai irhming chuangna chu a hong isong hrang a ni; ama kha keima

Efod songkola khan Urim le Thumim kha om sianlân, ni chongpui hrangin a hong rikipa Arona lung irdîn taka a iom hrang a ni. Khaangin Arona a hong rikipin Efod kha innghâk a ta, Israel mihai hranga ki inuam lam chu siam infel thei a ti.
“Efod hnuaia innghâk hrang songkol irfual chu samul dum rônga không hrang a ni.
A laitaka lu thunna tiang a ir-ông hrang a ni, a chet thei loina hrangin a hmor kîm hrang a ni.
A hnuai tianga hmor irfuala khan samul dum, a senduk le a sen dûr rângachak silniang kârirthâk a inkhop hrang a ni.
Kha kha ochai sin a tho zoroa Arona innghâk hrang a ni. Hmun Irthianga
“Rângachak felriai phêka khan, namindetna, kutsabia irziakin, a chunga khan, “
Ochai lukôm maton tiang khan hrui dum leh khit roh.
Arona’n lukôm leh khan a michala inkhop a ta, khanchu keima
Arona innghâk hrang songkol hnuaia lukôm pat irhmia không ni sianlân, a kong khitna hrang khom enhoi taka irvôtir ni ri se.
“Songkol irfual kong khit le lukhumhai, Arona nâipasalhai hrang siam pehai ro; man neia irvôtir hrang a ni.
Ni upa Arona le a nâihai chu innghâkhai sian, ki sinthotu ochai ni hrangin Oliv sahriak irthûtirhaiin lân, inhlanin lân, ser indanghai roh.
Pat ze irhmia không, tuman kong hnuai ata a mal dêna sei ni ri se, an inzakpui an lang loina hrangin.

Arona le a nâihai khan, puan ina an hong lût zoroa, Hmun Irthianga om maichâma ochai sintho hranga an hong zoro khoma, kha kha an ikai ngêt hrang a ni. an inzakpui ngai an lang duai khoma that an ni loina hrangin, hi hi Arona le a’rchihai hrangin kumkhuaa tho hrang dân chu a ni.
“Keima sin tho hranga ochai sin tho hrang, Arona le a nâihai ni irserindang hrang dân chu, hiang hin ni a ti; sehrâtchal tuai inkhat le kêlbelra chal inhni demnaboi kaiin lân,
chol kop loi bai oliv hriaka irpol leh, sahriak pol sai bai phêk satakin siamin lân,
annihai kha kok sûnga thunin lân, sehrâtchal inhni ni hong ichôi hrang a ni.
“Arona le a nâihai chu ki omna puan in kot bâia hong hruaihaiin lân, dân anga irthârna tui irsil hrangin hrilhai roh.
Arona chu ochai tukfam, songkol irfual, Efod songkol, Efod hnuaia songkol irfual rôpbel le kong khit irkipin.
A lua lukôm, “
Irthû a nang zoroa hmang zât oliv hriak kha la’nlân, a lua buakin irthûtir roh.
A nâihai kha hong hruaihaiin lân, songkol innghâkhai sian,
an konga kongkhithai khitin, an lu tiang khom lukhum inkhumtirhai roh. Khaang taka khan Arona le a nâihai chu ni inamindethai hrang a ni. Anni le an irchihai chu ochai hong ni thei mai ta an ti.
Sehrâtchal tuai ki omna puan in kôla hong kaiin lân, Arona le a nâihai chu sehrât lu chunga kut irnghat hrangin hrilhai roh.
Puan in kôla khan, ki kuang sehrâtchal chu that roh.
Sechal thisen kha la’nlân, maichâm kila khan ni kut mitin leh polin lân, a ban la om chu maichâm kôla khan bun ving roh.
A rîl tuamtu, a hlap murdi le a mithin a sa tak, a bê inhni a thâi kop kha la’nlân, sual irbôlna hrangin maichâma hâlirvôm roh.
Khanchu a hme, a vun, le a rîlhai chu dâi pên tiang hâlirvômin lân, sual irbôlna thil inhlan a ni sikin hâlirvôm ving hrang a ni.
“Belrachal inkhat kaiin lân, Arona le a nâihai chu an lu chunga an kut irnghat hrangin hrilhai roh.
Thatin lân, maichâm irhîl kha thisen inthek ro,
hme kha irchan indi’n lân, a sûngkua le a hnungzâng tianga a malhai chu irsûkinfâi ro, a lu le a ke danghai chu a chunga khan se roh.
A rêngin thilinhlan belra chu ni inhlan hrang a ni, hi thilinhlan mirimhoi hin ki milung a inchuktir ngai a ni.
“Belrachal inkhat kai sa’n lân, serindangna hmang ngai kha, Arona le a nâihai chu an lu chunga kut irnghat hrang ti pehai roh.
Thatin lân, a thisen chu Arona le a nâihai mikuar chang tianga silnianghaia, kut chang tiang kutpui hmora, kepui chang tiang hmora nâlin lân, a ban la om chu maichâm irhîl kha inthek roh.

Maichâm thisen irthûna hmang ngai oliv hriak senkhat la’nlân, Arona le a puanhai chunga le a nâihai le an puanhai chunga khan inthek roh. Khanchu ama le a nâihai an puanhai murdi keima hranga serindang ni ta an ti.
Kêlbelra irmei satak, a sûngkua tuamtu a hlap, a mithin sanatak, a bê inhni a thâi kop le a chang tianga malpui kha âtin lân,
bai inhlan khamphulua sia chu a zât kipa bai tiam khat seng oliv hriak le inhmet bai tiam khat le chol kop loi bai tiam la’nlân,
kha fâk le nêk thil murdi kha Arona le a nâihai kuta fe’n lân, ki ta hrangin thilpêk bîk nghi hrangin, thâr hrangin ni ihrilhai hrang a ni.
An kuta irthokin la’nlân, maichâma hâlirvôm thilinhlan chunga khan sia’n lân, ki ta hrangin thilinhlanna nei roh. Ni thilinhlan mirimhai hin a ni inlômtir ngai a ni.
Hi belrachal mier hi la’nlân, ki ta hrangin thilpêk bîk ni hrangin thâr roh. Khaangin hihai hi ni dongtum ni a ti.
Ochai namindet zoroa kêlbelrachal mier le a malpui thârin ki kuang thilpêk bîk ni inhlan hrang a nia, ochaihai ta hranga thâr hrang a ni.
Israel nâihai irhîlin thil an inhlan kha la’nlân, a mier le a malpui chu ochaihai dongtum kumtuanga hranga ki indet a nia, hi hi
“Arona ochai tukfamhai hi a thi tena chu a nâihai kuang ochai ni hranga an phunhai zoroa an innghâk hrang a nia, an kuta ni ipêkhai hrang a ni.
Arona nâi irthûla ochaia namindet khan sintho hranga ki omna puan in hmun irthiang a fe zoroa sûn sari sûng chu hi puanhai hi a irbel hrang a ni.
“Arona le a nâihai namindetna hrang, kêlbelrachal hme chu lâkin hmun irthianga but roh.
Anni khan ki omna puan in mikot bula khan khamphulu sûnga bai la om le khan fa ri se.
Anni namindetna sual irbôlna hme chu an ifâk hrang a ni; khalâi irthiang a nia, ochai vaiin an ifâk thei hrang a ni.
I mani, hme mo bai mo zîng dênin fa loiin a la omin chu, hâlpai ving hrang a ni; hme ser a ni sikin, a dâi chu fa hrang ni ta mah.
“Thu nang ki ipêk ang takin Arona le a nâihai chu sûn sari sûng chu ni iserindanghai hrang a ni.
A sûn tin sual irbôlna hrangin, sehrâtchal inkhat inhlan ngêt ni ta, kha leh khan maichâm kha a ithâr hrang a ni. Khanchu oliv hriak pol ni ta, irthiang taka ni isiam hrang a ni.
Khaang khan sûn sari sûng chu, a sûn tin tho ngaiin lân, khanchu maichâm kha hor thiang ving a ta; mihriam mo, a dang khomin a tôn murdi a’rthiangna irtha khan a ipol ving hrang a ni.
“Zoro la hong om mai hrangin a sûn tin maichâma kêlbelrate inhni ni inhlan ngai hrang a ni.
Zîng tin belratehai laia inkhat inhlan ni ta, a dang kha khohloi tiang inhlan ngai roh.
Belrate matona leh khan baidi a sa chi her khat le oliv hriak irthît sai litar khat ni inhlan hrang a ni.
Belrate inhnina kha chu khohloi tiang inhlan nôkin lân, ama leh khan baidi oliv hriak le uain khom zîng tianga dôr kha inhlan nôk roh. Hi hi keima

Zoro la hong thiaia hin, hâlirvôm thilinhlan hin ki omna puan in kotbâi kôla khan inhlanin a iom mai ngai hrang a ni, kha hmuna khan kêng ki mihai zuang irtongpuihai ngai ki ta, nangni ki ichongpui hen hrang a ni.
Kha hmuna khan Israel mipuihai irtongpuihai ki ta, ki ompuina vâr irkhêl khan a hmun kha irthiangin siam ki ti;
puan in le maichâm chu ser irthiang ki ta, Arona le a nâipasalhai khom chu ochai sina ki sin tho hrangin serindanghai ki ti.
Israel mihai laia lêng ki ta, an Pathian ni ki ti.
An laia ki lêng theina hrangin Aigupta ram ata anni hruaisuaktu
“Sitim thing le mirimhoi hâlna hrang maichâm siam roh.
Irki minli nei mûk khat vêla sei, a’rsâng lam mûk hni ni sianlân, a’rki minlia khan a’rki inchor maichâm leh tuan khata siam om ri se.
A chung tianga incham, irki minlihai, a’rkihai chu rângachak rônga inluan hrang a nia, a hmor tiang chu rângachaka tuam hrang a ni.
A irzônna hmol rolna hrang rângachak irkual inhni siamin lân, a sîr hitiang, hitiang a hmor hnuaia khan inkhop roh.
A zônfung chu sitim thing ni sianlân, rângachak leh ni ituam hrang a ni.
Hi mirimhoi hâlna maichâm hi Thuthung Bôm maton tianga puanzâr inkhâina maton tiang khan intoitir roh. Kha hmuna khan nang ki irhmupui hrang a ni.
A zîng tin, Arona’n meiser infâi balamin, mirimhoi thil a inhlan hrang a ni.
Khohloi tiang meiser an chok zoro khomin khaang khan a itho ngêt hrang a ni. Zoro la hong om thiai maia khom, hi mirimhoi thil inhlan hi irngam loiin a irzôm mai hrang a ni.
Hi maichâm chunga hin hâl phal loi, thil mirimhoi, hme thil inhlan mo, bu thil inhlan mo, kha hnung uain khom thilin ni inhlan hrang ni mah.

A kum tin voikhat, sual irbôlna thil inhlan thisen chu, Arona khan maichâm thâr irthiangna hrangin a’rki minli khan a ipol hrang a ni. A kum tin zoro la hong oma khan tho mai hrang a ni. Hi maichâm hi keima
“Irteppui zoroa a mi Israel mihai chunga vânduaina irkhêl a tung loina hrangin, mi tinin mâni hringna irtanna an ipêk ving hrang a ni.

Irteppuia om murdi an pêk hrang dôr sum an inkung chu an ipêk ngêt hrang a ni. Ki omna puan ina hrang, varna le diktaka varh sekel chimrip, Gera sômhni an pêk ngêt hrang a ni. Mi tinin sekel chimrip ki kuang thilinhlan an inei ving hrang a ni.
Irteppuia tep kum sômhni chung tianga mihaiin
An hringna irtanna hrang

Israel mihai laia irthokin hi hringna irtanna sum hi irfuangin lân, ki omna puan in enkolna hrangin hmang roh. Hi khâzana hi an hringna irtanna hranga chôi ni a ta, anni ki sûnghual ti inhriatmaina hrang ni a ti,” tiin.
“Dâr tâbora toina hrang dâr thîrin siamin lân, puan in le maichâm kâra intoitirin lân, tui om mai ri se.
Arona le a nâihai khan an kut le ke irsûkinfâina hrangin tui kha an ihmang hrang a ni.
Uain inna mo, fâk nêk zongna mo thil inhlanna hranga maichâm an pan mân khan chu thatin om no nihai.
An thi loina hrangin an kut le ke an irsûk ngêt hrang a ni. Anni le an irchihaiin kumtuanga an hmang hrang chu a ni,” tiin.
“Mura tui her ruk, thingzungthum mirimhoi her thum, thing rimhoi her thum,
kesepât thing her ruk, ki omna puan ina hmang lai her leh varh kha lakhômin lân, oliv hriak litar minli leh polin lân,
mirimhoi irpol anga irthiang takin siam sa roh.
Ki omna puan in thuthung bôm.
Dokâng le hmangrua danghai, meiser siana le hmangrua danghai, mirimhoi hâlna hrang maichâm,
Thil inhlan hâlna hrang maichâm le a hmangrua murdihai, tâbor irthûlna le an toitirnahai inlâpna hrangin kha kha hmang roh.
Hi thilhai hi fel takin serindangin lân, hong irthiang khak an ta, mihriam mo, i dang khom a hong tônpu dôr chu a’rthiangna irtha khan a innatirhai hrang a ni.
Arona le a mihai chu ki sintho hrangin sahriak hi polhaiin lân, ochai hrangin namindethai roh.
Israel mihai chu hrilhai roh. Hi hriak irthiang hi ki sinthotu ni hranga serindang zoroa irpol hrangin hmang mai ngai hrang a ni.
Mi pangaihai chu pol hrang ni maka; thil dang dang irpol ngai dân hmangin a dang nin isiamsuak hrang ni mah. Thil irthiang a nia, nin iser ok hrang a ni.
Hianga irpol hrang sahriak le thil danga ki siamhai mo, ochai rua ni loi lei pol mihai chu ki mihai laia inkhat khom tep ni no nihai,” a tia.
Khan,
mirimhoi sinpu sin dân angin mirimhoi takin siamin lân, fâi tak le irthiang taka a om theina hrangin michi pol roh.
Vîkkham viatin lân, nôiinditir ro, nang ki’rtongpuina hrang hmun, irtongna Biakbuka Thuthung Bôm maton tiang khan sia’n lân, nangma ta hrangin irthiang tak ni a ti.
Hi mirimhoi sin dân hranga hin, nangma ta hrangin mirimhoi zel siam ta no ro,
Mi tukhomin khaanga mirimhoihai kha mâni hmang hrangin a siama ni’n chu a mihai lai ata ipai ni a ti,” tiin.
“Uria nâipa Bezalela, Hura tupa Juda nama mi chu kin thang tâka,
kut sinthei le irfûktir theina, thil i ang khom siam hranga kutsintheina nei hrangin ama kha ki sin theina hrangin ki insiptir a ni ta.
Thil enhoihai ngaitua suaka, rângachak, sumru le dâr siam theina,
lungmantam inkhop zât ât tan, thing a enhoi tak tak siam theina ki inneitir a ni ta.
Ama changpui hrangin Dan nama mi Ahisamaka nâipa Oholiaba ki inthang sa a ni ta. Kut sinthei dang khom, sin hranga thu ki ipêk murdi siam theina ki ipêk sa a ni ta.
Puan in sin an ta, Thuthung Bôm le a sîng, puan in timmatuahai,
dokâng le hmangruahai, rângachak inzena siam meiser siana le a hmangruahai mirimhoi hâlna hranga maichâm,
hâlirvôm thilinhlana maichâm, a tuibêl murdi leh, tâbor le an toina hai,
Arona le a mihaiin ochai sin an tho zoroa an innghâk hrang ochai tukfam roiinpui,
Irpol zât sahriak, hmun irthianga hrang mirimhoi thil an isiam sa hrang a ni. Hi thilhai siam hranga hin thu nang ki ipêk ang takin an itho hrang a ni”.
Israel mipuihai chu inhril hrangin thu a pêka, “Ki sabat nî hi an iser hrang a ni, nin irchi la hong om thiaihai hrang khomin keima
Sabat nî hi nin ta hranga nikhua irthiang a nia, nin iser ngêt hrang a ni. Mi tukhom ser loia kha ni sûna sintho chu that hrang a ni.
Mâni sinthôna hrangin sûn rukpa zel nin neia, a sûn sari ni chu irngam nikhua irthiang, keima hranga serindang hrang a ni. Mi tukhom hi nikhuaa sintho chu that ngêt hrang a ni.
Israel mihaiin kin kâra thuthung an inhriatmaina hrangin kumtuanga ser mai hrang a ni.
Keima le Israel mihai kin kâra thuthung irsinsiana det ni a ti; keima
Pathianin Sinai tânga Mosia a chongpui zoiin chu, ama Pathian ngêt khan a irziak thupêkhai chuangna lungphêk inhni kha Mosia kuang khan a pêka.

Mosia chu tânga a hong om insôta, kha hmun ata zuang chum lat loiin a om ti an hmu’n chu mipuihaiin Arona tiang an hong fekhôma, a kuang khan, “Tho a ni hruai hrangin pathian ni siam pe ro; Aigupta ram ata ni hruaisuaktu Mosia laka hi imo a ichang a ni ta, suak ta maka,” an tia.
Arona’n an kuang khan, “Nin dôngmahai, nin nâipasalhai le nâinupanghai mikuar bet kuarkâihai khek unglân, ki kuang ni hong pe roi,” a ti pehaia.
Khaang khan mi tinin an rângachak kuarkâihai kha an kheka, Arona kuang an hong chôi tâka.
Ama’n kuarkâihai kha a lei lâka, an zôia, a suangna hrang hmun a isiam khan a buna, rângachak sehrâtchalte irlim an luan pehai tâka.
Mihaiin, “O Israel mihai hi Aigupta ram ata ni hong hruaisuaktu ei Pathian kha a ni,” an tia.
Kha thu kha Arona’n an hriatin chu, rângachak sehrâtchalte kôla khan maichâm a siama, “Nangtûk chu
Zînga chu irbôlnahai a hâl hrang le irngeina thilinhlan fa hrangin sahai an hong chôia. Mipuihai chu hruaithe fa hrangin an toi tâka, kha kha uain inrui inhnâi le taksa irzukna sinin an inchangtira.

An lampui zui hranga ki iti kha an imâk tâk kêng; rângachak inzôia siamsuak sehrâtchal irlim chubai mûkin irbôlna thil an inhlan tâk kêng, ‘Ama hi Aigupta ram ata hruaisuaktu an Pathian kha a ni,’ an ti,” tiin.
Hi mihai tukullian lam hi kin hriat infel a ni ta.
Khasikin, lei dâihrekin lân, an chunga ki ning an mur oka, annihai khu thathai ving ki ti, khanchu nang le ni irchihai nam roiinpui takin siam ki ti.
Mosia’n

‘Tâng rama that irhmang hrang pialin ni mihai hi Aigupta ram ata ni ihruaisuak a ni,’ tiin Aigupta mihai khan itin moh an iti thei? ni ningmurna insum zâmin lân, ni milung inchong thûlin hi vânduaina irkhêl hi ni mihai chunga insum no roh.

Ni mi Abrahama, Isaka le Jakoba hai kha inhre maiin lân; ‘Irvâna ârsi tam dôr nêkin annihai kha irchi suanpâr pe hrang le ram ni inkung murdi an ta ni mai hranga kha,’ an irchi suanpârhai kuanga ni inkung kha inhre mai ro,” a tia.
Khasika khan kêng
Mosia chu tâng ata a chuma, lungphêk inhni hitiang hitiang thupêk sômhai chuangna kha a chôia.
Lungphêk kha chu Pathian isiam a nia, thupêk sômhai chunga khan invera irziak a ni.
Josua’n mipuihai khêk an hriatin chu, Mosia kuang khan, “Riakbuka irdoi irhâi kin hriat,” a ti pea.
Mosia khan, “Zoina khêk irhâi mo, an dinghmun siatna irhâi chu ni le irhoi ma; raifân hlasak irhâi a ni,” a tia.
Mosia khan sehrâtchal le mipui lâm sup sup hmu’nfel theina hranga riakbuk kha a zu nâiin chu, a ning an mur pe tak taka, tâng kôla khan lungphêk a ichôihai kha dêngzuanin an khoipai ta.
Sehrâtchal irlim an isin kha a lâka, an zôia a suk indi chita, tui leh a’rzêla, Israel mihai kha an intirhai ta.
Arona kuang khan, “Itin takin mo hi mipuihai hin sin an itho, hiang dôra sual sin irkhêl an itho tâk hi?” a ti pea.
Arona’n hiang hin a ti, “Ki chunga ni ninginmurtir viat no ro; hi mihai hin thilsual tho hrang an irzuk dop dop ti chu ni inhriat mo ni ma,
anni hin ki kuang, ‘Tho a ni hruai hrangin pathian ni sin pe ro; Aigupta ram ata ni hruaisuaktu Mosia laka imo a thurchi a ini tâk inhre ta ma unga,’ an ni tia.
An rângachak irvôna thilhai ki kuanga hong chôi hrangin ki hrilhaia, a neipuhaiin chu an kheka an ni ipêk a ni. Kha thilhai kha meia ki rôa, hi sehrâtchal hi a hong irsiamsuak zel a ni,” a tia.
Mipuihai chu an nuam an ningin an oma, an râlhai en nuam loi rak hrangin Arona khan a len lêngtirhai tih Mosia khan a hmuin chu,
riakbuk mikota khan a ngîra a khêka, “Mi tukhom
an kuang khan, “Israelhai
Levihai khan thupêk kha an zôma, kha ni sûn khan mi sâng thum vêl an ithat irman a ni.
Mosia’n Levihai kuang khan, “Mâni nâi le urênghai that ten khom
Zînga chu Mosia’n mipuihai kuang khan, “Sual ichiom tak nin itho a ni ta; khan atûn hin
Mosia chu
Ngaihoi takin an sualna ngaidamin lân; khan ni ngaidam nuam zel no’n chu, ni mihai irhming chuangna bu ata kha, ki’rhming khom kâtpai ro,” a tia.

Atûn hin fe’n lân, nang ki ihrilna hmuna khan ni mihai hi hruaihai roh. Ki vântirtônin nang a ihruai hrang a nih ti hi inhre mai ro, hi mihai an sual sika dûk ki ithohaina hrang nikhua khom anâi teng ta,” a tia.
Khaangin sehrâtchal irlim hranga Arona an insintir sikin
Nin matona hruaitu hrangin vântîrtôn tîr ki ta, Kanaan mihai, Amor mihai, Periz mihai, Hiv mihai le Jebus mihai chu irzûlpaihai ki ti.
Ram irchong irnêng sa hmuna nin ife hrang a ni, keima chu ni kuang hong ual no ning, tukullian mi an nia, lam laia nangni ki that irhmangtir duaiin chu,” a tia.
Mipuihaiin kha thu kha an inhriatin chu an irpei a tema, tûte an irchon sa leh irvo nuam ta mahai.

khan an kuanga hril pehai hrangin Mosia kha thu a pêka, “Mi tukullian tak nin ni. Zoro sôtnotea hrangin ni pôla fe sa hrang khomin, nangni ki’rhmangtir chit khom a ni thei. Atûn hin nin irvôna thil mantamhai kha khek unglân, imo nangni ki ilo hrang infel ki ti,” tiin.
Khaang khan Sinai tâng an mâksan hnungin chu an thilhluhai leh irvo ta mahai.
Israelhai riakbuk siamna hmun tina khan Mosia puan in irthiang kha hlavita khan a siam ngaia. A’rhming hrangin
Kha hmuna khan puan in kotbâihaia ngîrin Mosia kha an ithîr ngai a ni.
Mosia kha a sûnga a lût zoiin chu sûm ir-al zuang chumin puan in kotbâia khan a oma, sûmkâr ata khan
Sûm ir-al kha puan in mikota khan an hmu le chu mipuihai an lu an kûn ngaia;
mi an rualhai leh an ichong ngai angin,
Mosia khan
Ni milung ki ichuk ta tak a ni’n chu, ni sin ki thoa, nang kin lômtir mai theina hrangin ni inthang ki nih ti kin hriat infel theina hrangin,” a ti pea.
Mosia khan, “Kin kuang ni hong no’n chu, hi hmun hi nin masantir viat no roh.

Kin kuang ni hong sa no’n chu, ni mihai le ki chunga hin ni milung a chuk a nih ti itin mo kin inhriat thei hrang? Ni ompuina khan irnêng chunga mi danghai laia danglamna tak a ni inneitir hrang a ni,” a tia.
Mosia ingên angin ngaihoi takin ni hmêl nir hmutir ro,” a tia.
Ki hmâi chu nang irhmutir no ning, mi tukhomin an ni hmu’n chu an ihring ngai loi a ni.
Khan lung chunga ni ngîrna hrang hmun chu ki kôla hin a om.
Ki ompuina vâr irkhêl a tung zoroa lungpui kika khan nang thun ki ta, ki fe zoi mâka chu nang ilhlî mai ki ti.
Khanchu ki kut khâipai ki ta, ki hmâi ni loiin ki ruang tiang kai hmu ni ti,” a tia.
Nangtûk zînga irsiamin lân, tâng sîp taka ni hmu hrangin Sinai tânga hong lui roh.
Mi dang tûte an hong ilui sa hrang ni ma, tâng kôla khan kêlbelra mo sehrâtin mo fâk an izong hrang ni ma,” a tia.
Khaang khan Mosia khan lungphêk inhni a siama,
A maton tiang fe angin

Suanpâr dênin ki chonginkung tho ngaitu, pualoina le tehelna le sual ngaidam ngai; khan nu le pahai sualna sikin nâihai le tu le te irlo inthum le minli dên khomin dûk intongtirhai lêk no ning,” a tia.
Mosia chu inrang takin khûksadelin a kûna, chubai a mûka.
A vuana dân nangni ki ipêkhai hi zôm ngit unglân, malam nin pan thiai lai hin, Amor-hai, Kanaan mihai, Hit mihai, Periz mihai, Hiv mihai le Jebus mihai inhnotsuakhai ki ti.
Nin fena hrang rama mihai leh khan thuthung nin isiam hrang ni ma, kha kha nin ta hrangin thina a ini thei hrang a ni sikin.
An maichâmhai setpai unglân, an lungphunhai insiat unglân, pathiannu Aseri irsinsianahai insiat zit roi.
“Pathian dang chubai nin imûk hrang ni ma,

Kha rama mihai leh khan thuthung siam no roi, an pathianhai chubai mûka irbôlna an inhlan zoro khomin, kop sa hrangin nangni fial an ta, an pathianhai laia fâk an inhlan kha fa sa hrangin nin irzuk hrang ni mah.
Nin nâipasalhaiin kha nam dang nupanghai kha dôngma’n lahai duai an ta, ki ta hrangin iamom loina om hrang le an pathianhai chubai nin mûkpui theina lampuia nangni an ihruai thei hrang a ni.
Inluan millim pathianhai chubai nin imûk viat hrang ni mah.
Baidi kût chu hmang mai ngai roi. Abib tha, ki zoro khita thu nangni ki ipêk ang khan sûn sari sûng chu chol pol loi bai nin ifâk hrang a ni; kha tha kha Aigupta nin mâkna zoro a ni sikin.
“Nâilutîr pasal le sa a suak maton tak chu keima hrang a ni.

Sakuartung suak maton tak rêk chu a’rthûlin kêlbelrate inhlanin inhlan thei nin ti, nir hlan no’n chu a ring inher khiak pe roh. Nâilutîr murdi chu ni inhlan nôk ving hrang a ni. Tûte thilinhlan loiin ki kuang an hong inlang thei hrang ni mah.
“Mâni sinthôna hrangin sûn ruk sûngpa reng nin neia, a sûn sari ni chu sin nin izong hrang ni ma, âlkai zoro mo, bu ât zoro mo i ang khomin nin irngam hrang a ni.
“Bu a tung masatak ât a’rphutin chu, favâng kût hmang unglân, phalbi lût tianga ni thei ra nin bûm zoro’n chu, kairêng kût chu hmang roi.
Israelhai Pathian kuanga pasal murdi chu a kum tin voithum an hong inlang ngêt hrang a ni.
Nin mâna nam danghai ki len hnothaia, nin ramrihai kin liantir tena chu, hi kût inthumhai laia hin,
“Irbôlna hme nin hlan zoro’n chol kop loi ni inhlan hrang ni mah. Ferkân kût zoroa that sai hme hlek khat khom nangtûka hrang hôi no roi.
“Ni loia chîmu a tung masatak chu
Mosia chu sûn sômminli le zân sômminli ite fâk le in loiin
Thupêk sôm irziak lungphêk chôiin Mosia chu Sinai tânga irthokin a chuma, a hmêl chu
Arona le Israel mipuihai khan Mosia kha an enzui maia, a hmêl chu ir-al phutin an hmu maia, a kôla va nâi hrang khom a sate’n an chia.
Khan Mosia’n a koihaia, Arona le nam hruaituhai murdi chu a kuang an fea, Mosia khan a lei chongpuihaia.
Kha zoiin chu, Israel mi murdihai a’rhîlin an irbûma, Sinai tânga
Mosia’n thu an sîr pehai zoiin chu, puan hmâiirkhûna leh a’rkhuma.
leh chong hrangin
A hmêl ir-al phut kha an ihmu ngai a ni. Khanchu
Mosia’n Israel nam pumpui a koi bûmhaia, an kuang, “Hi hi nangni sin hranga
Mâni sinthôna hrangin sûn ruk reng nin inei a ni, sûn sarina ni chu irngam nî sûn irthiang, keima
Sabat ni chu mei ten lua in sûnga khom nin itho hrang ni ma,” a tia.
Mosia’n Israel mipuihai laia, “
kuanga thilinhlan nei roi, tukhom a’rhlan nuamhai chu thilinhlan rângachak, tangka dârthîr,
patzâiirhmi thûr sai, a dum, senduk le sen samul puan, kêl mula siam puan;
kêlbelra chal a vun sen, savun a sazât, sitim thing;
meisera hmang hrang oliv hriak, irthu theina sahriak, hâl hrangin thil mirimhoi;
ochai Efod le a kôlvêla onik lung le lungmantamhai hong chôi roi.
“Nin laia kut theithiamna nei murdi’n hong irsiamhai sian,
puan in a chung irkhûna le, hnuai inta ual inkhopna le thingtuai tângkhang, a chopuihai le a bangbul intoinahai;
Thuthung Bôm zônfunghai, a sîng le a dâihlîm hrang puanzâr;
dokâng zônfung le hmangrua dang a rêngin; Pathian kuanga inhlan bai,
hâl invâr hrang meiser siana le hmangruahai; meiserhai le a tui,
thil mirimhoi hâlna hrang maichâm le a zônfunghai, irpol zât sahriak, thil mirimhoi, puan in kotbâia sia hrang puanzâr;
thilinhlanhai hâlna hrang maichâm a sîra dârthîr kopa zônfung le a hmangrua murdi irsûkinfâina tuibêl le a toihmun;
dâia hmang hrang puanzârhai, a chopui le an toitirna dâi mikota hrang puanzâr;
puan in le a dâi hêmvuakhai le a hruihai;
Hmun Irthianga sintho hrangin an fe zoroa ochaihai innghâk hrang tukfam enhoi takhai; ochai Arona le a nâihai hrang songkol ser siam ri se,” a tia.
Israel mipui irbûmhai chu an chîn indara,
a’rphaltuhaiin
Mi irzukna neihaiin nupang le pasal irvôna irthei enhoihai, kuarkâihai, kutsabi hai, irthei rângachaka siam thil hlutak takhai an hong chôia
Mi tukhom patzâiirhmi a dum, a senduk mo, a sen samul pat, kêl mula siam puan kêlbelra chal vun a sen; savun a sazât neihaiin an hong chôia.
Sumru le dârthîr neihaiin
Mi kut theithiamna neihaiin patzâiirhmi an hong chôia.
Kêl mul khom satak thûr sai an hong chôi sa ngai.
An hruaituhaiin onik lung le lung mantam dang, Efod-a inkhop hrang le rôpphô târ hrang,
Thil mirimhoi le sahriak inchok thei hrang, irpol hrang le hâl hrang an hong tum ngaia.
Israel mi tukhom a nuam murdiin, Mosia kuang sin hrangin a thupêk anga hmang hrang thilpêkhai
Mosia’n Israel nâihai laia khan, “Juda nam laia mi, Hura tupa Uria nâipa Bezalela chu
Irfûktir theina thil i khom siam hranga kutsin theina le inhriat thiamna nei hrangin Pathianin a sinthotheina an siptira.
Thil enhoihai ngaituah suaka, rângachak sumru le dâr irfûktir theihai;
lungmantam inkhop hranga âttan, thing sin, thil enhoi chi tinrêng siam theina a ipêk a ni.
Dan irchia mi, Ahisamaka nâipa Oholiaba le an ruaiin mi dang kut theithiamhai irchutir theina

Thil siam theina, thil enhoi inhriat theina hai, puan zerhmi satak sin, a dum le a senduk le samul puan sen le puan dang không theihai, a ipêk a ni. I khom an sin theia, a hong irhoi hrang anga theina an inei tâk a ni.
“Bezalela, Oholiaba le kut sintheihai pâl,
Mosia’n Bezalela, Oholiaba le
Puan in irthiang sinna hranga Israel mihai thilpêk hong chôi kha Mosia kuang ata an idong a ni. A zîng tin Israel mihai khan an thilpêkhai Mosia tah hrangin an la hong chôi irzôm maia.
Mi kut sintheihai khan Mosia kuang an fea,
Khanchu Mosia kha riakbuk hmun tina khan tukhomin puan in irthiang sinna hranga thilpêk inhlanna nei ta loi hrangin thupêk a sema; khanchu mihaiin thilpêk an hong ichôi ta loi a ni.
Hong chôi saia om tâk lua kha a nang murdi sinna hranga nang nêkin a itam ual a ni ta.
Sinthotuhai laia a kut irloi ualhai khan
Puanzâr chu a sei lam mûk sômhni kiriat, puanzâr chu a khang tiang chu mûk minli seng a ni; puanzâr murdi chu a irtiat zit a ni.
Khan, puanzâr ringa kha chu an suiirzom zita, puanzâr ringa danghai khom an suiirzoma.
Khan, puanzâr buk tina a hmor taka khan a rông duminpôlin a sina, khaang dên khan a puanzâr hmor letianga irkopa khan a sin saa.
Phêk tin hmora khan hlam sômringa nângval irkopin, a’rdîntaka phêk inhnina khom khan nângvalin sômringa dang inkhop sai.
Phêk hni kha inkhata siam hrangin a’rkoptirna hrang rângachak kuaikim sômringa an siama.
Puan in chung chu kêl mula siam puan hlek sômhleikhatin a siama.
A rêngin irangnatin a dung mûk sômthum le a khang mûk minliin a isiam a ni.
A phêkin ringa ngain an insui irkoptira, kiruk danghai khom phêk danga an inkhop sa.
Phêk khatna sîr tiang khan irkual sômringa le phêk inhnina sîrtaka lekha khan nângval sômringa an inkhop sa a ni.
In chung inkhata siam hrangin phêk hnihai insui irkoptir hrangin dâr kuaikim sômringa an siama.
A chung thuaa hmang hrangin kêlbelra chal vun sen le savun a sazât chi an siama.
Khan, biakbuk bang intunghai chu sitim thingin a siama.
Thingphêk tin a sei tiang chu mûk sôm, thingphêk tin a khang tiang chu mûk khat le a chimrip a ni.
Thingphêkhai kha hmunkhata irzom theina hrangin a’rlûtmat thei, a kîm inhni a oma, a rêngin a kîm an inneitirhai chit a ni.
Sim tianga intung hrangin sômhni,
an toina hrangin a sûng ir-ông sumrua inluan sômminlia kîm inhnia chel indetna nei chitin, an toina hrang inhni an isia sa a ni.
Hmâr tianga puan ina intung hrang phêk sômhni,
an toitirna hrang sumrua siam sômminli, phêk khat hnuaia inhni hni toina siam sa a ni.
Nitâk tianga puan ina intung hrang phêk ruk,
a kil tianga hrang phêk hni an isiam a ni.
Hi a kila hai hi a bula irzomtir a ni, a sîp dêna irzomtir a ni.
Khaangin chopui kiriat, sumrua inluan an toitirna sômhleiruk, inkhat hnuaia toina hrang inhni hni a iom chit a ni.
A bang tung tianga indettirna hrangin tângkhang hrang sitim thingtuai sômhlei ringa,
hmâr tiang banga, sim tiang banga, a hnung tiang nitâk tianga banghaia khan ringa ngain an khanga.
a tângkhang inlaina taka khan a tung tianga a laitaka khang khan, puan in hmor inhni khan an irtongtir a ni.
Thingbuk intunghai chu rângachak tuiin an inluana, a tângkhang danghai indetna hrangin rângachak irkual an inkhopa, annihai khom khan rângachaka inluan a ni.
Patzâi irhmi samul rông dum a senduk le a sen irzêl cherubhai dûr zia enhoi taka zepa không chu chontan puanzârin an hmanga.
Sitim thing chopui minli puanzâr indettir hrang rângachak inluanin an phuna, rângachak kuaikim an inkhopa, chopuihai phûmna hrang sumrua inluan toina minli an siam sa.
Puan in mikota târ hrang patzâi irhmi thûr sai samul dum, a senduk le a sen irzêl, a’rvô enhoi tak puanzâr an khônga.
Hi puanzâr hranga hin sitim thing chopui ringa kuaikim inkhop, a sîphai le puan banga hrang khianghrol tuan rângachakin an inluana, a chopui intoina hrang dâr thîr ringa an siam sa.
Bezalela khan Thuthung Bôm hrang sitim thingin a dung mûk hni le a chimrip, a khang mûk khat a chimrip, a’rsânglam mûk khat a chimripin a sina.
A sûng le a pên tianghai khan rângachak rôngin an luanhaia, a kil thophai khom rângachak leh a thopa.
A zônfung rolna hrang rângachak irkual minliin a siama, bôm sîra a ke minlihai khan hitiang hitianghai khan inhni hniin an khopa.
A zônfung hrang sitim thing leh a siama, rângachak le a tuama,
bôm sîr hitiang le hitianghai khan a’rkualna khan a rola.
Bôm a sîng hrang, a dung mûk hni a chimrip, a khang mûk khat a chimrip, rângachak felfatin a siama.
Rângachak suk inphêkin cherub inhni,
a sîng a seina tiang a siama, a sîng leh khan irzoma phêk khat a ni theina hrangin a isiam a ni.
Cherubhai chu bôm sîng chunga khan hmâi irsongin an ir-en a ni, an mitha zârhai khan Thuthung Bôm sîng kha an ingha a ni.
Sitim thing dokâng a dung mûk hni, a khang mûk khat, mûk khat le a chimripa irsâng a siama.
Rângachak felfatin a tuama, a kôlhai khom kha rângachak leh a tuam vinga.
A hmor kutzapha dôra lian a siama, rângachakin a thopa.
A’rzônna hrang rângachak irkual minli a siama, a kehai omna a kil minlia khan an khopa.
A’rzôn zoroa zônfung rolna hrang irkual chu a hmor kôla khan inkhop a ni.
A zônfung sitim thing leh a siama, rângachakin a tuama,
rângachak felfatin dokâng hmang hrang le khênghai a siama, khênghai, khilâthai, bêlhai le khurihai uain inna hmangrua hrangin a isiam a ni.
Rângachak felfatin meiser siana ôn sari nei an chera. An toina hrang le a ngul kha rângachak suk inphêkin a siama; a’rvôtirna pârhai, a’rmuam le pâr illimhai leh khan a irzomtir ving a ni.
A ôn kiruka kungpuia irthokin an zara, a sîr tiang, hitiang hitiang inthum thumin a iom a ni.
A ôn kiruk omna hmun tina khan a’rvotirna pâr irlim inthum, almond pâr irvut angin, a’rmuam le pâr anga om an khop sa.
A ngulpuia khan a’rvôtirna pâr almond pâr irvut anga om, a’rmuam le a pâr ang a iom sa a ni.
A ôn chung inta le hnuai inta kâra khan, a ngulpuia khan a’rmuam inkhat illim a chuang chita.
Hi a’rmuamhai a ônhai le a ngulpui hi rângachak felfat phêk khat suk inphêka siam a ni.
Meiser siana ôn sari hranga meiser bûr, a lu inchor sari, meichephai le mei chôina hmunhai rângachak felfatin a siama.
Meiser siana le hmangrua danghai siamna hrangin rângachak felfat her sômthum ringa a ihmang a ni.
Sitim thing maichâm kil minli nei mûk khat vêla sei, a’rsânglam mûk hnia irsâng a siama, irki minlia inchor leh khan an tuanthal a ni.
Rângachak felfatin maichâm leh a’rkihai a thopa, a hmor indôr khom rângachak leh a ithop a ni.
A zônfung rolna hrang rângachak irkual inhni a siama, a hmor indôr hnuaia khan an khophaia.
a zônfung hrang sitim thingtuanhai a siama, rângachakin a tuama.
Hriak irthiang irpol zât, mirimhoi irpol zâthai a siam sa.
Thilinhlanhai hâlna hrang maichâm sitim thing le irki minli nei, mûk ringa sei, mûk thum irsâng a siama.
A’rki minlia khan a’rki inchortirin a intuanthal a ni; dârin maichâm le a’rkihai kha a tuam vinga.
Maichâma hmang hrang hmangruahai, irvut bêlhai; irvut luakna, khuri hai, thîr kuaikim le mei luakna dârthîrin a siama.
Dâr tuana om hmor hnuai tiang khan irkualin an inkhopa, maichâm chimrip a idel a ni.
A’rzônna hrang a kalna minli siamin irki minli khan an khopa,
a’rzônna hrang sitim thing tuan a siama, dâr leh a tuama.
Maichâm kil tianga kalna khan a rola, maichâm chu thingphêk leh a siama, a sûng chu a ir-ôngtir a ni.
Patzâiirhmia không puan in kha a’rkula. Sim tianga puan mûk irzakhata sei puan a hmanga,
chopui sômhni le an toihmun dâr sômhni, thil bângna hrang kuaikim le a zarna hrang sumru tuanhai siamin.
Hmâr tianga dâi khom khaang ngêt khan a nia.
Nitâk tianga khan puan mûk sômringa sei a zara, chopui sômkhat le an toitirna hmun dâr sômkhat a siama, a chopuia khan thilinchor a oma, puan bângna hrang sumru tuan a om sa.
Nisua tiang, mikot omna khom khan dâi mûk sômringa irzat a ni.
Mikot irzat lam chu mûk sôm hleiringa a ni, a sîr hitiang hitianga zâr hrangin patzâiirhmi thûr sai không zoi loi a ni.
Mikot kôla puanzâr murdi chu patzâi irhmia siam ving a ni.
Chopui intoitirna chu dâra siam a nia, a kuaikim ngul le a chopui sîp tuamnahai chu sumru rônga siam a ni. A’rkulna dâr chopui chu a rênga sumrua inluan ving a ni.

A lûtna mikota puanzâr chu patzâiirhmi thûr sai, samul dum, a senduk, a sen leh irzêl enhoi taka zepa không a ni. A sei lam chu mûk sômhni, a’rsâng lam chu mûk ringa; puan in irkulna puanzâr danghai anga khan;
An toitirna dârthîr minli inver sai sûnga phun chopui minlia indet a ni.
Puan in le a irkulna dâi hêmvuak murdi kha dâra siam ving a ni.
Thupêk sôm irziak chuangna lungphêk an isiana
Juda nama mi, Hura tupa Uria nâipa Bezalela’n Mosia kuanga
A sinthopui, Dan nama mi, Ahimasaka nâipa Oholiaba chu thil ker theia enhoi lam a siam thei, patzâiirhmi le samul dum, a senduk le a sena irzêla không nuam mi a ni.
Puan in irthiang sinna hranga
Irteppui an neia, mi tin an chôitum hranghai bituk an siama, sumru an hong ichôi bûm chu her sâng thum irzaminli sômthum a ikâi a ni, khotâng varh dân diktaka varin.
Hi hi kum sômhni kâia irteppuia tep sa chu, mi nuai ruk sângthum irzaringa sômringa haiin sekel irzakhat an hong ipêk irangpui kha a ni.
Puan in irthiang le puanzâr intoitirna irzakhat siam hrang sumru her sâng thum irzaminli hmang a nia, an toitirna inkhat hrangin her sômthum minli hmang a ni.
A hmang zoi loi sumru her sômthûm la om chu, Bezalela puan zârna thiltuan chopui hranga kuaikim le a sîp tuamna hrangin a siama.
hranga dâr an ipêk chu her sâng hni irzaminli sômhni ringa a ni.
Hihai ata hin
puan in irkulna dâi le a mikot irnghatna hai, puan in le a’rkultu dâi indettu hrang hêmvuakhai a siamsuaka.
Samul pat dum, a senduk le a senhai hmangin hmun irthianga sin an tho zoroa ochaihai innghâk hrang enhoi tak le Arona ta ochai songkol ser chu
Efod chu rângachak patzâiirhmi thûr sai; samul dum, a senduk le a sen hmangin a khônga.
Rângachak irphân dapin a sukinpêra, patzâiirhmi, samul dum, a senduk le a sen leh irpol hrangin a thêrhai zita,
rôpbel inhni an sina, Efod kilhai khan an inkhopa, khahai khan Efod an intûk indetpui a ni.
Konga Efod khit indetna hrang Efod ang zekin an siama, Mosia kuang khan
Onik lungmantam chu rângachaka an inkhopa, enhoi takin Jakoba nâi sômhleihnihai irhming an irziaka.
thupêk ang takin Efod dâra irvôna khan an belsaa; kha kha Israel nam sômhleihni inlangna hrang a ni.
Efod siamna hranga an thil hmang, patzâiirhmi thûr sai, samul dum, a senduk le a sen le rângachakhai hmangin rôpbel khom enhoi takin an không sa.
Ithep a nia, thep zoiin irki minli nei, khâp khata chêng a ni.
Lungmantam rân minli an inkhopa; rân maton taka khan Odam, Pitda le Bereka lunghai an siaa;
a rân inhnina khan Nopek, Safir le Emirald lunghai;
a rân inthumna khan Tarkois, Agate le Amethist lunghai;
A rân minlina khan berid, Onik le Jasper lunghai an siaa. Hi lungmantamhai hi rângachak inkhop indet a ni.
Lung inkhata hin Jakoba nâihai inkhat irhming a chuang chita, Israel nam sômhleihni irthûla ngîr hranga iti a ni.
Hi rôpbel hranga hin rângachak felfat zîngziri hruihrual irkin anga siam a ni.
Lungmantam inkhopna hmun inhni rângachak le rângachak irkual inhni an siama, a’rkualhai kha rôpbel chung tianga a khilina hrangin an inkhopa.
Rângachak zîngziri irkin kha a’rkualna khan an khita;
hrui inhni inkhat tianga mongna hmora khan, a danghai chu a kopna hmun inhni khan a kop sa, khaangin, rôpbel intoina chu Efod dâr bângna maton tianga inkhâi a ni.
Rângachak irkual inhni an siama rôpbel hnuai sîra khan an inkhopa, a sûng tiang chu Efod kôl zela khan,
rângachak irkual inhni an siam nôka, Efod dâr bângna inhnihai maton tiang hnuaia enhoi takin kongkhit chunga an inkhopa;
Mosia kuanga
Efod hnuaia innghâk hrang songkol irfual chu samul dum inzena không a nia.
Lu thunna hranga a ring ir-ông chu a chet loina hrangin, suisaruangmual neia iphiar a ni.
A hnuai tianga a hmor irfual khan patzâiirhmi samul dum, a senduk a sena siam dâlim dûr anga siam rângachak silniang kârirthâk inkhop a nia; Mosia kuanga
Arona le a nâihai innghâk hrang songkol hnuai,
lukôm, le tuman an khônga,
patzâiirhmi thûr sai le samul dum, a senduk le a sen hmangin kongkhit enhoi taka irvôtirin an ikhông a ni, Mosia kuanga
Rângachak felfata irvôna thil irthiang an siama, kha khan “
Lukôm maton tiang khan hrui dumin an inkhopa,
Mosia kuang khan puan in le a hmangruahai an hong chôia; a kuaikimhai, thingphêk irfûk saihai, tângkhang hai, chopuihai le a in intoitirna hai;
a chung irkhûtirna kêlbelra chal vun sen; a chung irkhûna savun a sazât a’rhlina hrang puanzâr;
thuthung bôm le a sûnga lungphêk hai, zônfung hai, a sîng;
maichâm le a hmangrua, Pathian kuanga inhlan bai ser sai;
rângachak felfata siam meiser siana, meiserhai, a hmangrua murdi meisera inchok hrang meitui;
rângachak maichâm, irpol zât sahriak, thil mirimhoi hâl zât, puan in mikota hrang puanzâr;
dâr maichâm le an detna zônfung hai, hmangrua murdi, irsûk infâina tuibêl le a toihmun;
dâia puanzâr târ hrang, a chopuihai le a toihmun hai, dâi mikota hrang puanzâr le a toihmun hruihai; puan in hêmvuak hai, puan ina le hmang hrang hmangrua murdi;
hmun irthianga ochaihai innghâk hrang tukfam le mitha enhoi takhai ochai Arona le a nâihai innghâk hrang songkol serhai.
Mosia kuanga thu a ipêk ang takin sin tinrêng Israel mihaiin an thoa.
Israel nâihai khan itinrêng eninfelin
“Tha masa tak, sûn khatna nî chu
Thuthung Bôm a sûnga thupêk sômhai omna kha a sûnga sen lân, a maton tiang puanzâr târ ro.
Dokâng chu a sûnga thunin lân; a chung tianga hmangruahai se roi. Meiser siana khom thuninlût sa unglân, a chunga meiser intoi roi.
Rângachak maichâm, mirimhoi hâlna hrang chu, Thuthung Bôm maton tiang se unglân, puan in mikota khan puanzâr târ roi.
Hâlirvôm thilinhlanna hrang maichâm chu puan in maton tiang intoi unglân,
irsûkinfâina tuibêl chu tui sung inbitin puan in le maichâm kâra se roi.
A tual kha dâiin sung unglân, a kotbâia khan puanzâr târ roi.
“Khante, puan in le a hmangrua murdi chu hriak irthiang polin thârin lân, a hong irthiang hrang a ni ta.
Kha hnung chu maichâm le hmangruahai pol intharin lân, a hong irthiang hrang a ni ta.
Irsûkinfâina tuibêl le a toihmun khom khaang dênin ni ithâr hrang a ni.
“Arona le a nâihai puan in mikota hong hruaihaiin lân, dân anga irthâr hrangin tuiirsil hrangin ti pehai roh.
Arona chu ochai tukfamhaiin irvo sian, sahriak irthuin hiang tak khan ni iserhai bîk hrang a ni, ochai nia ki sin a tho theina hrangin.
A nâihai khom koi inlûthaiin lân, anni chu songkol irfual innghâktirhai roh.

Khanchu an pa sahriak ni irthu ang tak khan, anni chu ochai sintho hrangin, sahriak irthutirhai roh. Hi hriak irthu hin anni chu zoro la hong hranghaia khom ochaiin a isiamhai mai hrang a ni ta,” a tia.
Khaang takin Aigupta ram ata an suak zoia, kum hnina le tha masa tak sûn khat nî sûn khan,
Mosia’n a bul intoinahai an deta, a hmangruahai a’rfûktira, tângkhang an khopa, chopuihai a phuna;
puan in chunga khan a irkhûna puanzâr a târa, a chung nôka khom khan a’rthuatira,
Khanchu lungphêk inhnihai kha a lâka, Thuthung Bôm sûnga a siah tâka, a zônfunghai chu Bôm irzônna irkual sûnghai khan a rola, a sîngna leh a sînga.
Bôm chu puan in sûnga a chôi inlûta, a irhli hrang puanzâr chu a târa,
Puan in sûng tentan sûnginta ual hmâr tiang khan dokâng a doa,
thupêk ang takin a chunga khan bai ser a siaa.
Sim tiang khan puan in sûnga meiser siana chu dokâng depna tiang an toia.
Kha hmuna khan
Rângachak maichâm chu puan in sûnga tentan puanzâr kôla a doa.
RENGPA thupêk ang takin thil mirimhoihai chu a hâla.
Puan in mikota puanzâr chu a târa;
kha puanzâr pêna khan hâlirvôm thilinhlan le bu le bâl thilinhlanhai a’rhlana, RENGPA thupêk lam takin.
Dâr irsûkinfâina tuibêl chu puan in le maichâm kâra khan a siaa, tui a sung inbita.
Kha khan Mosia’n, Arona le a nâihai khom an kut le kehai an irsûkinfâia,
puan in sûnga mo, maichâma moh an fe hrang richamin RENGPA thupêk lam ang takin an kut le kehai an irsûkinfâi ngai a ni.
Mosia khan puan in le maichâm irhualtu hrang dâi a sina, a dâi mikota khan puanzâr a târa.Hiang hin sin hrang murdi chu a izoi zit a ni ta.
Khanchu puan in kha sûmin a tuama, RENGPA ompuina vâr irkhêl khan a sipa.
Hi sika hin Mosia kha puan in sûnga a ilût thei ta loi a ni.
Israel nâihai khan puan in chung ata kha a’rthon vaiin an riakbuk kha an irthon theia.
Sûm kha, kha hmuna khan a om kâr kai chu an riakbuk kha an irthon ngai loi a ni.
An chaninvâi laiin a zîng sûng kâr chu sûna RENGPA ompuina sûmin a tuama, zâna meichokin puan in chunga khan an hmu ngaia.
Irtongna puan in ata Mosia chu
Israel nâihai kuang hiang hin ti ro:
Thilinhlan chu hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrang a ni’n chu sa laia a chal, hmêlveiloi ni a ta,
Hâlirvôm hrang sa lu chunga a kut irnghat a ta, a sual irbôlna hrangin pom ni a ti.
Sechalpa kha
A vun kha hlâi a ta, a hme kha irchanchit a ti.
Arona nâi ochaihai khan maichâma thing an lei siaa, mei tho an ti.
A sa chu a thâi le a lu leh ochai khan meia rô an ti.
A phîng sûng le a kehai kha irsûkinfâi hrang a nia, an hlantu ochai khan maichâma a rêngin a ihâlirvôm hrang a ni. Hi hi hâlirvôm thilinhlan tho lam dân hrang a ni; kha kha
Belra mani kêl mani hâlirvôma inhlan hrangin chu a chal, hmêlveiloi, a ini ngêt hrang a ni.
makunga, maichâm hmâr tianga khan tan a ta, a thisen kha ochaiin maichâma inthekin irkualsua a ti.
A hme kha irchan indarh a ta, maichâm chunga thing chok luai luaia khan ochaiin a lu leh a thâi le rô a ti.
A phîng sûng le a kehai rêk chu a irsûkinfâi bak hrang a ni; a rêng khan ochaiin a ihâlirvôm zit hrang a ni, hâlirvôm thilinhlan a nia,
ochai khan lei la a ta, maichâma a inhlan hrang a ni; a ringa inpotsat a ta, a ihâlirvôm hrang a ni; a thisen chu maichâm sîra a inzung zoi hrang a ni.
A midil le a busêk chu maichâm kôl sak tiang irvut sianaa a ipai hrang a ni.
Inset chit loiin a mitha dâra kaiphar hrang a ni, maichâma hâlirvôm zit ri se, hâlirvôm thilinhlan a nia,
Ochai khan baidi kha hap a ta, sahriak tômte le berohai leh khan maichâma a ihâlirvôm hrang a ni, kha kha a rênga hâlirvôm a nih ti entîrna hrang a ni; hâlirvôm thilinhlan a nia,
Thilinhlana hâl ban kha chu ochai dongtum hrang a ni,
Bu le bâl thilinhlana lungthua rô inhmin a hong chôiin chu, chol kop loi bai a ini hrang a ni, sahriak le inhmet a ni no khomin irphân taka sinin sahriak pol ni ri se.
Khan, ni thilinhlan chu khênga hâlirvut baidi thilinhlan a ni’n chu chol kop loi, sahriaka inhmet, bai indi tak a ini hrang a ni.
Khoi ni ta, sahriaka phûm ni ta, kha kha baidi thilinhlan a ni.
Thîrbêla inzêi, bu le bâl thilinhlan kha baidi a sa zât, sahriaka inzêi a ini hrang a ni.
Khaang thil kha
senkhat nok thâk a ta, a inokthâk kha a ihâlirvôm hrang a ni; kha kha a rênga hâlirvôm entîrna ni a ti. Hi hi hâlirvôm thilinhlan a nia,
Inhlan ban, rô loi chu ochaihai dongtum hrang a ni,
Bu le bâl thilinhlan,
Nin bu le bâl invâng masa tak rêk chu
Bu le bâl thilinhlana hin michi a ikop seng hrang a ni, michi hi Pathian leh Thuthung entîrna a nia, nin thilinhlana a ikop seng hrang a ni.
Nin bu le bâl thar masa nin hong inhlan tika changpêr inhlan sa hrang a ni.
Oliv hriak le bero a ikop sa hrang a ni.
Ochai khan changpêr le sahriak tômte, a rênga irthûlin la a ta, bero le khan bu le bâl thilinhlan
Irpôlkhôm thilinhlan hrang mi’n an sa vâi laia a hong inhlanin chu a chal mani, a pui mani hmêlveiloi,
A sa inhlan lu chunga a kut irnghat a ta, irtongna puan in tual lûtna mikot kôla that a ta, ochaiin a thisen kha maichâm a inzung irkual suak hrang a ni.
Irpôlkhôm thilinhlan ata kha
a bêhai le a thâi, a mithin hlap sa lai tak
kha ochaiin maichâma hâlirvôm thilinhlan dang a hâl laiin a ihâlirvôm hrang a ni; kha kha
Irpôlkhôm thilinhlan hrang mi’n a belra mani, a kêl laia mani a hong inhlanin chu a pui khom, a chal khom, hmelveiloi a inhlan hrang a ni.
Belra a hong inhlanin chu
a lua a kut irnghat a ta, irtongna puan in mikota
Irpôlkhômhai thilinhlan ata kha
a bêhai leh a thâi, a mithin a sa lai tak,
kha kha ochaiin maichâma
a lua a kut irnghat a ta, irbiakna in mikota that a ta, a thisen kha ochaiin maichâma a inthek irkual suak hrang a ni.
Hi hi fâk hrang thilinhlan hrangin
a bêhai le a thâi hlap, a mithin hlap sa lai tak.
Hi hi fâk hrang, thilinhlan hrangin ochai khan maichâma
Israel mi tukhomin sa thâi le thisen an ifâk hrang ni ma. Israel mihai kha khoa khom omhai sian hi dân hi an izôm kumkhua hrang a ni.
Israel nâihai hril ro, mi tukhomin
Thil tho’nsualtu chu ochai inlaltak a nia, mipuiin a sual mô an pêl hrangin chu, a sual irbôlna’n sehrâtchal tuai, hmêlveiloi,
makunga, irbiakna puan in mikota, sehrâtchal tuai chu hong kai a ta, a lua a kut irnghat a ta, a ithat hrang a ni.
A thisen senkhat chu chôi a ta, irbiakna puan in sûnga lûtpui a ta,
a kut chalin hmun irthiang puan zâr kha thisen khan voisari inthek a ta,
mirimhoi hâlna maichâm kôla a ibuakpai zit hrang a ni.
Sehrât mar, a rîl thâi murdihai,
a bêhai le a thâi a mithin tuam râng thâi sa lai takhai.
Ochai khan la a ta, a thâihai kha irpôlkhôm thilinhlan tho dân ang khan hâlirvôm inhlanna maichâma a ihâlirvôm hrang a ni.
A vunhai, a takhai, a luhai, a kehai, a sûngkua murdi le a rîlhai le
riakhmun dâi pên tiang hmun ser, maichâm irvut pai khômnaa, meipuia inchepin a ihâlirvôm hrang a ni.
Israel nam pumpuiin tho’nsual an tho tika, inhresuak zoi loiin
an tho’nsual tho kha an irhriat suak zoi le, nam punghai khan sual irbôlna hrangin sehrâttuai kha irbiakna puan in mikota an hong ilâk hrang a ni;
nam hruaituhaiin chu a lua kut irnghat an ta, that hrang a ni.
Ochai inlaltak khan sehrât thisen kha irbiakna puan ina chôi lût a ta,
hmun irthiang tak puan zâr chu voisari a kut chalin thisen kha a inthek hrang a ni.
Puan in sûnga mirimhoi hâlna maichâm kila a’rkia khan thisen pol sa a ta; puan in mikota thilinhlan hâlna maichâm kôla a zôk ban chu a ibunpai hrang a ni.
A thâihai kha maichâma khan a ihâlirvôm hrang a ni.
Sual irbôlna sehrâttuai a isinsiam ang khan a itho zit hrang a ni, mipui sual irbôlna kha a inhlan hrang a ni; khanchu, an sual kha ngaidam ni ta a ti.
Sehrâttuai kha riakhmun dâi pên tianga, ama sual irbôlna ang khan, a ihâlirvôm hrang a ni. Hi hi nam pumpui sual irbôlna thilinhlan hen hrang lam chu a ni.
Roirêltu’n thilsual a tho’nchâia,
a thilsual tho kha an hrila, an hriatsuak zoi le, a sual irbôlna hrangin kêlchal, hmêlveiloi a inhlan hrang a ni.
Kêl lua a kut irnghat a ta, maichâm hmâr tiang, hâlirvôm thilinhlan an thatna hmuna khan a itan that hrang a ni.
Ochaiin a thisen kha lâk a ta, a intât ban chu maichâm kôla khan a ibunpai hrang a ni.
A thâi murdi chu irpôlkhôm thilinhlan, a itho angin maichâma khan a ihâl irvôm hrang a ni; khaang kha roirêltu sual irbôlna ochaiin a inhlan hrang dân chu a ni; khanchu, a sual chu ngaidam ni a ti.
Mi narânin thilsual a tho’nchâia,
a thilsual tho a’rhriatsuak zoi le kêlpui hmêlveiloi, a sual irbôlna hrangin a hong inhlan hrang a ni.
Kêl lua kut irnghat a ta, hâlirvôm maichâm hmâr tiang, hâlirvôm thilinhlan an ithatna hmuna khan a ithat hrang a ni.
A thisen chu ochaiin maichâm kil irkihaia khan a kut chalin intât a ta, a intât ban chu maichâm kôla a ibunpai hrang a ni.
A thâi murdi chu irpôlkhômhai thilinhlana itho ang taka khan maichâma a ihâlirvôm hrang a ni; kha kha
Sual irbôlna hrangin belra a hong chôiin chu, a pui, hmêlveiirla loi a ini ngêt hrang a ni.
Belra lua khan a kut irnghat a ta, hâlirvôm thilinhlana an ithatna hmun, maichâm hmâr tianga khan a itan that hrang a ni.
A thisen kha hâlirvôm maichâm kil irkihaia khan a kut chalin ochai khan thisen kha nâl a ta, a inâl ban chu maichâm kôla a ibunpai hrang a ni.
Irpôlkhômhai thilinhlan belra ang khan a thâi murdi kha la a ta,

Hiang thila hin sual irbôlna inhlan a nang. Roirêlna hmuna thu’nhriatnaa koi a ni’n chu a thil hmu mani, a thil inhriat mani inpuang hranga ti a nia, an puang nuam no’n chu thilsual a tho a ni, a moh a iphur hrang a ni.
Mi’n thil irthiang loi, sâ a ruakhai, a lian mani a chîn mani ramsa irthiangloi ruakhai mani a tôn palin chu thilsual a itho a ni; an hriat suakin chu a mô chu a ipêl hrang a ni, porinche sa a ti.
Mihriam ata suak, thil irthiangloi rêng rêng a tôn palin chu a thiltho chu dik mah ti an hriat zoi le a irthiang zôi zel a ni.
Mi’n thil sa mani saloi mani tho hrangin irngaitua sabak loiin khuasâl sianlân, a thiltho chu a’rngaitua sabak zoi tika vai a tho’nsual mô kha pêl ta a ti.
Mi’n thilsual a tho’n chu, a thilsual tho kha irphuang a ta,
a thilsual tho hremna hrangin
Belra mani kêl mani a nei no’n chu a sual mana pêkin
Ochai kuang hong lâk a ta, sual irbôlna kha a inhlan masa hrang a ni. Tan nghet loiin a ringa khiak a ti,
a thisen chimrip chu maichâm panga inthek a ta, maichâm kôla a thisen kha a inzung zoi hrang a ni. Hi hi sual irbôlna thilinhlan a ni. Inkhat chu dân angin hâlirvôm thilinhlana a inhlan hrang a ni.
Khaang ochai khan mi thilsual tho irbôlna kha inhlan a ta, ngaidam ni ta a ti.

Vasu inhni mani phervali inhni mani khom a nei no’n chu sual irbôlna thilinhlan baidi sa zât her khat a hong inhlan hrang a ni. Oliv hriak mani bero mani a hong ipol sa hrang ni ma; hâlirvôm thilinhlan ni maka, sual irbôlna thilinhlan a ni.
Ochai kuang hong chôi a ta, fâk hrang thilinhlan angin
Khaang khan thilsual thôtu hrangin ochai khan lei inhlan pe a ta ngaidam ni a ti. Bu le bâl thilinhlan ang dênin a ihâl ban baidi chu ochai dongtum hrang a ni.
“Mi’n
A ipêk loi zât irphu chu pe a ta, khabana hmun ringaa hmunkhat a ipêk bel hrang a ni. Ochai kuang pêk a ta, belrate kha ama’n tho’nsualna man thilinhlana lei inhlan pe a ta, ngaidam ni a ti.
“Tho loi hrang thua

Ochai kuang tho’nsual man thilinhlan hrangin belra mani kêl mani, a chal, hmelveiloi a hong ikai hrang a ni, sa man bi zât chu biak ina dân hmang lai anga sût hrang a ni. Ochai khan tho’nsual man thilinhlan kha a thil tho’nsual pal irbôlna hrangin lei inhlan pe a ta, sual kha ngaidam ni a ti.
ata a tho’nsual man thilinhlan a ni,” a tia.
A’rchi Israelhaiin a kuanga thil a inkoltirhai, a ihlephai, pêk kîr nuam ta no sian, inrûkpai pên mani huang ta sianlân;
khan, thil irhmang hrûta hrût loi angin khomâk a sâmin chu,

hiang thilsual, a i ang khom hi tho sianlân, a inrûkhai a ihuanghai, a ihlep inkhîr nuam loihai, thil irhmang hrûthai, milak khomâk a isâmkhum thilhai chu, a rêngin a ithuan zit hrang a ni; khabana hmun ringa ata hmun khat a ipêk belsa hrang a ni; thilsual a tho ti hmusuak nia a neitu kuang a ipêk hrang a ni.
Tho’nsual man
Ochai khan
Arona le a nâihai chu hâlirvôm thilinhlan chungchânga tho hrang dân hi hril roh. Hâlirvôm thilinhlan chu zânkhovârin maichâma khan a isia hrang a ni, mei chu inchok mai hrang a ni.
A tûka chu ochai khan a puanchek irphân songkol le tuman hnuai innghâkin lungthua thil rô irvâmhai kha hrût a ta, maichâm sîra khan a isia hrang a ni.
A puandiar chu thûl a ta, riakhmun dâi pên tiang hmun sera irvut kha a ipai hrang a ni.

Maichâma mei kha som inhring mai hrang a ni, a ithi hrang ni mah. Ochai khan a ni tin thingtua bel mai a ta, hâlirvôm thilinhlan hranghai kha hâl a ta; irpôlkhôm thilinhlan thâihai khom kha hâlirvôm zôi zel a ti.
Maichâma mei kha som inhring mai hrang a ni, a ithi lik hrang ni mah.
“Hiang hi bu le bâl thilinhlan tho hrang dân chu a ni: Arona irchi ochaiin bu le bâl thilinhlan kha maichâma,
Baidi le sahriak kha a chimrip thâr a ta, bero leh maichâma hâl a ti, kha kha a rêngin
Inhlan ban chu ochaihai fâk hrang a ni, irbiakna puan in tual hmun irthianga chol kop loia fa hrang a ni,
chol le inhmet pola inzêi hrang ni mah. Bu le bâl thilinhlan ata an dongtum hrangin ki ipêk a ni. Sual irbôlna le tho’nsual man thilinhlan anga thil ser, a sân ser irthiang tâk a ni.
Arona irchi pasalhai ka kaiin fa thei an ti.
“Arona le a nâihai sahriak pol an niin chu
Oliv hriak leh inhmet irzêla thîrtûla em inhmin hrang a nia, irsik indi’n bu le bâl thilinhlan anga inhlan hrang a ni.
Arona irchi, a âiôtu hranga sahriak pol, ochai inlaltak khan hi thilinhlan hi a inhlan hen hrang a ni; hi hi kumkhuaa tho hrang a ni,
Ochaiin bu le bâl thilinhlan a inhlan hi fa hrang ni ma, hâlirvôm zit hrang a ni,” a tia.
Arona le a nâihai kha hril roh. Hiang hi sual irbôlna thilinhlan inhlan hrang dân chu a ni. Hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrang thatna hmuna sual irbôlna thilinhlan chu
An hlantu ochaiin, a hme hi puan in irbiakna tual hmun irthianga fa hrang a ni.
Hi hme hi a tôn murdi chu an innim zôi zel a ni. Sil le kai khom a thisenin an thekin chu hmun irthianga a irsûk hrang a ni.
A hme suangna bêl kha pilbêl a ni’n chu inkhoi hrang a ni; thîrbêl a ni’n chu inlap infâi vinga irsûk hrang a ni.
Ochai irchi pasal rêng rêng chu a hme fa thei an ti, thil ser a ni.
Irbiakna puan in hual sûng hmun irthianga thisen chu sual irbôlna hrangin lâk lût a niin chu a hme chu hâlirvôm zit hrang a ni.
Hi hi tho’nsualna man thilinhlan tho lam hrang chu a ni.
Hâlirvôm thilinhlan, sa thatna hmuna sa chu that hrang a ni, a thisen chu maichâma inthek hrang a ni.
A’rmei takhai, a rîl thâihai,
a kalhai le a taksahai a mithin hlap tuam sa lai takhai kha
ochaiin maichâma a hâlirvôm hrang a ni, tho’nsual man thilinhlan a ni.
Ochai irchi, pasal kakaiin a hme kha fa thei an ti, a sâna ser a ni sikin hmun irthianga fa hrang a ni.
Sual irbôlna thilinhlan le tho’nsualna man thilinhlan hi an hlan dân a ir-ang mai hrang a ni; an hlantu ochai hin a hme hi an ifâk hrang a ni.
Hâlirvôm thilinhlana hmang savun kha an hlantu ochai idong hrang a ni.
Bu le bâl thilinhlan lungthua rô innhminhai, thîrtûla rô inhminhai, thîrbêla inzêihai kha an hlantu ochai dongtum hrang a ni.
Bu le bâl thilinhlan la’nhmin loi, sahriak kop le koploi khom Arona irchi ochaihai dongtum hrang a ni, an irsem thiai hrang a ni.

Irpôlkhôm thilinhlan chu Pathian kuang lômthu hrilna hrangin mi’n a hong inhlanin chu, sa an hlan laiin bai chol kop loi le oliv hriak leh inhmet mani, bai irphân oliv hriaka nâl mani, oliv hriaka inzêi mani a hong inhlan sa hrang a ni.
Khabana chol kop baitang rô inhmin a ipêk sa hrang a ni.
Bai chi dang dang a inhlan laia inkhat chu
A hme chu an hlan nia fa zoi zit hrang a ni, a tûka hrangin sia hrang ni mah.
Irpôlkhôm thilinhlan chu chonginkung hlochukna sika mani, mâni nuam thua thilinhlan rêng rêng mani chu, a hme kha an hlan nia fa zit ual hrang ni ma, a tûka khom la fa thei a ni.
Fa zoi loi, sûn thum ni tena khom la om chu hâlirvôm hrang a ni.
A sûn thum nia la fâk chu Pathianin a thilinhlan kha pom no nia, an hlantu thil tho kha a saa pom nêkin porinchea bê ni a ta, a fâktu khom mophur a ti.
A hme thil porinche a kopin chu fa hrang ni ma, hâlirvôm hrang a ni. Mi porinche loiin chu a hme kha fa thei an ti.
Mi porinche laiin irpôlkhômhai thilinhlan hme hi a fâkin chu ensan hrang a ni.
Mihriam mani sa ata mani thil porinche suak tôntu chu hi hme hi a fâkin chu ensan hrang a ni, a tia.
“Israel nâihai chu hril ro: belra mani, sehrât mani, kêl mani, a i anga mar khom nin ifâk hrang ni mah.
Sa thi mani, sa ise that hme chu nin ifâk hrang ni ma, thil danga chu hmang thei ni a ti.
Fâk hrang thilinhlan
Israel nâihai chu khoa khom omhai sian sa thisen mani va thisen mani an ifâk hrang ni mah.
Hi dân insiat murdi chu ensan hrang an ni,” a tia.
“Israel mihai chu hril roh. Irpôlkhôm thilinhlan
Ama ngeiin fâk hrang thilinhlan chu a hong inhlan hrang a ni. Sa taksa le a mithin chu sen a ta,
Ochaiin a taksa chu maichâma hâl a ta, a mithin chu ochai dongtum a ni.
Irpôlkhôm thilinhlan chu a chang tianga mal chu ochai dongtum a ni,
Irpôlkhôm thilinhlan taksa le thisen inhlantu ochaiin chu, a mal chang tianga chu dong a ti.
Israelhaiin
Hi hi fâk hrang
Kha nikhua khan

Khanchu, hâlirvôm thilinhlan hai, bu le bâl thilinhlan hai, sual irbôlna thilinhlan hai, tho’nsual man thilinhlan hai, ochai namindet thilinhlanhai le irpôlkhôm thilinhlanhai chu khaanga inhlan hen hrang chu a ni.
Ramchâra Sinai tânga Israelhai thilinhlan hrang dân a hril laia Mosia kuang
“Arona le a nâihai kha irtongna puan in lûtnaa honghai sianlân, ochai tukfam pol hrang sahriak hai, sual irbôlna hrang sehrâtchal tuai hai, belrachal inhni le chol kop loi bai, kokin hong chôi ri se.
Israel pungkhômhai chu koi zit ro,” a tia.
“Ei itho hrang hi
Mosia’n Arona le a nâihai kha a hong hruaia, dân angin tui a’rsiltirhaia.
Songkol hnuai, songkol irfualhai an nghâktira, kongkhit an khittira. Efod an nghâktir saa, a khitna sataka phan khan a konga a khitdela.
Rôp irbel kha a’rbela, Urim le Thumim khom kha a siaa.
Diar kha an kaitira, a michala rângachak phêk,
Mosia’n sahriak pol zât kha a lâka, kairêng le a sûnga om murdi kha an mâia, a’rthiangtira.
Sahriak chimrip khan maichâm le a bêlbûr hai, thîr tâbor le dônahai kha irthiangtirna hrangin voisari an theka.
Sahriak chimrip chu Arona lua a buaka, a ser irthiang tâka.
Arona nâihai khom kha Mosia’n a hruaia, songkol chial an nghâktira, kongkhit an khittira, lukhum an khumtir saa, khahai kha
Mosia’n sual irbôlna sehrât kha a kaia, Arona le a nâihai khan a lua an kut an irnghata.
Mosia’n a thata, a thisen chimrip chu a kut chalin maichâm kil irkihai khan irthiangtirna hrangin a nâla, a inâl ban chu maichâm kôla a bunthuana, khaang khan maichâm kha a sera, a irthiangtir a ni.
Mosia’n a sûngkua a rîl thâi murdi, a mithin le a milunghai, a bêhai le a thâihai kha maichâma khan a hâla.
thupêk angin a vun, a taksahai, a rîlhai kha riakhmun pên tiang a hâla.
Hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrang belra khom kha Mosia’n a kaia, Arona le a nâihai khan a lua an kut an irnghata.
Mosia’n a thata, maichâm kha thisen khan an thek kuala.
thupêk angin belra kha a’rchanchita, a lu le a taksahai le a thâihai chu a hâla.
A sûngkua le a kehai kha a’rsûka, belrachal kha maichâma a hâl zit tâka. Hâlirvôm thilinhlan a ni, kha kha mirimhoi tak hranga hâlirvôm thilinhlan a nia;
Mosia’n belra inkhat ochai namindetna kha a kaia. Arona le a nâihai khan a lua an kut an irnghata.
Mosia’n a thata, a thisen chimrip kha Arona mikuar chang tiang hmora khan a pola, a kutpui chang tiang le a kepui chang tiang hmora khom a pola.
Arona nâihai khomin an hong pana, an mikuar chang tiang hmora, an kutpui le kepui chang tiang hmorhaia a lei pol pehai saa, a ipol ban chu Mosia’n maichâma inthekna hrangin a ihmang a ni.
Belra mar, a pin thâitak-hai, a rîl thâi tuamhai, a mithin tuamtu a rânghai, a bê inhni le a thâi kophai le a mal chang tianga kha a lâka.
kuang bu le bâl thilinhlan, chol koploi bai tang khat le bai, sahriak le inhmethai, bai irphân sahriak nâlhai kha chu sathâi le a mal chang tiang chunga khan a siaa.
Arona le a nâihai kuta an hlana,
Mosia’n khahai kha a lâk nôka, hâlirvôm thilinhlan chunga namindetna thilinhlana a hâl tâka. Hi hi fa hrang thilinhlan a ni; kha kha
Mosia’n a mier kha a lâka,
Mosia’n sahriak pol hrang senkhat chu maichâma inthek thisen chimrip leh khan a lâka, Arona le a nâihai kha an songkolhaia an theka. Khaang khan an songkolhai le
Mosia’n Arona le a nâihai kuang, “Irtongna puan in mikot kôla a hme hi la unglân, but unglân, koka namindetna thilinhlan bai leh khan
Nin ifâk ban kha, hme khom bai khom hâl zit hrang a ni.
Namindetnaa tho hrang tho zoi zit a ni hnungin, sûn sari sûng chu irtongna puan in ata pên tiang nin isuak hrang ni mah.
thupêk angin khahai kha nin sual irbôlna hrangin ki itho a ni.
thupêk ang khan sûn sari le zân sari irtongna puan in lûtna kôla nin iom hrang a ni. Nin om nuam no’n chu thi nin ti, kha kha
Khanchu, Arona le a nâihai khan Mosia kuanga
Sûn riat niin chu Mosia’n Arona le a nâihai kha Israel ulianhai leh a koihaia.
Arona kuang, “Belrachal tuai le belrachal hmêlveiloi kaiin lân, sehrât kha sual irbôlna thilinhlana
Israel mihai khan sual irbôlna thilinhlana kêlchal hong chôihai sianlân; sehrâtte le belrate, kum khat vêl ang, hmêlveiloi hâlirvôm hrangin hong chôi sa ri sehai.
Sehrâtchal le belrachal, irpôlkhômhai hrangin hong chôi sianlân, bu le bâl thilinhlan sahriak leh irpol
Mosia thupêk angin irtongna puan in mikota, khahai kha hong chôiin lân, nam pumpui chu
Mosia khan an kuang, “Hi hi tho hrangin
Khan, Arona kuang khan, “Maichâma ni sual irbôlna hrang le hâlirvôm thilinhlan chu inhlan ro, mipui sual irbôlna hrang khom inhlan sa roh.
Arona chu maichâma a fea, ama sual irbôlna sehrâtchal tuai kha a thata.
A nâihai khan a thisen an hong lâk pea, a kutchal an chiea, maichâm kil irkia khan an pola, a ipol ban chu maichâm kôla a bunpaia.
A thâihai, a bê inhni, a mithin tuam a râng sa laitakhai kha Mosia kuang
A vun le hme rêk chu riakna hmun pên tiang a hâlirvôma.
Ama hranga hâlirvôm thilinhlan khom kha a thata, a thisen kha a nâihaiin an hong lâk pea, maichâma an thek irvêla.
A lu le a hme dang khom an hong chôia, maichâma a lei hâla.
A sûngkua le a kehai kha a’rsûk infâia, maichâma hâlirvôm thilinhlan chunga khan a hâl tâka.
Kha zoi chu mipui thilinhlan kha an hlan tâka. Mipui sual irbôlna thilinhlan kha a thata, ama sual irbôlna a inhlan ang takin a thoa.
Hâlirvôm thilinhlana inhlan hrang sa khom kha a tho hrang lam dân angin a thoa.
Bu le bâl thilinhlan baidi kha a hapa, maichâma khan a hâl saa.
Irpôlkhômhai thilinhlan sehrâtchal le kêlchal, mipuiin an hong ichôi kha a thata, sa thisen kha a nâihaiin an hong chôia, maichâm kha an thek irvêla.
Arona khan sehrâtchal le belrachal mar, belrachal pin thâi tak le a hlap thâihai, a bêhai, a mithin tuamtu a rânghai kha an pêk saa,
a mier chunga khan a siaa, khan ama khan a thâi kha a hâla,
Mosia ihril angin a mier le a mal chang tianga kha ochaihai hrangin
Arona’n hihai hi an hlan zoiin chu mipui chunga a kut a phara, satvurna a hrila, maichâm ata a zuang chum tâka.
Mosia le Arona kha irtongna puan ina khan an lûta, an hong suakin chu mipui hrangin satvurna kha an hrila.
kuang ata mei a hong suaka, maichâma hâlirvôm le a hme thâihai kha a hong kâng irhmang tâka. Mipuiin kha kha an hmu’n an khêka, khûksadelin irnênga an inbok tâka.
Nadaba le Abihua, Arona nâihai khan, an mei lâkna khan meiri-al an lâka, mirimhoi hâl zât an phula,
kuang ata mei a zuang suak zoka,
Mosia’n Arona kuang, “
Mosia’n Misaela le Elzafan, Arona pa urêng Uziela nâihai kha, a koia, an kuang, “Hong unglân, nin urênghai ruak hi in irthiang ata hi la suakhai unglân, riak hmun pên tiang sepaihai roi,” a tia.
Khanchu, an honga, Mosia iti angin an ruakhai kha an ochai songkol irfual khan riakna hmun pên tiang an irzôn suakpaihai ta.
Mosia’n Arona le a nâipa Eleazara le Ithamara kuang, “Lu nin irsûkin nin sam intha no unglân, nin puan khom ir-ek thêr sa no roi; khaang khan nin tho’n chu nin ithi ngêt hrang a ni,
Nangni’n chu irtongna puan in hi suaksan no roi, thina nin ti,
“Irtongna puan in nin hong lût hrangin nang le ni nâihai hin uain le zu nin i-in hrang ni ma, nin inin chu thi nin ti. Hi hi nin irchi murdi’n an izôm hrang a ni.
Thil ser le serloi, irthiang le irthiang loi nin isen thiam hrang a ni.
Mosia kuang dân nangni ki ipêk murdi Israel mihai kha nin irchutir hrang a ni,” a tia.
Mosia’n Arona le a nâipa inhni la dam, Eleazara le Ithamara hai kuang, “Bu le bâl thilinhlan ata
Hmun irthianga khan fa unglân,
A mier le a mal,
A mal le a mier hi
Mosia’n sual irbôlna thilinhlan kêl chungchâng thu kha ngûk takin a’rdona, an lei hâlpai tah ti an hriata. Eleazara le Ithamara chunga khan a sân a ning an mur tâka.
“Ithoa mo hmun irthianga sual irbôlna thilinhlan, kêlchal hme kha nin ifâk loi, ser irthiang zit tâk a ni kha; mipui sual irbôlna ata nin dongtum hrang
Irtongna puan ina thisen kha lâk lût ni maka, nangni ki ihril ang khan kha khan a hme chu nin ifâk hrang a ni kha te,” a tia.
Arona khan a sâma, “A vuan khan irbôlna hme chu fa inlân,
Khahai kha Mosia’n a hong inhriatin chu, a milung a chuk tâka.
“Israel mihai kha hiang hin hrilhai roi.
Tânga lêng, hiang sahai hi fa thei nin ti: a kemitin têra suak, a fâk insoi ngai sâ rêng rêng chu fa thei nin ti.

Khannisianlân insoia inlem mani a mitin têr loia a suak laia om mani, hihai hi chu nin ifâk hrang ni ma; saringsei, insoiin invol khom sianlân, a mitin a têr no sikin, nin ta hrangin a iporinche a ni.
Khan, mizupui, an soia an lem nâkin, a mitin a têr no sikin; nin ta hrangin a iporinche a ni.
Khan, mizupui kha insoia an lema chu, khannisian a mitin a têr no sikin: nangni hrangin a porinche a ni.
Vok hme fa no roi, sâ porinche a ni, a ke mitin a’rkaka chu, khannisian insoiin invol mah.
Hiang sâ hmehai hi chu fa no roi, a thi tâk ruak khom tôn no roi, a porinche a ni.
Nga chi tinrêng, tuia omhai, tuikhangliana om, dîla om, hlip le a phe neihai chu fa thei nin ti.
Tuia lêng hlip le a phe nei loi chu fa loi hrang a ni.
Khahai kha intir a om, a tôn khom tôn no roi.
Tuia lêng, hlip le a phe nei loi chu nin ifâk hrang ni ma.
Hi vâhai hi vâ intirom an ni: irmu, simbu
muhâite, vânlaiirmu chi rêng rêng
vaâk chi rêng rêng,
vâ ngalirsâng hai, meibâk, tuivaârngoi, tuikhanglian vahai, irmu chi rêng rêng
rângkêk, vadung irmuhai, suitilil hai
simbu misiaknei, raikoso hai,
khânghlâi hai, dîl va chi rêng rêng, sualungvakâmkei hai le bâk hai.
Thilhring mitha nei, ke minlia irvâk chi rêng rêng chu nangni hrangin a porinche a ni.
Irkâr theina hrang ke mitin irphal nei zât rêk chu fa thei nin ti.
Khâihmimse chi rêng rêng, khâiruang chi rêng rêng, ruanguiêk chi rêng rênghai fa thei nin ti.
Mitha nei, ke minlia irvâkhai chu nangni hrangin intirom a ni.
A thi tôn murdi khohloi dênin porinche a ti.
A hme khom puan diarin a tônin chu irsu hrang a ni, khohloi dênin a neitu chu a porinche a ni.
Sa khom a mitin irkak khomsian insoi loi mani, a mitin irkak sualoi rêk chu a iporinche a ni, a ruak tôn chu porinche a ti.
Ke minli nei, kepâr irtuam murdi chu, an iporinche a ni, an ruak tôn chu khohloi dênin porinche a ti.
An ruak lâktu khan puandiar a irsûk hrang a ni, khohloi dênin porinche a ti; hi ruakhai ang hi nangni hrangin a porinche a ni.
Irnênga a’rvâkhai ang zât hi nangni ta hrangin a porinche sa a ni; ibûi, mizu, châichek rêng rêng,
tokke, innghâk, laikin, ûleng kinsanêlnek.
Hiang a boka irvâka lôn chi hi nin ta hrangin a porinche a ni. A thi tôn khom khohloi dênin porinche an ti.
Khan, a thiin chu thing mani, puandiar mani, savun mani, hmarsa mani, thil sianaa hmang tâka khom a delin chu porinche a ti, irthiang nôk zôi zel a ti.
Pilbêl sûnga a tâkin chu a sûnga om tinrêng kha porinche a ta, a bêl kha zêmkhoichit hrang a ni.
Thil fâk thei chi rêng rêng, khaang bêla lei om chu irchôk a niin chu porinche sa a ti; khaang bêla inthei chi om rêng rêng khom porinche sa a ti.
Hihai thi ruak hi bai inzêina bêla mani, a tâkin chu porinche a ta, inkhoichit hrang a ni.
A thi ruak chu i ang khomin tôn sian a tôntu chu a porinchea, khannisian, tuikuanga, tui panga ta sian porinche ma.
Song hranga chîmu sia chunga tâk khom ni sian, chîmu chu porinche ma.
Chîmu chu tuia an inchie laiin, hi a thi ruak hi a tâkin chu porinche a ti.
Sa fâk zât thi sianlân, a ruak tôn murdi khohloi dênin porinche an ti.
A hme fâk chu a puandiar a irsûk hrang a ni, khohloi dênin porinche a ti. A hme pêltu khomin a puandiar a irsûk hrang a ni, khohloi dênin porinche a ti.
Thilhring, irnênga boka irvâk zât hi nin ifâk hrang ni mah.
A’rtôla irtôlhai, ke minli mani kha nêka tam mani nei irnênga irvâk zât rêng rêng hi nin ifâk hrang ni ma, a porinche a ni.
Hihai hi nin fâkin chu intirom ni nin ta, porinche nin ti.
Kei
Nin Pathian ni hrangin Aigupta ram ata nangni hruai suaktu
Hihai hi ramsa hai, vâ hai, tui sûng hai, irnêng chunga irvâk hai, chungchânga dân chu a ni.
A’rthiang le irthiang loi, fâk zât le fâk loi zât nin itheithâk hrang a ni.
“Israelhai kha hril roh. Nupangin nâi a vonga, pasal a niin chu sûn sari sûng porinche a ti, thi a nei sûnga a iporinche ang khan.
A sûn riat ni’n chu nâitesente ser hmor vun kha a itan hrang a ni.
A thisen suak sikin nu chu sûn sôminthum sûn thum a hek mâka chu irthiang no ni, a’rthâr irthiang mâka chu thil irthiang ite a itôn hrang ni mah.
“Nâinupang nei chu sûn sômhleiminli sûng, thi nei lai ang dênin, porinche a ti, a thisen suak sikin sûn sômruk kiruk dang a hek mâka chu irthiang no ni.

Pasal mani nupang mani irthâr infâi zoro a chuk zoia irtongna puan in lûtnaa kum khat vêla belrate hâlirvôm thilinhlana hrang hong chôi a ta, sual irbôlna hrangin phervali mani, vasu mani ochai kuang a hong ichôi sa hrang a ni.
Ochai khan

“Nupang khan belrate a nei no’n chu vasu bop khat mani phervali bop khat mani a hong inhlan hrang a ni; inkhat chu hâlirvôm thilinhlan ni a ta, inkhat chu sual irbôlna thilinhlan ni a ti. Ochai khan a porinche thârna kha inhlan pe a ta, hong irthiang ta a ti,” a tia.
“Vun pân mani, sarthiat mani, invûng mani a oma, dam zôi theiloi hrang angin an langin chu ochai inentir hrang a ni.
Ochaiin pân kha ngûk takin a hong ena, a pân laia mul kha a hong ngoia, a pân dân kha a vêl vun nêkin an thûk uala an langin chu pânsia a ni, ochaiin mi porinche’n inpuang a ti.
A pân kha a ngoia, a sân an langa, a mul khom a ngoi no’n chu ochaiin sûn sari sûng irkêmtir a ti.
Sûn sari hnunga ochaiin en nôk a ta, a pân kha a pangai dên a nia, a zap no’n chu sûn sari dang irkêmtir nôk a ti.
Sûn sari hek zoi tika en nôk a ta, a pân kha a châr thiaia, an darh no’n chu porinche mah ti ochaiin inpuang a ti, pân papai a nia, a silkaihai kha irsûk a ta, irthiang a ti.
Ochaiin a ena, a’rthiang tia an puang hnungin pân kha indarh sianlân, a inentir nôk hrang a ni.
Ochaiin en nôk a ta, a hong indarh irzatin chu, mi porinchea inpuang a ti, pân saloi zât a ni.
Tukhomin pân saloi zât hi an irveiin chu ochai kuang hruai ngêt hrang a ni;
ama khan ngûk takin lei en a ta, pân kha a ngoi hlunga, a mul a ngoia, a hnâi a omin chu,
pân dam intak zât a ni; ochai khan mi porinche a nih ti inpuang a ta, en nôk hranga irkêmtir nang no nia, a porinche ti a fel sai a ni.
Kha natna kha an dara, ochai hmu phâk ten, a ke ata a lusîp dênin a’rsua tâkin chu,
ochaiin ngûk takin en a ta, a taksa pumpui an darhsuak tâkin chu, kha mi kha a’rthiang tâk ti inpuang a ti, a vun kha a ngoi suak zitin chu a irthiang tâk a ni.
Aniachu a taksa châr a hong irlangin chu a porinche a ni.
Ochai khan en nôk a ta, an lông lai a hmu’n chu porinche a nih ti inpuang a ti. Takpuma inlông om hi pân saloi a nia, a porinche a ni.
Inlông kha a boia, a hong ngoiin chu ochai a inentir hrang a ni.
Ama’n lei en a ta, inlông kha a lei ngoiin chu kha mi kha chu a’rthiang tâk a nih ti inpuang a ti.
Sarthiat dam tâk,
a hong irhlipin mani a sena a hong dukin mani, ochai inentir hrang a ni.
Ochai khan a porinche ti inpuang a ti; sarthiat ata pân saloi a irsiam a ni.
A mul chu a hong ngoi noa, a vêl vun ata inthûk ual loia ochaiin an hriatin chu kha mi kha sûn sari sûng a ikhum irkêmtir hrang a ni.
Kha thil kha a hong zapin chu ochai khan a porinche a nih ti inpuang a ti; hri saloi a ni.
A danglam noa a zap no’n chu, sarthiat ata hong irsiang nôk a ni, ochai khan a’rthiang ti inpuang a ti.
Mei ikâng inlông tuang chu a kâng laia sen mani, a senindông mani a niin chu
ochaiin lei en pe a ta, a mul kha a hong ngoia, a vun pên tiang ata an thûk okin an langin chu, a kângna sâbe lai kha pân saloia a irsiam tâk a ni. Ochaiin kha mi kha a porinche ti inpuang a ti.
A mul a hong ngoia, inthûkin inlang no sian khom, a dukin chu ochaiin sûn sari sûng a bingin a isiapai hrang a ni.
A sûn sari niin ochai khan en nôk a ta, a pân kha a hong zapin chu pân saloi a ni; ochai khan kha mi kha a porinche a nih ti inpuang a ti.
A ngaidân a nia, a hong zap noa, a duk no’n chu, pân saloi ni maka; kâng ser papai a nia, ochaiin kha mi kha a’rthiang ti inpuang a ti.
Pasal khom nupang khom, an lua mani an irkama mani, pân a omin chu
ochaiin en a ta, a kôlvêl vun kha an thûkin an langa, a mulhai kha a eng hruakin chu inthak saloi a ni; kha mi kha a porinche ti inpuang a ti.
Pân kha inthûk ual loiin inlang khomsian, a mulhai kha a hong vom insa ual no’n chu sûn sari sûng a ikhum irkêmtir hrang a ni.
a sûn sari nia ochai khan en nôk a ta, a zap noa, an thûk ualin an lang no’n chu,
a pân kôlvêla mul chu ziat inkol hrang a ni, ochai khan sûn sari sûng a ikhum irkêmtir nôk hrang a ni.
Sûn sari niin ochai khan a pân kha en nôk a ta, a zap noa, inthûk ualin an lang no’n chu, a’rthiang ti inpuang a ti; kha mi khan puandiar irsu a ta, irthiang ta a ti.
A’rthiang ti inpuang zoia, pân kha a zapin chu
ochaiin en nôk a ta, a pân kha a izap ngei a ni’n chu kha mi kha a iporinche a ni; a mul kha a eng le eng loi en nang ual no ni.
Pân kha a zap noa, a sam kha samvom sa nia ochaiin an hriatin chu pân kha a dam ta tihna a ni, ochaiin a’rthiang tah ti inpuang a ti.
Pasal khom, nupang khom, an vun taksa puar a ngoi a hong omin chu,
ochaiin en pe a ta, a ngoina kha an vârin chu a hnâi hong lâkpai a nia, ama kha chu a’rthiang a ni.
A tukburung tiang le a michal tianga sam chil sianlân, lukol papai a nia, a irthiang a ni.
A michal le a tukburung sam chil sianlân, chalkol papai a ni, a’rthiang a ni.
A kol laia eng mani sendâng viat a omin chu pân saloi a ni.
Ochaiin hong en a ta, a sen indâng viat a omin chu,
kha mi kha a porinche ti inpuang a ta, a lua pân saloi a om sikin.
Pân saloi irvei chu songkol chet innghâk a ta, a sam inthâ a ta, a hmâi chimrip, a’rkam tiang chu tuam a ta, “Porinche, porinche,” tiin a ninginmurin khêk hrang a ni.
Kha pân saloi inthak kha a nei sûng chu a porinchea, mi dang kôla om loiin dâi pên tiang a iom hrang a ni.
Samul puana mani, puan irnêma mani,
pat phiara mani, samul pat phiara mani, savuna mani, savuna siam thil danga mani, phâr hri a kâia,
a êm angin mani, a sen angin mani ni’n an langin chu, phâr hri an darh zât a nia, ochai inentir hrang a ni.
Ochaiin en a ta, sûn sari sûng a danga inomtir a ta,
sûn sari sûng en nôk a ta; hri kha a hong izap a ni’n chu, thil porinche a ni.
Ochai khan a ihâlpai hrang a ni; hri, meia hâlpai zât a ni.
A hong ena, a hong zap no’n chu
irsûk infâitir a ta, sûn sari dang se nôk a ta,
en nôk a ta, hri chu zap no khomsian a pân hmun rông kha a danglam no’n chu a la porinche a ni, a pân hmun kha pên tiang vai mani, a sûng tiang vaia om mani, a ni khomin.
Hong en nôk a ta, a pân hmun kha a hong irnêpin chu a omna laitak kha puan ata mani, savun ata mani ât thapai hrang a ni.
A pân hmun kha a hong inlang nôka, a zap maia an langin chu puan neitu khan a ihâl chian hrang a ni.
A’rsûk infâi theiin chu irsu nôk a ta, hong irthiang ta a ti.
Puan irnêm mani, samul puan phiara mani, savun siam thil rêng rênga mani, a pân hmun, a’rthiang le irthiang loi sen hrang lam chu, khaang khan a ni.
“Pân saloi irvei dam nôk, thâr infâi hrang dân chu hi ang hin a ni. A’rthiang tah ti inpuang a ni’n chu ochai kuang fe a ta,
ochaiin dâi pên tiang hruai a ta, ngûk taka a en zoia a dam ngêt a nih ti an hriatin chu
sa irthiang inhni, sidar thing le patzâi senduk le husop hriak le hong chôi hrangin hril a ti.
