Pil bêlin ivatui luang lai thâl sianlân, ama chunga khan vâ inkhat a ithat hrang a ni,
a thisen zungna tuia khan vâ inkhat kha sidar thing, patzâi senduk, husop hriak hai leh khan inchie a ti.
Irthiangtir hrang kha thisen khan voisari inthek a ta, a’rthiang tah ti inpuang a ta, vâ chu ramhnuaia insua a ti.
Kha mi khan a sil le kaihai kha irsu a ta, a sam ep a ta, a’rsil tika hong irthiang a ta, riakna hmuna lût thei ta a ta, aniachu, sûn sari sûng ama puan in pên tiang a iriak hrang a ni.
Sûn sari zoia a lu, a hnerkamul, a mitkhoi mul le a mul danghai khom voi a ta, a puandiar irsu a ta, tui a’rsil zoi tika hong irthiang ta a ti.
Sûn riat ni’n chu belrate, a chal inhni le a nupang inkhat, kum khat vêla irchang, hmêlveiloi le baidi her thum, sahriak koploi oliv hriak litar hmun thuma hmunkhat hong chôi a ta,
ochai khan irtongna puan in mikota, kha mi kha a thilinhlanhai leh khan a ihruai inlût hrang a ni.
Belrate inkhat, a chal chu, oliv hriak litar hmun thuma hmunkhat leh khan tho’nsualna man thilinhlana inhlan pe a ta,
Belrate chu sual irbôlna le hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrang thatna hmun irthianga that a ta, hiang tho’nsualna man thilinhlan hi sual irbôlna thilinhlan angin ochai hrangin a iser hrang a ni.
Ochai khan belrate thisen kha an hlantu mikuar chang tiang hmora, a kut le kepui hmorhaia a ipol pe hrang a ni.
Ochai khan oliv hriak senkhat chu a kut zapha vei tiang bun a ta,
a kut chang tianga kutpâr phûm a ta,
A kuta hriak le belrate thisen senkhat kha irzêl a ta, a mikuar chang tiang hmora, a kut le kepui hnâra pol pe a ti.
A kuta hriak la om chu irthiangtir hrang, a lua khan pol a ta, khaang khan irthârna kha tho pe a ti.
Sual irbôlna thilinhlan kha inhlan pe a ta, kha mi kha thâr irthiang a ti. Kha zoia chu hâlirvôm thilinhlan kha that a ta,
bu le bâl thilinhlan le maichâma inhlan a ta, khaang khan thâr irthiang a ta, kha mi kha irthiang ta a ti.

Khaang dôr nei zoi zâkloi inriang chu irthârna belrate inkhat, tho’nsualna man thilinhlan hrangin hong chôi a ta, sual irbôlna hrangin a ithâr hrang a ni, kha leh khan baidi hriak le irpol herkecher le oliv hriak litar hmun thuma hmunkhat a inhlan sa hrang a ni.
A inei la lamin, vasu bop khat mani, phervali bop khat mani, inkhat chu sual irbôlna thilinhlan hrangin, inkhat chu hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrangin a hong ichôi hrang a ni.
A’rthâr sûn riat niin chu
Ochaiin chu belra le oliv hriak kha la a ta,
Belrate kha that a ta, a thisen senkhat kha a mikuar chang tiang hmora, a kut le a kepui chang tiang hmora pol pe a ti.
Ochai khan oliv hriak senkhat kha a kut zapha vei tiang bun a ta,
a kut chang tiang kutchala inchie a ta,
Sahriak senkhat a mikuar chang tiang hmora, a kut le ke chang tiang kepui hnârhaia a ipol hrang a ni.
A kuta hriak la om khan khapa lua khan a ipol hrang a ni. Khaang khan irthârna kha a itho pe hrang a ni.
Kha zoia chu vasu mani, phervali mani inkhat chu,
sual irbôlna hrangin, bu le bâl thilinhlan leh inhlan a ta, khaang khan thâr irthiang a ti.
Hiang hin pân saloi irvei, irthârna hrang bituk zât nei zoiloi hranga irthâr hrang dân chu a ni.
“Nin inei hranga nangni ki ipêk Kanaan ram nin tung tika chu, ram nin va idong nin in sûnga phâr hri kin koptirin chu,
in neitu khan ochai koi a ta, ‘Ki in sûnga phâr hri ni le irhoi a kopa’ ti a ta.

Ochai khan in sûnga a lût mân a sûnga thil om murdi inkêlsuatir a ta, a porinche ti an puangkhum loina hrangin, in sûnga thil om murdi chu inkêlsuatir zit a ta, eninfel hrangin in sûnga khan lût a ti.
A phâr hri kha ngûk takin en a ta, a êm mani, a sen u uai mani a oma, banga khan a lei kâia, bang kha a hmonin an lang tikin chu,
in kha suaksan a ta, sûn sari sûng inkaltir a ti.
Sûn sari ni’n chu in kha va en nôk a ta, banga khan a lei zapin chu,
lung hri kopna lung kha, kho pên tiang porinche painaa inpaitir a ti.
Kha zoi tena chu in sûng tianga bang murdi kha ziat inkhoktir a ta, an ikhok kha dâi pên tiang an ipai hrang a ni.
Lung an ipai kha a thar thûl hrang a ni, a lung bang khom a thar vanga inmâi innâm hrang a ni.
Hi hi pai a nia, inmâi innâmna ziatkhok zit hnunga a thar thûl a ni zoia khom hri a kop nôkin chu,
Ochai khan va en nôk a ta, a hong zapin chu boi theiloi a ni, in kha a porinche a ni.
Insiat chit hrang a ni, lung, thing, inmâi innâmhai kha pai zit hrang a ni.
In kha khâr a ni sûng khan a lût an omin chu khohloi dênin porinche an ti.
Kha in sûnga zâl mani, thil fâk mani chu, a sil le kai kha a irsûk ngêt hrang a ni.
In sûnga lung, inmâi thar hnung khan ochaiin va en nôk a ta, hri kop a om ta no’n chu a’rthiang ti inpuang a ti, hri kha a boi fel tâk sikin.
Kha in thâr irthiang hrangin chu, vâ inhni chel a ta, sidar thing, pat senduk hai le husop hriak hong chôi sa a ti.
Vâ inkhat chu pilbêl ivatui siana chunga that a ta,
vâ inkhat kha sidar thing, patzâi sendukhai, husop hriak leh khan pil bêla tui thar, vâ inkhat thisen zungnaa khan inchie a ta, in sûng kha voisari inthek a ti.
Vâ thisen le tui luang lai, sidar thing, pat sendukhai le husop hriakhai hmang khan in kha thâr irthiang a ti.
Vâ la hring kha kho sûng ata ramhnuaia insua a ta, khaang khan irthâr infâina kha tho a ta, hong irthiang ta a ti.
Hiang hin takpuma pân saloi chungchânga tho hrang lam chu a ni.
Puandiar mani, in sûnga hrihai,
takpuma invûng mani, irdul mani, a khir mani,
a’rthiang le irthiangloi theithâkna hrangin. Hihai hi inphâr chungchânga dân chu a ni.
“Israel mihai chu hril roi; pasal tukhom, an ser ata thil suak a omin chu a porinche a ni.
A suak irzôm mai mani, a mong nôk lat khom ni sian, a porinche tâka, hianga tho hrang a ni.
Khaang mi zâlhmun le a toina kâi kaiin chu a porinche a ni.
A zâlhmun tôntu khom, a toinaa toi khom khan an sil le kai irsu an ti, tui an irsil hrang a ni; khohloi dênin porinche an ti.
An takpum tôntu khomin a puandiar irsu a ti, tui a irsil hrang a ni, khohloi dênin porinche a ti.
Kha mi khan mi porinche ni loi inchil sianlân, a inchiltu kha porinche sa a ta, a sil le kai irsu a ta, tui a irsil hrang a ni; khohloi dênin porinche a ti.
Kha mi chuangna sakor chunga chuang chu porinche a ta,
a itoi phâna tôntu khom khohloi dênin porinche a ta; kha thil chôi sontu khom khan a silkai irsu a ta, tui a irsil hrang a ni, khohloi dênin porinche a ti.
Thil suak neitu khan kut irsu loiin mi dang a tônin chu, a itôntu khan a sil le kai irsu a ta, tui a irsil hrang a ni, khohloi dênin porinche a ti.
Pilbêla itôn chu inkhoipai hrang a ni, thing khêng rêk chu sataka irsu hrang a ni.
A thil suak irveitu kha a hong dama irthokin a’rthiang nôkna hrangin sûn sari nghâk a ta, a sil le kai irsu a ta, vadung luang laia a irsil hrang a ni; khanchu, hong irthiang thei a ti.
A sûn riat ni’n chu vasu inhni mani, phervali te mani
Inkhat chu sual irbôlna thilinhlana, inkhat chu hâlirvôm thilinhlana, inhlan pe a ta, khaang khan a porinchena kha lei irthiangtir a ti.
Pasal chu a chi a tâk ringotin chu a irsil hrang a ni, khohloi dênin porinche a ti.
A chi tâkna puan mani, savun mani, thil siam tâk ka chu irsu ngêt hrang a ni, khohloi dênin porinche an ti.
Khan, nupang a zâlpui khomin an inhni’n an irsil hrang a ni, khohloi dênin porinche an ti.
Nupang, thinei chu, sûn sari sûng porinche a ti. Ama tôn ka kaiin khohloi dênin porinche an ti.
A thi nei laia a toinahai, a zâlnahai kha a porinche zit a ni.
A zâlna mani, a toina mani tôntu chu a silkai irsu a ta, a irsil hrang a ni, khohloi dênin porinche a ti.
A zâlna mani, a toina mani rêng rêng tôntu chu khohloi dênin a porinche a ni.
Nupang thinei laia zâlpuitu chu a porinchena kha a kâi saa, sûn sari sûng porinche a ti, a zâlhmun khom porinche a ti.
Nupang chu a thinei zoro ni loia, a thi suak mani, a thinei ngai sûng nêka sôt mani, thi a neiin chu, a thi a suak sûng chu a porinche a ni.
A thi suak sûnga a zâlna le toina kha a porinche a ni, a thinei lai zoro anga khan.
Kha tôntu khan a sil le kai irsu a ta, a irsil hrang a ni, khohloi dênin porinche a ti.
A thi suak kha a mong tika chu sûn sari sûng nghâk a ta, hong irthiang ta a ti.
A sûn riat nia vasu inhni mani, phervali inhni mani chongkhômna puan in mikota ochai kuang hong chôi a ta,
ochai khan inkhat kha sual irbôlna thilinhlana, inkhat kha hâlirvôm thilinhlana inhlan pe a ta,
Israel mipuihai porinche loiin an irkêm hrang a ni, irtongna puan in bul zela om an nia, hong porinche lik nihai, ti an ti.
Hi hi pasal, a sera thil suak nei mani, a chi thâkin mani,
nupang khom a tha tin thinei le a porinche laia pôltu chungchâng tho lam hrang chu a ni.
Arona nâihai inhni’n
“Ni upa Arona kha hril roh: Thuthung bôm sîng chunga sûma ki zuang ngai sikin hmun irthiang tak tentan zâr sûnga a hong ilût papai hrang ni ma, kha kha a uksak no’n chu thi a ti.
Hmun irthiang taka chu sehrâtchal tuai, sual irbôlna thilinhlan le belra hâlirvôm hong inhlan hrangin chu hong lût thei a ti.
Tui irsil bak a ta, sil le kai irthiang a irbel hrang a ni; puan irnêm songkol hai, tumante kai a ta, puan irnêm kongkhitin khit a ta, puan irnêm diarin a ikai sa hrang a ni.
Israel pungkhôm khan sual irbôlna thilinhlan hrang kêlchal inhni le hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrang belrachal inkhat an ipêk hrang a ni.
Arona’n sehrâtchal kha ama le a in sûng mihai hrangin sual irbôlna’n sual irbôlna thilinhlana inhlan a ti.
Irtongna puan in lûtnaa kêl inhni kha kai a ta,
a kho tak mo
inthang ual chu sual irbôlna thilinhlana inhlan a ti.
Azazela hrangin inthang kêl kha
Arona’n sehrâtchal kha inhlan a ta, ama le a in sûng mihai sual irbôlna hrangin sual irbôlna thilinhlana inhlan hrang a ni.
Mei lâkna’n maichâma meiri-al kha lâk a ta, mirimhoi hâl zât hap hni le hmun irthiang taka a hong ichôi hrang a ni.
makunga mirimhoi kha meia phul a ta, mirimhoi khu khan thuthung bôm sîng kha a inhli hrang a ni: khanchu, hmu thei no nia, a ithiloi hrang a ni.
Sehrâtchal thisen kha a kut chalin thuthung bôm makunga khom voisari a inthek hrang a ni.

Kha zoi tika chu kêl kha mipui sual irbôlna thilinhlana that a ta, a thisen kha hmun irthiang taka khan hong chôi a ta, sehrâtchal thisen a iti ang thuthung bôm maton tianga le a sîngnaa a inthek hrang a ni.

Khaang khan hmun irthiang tak kha Israel mipuihai tho’nchâina le an sualna ata a thâr irthiang hrang a ni. Irtongna puan in riakhmun kôl zela om a nia, riakhmun porinche sikin khaanga irthiangtir kha a inang a ni.
Hmun irthiang tak thâr irthiang hranga Arona a lût le a hong suak nôk kâra irtongna puan in sûnga tukhom an iom hrang ni mah.

Ama le a in sûng mihai sual le Israel pungkhôm sual irbôlna a tho zoiin chu pên tiang hong suak a ta, maichâma hâlirvôm thilinhlan inhlan a ta, thâr irthiang a ti. Sehrâtchal thisen le kêl thisen senkhat kha maichâm kila irkihaia khan a pol hrang a ni.
A kutchalin thisen chimrip kha maichâma voisari inthek a ta, Israel mihai sualna sikin a thâr irthiang hrang a ni.
Hmun irthiang takhai, irtongna puan in sûng murdihai, maichâmhai a thâr irthiang zoiin chu Azazela hranga kêl kha

Kêl lua khan a kut kianghni’n irnghat a ta, Israel mihai thil saloi le sual an ithohai le an pualoina murdi kha phuang a ta, kêl lua khan irnghat a ti; a itho hranga inkung khan ramchâra kêl kha fepui a ta,
Kêl khan an porinchena murdi kha pêl a ta, ramchâra khan insua a ti.
Kha zoi tena Arona kha irtongna sûnga lût a ti, hmun irthiang taka a lu doa ochai songkol innghâkhai kha hlîk a ta, masan a ti.
Hmun irthianga khan tui irsil a ta, ama puandiar irbel nôk a ta, hâlirvôm thilinhlan, ama dongtum le mipui dongtum inhlan a ta, ama sual le mipui sual kha a irbôl hrang a ni.
Sual irbôlna thilinhlan, sa marhai kha maichâma hâl a ti.
Ramchâra Azazela hranga kêl va insuatu khan in tiang a hong kîr tika a puandiar irsu a ta, tui a irsil sa hrang a ni.
Sehrâtchal le kêl, sual irbôlna thilinhlan hranga that, hmun irthiang taka sual lapaina hrang an thisen lâklût sai kha a vunhai, a sûngkuahai le dâi pên tiang hâl zit hrang a ni.
Va hâlirvômtu’n chu a sil le kai irsu a ta, irtongna puan in tiang a hong kîr mân tui a irsil hrang a ni.
Hi dân hi kumkhuaa zôm hrang a ni. Tha sarina tarik sûn sôm niin chu Israel mi murdi le an laia nam dang om sahai khan bu nghei an ta, sin an itho hrang ni mah.
Hi nikhua hin a ni, an hong irthiang theina hrangin an sual murdi irbôlna thilinhlan an inhlan a ni.
Hi nikhua hi nikho ser, ser ir-up khak hrang a ni, bu ngheia sin khom tholoi hrang a ni. Hi dân hi kumkhua’n zôm hrang a ni.
“Ochai inlaltak hranga sahriak pol le a pa irthûl hranga namindetin hi thil hi a itho hrang a ni, ochai songkol irthiang a innghâk hrang a ni.
Hmun irthiangtak, irtongna puan in sûnghai, maichâmhai, ochaihai le pungkhômhai thâr irthiangna sin kha a itho hrang a ni.
Hi dânhai hi kumkhuaa zôm hrang a ni. Israel mihai kha kum khata voikhat, an sual an irthâr irthiangna sin hi tho pe ngêt hrang a ni,” a tia. Mosia’n
Arona le a nâihai le Israel mihai kha hril ro, hi hi
“Israel mi’n riak hmuna khom dâi pên tiang khom sehrâtchal mani, belra mani, kêl mani a thata,
kuang inhlan hrang tia irtongna puan in mikota a that no’n chu thisen a insua a ni, thisen insua anga bê hrang a ni, a’rchihaiin an iensan hrang a ni.
Ram irhonga thilinhlan that an ivarh ngai hi
Ochai khan a thisen kha irtongna puan in lûtna kôla maichâma inthek a ta, a thâihai kha a ihâlirvôm hrang a ni, kha kha
Kêl lu nei ramilhli an ibiak hrang ni ta ma; khaang biak chu
“Israel mi mani, nam dang an laia om mani, tukhomin
irtongna puan in mikot kôla vai an inhlan hrang a ni; hmun danga inhlan chu Pathian mihaiin an iensan hrang a ni.
“Israel sûngkua laia mi mani, an laia nam dang om mani, a thisen le ileh sa fâk tâk ka chunga,
Thilhring rêng rêng, an hringna kha an thisena a oma, khasika khan kêng
Khasikin kêng,
“Israel mi’n mani, an laia nam dangin mani, sa irthiang khom, va irthiang khom ramchainaa man sianlân, a thisen kha irnênga inzung inkangtir a ta, vâiphinin a isirpol nôk hrang a ni.
Thilhring tinrêng hringna chu a thisena khan a iom a ni; khasikin

Israel mi mani, an laia om nam dang mi mani, tukhomin sa thi sai hme mani, sa isethat sai hme mani a fâkin chu an sil le kai irsu an ta, tui an irsil ngêt hrang a ni, khohloi dênin porinche an ta, kha tena kêng an hong irthiang hrang a ni.
Irsûk nuam loi mani, tui irsil nuam loi mani chu tuang an ti,” a tia.
“Israel mihai kha nin Pathian
Nin lêngna Aigupta mihai itho lam tho no unglân, nangni ki ihruai lûtna hrang Kanaan ram mihai om dân khom la ual no roi.
Ki dânhai hi zôm nin ta, ki thupêk angin nin iom lem hrang a ni.
Ki dânhai hi zôm unglân, tho hrang ki itihai hi tho roi; kha kha mihriam ta hrangin hringna hrang a ni;”
Tukhomin mâni urêng irnaipui a ipôl hrang ni ma,
ni pa mualinphoitir hrangin ni nu ni ipôl hrang ni ma, ni nu a nia, ama khom ni imualinphoitir hrang ni ma.
Ni pa dôngma dang tukhom pôlin ni pa ni imualinphoitir hrang ni ma.
In inkhata nin omsuam mo tâk, om no mo tâk, ni farnu, nu dang khom pa dang nâi khom ni ipôl hrang ni mah.
Ni nâipa nâinuhai, ni nâinu inei ni tunuhai pôl no ro, mâni irmualphoitir ni ni.
Ni pa dôngma nâinu infâ khom ni ipôl hrang ni ma, ni farnu dên kêng.
Ni nî ni ipôl hrang ni mah.
Ni nu zuarpui khom ni ipôl hrang ni ma, urêng irnai nin ni.
Ni pa sangpahai dôngma khom pôl no ro, ama khom ni nu a ni sa.
Ni nâipa dôngma, ni moi khom pôl no ro,
Ni sangpa dôngma khom pôl no roh.
Ni nupang pôl tâk nâinu mani, tunu mani pôl no ro, thilsual a ni; ni urêng irnaipui an ni.
Ni dôngma a hring laiin a zuarpuinu dôngma’n nei no roh.
Nupang thinei laiin pôl no ro, a porinche lai a ni.
Mi dôngma pôl no ro, mâni irporinchetir a ni.
Moleka biakna hrang hâlirvôm hrangin ni nâi ni ipêk viat viat hrang ni ma, ni Pathian irhming ni porinchetir ni ti,
Nupang angin pasal kha ni ipôl hrang ni ma, a porinche a ni.
Pasal khomin nupang khomin, sâ a ipôl hrang ni ma; khaang tho ngai mi chu an suakinsual an nia, irporinchetir no roi.
Nin matona ki irzûlpai suak hrang namhai kha hi thil hin an irporinchetira, hi thil hin irporinchetir no roi.
An thil inzong sikin ram kha an porinchetira, an sual sika khan ram kha hrem ki ta, an nihai kha ki inhnotsuak hrang a ni.
Nangni chu ki dânhai le ki thupêkhai hi zôm unglân, nin laia tukhomin, nin laia om nam danghai ten khomin, hi thil porinche hi tho no roi.
Nin om mâna hi rama omhai hin thil porinche hi an tho ngaia, ram chu an porinchetir tâk a ni.
Rama khan nin mâna omhai an hnôl tâk angin nin porinche’n chu irhnôl sa ngêt nin ti.
Nin laia hiang thil tho chu ensan ngêt hrang a ni.
“Hi thil intirom nin mâna mihai iuar ngai hi tholoi hrangin nangni ki iti a ni, irporinchetir viat no roi,
“Israel mipui pungkhômhai kha hril roh: nin irthiang hrang a ni, kei
Mâni nu le pa mahrip nin itho seng hrang a ni, ki thupêk angin ki sabat nikhua nin iser hrang a ni,
Millim tiang irhei no roi, biak hrangin millim pathianhai irsiam ual no roi: kei hi
Irpôlkhômhai thilinhlan
A sâ kha nin thatin mani, a tûka mo fa zoi hrang a ni,
a sûn thum ni’n nin fâkin chu a porinchea, thilinhlan kha pom no ning.
Khaang fâk chu thil irthiang a porinchetira, a mô a ipêl hrang a ni, a mihai khan an iensan hrang a ni.
Bu nin âtin faôi tena ât no roi, nin ilâk irhmâi ât hrangin fe nôk no roi.
Grep voikhat lâk zoi mani, a ra tâk mani, irvai ta no ro, mi’nrianghai le nam danghai hrangin masan ro, kei hi
Inru no ro, mi huang no ro, milak hril no roh.
Ki’rhming sâmin milak tho no ro, ni Pathian irhming insiat no ro,
Ni bômhai huang no’n lân, an thil nei irchûpuihai no ro, ni kuanga irhlo chu zân khat khom a hlo khap pe no roh.
Kuarsêt khuasâl no ro; mitcho matona tûkna thil se no roh. Ni Pathian chi ro, kei hi
Dik takin ni tualbômhai thu rêl pe ngaiin lân, mi’nriang ditsak bîk no’n lân, mi’rchong chi ual hliak no roh.
Mi chungchâng, milak chong inzaptu ni no ro: thi zôi thei ngîrhmuna ngîr kha san hrangin ni thu inhriat ang ang hril irdîn no ro;
Tukhom khôkmâk lungrîl irput no ro, irhong pharin thu insîr suakin nin kâr thu infeltir ro, khanchu thilsual ni itho loi hrang a ni.
Tu chunga khom phuba la no ro, khôkmâk no ro; lung ni irthung angin ni bômhai kha lungthung roh. Kei hi
Ki thupêkhai hi zôm roh. Ni sâ vâi kha chi dang dang irzêltir no roh. Loi inkhata chîmu dang dang song no roh. Thil chi hni puankhông sil no roh.
Suak dôngmate kha, mi’n dôngma hrangin hual sianlân, a man la pe loi mani, la’nsualoi mani a ni’n chu mi dangin lei châipui khomsian, suak mamai a nia, that hrang chu ni ma, hrem hrang chu a ni.
Pasal khan tho’nchâi man thilinhlan, irtongna puan ina a hong inhlan hrang a ni.
Kha pa sual irbôlna hrang irthârna kha ochaiin lei inhlan pe a ta, Pathianin ngaidam a ti.
Kanaan ram nin hong tung tika, thei nin iling rêng rêng a ra phut ata kum thum sûng chu porinchea bê hrang a ni, fa no roi.
A kum minlinaa thei ra murdi chu
A kum ringanaa thei ra chu fa thei ta nin ti; khaang khan nin tho’n chu nin thei kha a sân ra nuam a ti;
Sa rêng rêng a thisen le ileh fa no roi, mitvai dôihai, tasânhai, uar no roi.
Nin michal ata a vêlin nin sam voi inkol mani, hnerkamul voihai mani nin itho hrang ni ma.
Mithi sûn sikin nin taksa rêng rêng khom nin irziak inchialhai, ir-âtkhok mani uar no roi. Kei hi
Ni nâinu chu tempil notizuara pêkin thanginse no ro; nam dang pathian tiang irheina lik ni ti, ram chu pualoina’n sipna ni.
Sabat nî serin lân, chubai ni ni mûkna hmun chu inza ro,
Ramilhli ikop mani, mithi kaithoi thei mani irdon hrangin fe no ro; khaang kha ni tho’n chu porinche ni ti.
Tar luchuak tâkhai makunga ngîrna châng inhren lân, ulianhai chu inza roh. Nin Pathian chi roi, kei hi
Nin rama nam dang om saihai chu dengintheitir no roi.
Nin Israel chanpuihai angin bê unglân, mâni lung nin irthung angin lungthunghai roi. Nangni khom Aigupta rama mikhual nin ni ngai kha inhre mai roi. Kei hi
Irtêna dik loihai, varna lung dik loihai, phalla dik loihai hmangin mi huang no roi.
Irtêna diktak, varna lung diktak, phalla diktak hmang ngai roi. Aigupta ram ata nangni hruaisuaktu
Ki dân murdi le ki thupêkhai hi zôm roi,
“Israel mihai hril ro; Israel mi’n mani, nin laia om, ram dang mi’n mani, Moleka kuang mani, nâi an hlanin chu that hrang a ni, pungkhômhaiin lungin an idêngthat hrang a ni.
Mâni nâi Moleka kuang inhlana ki hmun irthiang porinchetira, ki’rhming irthiang insiattu chu irheisan ki ta, ensan ki ti.
Israel mipuihaiin kha thil kha a’rnghil om tho’n, an that nuam no’n chu,
keima ngeiin kha mi chunga le a in sûng mihai chunga insum ki ta, Moleka biaka keimaa iamom loihai murdi chu ki mihai laia inkhop ta no ning.
Ramilhli ikop le dôi thei pantuhai chu irheisan ki ta, ki mihai laia inkhop ta no ning.
nin Pathian ki ni sikin irvong irthiang roi.
Ki dânhai hi zôm unglân, tho ngai roi.
Mâni nu le pa khosâltu chu that hrang a ni; a thisen mô chu ama’n pêl a ti.
A Israel chanpui dôngma uirepuitu chu a nupang leh khan that hrang an ni.
Mi’n a pa dôngma laia inkhat khom a lei pôlin chu a pa a imualinphoitir a ni, a nupang leh khan that hrang an ni, sûngsuak irnai irdit an nia, an thisen mô chu anni’n pêl an ti.
Mi’n a moinu a zâlpuiin chu that ngêt hrang an ni; porinchena sual tho an nia, an thisen mô chu anni’n pêl an ti.
Pasalin pasal dang a pôlin chu thil inzakom tak an itho a ni, an inhni’n that hrang an ni, an thisen mô chu anni’n pêl an ti.
Mi’n nulefa dôngma’n a neiin chu thil inzakom tak an itho a nia, an inthumin hâl that hrang an ni, hiang thil hi nin laia, a tho an iom hrang ni mah.
Mi’n sâ a pôlin chu a sâ leh khan that hrang an ni.
Nupang khom sâ pôl tuma zâlpui chu a sâ leh khan that hrang an ni, an thisen mô chu anni’n pêl an ti.

Mi’n a farnu, nu dang inei mani, pa dang inei mani dôngma’n a neiin chu vântâng laia mualinphoitir hrang a ni; khua ata inhnotsuak hrang a ni. Mâni farnu an dit sikin, a mô chu ama’n a ipêl hrang a ni.
Mi’n nupang thinei laia a pôlin chu an inhni’n ensan hrang an ni, porinche lai chungchânga dân an tho’nchâi a ni.
Mi’n, mâni nî mani, a nu nâipangnu zuarpuinu mani a pôlin chu an inhni’n an sual mô chu pêl an ti.
Mi’n a pa urêng dôngma a pôlin chu a pa urêng chu a mualinphoitir a ni, a nupang leh khan an sual mô chu pêl an ti, nâi zel nei no nihai.
Mâni sangpa dôngma irchupuitu chu nâi zel nei no nihai, thil porinche tak a itho a ni, a sangpa a imualinphoitir a ni.
Ki dân le ki thupêk murdihai hi zôm unglân, tho ngai roi; khanchu, nin omna hrang ram nangni ki hruai intung tika chu kha ram ata kha hnôlin om no chin ni.
Kha hmuna lei om, nangni ki inhnotsuak pe hranghai om dân la no roi; hiang tho hi an uar ngai, ki intir lam tak a ni.
Hi ram, khuaihlutui le dût tui luangna ram hi, nin ilua hrangin nangni pêk hrang kin kung tâka, nangni pe ngêt ki ti;
Khasikin, sâ le vahai chu a’rthiang le irthiang loi theithâk intam unglân, sâ irthiang loi mani, vâ irthiang loi mani fa no roi; irthiangloi ki iti nin fâkin chu irthiang loi ni nin ti.
Ki ta bîk hrangin nin irthiang hrang a ni, ki ta nin nina hrangin nam dang lai ata nangni ki inthang suak a ni.
“Pasal khom, nupang khom, ramilhli ikop le dôi uar chu lunga dêng that hrang an ni, an thisen mô chu anni’n pêl an ti,” a tia.
Ama nu mani, pa mani, nâipa mani, nâinu mani, sangpa mani,
farnu mani pasal neiloi inkhata ompui ruak chu tôn thei a ti.
A dôngma sûngkuahai ruak khom tônin a iporinche hrang ni ma.
Ochai tukhomin lusûn entîrna hrangin a lu kiangkhat a ivoi inkol hrang ni ma, a hnerkamul a ivoi hrang ni ma, a ir-ât irphop hrang ni ma.
A irthiang hrang a ni, ki’rhming a insiat hrang ni ma; hâlirvôm hâltu a nia, ki kuang fâk hrang inhlantu ni sa a ta, a irvong irthiang hrang a ni.
Ochai chu a’rthianga, notizuar tâkhai, mi imâkhai, ruatharte irditpui tâkhai dôngma’n a inei hrang ni ma.
Nin Pathian kuang fâk hrang inhlantu, ki mihai lai ata ki indang a ni.
Ochai nâinu notizuar khan a pa a mualinphoitira, hâl that hrang a ni.
Ochai inlaltak chu sahriak pol a nia, ochai puandiar irbel hranga ser bîk a ni; khasikin, lusûn entîrna hrangin a sam khûi loiin a intha hrang ni maka, a puan a inpotthêr hrang ni ma.
Mithi ruak omnaa a ife hrang ni ma; a nu le a pa ruak ngei khom tônin a iporinche hrang ni mah.
Khaanga tho hrangin ki hmun irthiang a suaksanin a iporinche hrang ni ma, keima hranga ser indang tâk, sahriak pol tâk a ni, kei hi
Dôngmate irthiang vai dôngma’n a inei hrang a ni.
Pasal sûnhai, imâk tâkhai, ruatharte le irdit tâkhai, notizuarhai dôngma’n a inei hrang ni ma, ama chipui laia om dôngmate irthiang a inei hrang a ni.
khano’nchu, a nâihai porinche an ti, anni khom an irthiang hrang a ni.
“Arona hril ro; nin irchi laia nâi suakinsual tukhomin fâk hrang thilinhlan hi, itiklai khomin an hong inhlan hrang ni mah.
Suakinsualna nei chu thilinhlan a hong inhlan hrang ni ma; mitcho, ke’nbâi, hmêl insiat, ru’rbun danglam bîk irput hai,
kut bûi, ke bûi,
ke’rval, phûkirsam, mit hêk, uithak irvei, hlip neihai le tilru koihai khan thilinhlana’n inhlan hrang ni mah.
Ochai Arona irchi, takpuma suakinsualna nei chu hâlirvôm thilinhlan hâl hrangin mani, fâk hrang thilinhlan hâl hrangin mani a ihong hrang ni ma.
Khaang mi chu Pathian hranga thilinhlan irthiang le ochai dongtum thil irthiang kha fa thei a ti.
Suakinsualna a nei sikin hmun irthiang tak puanzâr kôla a ihong hrang ni ma, maichâm a hong inâi hrang ni ma. Hi thil irthiang hi a iporinchetir hrang ni ma, kei hi
Hi thu hi Mosia’n Arona le a nâihai kha a hrila, Israel mihai khom a hril a ni.
Arona le a nâihai kha hril ro; “Israel mihai ki makunga thil ser an hong inhlanhai kha kuluk takin lei dong sianlân, ki’rhming mualinphoitir no ri se, kei hi
Israel mihaiin keima hranga thil irthiang an hong inhlan kha nin irchi thiaihai an porinche laiin an tônin chu ochai ata inmatir hrang an ni; kei hi

Arona irchi, vuna pân saloi irvei mani, a ser ata thil suak nei mani chu a porinchena a boi mâka chu thilinhlan irthiang hi a itôn hrang ni ma. Ochaiin mithi ruak tôntu a tônin mani, ama chi a tâkin a porinche tâk a ni.
A boka irvâk sâ porinche mani, mi porinche mani a tôn khomin a porinche a ni; tui a’rsil mâka chu thilinhlan irthiang fa thei no ni.
Ochai porinche tâk ka chu khohloi dênin a porinchea, tui a’rsil mâka chu thilinhlan ser irthianghai kha fa thei no ni.
Misa a tâk tena irthiang a ta, thilinhlan irthiang kha fa thei ta a ta, a dongtum hranga ti a ni sikin.
Sa thi sai tâk mani, sâ isê mani chu a ifâk hrang ni ma, kei hi
“Thil tho hrang dân ki itihai hi an izôm zit hrang a ni, an zôm nuam no’n chu a mô pêl an ta, thi an ti; anni indangtu
Ochai in sûng mihai vaiin thilinhlan irthiang hi fa thei an ta; ochai iompui mani, mi sin hranga om mani, mi dang tukhomin an ifâk hrang ni mah.
Ochai suak, ama poisa le ngeia a irchôk mani, a in sûnga suak ngei mani chu fa thei an ti.
Ochai nâinu khom ni sian, ochai ni loi pasal a neiin chu thilinhlan irthiang hi fa thei no ni.
Pasal isûn mani, imâk tâk mani, nâi nei loia a pa ina lût nôk chu fa thei a ti; ochai irchi vaiin fâk irthiang a ni.
Ochai irchi ni loiin ochai dongtum thil irthiang kha lei fa pal sianlân, a ithuan zit hrang a ni, hmun ringaa hmunkhat a ipêk bel hrang a ni.
Ochaihai khan thilinhlan irthiang hi an porinchetir hrang ni ma.
Fâk loi hrang irchihai an infâktir hrang ni ma; an fâkin chu thiamno chang an ti, tuang an ti. Hi thilinhlan irthiangtu
“Arona hai, a nâihai le Israel mihai chu hril ro: Israel mi’n mani, an laia om nam dangin mani, chonginkungna thilinhlan mani, mâni nuam thua thilinhlan mani,
a lei pom theina hrang chu sehrâtchal mani, belra mani, kêl mâni, a chal hmêlveiloi a ni.
Hmêlveina nei chu inhlan khomsian
“Mi’n chonginkung suana hrangin thilinhlan, mâni nuam thilinhlan mani, irpôlkhômhai thilinhlan hrangin
Sa mitcho mani, ke’nbâi mani, sirirdul mani, pân hnâi lâk nei mani, a vun phâr mani,
Nuam thilinhlana khan sehrât mani, belra mani, irningloiin khom, inhlan thei a ni; chonginkung suana hranga thilinhlana rêk chu pom ni no ni.
Sa tillâk tho mani, inolkhiak mani, pop iliam mani, zêm irdulhai ang mani chu
“Nam dang sâ chu fâk hrang thilinhlan inhlan hrang ni ma; khaang inhlan chu hmêlveiloi nei anga tep sa hrang a ni, pom ni thei no ni.
Mosia kuang,
Belra mani, sehrât mani, kêl mani, a chal chu a pui kôla sûn sari om a ta, a sûn riat nî ata chu hâlirvôm hrangin hmang thei ni ta a ti.
Sehrâtpui le a tê, belrapui le a tê, kêlpui le a tê sûn khata thilinhlana inhlan hrang ni mah.
Lômthu hrilna thilinhlan nin hlanin dân ang takin itinrêng tho ro, pom thei ni a ti,
fa zit unglân, a tûka hrangin hôi no roi.
“Ki thupêkhai hi zôm unglân, zôm roi, kei hi
ki’rhming hi nin iporinchetir hrang ni ma, Israel mihaiin chu ki’rthiang ti hi an inhriat hrang a ni, nangni indangtu
Nin Pathian ni hrangin Aigupta ram ata nangni ki hruai suak a ni, kei hi
“Israel mihai chu hril ro:
Sûn ruk sûng sin tho nin ta, a sûn sari niin chu sabat a nia, nin irngam hrang a ni. Sin tho loiin Pathian chubai mûkin nin inkhôm hrang a ni. Sabat nî hi
hranga kût inkunghai chu hihai hi a ni, a zoro inkunga nin ihmang hen hrang a ni.
“Tha masa tak tarik sômhlei minli khohloi tiang, hi
kha tha dên tarik sômhlei ringa ni chu
A sûn khat nî chu irbukkhômna nei nin ta, sin ite nin itho hrang ni ma.
Sûn sari sûng chu a nitin
“Israel mihai chu hril ro: ram nangni ki ipêk hrang nin tung tika chu ochai kuang nin bu thar masa a mût kha nin hong ichôi hrang a ni.
Ama khan
Bumût thâr ni khan belrate, a chal hmêlveiloi, kum khat vêla, hâlirvôm thilinhlana nin hong inhlan hen hrang a ni.
Kha le ileh khan bu le bâl thilinhlana baidi a sa zât her hni, oliv hriak pol nin inhlan sa hrang a ni; kha kha
Nin bu thar, ochaihai kuang nin hong inhlan mâka chu nin inêk hrang ni mah. Nin irchihai khomin hi dân hi kumkhua’n an izôm hrang a ni.
Bumût,
sabat voisari zoi tûk, sûn sômringa ni’n chu bu le bâl thilinhlana nin chîmu thar kha nin inhlan hrang a ni.
Sûngkua tinin mâni hmun senga chol kop loi bai nin iur hrang a ni.
Kha leh khan belrate kum khat vêla sari, sehrâtchal inkhat, belrachal inhni, hmêlveiloi inzen vântângin
Sual irbôlna thilinhlana kêl inkhat inhlan nin ta, thilinhlana belrate kum khat vêla irchang inhni, nin inhlan sa hrang a ni.
Ochaiin bai le belrate inhni kha
Kha nî khan tukhomin sin pangai nin itho hrang ni ma, Pathian chubai mûk hrangin nin inkhôm hrang a ni. Hi dân hi nin irchihai khomin an omna kipa kumkhua’n an izôm hrang a ni.
Bu nin âtin nin irkhol dênin nin inlût zit hrang ni ma, ât irhmâi nin nei khomin ât zit no roi. Mi’nrianghai le nam danghai hrangin se roi, kei hi
“Israel mihai kha hril ro; tha sarina, tarik khat ni’n chu omni ten unglân, bekul tum unglân, irbukkhômna nei roi.
kuang bu le bâl thilinhlan nin inhlan hrang a ni, nin sin pangai tukhomin nin isin hrang ni mah.
“Tha sarina, tarik sôm hi kum tin nam pumpui sual irbôlna nikho roiinpui a nia, bu ngheiin nin inkhôm hrang a ni.
Hi nikhuaa hin sin nin itho hrang ni ma, nin sual irbôlna inhlan a ni sikin.
Hi nia thil imo khat lei fâk chu a chipuihai lai ata inhnotsuak hrang a ni.
Hi nia sintho chu
Hi dân hi nin omna kipa nin irchihai khomin kumkhua’n an izôm hrang a ni.
Tarik kuak khohloi, misa tâk ata tarik sôm khohloi misa tâk dênin irngam nia hmang hrang a ni,” a tia.
Tha sarina tarik sômhlei ringa ni ata sûn sari sûng kairêng kût nin ihmang hrang a ni.
A sûn masa tak nî chu irbukkhôm ir-up nei nin ta, nin sin pangai nin isin hrang ni mah.

Sûn sari sûng chu a nitin bu le bâl thilinhlan inhlan hen nin ta, a sûn sari ni chu irbukkhôm nei nôk nin ta, bu le bâl thilinhlan khom nin inhlan hrang a ni, Pathian chubai mûk nî a ni, sin nin itho hrang ni mah.
Hihai hi
Hi kût hi sabat ser bâka ser hrang a ni; khan, hi thilinhlanhai hi
Bu nin ât zoia, tha sarina tarik sômhlei ringa ni ata kût hi sûn sari sûng nin ihmang hrang a ni. A sûn masatak kha irngamna nikhua ni a ti.
Kha nikhuaa khan nin chîmu ra satakhai hong chôi unglân, tûm ônhai le thing incher sasôl sât unglân,
Khaang khan sûn sari hmang roi. Hi dân hi nin irchihai khomin kumkhua’n an izôm hrang a ni.
Israel mi murdi chu hi nikhua sari sûng hin dângdia an iom hrang a ni.
Israel mihai Aigupta ram ata
Khaang tak khan Mosia’n Israel mihai kha
“Israel mihai khan oliv hriak irthît infâi meiser tui hrangin hong chôihai sianlân, a zoro taka a ibel hen hrang a ni.
Irtongna puan in sûnga hmun irthiangtak, thuthung siana, puanzâr pên tiang, khohloi tin Arona’n bel a ta, a tûk khovâr dênin a ibel pat hrang a ni. Hi thil hi kumkhuaa tho hrang a ni.
Rângachak inzena siam meiser sianaa meiserhai chu Arona’n irvo a ta,
Baiphit a sa zâtin bai tang sômhleihni, her khata rikin, siam ro,
rângachak inzena inluan dokânga khan thâr hni, kirukin se roh.
Bero’n zen, idôr ten mani bai sia irtângna khan sehai ro, kha khan bai kha
Sabat ni kipa
Bai kha Arona le a’rchihai dongtum a ni hrang a ni, hmun irthianga khan an ifâk hen hrang a ni,
Aigupta mi ata Israel nu inkhat nâipa le Israel mi an irsuala.
Kha nupang kha Selomiti nâinu a ni, Dan nama Dibria tunu a ni. Israel nu nâipa khan
I anga tho hrang mani ti
“Kha mi kha dâi pên tiang hruaiin lân, Pathian khua a isâl lai inhretuhai khan a lu chunga an kut irnghathai sianlân, mipuiin lungin dêngthat ri sehai.
Israel mihai kha hril ro: Pathian khuasâltu khan a ituang ngêt hrang a ni.
Pathian hrilsiat chu thatpai hrang a ni; Israel pungkhôm murdi’n lungin an idêngthat hrang a ni; Israel mi khom, an laia nam dang omhai khom, Pathian hrilsiat chu thatpai hrang a ni.
Mi that chu thatpai sa hrang a ni.
Mi dang sa that petu chu a ithuan hrang a ni, hringna irthûla hringna.
Mi dang hmêlirveitirtu chu a itho ang takin a chunga tho nôk hrang a ni.
Ru inkhat an khiaktirin chu a ru inkhat inkhiak nôk hrang a ni, mit irthûla mit, ha irthûla ha, hmêlirveitir irthûla hmêlirveitir nôk.
Mi sa inrûka thattu chu thuan a ta, mihriam thattu chu that sa hrang a ni.
Hi dân hi Israel mi murdi hrang a ni, nin laia om nam danghai khom huam a ti,
Hi thu hi mihai a hril zoiin chu Pathian khosâltu kha riakhmun ata an hruai suaka, an dêngthat tâka. Mosia kuang
Sinai tânga
“Israel mihai kha hril ro, nangni ki ipêk hrang ram nin tung tika chu
Kum ruk sûng chîmu song nin ta, nin grephai sât nin ta, a ra irhmal nin ti.
A kum sari kum rêk chu
Ni bu faôi khom nin i-ât hrang ni ma, ni ienkol loi grep khom nin irhmal hrang ni ma: ram inôltir kum a ni.
Ram chu inôltir khom unglân, nin suakhai hrang, irhlofâk nin ihmanghai hrangin, nam dang nin iompuihai le nin ta hranga fâk hrang chu om dên a ti.
Nin sâ vâihai, nin ramsahai ta hrang khom fâk hrang om dên a ti.
Kum sari a bâk sari, kum sômminli kum kuak a hek kum
tha sari, tarik sôm ni, sual irbôlna nikhua roiinpuia khan mi tîr unglân, ram pumpuia bekul tum ri sehai.

Kum sômringana chu lôm nin ta, ram sûnga om murdihai hrangin zalênna thu nin inpuang hrang a ni, nin ta hrangin Jubili kum ni a ti. In le loi zuar tâk murdi chu a neitu kuang mani, a’rchihai kuang mani, pêk kîr nôk hrang a ni, suaka zuar tâk khom an isuak zit hrang a ni, mâni in le loia kîr nôk an ti.
Kha kuma khan ite nin isong hrang ni ma, faôi nin i-ât hrang ni ma, nin grep sat irnoi hong ra khom nin ilâk hrang ni mah.
Kumtuangin kha kum kha nin ta hrangin kum ser ni a ta, nin loia hong suak kha nin ifâk hrang a ni.
Hi Jubili kuma hin mâni ram seng nin inei kîr nôk hrang a ni.
Khasikin, ram nin zuarin mani, nin lâkin mani, nir chi chanpui Israel mi chu irhoiloi takin ni ilo hrang ni mah.
Jubili kum a tung mâna, rama chîmu hong suak thei hrang dôr insâpin, a ram man chu sût hrang a ni.
kum a la tamin chu a man a ipung hrang a ni; ram kha zuar tak tak ni maka, chîmu thar thei vai kha zuar thei a ni.
Nin Israel chanpuihai huang no roi, Pathian chi roi, kei hi
Rama chîmu irzir intam a ta, nin inuam do dôr fâk hrang nei nin ta, irtharngam takin om thei nin ti.
A kum sari kum chu ite ei song noa, ei ât ual no’n chu imo ei ifâk hrang? nin iti a ni thei.
A kum rukna ram chu satvur ki ta, kum hni fâk hrang suak a ti.
kum riatnaa chîmu song ra nin ât mâka chu kum ruknaa suak kha nin iruk hrang dôr om a ti.
Nin ram chu zuarpai thei no chin ni, ram chu ki ta a ni; nangni chu mikhual nin ni.
Ram chu nin izuar a ni khomin a neitu khan a irchôk kîr thei ngêt hrang a ni.
Israel mi chu a sân an rianga, a ram zuar nang rak a ni khomin a’rnâipui urêngin a irtan hrang a ni.
Lei irtan hrangtu urêng irnaipui neiloi chu, ama a hong irfûk irhniang theia, ama ngêtin a’rchôk kîr nôk thei hrang a ni.
Khaang thila chu Jubili kum tung mâka chu chîmu thar thei zât man insâpin irchôk kîr thei hrang a ni, Jubili kum chu a inei kîr nôk dên hrang a ni.
Ram ircho kîrna hrang poisa a nei zoi no’n chu a’rchôktu khan Jubili kum dênin nei a ta, Jubili kum chu a neitu chongpu kha a ipêk khîr nôk hrang a ni.
Kul nei khopuia in neiin a in kha a zuarin chu a zuar ata kum khat sûng khan irtan nôk thei a ti.
Kum khat sûnga a’rchôk kîr thei no’n chu irchôk kîr thei nôk ni ta no ni, a’rchôktu khan a’rchihai dênin a in kha nei thei ta a ti; Jubili kuma khom pêk khîr hrang ni mah.
Khua kulnei loi, thingtâng khuaa in chu ram nin irchôk anga bê hrang a ni, a neitu kuang khan irchôk kîr thei a ta, Jubili kuma pêk kîr nôk dên hrang a ni.
Levia irchihai rêk chu an omna hrang inkung khuaa an thil nei chu itiklai khomin irchôk kîr nôk thei an ti.

Hi khuaa om Levi irchihaiin in an izuar chu ircho kîr thei no khomhai sian, Jubili kuma chu pêk kîr nôk hrang a ni; Levi chihai an omna hrang inkung khuaa an in nei chu Israelhai laia an kumkhua thil nei indet tak an ni sikin.
Levi irchihai khua kôla sâ lêngna hmuna chu itiklai khomin zuar hrang ni ma, thil an inei indet omsun a ni.
Nin urêng Israel, ni kôla om chu, a sân a lei hong inrianga, mâni khom a’rfâ thei no’n chu irhlofâk angin mani, mikhual angin mani ni ienkol hrang a ni; khanchu, ni kôla a iom sa mai hrang a ni.
A kuang ata a pung irzûl no ro, Pathian chin lân, ni urêngpa chu a bingin a hong iom thei hrang a ni.
Poisa nin pûktir khomin inpungtir no’n lân, ni bu a’rchôkin ite hlep no roh.
Kanaan ram hi nangni ki pêka, nin Pathian ni hrangin Aigupta ram ata nangni hruai suaktu
Ni chipui Israel chu a sân lei hong inriangin ni suaka hong irzuar khomsian, suak angin ni isor hrang ni mah.
Irhlofa le mikhual angin enkol ni ta, Jubili kuma ni insua nôk hrang a ni.
Kha zoi tika chu a nâihai le nang suaksan an ta, an in sûng mihai kuang om nôk an ta, an in le loi kha lua nôk an ti.
Israel mihai hi ki suak an ni, Aigupta ram ata ki hruai suakhaia, suaka zuar hrang ni mahai.
Indînhai sabak loiin an chunga nin iom hrang ni ma, Pathian chi roi.
Pasal mani, nupang mani suak nin nangin chu nin kôlvêla nam dang ircho roh.
Nin laia om nam dang nâihai chu ircho thei nin ti, khaang mi nâi, nin ina suakhai chu nin ta ni thiai a ti.
Nin nâihaiin dong thei an ti, donghai an ta, an hring sûng chu an suak ni an ti. Aniachu, ni chipui Israel kha deng ni intheitir hrang ni mah.
Nin laia om nam dang chu hong irchong zaphai sian khom, nin chipui Israel mihai rêk chu inriang zapin, kha nam dang kuanga mani, ama chipui kuang mani suaka a’rzuara.
Lei irzuar tâk khomsian, irchopai nôk thei a ni, ama urêng laia inkhatin mani,
a pa urêngin mani, a pa urêng nâipahaiin mani, a’rkaipui nâi ual mi dangin mani irchopai nôk thei an ti.
Ama irchôktu leh chong an ta, a irzuar kum ata Jubili kum dênin irhlofa pangaiin i dôr mo hlo irman nih ti insâpin, a’rtanna hrang man chu bituk ni a ti.
A sôt mani, sôtloi mani a sôt za chu sûtin an man ata irthokin inkhîr nih a ti.
Jubili tung dêna, a hlo thei hrang dôr chu, a’rhlotu kuang ata irtan suana hrang man dôr chu a ni.
Irhlofa, kum khat hranga hmang ang dênin an irsor hrang a ni. A pu khan deng a intheitir hrang ni mah.
I ang lama khom, irtansuak a ni no khomin Jubili kuma chu, a mihai leh insua ngêt hrang a ni,
Israel mi rêng rêng, tukhom suaka an intâng kumkhua hrang ni ma; Israel mihai kha
“Ite ni ual loi, millim sinhai, lung millimhai, chubai mûk hrangin nin isiam hrang ni ma, kei hi
Irngam hrang ki iti nikhuahai ser unglân, chubai nin ni imûkna hrang hmun chu inza roi, kei hi
Ki dânhai hi nin zôma, ki thupêkhai tak nin sônin chu
a zoro taka rua inthotir ki ta, nin loi inlâp a ti, nin theihai khom ra nuam a ti.
Grep ra irhmal zoro dênin bu ât nang a ti, bu tû zoro dênin nin grep ra irhmal nang a ti. Nuam do dôra fâk hrang nei nin ta, nin rama khan irtharngam takin om nin ti.
Nin rama irngeina inlêngtir ki ta, chitna om loiin zâl nin ta, ram sahrânghai irzûlpai ki ta, râlin nangni hong doi no nihai.
Nin râlhai chu irzûlhai nin ta, khandaiin that nin ti.
Mi pangaiin mi irzakhat inhnê nin ta, mi irza’n chu mi sîngkhat inhnê thei nin ti.
Sat nangni vur ki ta, nâi le te nangni pe nghek ki ta; ki thuthung angin keiin ki itho hrang chu nangni tho pe thiai ki ti.
Bu milui nin nêk zoi loi chu a thar siana hrangin pai nang a ti.
Nin laia om ki ta, nangni intha viat no ning.
Nangni ompui ki ta, nin Pathian ni ki ta, ki mihai ni nin ti.
Kei
“Ki thu nin irngaitua nuam noa, ki thupêkhai nin zôm nuam noa,
ki dânhai nin hnôla, omdân hrang ki iti nin hnuaisiaa, tho hrang ki itihai nin tho nuam noa ki thuthung nin tho’nsualin chu,
hiang hin nangni hrem ki ti: chamairakin nangni inomtir ki ta, inkhurpui, dam thei loi hri irvei nin ta, nin mit dolde suak a ta, hring suakpui no chin ni.
Nangni irheisan ki ta, nangni khôkmâktuhai chu nin chunga roirêltuhai ni an ta, irzûl loi khomin intâ tânin om nin ti.
Khan khomin ki thu nin la’rngai mai no’n chu a bâk sari’n nangni hrem ki ti.
Nin isong tak tak, nin hrâtna chu, nangni insiat pe ki ta; nin ta hrangin irvân chu thîr anga rua insum loiin nangni siam ki ta, nin loihai khom dâr angin châr a ti.
Môk sin sosôl ni nin ti, nin loia ât hrang om no nia, nin thei kunghai khom ra ual no ni.
“A ni doi lamin nin oma, ki thu nin la uksak nuam mai no’n chu nin sual nêka irphu bâk saria irkhêlin hri nangni irveitir ki ti.
Ramsa hâitak tak hong tîr ki ta, nin nâihai le nin sahai hong sê an ta.
“Hi hremna nin tong hnung khoma ki tiang nin irhei noa, nin ni doi maiin chu,
nangni irkalpui lamin om ki ta, a bâk saria nain nangni hrem ki ti.
Nin laia râl hong tîr ki ta, thuthung nin itho’nsiatna phuba nangni hong la an ti. Nin khopui kul sûnghaia nin irbîk khomin hri inlêngtir ki ta, râlhaiin hong la dên an ti.

Nin fâk irvaina inpingtir ki ta, lungthu sôm hmanga fâk le nêk suang nuhai khan lungthu inkhat vai hmangin fâk le nêk suang ta an ti. Sem viviat a ta, an dongtum an fâk zoi hnung khom an phîng la châm dên a ti.
“Khaang dôr tena khom ki thu nin irngai nuam noa, nin ni la doi maiin chu,
ningmurin nin chunga insum ki ta, a bâk saria nain nangni hrem ki ti.
Nin nâipahai le nin nâinuhai hme fapuina rak nin ti.
Nin millim pathian biakna hmun irsânghai kha insiatpai ki ta, nin mirimhoi hâlna maichâmhai kha insiat ki ta, nin ruakhai chu nin millim biakhai chunga pai ki ta, ki hringna khan nangni khôkmâk a ti.
Nin khopuihai kha insim ki ta, nin pathian biakhai kha inramtir ki ta, nin irbôlnahai kha nangni lei pom pe no ning.
Nin ram inkoltir zit ki ta, a luatu nin râlhai khan, a’rkhêl ti tak tak an ti.
Irdoina hong tung a ta, nam dang rama nangni hruai indarh an ta, nin khopuihai kha chim remrum a ti.
Nin râlhai rama nin om sûngin nin ram chu irngam a ti.
Nin om sûngin nin ram kha inôltir nuam mak chêia, nin om no sûng chu a irngam ta hrang a ni.
Nin râlhai rama hruaihai chu chi tak tak an ta, sûlhna inlêng maia luan intân an ta, khandaia irzûl ang dênin tûte irzûl loi khomin tûk an ti.
Khandaia irzûl ang dênin irpalthût irhlôm an ta, râl doi nôk hrang tûte om no chin ni.
Mi rama thi nin ta, kha khan nangni phûm an ti.
Nin râlhai rama la dam sun omhai khom nin sualna sik le nin pahai sualna sikin zui irhmang nin ti.
“Nin ni doia, nir heisanin kha mihai khan an pahai leh thilsual an tho a nih ti inhre suak an ta,
anni sikin ki’rheisana, an râlhai rama kin hnotsuak a nih ti irhriat an ta; khanchu, an lungrîl irhnuai an ta, an sual man an pêl hnung chu,
Jakoba, Isaka le Abrahama hai kuang ki chonginkung kha inhriat mai ki ta, ki mihai chu, hi ram hi ki pêk hrang nôk thu hril thar nôk ki ti.
Aniachu, ram chu a’rngam theina hrangin ram ata mihai kha lâk suak bak hrang a ni. Ki dânhai le ki thupêkhai hnôla an thilsual tho man kha an ituang bak hrang a ni.
Khaang tak khan hrem khom inlân an râlhai rama an om kha, sehai rak no ninga, inboipaihai zit ual no ning.
An irchibulhai leh ki thuthung kha inthar nôk ki ti. Aigupta ram ata khan nam tin hmua ki mihai kha, kei
Hi hi Sinai tânga Mosia kuang
“Israel mihai kha hril ro: mi’n
pasal, kum sômhni ten, kum sômruk dênin, sumru sekel sômringa varh ni a ti.
Nupang puihling tâk chu sumru sekel sômthum varh ni a ti.
Pasal nâipang, kum ringa ten kum sômhni dênin sumru sekel sômhni varh ni a ta, nupang a niin chu sumru sekel sôm varh ni a ti.
Nâitesen tha khat tena kum ringa dênin pasal chu sumru sekel ringa varh ni a ta, nupang chu sumru sekel thum varh ni a ti.
Kum sômruk chung tianga pasal chu sumru sekel sômhlei ringa varh ni a ta, nupang chu sumru sekel sôm varh ni a ti.

A pêktu chu a sân an riang sikin a’rtansuakna man tuk dôr khi a pêk thei no’n chu pe hranga a inkung mihriam kha ochai kuang hong hruai a ta, ochai khan bituk nêka tôm ual, a pêk thei hrang dôr irhoi, lei tuk pe a ti.
A pêktu khan a pêk suana hrang mani, a nêka thil dang mani pe thei ta no ni; khaanga tho a tumin chu a ruaiin
Sa, fâk irthiangloi zât,
ochai khan a man hrang zât a bi lei tuk a ta, khaang dôr kha a mana tep hrang a ni.
A pêktu khan irtan a nuamin chu a man bituk dôr le, kha hmun ringaa hmun khat bêlin irtan thei a ti.
Mi’n ama in ngei
A in kha irtan a nuamin chu a man inrît dôr kha pe a ta, hmun ringaa hmun khat a ipêk belsa hrang a ni.
Mi’n ama ram chimrip
Jubili kum zoi renga pêk a niin chu a man chuka tep hrang a ni.
Kum danga pêk a ni’n chu ochaiin Jubili dênin i dôr mo rama suak thei ti insâp a ta, khaanga khan a man chu ti hrang a ni.
A neitu khan ram kha a’rtan nuamin chu a man ti dôr kha pe a ta, hmun ringaa hmun khat a ipêk bel hrang a ni.
A loi kha ama’n a’rtan nuam no’n mani, mi dang irchotir mani a ni’n chu irtan thei ni ta no ni.
Jubili kuma chu ram kha
A ram irchôk, a dongtum ram ni loi, a pêkin chu,
ochaiin Jubili dênin a man insâp a ta, kha ni ngêta khan a chimrip kha pe a ta, a poisa chu
Jubili kuma chu a neitu kuanga khan mani, a’rchihai kuang mani, pêk kîr nôk hrang a ni.
Hi thil man insâp hi tempil varh lung tianlai anga insâp hrang a ni. Sekel khat kha Gera sômhni dôr a ni.
Sa suak masatak chu
Sa fâk irthiangloi ata masatak rêk chu a man inrît dôr le hmun ringaa hmun khat belin irtan thei a ni; a pêktu’n a’rtan nuam no’n chu mi dang kuang a man inrît ang khan zuar hrang a ni.
Mihriam khom nisian, khaanga pêk tâk chu irtansuak thei ni ta ma, thatpai hrang a ni.
Loi ram ata hong suak rêng rêng, bu khom, thei khom, sôma inkhat chu
Mi’n kha kha a’rtan nuamin chu a man pangai bana hmun ringaa hmun khat pêk belin irtan thei a ti.
Sa vâi rêng rêng sôma inkhat chu
Sa neitu khan a sisiat sômnaa a isia hrang ni ma, a sa ual kha a siat ualin thûl hrang ni ma, thûl a tumin chu
Hi thupêk hi Sinai tânga Mosia kuanga Israelhai hrangin
Israelhaiin, Aigupta ram an suaksan zoi kum hnina, a tha hnina, sûn maton taka khan, Sinai ramchâra irtongna Biakbuk khan
“Nangma le Arona hin Israel irchihai chu an panam dungzuiin le an in sûng mi angin tephai roi.
Râl doi thei tak pasal kum sômhni le a chung tianga mi chu tephai ving roi.
Nang changpui hrangin panam tina pâfonghai chu inhrilhai ro,” a tia.
Hi sinthopui hranga panam tina an inthang suakhai chu hihai hi an ni: Reubena panama mi Sedeura nâipa Elizura,
Simeona panama mi Zurisadaia nâipa Selumiela hai,
Juda panama mi Aminadaba nâipa Nasona hai,
Isakara panama mi Zuara nâipa Nethanela hai,
Zebulun panama mi Helona nâipa Eliaba hai,
Josefa irchi Efraima panama mi Amihuda nâipa Elisama hai, Manasea panama mi Pedazura nâipa Gamaliela hai,
Benjamina panama mi Gideona nâipa Abidana hai,
Dana panama mi Amisadaia nâipa Ahiezera hai,
Asera panama mi Okrana nâipa Pagiela hai,
Gada panama mi Deuela nâipa Eliasapha hai,
Naftalia panama mi Enana nâipa Ahira hai hi.
Annihai hi mipuihai inthang, an panam sûnga hruaitu, Israel in sûngkua pâfonghai kha an ni.
Mosia le Arona chu hi mi sômhleihnihai hin an isanhai a nia,
khanchu Israel nam murdihai chu tha hni sûnga sûn masa taka khan an koibukhaia, panam tin le in sûngkuahai an tephaia. Pasal kum sômhni chung tianga mi chu irziakin an itephai a ni tâka.
thu a ipêkhai ang takin, Mosia’n Sinai ramchâra khan mipuihai kha a itephai a ni.
Pasal kum sômhni le a chung tianga râl doi theihai kai chu, an panam le an in sûngkua ang takin an irhming an irziakhaia, Jakoba nâilutîr, Reubena panam ata phutin hiang hin an tam dân chu a ni.
Reubena panama mihai chu sîngminli sângruk le irzaringa an ni.
Simeona panama irchihai chu an itam lam angin pasal kum sômhni chung tianga râlkâp thei dôrhai chu,
Simeona irchihai murdi chu sîngringa sângkuak irzathum an ni.
Gada panama irchihai chu an irhming tam dân angin kum sômhni chung tianga râl doi thei dôr chu,
Gada irchihai chu sîngminli sângringa irzaruk le sômringa an ni.
Juda panama irchihai chu an irhming tam dân angin kum sômhni chung tiangahai chu,
râl doi thei dôra mi a chung tiang Juda irchihai chu sîngsari sângminli le irzaruk an ni.
Isakara panama irchihai chu an itam dân angin kum sômhni chung tianga râl doi thei dôrhai chu,
Isakara irchihai chu sîngringa sângminli irza minli an ni.
Zebulun panama irchihai chu, an irhming tam dân angin kum sômhni chung tianga mi chu
râl doi thei tena mihai chu an rêngin sîngringa sângsari le irzaminli an ni.
Josefa panam laia mi Efraima irchia mi an tam dân angin kum sômhni chung tianga râl doi thei
Efraima irchihai chu sîngminli irzaringa an ni.
Manasea panama irchi an irhming tam dân angin kum sômhni chung tianga râlkâp thei
Manasea irchihai chu an rêngin sîngthum sânghni irzahni an ni.
Benjamina panama irchihai, an irhming fe dân angin kum sômhni chung tianga râl doi thei,
Benjamina panamhai chu sîngthum le sângringa irzaminli an ni.
Dan panama irchihai chu an irhming irziak dân angin kum sômhni chung tianga râl doi thei
Dan irchihai chu sîngruk sânghni irzasari an ni.
Asera panama irchihai chu an irhming irziak dân angin kum sômhni chung tianga râl doi thei
Asera irchihai chu an rêngin sîngminli sângkhat le irzaringa an ni.
Naftalia panama irchihai chu an irhming irziak lam angin kum sômhni chung tianga râl doi thei
Naftalihai chu sîngringa sângthum irzaminli an ni.
Hihai hi an ni, Mosia le Arona’n Israel nam pâfonghai sômhleihni an itephai thei chu an ni.
Khanchu râl doi thei dôrhai chu Israel irchi, a panama tepin kum sômhni chung tianga itephai chu an ni.
An rênga tep theia om dôr chu nuairuk sângthum irzaringa le sômringa an ni.
Levi mihai chu panam danghai laia khan tep sa ni mahaia,
Mosia kuang khan,
“Râl kâp thei hrang dôr pasal ni tephai tena khom Levihai chu ni itep sahai hrang ni ma;
Levi irchihai chu inhriattirna Biakbuk le a neinun hmangruahai kha inenkoltirhai roh. A neinunhai kha irzônhai sianlân, donsuihai sian, a kôlvêla khan an puan inhai inzar ngai an ti.

Khan, nin Biakbuk kha nin son hrang rikipa, Levia irchihai khan insiat an ta, nin inzar nôk hrang khomin Levia irchihai khan an inzar hen hrang a ni; mi dang hong irrol tumhai chu thatpaihai hrang an ni.
Khanchu Israel mihaiin an omna hmun senga, a pa pâlin, an tam dân izirin riakbukhai chu siam an ti.
Khannisian Levia irchihaiin chu Biakbuk vêla khan riakbuk irfûktir hrang a ni. Biakbuk kha enkol an ta, kha no’n chu mihaiin hong nâi an ta, Israelhai chunga ningmurna hong tungna lik a ti,” a tia.
Khaang tak khan Israel mihai khan
“Israel mihaiin riakbuk an siam tika chu, mi tinin mâni pâl irsinsiana le mâni panam puanzâr târ an ti.
Nisua tianga Juda panam irsinsiana hnuaia a pâl pâla puanzâr hranga an hruaituhai chu hihai hi an ni. Aminadaba nâipa Nasona ni a ti.
A pâlhai tam lam chu sîngsari le sângminli irzaruk an ni.
Khan ama zoia puan in zârtu hrang chu Isakara irchia mi ni a ti.
Isakara irchihai hruaitu chu Zuara nâipa Nethanela ni a ti, an tam lam chu sîngringa sângminli le irzaminli an ni.
Zebulun irchihai hruaitu hrang chu Helona nâipa Eliaba mi chu
an tam lam chu sîngringa sângsari le irzaminli an ni.
An pâl tam dân angin Juda mi an itephai chu nuaikhat sîngriat sângruk le irzaminli an ni. Annihai hin an ihruaihai mai hrang a ni.
An pâl tam dân izir angin sim tiang panga khan Reubena hai leh om an ta; Reubena irchihai hruaitu hrang chu Sedeura nâipa Elisura ni a ti.
An tam dân chu sîngminli sângruk le irzaringa an ni.
Khan anni zoia zâr hranghai chu Simeona irchihai ni an ta, Simeona irchihai hruaitu hrang chu Zurisadaia nâipa Selumiela ni a ti.
An tam lam dân chu sîngringa sângkuak le irzathum an ni.
Khan, Gada irchihai chu an hruaitu hrangin Reuela nâipa Eliasapha ni a ta;
an tam lam chu sîngminli sângringa irzaruk le sômringa an ni.
Reubena mihai tam dân chu nuaikhat sîngringa sângkhat irzaminli le sômringa an ni. Annihai hi a dôntea suak hrang chu an ni.
Khanchu irtongna puan in kha suaksan an ta, Levi irchihai chu a laia om an ta; an omhmun izir angin a pa pâlin fe an ti.
An tam dân izir angin nitâk tiang panga khan Efraimahai om an ta, an hruaitu chu Amihuda nâipa Elisama ni a ti.
An tam lam chu sîngminli irzaringa an ni.
Anni zoia chu Manasea hai ni an ti,
Manasea hai hruaitu hrang chu Pedazura nâipa Gamaliela ni a ti; an tam lam chu sîngthum sânghni le irzahni an ni.
Anni zoia chu Benjamina irchihai, an hruaitu hrang chu Gideonia nâipa Abidana ni a ti.
An tam dân chu sîngthum sângringa le irzaminli an ni.
Efraima mi tam lam chu nuaikhat sângriat irzakhat an ni. Anni hi a dônte’n an isuak hrang a ni.
“An pâl tam dân angin Dan mihai chu hmâr tiang khan om an ta, Dan irchihai hruaitu hrang chu Amisadaia nâipa Ahiezera ni a ti.
An tam lam chu sîngruk sânghni le irzasari an ni.
Anni zoia puan in zâr hranghai chu Asera irchihai ni an ti. Asera irchihai hruaitu chu Okrana nâipa Pagiela ni a ti.
An pâl tam lam chu sîngminli sângkhat le irzaringa an ni.
Anni zoia hrang chu Naftalia irchi hai; an hruaitu hrang chu Enana nâipa Ahira ni a ti.
An tam lam chu sîngringa sângthum le irzaminli an ni.
Dan mihai tam lam chu nuaikhat sîngringa sângsari le irzaruk an ni. Khan annihai hin a pa pâla suakin an ife irzôt chit hrang a ni,” tiin.
Hihai hi Israel irchihai insûngkua tina mi, an itephai chu an ni, an rêngin nuairuk sângthum irzaringa le sômringa an ni.
Khannisian, Levi irchihai kha chu
Mosia thu a ipêk ang khan Israel irchihaiin a pa pâla puanzâra, a panam ang dungzuiin a pa pâlin an suak ngai a ni.
Hihai hi Sinai tânga
Arona’n nâipasal minli a neia, a nâilutîr tak chu Nadaba a nia, khan Abihua, Eleazara le Ithamara hai hi an ni.
Anni chu sahriak nâl an nia, ochai hranga inhlan an ni.
Khannisian Nadaba le Abihua chu
Khanchu
“Levi irchihai kha ochai Arona kuang hruaihaiin lân, a sin an tho pe theina hrangin a kuang inomtirhai roh.
Ama le mipuihai sin thoin, irtongna puan in Biakbuk puan ina khan Biakbuk sin chu tho an ti.
Neinunhai kha enkol an ta, Israel irchihai ta hrangin Biakbuk sin chu tho an ti.
Levihai sintum tak chu Arona le a nâipasalhai ta hranga sintho hi a ni.
Arona le a nâipasalhai chu ochai sintho hrangin tihai ni ta, nam dang a hong irrolhai chu that ni an ti,” a tia.

“Atûn hin chu Levi irchihai chu ki ta an ni tâka, Aigupta mi nâilutîr murdi ki that lai khan; Israel insûngkua tina nâilutîr le sa a suak masa tak chu keima ta hrangin ki inhlan irthianghaia. Khasikin atûn Israel nâilutîrhai irthûlin Levi irchihai hi ki ta ni an ti; keima hi
“Levi irchihai chu an irchi suanpâr angin sûngkua tinhai chu pasal tha khat rengata a chung tianga kai chu tephai roi,” a ti pea.
Khanchu
Levia nâipasalhai chu Gersona, Kohata le Meraria hai an ni, an irhming hi an irchihai khan an irput a ni.
Gersona nâipasalhai chu Libnia le Simeia an ni.
Kohata nâipasalhai chu Amrama, Izara, Hebrona le Uzela hai an ni.
Meraria nâipasalhai chu Malia le Musia hai an ni. Hihai irhming hi an irchihai khan nam irhminga an irput a ni.
Gersona chu Libni le Simei insûngkua irchihai an ni; hihai hi Gersona in sûng mihai chu an ni.
Pasal, tha khat chung tianga tephai kai chu mi sângsari irzaringa an ni.
Gersona irchihai khan Biakbuk kha nitâk tiang an inzar hrang a ni.
Gersona panamhai hruaitu hrang chu Laela nâipa Eliasafa ni a ti.
Gersona mihaiin an ienkol hrang chu Biakbuk le puan in le a chung irkhûna hai, irtongna biakbuk mikot puanzârhai,
A kholâi le maichâm irkulna puanzârhai a kholâi kotbâia puanzârhai hi ni a ti. Annihai hi, hi sina hin mophurtu an ni.
Amrama mihai, Izhara mihai, Hebrona mihai, Uziela mihai, hi Kohata panama mi an ni.
Pasal, tha khat ata a chung tianga tepa om thei kai chu sângriat irzaruk an ni.
Hi namhai hi Biakbuk sim tiang puan in inzâr an ti.
Kohatha mihai hruaitu hrang chu Uziela nâipa Elizafana nih a ti.
An ienkol hrang chu Thuthung Bôm doina, meiser intoina, maichâmhai le ochaihaiin hmun irthianga an ihmang bêl le bûrhai le puanzârhai, kha tianga sin kha an itho ual hrang a ni.
Levi irchihai hruaitu ulian tak chu Arona nâipa Eleazara ni a ta, hmun irthiang enkoltuhai ir-ôihai a ti.
Mali le Musi hi Meraria nama mi an ni.
Pasal, tha khat ata a chung tianga itep theihai chu mi sângruk irzahni an ni.
Hi namhai hin Biakbuk hmâr tiang puan inzar an ta, Abihaila nâipa Zuriela chu anni laia hruaitu tak ni a ti.
Meraria nam enkol hranga inkunga om chu, Biakbuk thingphêkhai, tângkhanghai, chopuihai, a’rnghatna bul, khaang sin kha an itho ual hrang chu a ni.
Khabana, chopuihai, a bulhai, hêmfunghai le a hruihai hi an ienkol sa hrang a ni.

Mosia le Arona le a nâipasalhai chu Biakbuk maton tiang, nisua tianga puan in inzar an ti. Anni chu Israel mipuihai ta hrangin hmun irthianga sin thôna mophurtu ni an ta, mi danghai an irrolin chu that ni an ti.
Mosia thu a ipêk angin Levi irchia mi pasal tha khat ata a chung tianga mi tepa omhai chu sînghni le sânghni an ni.
Khanchu
Tha khat ata a chung tianga mi kai chu a rêngin sînghni le sânghni irzahni sômsari inthum an ni.
Khan
“Atûn chu Levi irchihai le an sahai kha Israel nâilutîrhai irthûla le an sa inte maton takhai kha keima ta hrangin inhlan irthiangtirhai roi.
Khanchu Levi irchihai nêkin Israel nâilutîrhai chu mi irzahni sômsari inthumin an tam sikin irtan ni an ti.
A lu kipa, hmun irthianga Sekel tep dân angin sekel ringa leh irtanhai ni ti.
Kha tangka kha Arona le a nâipasalhai kuang pe ni ti,” a tia.
Mosia’n khaang khan a thoa,
Sekel sângkhat irzathum sômruk ringa a chôia,
Arona le a nâipasalhai chu a pêkhai tâka.
Khan,
“Levi irchihai laia Kohatha mihai kha an panam le an insûngkuaa om dôr tephai unglân,
irtongna Biakbuka sintho thei hrang pasal kum sômthum le sômringa kâra mi chu tephai ving roi.
Irtongna Biakbuk hmun irthiang taka Kohatha mihai sintum chu hihai hi a ni.
Riakbuk irthonna a om hrang tika chu, Arona le a nâipasalhaiin hmun irthianga Thuthung Bôm maton tianga puanzâr kha lapai an ta, Thuthung Bôm kha irkhû an ti.
Kha kha savun leh inkhumtir an ta, kha zoia chu a chung taka khan puan dum leh inkhum sa an ta, a zônfung khom inkhop an ti.
Khanchu inentirna bai dokâng chunga khan khêng hai, mirimhoi siana khuri hai, khilât ir-ûm le uain thilinhlanna khilât lianhai sia an ta; kha dokânga khan bai kha chu a iom mai hrang a ni.
Kha kha puan a seninlâr leh irkhu an ta, savun leh tuam an ta, khanchu a zônfunghai kha inkhop an ti.
Khanchu meiserhai leh a toina hranghai khom meichephai, a’rvut siana hai, le oliv hriak siana hai chu puan dum leh irkhu an ti.
Khahai kha a neinun le savunin infûn an ta, a’rzônna khom sia an ti.
“Kha hnung chu rângachak maichâm kha puan dum leh irkhu an ta, savun leh irkhu an ta, a zônfung khom inkhop an ti.
Hmun irthianga bêl le bûrhai kha puan dum leh infûn an ta, savun irkhu an ta, a zônfung khom inkhop an ti.
Maichâma meirivâm kha luakpai an ta, a chunga puan senduk irkhu an ti.
A chunga khan maichâma an sin thônahai kha meiri-al indomna hai, meichep hai, luakor leh tâbor hai kha sia an ti, savun leh irkhu an ta, a zônfung irbun an ti.

Khanchu riakbuk irthon hrang tika chu, Arona le a nâipasalhai khan neinun irthiang murdi kha an inkhumhai zoi tena chu Kohatha mihai chu a’rzôn hrangin hong an ti. Kohatha mihai khan neinun irthiang kha an itôn hrang ni ma, an thi loina hrangin. Hihai hi irtongna Biakbuk Kohatha mihai mophurna chu a ni.
Ochai Arona nâipa Eleazara sintum chu meiser inchokna hranga sahriak hai, mirimhoi hai, baidi thilinhlan hai, ir-al theina hriak hai le
Khanchu
“Kohatha irchihai panam chu Levi irchihai ata boi loiin,

thil irthiang saihai kôla an honga, an ithi hrang hi phalhai no roi, kha thil khan a dêhai loina hrangin, Arona le a nâipasalhai kha a sûnga lût an ta, mi tinin an itho hrang le an ipêl hrang dân chu hrilhai an ti.
Khannisian Kohatha irchihai kha lûtin ochaihaiin thil irthiang an irkhu lai kha an va en hrang ni ma, an thi loina hrangin,” a tia.
Khan,
Gersona irchihai khom panam le insûngkua om dôr tephai ving roh.
Irtongna Biakbuka sintho thei hrang pasal kum sômthum ata sômringa kâra mihai chu tephai ving roh.
Gersona irchihai sintum chu hihai hi ni a ti:
Biakbuk le irtongna ina puan zârhai chung irkhumna hai, savun a chung taka inkhumna hai, a kotbâia puanzâr hai,
Biakbuk kholâia puanzârhai le maichâm kôla puanzârhai a kholâi lûtna kotbâia puanzârhai le a neinun dang murdi chu irzôn an ta, kha thila la nang danghai chu tho ving an ti.
Mosia le Arona’n Gersona mihai khan an sintumhai thoin, Arona le a nâipasalhai chôi hrang an itihai kha an tho le tho loi en an ti.
Khahai kha irtongna Biakbuka Gersona mihai sintum chu a nia, an sintum tak chu ochai Arona nâipa Ithamara’n inkung pehai a ti.
Irtongna Biakbuka sintho thei hrang mi pasal kum sômthum le sômringa kâra mi chu tephai ving roh.
Irtongna Biakbuka sintum chu hihai hi a ni; Biakbuk thingphêk hai, tângkhang hai, chopui hai, a’rnghatna bul hai,
a mikot irkulna chopui hai, a’rnghatna bul hai, a hêmfung hai, a hrui hai le neinun dang murdi irzôn hrang nih a ta, an irhming indangin an sintum ni indang pehai hrang a ni.
Hihai hi Meraria namhaiin Biakbuka an sintum chu a ni: ochai Arona nâipa Ithamara enkolna hnuaia irzôn ngai an ti.
Kohatha, Gersona le Meraria hai chu an tephai tâka. A panam le a in sûngkuain puan ina sintho thei hrang pasal kum sômthum ata sômringa kâra mi kai chu an tephai vinga.
A panama tephai chu sânghni irzasari le sômringa an ni.
Khahai kha an ni, irtongna puan ina sintho ngai, Kohatha irchia an itep, Mosia hmanga
Gersona nâipasalhai irtongna puan ina sintho hranga hmu zâthai chu.
A panam dungzui angin kum sômthum ata a chung tiang kum sômringa mi tena tep an ni.
An nam le insûngkuaa an itephai chu sânghni irzaruk le sômthum an ni.
Annihai kha Gersona nâipasalhai irtongna puan ina sinthohai chu,
Meraria nâipasalhai irtongna puan ina sintho hranga hmu zâthai chu,
kum sômthum ata kum sômringa mi ten tep an ni.
A insûngkua puma an itephai chu sângthum irzahni an ni.
Annihai kha, anni Meraria nâipasalhai Mosia hmanga
Levi irchihai irtongna ina sintho hranga mi pêl thei hranghai chu.
A nam le insûngkua angin kum sômthum ata sômringa mi ten Mosia, Arona le Israel hruaituhai itep zât chu an ni.
An itephai chu sângriat irzaringa le sômriat an ni.
Mosia hmanga
Khan
“Israel irchihai kha riakbuk ata kha inphâr murdi, thilsual thohai le mithi sika porinchehai chu inhnotsuak ving hrangin thu pehai roh.
Hianga porinchehai hi chu kêlsuapaihai ro, ki mihai laia ki omna riakbuk kha an porinchetir loina hrangin,” tiin.
Israelhaiin khaang khan an thoa, riakbuk ata kha an kêlsuahaia.
“Israel irchihai kuang hiang hin hril ro, pasalin mani, nupangin mani,
A tho’nsualna sikin thupha chôi a ta, a tho’nsualna man chu irkip takin tuam a ti; hmun ringa senin hmun khat, a tho insualnapa kha pe sa a ti.
Khannisian kha mi kha a lei thia, tho’nsualna man bêna hrangin sûngsuak irnaipui a nei noa ni’n chu,
Khanchu Israel irchihaiin thil irthiang
Mi tinin thilinhlan ochai kuanga an ipêkhai kai chu a dongtum ni a ti,” a tia.

“Israel irchihai kuang hrilin lân, an kuang, mi’n a dôngma kha an ika, mi dang leh siatin ama le ama a porinche angin bê ta sian, kha thil kha inhriatpuitu leh a tho lai taka chelin mani om loiin, a pasal kha ip ta ang sianlân; aninole, a pasalin hnarsana’n mani, irthiang chachaka om kha irthiang loi angin lei bê ta sianlân;

A kho khom kha lei ni ta sian, pasal khan a dôngma chu ochai kuanga hruai a ta, khabana thilinhlan hrangin baidi Epha hmun sôma senin hmunkhat chôi sa a ta, sahriak a ibuak hrang ni maka, mirimhoi khom a chunga khan a isia sa hrang ni ma; thudik inlangna hrangin pasal inhnina neitu rengata thilinhlan a ni sikin.
Ochai khan nupang kha maichâm makunga khan inngîrtir a ti.
Ochaiin pil bêla tui irthiang luak a ta, Biakbuk hnuaia pildi la nôk a ta, tuia khan phul a ti.
Ochai khan nupangnu kha
Khanchu ochaiin nupang kha khomâkirsâmtir a ta, a kuang, “Ni uire noa ni’n chu kho sâl intungtirtu, hi tui khâ rengata hi zôk ni ti.
Khannisian ni uirea ni’n chu, zôk no chi ni,” a iti hrang a ni.
Khanchu ochaiin nupang kha khomâkirsâmtir a ta, a kuang, “
Khomâksâm intungtirtu’n, hi tui hi ni rîla thun a ta, ni phîng invûngtir a ta, ni mal inchîntir a ti,” ti a ta. Khanchu nupang khan, “Amen, Amen,” a lei iti hrang a ni.
Khan ochai khan kha khomâkirsâmhai kha lekhabua irziak a ta, tui khâa khan inchie a ti.
Khanchu nupang kha khosâl intungtirtu tui khâ kha in intir a ti. Khanchu khosâlna intungtirtu tui kha a phîng sûnga lût a ta, a sân hong na pe ta a ti.
Khanchu ochai khan baidi thilinhlan kha nupang kut ata kha la a ta,
Ochai khan baidi thilinhlan kha kut kângkhat la a ta, maichâma khan hâl a ta, kha zoiin chu nupang kha in intir a ti.
A lei uirea ni’n chu a sân a phîng hong na pe a ta, a phîng hon vûng pe a ta, a nâi vongna hong siat a ta, a mal khom hong chîn pe a ta, khanchu nupang kha a’rchihai laia khosâlin om a ti.
Khannisian a uire noa ni’n chu, ama chu insiattir no nia, nâi hong vong thei a ti.
Hi hi pasalin dôngma a hnarsâna le uirena thua a in-ikna chungchânga dân om chu a ni. Nupang kha maichâm kôla khan inngîrtir ni a ta, khanchu ochaiin hi dân ang hin a chunga tho a ti.
Pasal kha chu theiloi changna ata zôk a ta, khannisian nupangin chu kha sualna mô chu pêl a ti.
Khanchu
Israel irchihai kuang, hiang hin hril ro, an kuang, pasalin mani, nupangin mani, Nazarit ni hranga a bîk taka chonginkungna neiin
uain le zû nghei a ta, grep ra ata siam, zû ite a iin hrang ni mah.
Nazarit mi a’rti sûng kârka chu grep rânga thilhai kha a ifâk hrang ni ma, grep ru le a kôr khom a ifâk thei hrang ni mah.
Nazarit chonginkungna hnuaia a om sûng chu, a sam mani, a hnerkamul mani khom epin a irvo hrang ni mah. Chonginkungna sika
A sam kha Pathian ta hranga a’rpêk ti entîrna ni a ta, khasikin a pa thina hmuna fein a iporinche hrang ni mah.
Nazarit mi ki nih a’rti kârka chu,
A kôla irningloia a thi an om thutin chu, a sam kha porche a ni sikin, sûn sari nghâk a ta, khanchu a sam le a hnerkamul kha voipai a ta; khanchu a hong irthiang nôk hrang a ni.
Khanchu sûn riat a hong ni tena chu, vasute inhni mani, phervali inhni mani chôi a ta, irtongna Biakbuk kotbâia khan ochai kuang hong chôi a ti.

Ochai khan mithi sika ama thâr irthiangna hrangin inkhat kha sual irbôlna’n inhlan a ta, inkhat dang kha pum hâlirvôm thilinhlana khan inhlan a ti; kha ni khan chu a sam kha a irthiangtir nôk nih a ti.
Matona a lei inhlan kha, a sam a porinche tâk sikin pom ni ta no ni. A thar vangin
Hi hi, Nazarit mi, ki ni a’rtihna bîk nikhua a’rkip tena tho hrang dân chu ni a ta; irtongna Biakbuk kotbâia khan hruai ni a ti.
kuang demnaboi sa inthum inhlan a ta; kêlbelra tuaite kum khata mi pum hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrangin, kêlbelra irlate kum khata mi sual irbôlna hrangin le belrachal kha irngeina hrangin.
Khabana bai chol pol loi khamphulu khat; baidi le oliv hriak leh siam baitiam le oliv hriak pol baitiam irphân ni a ta, khanchu buhûm le uain thilinhlana inhlan sa a ti.
Ochai khan kha thilinhlanhai kha sual irbôlna le pum hâlirvôm thilinhlanin
Kêlbelrachal le khamphulua bai kha irngeina thilinhlanna hrangin
Nazarit mi khan irtongna Biakbuk kotbâia khan a sam ep infâi ving a ta, irngeina thilinhlan hâlna meia khan hâlpai a ti.
Khanchu ochaiin kêlbelrachal hmê a dârsuama suang inhmin sai le khamphulua baitiam khat le chol pol loi baitiam irphân inkhat kha la sa a ta, Nazarit mi kuta khan pe a ti.
Khanchu ochaiin ngaihoi thilinhlanna hrangin
Hihai hi a ni, Nazarit chonginkung dânhai chu, khannisian Nazarit mi’n a chonginkungna a innang khêla, thil dang inhlan sa a nuamin chu, a chonginkunghai kha irkiptir ngêt a ti.
Arona le a nâipasalhai kuang, hi thu hmang hin Israel irchihai chu sat ni ivur hrang a ni:
nangni donsui mai ri se;
nangni inren mai ri se.
lungirngamna nangni pe ri se,
tiin hril roh.
Khanchu
Khanchu Mosia khan Biakbuk kha an dingtir zoiin chu, Biakbuk le a neinunhai chu maichâm le neinun danghai kha hriak a nâla, a’rthiangtirhai ni khan.
Israel panam laia hruaitu, irtepna sinthoa hruaituhai ngêt khan,
kuang an thilinhlanhai an hong chôia; tâli kiruk, hruaitu inhniin tâli, a chung om inkhat le sehrâtchal sômhleihni, hruaitu murdi’n inkha khat an inhlana, an inhlan zoiin chu,
Mosia a chongpuia,
a kuang, “Hi thilpêkhai hi Biakbuk sinna hrangin lei pom pehai ro, Levi irchihai kuang, an sintum chit pehai ving ro,” a ti pea.
Khanchu Mosia’n, tâli le sehrâtchalhai kha a lâka, Levi irchihai kuang a pêkhai tâka.
Gersona irchihai kuang tâli inhni le sehrâtchal minli a pêkhaia.
Meraria irchihai kuang tâli minli le sehrâtchal kiriat a pêkhaia, khanchu sin murdi kha Arona nâipa Ithamara enkolna hnuaia tho ni a ti.
Khannisian Kohatha irchihai kha chu Mosia’n pehai ma, an sintum chu thil irthiang an dârsuama irzôn kha a ni sikin.
Khan hruaituhai khom khan maichâm inhlan irthianga a om nî khan, thilinhlanhai an hong chôia; khanchu an thilpêkhai kha maichâma khan an siaa.
Mosia kuang, “Sûn sôm hleihni sûng chu hruaituhai khan a nî tin an laia inkhatin thilpêkhai chu maichâm inhlanna hrangin an inhlan hrang a ni,” a tia.
Sûn khat nia thilinhlan hrangtu chu Juda irchia mi Aminadaba nâipa Nasona a ni;
a thilinhlan chu sumtak khêng khat, a rik lam chu sekel irzakhat sômthum, hmun irthianga sekel sômsari irangpui anga rik tâbor bôm khat fâk thei thilinhlan hranga hriak pol sai baidi sip khak khak;
sekel sômkhat anga rik, mirimhoia sip rângachak khethûk inkhat;
pum hâlirvôm thilinhlan hranga sehrâtchal tuai inkhat, belrachal inkhat, belrate a chal kum khat mi inkhat;
sual irbôlna hranga kêlchal inkhat;

khanchu irngeina irbôlna hranga thilinhlan sehrâtchal inhni, belrachal ringa, kêlchal ringa, belrate inhni, belrachal ringa, kêlchal ringa, belrate a chal kum khata mi ringa, hi hi Aminadaba nâipa Nasona thilinhlanhai chu a ni.
A sûn inhni sûng chu Isakara hai hruaitu Zuara nâipa Nethanela’n an hlana;

a thilinhlan hrang chu sumtak khêng khat, a rik lam chu sekel irzakhat sômthum, hmun irthianga sekel sômsari irangpuia rik sumtak tom khat, fâk thei thilinhlan hrang hriak pol sai baidi sip mat mat ni a ti.
Sekel sômkhat dôra rik mirimhoia sip rângachak khethûk khat,
pum hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrangin sehrâtchal tuai inkhat, belrachal inkhat, belrate a chal kum khat mi inkhat;
sual irbôlna hrangin kêlchal inkhat;
irngeina irbôlna thilinhlan hrangin sehrâtchal inhni, belrachal ringa, kêlchal ringa, belrate a chal kum khata mi ringa an hlana. Hihai hi Zuara nâipa Nethanela thilinhlanhai chu a ni.
Khan sûn thum ni chu Zebulun irchia hruaitu Helona nâipa Eliaba’n an hlana;

a thil inhlan chu sumtak khêng khat, a rik lam chu sekel irzakhat sômthum, hmun irthianga sekel sômsari irangpui dôra rik sumtak tom khat, fâk thei thilinhlan hriak pol sai baidi sip mamat ni sa a ti.
Sekel sômkhat dôra rik mirimhoia sip rângachak khethûk khat;
pum hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrangin sehrâtchal tuai inkhat, belrachal inkhat, bêlrate a chal kum khata mi inkhat;
sual irbôlna hrang kêlchal inkhat;
irngeina irbôlna hranga thilinhlan, sehrâtchal inhni, belrachal ringa, belrate a chal kum khata mi ringa a ni. Hi hi Helona nâipa Eliaba thilinhlanhai chu an ni.
Sûn minli ni chu Reubena irchia hruaitu Sedeura nâipa Elizura’n an hlana.
A thil inhlan chu sumtak khêng khat, a rik lam chu sekel irzakhat sômthum, hmun irthianga sekel sômsari irangpui tâbor inkhat, fâk thei thilinhlan hranga hriak pol sai baidi sip mamat ni a ti.
Sekel sôm irangpuia rik mirimhoia sip rângachak khethûk khat;
pum hâlirvôm thil inhlan hrangin sehrâtchal tuai inkhat, belrachal inkhat, belrate a chal kum khata mi inkhat.
Sual irbôlna hrangin kêlchal inkhat, irngeina irbôlna hrangin sehrâtchal inhni;
belrachal ringa, kêlchal ringa, belrate a chal kum khat mi ringa a ni. Hi hi Sedeura nâipa Elizura thilinhlanhai chu a ni.
Sûn ringa nî chu Simeona irchi Zurisadaia nâipa Selumiela’n an hlana;
a thil inhlanhai chu tangkarua khêng khat, hmun irthianga sekel sômsari irangpuia rik, tâbor inkhat hriak pol sai baidi sip ni a ti.
Sekel sômkhata rik mirimhoia sip rângachak khethûk khat;
pum hâlirvôm thil inhlanna hrangin sehrâtchal tuai inkhat, belrachal inkhat, belrate kum khata mi inkhat;
sual irbôlna hranga kêlchal inkhat;
irngeina irbôlna hranga thilinhlan sehrâtchal inhni, belrachal ringa, belrate a chal kum khata mi ringa a ni. Hi hi Zurisadaia nâipa Selumiela thilinhlanhai chu an ni.
Sûn ruk nia chu Gada irchia an hruaitu Deuela nâipa Eliasafa’n an hlana.
A thil inhlan chu tangkarua tâbor inkhat, a rik lam chu sekel irzakhat sômthum, hmun irthianga sekel sômsari irangpui sumtak tom khat, fâk thei thilinhlan hranga hriak pol sai baidi sip ni a ti.
Sekel sôm irangpuia rik mirimhoia sip rângachak khethûk khat;
pum hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrangin sehrâtchal tuai inkhat, belrachal inkhat, belrate a chal kum khat mi inkhat;
sual irbôlna inhlan hrangin kêlchal inkhat,
irngeina irbôlna hrangin sehrâtchal tuai inhni belrachal ringa, kêlchal ringa, belrate a chal kum khata mi ringa an ni. Hi hi Deuela nâipa Eliasafa thilinhlan chu a ni.
Sûn sari nî chu Efraima irchihai hruaitu Amihuda nâipa Eliasama’n an hlana;

a thil inhlan chu tangkarua tâbor inkhat, a rik lam chu sekel irzakhat sômthum, hmun irthiang sekel sômsari dôra rik tangkarua tâbor khat, fâk thei thilinhlan hranga hriak pol sai baidi sip ving ni a ti.
Sekel sôm irangpuia rik mirimhoia sip rângachak khethûk khat;
pum hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrangin sehrâtchal tuai inkhat, belrachal inkhat, belrate kum khat mi inkhat
sual irbôlna hrangin kêlchal inkhat;
irngeina irbôlna hrangin sehrâtchal inhni, belrachal ringa, kêlchal ringa, belrate a chal kum khat mi ringa a ni.
Sûn riat nî chu Manasea irchia an hruaitu Pedazura nâipa Gamaliela kha an inthanga;
a thilinhlanhai chu sumtak khêng khat, a rik lam chu sekel irzakhat sômthum, hmun irthianga sekel sômsari irangpuia rik sumtak tom khat, fâk thei thilinhlan hranga hriak pol sai baidia sip ni a ti.
Sekel sôm irangpuia rik mirimhoia sip rângachak khethûk khat;
pum hâlirvôm thilinhlan sehrâtchal tuai inkhat belrachal inkhat, belrate a chal kum khat mi inkhat;
sual irbôlna hranga kêlchal inkhat;
irngeina irbôlna hranga thilinhlan sehrâtchal inhni, belrachal ringa, kêlchal ringa, belrate a chal ringa a ni. Hi hi Pedazura nâipa Gamaliela thilinhlan chu a ni.
Sûn kuak ni chu Benjamina irchia Gideona nâipa Abidana’n a inhlan a ni.
A thil inhlanhai chu sumtak khêng khat, a rik lam chu sekel irzakhat sômthum, sumtak sekel sômsari irangpui tom khat, fâk thei thilinhlan hriak pol sai baidia sip ni a ti.
Sekel sôm irangpuia rik mirimhoia sip rângachak khethûk khat;
pum hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrangin sehrâtchal tuai inkhat, belrachal inkhat, belrate a chal kum khata mi inkhat.
Sual irbôlna hrangin kêlchal inkhat;
irngeina sual irbôlna hrangin sehrâtchal inhni, belrachal ringa, kêlchal ringa, belrate a chal kum khat mi ringa a ni. Hi hi Gideona nâipa Abidana thilinhlan chu a ni.
Sûn sôm nî chu Dan irchia mi Amisadaia nâipa Ahiezera’n an hlana;
a thil inhlan chu tangkarua khêng khat, a rik lam chu sekel irzakhat sômthum, hmun irthiang sekel sômsari irangpuia rik tangkarua tâbor khat, fâk thei thilinhlan hriak pol sai baidia sip ni a ti.
Sekel sôm irangpuia rik mirimhoia sip rângachak khethûk khat,
pum hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrang sehrâtchal tuai inkhat, belrachal inkhat, belrate kum khat mi inkhat,
sual irbôlna hrangin kêlchal inkhat.
Irngeina irbôlna hrangin sehrâtchal inhni, belrachal ringa, kêlchal ringa, belrate a chal ringa a ni. Hihai hi Amisadaia nâipa Ahiezera thilinhlan chu a ni.
Sûn sômhleikhat nia chu Asera irchia hruaitu Okrana nâipa Pagiela’n an hlana,
a thil inhlan chu tangkarua khêng khat, a rik lam chu sekel irzakhat sômthum, hmun irthianga sekel sômsari irangpui tangkarua tâbor khat, fâk thei thilinhlan hriak pol sai baidia sip a ni.
Sekel sôm irangpuia rik rângachaka khethûk khat;
pum hâlirvôm thilinhlanna sehrâtchal tuai inkhat, belrachal inkhat, belrate a chal kum khat mi inkhat;
sual irbôlna hrangin kêlchal inkhat;
irngeina thil irbôlna hranga inhlan chu sehrâtchal inhni, belrachal ringa, belrate ringa kêlchal ringa a ni. Hi hi Okrana nâipa Pagiela thilinhlan chu a ni.
Sûn sômhleihni nia chu Naftalia irchia hruaitu Enana nâipa Ahira’n an hlana.

A thil inhlanhai chu tangkarua khêng khat, a rik lam chu sekel irzakhat sômthum, hmun irthianga sekel sômsari irangpuia rik tangkarua tâbor khat, fâk thei thilinhlana hriak pol sai baidia sip ni a ti.
Sekel sôm irangpuia rik mirimhoia sip rângachak khethûk khat;
pum hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrangin sehrâtchal tuai inkhat, belrachal inkhat, belrate kum khat mi a chal inkhat;
sual irbôlna hrangin kêlchal inkhat;
irngeina irbôlna hrangin sehrâtchal inhni, belrachal ringa, kêlchal ringa, belrate a chal ringa a ni. Hi hi Enana nâipa Ahira thilinhlanhai chu a ni.
Khanchu maichâm sahriak nâl nia Israel hruaitu thilinhlanhai chu tangkarua khêng sômhleihni, tangkarua leh irpol tom sômhleihni, rângachak khethûk sômhleihni;
tangkarua khênghai chu sekel irzakhat le sômthum irangpuia rik inzen a ni; tangkarua bêlbûrhai chu hmun irthianga sekel sânghni le irzaminli irangpuia rik a ni.
Mirimhoia sip rângachak khethûk sômhleihni chu hmun irthianga sekel sôm irangpuia rik inzen an ni; rângachak khethûk murdi chu sekel irzakhat le sômhni irangpuia rik a ni.
Pum hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrang sehrâtchal murdi chu sômhleihni an ni; belrachal sômhleihni, belrate a chal sômhleihni, fâk thei thil inhlan le; khan sual irbôlna hrangin kêlchal sômhleihni.
Irngeina irbôlna hrangin sehrâtchal sômhni minli, belrachal sômruk, kêlchal sômruk le belrate a chal kum khat mi sômruk an ni. Hi hi hriak nâl hnunga maichâma inhlan zoia thilinhlanhai chu a ni.

Khanchu irtongna puan ina, ama biak hrangin Mosia kha a lûtin chu, Thuthung Bôm chunga za’rngaina toihmun chung tiang cherub inhnihai kâr taka irthokin ama hong chongpuiin irhâi hi an hriata, irhâi khan a chongpui tâka.
“Arona inhrilin lân, a kuang, meiser sarihai kha a siana hmuna an sia tika, kha meiser khan a maton tiang a i-êl hrang a nih ti ro,” tiin.
Arona’n khaang khan a thoa;
Hi meiser siana hi
“Levi mihai kha Israel irchihai lai ata kha a bingin sehaiin lân, thâr irthianghai roh.
Anni kha hiang hin thârhai ro; irthârna tui inthekkhumhaiin lân, an pumpuia irvo infâi hrangin le an puanhai sôp infâi hrangin hrilhai roh. Khanchu Pathian dân angin irthiang an ti.
Khanchu sehrâtchal tuai inkhat le buhûm thilinhlan hriaka pol baidi indi tak leh inlatirhai ni ta; khabana sehrâtchal inkhat sual irbôlna hrangin ni ilâk sa hrang a ni.
Khanchu Israel irchihai kha bukhai ni ta. Levi irchihai chu irtongna Biakbuk mân tiang khan hruaihai roh.
Khanchu Israelhai khan Levi irchihai chunga an kut irnghat an ta,
khanchu Israelhai khan Levi mihai kha

Khanchu Levi irchihaiin sehrâtchalhai lua khan an kut irnghat an ta; Levi irchihai ta hrangin chu irngeina an siam theina hrangin, inkhat chu sual irbôlna hrangin, inkhat dang chu pum hâlirvôm thilinhlanna hrangin
“Levi irchihai kha Arona le a nâipasalhai makunga inomtirhai ni ta;
Khaang khan Israel irchihai lai ata kha Levi irchihai kha zêkhaiin lân, khanchu Levi irchihai kha keima ta ni an ti.
Kha hnung chu Levi irchihai kha irtongna Biakbuka khan Pathian sintho hrangin lût an ta, nangin anni kha thâr irthianghai ni ta, ngaihoi thilinhlan angin ni inhlanhai hrang a ni.
Israel irchi nâilutîrhai irthûla keima dongtum an ni sikin.
Mihriam khom ni sian, sa khom ni sian, Israel irchihai laia nâilutîrhai chu ki ta an nia, Aigupta rama nâilutîr ki that lai khan anni hi chu keima dongtum hrang piala ki isiahai tâk kêng.
Khasikin Israel irchia nâilutîr murdihai irthûlin Levi irchihai chu ki ilâk tâk a ni.

Khasikin Israel irchihai irthûlin anni chu irtongna Biakbuka sintho hrang le Israel irchihaiin hmun irthianga an hong nâi khoma, anni laia hri a lêng loina hrangin hrungin Israel irchihai rengata Levi mihai hi Arona le a nâipasalhai ki ipêk a ni,” tiin.
Khanchu
