Khanchu, nin pi le puhai omna ngai ram kha dong nôk nin ta, nin irchibulhai nêk khan hong tam nin ta, hong irchong nôk ual sa nin ti.
nin Pathian khan nin irchihai leh thu zôm theina milung nangni pe a ta; khanchu, ama kha a sân lungthung nin ta, kha rama khan nin iom mai thei hrang a ni.
Hi khuasâl murdi hi nin râl, nangni khôkmâktu le dengintheitirtuhai hi nangni indongtir a ta;
a thu zôm ta nin ta, a vuana thu nangni ki ipêk murdi hi zôm ta nin ti.

khan nin thil thôna kipa hlo nangni inchuktir a ta, nâi le te nei intam nin ta, nin sâ vâihai pung tûr tûr a ta, nin loihai kha inlâp tak tak a ti. Nin pi le puhai irhniangtir, a irzuk angin nangni khom nangni irhniangtir irzuk a ti.
A thu rêk chu nin izôm khak hrang a ni, a dân bua chuang thu’nkung le thupêk murdi kha nin izôm zit hrang a ni. Thudik takin ama tiang nin irhei hrang a ni.
A vuana thu nangni ki ipêk hi nin ta hrangin zôm intak ta hrai ni no nia, inhriat phâk loi hrang ni ual hliak ma.
‘A thu ei inhriata, ei zôm hrangin tu mo irvâna hong kâia ni zuang lâk pe hrang?’ tho hrangin irvâna om pat ni ma.
‘Ei inhriata ei zôm hrangin tu mo tuikhanglian râla fea ni hong lâk pe hrang?’ ti hranga tuikhanglian râl daiha om ni ual hliak ma.
Hi hin, ni kôla hin a om mai hi te, nin hriat tâka, an sîr khom nin sîr nin sîr mai kha te; zôm chian ro.
A vuan hin imo nin thang nuam, thil sa mo, saloi, hring mo, thi, inthang ro.
nin Pathian thupêk a vuana nangni ki ihril hi nin zôma, ama kha lung nin thunga, a thu nin irngaia, a dânhai nin zômin chu irhniang nin ta, nam roiinpui tak hong ni nin ti.
A thu nin zôm nuam noa, nin irngai nuam noa, pathian danghai nin biak likin chu,
nangni ki hril infel, irhmang ngêt nin ta; Jordan râl, nin ilua hrang rama khan dam insôt no chin ni.

A vuan hin inthang roi, hringna mo nin nuam thina, Pathian satvurna dong mo khosâl tongna, a kho tak mo nin inthang thu’nhretua irnêng le irvân ki ikoi a ni. Nangni le nin irchihai an dam mai theina hrangin hringna inthang roi.
Mosia khan Israel mihai kuang thu an sîr thiaia;
“Kum irzakhat sômhnia ulian ki ni tâka, nuam nuama suak lik thei khom ni ta ma ung;
nin Pathian khan nin maton hruai mai a ta, khataka nam omhai kha nangni thatpai pe a ti; nin iluapai pehai hrang a ni;
khan anni kha nangni pe a ta, thu nangni ki ipêk ang takin nin isoisak hrang a ni.
Milung inngar unglân, pût si sit roi; ama,
Josua kha Mosia’n a koia, Israel mi murdi inhriata, ‘Ni milung inngarin lân, a sân chang ngit ro, an pahai kuanga pêk
Ama ngei,
Mosia khan hi Pathian Dân hi lekhabua a irziak, Levia irchi, Thuthung Bôm irzôntu ochaihai kha pe a ti, Israel ulianhai khom a pêka,
Mosia khan an kuang, ‘Kum sari mong ten, lâkai intâng ngaidam zoro inkung kuma kairêng kût laiin,
nin Pathian hmun inkunga Israelhai kha a makunga an hong inlang hrang a ni.
Mipui bukkhôm unglân,
Khaang khan
kha Irtongna puan ina khan sûm indingin hong inlang a ta, puan in mikota khan sûm kha an ding nguta.

khan Mosia kuang, ‘Irngai ta, ni pi le puhai kuang zâl lat hrang ni ni ta; hi mihai hin ni thi tika chu ni uiresan an ta, thu ki irthungpuihai kha tho’nchâi an ta, ni rotsan an ta; an va lêngna hranga lei om nam danghai pathian kha ni biaksan an ti.
An chunga ki ninginmur a ta, rotsanhai ki ta, siat zit an ti. thil saloi tak tong an ta; kei an Pathianin ki ompui ta no sikin hi thil hi an ituang a nih ti inhria an ti.
Thil saloi tak an thoa, Pathian dang an biak tâk sikin anni ata ki hmêl ki ithup pat hrang a ni.
‘Khasikin, hi hla hi irziak suakin lân, Israel mihai kha irchutir ro; an chunga ki milung hoiloizia an inhriatna hrang ni a ti.

An irchibulhai kuanga pêk ki inkung, khuaihlutui le dûttui luangna rama khan nangni hruai intung ngêt ki ti. Nuam dôr fâk hrang nei mai an ta, mar lu lul an ta, pathian danghai tiang irheiin chubai mûk ual ta an ta; ni hnuaisia’n ki thuthunghai kha tho’nchâi an ti.

Thil irkhêltak takin a dehai hnunga khom hi hla hi an nâihai khomin lan sîr thei mai an ta, an sualzia inhriattir a ti. Atûn ata hi, pêk ki inkung rama ki hruai intung mâka khom hin an lungrîl irput dân kha kin hriat mai kha te,’ a tia.
Kha nikhua ngeia khan Mosia khan hla kha a’rziak suaka, Israelhai kha a’rchutir ngut ngut tâka.
Mosia khan Pathian Dân kha lekhabua irkip takin a’rziaka.
A’rziak zoi tika chu
‘Hi Dân bu hi la unglân,
Nin ihnangzia le nin tukullianzia kin hriat, kei ki la dam lai ngêta khom
Nin ulianhai le nin hruaituhai kha hong pungkhômhai sian hihai hi lei hril ki ti; irnêng le irvâna ki thu inhretu hrangin nangni ki ikoi a ni.
Ki thi hnunga chu a sân siat zoi nin ta, ki thu nangni irchutir kha zôm nuam no chin ni. Inhnung tena len vâng chu
Mosia khan hi hla hi a hril suaka, Israel mi murdi’n an irngai mur tâka.
Irnêng le irvânhaio, ki thu hi nin mikuar sung unglân,
ki thu hi irngaitua roi.
Ki’rchutirna hi rua angin tho a ta,
ki thu hi irdo angin tâ a ti.
Hloisûl irnoi chunga rua ang le sûlhnâ chunga rua tui angin:
Kin Pathian kha chôiindôm roi.
Itinrêng sataka thotu, lungpui a ni,
Dik takin roi a rêl ngai,
Pathian iamom le dik,
thil sa le dik tho ngaitu a ni.
Pualoina a inei ma ni?
Nei make, A nâihai kha kêng dem om chu,
Irlo beng ngarhai le ihnanghai kha.
Mi’nvêt le mi hnanghaio,
hiang hin mo
Nangni neitu nin pa a ni,
nangni a siama, nangni a inpuihlingtir a ni.
Tianlai kha ngaitua suak u ta,
Zoro liam pat tâkhai kha,
i thil mo tung nin pahai irdon unglân,
tianlai rêng thurchi nin ulianhai insîrtir u ta.
An chungtaka namhai ram a sema,
Mihai omna hrang an kung pe lai khan,
Pathian nâihai phâkin an ramri a khang pehaia.
Ramchâra an chaninvâi a hmua,
ram chôp phâivo saloi thônaa khan,
a’rhlikhûa, a sân nangni an dota,
a mit lailên angin nangni a enkola.
Irmupuiin a têhai vuang a irchuhai angin,
A mitha pharhai chunga inrîm hrang ite boiin a siahai ngaia;
khaangin,
nam dang pathian kop sa mahai.
Tâng rama an chuang suaktira,
rama thil mônghai kha an fâka,
lung hmuna khom an oliv a ra mer mura.
Dûttui an nei intama,
an sehrâthai le kêlhai khan an belrahai lak an thâi,
Basan ram belra le kêlchal ang,
bu tui tak le grep tui uain ni ina.
Israelhai kha an hong irchonga,
a sân an hong irhniang tâka,
an mar tel tul tâka,
Siamtu, an Pathian kha an rotsana,
saninhringtu, an lungpui kha an ngainêpa.
Millim an ibiak kha a khôkmâk tak taka,
thil porinche an ithohai khan a ning an murtira.
Pathian ni loi ramilhli an biaka,
an pahai inhriat ngai loi le chi ngailoi an biak tâka,
pathian thar lâm te tehai.
Anni neitu lungpui kha uksak mahai,
annihai siamtu Pathian kha an rotsana.
a nâi le tehai kha an thikpai ta.
‘Irbîksan ki ta, Itin mo an iom hrang thîr ki ta,
irlo ihnang tâk an ni.
Nâi sual tûngnaboi an ni.
pathian ni loi an biak tika ki ningmur an kêlsuaa,
an millimhai khan ki ning an inmurtira,
Irchia tep kâi loihai hmangin ki ninginmurtir an ta,
nam invêttak takhai khom hnarsa an ti.
Ki ninginmur chu mei angin chok a ta,
irnêng thil murdi kâng irhmang a ti.
rammual hnuaia zu tung a ta,
mualhai irzunghai khom zu fapai ving a ti.
Siatna chi tinrêng an chunga intungtir ki ta,
an chunga thal intha ki ti.
Phîngchâm inkhurin thi an ta,
hri irkhêltak tak irvei an ta.
Ram sahrânghaiin sê an ta,
irnêng pila mirûl tûr neihaiin inchuk an ti.
Tuala khandai tong an ta,
in sûnga khom thil irkhêltak tak,
dôngmate ruatharte,
vânglai that an ta,
nâipang khom tar khom hôi no nihai.
Tûte inhriat ta loi hrangin ki’rhmangtir chit hrang mani ki ti lik tâk a ni.
‘A mihai kha kin soisak ngheka,’ tiin.
Nin râlhai kha irsor an tih ti ki chitinrîm a ni,
A soisaktu chu keima ki ni lik tâk a ni.
Nam invêt tak kha an lei ni,
thil rêng rêng inhre thei mahai.
Vâr ualhai sian chu inhre thei an ti,
an om hrang dân thîr thei an ti.
An lungpui khan rotsan no sian,
An Pathian
inkhatin a sâng têlin an irzûl hrang ma ni?
Inhni vaiin a nuai têlin an ingam hrang mo?
An râlhai khomin an Pathian kha Israelhai Pathian nêkin chu a nêp ual ti an inhriat.
Sodom le Gomora anga sual,
an râlhai kha grep khâ, tûr nei ang hi an ni.
An uain khom kha mirûl tûr ang a ni,
mirûl inchuk anga ichiom a ni.
An râlhai thil tho
phubâ lâk zoro’nchum a zong,
an ke sir kha a’rdang tika phubâ la ki ta,
thuan ki ti, an siat zoro kha a hong nâi ta.
An chunga hong tung hrang kha tuang lat an ti.
a siahlohai dongtum siatzia hai,
mi ngar khom ngar loi khom a thi ban tômzia a hmuin inren nôk a ti.
A mihai kha ‘Nin pathian thilthothei,
nin iiam ngaihai kha khôn mo an iom?
An irbôlna thâi fâktu,
an iin hrang thilinhlan uain intuhai kha?
hong thoiin hong changpui sianlân chu,
nangni sûnghualtu hong ni ri se.
Keima vai hi Pathian kha ki ni,
om ta tak mahai pathian danghai,
ki thathaia, kin damtirhaia,
ki ta ni sutpai thei tûte om mahai.
Pathian hring ki ni hi,
bân pharin ki nuam le thu kin kung ngai.
Khandai intât inngaih ki ta, dik takin roirêl ki ti.
Ki râlhai chunga phuba la ki ta,
ni khôkmâktuhai chu hrem ki ti.
An thisen chu ki thala luang a ta,
ki khandaiin thisen insua a ta,
râl sam seitak takhai kha sâtpai a ta,
Namhaio,
anni thattuhai kha hrem thiai a ta,
a râlhai chunga phubâ la a ta,
a mihai sual a ngaidam ngai.
Mosia le Nuna nâipa Josua khan kha hla kha mipui inhriata insîr an ti.
Mosia’n hi thu hi Israel mihai kuang an sîr zoiin chu,
‘Hi ki thupêk murdi hi ngaitua sabak unglân, nin nâihaiin hi dân thuhai hi zôm hrangin irchutirhai roi.
Hi thu hi thu mai mai ni ma, hringna thu a ni, Jordan dung fe kâia nin va ilua hrang rama khan tho unglân, dam insôt ni ti,’ a tia.
Kha nikhuaa khan
“Moab ram, Jeriko dep, Abarim tânga Nebo tâng sîpa khan kâiin lân, an ram hranga Israelhai ki ipêk Kanaan ram kha thîrin lân;
Kha khan, thi ni ta, ni pi le puhai kuang fe ni ta; ni upa Arona, Peor tânga a mihai kuang hruai a ni ang khan.
Inzinna ramchâr, Masa-Kades tui hmuna khan Israelhai laia ki thu ni tho’nchâia, Israelhai makunga ni ni ichôiindôm loi a ni.
Khasika khan ram kha hlatak ata vaiin hmu thei ni ti; Israel mihai omna hranga ki ipêk ram kha sir no chi ni,” a tia.
Pathian mi Mosia khan a thi mân,
hiang satvurnahai hi Israel mihai ta hrangin a ngên pehaia.
Misa angin Edom rama a suak Paran tâng ata a mihai a zuang êl invâra,
Vântîrtôn sîngkhatin an zuia,
A chang tiang mei a chok luai luaia,
A tahai kha a enkola,
a ke hnung an zuia, a thupêkhai an dong.
Mosia’n Dân thu a ni pêka,
Jakoba irchihai irchon hlu tak kha.
nam hruaituhai le Israel pungkhômhai chunga khan an lala.
Reubena chungchâng hiang hin an sîr:
“Reubena kha dam mai sianlân,
a mihai kha a sân tôm khomhai sian,” a tia.
Juda chungthu insîrin;
“O
a urênghai vâr nôk ri sehai,
a râlhai doipui ro,” ti hi.
Levihai chungthu an sîra;
“Ni siahlo iamom Levia irchihai khan Urim le Thumim dônhai sian,
ni thu hril ngai ro,
Masa-ah khan ni fiaa, Meriba tuihaia nin ibei kha.
A nuhai, an pahai,
chunga an iamom nêkin,
ni chunga an iiamom ual a ni.
Ni thupêk an zôma,
ni thuthunga a iamom a ni.
Ni nâi, Jakoba irchi hai kha ni dân irchutir an ta,
ni maichâma mirimhoi hâl an ta,
Hâlirvôm thilinhlan hâl ngai an ti.
O
a thilthohai lei lôm roh.
A râlhai kha an irnak sâtpaiin lân,
a khôkmâktuhai kha ngîr suak no ri sehai,” a tia.
Benjamina irchihai chungchâng hiang hin an sîr:
a mithâ hnuaia lênga,
sûn sôtin enkol a ta,
a’rnâipui ngit ngai,” a tia.
Josefa irchihai chungchâng hiang hin an sîr:
“An ram kha
Irnêng sûngrîl ata tui leh satvur ri se.
An thei rahai khan misa hmu insa sianlân,
a zoro taka hmin mer mur ri se,
tâng an isong irhoitak tak le mualhai kha thei tui tak takin sip ri se.
An rama khan thil sa sip sianlân,
sûl buka thu’nsîrtu khan satvur ri se,
a satvurna kha Josefa lua hong vur sianlân.
a urênghai kaihruaitu a ni kêng.
Josefa chu sehrâtchal anga hrât a ni,
Sele irki anga irki sa a nei,
a’rkihai kha Manasea irchi sâng pâla Efraima irchi sîngkhat pâl an ni.
Nam dang sik a ta,
kôlkil dênin vôr indarh a ti,” a tia.
Zebulun le Isakara chungchâng thu hiang hin an sîr:
“Tuikhangliana bepâr,
Zebulun kha irhniang ri se,
Isakara khom in tiang a dongtum kha pungin sa ri se.
An tângrama om hrangin ram dang an koia,
kha khan irbôlna dikin irbôl an ti.
Tuikhanglian irchongna an irchôka,
a vakam chiaiphoia thil sa an bûma,” a tia.
Gada chungchâng thu hiang hin an sîr:
“Gada ram irzattu kha inpâk roi,
bân sê tana luvun hlîk hranga kâmkeibaknei irbîk ang hi a ni.
Ram satak an inthanga,
Israel hruaituhai an pungkhôma khan hruaitu dongtum an inchangtira,
Dana irchi chungchâng hiang hin an insîr: “Dana kha kâmkeibaknei tuai a ni,
Basan ram ata a lei zong suaka,” a tia.
Naftalia chungchâng hiang hin an sîr:
“Naftalia khan
irhniangin ditsakna a dong,
A ram khan dîl ata sim tiang a dên rakin an ramin a suna,” a tia.
Aseri chungchâng hiang hin an sîr:
“Nâi danghai nêkin Asera kha a râlvân a sa,
a urênghai ditsakna dong sianlân,
a ke kha hriaka inchie ri se.
Thîr le dârin an khua kha kal an ta,
Dam takin lêng mai ri se,” a tia.
Israelhaio, nin Pathian ang hi pathian dang om mahai,
Nangni changpui hrangin roiinpui taka sûm chunga chuangin irvân khi a’rfang tuai tuai.
Kumtuang Pathian kha nangni enkoltu a ni,
a bân hrât khan nangni a sûnghuala,
nin makunga râl an hnotsuaka,
“Inboipai zit roi,” a ti.
Jakoba irchi Israelhai kha lungthi takin an om tâka,
Bu le uain tamna rama an om tîr tîra,
Irvân irdo’rfîm infa inlianhai khan an iam.
O Israel, ni vânnei bâka,
Nangma ang hi tukhom om mahai,
Nang sûnghual hrang le inhnêtu ni ni theina hrangin ni râlhaiin lungkham an ngên tâka;
nangin sirpha ni ti.
Khan, Mosia kha Moab phâia irthokin Jeriko irdîna Nebo tâng, Pisga tâng sîpa khan a hong kâia.
Naftalia le Efraima ram murdi, Manasea le Juda ram murdi, a thang tiang tuikhanglian dênin;
Sim ram le Tûm khopui, Jeriko phâi irhôr, Zoar dênin.
Khan,
Khanchu,
Khan, Beth-peor irdîna Moab ram irhôra a phûma; khannisianlân, a thân kha atûn ten tukhomin inhre mahai.
Mosia kha a thi khan kum irzakhat le sômhni mi a nia; a mit zîng maka, a’rnak khom chuai mah.
Israel irchihai khan Mosia kha Moab phâia khan sûn sômthum an châ tâka; kha khan, Mosia sûnna chap nikhuahai kha a hong mong tâka.
Khan, Nuna nâipa Josua kha vârna irtha’n a sipa, Mosia khan a chunga a kut a’rnghat sikin; khan, Israel irchihai khan a thu an zôma,
Khataka irthoka khan Israelhai laia khan Mosia anga
Irsinsiana murdihai le, thilirkhêl murdihai, Faroa le a siahlohai murdi kuang le Aigupta ram murdia inentira,
kut hrât tak le ichiomtak taka Israel mi murdihai mithmua Mosia’n a itho anga tho om ta mahaia.
“Ki siahlo Mosia chu a thi tâka, Israel mi murdi hi Jordan dung irkânpui ro, ki ipêk hrang rama fe hrangin irsiam roh.
Mosia kuanga ki ihril tâk ang khan nin kezaphaa nin isir murdi chu, nangni pe zit ki ti.
Sim tiang ramkâr ata hmâr tiang Lebanon tâng; sak tiang Eufrates vadung ata nitâk tiang Hit mihai ram, Mediteranean tuipui dênin nin ram ni a ti.
Josua, ni dam sûngin tukhomin nang inhnê no nihai. Mosia kuanga ki iompui angin nang ompui mai ki ti, nang intha viat no ning.
Hâitakin irnak song ro; khanchu, an irchibulhai kuanga pêk ki inkung ram chu hruaitu changin lûtpuihai ni ti.
Hâitakin irnak song phot mai ro; Mosia’n ki dân a ihrilhai hi zôm zitin lân, inkhatte lua zôm loiin om no ro; khanchu lam tinrênga hlochuk ni ti.
Itiklai khomin ki dân bu sûnga thu irziakhai hi tep irnghil no ro, ni zôm zit theina hrangin a sûn a zânin irchu ngai ro; khanchu lam tinrênga hmangchangin hlochuk zêl ni ti.
Hâitakin irnak la roh ki iti kha inhriat mai ro, chi no’n lân, rot no ro; kei
Josua’n Israel mipui hruaituhai kuang,
“Riakbuk hmuna fe zit unglân, mihai kuanga, ‘Sûn thum sûngin,
Reubena namhai, Gada namhai le Manasea namhai zât chimriphai kuang Josua’n,
nin dôngmahai, nin nâihai, nin sa vâihai chu hi laia hin lei om an ta, nin laia râlthuam chôituhai hi tuidung lei kâi masa nin ta, nin urêng Israelhai hi nin ichangpuihai hrang a ni.
nin Pathianin nangni a pêk hrang ram, Jordan dung nitâk lam tiang chu an lua fela, Israel namhaiin an omna hrang chita hoi taka an om zoi tena vai kîr thei nin ti, Jordan nisua tianga ram,
Josua chu an sâma, “Ni nin hril la lamin tho kin ti, ni ni itîrna ti tiang fe zel kin ti.
Mosia chong kin izôm ngai angin ni chong khom zôm kin ti;
Ni thu hnôla, ni thupêk zôm nuam loi chu thatpai ni ri se. Hâitakin irnak song phot mai ro,” an tia.

Nuna nâipa Josua’n Sitim ram ata va envêl hrangin mi inhni a tîra, “Ram chu inrûkin va envêl u ta, Jeriko khua kha chu va en infel ual roi duah,” a tia. Khua an va tungin chu riak tumin notizuar Rahabi in an pana.
Jeriko rêngin, Israelhai itîr envêltuhai chu kha nî zâna khan an hong tung ti a lei inhriatin,
Rahabi kuang, “Ni ina hong tunghai kha ram envêl hranga hong an ni, hong hruaihai ro,” ti hrangin mi a tîra.
Kha nu khan mikhual inhnihai chu a hruaia, a thuphaia, “Mi inhni chu an hong tung ngeia, kho tianga mi mo an inih ti inhre viat ma ung.
Zân a zîng vâng vângin, kul mikot an khâr mân viat khan an suak nôk tâk a ni; kho tiang mo an ife hrang ti inhre ma ung; irzûlhai zel unglân, la zu chel irmanhai nin ti,” a tia.
Kha mihai kha in chunga a hruaihaia, Nâniang kung irbukkhômna kâra khan a thup inrûkhai a ni.
Rêngin mi a itîrhai chu Israelhai irzûl hrangin an intân suaka, kul mikotpui chu an khâr nôka, Jordan dung dênin an irzûlhaia.
An zâl mânin Rahabi chu in chunga a luia,
an kuang, “
Aigupta ram ata nin hong suak khan
Kha kha kin inhriatin kin rot zoia, nangni chi sikin mi tin mumal nei loiin kin om ta. Nin Pathian
Nin chunga sin sa ki itho ang takin, ki insûngkua chunga sin sa tho hrangin Pathian irhming sâmin chonginkung unglân, kha thil inhriatna hrangin irsinsiana ni pe roi duah.
Ka pahai, ka nuhai, ki nuchahai le ki urênghai, kin sûngkuain nin zôk unglân, ni that loi hrangin chonginkung roi duah,” a tia.
Kha mihai khan nupangnu kuang, “Kin hril tum hi kin ti no’n chu Pathianin kin hringna hi la ri se! kin hong lam hi tûte nin hril no’n chu, ram hi
Rahabi in hi khopui kulbang irnghata om a nia, tukver ata anni chu hruihrualin an thâkhaia.
Khan ama’n, “Tâng tiang nin fe no’n chu nin râlhaiin nangni hmu an ti, sûn thum irbîk unglân, nin râl nangni irzûltuhai an hong kîr nôk tika, nin nuam nuamna fe ta nin ti,” a tia.
Kha mihai khan, “Ni iti anga tho hrangin chonginkung kin ti, hiang hin ni ti no’n chu keini’n mophur no ni ung.
Irngai roh, hi ram kin hong lût tika, hi pat sen hi ni ni inthâkna tukvera khan khit ro. Ni pahai, ni nuhai, ni nuchahai le ni pa insûng mihai kha ni ina koikhômhaiin lân;
kholaia tukhom suak no ri sehai, a suak an omin an thisen mô chu anni’n pêl an ti.
Kin chong hi mi tukhom ni inhril hrang ni ma, nin hrilin chu keini khomin chong ni ni inkungtir ang kha ti no ni ung,” an tia.
Rahabi’n, “Nin thu ang khan ni ri se,” a tia. An fetirhaia, an suak tâka. Pat sen chu tukvera khan a khit tâka.
Tâng tianga khan an fea, sûn thum an irbîka. An râlhaiin sûn thum an hong zong vêla, aniachu hmu mahai.
Kha mi inhnihai kha tâng ram ata an suaka, tuidung an irkâna, Josua kuang an tunga, an thil va tok murdi chu an hrila.
Josua kuang khan, “
A tûka Josua le Israelhai chu zînga an thoia, Sitim zôl ata Jordan dung kôla an irsona, ivadung an irkân mânin an riaka.
Sûn thum pêna chu hruaituhaiin an riakna buk chu an irfanga,
Nin fena ngai loina hmuna fe hrang nin nia, an hnung nin izui zêl hrang a ni. Aniachu, thuthung bôm kha nâi hrai no roi, mêl khat vêl nin kâra irhla ni ri se,” an tia.
Josua’n mipuihai kuang, “Irthiang roi, nangtûk hin
Josua’n ochaihai kuang, “Thuthung Bôm chu irzôn unglân, fe masa roi,” a tia. Khanchu, Thuthung Bôm kha an irzôna, mipuihai matona fein mâ an hruai tâka.
Khan thuthung bôm irzôntu ochai chu Jordan vadung pang nin tungin chu ngîr mai ri sehai, tiin thu pe ro,” a tia.
Josua’n Israel mihai kuang, “Hong unglân,
Josua’n, “Pathian hring chu nin laia a oma, nin matona Kanaan mihai, Periz mihai, Girgas mihai, Amor mihai, Jebus mihai hi an hnotsuak ngêt hrang a nih ti inhre ngêt nin ti.
Jordan vadunga nangni hruaiin rammual pumpuia
Israel nam tin laia, mi sômkhat inhni inthang suak unglân,
rammual pumpui
Mipuihai chu Jordan tuidung kâi hrangin an puan in ata an suaka; thuthung bôm irzôntu ochaihai chu an fe masaa.
Kha lai khan bu ât zoro a nia, Jordan vadung lian lai a nia, a kuang kha tui a sip mata. Thuthung bôm irzôntuhaiin Jordan tuidung an va sirin chu,

sak tiang ata tui zuang luang chu a chata, a hnâr tianga Zarethan bul Adama khopui dênin tui chu irbukkhômin a’rngama. Araba tianga tuipui thia luang lût ngai chu a kanga, a chat zita; mipuihai chu Jeriko khua kôl irdîn taka khan an irkân kâi tâka.
Israel mihai chu an rêngin irnêng châra Jordan vadung chu an irkâna; thuthung bôm irzôntuhai chu li laia khan irnêng châra mipuihai kâi zoi mâka chu an indinga.
Nam pumpui Jordan dung an kâi zit hnunga chu
“Israel nam tin laia an inthangsuak mi sômkhat inhnihai khan,
Jordan dunga Ochaihai indingna tak ata lung sômkhat inhni, inkhat zêlin irputhai sianlân, a vuan zâna nin riakna hrang hmuna sia ri sehai,” a tia.
Josua’n nam tin ata Israel mihaiin an inthangsuak mi sômkhat inhni chu a koihaia,
an kuang, “
kha lung kha
Josua thu angin Israelhaiin an thoa,
Josua’n thuthung bôm irzôntuhai ngîrna Jordan vadung lai taka khan, lung sômkhat inhni a phun saa, kha kha atûn ten hin a la om mai.
Mosia’n Josua kuang thu a lei ipêk tâk murdi anga,
An kâi zit hnunga
Reubena namhai, Gada namhai le Manasea nam chimriphaiin râlthuam chôiin, Mosia kuanga thupêk ang khan, mipui matona mâ hruaiin an kâia.
kôla irdoi irsiam sai rêng mi sîng minli’n Jeriko kôl zôl an va tung tâka.
Kha laia khan Israel murdi mithmua
“Thuthung bôm irzôntu ochaihai kha Jordan vadung ata hong suak ri sehai,” a tia.
Josua’n ochaihai kuang, “Jordan dung ata kha hong suak roi,” a tia.
thuthung bôm irzôntuhai Jordan dung ata an hong suaka, ivadung pang an sirin chu Jordan tui chu a luang nôk zut zut tâka, matona ang dênin ivadung chu a sip nôk tâka.
Jordan tuidung chu tha khatna tarik sôm ni khan an irkân a ni. Jeriko sak tiang ramri kôl Gilgal-a omhmun an siam tâka.
Jordan dung ata an lung lâk sômkhat inhni Josua’n Gilgal-a khan a phuna.
Israel mihai kuang, “Nakana nin nâihaiin an pahai kuang, ‘Hi lunghai hi i thôna ma ni? tia an irdonhai tena,
‘Hi zoroa hin Israelhaiin irnêng châra Jordan tuidung an irkân a ni’ tiin nin irchihai chu lan hriattirhai nin ti.
Tuipui Sen kin irkân mâka tuipui a inchattir ang tak khan,
Hi thil sika hin mi tukhomin
Jordan dung nitâk tianga om, Amor rênghai murdi le Mediteranean tuipui panga om Kanaan rama rêng murdihaiin Israelhai Jordan dung an irkân sûng chu vadunga tui chu
Kha lai khan
Josua’n meilung chemte a siama, Israelhai chu Gebeat-ha-arat hmuna khan an ser a tan pehaia.
Josua’n an ser a tan nasan chu hi hi a ni: Aigupta ram ata suak pasal râlkâp mi murdihai chu ramkâra an thi zit tâka,
an suak phuta khan ser an tan zit a ni; lampuia an hong sûnga suakhai kha chu an ser la tan loi an ni.
Israel mihai chu ramchâra kum sômminli an invâia, Aigupta ram ata an hong suak ata râlkâp mihai chu an thi zit tâk a ni.
An irthûla, an nâihai a don inlianhaia, kha mihai kha a ni Josua’n ser a itan pehai chu a ni, lampuia an ser an tan no sikin.
Mipuihai murdi ser an tan hnunga an dam mâka chu an riakbuka an oma.
Josua kuang, “A vuan hin Aigupta mihaiin nangni an hmusitna kha kin boipai tâk,” a tia. Kha hmun kha atûn ten hin Gilgal an ti ta a ni.
Gilgal-a Israelhaiin riakbuk an khuara, Jeriko phâizôla khan, kha tha tarik sômkhat minli ni khan ferkân kût an hmanga.
Ferkân kût zoia sûna khan, kha rama barli inzêi inphuak, chol pol loi bai le changpêr an fâk sa tâka.
Kha rama bu an fâk ata chu mana khom tâk ta mah. Israelhaiin mana fâk hrang nei ta mahaia, kha nî kum ata chu Kanaan rama bu le bâl thar an fâk tâk a ni.
Josua chu Jeriko khua kôla a om laiin mi an envêla, mi inkhat, khandai chôi hi a matona a lei inding a hmua. Josua’n a va pana, “Keini tianga sipai mo ni inih kin râl mo ni ini?” a tia.
“Ni make,
sipaihai hruaitu’n Josua kuang, “Ni kekok kha khek ro, ni ngîrna kha hmun irthiang a ni,” a tia. Josua’n a kekok a khek tâka.
Israelhai lût thei loi hrangin Jeriko kul chu an khâr khaka; tûte suak thei mahai, tûte khom lût thei mahai.
Josua kuang, “Jeriko khua chu an rêng le a sipai hrât huaisenhai leh nang ki pêk tâk.
Nang le râlkâp mi murdi’n khopui hi a sûna voikhat hong vêl phot nin ta; khaang khan sûn ruk nin ivêl hrang a ni.
Sûn sari ni’n chu ochaihaiin belra chal irki bekul chôiin Thuthung Bôm irzôntuhai matona khan fe an ta, belra irki chu tum an ta, voisari an ivêl hrang a ni.
Khan bekul chu inring takin tum an ta, kha kha nin inhriat tika thei dôrin mipui murdi khêk sup sup unglân; kul chu chim rup a ti; khanchu sipaihai kha irdîn ngitin khopui chu lût thei an ti,” a tia.
Nuna nâipa Josua’n ochaihai chu a koia, “
Mipuihai kuang, “Fe unglân, khua chu vêl roi,
Josua’n mipuihai kuang thu a hril zoiin chu a iti ang khan an tia; bekul chôitu ochai sarihaiin bekul chu an tuma;
Bekul tumtu ochaihai matona râlthuam chôituhai an fea, Thuthung Bôm hnung tianga râlthuam chôituhaiin hnung tiang an hrunga. Bekul chu mong loiin an tum ngota.
Josua’n mipuihai kuang, “Khêk roi duah, ki ti tika thei dôrin nin ikhêk hrang a ni, ki ti mân chu nin ikhêk hrang ni ma,” a tia.
Thuthung Bôm irzôn pumin khua chu voikhat an vêla, an riakbuka an kîr nôka, zâna an riaka.
A tûka Josua chu zînga a thoia, ochaihaiin Thuthung Bôm chu an irzôn nôka.
Râlthuam chôiin malam an hruaia, ochai sari, bekul chôiin an zuia, bekul chu chumloi chatloiin an tuma; Thuthung Bôm irzôntuhai chu râlthuam chôihaiin an hong hrung thiaia.
A sûn hninaa khom khua chu voikhat an vêla, riakbuk tiang an kîr nôka. Khaang ngêt khan sûn ruk an vêla.
A sûn sari nî khan chu zînga a vâr tônin an thoia, an tho dân pangaiin khua chu an vêl nôka; kha ni khan chu voisari an vêl irkuala.
A voisari an vêlnaa ochaihaiin bekul an hong tumin chu Josua’n, “Khêk ta roi,
Hi khopui le a sûnga om murdi hi
Kha, thilser tak rêng rêng chu ite nin insiat hrang ni mah, inkhat khom nin ilâk hrang ni ma, nin lâkin chu Israelhai om khômna buka siatna irkhêltak a itung hrang a ni.
Sumru hai, rângachak hai, dâr hai leh thîrhai chu
Khanchu, ochaihaiin bekul chu intông nuai nuaiin an tuma, mihaiin kha kha an inhriatin chu an khêka, kul bang chu a chim tâka; an mâni mân tiang irdîn ngitin an lût ta sup supa, khua chu an lâk tâka.
Khua chu an insiat zita, a sûnga om nupang pasal, ulian nâipang, sehrât hai, belra hai, sakuartung hai le ileh khan khandaiin an sât thathai zita.
Ram envêltuhai kuang, Josua’n, “Notizuar ina fe unglân, kha nu kha a nei murdi le va hruai suak roi,” a tia.
Envêltu ruatharte, a ina tunghai khan Rahabi chu a pahai, a nuchahai leh a urêng irnaipui, a iompuihai leh a nei murdi leh ile an hruai suaka, Israel riakna hmuna khan an hruaia.
Khua leh a sûnga om murdi chu an hâl zita; sumruhai, rângachak hai, dâr bêlhai, thîrhai rêk chu
Jeriko envêl hranga Josua mi tîrhai a lei inzôkhai sikin, notizuar Rahabi chu a pa insûng mi le, a nei murdi le ileh Josua’n a sansuaka, Israel laia atûn ten hin a la ikop mai a ni.
Kha zoi chu Josua’n mipui chu hiang hin chong a bêhai tâka:
“Jeriko khua inding nôk tumtu chu
A lungphûm siamirfûk nôktu chu nâilutîr inchân sianlân,
A kul lampui siamtu chu a nâimitum inchân ri se,” a tia.
Israelhaiin thil ser tak kha ngaisak mahaia: Juda irchi Zera nâi, Karmia nâipa Akana’n thilser tak senkhat chu a va lâka, Israelhai chunga
Bethel sak tiang Bethavan kôla om Ai khua envêl hrangin Josua’n Jeriko ata mi a tîra. Anni chu an fea, Ai khua chu an envêla.
An hong kîr nôka, Josua kuang, “Mi murdi fea doi ual nang ma, mi sânghni sângthum vêl dôr fehai sian, Ai khua chu hong doi ri sehai, an tômte kêng; mi murdi fe nang no ni,” an tia.
Khanchu, mi sângthum vêlin an hong doia, khannisianlân Ai khua mihai doi ngam loiin an intân zoi tâka.
Ai khua mihaiin kul ata Sebarim dênin an irzûlhaia, an tânhai chu mi sômthum kiruk an thata. Israelhai milung chu a’rhniama, an chia an rot zit tâk.
Josua le Israel upahaiin an puan an inpot thêra,
Josua’n, ‘A poi okna,
O
Kanaan mihai le hi rama omhaiin an inhriatin ni’rhual an ta, ni that zit an ti! khanchu, a mihai khom hualsûng zoihai mah ni ti ngêt an ti,” a tia.
Israelhaiin thil an insual a ni hi te. Ki Thuthung zôm hranga ki iti kha an insiata, thilser khak ata lâk an nei, an inrûka, kha kha an ni huanga, an neinun kâra an thup inrûk nôka.
Khasika khan a ni Israelhai hin an râlhai an ingam loia, an intân irhmang a ni; khomâksâmna an idong a ni. Lâk loi hrang nin ilâk kha nin pai mâka chu, nin kuang om no ning.

Thoiin lân, mipuihai chu irthiangtirhai ro, an kuang, ‘Nangtûk hin irthiang infâi roi, Israelhai Pathianin hiang hin a ti, “Israelhaio, nin laia khomâksâm an iom a ni, kha nin lai ata nin thonpai no’n chu, nin râlhai doi ngam no chin ni.
Khasikin, zîng tiang a nam namin honghai sian,
Thilser khak lâktu chu ama leh a nei murdi le meiin hâl zit hrang a ni.
Josua chu zîng taka a thoia, a nam namin Israelhai chu an honga, Juda irchihai chu chel an ni tâka.
Juda irchi laia Zer chi chel an ni nôka, Zer-hai lai ata Zabdia insûngkua chel an ni nôka.
Kha mi insûnghai lai ata khan Karmia nâipa Akana, Zabdia tupa chu chel a ni tâka.
Josua’n Akana kuanga, “Ki nâipa, Israelhai Pathian
Akana’n Josua chu a sâma, “Israelhai Pathian

Ei thil man laia Babulon puan satak, sumru sekel irza vêla rik le sekel sômringa vêla rik rângachak le ileh ki hmua, a sân ki’rzuka, ki ilâk zel a ni ta. Ki puan in sûnga irnênga ki ithupinrûk a ni, a hnuai taka sumru chu ki sia,” a tia.
Josua’n mi a tîra, riakbuk puan ina an fea, a lei ithup inrûk ngei chu a nia, a hnuai taka sumru chu a lei oma.
Riakbuk puan in ata chu an lâka, Josua leh Israelhai makunga khan an hong chôia,
Josua le Israelhaiin Zera nâipa Akana chu puanhai, sumruhai, rângachakhai le a dôngma leh a nâihai, a sehrâthai, a sakuartung hai, a belrahai leh a nei murdihai le Akor irhôra an hruaia.
Josua’n, itho mo ni nin kamangtir bâka?
Lungin an dêng mur mura,

An khua le an rêng chu Jeriko khua le an rêng ni soisak ang khan soisakhai ro, atûn zoroa hin chu an belra le an sâhai chu mâni ta hrangin la nin ti. Khopui inrûka irdîp hrang a hnung tiang ata siahai ro,” a tia.
Ai khua doi hrangin Josua le a sipaihai chu an irsiama. Josua’n mi feltak tak sîngthum an thangsuaka, zâna an fetirhaia.
Josua’n, “Khua hnung tianga khan hla ok loiin irbi zêt roi, irning chakin om roi.
Ki mihai le khua chu matona ang khan va doi kin ta, ni doi hrangin anni khom hong suak an ta; matona ang khan intânpat kin ti,
khua ata hlataka an ni irzûl zoi tena, matona ang khan kin irzûlhai pat tâk mani ti an ti.
Nin irbukna hmun ata hong suak nin ta, khua chu nin ilâk hrang a ni. Nin Pathian
Khua nin lâk zoia chu
Josua’n anni chu an fetirhaia, Ai khua thang tiang Bethel le Ai khua kâra khan an oma, zâna Josua-hai chu an riakbuka an riaka.
Josua chu zîng taka a thoia, a mihai chu a koikhômhaia, Israel upahai le ileh Ai khua chu an pan tâka.
Khua lûtna kotsua tiang, hmâr tiang a sipaihai chu riakbuk an khuara, Ai khua le an kâra khan irhôr a oma.
Ai khua thang tiang, Bethel le an kâra inrûka lei irbîk hrangin mi sângringa a siaa.
A sipai irbukna hmunpui hmâr tiang ata Ai khua doi hrangin an irning chiana, khua thang tianga lei irbîkrûka lei irning chian khom an oma. Kha ni zân khan Josua chu irhôra khan a fea.

Ai khuaa rêngin a lei hmua, a mihai le zînga an thoia; Israelhai le an irdoina hmun Araba irhôra khan Israelhai doi hrangin an zu fe nôk tâka, an hnung tiang ata khopui doi hranga mi lei irbîk inrûk an om ti inhre mahai.
Josua le Israelhai chu ichiom ang takin ramkâr tiang panin an intân pata.
Ai khuaa mihai chu an ni irzûlhai hrangin an irkoi bûma, Josua chu an irzûla, khua chu an suaksan zit tâka.
Ai khua mi murdi’n Israelhai chu an irzûla, khua lei hrungtu mi inkhat lua om mahai, khua chu mâksanin irhonghlangin a oma.
Josua’n a ufei inlên leh khan Ai khua chu a inkhîka, khaanga a inkhîk lai tak khan lei inruangtuhai kha an irbîkna hmun ata an zuang suaka, khuaa an lûta, an lâk tâka; khua chu an hâl rip tâka.
Ai khua mihai chu an hnung tiang an irheia, an khua kâng meikhu ngut ngut kha an hmua, ramkâra intânhai khan an doi nôka, intânna hrang rêng rêng inhre ta mahai.
Josua le Israelhaiin an sipai lei irbîkrûkhai khan khua chu an lâka, an hâlna meikhu dût dût kha an hmu’n chu, an hong doihai nôka, Ai mihai chu an that tôlpaihai tâka.
Khua lâktuhai khan an hong doi nôka, Israelhaiin an kachêpa, tûte dama intân suak om loiin an that zit tâka.
Ai khuaa rêng kha chu a hringin an chela, Josua kuanga an hong hruaia.
Ai khua mi, Israel irzûltuhai kha ramchâra an lei thathai zita, an sât thathai hnunga chu Ai khuaa Israel mi murdi chu an fea, khataka mi murdi chu khandaiin an that zita.
Kha nia khan, Ai khuaa mi an thathai chu nupang pasal tepin mi sîngkhat le sânghni an kâi.
Ai khua mi an that zoi zit mâka chu Josua’n a ufei kha an lek maia.
Josua kuanga
Khan, Josua’n Ai khua chu a hâl insiat zita, atûn ten hin a ram a isiat zit a ni ta.

Josua’n Ai khuaa rêng chu khohloi dênin thinga an khâi thata, misa a tâkin chu Josua thupêk angin a ruak chu an kaisuma, khua kul mikot sîra khan an paia, lungin a ruak kha an irkhua, atûn ten hin kha kha a la om.
Khanchu, Josua’n Israelhai Pathian
Israelhai mithmu lai ngêta Josua’n Mosia dân chu lunga khan a’rziak suaka.

Israelhai laia an upahai, hruaituhai, roirêltuhai le an laia nam dang omhai le Levi irchi ochaihai irzôn, Thuthung Bôm tiang irheiin, kiang tiang kiang tianga an indinga. A chimripin Gerizim tâng tiang an mâsongin an ngîra, a chimripin Ebal tâng tiang an mâsongin an ngîra.
An inding infel zoiin chu, Dân bua thu murdi, satvurna thuhai, khomâksâmna hrang thuhai chu Josua’n a tep suak zita.
Israel mipuihai makunga, nupanghai, nâipanghai le an laia fe sa nam dang mihai makunga Mosia’n thupêk murdi chu a tep suak zita, tep irhmâi nei viat mah.

Jordan thang tianga tâng rama omhai, phâi rama omhai, le Mediteranean tuipui kôla Lebanon tâng dêna om Hit-hai rêng le, Amorhai rêng, Kanaan rêng, Periz-hai rêng, Hiv-hai rêng, Jebus-hai rênghaiin Israelhai hrâtzia an lei inhriata.
An irkoi khôma, Josua le Israelhai chu doi tumin roi an rêla.
Gibeon khuaa om Hiv mihaiin Jeriko le Ai khua Josua’n a lâk dân an inhriatin,
vârirlet takin an irsiam tâka. Palâi ang tak takin an irsiama, hmarsa milui tak hi sakuartung an inpêltira, an uain savun kok, milui takhai kha an irbel rup a nia,
kekok miluitak tak siat rep rup an irbuna, songkol miluitak tak an innghâka. An bufûn chôihai chu dâidupin an khirkhaka.
Israelhai riakbuk Gilgal-a khan Josua an hong pana, a kuang, “Ram hlatak rengata kin honga, irngeina thu siam ei ti duah,” an tia.
Israel mihaiin Hiv mihai kuang, “Hi lai vêla nâitaka mihai reng nin ang, itin mo irngeina thu nangni kin ithungpui thei hrang,” an tia.
Josua kuang, “Ni siahlo kin ni hi” an tia. Josua’n, “Tuhai mo nin ini? kho rengata hong mo nin ini?” a tia.
Khan, anni’n Josua kuang, “Ni siahlohai hi ram hlatak ata hong kin ni, ni Pathian
Jordan râla Amor rêng Sihona, Hesbon rêng chunga le Basan rêng Astarot khuaa Oga chunga a sinthohai kin lei inhriata.
Kin upahai le kin rama mihaiin, ‘Zâna riakna cholam bufûn chôi unglân, anni chu va hmu unglân, nin siahlo kin nia, irngeina thu ni thungpui roi, va ti roi, an ni tia.
Kin cholam bufûn chôihai hi, kin hong suak phuta khan chu a la lum hlianga, khannisian, atûn hin chu hei en u ta, a châr tâka, a ap zuak ta.
Kin savun kok tharhai khom a chet zoi tâka, kin songkolhai, kin kekokhai khom kin hong inzin sôt tâk sikin a ichet fer fur tâk a ni hi,” an tia.
Israel mihaiinan cholam bufûn chu an lei nêk pehaia. Khannisian,
Josua’n Gibeon mihai le ileh khan hmang hrangin irngeina thu a thungpuia, thathai loi hrangin chong an kunga, Israel mipui hruaituhai khom chong an inkung sa.
Irngeina thuthung an siam zoi sûn thum hnunga chu kha mihai kha an kôl vêla omhai an nih ti an inhriat tâka.
Khanchu, Israelhai chu an irsona, sûn thum an fea; kha mihai omna khua Gibeon hai, Kafira hai, Kiriath-jearim hai chu an va tunga.
Kha mihai kha Israel mihai le irlût irsuak irthiang ma, Israelhai Pathian
Hruaituhaiin mipuihai kuanga, “Israelhai Pathian
Chong kin lei inkung tâk sikin an hringna kin inzôk hrang a ni. khano’nchu, Pathian hremna kin ituang hrang a ni.
Inzôkhai unglân, kin thing pêl hrang le kin tui chôi hrangin an iom hrang a ni,” an tia.
Gibeon mihai chu Josua’n a koihaia, “Kin kôl vêl nâitaka om chakin, ram hlatak ata hong kin nih tiin itho sika mo nin ni ihuang?
Hianga nin ti sikin Pathian khomâksâm nin dong ta, Pathian ina tua hrang thing pêltu le tui chôitu hrangin siahlo nin ini mai hrang a ni,” a tia.
Josua chu an sâma, “
Atûn hin nin kuta om kin nia, sa nin iti lam ang takin ni ti ta roi,” an tia.
Josua’n hiang hin a ti tâka: anni chu a hrunghaia, Israelhai that hrang a khapa,
Suaka an changhaia, Israel mipuihai le

Kha lai khan Jerusalem khuaa rêng chu Adoni-zedeka a nia, Josua’n Ai khua a lâka, an siat chit thuhai, Jeriko le an rêng a ihrem ang khan Ai khua le an rêng a hrem ti thuhai a lei inhriata; Gibeon mihai khomin Israelhai leh irngeina thuthung an neia, an laia an kop sa ta tihai a lei inhriat sa nôka.
Khasikin, Jerusalem mihaiin a sân an chia; Gibeon khua len vâng chu rêng khua liantak rêng khopui ang a ni, Ai khua nêk khomin an tama, irdoi khom an thiam tak tak a ni.
Khasikin, Jerusalem rêng Adoni-zedeka’n Hebron rêng Hohama hai, Jarmut khuaa rêng Pirama hai, Lakis rêng Jafia hai, Eglon rêng Debira hai chu chong an thuana.
“Hong unglân, Gibeon mihai hi doi ei ti, Josua le Israelhai leh hin irngeina an lei isiam zêt tâk kêng,” a tia.
Amor mihai rêng ringa, Jerusalem rênghai, Hebron rênghai, Eglon rênghai chu an irruala, Gibeon khua chu an irhuala an doi tâka.

Gibeon mihaiin Gilgal-a Josua kuang mi an tîra, “Ni siahlo hi ni mâksan no ro, hong inrang latin lân, ni changpui ro, ni hong inzôk ro! tâng rama omhai Amor rênghaiin ni doi hrangin an irbukkhôm zita,” an tia.
Khanchu, Gilgal ata irdoi mi pasal hrâthai chu hruaiin an fe tâka.
Gilgal rengata zân sôtin Gibeon dênin an fea, Amor mihai chu irningloiin an zu doi thuta.
Amor mihai chu Israelhai mithmua khan
Amor mihai kha an intân laiin
“Misa, Gibeon khua chunga hin inding mai ro,
Tha nang khom Aijalon irhôra inding mai ro,”
a tia.

An râlhai chunga phuba an lâk mâka chu misa chu an ding maia, tha khom a omna khan a om ngita. Hi thu hi ‘Jasar lekhabu’ an itia khan a’rziak a ni. Vânlaizôla misa chu a ngîra, sûn khat reng chu ta loiin a om ngota.
Khaang taka mihriam chong
Kha zoi chu Josua le a sipaihai chu an riakbuk Gilgal-a an kîr nôk tâka.
Amor rêng ringahai kha an intâna, Makeda khura an irbîka.
Josua kuang, “Rêng ringahai kha kin hmu ta, Makeda khura an irbîk a ni,” an tia.
Josua’n, “Khur mikot chu lung lianpahai leh inhruk unglân, a nghâk hrangin mi senkhat sehai roi.
Nangni chu nin râlhai kha khêlhai unglân, an khua kula an intân lûtna hrang khâl khakhai roi,
Josua le Israelhaiin an râlhai chu an thata, an that infâi zit ang a ni, an ithat mihlia tômte chu an khua kulhaia khan an la lût irmana.
Josua riakbuk khuarna Makeda-a khan irtharngam takin hruaituhai chu an honga, Israelhai chu tûte’n a doi ngam zel om mahaia.
Josua’n, “Khur mikot kha inhong unglân, rêng ringa kha hong hruai suak u ta,” a tia.
Khanchu, Jerusalem rênghai, Hebron rênghai, Jarmut rênghai, Lakis rênghai le Eglon rênghai chu khur ata an hong hruai suakhaia.

Hi rêng ringahai hi Josua kuang an hong hruaiin chu Israel mihai chu a koi irbukhaia, a sipai hruaituhai kuang, “Hong unglân, hi rêng ringahai tukburung hi sirbê pehai roi,” a tia. An honga, an tukburung an sirbea.
Josua’n, chi viat no roi, rot khom rot no roi, hâitakin irnak song roi.
Kha zoia chu rênghai kha Josua’n a thathaia, thing panga an khâihaia; khohloi dênin an ruak chu an khâi ta.
Misa a tâkin chu an ruak kha an kaithâktirhaia, an lei irbîkna khura ngêt khan an paitirhaia, khur kotbâi chu lunglianpahai leh an inhruka, atûn ten hin a la om.
Kha nî khan Makeda khua chu Josua’n a doia, a lâka, an rêng khom a chela; kha khuaa om murdi chu a thathai zita, inkhat khom insua mah, Makeda rêng chu Jeriko rêng a ithat ang khan a thata.
Khan Josua chu Israelhai murdi le Makeda khua rengata Libna khua chu an doia:
khanchu
Libna khua ata Josua le Israelhai chu Lakis khuaa an fea, an irhuala, an doia.
Israelhai kuta Lakis khua chu
Gezer khuaa rêng Horama chu Lakis khua changpui hrangin a zuanga, Josua’n ama chu a sipaihai leh a lei inhnêa, inkhat lua irhmâiloiin a lei that zita.
Josua le Israelhai chu Lakis ata Eglon khuaa an fea, an irhuala an doia.
Kha nî sûn ngêta khan an lâka, kha nî khan mi om murdi an sât tôlhaia, Lakis khuaa deng an ithei ang tak khan deng an intheitirhaia.
Josua le Israelhai chu Eglon ata Hebron khuaa an fea, an beia.
Khua chu an lâka, khataka om murdi chu an rêng leh ile a sât thathaia, a kôlvêla khuaa omhai khom a sât thathaia. Eglon khuaa a itho ang khan Hebron khom an siat zita, tûte hring damin insua mah.
Josua le Israelhai chu an kîra, Debir khua an doia.
Khua chu an lâka, an rêng chu an chela; a kôlvêla khuahai khom an lâka. A sûnga om murdi chu a sât thathai zita, Josua’n Debir khua le an rêng chu Libna khua le an rêng chunga a itho ang khan a thoa.
Josua’n ram chu a lâk zit tâka, tâng ramhai, nisua tianga tâng dunghai, nitâk tianga phâizôlhai, thang tianga ramhai leh a lâka, an rênghai chu an hnê zita, tûte insua mah. Israelhai Pathian
Kades-barnea rengata Gaza kongkâr ram murdi, Gosen ram khom, Gibeon dênin Josua’n a lâka.
Kha rama rêng murdi leh an ram chu, Israelhai Pathian
Josua le Israelhai chu an riakbuk Gilgal-a khan an kîr nôk tâka.
Hi thu hi Hazor rêng Jabina’n a lei inhriatin Madon khuaa rêng Jobaba hai, Simrona khua rênghai, Aksaf khua rêng hai,
Hmâr tiang sim tianga rênghai, Galili dîl thang Araba khuaa rênghai, Mediteranean tuipui kôla Dor khua rêng hai,
Nisua tiang le nitâk tianga Kanaan rêng omhai, Amor mihai rêng, Hit mihai rêng, Periz mihai rêng, tâng rama Jebus mihai rêng, Mizpa ram Hermon tâng bula Hiv mihai rênghai chu an irbukkhôma.
An sipaihai leh ile an honga, tuipui kôla chiaiphoi dôrin an tama. Sakorhai, thîr sakorhai khom an hong chôi chita.
Hi rênghai hi an irkop irruala, Israelhai doi hrangin Merom vadung kôla riakbuk an khuara.
Josua le a ihruai ngai irdoi mihai chu an irsiama, Merom vadunga khan an va doihai thuta.
Israelhai kuta a pêka, an doia, an that zit zoi mâka chu Misrefotmaim le Sidon dênin an irzûla, nisua tianga Mizpa irhôr dênin an irzûlhai pata.
chong pêk angin Josua’n an sakorhai chu kholra’n a siahaia, an thîr sakorhai chu a hâla.
Josua chu a kîra, Hazor khua a lâka, an rêng chu a sât thata, (Kha laia khan Hazor khua hi kho lian ual tak a lei ni.)
Khuaa mi murdi chu a sât that zita; tûte damin insua mah. Hazor khua chu a hâla,
Josua’n hi khua murdi hi a lâk zita, an rênghai khom a chela,
Hazor khua, Josua ihâl ti no chu, Israelhaiin an khua insiata in la indinghai chu hâl mahai.
Hi khuaa an râllâk sumpuan le insûng sa chu Israelhaiin mâni ta angin an neia, mihriam rêk chu an sât that zita; an itho thei taphot chu a hringa an irhmâi tûte om mah.
A siahlo Mosia kuang
Josua’n ram murdi chu a lâka, Negeb le tâng ramhai, Gosen ram phâihai, tângdung phâituanhai, Jordan irhôrhai, Israel tâng ramhai, a vêl tâng bul phâituanhai a lâk zita.
A ram lâk sim tianga Helak tâng, Seir bul ata sak tiang Baalgad, Lebanon irhôr Hermon tâng bul a dêna; an rênghai chu an hnêa, a chela, a thata.
Josua le hi rêng murdihai hi zoro sôttak an irdoi a ni.
Gibeon khuaa om Hiv mihai ti no chu Israelhai leh irngeina siam inkhat lua om ma, ilâkin an lâk zit a ni.

Josua chu a fe zêla, tâng rama Hebron khuahai, Debir khuahai, Anab khua hai, milian Anak an ti la omhai chu a that zita. Judai le Israel tâng rama omhai khom, an rêngin an khuahai khom a hâl inram zita.
Israel mihai ram chu milian rêng om ta mahai, Gaza khua hai, Gath khua hai, Asdod khua hai vai an la om pher phora.
Mosia kuanga
Jordan nisua tiang Arnon vadung ata Hermon tâng dênin Jordan dung irhôr ramhai chu Israelhaiin an inhnêa, ram chu anni’n an neipai pehai ta.

Amor mi Hesbon rêng Sihona le Basan rêng Oga an inhnea. Sihona ramin Gilead ram chimrip a ihuap a ni; Arnon dung irhôr irkua Aroer khua le Arnon vadung kôla khua rengata Jabok vadung a dêna, kha kha Amon mihai leh an ramrina a ni.
An rama khan Jordan dung nisua tiang, Galili dîl ata thang tiang vadung phâi murdi, Beth-Jesimot, Tuipui Thi nisua tiang Pisga dênin a huap sa.
Basan rêng Oga chu milian, Refaim an ti, la dam omsun laia mi a ni, Astarot le Edrei khuaa rêng a ni.
A ramin Hermon tânghai, Seleka hai le Basan ram murdi, Gezer le Maaka ramri ten a huapa; Gilead ram chimrip le Hesbon rêng Sihona ramri dênin a huap sa.
Hi rêng inhnihai hi Mosia le Israelhaiin an inhnêa,

Sak tiang Baal-gad Lebanon irhôra om le thang tiang Seir tâng bula Halak tâng kâra ram murdi, Jordan dung nitâk tianga om le an rênghai chu Josua le Israelhaiin an inhnêa. Kha ramhai kha Josua’n Israel namhai kuanga kumtuanga an ram irchon hrangin a sema.

Hi ramhai ihuap chu: tâng ramhai, nitâk tianga tâng mualhai, Jordan vadung irhôrhai le a tâng phâizôlhai, kha ram nisua tianga tânghai le Negeb ramchâr hai. Kha rama lei omhai chu Hiv mihai le Jebus mihai an ni.
Israelhaiin rênghai an inhnêna khuahai chu hi hi an ni: Jeriko khua rêng, bethel khua kôla Ai khua rêng,
Jerusalem rêng, Hebron rêng;
Jarmuth rêng, Lakis rêng;
Eglon rêng, Gezer rêng;
Debir rêng, Geder rêng;
Horma rêng, Arad rêng;
Libna rêng, Adulam rêng;
Makeda rêng, Bethel rêng;
Tapua rêng, Hefer rêng;
Afek rêng, Saron rêng;
Madon rêng, Hazor rêng;
Simron-meron rêng, Aksaf rêng;
Taanak rêng, Megido rêng;
Kades rêng, Karmel tânga Jokneam rêng;
Mediteranean tuipui kôla Dor rêng, Gilgal-a Goim rêng le
Tirza rêng. An rêng that murdi chu anrêngin sômthum inkhat an ni.
Josua chu a ulian tâka, a tar ok tâka;
Filistia le Gesur-hai omna ramhai,

Sim tiang Avim-hai omnahai la lâkloi a ni. Aigupta ramri Sihor vadung ata hmâr tiang Ekron dênin Kanaan mihai rama irngai a ni. Filistia-hai chu Gaza haia, Asdod haia, Askelon haia, Gada haia an rêng an iom a ni.
Kanaan-hai ram le Sidon-hai ram Meara chu Amor ramri Afek dênin la lâk loi a ni.
Gebal mihai ram, Lebanon tâng nisua tiang Hermon tâng kôla Hamath khua lûtna dênin ram la lâk loi a ni.

Lebanon tâng le Misrefotmaim kâra tâng rama om murdi Sidon mihai chu, keima’n Israel mihai matona lei inhnotsuakhai zit ki ti, chong nangni ki pêk angin an ram irchon hrangin Israelhai chu pe phot mai roh.
Khasikin, atûn hin Israel nam kuakhai le Manasea irchi chimriphai kuanga, an ram irchon hrangin sem ro,” a tia.
Manasea irchi chimrip leh Reubena irchi le Gada irchihaiin Jordan nisua tianga an ram irchon hrang
Arnon dung irhôr sîra khua om Aroer rengata le, irhôr laitaka khopui le, Medeba phâi ram murdi Dibon dênin,
Amor mi, Hesbon khua rêng Sihona ram murdi Amonhai ramri dênin a huama.
Gilead ram huamin Gesur-hai le Maakat-hai omna leh, Hermon tâng le Basan rama Seleka a dêna.
Astarot le Edrei rêng Oga ram Basan hai a huama, ama chu Refaim la om sunhai laia mi a ni; Mosia khan khahai kha an hnêa, an hnotsuak zit a ni.
Aniachu, Gesur mihai le Maakat mihai chu Israelhaiin inhnotsuak mahai, atûn ten hin Israelhai laia an la om sa a ni.
Levi irchihai rêk chu an ram irchon pe sahai ma, Israelhai Pathian
Mosia’n Reubena irchihai chu an insûngkua kuaa irsem hrang ram a pêk a ni kha.
An ramri chu Arnon irhôr sîra om Aroer khuaa irthokin irhôr lai taka khopui le Medeba tâng inzôlhai,
Hesbon khua le a kôlvêl khuaa tâng zôla omhai, Dibon hai, Mamoth-baal hai, Beth-Baalmeon hai,
Jahaz le Kedemot hai Mefaat hai;
Kiriathaim, Sibma hai, Zereth-sahar, irhôr inzôla omhai;
Bethpeor hai, Pisga tâng panghai, Beth Jesimoth hai a huama.
Tâng zôla khua om murdi le Amor mi Hesbon rêng Sihona ram murdi a huam sa. Kha kha Mosia’n an hnêa, Midian hruaipu Evia hai, Rekema hai, Zura hai, Hura hai le Sihona hnuaia roirêltu an ni.
Israel mihaiin Beora nâipa Balaama, pânzia en thei an that sa.
Nitâk tianga an ramri chu Jordan vadung a ni. Reubena irchihai nei hrangin khi khopuihai an vêla khuahai khi an pêka.
Mosia’n Gada irchihai chu an insûngkua kuaa irsem hrangin an ram irchon hrang a pêka.
An ramin Jahaz le Gilead khopui murdi a huama, Amon-hai ram chimrip, Raba khua nisua tianga om Aroer a huam saa.
Hesbon le Ramat-mizpa le Betonim kâra ramhai, Mahanaim ata Lo-debar ramri inkârhai a huam sa.
Jordan vadung tiang chu Beth-Haran hai, Beth-Nimra hai, Sukothhai, Zafon hai le Hesbon rêng Sihona ram lei nihai ngai kha a huam tel sa. Nitâk tianga ramri chu Jordan dung, Galili dîl dênin a ni.
Gada irchihai nei hranga khi khopuihai le a vêla khuahai khi an pêka.
Mosia’n Manasea irchi chimriphai hranga an insûngkua kuaa irsem hrangin ram irchon an nei hrang a pêka.
An ramin Mahanaim ata Basan ram, Basan rêng Oga ram murdi a huama, Basan ram Jair bial khua sômruk khom a huam a ni.
Gilead bial chimrip, Astarot hai, Edrei hai, Oga ram Basan khopuihai chu a pêk bel sa. Manasea nâipa Makira irchihai kuanga khi ramhai khi a ipêk a ni.
Moab phâia an om lai khan, Jeriko nisua tianga ram chu khi ang khin Mosia’n a sema.
Mosia’n Levia irchihai chu ram inkung pehai mah. Israelhai Pathian
Jordan vadung nitâk tianga Kanaan ram chu Israel mihai kuanga ochai Eliazara hai Nuna nâipa Josua hai le Israel nam hruaituhaiin hi ang hin ram an sema.
Jordan nisuana tianga nam hni le a chimrip chu Mosia’n ram irchon hrang a pêk tâka, an laia Levi irchihai chu ram pehai mah.
Josefa irchihai kha nam hni, Manasea le Efraima nama irsen an nia, khannisian Levi irchihai chu ram irchon pehai mah. An omna khua rêk chu an sialhai le belra le kêl satna hrang ram chu a pêkhai.
Mosia kuanga

Gilgal-a an om laiin Juda irchi laia mi senkhat Josua kuanga an honga. An laia mi inkhat, Keniz mi, Jefunea nâipa Kaleba’n Josua kuang, “Kades-Barnea ei om laia Pathian mi Mosia kuanga, ei inhni chungchânga
siahlo Mosia’n Kades-barnea hmun ata ram va enirchik hranga mi a itîrhai khan kum sômminli ki ni tâka; khan ki lungrîla om ang tak kha a kuang intung nôk ki ti.
Ki chanpui, ki urênghaiin, mipui an zâmirzaltira, kei rêkin chu ki Pathian
Kin Pathian
Irngai ta, Mosia kuanga
Mosia’n a ni tîr lai ang tak khan a vuan sûn tena khom ki la hrât a ni. Irdoinaa khom fea, nuam nuama suak zêl theiin ki la ihrât a ni.
Khasikin, kei le ki ifepuihai leh ile chong kin hong intung laia
Josua’n ama chu sat a vura, Jefunea nâipa Kaleba chu ram irchon hrangin Hebron chu a pêk tâka.
Khanchu, Israelhai Pathian
Tianlai khan Hebron chu Kiriath-arba ti a ni ngai, Arba khua tihna a ni. Arba chu Anak mihai laia khan rêng roiinpui tak a nia. Ram chu hoi takin a om tâk.
Juda irchihai, an sûngkua kuain an irsem hrang ram tum, sim tiang mongna tianga Edom ram le Zin ramchâr a oma.
Sim tiang ramri chu Tuipui Thi sim tiang kil mongna tiang a’rphuta.
Khan, sim tiang panin Akrabim fena thang tiang a fe pata, Zin ramchâra a lûta, Kades-barnea sim tianga Hezrona dênin a fea, Adar-a khan a tungin a fea, Karka tianga a inhera,
Azmon-a a fe zêla, Aigupta ramri dunga a suna, ivadung chu zoiin Mediteranean tuipuia a zu irchuna. Hi hi Judai ram sim tianga ramri chu a ni.
Nisua tianga ramri chu Tuipui Thi a ni, Jordan dung sua thalin.
Hmâr tianga ramri chu Jordan dung tuisuaa a’rphuta, Beth Hogla-a a tungin a fea, Beth Araba hmâr tiang a fe pata, Bohana lunga a zu suna. Bohana hi Reubena nâipa a ni.
Akor irhôr ata Debir khuaa a tungin a fe zêla, khan ivadung sim tianga om Adumin-a fena tianga om Gilgal a dêna. En-semes tuikhura a fe zêla, En-rogela a fea.
Jebus-hai khua Jerusalem omna sim tianga irhôr, Hinom chu a dêna, ramri chu Hinom nitâk tiang panga irhôr bula om tâng sîpa a fea, kha kha Refaim hmâr tiang pang irhôr mongna tak a ni.
Neftoa tuikhura a fea, Efron tânga khuahaia khan a fe thala; Baala khua tiang a inhera; kha khua kha Kiriath-jearim khom an ti ngai.
Khan, ramri chu Baala rengata a fe irkuala, Seir tâng a dêna, Jearim tâng sak tiang panga a fea, Beth-semes-a a suaka, Timna a lôi pata,
Ekron khua hmâr tianga tâng dung a zuia, Sikeron tiang an infetira, Baala tâng khêlin Jamnia khua a dêna, kha rengata Mediteranean tuipuia a monga.
Tuipui liantak chu nitâk tianga an ramri a nia. Kha ramri sûng chu Juda irchihai omna hrang chu a ni.
Kaleba’n Anaka nâihai inthum Sesaia hai, Ahimana hai, Talmaia hai chu a’rzûl insuaka.
Tianlaia Kiriath-sefer an lei iti ngai Debir khua chu an hong doia.
Kaleba’n, “Kiriath-sefer hong doia inhnêtu chu ki nâinu Aksaii, hi a dôngma hrangin pe zel ki ti,” a tia.
Kaleba sangpa Kaneza nâipa, Othniela’n kha khua kha a lâka, Aksaii chu dôngma’n a nei tâka.
An irnei nî khan Othniela’n, Aksaii kha a pa kuang ram nghi hrangin an thêma. A sakuartung ata a chuma; Kaleba’n a kuang, ‘Imo ni inuam?’ a tia.
Khan ama’n, “Nin renin lân, ram ni ni ipêk hi ramchâr a nia, tui omna ni pe sa ro,” a tia. Khanchu, tui hnâr nei khoichung le tuihnâr nei khoihnuai chu a pêk tâka.
Juda irchihai nam an insûngkua kuaa, an irsem hrang ram dongtum chu hihai hi a ni.
Sim tianga a mongna tak, Edom ramri depna tiang ram an nâihai chu hi hi a ni: Kabzeel, Eder, Jagur,
Kina, Dimona, Adada,
Kedes, Hazor, Ithnan,
Zif, Telem, Bealot;
Hazor-Hadata, Kerioth-hezron, (Kha kha Hazor a ni.)
Amam, Sema, Molada;
Hazar Gada, Hesmona, Bethpelet;
Hazar-sual, Beerseba, Biziothia;
Baala, Iim, Ezem,
Eltolad, Kesil, Horma;
Ziklag, Madmana, Sansana,
Labaot, Silhim, Ain, Rimon, le an kôlvêla khuahai, anrêngin khopui sômhnikuak a ni.
Tâng kôla phâi rama khua omhai: Estaol, Zora, Asna,
Zanoa, Enganim, Tapua, Enam;
Jarmut, Adulam, Soko, Azeka;
Saaraim, Adithaim, Gedera, Gederothaim, le an kôlvêla khuahai leh khopui sômkhat minli a ni.
Hi khuahai khom hi a ni: Zenan, Hadasa, Migdalgad,
Dilean, Mizpa, Joktheel,
Lakis, Boskat, Eglon,
Kabon, Lahmam, Kitlis,
Gederot, Bethdagon, Naama, Makeda le an kôlvêla khuahai leh khopui sômkhat kiruk a ni.
Hi khuahai khom hi a kop: Libna, Ether, Asan,
Ifta, Asna, Nezib,
Keila, Akzib, Maresa, le an kôlvêla khuahai leh khopui kuak a ni.
Ekron khom a kôlvêla khuahai leh a kopa,
Asdod kôla khopui le a kôlvêla khuahai, Ekron le Mediteranean tuipui kâra khuahai khom a kop.
Asdod le Gaza, an kôlvêla khuahai le, Aigupta ramri vadung leh an kâra Mediteranean tuipui kôla khua omhai a kop sa.
Tâng rama hi khuahai hi a kop sa: Samir, Jatir, Soko,
Danna, Kiriath-sana, Debir ti a ni sa;
Anab, Estemoa, Anim,
Gosen, Holon, Gilo, le an kôlvêla khuahai leh khopui sari a ni.
Hi khuahai khom hi a kop: Arab, Duma, Esan,
Janim, Beth-Tapua, Afeka,
Humta, Hebron, Zior, an kôlvêla khuahai leh khopui kuak a ni.
Hi khuahai khom hi a kop: Maon, Karmel, Zip, Juta,
Jezreel, Jokdeam, Zanoa,
Kain, Gibea, Timna, an kôlvêla khuahai leh khopui sôm a ni.
Hi khuahai khom hi a kop: Halhul, Bethzur, Gedor,
Maarat, Bethanoth, Eltekon, an kôlvêla khuahai leh khopui kuak a ni.
Hi khuahai khom hi a kop: Kiriath-baal, Kiriath-jearim an ti sa, Raba, an kôlvêla khopui inhni a huap sa.
Ramchâra, hi khuahai hi a om: Beth-Araba, Midin, Sekaka,
Nibsan, michi khopui, Engedi, an khua vêla khuahai leh khopui kiruk.
Juda irchihaiin Jebus-hai, Jerusalema omhai chu inhnotsuak zoi mahai. Juda irchihai leh Jebus-hai chu atûn ten hin an la om mai a ni.

Josefa irchihai ram dongtum, sim tianga ramri chu Jordan vadung rengata Jeriko tui suaknahai bula a’rphuta, Jeriko ata fe patin tâng dung chunga a tungin a fea, ramchâr fe thalin Bethel dênin a fe pata.
Khan, Bethel ata Luz khua dênin Ark-hai omna Atarot-a a fea.
Nitâk tiang panin Jafleta-hai omna ram a fe irkâna, Beth-Horon hnuaia a fe pata. Gezer-a fe patin Mediteranean tuipui a suna.
Josefa irchihai, Efraima le Manasea irchihaiin hi ram hi an ram irchon hrangin an chang a ni.
Efraima irchihai, an insûngkua kuain an irsem hranga an dongtum hmâr tianga ramri chu hi hi a ni: Nisuana tianga om Astarot-Adar le Beth-Horon kâra a ni.
Hmâr tianga mongna khua Mikmethat ata nisuana tiang panin ramri chu Tanat-silo tiang a fea, Janoa khuahai, Atarot khuahai, Naara khuahaia a fea, Jeriko a suna, Jordan dung a dêna.
Khan Jona ata kha Atarot le Naara tiang a chum nôka Jeriko sunin Jordan-a a zu monga.

Nitâk tiang Mikmethat khua ata Tapua khua, Kana dunga suakin ivadung chu a zuia, Mediteranean tuipui a zu dêna, kha ramri sûnga ram chu Efraima irchihaiin an insûngkua kua’n irsem hranga an dongtum ram chu a ni.
Manasea irchihai ram dongtum lai ata Efraimahai chu khopui senkhat, an kôlvêla khuahai leh khan an pêk saa.
Gezer khuaa om, Kanaan mihai chu inhnotsuak mahai, atûn ten hin kha Kanaan mihai chu Efraima-hai laia an la oma, sinthoa an siahlo ni hrangin an om tâk a ni.

Josefa nâilutîr, Manasea irchihai ram chang chu hi hi a ni: Josefa nâipa upa ual Manasea nâipa Makira, Gileada pa chu, mi huaisen a nia. Jordan nisua tianga Gilead le Basan ram chu an dongtum hrangin an pêka.

Jordan nitâk tianga Manasea nâi danghai hrang ram a pêk saa, kha mihai chu: Abiezera, Heleka, Asriela, Sekema, Hefera le Semida hai an ni. Hihai hi Josefa nâipa Manasea nâipasalhai, insûngkuaa ulianhai an ni.
Hefera nâipa Zelofehada’n nâipasal nei loiin nâinupang vai a neia. A pu chu Makira, Manasea nâi a ni. Zelofehada nâinupanghai chu, Mahlaii hai, Noi hai Hoglaii hai, Milkaii hai, Tirzaii hai an ni.
Anni chu ochai Eleazara hai, Nuna nâipa Josua hai le Israel nam hruaituhai kuang an va fea, ‘
Jordan nisua tianga Gilead le Basan ram kopin Manasea irchihai dongtum hmun sôm an nei bîk a ni.
Nâipasalhai ang takin an nâinupanghaiin ram an chang sa tâk sikin Gilead ram chu Manasea irchi danghaiin an chang tâk a ni.
Manasea irchihai ram chang chu Asera-hai ram chang rengata Sekem khuaa nisua tianga Mikmethat khua kâr chu a ni. Sim tiang ramri chu a fea, Entapuaa omhai chu a huama.
Tapua ram hi Manasea-hai ichang a ni, a khopui Tapua hi chu Efraimahai ta a ni.

Ramri chu Kana dunghaia a zu chuma. Vadunghai kôl sim tianga khuahai chu Efraimahai ta a ni, Manasea hai ram sûnga om ni khomsian; ramri chu hmâr tianga vadunghai kôla a fe zêla, Mediteranean tuipuia a suaka.
Sim tiang Efraimahai an oma, hmâr tiang Manasea-hai an oma, Mediteranean tuipui hi an ramri a ni; Asera namhai chu hmâr tianga nisuana tiang Isakara hai an oma.

Asera-hai le Isakara hai ram chang sûnga Manasea khua Beth-Sean le Ibleam khopui, an kôlvêl khuahai leh a oma. Tuipui kôla Dor khuahai, Endor hai, Taanak hai, Megido hai le an kôlvêla khuahai khom a om.
Hi khuaa omhai hi Manasea irchihaiin inhnotsuak thei mahai; khasikin Kanaan mihai chu an la om zêl a ni ta.
Israelhai an hong hrât zêl hnung khom khan inhnotsuak ual mahai, sintho hrangin chu an norhai ngai.
Josefa irchihaiin Josua kuang, “Itho sika mo kin irchon hrang ram hmun khat vai ni ni ipêk.
Josua’n, “Nin tam oka ni’n chu, Efraima tâng ram hi a chîn viata ni’n chu, Periz le Refaim-hai omna rampuihai hi tukdarh unglân, irthial infâi roi,” a tia.

Anni’n, “A tâng ram ringot hi kin ta hrangin chu ruk no ni; phâia Kanaan-hai lakin thîr sakor an neia; Jezreel phâia omhai le Beth-Sean khopui le a kôlvêl khuahaiin irdoina thîr sakor an nei chit a ni,” an tia.
Josua’n Efraima le Manasea irchihai chu a sâma, “Nin tam oka, hrât khom nin hrâta, ram changtum inkhat vai ni loiin a nêka tam nei ual nin ti.
Tâng ram khi nin changtum hrang ni a ta, rampuipa ringot khom ni sian, tukdarh unglân a ram pumin inhnê roi, Kanaan-hai chu an thîr sakorhai leh hrât tak khomsian, inhnotsuakhai zit an ti,” a ti.
Israel mihai chu Silo-ah an irbukkhôma,
Israel laia nam sari ram dongtum la pehai loi an oma.
Josua’n an kuang, “
Nam tinin mi pasal thum inthangsuak unglân, anni chu ram va’rfangsuak hrangin tîrhai ki ta; nam tin changtum hrang inkunghai sianlân, ki kuang hong intung nôk ri sehai.
Ram chu hmun sari’n thêr ni sianlân, Juda le Josefa irchihai chu an idongtum ram sûnga khan om an ti.
Ram hmun saria irsen dân hrang chu irziak an ta, hong chôi an ta, keiin
Levia irchihai hrang chu sem no roi,
Josua ihril ang taka tho hrangin mihai chu an fe suaka, an kuang, “Ram pumpui irfangsuak unglân, irsinsia zit roi; ki kuang nin hong ikîr nôk hrang a ni. Keiin hitaka Silo khuaa hin
Khan, kha mihai kha an suaka, ram chu an irfang zita, khopui omhai chu irsia zitin hmun sari’n an sema, an irziaka. Silo khuaa an riak hmuna Josua kuanga an irziakna lekhabu chu an hong chôia.
Silo khuaa khan Josua’n
Benjamina irchihai ram dongtum, an insûngkua kuaa irsem hrang chu inkung masa tak a nia, Juda le Josefa irchihai kâra an om tâka.
Hmâr tianga an ramri chu Jordan vadung rengata Jeriko sîra tâng panga a fe zêla; nitâk tiang panin Bethaven ramchâr a tunga.
Luz khua (Bethel an ti sa ngai) a fe zêla, sim tiang panin a fea, Atarot-adar, Beth-Horon tâng dung hnuaia khua chu a dêna.
Ramri chu nitâk tianga tâng dung rengata sim tiang panin a kôia, Kiriath-baal khua, Kiriath-jearim an ti sa ngai chu a dêna; hi khua hi Juda irchihai khopui a ni. Hi hi nitâk tianga ramri chu a ni.
Sim tianga ramri chu Kiriath-jearim rengata a’rphuta, nisua tiang panin Nefto tuikhura a fea.
Hinom-a suak tâng dunga fein Refaim phâi lûtnaa khan a suna, Hinom irhôr a pana, Jebus-hai khua sim tiang panin a fea, Enrogel a dêna.
Ramri chu hmâr tiang a kôia, En-semes a dêna, Adumin hong fena sîra Gilot khuaa a fea, Bohana lunga (Bohana chu Reubena nâipa a ni) a fe zêla.
Jordan dung sîra tâng hmâr tianga fe’n irhôra a fe thala,
Beth Hogla tâng dung hmâr tiang a fe zêla, Jordan dung suakna Tuipui Thia a fe lût a ni.
Jordan chu nisua tiang rama ramri mongna a ni. Hi hi Benjamina irchihai insûngkua tina ram changtum hrang ramri chu a ni.
Benjamina irchi, an insûngkua kuaa izir ang zêla khua an irsem chu hi hi a ni: Jeriko, Beth-Hogla, Emek-keziz;
Beth-Araba, Zemaraim, Bethel;
Avim, Para, Ofra;
Kefaramoni, Ofni, Geba le an kôlvêla khua omhai leh khopui sômhleihni a ni.
Gibeon hai, Rama hai, Beerot hai,
Mizpa hai, Kafira hai, Moza hai,
Rekem hai, Irpeel hai, Tarala hai,
Zela Haelef hai, Jebus hai (Jerusalem an ti sa), Gibea hai, Kiriath-jearim hai, an kôlvêla khua omhai leh khopui sômkhat minli a ni. Hi hi Benjamina irchi insûngkua tina dongtum khuahai chu a ni.
Tasân voihnina chu Simeona irchihaiin, an insûngkua an insûngkua’n ram irsem hrangin, an changa. An ram dongtum chu Juda irchihai ram chang sûnga a ni.
Hi khuahai hi a huam: Beerseba, Seba, Molada;
Hazar-sual, Bala, Ezem;
Eltolad, Bethul, Horma;
Ziklag, Beth-Markabot, Hazar-Susa;
Beth-Lebaot, Saruhen, an kôlvêla khuahai leh ile, khopui sômkhat inthum a ni.
Hi khuahai khom hi a kop: Ain, Rimon, Esther, Asan le a kôlvêla khopui minli a ni.
Hi hin a kôlvêla khua Baalath Beer (Rama an ti ngai) sim tiang dênin a huam a ni. Simeona irchihaiin hi lai ram hi an dongtum hrang piala inkung a ni.
Juda irchihaiin an innang nêka lian ual ram an nei sikin an ram senkhat chu Simeona irchihai kuang ipêk a ni.
Tasân voithumna chu Zebulun irchihai chunga an insûngkua kuaa irsem hrang ram chu an changa, sim tiang a mongna taka Sarid khua a oma.
Kha rengata nitâk tianga Marala a pana, Debeset va tônin Jokneam nisua tianga tuidunga a suaka.
Sarid nisua tianga Kisloth-tabor ramri a hong suna, Daberat-ah a fe patin ramri Jafia tiang a fea.
A suk tiang fe’n Gath Hefer-a a fe zêla, Ethkazin fe patin Rimon tianga Nea panin a’rkuala.
Hmâr tiang panin ramri chu Hanathon tiang a fea, Iftahel irhôra a mong a ni.
Kata hai, Nahalal hai, Simrona hai, Idala hai, Bethlehem hai a kôlvêl khuahai leh khopui sômkhat inhni a huam sa a ni.
Zebulun-hai chu dongtum rama khan hi khopuihai le a kôlvêl khuahai hi a iom a ni.
Tasân voiminlina chu Isakara irchihai chunga an insûngkua kuaa irsem hrangin a chuma.
Hihai hi an ram sûnga ihuam chu a ni: Jezreel, Kesulot, Sunem;
Haferaim, Sion, Anaharat,
Rabit, Kision, Ebez;
Remet, En-ganim, Enhada le Beth-pazzez.
An ramri chu Tabor tânga a fe thala, Sahazumai le Bet-semes fe patin Jordan a dêna, khopui sômkhat kiruk, an kôl vêla khuahai leh a huama.
Isakara irchihaiin an insûngkua tin irsem hrangin khi khopuihai le an kôl vêla khuahai leh ile an ichang a ni.
Tasân voiringana chu Asera irchihai chunga an insûngkua kuaa ram irsem hrangin a chuma.
An ram ihuam kai chu hi hi a ni: Helkat, Hali, Beten, Aksaf;
Alam Melek, Amad, Misal. Nitâk tianga an ramri, Karmel le Sihor Libnat a zu tunga,
Misa suakna tiang ramri chu a kôia, Bethdagon fe patin Zebulun ram a suna, Iftahel irhôra a lûta, hmâr tiang panin Bethemek le Neiel tiang a pana, Kabul a dêna.
Ebron hai, Rehoba hai, Hamon hai, Kana haia a fea, Sidon khopui a suna.
Khan ramri chu a’rkuala, Rama le Tura khopui kul a suna, Hosa-a a kôia, Mediteranean tuipuia a monga, Mahalab hai, Akzib hai,
Uma hai, Afek hai, Rehob hai a huama, an kôl vêla khuahai leh ile khopui sômhni inhni a ni.
Hi khopuihai le an kôl vêla khuahai hi Asera irchihaiin insûngkua tin irsem hranga an ram dong chu a ni.
Tasân voirukna chu Naftalia irchihai chunga an insûngkua kuaa irsem hrangin a chuma.
Hmâr tianga ramri chu Helef-ah a’rphuta, nisua tianga Elon-Bazananim fe thengin Adamainekeb-ah a fea, Jabneel lûtin Lakum a dêna, Jordan-ah a monga.
Nitâk tiang panin Aznot-tabor-ah a fea, Hukok a dêna, sim tianga Zebulun dênin a fea, Asera-hai ram a va suna. Nisua tianga Jordan, nitâk tianga Asera-hai ram le ri an irchôi a ni.
Kul nei khuahai chu: Zidim, Zer, Hamath, Rakat, Kinereth;
Adama, Rama, Hazor,
Kedes, Edrei, Enhazor,
Iron, Migdalel, Horem, Bethanat, le Beth-Semes, an kôl vêla khuahai leh ile khopui sômkhat kuak a huam saa.
Hi khopuihai le an kôl vêla khuahai hi Naftalia irchihai insûngkua tin irsem hranga an ichang a ni.
Tasân voisarina chu Dana irchihai chunga an insûngkua kuaa irsem hrangin a chuma.
An ramin hi khuahai hi a huam: Zora, Estaol, Irsemes;
Saalabin, Aijalon, Ithla;
Elon, Timna, Ekron;
Elteke, Gibethon, Baalath;
Jehud, Beneberaka, Gath-rimon;
Mejarkon, Rakon le Jopa khua vêl ramhai.

Dana irchihai hi an râlhaiin an ram an lâk pehaia, Lus khuaa an fea; an hong doia, an lâka, mihai chu an thata; khan kha ram kha anni’n an nei tâk a ni. A khua irhming hi an irchibul tianga irhming chôiin Dan an tia.
Hi khopui le khuahai hi a ni Dana irchihaiin an sûngkua ang dungzuia an irchon hranga ram an idong sûnga omhai chu.
Ram an irsem zoi zitin chu, Israel mihaiin Nuna nâipa Josua chu a binga hrangin ram an pêka.
thupêk angin ama indita inthang tak Timnat-sera khua an pêka. Efraima tâng rama om a ni; khua chu an ding inthara, kha khan a om tâka.
Ochai Eleazara hai, Nuna nâipa Josua hai le Israel nam hruaituhaiin hi ramhai hi tasânin Silo khuaa khan biakbuk puan in mikot bula an sem infel tâka.
“Israel mihai hril roh, Mosia ki inhril ang khan zôkna hrang khua inthang roi.
Châiirpal mani, hmu loi sika mani mihriam thata, an thisen phuba lâktu ata an intâna, an irbîk theina hrangin.
Kha khuaa khan intân an ta, khopui lûtnaa inding an ta, kha khuaa upahai kuang an hong intân nasan kha an ihril hrang a ni; anni’n hmun lei ngaitua pehai an ta, an omna hrang pehai an ti.
Thisen phuba latuhaiin an hong zong khomin an lei ihrung hrang a ni, châiirpal a ni sikin, ningmur sika that chu ni no ni.

Kha khuaa khan Israel irbukkhômhaiin an chung thu an rêl mâka le, ochai inlaltak chang lai a thi mâka chu a iom mai hrang a ni; kha zoia chu, kha mi châiirpalna mi thattu kha a hong intâna, an khuaa ama ina ngêt kîr nôk thei ta a ti.

Hi a hnuaia khuahai hi Israel mihai ta hrang le an laia om nam danghai zôkna hranga an inkunghai chu a ni. Kades khua, Naftalia ram nitâk tiang Galili biala; Sekem khua, nitâk tianga Efraimahai ram; Kiriath-arba khua (Hebron an ti ngai) nitâk tianga Juda irchihai ram sûnga om.
Jordan nisua tianga khua: Bezer khua, Golan khua, Manasea hai ram Basan biala om.

Khahai kha a ni Israel mihai le an laia nam dang omhai ta hranga irhual hranga khua an inkunghai chu a ni. Tukhomin mi that sianlân, hi khuahaia hin an rot thei; an chung thu chu Israel irbukkhômhaiin an rêl infel mân chu thisen phuba lâktu kuta thi no nih.
Levi irchi hruaituhai chu Ochai Eleazara hai Nuna nâipa Josua hai le Israel nam hruaituhai kuanga,
Kanaan rama Silo khuaa khan an va fea, “
Khanchu, Israel mihaiin an ram chang sai sûnga hin hi khopuihai le a kôl vêla ram ôl insûng sa lêngna hrangin
Levi irchihai laia Kohatha irchihai chu khopui an sem masataka, Arona irchi ochaihai chu Juda irchihai, Simeona irchihai le Benjamina irchihai ram dongtum sûng ata khopui sômkhat inthum an pêka.
Kohatha irchihai chu Efraima hai, Dan hai leh nitâk tianga Manasea irchi chimriphai ram sûng ata khopui sômkhat an pêka.
Gersona irchihai chu Isakara hai, Naftalia hai, nitâk tianga Manasea hai ram dongtum sûng ata khopui sômkhat inthum an pêka.
Meraria irchihai chu Reubena hai, Gada hai le Zebulun ram sûng ata khopui sômkhat inhni an pêka.
Mosia kuanga
Juda le Manasea irchihai ram sûng ata hi khopuihai hi,
Levia irchi Kohatha panam Arona irchihai kuanga an pêk chu a ni, anni hi khua an sema, a dong masatak an ni.
Juda rama tâng ram khopui Anaka pa, Arba khua, Hebron an ti ngai le a kôl vêla ram ôlhai leh ile an pêka.
Khopui sîr vêl le a kôl vêla khuahai chu Jefunea nâipa Kaleba kuang pêk a lei ni tâk kha.
Khan zôkna hranga khua inkung Hebron khua bâka hi khopuihai hi ochai Arona irchihai ta hranga pêk a ni: Libna,
Jatir, Estemoa,
Holon, Debir,
Ain, Juta, Beth-Semes, an kôl vêla ram ôlhai leh ile Juda le Simeona irchihai ram chang sûng ata khopui kuak an pêka.
Benjamina ram sûng ata hi khopui minlihai hi an pêk sa: Gibeon, Geba,
Anathot, Almond, le an kôl vêla ram ôlhai.
An rêngin khopui sômkhat inthum, an kôl vêla ram ôl, insûng sa lêngna hmun hrang leh ile ochai Arona irchihai chu an pêka.
Levia nâipa Kohatha irchi danghai kuanga Efraimahai ram ata khua senkhat an pêk saa.
Khopui minli an pêk, zôkna hranga inkung Efraima tâng rama khopui Sekem hai, Gezer hai,
Kibzaim hai, Beth Horon hai le a kôl vêla ram ôlhai a ni.
Dan ram sûng ata khua minli an pêk sa: Elteke hai, Gibethon hai,
Aijalon hai, Gath-rimon hai le an kôl vêla ram ôlhai a ni.
Nitâk tianga om Manasea irchihai ram sûng ata khopui inhni an pêk, Taanak le Gath-rimon, an kôl vêla ram ôlhai a ni.
Kohatha irchi danghai kuanga hi khua sômhai le an kôl vêla ram ôl, insûng sa lêngna hmun hranghai leh ile an pêka.

Levia nam senkhat, Gersona irchihai chu nisua tiang Manasea irchihai ram sûnga khopui inhni an pêka; zôkna hranga inkung Basan biala Golan le Beestera an kôl vêla ram ôl, insûng sa lêngna hranga ram hoi pêk an ni.
Isakara irchihai ram sûng ata khopui minli: Kision, Daberet,
Jarmut, En-ganim hai le an kôl vêla ram ôl insûng sa lêngna hmun hranga ram leh ile an pêka.
Asera-hai ram sûng ata khopui minli: Misal, Abdona,
Helkat, Rehob le an kôl vêla ram ôl insûng sa omna hrang leh ile an pêka.
Naftalihai ram sûng ata khopui inthum, zôkna hranga inkung Galili rama Kedes, Hamoth Dor, Kartan le a kôl vêla ram ôl insûng sa lêngna hranga hmun leh ile an pêka.
Gersona irchi insûngkua mihaiin khopui sômkhat inthum le an kôl vêla ram ôl insûng sa lêngna hmun hrang leh ile an chang a ni.
Levi irchia mi la omhai, Meraria irchihai chu Zebulun-hai ram sûng ata khopui minli Jokneam, Karta,
Dimna, Nahalal le an kôl vêla ram ôl insûng sa lêngna hmun hrang leh ile an pêka.
Reubena-hai ram sûng ata khopui minli: Bezer, Jahaz,
Kedemot, Mefaat le an kôl vêla ram ôl insûng sa lêngna hmun hrang leh ile an pêka.
Gad-hai ram sûng ata khopui minli zôkna hranga inkung Gilead biala Ramot, Mahanaim,
Hesbon, Jazer le an kôl vêla ram ôl insûng sa lêngna hmun hrang leh ile an pêka.
Khanchu, Mararia irchihai chu a rêngin khopui sômkhat inhni an pêkhai a ni.
Israel mihai ram sûnga Levi irchihai khopui hranga inkung sai chu khua sômminli kiriat a ni, an kôl vêla ram ôl insûng sa lêngna hmun hrang leh ile pêk an ni.
an irchibul pi le pu kuanga ram pêk a inkung tâk ram murdi chu Israel mihai kuanga a pêk ta. An lâk zoiin chu an lua tâka.
An irchibul pi le puhai kuanga pêk a lei inkung sai tâk ram chu
a lei inkung diam tâk angin ram pumpui chu irngeina a inlêngtira. An râlhai inkhat lua’n inhnê mahai,
Israelhai kuanga chong a inkung tâk sai rêng rêng chu
Josua’n Reubena irchihai, Gada irchihai le Manasea irchi chimriphai chu a koihaia,
an kuang, “
nin urênghai chu zoro sôt tak sûng irheisan loiin nin Pathian
Atûn chu,
siahlo Mosia’n dân nangni a ipêk kha zôm ngêt unglân, nin Pathian
Khanchu, Josua’n sat a vurhaia, an kîrtirhaia, an in tiang an kîr nôk tâk.
Mosia’n Manasea irchi chimriphai chu Jordan nisua tianga Basan ram a pêka, a chimrip dang chu Josua’n Jordan nitâk tianga ram a pêk sa. Josua’n in tiang an kîrtirhaia khan sat a vurhaia,
“Belra le kêlhai, sum le rângachak hai, dâr le thîrhai, le puandiar tamtak leh ile, irchong takin in tiang kîr nôk nin ta, nin râlhai thil nin ilâk pehai chu nin urêng danghai sem sahai roi,” a tia.
Reubena irchihai, Gada irchihai le Manasea irchi chimriphai chu Silo khua rengata in tiang an kîr tâka. Israel danghai chu Kanaan rama Silo khuaa khan an mâksanhaia, Mosia kuanga
Reubena irchihai, Gada irchihai le Manasea irchi chimriphai khan Jordan nitâk tianga om, Kanaan rama Gelilot chu an tunga, ivadung kôla khan ennuam om taka roiinpui maichâm lian an siama.
Israel mi danghai kha, Reubena hai, Gada hai, le Manasea haiin Kanaan rama Jordan dung kôla, Israel mihai rama khan maichâm an siama, ti mi’n an hrilhaia.
Israel mipuihaiin an lei inhriatin doi an tuma, Silo-ah an irbukkhôma.
Khanchu, Reubena hai, Gada mihai, nisua tianga om Manasea mi chimriphai chu Gileada an om laiin Israel mihaiin ochai Eleazara nâipa Finehasa chu an tîra;
ama leh khan milian sôm, Israelhai nam laia sûngkua ulian tak inkhat zêlin le nitâk tianga nam sôm hruaitu tak inkhat zêlin a pâlin an tîrhaia.
Gilead an tunga, Reubena mihai, Gada mihai, le nisua tianga Manasea mi chimriphai kuang,
“Mipuihai,
Peor hmuna thilsual ei itho kha nin la inhriat mai mo ni ma?
chu i sika mo nin izui nuam loi? A vuan hin
Nin ram hi ama biakna inrukloi raka porinche a ni’n chu
Zera nâipa Akana khan thil ser tak ansiata, Israel mipuihai chunga siatna a tunga, Akana vai ni loiin mi dang khom an thi kha,” an tia.
Reubena mihai, Gada mihai, nisua tianga Manasea mihaiin Israel hruaituhai chu an sâma,
chong zôm loiin hâlirvôm thil inhlanhai kin inhlanna hranga keini maichâm kin isiam a ni’n chu
Khaang kha ni ma: nakana nin irchihaiin kin irchihai kuang hiang hin an tih itinin ti hi kin ichi a ni. ‘
Ama’n Jordan dung chu Reubena le Gada mihai leh ramri hrangin a siama,
Khasikin, hâlirvôm thil inhlan le irbôlna chi dang inhlanna’n maichâm hi siam ni ma ung.
Nin mihai le kin mihai, rualthoithar hong ni zêlhaiin
Khasikin, nakana kin irchihai chunga hianga irtîna chong a hong om tika ngaitua’n, ‘Kin irchibul pi le puhaiin

chunga nuar kin itum ni ma, Ama irheisana kin thil inhlan hâlna, kin bu bâl thilinhlan le irbôlna inhlanna hranga maichâm dang siam kin itum khom ni ma, ei Pathian maichâm, a biakbuk kôla om ang kha chu maichâm dang rêng rêng inding ma ung,” an tia.
Ochai Finehasa le mipuihai hruaitu, nitâk tianga om nam hruaitu sômhaiin Reubena mihai, Gada mihai nisua tianga Manasea mi chimriphai chong chu an inhriatin an milung a chuk tâka.
Finehasa, ochai Eleazara nâipa’n an kuang, “
Reubena le Gada irchihai omna Gilead rengata ochai Eleazara nâipa Finehasa le Israel hruaituhai chu Israel mihai omna Kanaan ram khan an kîra, an thu inhriat kha an va hrilhaia.
Israel mihai chu an lung a chuk tâka, Pathian an inpâka. Reubena le Gada irchihai omna ram kha insiatpai rip thu chu hril ta mahai.
Reubena irchi le Gada irchihaiin kha maichâm kha, “Kin kâra
Khanchu, Israel mi murdi upahai, hruaituhai, roirêltuhai le ulianhai chu a koi bûmhaia, an kuang, “Atûn hin chu a sân ki tar tâka.
nangni sikin hi namhai chunga nin Pathian
Kin inhnê tâkhai nam omna ram le kin la inhnê loihai omna ram chu nin irchon hrangin ki sem infel zit tâk a ni; nisua tianga Jordan dung ata nitâk tianga Mediteranean tuipui dênin sem a ni.
nin Pathianin nin matona lei inhnotsuakhai zit a ta, nin hmu phâk loina hmuna inhnotsuakhai a ti;
Khasikin, Mosia dân lekhabua irziak murdi irdîn takin zôm tum ngit unglân, inkhat lua irhmâi no roi.
Nin laia nam dang la om leh hin irpôl no roi; an pathianhai hi koi no roi, an irhming sâmin chong inkung no roi, chubai mûkin an makunga kûn viat no roi.
chu iamom takin atûn ten nin kop indet ang hin kop indet khak roi.
Nam lian tamtak le hrâttak takhai nin maton zela
A chonginkung angin
nin Pathian chu lungthung ngei ngei unglân.
Nin irheisana, nin laia nam dang la omhai leh nin irpôlkhôma, nin irneipolin chu,
nin Pathianin hi namhai hi nin maton zela inhnotsuak viat no ni.
“Irngai roi, atûn chu, ki thi zoro anai ta. Tukhomin takirtâi takin a sûtin chu
nin Pathianin thil sa pêk hranga a inkung chu a tho ngai angin thil saloi a inkunga khom a tho ngai.
nin Pathianin zôm hranga a iti, a thuthung kha nin insiata, Pathian dang nin pana, a sin nin zongin chu,
Josua’n Israel namhai chu Sekem khuaa a koibûmhaia. Israel upahai, nam hruaituhai, roirêltuhai le ulianhai chu Pathian makunga an hong irbûma.
Josua’n mi murdi makunga, “
Nin pu Abrahama chu Eufrates vadung râl ata Kanaan ram pumpuia ki hruai inlûta, Isaka ki pêka, a’rchi tamtakin kin punga,
Isaka chu Jakoba le Esaua ki pêka, Seir tânghai chu Esaua omna tâng hranga pêk a ni. Jakoba le a nâihai chu Aigupta rama an lûta.
Inhnunga chu Mosia le Arona kha ki tîra, Aigupta mihai chu ki hremhai tak taka, nangni chu Aigupta rengata nangni ki hruaisuak tâk a ni.
Nin pi le puhai chu Aigupta ram rengata ki hong hruaisuaka, Aigupta mihaiin sakor thîrtâli le sakor chunga chuang mihai leh ile an hong irzûlhaia;
Khannisian, Tuipui Sen an tungin chu changpuitu zongin
Jordan nisua tianga om, Amor mihai omna chu nangni ki hruai intunga, nin irdoia nin inhnêhaia, an ram chu nin nei tâka. Anni chu ki that irhmanghai tâk a ni kha.
“Khan, Zipora nâipa Balaka, Moab rêngin Israelhai chu a lei doia, Beora nâipa Balaama chu khomâksâm khumhai hrangin a lei phuna.
Khannisianlân, Balaama thu chu irngai nuam ma unga, sat nangni a ivur tâk a ni; khaang khan Balaka kut ata nangni ki isansuak a ni;

Jordan vadung nin kâia, Jeriko khuaa mihaiin nangni an lei doia; Amor mihai, Periz mihai, Kanaan mihai, Hit mihai, Girgas mihai, Hiv mihai le Jebus mihai khomin nangni an lei doia; khannisian nangni ki inhnêtir zit a ni.
Amor rêng inhnihai len vâng chu khandai mani thal mani hmang nang loiin nin maton tiang khuaibêl ki tîra, an hnotsuakhai zit a ni.
Nin la ichuan viat loina ram nangni ki pêka, in nin la isin loina khopui nangni kin omtir a ni. Atûn chu nin iphun loi grep ra nin irhmala, nin iphunloi oliv ra nin fâk tâk a ni hi.
“Khasikin,

sintho hi sa nin ti no’n chu nin irchibul pi le puhai ibiak, Mesopotamia ram pathianhai sin kha mo nin tho nuam, atûna nin omna rama mi, Amor pathianhai hi mo, a vuan hin nin nuam nuam inthang roi. Kei le ki insûng mihai rekin chu
Mipuihaiin, “
Aigupta rama suak kin ni laia ni hruaisuaktu chu
Hi rama kin hong tung khomin
Josua’n mipuihai makunga, “
chu irheisanin pathian dang sin ni tho’n chu nangni doiin nangni hrem a ti; nin chunga lei sa ngai khom sianlân, nangni a that irhmang zit hrang kêng,” a tia.
Mipuihaiin Josua an sâma, “Ni ma!
Josua’n an kuang, “
Josua’n, “Khaang khan a ni’n chu, nam dang pathian illim nin idônhai kha pai zit roi duah: Israelhai Pathian
Mipuihaiin Josua chu an sâma, “Kin Pathian
Khan, kha sûna khan Josua le mipuihaiin thu an thunga; an zôm hrang dân le thupêk a siam pehaia.
Josua’n kha thu kha Pathian dân bua khan a’rziak lûta; lung liantak a lâka, Sekem khuaa
Josua’n mipuihai kuang, “En u ta, hi lung hi ei thu inhretu a ni; ei kuanga
Josua’n mipuihai chu an fetirhaia, an mâni khua senga an kîr nôk tâka.
Kha zoia chu kum irzakhat sômhni a ni’n Josua chu a thi tâka.
Gaas tâng hmâr tiang, Efraimhai ram, tâng rama ama ram Timat-sera-ah khan an phûma.
Josua dam sûng chu Israelhaiin

Josefa ruak, Israelhaiin Aigupta ram rengata an hong chôi kha Sekem khuaa khan an phûma, Jakoba’n tangka sumru irzakhata Sekema Hamora irchihai kut ata a irchôk ram a ni, hi ram hi Josefa irchihai ta hranga ram irchon a hong ni ta zêla.
Arona nâipa, Eleazara khom a thia, Efraima mihai tâng rama om, a nâipa Finehasa an ipêk ram Gibea khuaa an phûma.
Josua thi hnungin Israelhaiin
Juda irchihaiin, an urêng Simeona irchihai kuang, “Ei ta hranga inkung rama hin hong unglân, Kanaan mihai hi doihai roi, keini khom, khaang ngêtin nin ram ta hrangin doi hrangin hong kin ti,” an tia.
Khasikin, Simeona nam le Juda namhai chu irdoinaa an fe tâka,
Kha khan Adoni-bezeka a lei oma, an doia,
a intân pata, an irzûla, an chela, a kutpui le a kepui an tanpai pea.
