Adoni-bezeka’n, “Rêng sômsari kutpui le kepui ki lei tan inbongpai pea omhai khan ki bu nêkna maichâm hnuaia bu’rmal an hrût ngaia, khaanga ki itho ang chie khan Pathianin ki chunga a hong tho tâk a ni hi te,” a tia. Khanchu, Jerusalema an hruaia, kha khan a thi tâka.
Juda irchihaiin Jerusalem an doia, mi an thata, khopui chu an hâla.
Kha zoia chu Juda irchihaiin tâng rama omhai, tâng phâia omhai le Negeb (Kha kha thang ram tiang ramchâr irhming a ni) hmuna om Kanaan mihai chu doi hrangin an irsiama.
Hebron khua, Kiriath-arba an ti ngai chu, an doia, Sesai mihai, Ahimana mihai le Talmai mihai chu an inhnêa.
Kha rengata Juda irchihai chu Debir doi hrangin an fea, tiana khan kha khua kha Kiriath-sefer ti a ni ngai.
Kaleba’n, “Kiriath-sefer doia, lâk thei chu, ki nâinu Aksaii dôngma hrangin pêk ki ti, a tia.
Kaleba sangpa Kenaza nâipa Othniela’n a lâka, a nâinu chu a dôngma hrangin a pêk tâka.
An irnei nî khan a pa kuanga ram ngên hrangin Othniela’n a nora. A sakuartung chung rengata a chuma, Kaleba’n, “Imo ni inuam?” a tia.
Nupang khan, “Thilpêk ni pe ro, sim tiang ramchâra ni nin omtir tâk lolo’n chu tui hnâr neihai ni pe’n lân,” a tia. Kaleba’n khoichung leh khoihnuai tuihnâr omna chu a pêk tâka.
Mosia tarpu tianga irchi, Ken mihai chu Juda irchihai leh tûmzôl khua an ti Jeriko rengata Arad khua sim tiang Judai ramchâra an fea, khataka omhai laia khan an omsuam tâka.
Juda irchihai chu Simeona mihai leh an fe suama, Zefat khuaa khan Kanaan mihai chu an doia; khua chu an insiat zita, a’rhming Horma an phuaa.
Gaza, Askelon, Ekron hai le a kôl vêla khuahai chu Juda irchihaiin an lâka.
Juda irchihai chu a ompuia, tâng rama omhai chu a inhnotsuaka; tâng phâia omhai rêk chu sakor thîrtali an neia, Juda irchihaiin inhnotsuak thei mahai.
Mosia thu angin Hebron chu Kaleba an pêka, anni’n Anaka nâi inthum chu an inhnotsuaka.
Benjamina irchihaiin Jerusalema om Jebus mihai chu inhnotsuak mahai; Jebus mihai chu Benjamina irchihai leh Jerusalema atûn ten hin an omsuam.
Efraima le Manasea irchihai chu
Matona khan Bethel chu Luz ti a ni. Khua envêl hrangin mi an tîra.
Mi inkhat khua rengata a hong suaka, khua envêltuhaiin, “Khopui inrûka lût theina nin hril roh, ite nang lo no ni ung,” an tia.
Khanchu khopui lûtna chu a’rhmuhaia, Efraima le Manasea mihaiin khua chu an lâka, khandaiin mi an that tôla; kha mi inkhat kha chu an insûng mihai leh ile an zôk.
Ama chu Hit rama a’rthona, khua a chuana, a’rhming Luz a phuaa; atûn ten hin kha irhming kha a la’rput mai.

Manasea irchihaiin Beth-Sean khuaa omhai, Taanak khuaa omhai, Dor khuaa omhai, Ibleam khuaa omhai le Megido khuaa omhai, Kanaan mihai an kôl vêla khuaa omhai leh ile inhnotsuak mahai. Kanaan mihai chu an om mai tâk a ni.
Israel mihai an hong hrât sit sitin chu Kanaan mihai chu sinthônaa hmang hrangin an siama, an hnot chu inhnotsuak mahai.
Efraima mihaiin Gezer khuaa Kanaan mi omhai chu inhnotsuak mahai. Kanaan mihai chu an bila Gizer khuaa khan an om sa tâka.
Zebulun mihaiin Kitron le Nahalal khuaa omhai chu inhnotsuak mahai. Kanaan mihai kha an laia an om kumkhua tâka; aniachu siahloa an siamhai.
Asera mihaiin Ako khuaa omhai, Sidon khuaa omhai, Ahlab khuaa omhai, Akzib khuaa omhai, Helba khuaa omhai, Afek khuaa omhai, Rehob khuaa omhai chu inhnotsuak mahai.
Asera mihai chu Kanaan mihai kâra an om sa maia, inhnotsuak mahai.

Beth-Semes khuaa omhai, Bethanat khuaa omhai chu Naftalia mihaiin inhnotsuak mahai; kha rama om Kanaan mihai leh khan an om sa tâka; Beth-Semes le Bethanat-a omhai chu sinthônaa hmang hrangin an siama.
Amor mihaiin Dana irchihai chu tâng rama an inhnotdoka, an omna hmuna lût nôk phal ta mahai.
Amor mihai chu Har-heres tânghaia, Aijalon khuahaia, Saalabin khuahaia an om mai tâka; khannisian, Josefa insûng mihai chu an hrât zêla, an sinthotua hmang hrangin an hong om tâka.
Amor mihai ramri chu Akrabim hong fena le hmâr tiang Sela-ah irthokin a tungin a fe pat a ni.
Gilgal rengata
kha rama lei omhai leh khan thuthung nin siam hrang ni mak, an maichâmhai nin insiatpai hrang a ni’ ki ti kha; khannisian, ki chong zôm nuam loiin i thil mo nin itho tâk kha?
Khasikin, nangni ki hril, nin matona hi mihai hi inhnotsuak no ning, nin hrangin râl ni an ta, an pathianhai biak hrangin nangni val an ti,” a tia.
vântîrtônin kha thu kha a hril zoiin chu Israelhai chu an chap mur tâka.
Khasikin, kha khua kha Bokim an ti tâk a ni. Kha khan
Josua’n Israel mihai chu an chîntirhaia; an mâni dongtum ram chita lua hrangin an fe seng tâka.
Josua dam sûng chu Israel mihaiin
siahlo Nuna nâipa Josua chu kum irzakhat sômkhat mi a niin a thia.
Hmâr tiang Gaas tâng, Efraima tâng rama ama ram ngêt Timnat-heres hmuna an phûma.
Upahai khom chu an thi zita,
Khanchu, Israelhaiin
Aigupta ram rengata hruaisuakpu, an pahai Pathian,
irheisanin, Baalhai, Asterte-hai chubai an mûk tâka.
Khanchu, Israelhai chunga
Irdoi hranga an fe suakna hmun tina a ihril ang ngeiin
Khanchu,
khannisian, an hruaituhai chong chu irngai nuam mahaia, Israelhaiin
hruaituhai a pêkhaia,
An hruaitu a thi’n chu hnung tiang irletin, an pahai nêka siat ualin an om ngai; pathian dang biak le chubai mûk an uara, nam dang ti dân tinrêng an lâka, an tho insualna mâksan ual mahai.
Israelhai chunga
Khasikin, Josua a thia, nam dang, a inhnotsuak loihai kha, kei khomin inhnotsuak ual ta no ning.
Hi mihai hi, an pahai angin ki lampui an zui mo zui loi mo fiana hrangin ki hmanghai hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khasikin,
Israelhai Kanaan rama râl doinaa chang phâkloihai fiana hranga hi nam senkhathai hi
Israel irchi, thoiintharhai, irdoinaa la chang ngai loi mihaiin irdoina an irchu theina hrangin an omtirhai a ni.
Kha namhai kha chu: Filistia rêng ringa hai, Kanaan mi murdihai, Zidon mihai, Lebanon tâng, Baal Hermon le Hamath khua lûtnaa om Hiv mihai an nih.
An pahai kuanga
Israelhai chu Kanaan mihai, Hit mihai, Amor mihai, Periz mihai, Hiv mihai le Jebus mihai laia an oma.
Kha mihai leh khan nupang pasal an irnei pola, an pathianhai chu an biak nôk tâka.
Khanchu, Israelhaiin
Khasikin,
Israelhaiin
Irtha chu a chunga a oma, Israelhai hruaitu a hong ni tâk. Irdoi hrangin a fe suaka,
An ram chu kum sômminli sûng irngeina a oma, Kenaza nâipa Othniela chu a thi tâka.
Israelhaiin
Eglona’n Amon mihai le Amalek mihai a’rrualpuihaia, Israelhai chu a beia, an hnêa, tûm thing tamna khopui Jeriko chu a lâka.
Israelhai chu Moab rêng Eglona hnuaia kum sôm kum riat an oma.
Khannisianlân, Israelhaiin
Ehuda’n chem ngaih tak mûk khat vêla sei a siama, a puan hnuaia a chang tianga a teêl tiang khan a thup zêta.
Moab rêng Eglona chu mi mar tak hi a nia, Ehuda’n thilpêk chu a pêka;
thilpêk a pêk zoiin chu thilpêk chôituhai chu in tiang a tîrhai tâk.

Gilgal kôla lung khur rengata Ehuda chu a kîr nôka, Eglon kuang a fe nôka, “Mahripom rêngpa, nangma kuang thu’rthup intung hrang ki nei,” a tia. Rêngin a siahlohai kuang, “Ni suaksan zit roi duah,” a tia. Khanchu, an suaksan tâka.
Rêng kha a chontan chung taka a sôl inchanna hmun dâina khan a bing dokin a lei toia. Ehuda’n, “Ni kuang Pathian chongbe insîr hrang ki nei,” a tia. A toina hmun ata a lei thoia.
Ehuda’n a vei kutin a chang tianga chemte kha a kêldoka, a phînga khan an vit tâka.
Chemte chu a tum khîta, a fong khom a lût sa sikin phôipai mak; a hnung tiang chemte hmor chu a tertota.
Ehuda chu pên tiang a suak pata, chontan chung tak inkhâr chu a khâra a kalkhak tâka.
A suak hnungin chu, rêng siahlohai chu an honga, chontan mikot chu a’rkalkhaka. ‘A chontan sûngrîla irsinsiam hranga fe ni a ti,’ an tia.
Zoro sôttak an nghâka chontan inkhâr chu inhong ta maka, khanchu châbi an lâka, inkhâr chu an inhonga, an pu chu a thia, hnuaichanga a’rhlum raka.
An buai sup sup lai takin Ehuda chu a suaka, lung khur a fe irkâna, Seira-ah an tân pat tâka.
Ehuda chu Efraima tâng ram a hong tungin chu bekul a tuma, Israelhai chu tâng ram rengata a kuang an zu fea, ama’n a hruaihaia.
An kuang, “Ni zui roi, nin râl Moab mihai chu nin kuta
Kha zoroa khan Moab mi sîngkhat vêl, mi hrât le mi nakngol ngot an thata, inkhat lua a zôk om mahai.
Kha nî khan Israelhaiin Moab mihai chu an inhnê ta. Ram chu kum sômriat irngeina a lêng ta.
Khan ama hnunga Anata nâipa Samgara khomin Filistia mi irzaruk chu sehrât sunna hmolin an zuithathaia, Israelhai chu a sansuakhai.
Ehuda thi hnunga Israelhaiin
Khasikin,
Jabina’n thîr sakortali irzakuak a neia, kum sômhni sûng chu Israelhai deng an theitirhai tak taka, Israelhaiin
Deipunu, Debori, Lapidota dôngma chu, Israelhai roi a rêla.
Efraima tâng rama, Bethel le Rama khua kâra, Debor khuaa tûm thing hnuaia a toia, Israel mihaiin a kuang chongirdon an fe hena.
Kedes-Naftali-ah om Abinoama nâipa Baraka chu a koia, a kuang, “Israelhai Pathianin ‘Naftalia le Zebulun irchihai ata mi sîngkhat hruaiin Tabor tâng tiang fe roi,’ a iti mo ni mah?
Kanaan rêng Jabina sipai hruaitu Sisera chu a thîr sakor tâlihai le a sipaihai leh ile Kison dunga nangni hruai ki ta, ni kuta nangni pêk ki ti a ti kha,” a tia.
Baraka’n, “Ni fe’n chu fe ki ta, ni fe no’n chu fe no ning,” a tia.
Debori’n, “Fe ngêt ki ti; aniachu, ni fe khomin ni roiinpuina hrang ni no ni;
Baraka’n Naftalia leh Zebulun mihai a koibûmhaia, mi sîngkhatin an zuia, Debori khom a fepuihai sa.
Ken mi Hebera chu Mosia tarpu, Hobaba irchi a nia, Ken mihai lai ata a bingin a oma, Elon-Bezananim bul Kedes vêla khan riakbuk a hong khuara.
Tabor tâng tiang Abinoama nâipa Baraka a fe thu Sisera chu an hrila.
Khan Sisera’n a thîr sakor tâli irzakuak chu a fepuihaia, Haroset-goim rengata a sipai murdi chu Kison dunga khan a hruaia.
Debori’n Baraka kuang, “Tho, a vuan hin
Baraka’n Sisera chu khandaiin a doi thuta,
Baraka’n a thîr tâlihai le a sipaihai leh ile an irzûla, Haroset-goim dênin an irzûla, Sisera sipaihai chu a sâtthat zita, inkhat lua intâna zôk om mahai.
Sisera chu Ken mi, Hebera dôngma Jaeli puan ina an tâna, a lût pata, Hazor rêng Jabina le Habera insûng mihai chu an irngei mai a nih.
Sisera don hrangin Jaeli chu an tânsuaka, “Hong intân ro, ka pu, ki kuang hong irbîk ro; chi viat no ro,” a tia. A puan ina khan an tâna, a lûta, puanin ar khû tâka.
Sisera’n, “Tui in hrang ni pe ta, ki tui an hrâl e,” a tia. Sehrât dût bûr an honga, an intira, puanin ar khû nôka.
Sisera’n, “Puan in mikota khan omin lân, mi an honga, ‘Hitaka hong mi an om mo?’ tia nang an irdonin, ‘Om mah’ ni iti hrang a ni,” a tia.

Sisera chu a sân a sôla, inmutui takin a ina. Khan, Habera dôngma’n puan in epna irzum le sekchôi a lâka; a in hnungin dâiriamin a va lûta; a inmu irhnik lai taka a zâl laiin puan in kilna irzumin a bangbarêpa a hêma, a hêm intuma, hnuaia an pêr tâka, khanchu a thi tâka.

Baraka’n Sisera chu a hong irzûla, Jaeli’n lei don hrangin a lei suaka, a kuang, “Hong ta, mi ni izong chu nang inentir ki ti,” a tia. An lût suam tâka, Sisera chu a lei thia, puan in kilna chu a bangbarêpa a’rphun muta.
Kha nî sûn khan Israelhai makunga Kanaan rêng Jabina chu
Kanaan rêng Jabina chu Israelhaiin an inhnê zêl tâka, a mongna taka chu, an that irhmanghai zit tâk.
Kha nî sûn khan Debori le Abinoama nâipa Baraka’n hiang hin hla an sak:
Hruaituhaiin Israelhai mâ an hruaia,
mipuiin raifân takin an zui dûl dûl mai hi,
irzuk takin
Rênghaio, irngai roi,
Hruaituhaio, nin mikuar lei sung roi,
Israelhai Pathian
O
Edom ram ni suaksan khan irnêng kha an hnîng dûm dûma,
Irvânhai khom rua a zuang zunga,
A ni, Sûmhai khan rua an thotira.
Sinai tâng ten khom,
Israelhai Pathian
Anata nâipa Samgara le Jaeli dam laihai khan,
lamlianhai kha a ping khaka,
Khualinzin mihaiin lam irthep irkualin kêng an fe ngai.
Debori a hong mâna,
Israel nu a hong thoi mân khan,
Om mahai, Israel laia om mahai tûte.
Mihaiin pathian dang biak an inthang,
Ei rama hin irdoi a suak tâka,
Israel mi sîngminli laia pho le ufei chôi nin om mo?
Kin renhai bâka,
Israel hruaituhai, irzuk taka zuituhai khom chu:
Sakuartung chunga chuang ngaihaio.
Nangni toihmun irsâ taka toihai khomin lamintûn zongtuhai leh hin hi thu hi inpuang roi.
Tuikhura irhâi irsê sup sup khan,
Israel rama thil roiinpui a itho chu an insîra.
Kul mikothaia khom an irbukkhôm tâka.
Har ro, har ro,
Debori, har ro, hla lei sak ta,
Abinoama nâipa, thoi ta,
Baraka, thoi roh.
Râl tamtak sala hruai dût dût ro.
Mi lian rualhai khomin an zui saa,
Râl doipui hrangin
Efraima ram rengata tuidung tamna tiang an pan,
An urêng Benjamina-haiin an hong zuia.
Makira mihai mi lianhai an zuang chuma,
Zebulun rêng ulianhai leh ile an zuang chum.
Isaka mi lianhaiin Debori an zuia,
Isaka angin, Baraka khom:
Irhôr tianga khan ama leh an intân lûta,
Reubena mihai laia chu irthêrin an oma,
Fe hrang thu chu siam infel thei mahai.
I sika mo belra rual koina theihle tum irngaia,
Belra pâl kâra nin itho mai?
Reubena mihai lak irsen an oma,
Fe hrang thu chu siam irfûk thei mahai.
Gada mihai chu Jordan râla an om daih tâka,
Dan mihai chu irkuanga an la om maia,
Asera mihai khom tuipui muang tianga,
Iva panga an om mai.
Zebulun le Naftalia mihai rêkin chu thi vângin râl an doia.
An rênghaiin an hong doia,
Khanchu, Kanaan rênghaiin Megido vadung kôl Tanak-ah khan an irdoia.
Khannisian, râllâk sum lâk hrang nei mahai.
Vâna ârsihai khomin an hong doia,
Ârsihaiin an hmun rengata Sisera chu an hong doia.
Kison tui lianin anni chu a hnôl irhmang zita.
Tianlai Kison vadungin a tâna.
O ki’rtha hrât takin fe mai roh.
Sakorhai chu an irchôma,
An ke tinhai leh hnuai inrâkin an irchôm an irchôma.
“Meroz chu khosâl inpêl ro,” a tia.
“Khataka omhai chu natakin khosâlna inpêl roh.
râl an idoi nuam loi a ni,” a tia.
Nupang murdi laia hin Jaeli Ken mi Hebera dôngma hi mi vânnei tak ni a ti.
Sisera’n tui a zonga, dût an intira,
Khuri sataka dût inkang a hong chôia, a pêka.
Nupangnu khan puan in kilna a hong chôia sinthotuhai sekchôi a hong chôia,
Sisera chu a sekchôi leh khan a lua a zêm inlûta,
A bangbarêp taka a hêma,
a hêm that chak tâka.
A’rkhûka a’rthep rupa,
an rîla, a ke bula a that raka.
A thi zel ta.
Sisera nu’n a tukver ata a lei thîra,
a zu koia. ‘Itho mo a thîr sakortâli a hong tung inhnung bâka?
Itina mo a sakorhai chu an ir-ôi bâka,’ a tia.
A rualnu vâr takhaiin a lei inthêma,
Ama le ama lungirngamna chong ar sak tâka.
“Ni man belsa hrang an zong ni ngêt a ti,
râllâk sum irsem ngêt hi an zong,
Dôngmate inkhat le inhni man belsa hrang an irvâk ni a ti,
Sisera chôi pe hrang puan satak an izong vêl ni a ti.
Rêngnu sil hrang an izong ngot ni a ti,” tiin.
O,
Ni rualhai rêk chu, misa suak angin vâr phut ri sehai tiin.
Kum sômminli sûng chu an rama irngeina a lênga.
Israel mihaiin
Midian mihai chu Israelhai nêkin an hrâta, khasikin Israel mihai chu tâng panga irbîk hrangin khur an invera, khurhaia an irbîka, kulhai an siama.
Khan, Israelhaiin chîmu thil an tho’n chu Midian mihai, Amalek mihai le Ramchâra om mihai chu an hong fea, an hong doihai ngai.
Riakbuk an siama, Israelhai chîmu songhai chu an insiat zela, Gaza dênin Israel rama khan fâk nêk om mak; belrahai, sehrâthai, sakuartunghai an lâkpai pehai ngai.
An sa pâlhai an hongpuihaia, puan inhai an hong chôia, khuai pung ang mai an ni, ram chu an hong insiat ngai a ni.
Khasikin, Israelhai chu om nalam inhre ta mahai. Israelhaiin
Midian mihai sikin Israelhai dengthei irhâi chu
Israehai kuanga deipu inkhat a tîra, “Israelhai Pathian
Aigupta hruaitu le nangni dengintheituhai kut ata nangni ki hruaisuaka, hi ram hi nangni ki pêk tâk a ni.
nin Pathian chu ki ni. Amor mihai rama om nin nia, an pathianhai chu biak no roi ki iti kha, ki chong zôm nuam mak chêi,’ a ti e,” a tia.
vântîrtôn chu a zuang inlâra, a kuang, “Nang mi hrât huaisen,
Gideona’n, “Ka pu,
Gideona’n, “Ka pu, itin mo Israelhai chu ki sansuakhai hrang? Manasea irchi laia hrâtloi tak sûnga mi ki nia, kin insûngkua laia khom nâipang tak ki ni,” a tia.
Gideona’n, “Lung nin khamin lân,
Fe pat no’n lân, thilpêk hong lâk ki ta, ni ke bula hong chôi ki ti,” a tia.
Ama khan, “Ni hong tung mâka chu hin lei om mai ki ti,” a tia.
Gideona chu ina a lûta, kêltuai a thata, chol polloi bai her sôm a chôi saa. Kêl hme chu baltia a siaa, a tui chu a bêla a siaa. Saiso thing hnuaia
vântîrtônin, “A hme le bai chol polloi kha lung chunga khan sia’n lân, a tui kha buak ro,” a tia. Khaang khan Gideona’n a thoa.
vântîrtônin a khianghrol hmorin sa le bai chol polloi kha a intôna; lung ata mei a hong suaka, sa le bai chu a kâng irhmang zit tâka.
Gideona’n
, “Charindong no ro, irtharngam takin om ro, thi no chi ni,” a tia.
Kha hmuna khan Gideona’n
Kha nî zâna khan
Hi irnêng pônga hin ni Pathian
Khanchu, Gideona’n a siahlo sômkhat a hruaia,
Zînga chu mihai an hong thoia, Baal maichâm chu a lei chima, a kôla Aseri irlim thing phun khom a kiak an hmua; maichâm thara khan sehrâtchal inhnina kha hâlirvôm thilinhlanna khan inhlan an hmua.
“Tu itho mani?” an tia. An zong irvêla, “Joasa nâipa Gideona itho a ni,” ti an inhriata.
Khanchu, khuaa mihaiin Joasa kuang, “Ni nâipa kha hong hruaisuak ro, kin ithat hrang kêng. Baal maichâm an siata, a kôla Aseri irlim irphûm khom a tanpai a ni,” an tia.

Khannisian Joasa’n khaanga tîtuhai kha a sâma, “Baal hi nin thop mo, san hrang nin itum ma ni? Baal thop murdi chu nangtûk zîng renga hin thatpai an ini hrang a ni. Pathian a ni tak takin chu a maichâm an insiat lai khan ama le ama a irhrung hrang a ni kha te,” a tia.
Khasikin, kha nî khan Gideona chu Jerubaala an phua tâk a ni, kha kha “Baalin doi ri se,” tihna a ni. Baal maichâm an siat pe sikin, Baalin hong doi ri se, an tihna a ni.
Midian mihai, Amalek mihai, ramchâra omhai chu an irbukkhôma, Jezreel irhôra riakbuk an khuara.
irtha chu Gideona chunga a oma, Abiezera mihai koi khômna’n bekul a tuma.
Manasea mihai, Asera mihai, Zebulun mihai le Naftalia mihai kuang khom palâi a tîrhaia, ama an hong irtongpuina hrangin an honga.
Gideona’n
en ro, hruizôla belra mul hi sia ki ta, belra mula vai hin irdo a tâka, a kôl vêl irnêng a chârin chu, ni ihril angin Israelhai hi nangma ni hmangin saninzôkhai thei ki ti, ti inhria ki ti,” a tia.
Nangtûk zînga a thoiin chu belra mul kha an hera, belra mula irdo chu khilât khat a suaka.

Gideona’n Pathian kuang, “Ki chunga ningmur no ro duah, voikhat vai lei hril nôk viat rong, enfiana hi Belra mula hin ni pêk nôk ro: A vuan zân chu belra mul hi hul sianlân, a kôl vêla irnêng hi chu dui ri se,” a tia.
Kha nî zân khan Pathian belra mul chu an hula, irnêng chu dui norin irdo’n an phâtira.
Khanchu Jerubaala an iti Gideona le a kuanga mi omhai chu zîng taka an thoia, Herod vadung kôla riakbuk an khuara, Midian mihaiin chu an omna hmâr tiang More tâng kôla riakbuk an khuara.
Mipui laia hril ro, “Tukhom, irdoina chia thâidôp chu Gilead tâng ata in tiang kîr nôk ri se, tiin inpuang ro,” a tia. Khanchu, mi sînghni le sânghni chu in tiang an kîra, sîngkhat chu an la om.
Khanchu, ivadunga a hruaihaia,
An kut zaphaa inliaka inliakhai chu mi irzathum an nia, mi danghai chu khûksadelin tui an indôp a ni.
Gideona kuang, “Mi irzathum, an kuta tui thâla indôp hmanghai leh hin nangni sansuak ki ti, Midian mihai chu nin kuta pêk ki ti,” a tia.
Khanchu fâk nêk pêltuhai le bekul irputtuhai le mi irzathum ti no chu mi dang chu an in tiang a tîr nôkhai zita. Midian mihai riakbuk chu an thang tiang phâia om a ni.
Zâna
Nangma zu fe ni chi’n chu ni siahlo Pura kha hruai sa roh.
An ihril chu zu’rngaiin lân, kha zoi chu an riakbuk zu doi chu a sate’n nuam ni ti,” a tia. Khanchu, a siahlo Pura leh khan râl sipai omna hmor tiang khan an zu fea.
Midian-hai, Amalek-hai le ramchâra omhai chu irhôra khan an irthek mura, khâi pung ang mai an ni, an saringseihai khom muanga chiaiphoi anga tep zoiloi an ni.

Gideona hai chu an zu tungin, mi inkhatin a rual chu a’rmang a lei inhrila, “Irmang ki neia, kin riakbuka hin barli bai tang a’rhluma, riakbuk puanin a hong dela, a del siata, hnuaia a’rdâp ziak tâk,” a tia.
A rualpa’n, “Joasa nâipa Gideona khandai a ni no’n te imo a ini hrang? Kha Israelpa kuta khan Midian-hai le sipaihai murdi hi Pathianin a pêk tâk a ni hi te,!” a tia.
Gideona’n irmang le a omzia an inhril kha a inhriatin chu Pathian chubai a mûka; Israelhai riakbuka a hong fea, an kuang, “Thoi roi, Midian mihai chu
Mi irzathum chu buk thumin a sena; bêl rong le a sûnga meiser om, bekul leh ile a pêkhai chita;
an kuang, “Mi en chak unglân, ki itho ang tho zêl roi, an riakbuk sîr tak ki tung tika ki itho angin nangni khom nin itho hrang a ni.
Kei le ki fe chanpuihaiin bekul kin tumin chu kil tina tum chit unglân, ‘
Gideona le a mi irzakhathai chu zân laia, râl hrungtuhai an irthûl lai takin riakbuk hmor chu an tunga; an bekul chu an tuma, an bêl chu an zêm khoia.
Pâl danghai khomin an bekul chu an tuma, bêl chu an zêm khoia, meiser chu an vei kutin an intûka, bekul chu an chang kuta intûkin an tuma, “Khandai chu,
Râlhai riakbuk irhîlin an ngîrna hmun chita khan an ngîra, riakbuka sipaihai chu an khêka, an intân zoi tâka.
Gideona mihaiin bekul irzathum kha an tuma;
Khan, Naftalia irchihai, Asera irchihai le Manasea irchihai Jordan nisua tiang le nitâk tianga omhai chu an koi bukhaia, Midian-hai an inhnotsuakhaia.
Gideona’n Efraima tâng rama palâi a tîrsuaka, “Hong suak unglân, Midian mihai hong doi unglân, Midian mihaiin Jordan dung le ivadung danghai chu an lei khâlhai zita.
Midian hruaitu inhni Oreba le Zeeba chu an chela, Oreb lung hmuna Oreba chu an thata, Zeeba chu Zeeb grep sômna khura an thata. Jordan râla Oreba le Zeeba lu chu Gideona kuang an hong chôia.
Efraima mihaiin Gideona kuang, “Midian mihai doi hrangin itho sika mo ni ni ikoi loi?” an tia, natakin an hala.
Gideona’n, “Nangni lei itho ngai leh hin kin itho thei sun hi ite hrilirkhîna om mak! nangni Efraima mihaiin nin itho sunhai khom hi keini namhai, Abiezera mihai itho nêkin chu a roiinpui daih kêng.
Pathianin Midian hruaitu lian Oreba hai, Zeeba hai chu nin kuta a pêk tâka, keiin ite ki itho om ual mah hi te,” a tia. Khaang khan a chong zoiin an nuarna khom chu a hong dâi tâka.
Gideona le a mi irzathumhaiin Jordan dung an irkâna, an sôl ok khomin, an râlhai chu an irzûl mai,
Sukoth khua an tunga, kha khuaa mihai kuang, Gideona’n, “Midian rêng Zeba le Zalmuna kin irzûla, ki mihai hi a sate’n an sôl tâka, ngaihoitakin fâk nêk pehai ro duah,” a tia.
Khannisian, ‘Sukoth nin kuta nin ichel tâk khom la ni loiin, itin mo ni sipai sôlhai fâk nêk kin ipêkhai hrang?’ an tia.
Gideona’n, “A dik
Kha rengata Penuel-ah an fea, an kuang, Sukoth mihai a ti ang ngêt khan a ngênhaia, anni khomin Sukoth-hai isâm ang ngêtin an sâma,
Penuel-ah mihai kuang khom khan, “Hoitak le dam taka ki hong kîr nôk tika nin khua hi inram chit ki ti,” a tia.
Zeba le Zalmuna chu Karkor khuaa, an sipaihai leh an oma, ramchâra omhai chu mi nuai khat le sînghni irdoinaa an thi tâka, a thi zoiloi la damhai mi sîngkhat le sâng ringa’n chu an la zui mai a ni.
Gideona chu Noba le Zogbeha nisua tiang thingtâng lampuia a fea, irningloiin a râlhai le an irtok thuta.
Midian rêng Zeba le Zalmuna chu an intâna; khannisian an irzûla, an chela; an sipaihai chu a saterengin an buai tâka.
An irdoi zoiin chu Gideona chu Heres lam tunga a hong kîra.
Sukoth mi ruatharte inkhat hi a chela, an khuaa hruaituhai le upahai irhming ar dona.

Gideona chu Sukoth khua a va fea, an kuang, “Zeba le Zalmuna hi en ta roi, Zeba le Zalmuna hi, nin kuta om tâk mannia, ‘nin sipai sôlhai hi fâk nêk itin mo kin ipêkhai hrang’ tia nin ni ihril kha,” a tia.
Ramchâra ilhling le sûl ilhlingnei a lâka, an khuaa hruaituhai chu a chela, Sukoth mihai mit hmua, kha ilhling leh khan a zêmhaia.
Penuel kul banghai chu ansiata, a sûnga mihai chu a that zita.
Gideona’n Zeba le Zalmuna chu, “Tabor tânga mi nin ithathai kha i ang mi man ni?” tiin ar donhaia. Anni’n, “An ir-ang zit, rêng nâihai nia irhoi tak an ni,” an tia.
Gideonan, “Ka uhai, ka nu tak nâihai ngêt an ni.
A nâipa upatak Jethera kuang, “Thoiin lân, thathai ro,” a tia. Khannisian, khandai chu irlek ma, a la nâipang hrai sikin, a ithat ngamhai loi a ni.

Zeba le Zalmuna khan, Gideona kuang, “Nangma kha hongin lân, ni that ro, pa le pa irdoi hrang a ni hi te,” an tia. Gideona chu a thoia, Zeba le Zalmuna chu a thathaia, an sakuartung ringa irtheihai khom a lâkpai pehaia.
Israel mihaiin Gideona kuang, “Midian mihai kut ata ni ni sansuaka, kin chunga roirêltua om roh, ni nâihai, ni tuhai khom roirêltua hong chang zêl ri sehai,” an tia.
Gideona’n, “Nin chunga roirêltua chang no ning; ki nâihai khom chang no nihai, nin chunga roirêltu hrang chu

Gideona’n an kuang, “Thil inkhat nangni ngên hrang ki nuam a ni, mi tinin râlhai bômzoi nin ilâk kha inkhat ni pe chit unglân ki nuam!” a tia. (Ismaela mihai an ni sikin rângachak bômzoi an nei seng a ni.)
Anni’n, “Inhnar ma ung, pe kin ti,” an tia. Puan an dâpa, râl bômzoi an lâk chu an pêk senga.
Khaang khan an ipêk khom rângachak bômzoi chu her sôminhni vêl a ni. Midian rênghai irvôna, ringzêlhai, hnâr bethai, puan sendukhai le an saringsei ring khita neihai chu tep sa ni mah.
Gideona’n kha rângachakhai leh khan Efod a siama, a omna khua Ofra-ah khan a siaa. Israelhaiin an Pathian an mâksana, Gideona le a in mihai ta hrangin châng ichiom tak a hong ni tâka.
Khanchu, Midian mihai chu Israelhaiin an inhnêhaia, ite châng thei ta mahai. Gideona dam sûng chu ram kha kum sômminli irngeina a lêng.
Gideona, Jerubaala an ti ngai chu, ama in tiang a fea.
Gideona’n dôngma a nei intama, nâipasal sômsari a neia.
Sekem khuaa a lâksîrin nâipasal a nei pe saa, ar hming chu Abimeleka an phuaa.
Joasa nâipa Gideona chu a tar ok tena a thia, Abiezera mihai ram Ofra khuaa, a pa Joasa thâna an phûm sa tâka.
Gideona a thi hnunga chu Israel mihai chu hnungtôlin an oma, Baal an biak tâka, Baal-berith chu pathiana an hong siam tâk.
Hmun tina an râlhai kut ata sansuaktu
Gideona’n chu Israelhai chunga theidôra irnak songin a om ngaia chu anni’n Gideona insûng mihai chu inren viat ngai mahai.
Gideona nâipa, Abimeleka chu Sekem khuaa a nu ina khan a fea, a nu insûng mihai le a nu panamhai kuang,

“Sekem mihai hin, Gideona nâi sômsarihaiin nin chunga roirêl ri seh mo nin ti, mi inkhat vaiin mo, hril roi, nin tia ni’n chu kei hi nin nâihai laia nin thisen irzompui omsun ki ni, nin inhriat mai hrang a ni” a tia.
A nu nuchahaiin Sekem mihai kuang kha thu kha an hrila, Abimeleka hnungzui chu an nuam tâka, “Kin urêngpa a ni tâk hi te,” an tia.
Khanchu, Baal-berith an biakna in ata tangka sum sômsari an pêka, kha sum leh khan Abimeleka’n mi inriang tak tak le mi hmanghmunboihai a hruaihaia, anni’n ama an zui tâka.
A pa insûng mihai omna Ofra khuaa khan a va fea, Gideona nâihai, a uhai sômsari chu lung inkhat chunga a that tôla, nâipangtak Jothama rêk chu ar bîka, that mahai.
Khanchu Sekem mi le Bethmilo mi murdi chu an irbukkhôma, Sekem kôla Saiso thing hnuaia Abimeleka chu rênga an siam tâka.
Kha kha Jothama an hrila, Gerizim tâng sîpa khan a fea, theitôpin a khêka, hiang hin a tia, ‘Sekem mihaio, ki thu hi irngai u ta, Pathian khomin nin thu a irngai hrang a ni.
Voikhat chu rêng inthang tumin thing murdi an irbukkhôma, oliv thing kuang, “Nang kin rêng ni hrangin om ro,” an tia.
Oliv thingin, “Pathian le mihriam chôiindômna hrangin an ni hmang tak, ki hriak hi suaksanin thinghai chunga hi tiang kha tiang ki isem vêl thei hrang mo?” a tia.
Theipui kung kuang, “Nang hongin lân, kin rêng hrangin om ro,” an tia.
Khannisianlân, theipui kungin an kuang, “Ki thumna le ki ra satak hi suaksanin thinghai chunga hi tiang kha tiang ki isem thei hrang mani?” a tia.
Khan grep hrui kung kuang, an fea, “Nang ngêt, hongin lân, kin rêng chang hrangin om roh,” an tia.
Grep hruiin, “Nangni rêng hrangin om ta inlân, Pathian le mihriam inlômtu, uain sômna hrang grep ra nei hrang mo ki la nia,” a tia.
Inhnungkhôn taka chu, thing murdi chu thing ilhlingnei kuang an fea, “Nang hi chu kin rêng ni ichang ngêt hrang a ni,” an tia.
Thing ilhlingneiin, “Rêng ni hrangin nin ni nuam tâkin chu ki kung hnuaia hin hong roi; nin hong nuam no’n chu ki ôn ilhling rengata mei hong suak a ta, Lebanon Sidar-hai kâng fâi zit a ti,” a tia.
Jothama’n a hril zêla, “Abimeleka rênga nin isiam hi dik le fel tak tho mo nin ni? Gideona chu a sintho irphu ang ngei ngaisângin, a insûng mi khom dik takin nin chôiindôm nuam mo?
Inhre roi, ka pa, Gideona’n Midian mihai kut ata nangni a sansuaka, thi irhuamin irnak a isong a ni kha.

Atûn hin chu, ka pa insûng mihai chunga nin doia, a nâipasal sômsari chu lung inkhat chunga nin thathaia, a siahlonu nâipa, ni irzirpui nâi Abimeleka hi Sekem khuaa mihai rênga nin hong isiam tâk a ni hi.
A vuan sûn hin Gideona le a insûng mihai chunga thil diktak le feltak nin tho’n chu Abimeleka chu lômtakin zui unglân, ama khomin nin chunga lôm ri se.
Khaang khan a ni no’n chu, Abimeleka rengata mei hong suak sianlân, Sekem le Bethmilo mihai rengata mei hong suak sianlân Abimeleka chu kâng ri se,” a tia.
A upa Abimeleka a china sikin Jothama chu a rot intâna, Beer khuaa a va om tâka.
Abimeleka’n Israelhai chunga kum thum rêng a changa.
Abimeleka le Sekem mihai chu Pathianin a’rdoitirhaia, Sekem mihaiin Abimeleka chu vârirlek takin an doi tâka.
Gideona nâi sômsarihai chunga rông taka an that sikin an thisen phuba mophurna chu Abimeleka le ama thoptu Sekem mihai chunga a chum tâk a ni.
Sekem mihaiin tâng sîpa Abimeleka lei inruang hrangin mihriam an siahaia, kha mihai khan tukhom kha tianga hong kai chu an lei long polhai ngai. Kha thurchi kha Abimeleka an inhrila.
Khan, Ebeda nâipa Gaala chu a sangpahai leh Sekem-ah an hong; Sekem mihaiin an lei iam zoihaia.
Khanchu, loihaia an fea, grep rahai an irhmala, kût an hmanga, an pathian ina an lûta, an fâkin an ina, Abimeleka chu khua an sâla.
Ebeda nâipa Gaala’n, “Sekem mihai hin imo an inhriata? Itho mo Abimeleka sin nin itho pe? Gideona nâipa kha mo ni ma? Zebula lak hi a thu thua om a nia. Nin pu Hamora irchihai sin hi tho ual roi ba.
Hruaitu ni inlân chu Abimeleka hi inhnotsuak ngêt ki ti. Abimeleka, sipai lâk sa’n lân, hong suak ro, irdoi ei ti, ti ngêt ki ti,” a tia.
Khua hruaitu Zebula’n, Ebeda nâipa Gaala thuhril an hriatin chu a sân a ning an mur tâka.
Abimeleka kuanga inrûktein palâi Aruma-ah a tîra, Sekema Ebeda nâipa Gaala le a urênghai an honga, khuaa mihai hi ni chunga irdoina siam hrangin an inphûthai tâk.
Khasikin, zân zâna hongin lân, ni mihai kha hong hruaiin lân, rama lei inruanghai hrangin thupinrûkhai roh.
Zîng taka thoiin lân khopui chu hong irhualrup zel unglân, nangni doi hrangin Gaala le a mihai hong suak chu nin nuamlam ang takin lôhai roi,” a tia.
Khanchu, Abimeleka chu a mihai leh a zân zânin an irthoka, an suaka, hmun minlia irsemin Sekem khua chu an irhuala.
Ebala nâipa Gaala chu a hong suaka, kul mikota khan a ngîra. Abimeleka le a mihai chu an irbîk inrûkna ata an hong suaka.
Gaala khan mipuihai a hong hmu’n chu Zebula kuang, “En ta, tâng rengata mipui an hong suak,” a tia. Zebula’n, “Tâng irhlîm so mihriam mani tiin ni ihmu’nsual ni a ti,” a tia.
Gaala’n, “En ta, tâng bula so! mi an hong suak ngei so te, pôlkhat dang khom Meonenim rengata an hong so te,” a tia.

Zebula’n hi ang hin a ti tâka: “Abimeleka hi tu mo a ini, a sin kin itho pe hrang? tia ni ihrilna chongbâi kha khôn mo a om tâk? Ni ihmumâkhai tak tak kha an ni so. Suakin lân, va doihai ta ro,” a tia.
Gaala’n Sekem mihai chu a hruaisuaka, Abimeleka chu a doia.
Abimeleka’n a’rzûla, an tân tâka. Kul mikot bul dênin mi tamtak pop chitin an irtet phura.
Abimeleka chu Aruma khuaa om a nia. Zebula’n Gaala le a urênghai chu Sekem rengata an hnotsuaka, om thei ta mahai.
Tûk nôka chu Abimeleka’n Gaala le a urênghai chu Sekem khua pên tiang an intân suak hrang ti an hriatin,
a mihai chu a hruaihaia, pâl thumin a sena, pên tiang a lei inruanga. Mihai chu an hong suaka, a thoia, a doi tâka.
Abimeleka le a mihai chu kul mikot bula inrang takin an intâna, an va nghâka, a rualhai pâl hnihai’n pên tianga lei suak tâkhai kha an irzûlhaia, an that zita.
Abimeleka’n khua chu sûn sôtin a doia, a lâk tâka. A sûnga mihai chu a thathaia, khua chu an siata, michi a phul zuta.
Sekem khuaa hruaitu lian ual ualhai chu Baal-Berith biakna in kul kilkhôra khan an intân khôma.
Khuaa hruaitu ual ualhai an intân khôm thu chu Abimeleka’n a lei inhriata.

Zalmon tânga khan Abimeleka chu a hong luia, a mihai murdi’n an zuia, Abimeleka’n hrei lian a lâka, thing ôn a tuk thâka, a dâra a’rputa; a mihai kuang, “Ki itho lam ang takin nangni khom tho roi,” a tia.

Abimeleka mihai murdi chu thing ôn an lâk chita, Abimeleka itho angin kul kilkhôra khan an sia zêla, kul kilkhôr chu an hâl khum tâka; khuaa hruaitu ual ualhai khom chu an thi zit tâka, pasal le nupang tepin sângkhat vêl an thi.
Abimeleka chu Thebes khuaa a fea, a’rhuala, a lâk tâka.
Khuaa khan in irsâng inkhat, iamom tak hi a oma. Kha khan mi murdi nupang pasal, khuaa hruaituhai leh an hong intân khôma, an irkalkhum khaka, in irsâng sîp inzôla khan an hong luia.
Abimeleka chu in irsâng bula khan a hong fea, lampui chu hâl tumin a va nâia.
Nu inkhatin bu nôina lung chunginta ual hi a lua a zu’nthâka, a lubûr chu a koi tâk.
Ruatharte, a râltukfam pêlpu chu, a koi lata, “Ni khandai kha lan lân, ni that ro, mi’n nupang ithat kêng tina duai an ti,” a tia.
Ruathartepa khan a that sabak tâka. Israel mihaiin Abimeleka a thi tah ti an inhriatin anni khua in tiang an kîr nôk tâka.
Khaang kha a pa le a urêng sômsari chunga a thilsual tho sikin Pathianin an tuangtira.
Sekemmihai khom an thilinsual thôna sikin, Pathianin a intuangtirhaia, Gideona nâipa Jothama khomâksâm chu anni chunga a tung tâk a ni.
Abimeleka a thi hnunga khan Isakara irchi laia mi Pua nâipa Tola, Dodoa tupa, Efraim tâng ram Samir khuaa om chu Israelhai sansuak hrangin ar siama.
Kum sômhni inthum sûng Israelhai chu a hruaia, a thia, Samir khuaa khan an phûma.
Tola thi hnunga Gilead mi Jaira a hong om nôka.
Israelhai chu kum sômhni inhni a hruaihaia. Nâipasal sômthum a neia, kha mihai khan chuangna hrang sakuartung an nei chita.
Gilead rama khopui sômthum an neia, kha khua irhming chu “Jair khua” ti a ni mai tâk. Jaira chu a thia, a omna Kamon khuaa an phûma.
Israel mihaiin
chu Israelhai chunga a sân a ning an mur tâka, Filistia mihai le Amon mihai kuta a pêka.
Amon mihaiin kum sômkhat kiriat sûng chu Jordan nisua tianga Amor mihai ram Gilead-a Israel omhai chu dengtheia lunginzîng takin an siahaia.
Khan Amon irchihai kha Juda, Benjamina le Efraima irchihai doi hrangin Jordan râl an kâia; khasikin Israelhai chu a sân an lunginzîng tâka.
Israelhaiin
R
Zidon mihai, Amelek mihai le Maon mihaiin deng nangni an intheitira, nin ni koia, nangni ki saninzôk a ni kha.
Khan khomin, nin ni la’rheisana, pathian dang sin nin tho pea; khasikin, nangni saninzôk viat no ning.
Nin inuam tak pathian danghai kuanga khan fe ta roi; nangni sansuak hrangin ngên unglân, lunginzîng nin tuang lai khomin nangni sansuak ri se,” a tia.
Israelhaiin
Khanchu, an kôla pathian dang irlimhai chu an paia,
Khan Amon-hai chu an irbukkhôma, Gilead hmuna riakbuk an khuara, Israelhai khom an irbukkhôma, Gilead biala Mizpa khuaa riakbuk an khuar saa.
Israel mihai le Gilead-a an hruaituhaiin, “Amon mihai doi hrangin tu mo malam hruai hrang? Gilead ram pumpui sûnga hruaitua la chang a ti,” an tia.
Gilead mi, Jeftha chu pa hâitak a nia, a nu chu notizuar a ni. Gileada nâi a ni.
Gileada dôngma’n nâipasal a nei maia, khahai chu an hong ulianin Jeftha chu an inhnotsuaka, ‘Kin pa insûng irchon nangin lua thei no chi ni, nu danga nâi ni ni hi,’ an tia.
Jeftha chu a urênghai khua rengata a suaka, Tob rama a om tâka. Jeftha chu mi dukdak loihaiin an zuia.
Amon mihaiin Israelhai an hong doia khan
Gilead hruaituhai chu Tob khuaa om Jeftha chu hruai hrangin an fea,
Jeftha kuang, “Amon mihai kin doi theina hrangin kin hruaitu taka hong chang ro ba,” an tia.
Jeftha’n Gilead upahai chu a sâma, “Nin ni ennuam no sikin, nin pa in ata nin ni inhnotsuaka, dengtheina nin tuang tena itho sika mo nin ni hong ipan hi?” a tia.
Gilead upahaiin Jeftha chu hiang hin an sâma, “Kha sik taka khan a ni, Amon-hai ni doipuia ni hruai hrangin nang kin nuam, Gilead mihai hi nangin ni hruai hrang a ni,” an tia.
Jeftha’n, “Amon-hai doi hrangin ni hruai kîra,
Gilead upahaiin, “Ni nuamlam angin tho kin ti,
Khanchu, Jeftha’n Gilead upahai chu a zuia, mihaiin an hruaitua le a lutaka an siam tâka, Jeftha’n a thil phut chu Mizpa khuaa khan
Jeftha’n Amon rêng kuang palâi a tîra, “Kin ram doi hrangin itho mo ni hong irrol,?” a tia.

Amon rêngin palâihai kuanga, “Aigupta ram ata Israelhai an hong suaka khan ki ram an nir chupuia, khasik taka khan a ni. Arnon dung le Jabok dung kâra, Jordan irhôr chu an ni lâkpai pea, hihai hi hril intam loiin an ni ipêk kîr hrang a ni,” a tia.
Jeftha’n palâihai chu Amon rêng kuanga a tîrhai nôka,
“Moab le Amon ram hi Israelhaiin lâkpai mahai.
Aigupta ram ata Israelhai an hong suak khan ramchâra fe thalin tuipui sena an fea, Kades an tunga.
Edom rêng kuang, ‘Ni ram sûnga lûtin nin fetir ro,’ tia an ngên lai khan lei phal ma, khaang ngêtin Moab rêng khom an ngêna, lei phalhai maka; Israelhai chu Kades-ah an om maia.

Edom ram lût loiin ramchâra irkual pumin an fea, Moab ram rêng khom phal maka, Moab khua nisua tiang an irkuala, Moab ram lût loiin an ramri dung Arnon phâi, an ram ni loina lam tiang riakbuk an khuara.
Israelhaiin Amor mi Hesbon rêng Sihona kuanga khom, ‘Kin rama fe hrangin ni ram sûng hong lût kin ti,’ tia an ngên kha,
Sihona’n lei phal maka, a mihai a koikhôma, Jahaz hmuna riakbuk a khuara, Israelhai chu a doi tâka.
Khannisian, Israelhai Pathian
Khanchu, Amor-hai ram, Arnon dung le Jabok dung kâra, ramchâr le Jordan dung kâra ram chu an nei tâk a ni.
Israelhai Pathianin Amor mihai ram a lâkpai pehaia, Israel mihai a ipêk chu, nangin neipai hrang ni itum ma ni?
Ni pathian Khemosa’n ram nang a ipêk kha neiin lân, kin Pathian
Moab rêng Zipora nâipa Balaka nêka hrâtin ni inhriat ma ni?

Kum irzathum zel Israelhai hin Hesbon khopui le Aroer khopui hi, an kôl vêl khuahai leh ile, Arnon vadung kôl khopui murdi leh hin an hong lua tâka, kha sûnga khan chu lâkpai pe hrang rêng ni itum ngailoi.
Khasikin, keini’n thilsual kin nei moa, nangni’n nin ni hong idoi mai hi nin itho indik loi a ni.
Khannisianlân, Amon rêngin Jeftha chong kha irngai pe nuam ual mah.
Jeftha chu
in rengata râl ram kin hong kîr nôka ni lei lôm hranga hong suak masatak chu tukhom ni ri se,
Jeftha chu Amon mihai rama khan a fe tâka; a va doia,
Aroer khua ata Minit bial khua sômhni, Abel-Keramim dênin a lâk kîra, a that chita. Israel mihai makunga khan Amon-hai chu an duai tâka.
Jeftha chu Mizpa khua a ina a fe nôka. Irngai ta, ama lôm hrangin a nâinu chu khuangtehai leh a lei lâm suaka. Ama chu a nâi neisun a ni, nâipasal mani nâinupang mani nâi dang rêng rêng nei mah.
A nâinu a hong hmu’n chu beidongin a puan an potthêra, “A poi oke! ki nâinu, nangma kher hi! ki milung nin siatin ki milung ni nin zîngtir tak taka!
Ama’n, “Ka pa
A pa kuanga khan “Hiang hin ni itho hrang; tha hni sûng chu ki bingin ni sia unglân, ki rualhai leh tânga khun zu fe kin ta, nupang dôngmate irthiang ki ni laia tho hrang hi zu sûn ki ti,” a tia.
A pa’n an fetira, tha hni sûng chu an omtir tâka. A rualhai leh khan tânga an fea, nâi neiloia a ithi hrang chu an sûna.
Tha hni zoia khan a pa kuanga a hong kîr nôka,
Israelhai laia, Israel dôngmate’n, kum tin Gilead mi Jeftha nâinu sûn hrangin sûn minli an hmang ngai, dâna an hong nei tâka.

Efraima mihai chu an irbukkhôma, Jordan râl Zafon-ah an kâia. Jeftha kuang, “Amon mihai doi hrangin ramri ni khêla, itho sika mo kop sa hrangin ni ni ikoi loi? Ni in chu nang leh ile kin ihâl hrang a ni,” an tia.
Jeftha’n, “Amon mihai le kin mihai hi thei dôrin kin irkhal a ni. Ni changpui hrangin nangni ki koia, ni changpui loia nin iom a ni kha.
Ni changpui nuam mak chêi ti kin hriatin mâni hringna irhuamin ramri ki’rkân tâka, kin va doia,
Jeftha’n Gilead mihai chu a koi khôma, Efraima-hai chu a doia, an hnê tâka. Efraima-haiin, “Nangni Gilead-hai hi Efraima le Manasea ram rengata chaninvâia hong intân irhmang nin ni,” an tia.
Gilead-haiin Jordan dâi kâi hrang phalna an hong zongin Gilead-haiin, “Efraima mi mo nin ni?” an lei ti thiaia. “Ni ma ung,” a ti’n chu,
“Shibolet lei ti ta,” an tia; a’rlam dân fia thei loia, ‘Sibolet a ti’n chu an chela, Jordan vadung kôla khan an that zel ngai. Kha zoro nia Efraima mi thi murdi chu sîngminli le sânghni an ni.
Jeftha’n Israelhai chu kum ruk a hruaia, a thia, Gilead a omna khuaa an phûma.
Jeftha zoia Bethlehem khuaa mi Ibzana’n Israelhai chu a hruaihaia.

Ibzana’n nâipasal sômthum le nâinupang sômthum a neia. A nâinu sômthumhai chu an mâni irchipui nam ni loi, kho dang mi pasal an neitirhaia; a nâipa sômthumhai khom mâni chipui nei loiin ram dang mi sômthum a hruai pehaia. Ibzana’n Israelhai chu kum riat a hruaia.
A thia, Bethlehem khuaa an phûma.
Ibzana hnunga khan Zebulun mi Elona’n Israelhai chu kum sôm a hruaia.
Elona chu a thia, Zebulun ram Aijalon khuaa an phûma.
Elona hnunga khan Pirathon khuaa mi Hilela nâipa Abdona hin Israelhai chu a hruaia.
Abdona’n nâipasal sômminli le tupa sômthum a neia, an chuangna hrang sakuartung sômsari a neia. Abdona’n Israelhai chu kum riat a hruaia.
Abdona chu a thia, Efraima ram Amalek-hai omna tâng ram Pirathon khuaa an phûm tâka.
Israelhai chu
Khan, Zora khuaa Dana irchi, mi pasal inkhat, Manoa a oma, a dôngma chu a chinga, nâi rêng rêng nei mahai.
Nupangnu kuang
Khasikin, irdîn takin omin lân, uain mani zû mani in viat no ro, Sa irthiangloi khom fa viat no roh.
Nâi ni vong, nâipasal ni inei hrang hi, a lu voiinkol loi hrang a ni. Pathian ta hrangin a suak ata Nazarit mi ni a ti. Ama’n Filistia mihai kut ata Israelhai sansuakna sin tho phut a ti,” a tia.
Nupang kha a fea, a pasal kuang, “Pathian mi ki kuang a zuanga, a hmêl chu

Irngai ta, nâi vong ni ta, nâipasal nei ni ti, uain mani zû mani in viat no ro, sâ irthiang loi khom fâk viat no ro, ni nâi nei hrang chu a suak rengata a thi dênin Pathian ta hranga Nazarit mi ni a ti, tiin a ni hrila,” a tia.
Manoa’n,
Pathianin Manoa ngênna kha a lei irngaia, khan nupang kha loia a toi laiin Pathian vântîrtôn kha a zuang inlâr nôka, a pasal Manoa chu om sa mah.
Khasikin, inrang takin nupang chu a pasal kuang an tâna, “Matona ki kuanga zuang, ki iti kha a zuang nôk tâk e,” a va tia.
Manoa chu a thoia, a dôngma chu a zuia, mi chu a va hmua, “Nupang kuanga thuhriltu kha ni ni mo?” a tia. Ama’n, “Ki ni,” a lei tia.
Manoa’n, “Ni thu anga thil a hong tung hnunga nâite chu itina enkol hrang mani, itin mo a hringnun a hong ini hrang?” a tia.
grep kung rengata thil ite a ifâk hrang ni ma, uain mani zû mani in viat no ri se. Ki ihril murdi kha zôm sianlân, thil irthiangloi khom fa no ri se,” a tia.
Manoa’n
Manoa’n
Khanchu, Manoa’n kêlte chu a thata, bu le bâl thilinhlan leh hâlirvôm thilinhlana lungpui chunga khan
Lungpui maichâm rengata meikhû irvân tiang a fe’n chu
Manoa-hai sangramin kha mei kha
Khan Manoa’n, a dôngma kuang, “Ei ithi ngêt hrang a ni, Pathian ei hmu tâk hi te,” a tia.
A dôngma rêkin chu, “
Khan, nupangin nâipasal a neia, ar hming Samsona a phuaa; nâi chu a hong liana,
irtha’n Zora le Estaol kâra Mahane-dan hmuna khan Samsona chu a hong pôl irphut tâka.
Samsona chu Timna khuaa a zu fea, Timna khuaa Filistia dôngmate inkhat chu a zu hmua,
a hong kîr nôka, a nu le pa kuanga, “Timna khuaa Filistia dôngmate inkhat ki zu hmua, ki dôngma hrangin ni biak pe roi,” a tia.

A nu le a pa’n, “Ei irchipui laia mani, ei mihai laia mani dôngma hrang an om loi mani na? Itho sika mo ser tanloi Filistia mi dôngmaa nei ni inuam tâk?” an tia. Samsona’n a pa kuang, “Nin neitir zel roi, ki indit tak a ni,” a tia.
Khannisianlân, a nu le pa’n, kha kha
Khanchu, Samsona chu a nu le pa leh khan Timna-ah an zu fea, Timna-ah grep irhuan hi an zu tunga; khan irngai ta, kâmkeibaknei hrâtlai hin a hong inhrâm khumhaia.
Irningloiin
Khan, khuaa khan a zu fea, nupang chu a zu chongpuia, Samsona’n a sân an dita.
Zoro idôr mani fe hnunga chu zu neia zu hruai hrangin a zu fe nôka, kâmkeibaknei ruak kha en hrangin a va pêta, kâmkeibaknei puma khuai lei om mur mur le khuaihlutui tamtak om kha a va hmua.
Khuai hlutui chu a lâka, a fe balamin a fâk zêla, a nu le a pa khom a pêka, an fâka, kâmkeibaknei ruak ata a lâk a nih ti a pahai hril mah.
A pa chu dôngmate ina khan a zu fea; khataka khan ruathartehai iti ngai dân angin Samsona’n hruai an thêa.
Filistian mihaiin ama rual hrangin ruatharte sômthum an inkung pea.
Samsona’n an kuang, “Irôro nangni irdon ki ti, hruaithe sûng sûn saria a omzia nin inhriatin chu puansil irnêm sômthum le irsakna puan irnêm sômthum nangni pe ki ti.
Nin inhriat no’n chu puansil irnêm le irsakna hrang puan sômthum nin ni ipêk hrang,” a tia. “Ni irôro chu lei hril ta, lei irngai kin ti,” an tia.
An kuang, “Fâktu rengata fâk hrang a hong oma,
Hrât tak rengata thil thum a hong suak,”
ti hi, a tia.

Sûn thum an ngaitua khomin a omzia inhre thei mahai. A sûn sari nî chu Samsona dôngma kuang an fea, “Ni pasal chu a irôro hril hrangin ngên ro; khano’nchu, nang le ni insûng mihai hi kin ihâl thathai hrang. Hmâimôk ni sak hrangin mo ni ni ifial?” an tia.

Samsona dôngma chu a pasal makunga a chapa, “Ni lungthung viat loia, ni ni ihnôl a ni hi; kin mi ruathartehai irôro nir donhaia, a omzia khom nin hril nuam mak che,” a tia. A kuang, “Ka nu le pa lua khom hril loiin, nang ki inhril hrang mo?” a tia.
Hruai an inthê sûng sûn sari sûng chu a chap a chapa, a ngên ngut ngut sikin a sûn sari nî chu a hril pe tâka, a dôngma’n a mihai a hril tâka.

Khataka khuaa ruathartehaiin a sûn sari nî, misa tâk mân a kuang an honga, “Khuai hlutui nêka thum imo om? Kâmkeibaknei nêka hrât ual i mani?” an tia. Samsona’n, “Ki sehrât irla hi irnêng inpholtir no unglân chu,
ki irôro hi inhre viat no chin ni,”
a tia.
Khan, Samsona dôngma chu inneinaa rual hranga a ihmang, a rualpa kha a dôngma hrangin an pêk tâka.
Inhnunga chu bu ât laiin Samsona’n kêlte chôiin a dôngma chu a va pana, “Ki dôngma chontana va lût ki ti,” a tia. Khannisian, a tarpu’n lei phal ta maka.
A tarpu’n, “Ni indit viat ta loi mani kin tia, ni rualpa inkhat kha kin lei inneitir tâk a ni hi te. A sangnu hi a hmêl a sa uala, lungkham takin ama irthûla nei zel ta roh,” a tia.
Samsona’n, “Atûnlai hin Filistia mihai hi lei longnenghai ta rong,” a tia.
Samsona chu a suaka, sihal sômthum a chela, inhni an irmei a suiirzomhaia, a suiirzomna taka khan meiser a siaa.
Meiser chu an choka, Filistian-hai loia bubil hmuna khan sihalhai chu an suaa. Bu pâr le bu indinglai chu a kâng suat suata, oliv hmunhai khom a kâng saa.

Filistia mihaiin, “Tu itho ma ni?” an tia. “Timna khua mi mâkpa Samsona itho a ni hi te. A dôngma kha a tarpu’n a lâk pea, a rualpa a pêkpai a ni kha,” an tia. Filistia mihai chu an honga, kha nupang le a pa chu an in leh ile an hâl thathai tâka.
Samsona’n, “Hianga nin itho a ni’n chu nin chunga phuba ki lâk mâka chu mong no ning,” a tia.
Khanchu, an chunga a tho tâka, mi tamtak a thata, Etam lungpui khura a lûta, a om mai tâka.
Filistia mihai chu an hong fea, Judai rama riakbuk an khuara, Lehi vêla an inzardara,
Judai ram mihaiin, “Itho sika mo ni doi hranga nin ihong hi?” an tia. Anni’n, “Samsona khitphiara, a ni ilong lam angin long hrangin kin ihong irsiam a ni,” an tia.

Judai ram mi sângthum Etam rôl khura khan an zu fea, Samsona kuang, “Filistia-hai hi kin chunga thuneituhai an nih ti inhre mak che mo? Kin chunga ni tho lam hi itina mani tâk?” an tia. Ama khan, “An ni ilong angin an chunga ki itho a ni kha,” a lei tia.
Anni’n, “Filistia mihai kuta pêk hrangin nang khit hrang kin ni,” an tia. Samsona’n, “Nangni’n ki chunga kut insumloi hrangin chong irkhâm phot roi,” a tia.
Samsona kuang, “A ni nang khit kin ta, an kuta pêk kin ti, nang that no ni ung,” an tia. Khanchu, hruihrual thar inhniin an khita, khur ata chu an hong hruaisuaka.
Lehi hmun an hong tungin chu Filistia-haiin an lei dona, an khêk mur mura;
Sakuartung irkamru thar tak hi a hmua, a lâka, mi sângkhat vêl a van zui thathaia.
Samsona’n, “Sakuartung irkam ru maiin ki that tôla,
A sâng têlin ki vîk thathaia,
Sakuartung irkam ru chârin,” a tia.
Kha thu kha a hril zoiin sakuartung irkam ru chu a paia, kha hmun kha Ramat-lehi an phua tâka.
Samsona chu a tui an hrâl tak taka,
Khan, Lehi hmuna khur om chu
Filistia mihai zoro lai khan Samsona’n Israel mihai chu kum sômhni a hruaia.
Samsona chu Gaza khuaa a fea, notizuar a hmua, a zâlpuia.
Gaza khuaa hruaituhaiin Samsona a hong ti an inhriatin chu an irhuala, “Khua hong vâr phot ri seh that ei ti,” an tia; dâihrekin kul mikot bula khan zânkhovârin an inruanga.

Khannisianlân, Samsona chu zân chimrip ten vai a oma; zân chimripa khan a thoia, khopui kul mikot chu a chela, a khâra, a chopui le a kalnahai kha a phôipai zita, Hebron tâng sîp taka a hong sia tâka.
Kha hnunga khan Sorek irhôra om dôngmate inkhat, a’rhming Delili chu ar ditpuia.

Filistia hruaitu ulianhai ringa a kuang an honga, “Itina mo hiang dôra a ihrât, itin mo kin inhnê thei hrang, inhriat tum ro ba; ama khita kin soisak theina hrangin tangka sum sângkhat le irzakhat nang pe chit kin ti,” an tia.
Khanchu, Delili’n Samsona kuang, “I sika mo hiang dôra ni ihrât nin hril ro ba; itin mo nang khit inlân nang kin soisak thei hrang?” a tia.
Samsona’n a kuang, “Saihli thal hrui thar la chârloi sari leh hin ni khithai sianlân, hrât no ninga, mi danghai ang mai ni ta ki ti,” a tia.
Khanchu, Filistia hruaitu ulianhaiin saihli thal hrui thar la chârloi sari an hong chôia, kha leh khan Samsona chu an khita.

Delili chontan sûngrila lei inruangtuhai an oma, a kuang, “Samsona thoi ro, Filistia mihaiin nang doi hrang an ni,” a tia. Khan, saihli thal hruihai chu patzâi meiser leh hâl sat ang maiin a chat chit tâka. A hrât nasan chu lan hre thei mahai.
Delili’n Samsona kuang, “Nin hril mak che, ni ni huang a ni: a dik takin nin hril ro, itin mo khit phiar thei ni ini hrang,” a tia.
Ama’n, “Hruihrual thar, la hmang viat ngai loi leh hin ni khithai sian, hrât no ninga, mi danghai ang mai ni ta ki ti,” a tia.

Delili’n hruihrual thar la hmang viat ngai loi chu a lâka, a khitphiara, “Samsona, Filistia mihaiin nang hong doi hrang an ni ta,” a tia. Lei inruangtuhai chu chontan sûngrila an oma, an hong suaka. Khan, a khitna hruihrual chu patmal ang takin an potsat chit tâka.

Delili’n Samsona kuang, “Ni ni la huang maia, dikloi thu ni ni la ihril nôk a ni hi. Itin tak mo nang khit inlân ni ihrât theiloi hrang?” a tia. Samsona’n, “Ki sam phiar sari hi puana không sa’n lân a kilna leh kil khakin lân, hrât ta no ning, mi danghai angin ni ta ki ti,” a tia.
Delili’n a sam chu a kil khaka, a kuang, “Samsona, Filistia mihaiin nang hong doi hrang an ni ta,” a tia. Ama chu a hong hara, a sam kildêna timmatuahai chu a phôi chita, a sam chu a kêlsua paia.
Delili’n, “Voithum reng ni ni huang tâka, itin mo ki lungthung ni ni la iti thei? lung ni thung tak tak mak che, ni hrât nasan khom nin hril nuam mak che,” a tia.
Sûn tin a nor ngot ngota, a ngên ngut ngut sikin, thipui rak ang dôrin a milung a hong inzîng tâka.

Khanchu a lungrîl murdi a hril zit tâka, “Ki suak rengata Pathian ta hranga Nazarit mi ki nia, ki sam hi ziatinkol la ni ngai ma, ki lu hi voiinkol ni sianlân ki hrâtna hi boi a ta, mi dang ang takin ki ihrât loi hrang a ni,” a tia.

Delili’n tinrêng a hril tatak tâk a nih ti an hriatin, Filistia hruaituhai chu a koihaia, “Hong suak ta roi, itinrêng a nin hril zit tâk,” a tia. Filistia hruaituhai chu an honga, sum tangka chu an hong chôia.
Khan, a mal chunga lukhamin an intira, mi inkhat a koia, a sam phiar sari chu an tantir zita; a soisaka, a hrâtna chu a hong boi tâka.
Delili’n, “Samsona, Filistia mihaiin nang an hong idoi hrang a ni,” a tia. A inmu chu a hong hara, “Matona ang khan hrât ki ta, zôkpat ta no ning mo,” a tia.
Filistia-haiin an chela, a mitru an kêlsuak pea. Gaza khuaa an hruai tâka, kut khitna thîrhrui an inbuntira; intângna ina bu an innôitir ngaia,
khannisian a lua sam chu a hong sei nôk tâka.
Filistia hruaituhai chu an pathian Dagon kuang thilinhlan tamtak inhlan hrangin an irbukkhôma, “Kin râlpa Samsona chu kin pathianin a ni pêk tâk hi te,” an tia.
Samsona an hmu’n chu an pathian an inpâka, “Ei pathianin ei râlpa le ei ram insiatpu, mi tamtak ni thatpupa chu ei kuta a ni pêk tâk hi te,” an tia.

An lôm tak taka, “Samsona kh a hong hruai u ta, nuiza siamna’n lei hmang rei,” an tia. Intângna in ata Samsona chu an hong hruai suaka, nuiza siamna’n an hmang tâka, chopui le chopui inhni kâra an inngîrtira.
Samsona’n a kaipu nâipang kuang, “Hi in doina chopui hi ni hong inthemtir ta, lei irhnêl rong ba,” a tia.
Ina khan Filistia hruaitu, pasal le nupang an omkhôm mura, a in irchuan chunga khom khan pasal le nupang sângthum vêl an oma. Samsona nuiza siamna’n an hmang chu an ena.
Khanchu, Samsona’n
Khan, Samsona’n, kha a irhnêlna chopui inhni chu a bân chang tiang le vei tiang an kuaa. sirsanin a hmanga.

“Filistia mihai hi lei that hlukhai rong,” a tia, chopui chu ar nakhrât thei dôrin a nama, in chu a chim rup tâka, an hruaituhai le a sûnga om murdi chu a del thathaia. A dam laia a ithathai nêkin atûna a ithathai hi an tam ual.
A urênghai le a pa insûnghai chu an zuanga, a ruak chu an kêlsuaa, a pa Manoa thân Zora le Estaol kâra khan an phûm tâka. Kum sôm inhni Israelhai chunga roi a irêl a ni.
Efraima tâng rama mi inkhat a oma, ar hming chu Mika a ni,
a nu kuang, “Ni sumru tangka sângkhat le irzakhat mi’n an inrûk kha, khomâk ni sâma, kei khom ni ni inhril kha, ki ilâk a ni, ki la idôn mai a ni” a tia. A nu’n, “E, ki nâipa,
Sumru tangka sângkhat le irzakhat chu a nu a pêk nôka, a nu’n, “Ki khomâksâm kha ki nâipa chunga a chum loina hrangin keima ngeiin hi sumru tangka hi

A nu a pêk inkhîr sumru chu, a nu’n sumru tangka irzahni chu a lâka, millim siam thei kuang thing millim sumru inluanna hrang le a sungna hrangin sumru millim siamna’n a pêka; Mika ina khan an sia tâka.
Mika’n Pathian in a sina, Efod leh millim a siama, a nâipa inkhat chu ochai hrangin an kunga.
Kha lai khan Israel rama rêng la nei mahai, mâni chitin sa an ti angin an om mai a ni.
Judai rama Bethlehem khuaa ruatharte inkhat Levia irchia mi hi a oma,
Kha mi kha omna hrang zongin Judai rama Bethlehem khua chu a suaksana, Efraima tâng rama a honga, Mika in chu a hong tunga.
Mika’n, “Kho rengata ni ihong mo?” a tia. Ama’n, “Judai rama Bethlehem khuaa om Levi irchia mi ki nia, omna hrang zongin ki ihong a ni,” a tia.
Mika’n a kuang, “Ki kuang om zel ta ro, ka pa le ki ochai ni hrangin chang ta ro; kum khata sumru tangka sômkhat nang pe ki ta, ni puan sil inkhat le ni bu nêk hrang khom nang pe sa ki ti,” a tia.
Kha nî ata kha Levia chi chu lungchuk takin a om tâka, a nâipa inkhat ang takin a om sa tâka.
Mika’n Levia irchi mi chu sinthôna a pêk tâka, khanchu a ochai hrangin a siaa, Mika ina khan a om sa tâka.
Mika’n, “Levi irchia mi ngêt ochai ki nei tâka,
Kha lai khan Israel rama rêng la nei mahaia. Israel laia ram lua hrang an irsem lai khan Dana irchihai chu ram lua hrang chang sa mahaia, ram lua hrang an zong irvêl mai a ni.
Khasikin, Dana irchihaiin an irchihai lai ata mi pasal sa ringa an inthanga, Zora le Estaol khua ata ramsa zonga envêl hrangin an tîra. Efraima tâng ram an hong tungin Mika ina an fea, an riak tâka.
Mika ina Levia irchi ruatharte chong irhâi chu an inhriat tâka, an va pana, “Hi hin imo ni itho? Tu’n mo nang an hong ihruai?” an tia.
Ama’n a sâma, “Mika ina ki honga, ochai hrangin a ni inkung a ni,” a tia.
Anni’n a kuang, “Kin fena hrang hi hlo kin ichuk hrang mo, chukloi hrang? Pathian ni zong pe ro,” an tia.
Kha ochai khan an kuang, “Irtharngam takin fe roi,

Khanchu, mi pasal ringahai chu an fea, Lais khua an va tunga. Sidon mihai ang takin kha khuaa mihai chu hoi takin an om ti an hmua. Mi nunirnêm om mai mai, tûte’n inbuaihai loi, itinrênga irfakhop an ni. Sidon khua ata chu hlatak a nia, mi dang tu leh khom irkopna rêng rêng nei mahai.
Mi ringa chu Zora le Estaol khuaa mihai kuang an kîr nôka, kha khuaa mihaiin an kuang, “Imo nin hril hrang nin neia?” an tia.
Anni’n, “Thoi roi, Lais khua chu hong doi ei ti, a ram kin hong hmua, ram satak a ni. Hi hin om mai mai no roi, irhnot unglân, hong lâk ei ti.
Nin hong fe photin chu hoitaka om mihai kha hong hmu nin ta, a ram lak chu a liana, Pathianin nangni a pêk tâk a ni, hnuaia thil om chu tinrênga irsam nona hmun a ni,” an tia.
Khanchu, Dana irchihai, hriamhrei chôi mi irzaruk chu Zora le Estaol khua ata an irthoka, an suaka.
Judai rama an hong fea, Kiriath-jearim-ah riakbuk an khuara; khasikin kha khua kha Mahane-dan ti irhming a irput mai tâk a ni.
An fe zêla, Efraima tâng ram, Mika in chu an hong tunga.

Lais le a vêla ram hong envêltuhai mi ringa khan an rualhai kuang, “Hi in inkhat sûnga hin thing millim sumrua inluanhai a om ti nin inhriat mo? Millim danghai le Efod khom a om, itin mo tho inlân sa ni?” an tia.
Levia irchi ruatharte omna Mika ina khan an fea, kha ruatharte kha, “Ni dam mo?” an tia.
Mikot kôla khan hriamhrei chôiin Dan irchihai chu mi irzaruk an ngîra.
Mi ringa ram envêltuhai chu kha ina khan an lûta; khan ochai chu mi irzaruk irdoina tukfam irbelhai laia mikot bula khan a ngîra.
Mi ringahaiin Mika ina thilser omhai chu an lâk laiin, ochaiin, “Imo nin itho?” a tia.
Mi ringahaiin, “Dâihrek ro, chong no ro, kin kuang hongin lân, kin ochaia chang ro, Israel nam pumpui laia ochai chang chu sûngkhat ochai mai mai ni nêkin ni inuam ual hrang mo ni ma?” an tia.
Ochai chu a sân a râi a fâna; khanchu, thil serhai chu ama’n a chôia, an laia khan a fe sa tâka.
An hongna lama an kîra, an nâihai le insûng sahai leh ile khan an suak tâka; a fe masahaiin an neinunhai chu an fepuia.
Mika in ata hlatak an fe hnungin, Mika tualbômhai chu an irbukkhôma, Dan irchihai chu an va inhnotsuakhai tâka.
Dana irchihai chu an va inhnotsuaka, an khêka. Dana irchihai chu an hong irheia, Mika kuang, “Imo a ini tâk, mi an tam bâka?” an tia.
Mika’n, “Imo a ini tâk nin tia; ki ochai nin ni suta, pathian ki isiamhai chu nin inrûka, ite nin imâksan om ma,” a tia.
Dana irchihaiin, “Thu dang ite hril no ro, hi mihai hin an ning an murin chu, nang doi an ti. Nin insûngkua murdi hringna inchân rôi an ti,” an tia.
An fe zêla, Mika’n keima nêkin an hrât ual daih a nih ti an hriatin, a kîr nôk tâka.
Mika millim siam le a ochai chu an hruaia, Lais an va tunga, hoitaka om mai maihai chu an doia, khandaiin an sât thathaia, khua chu an hâla.

Sidon khua ata a satea hla a ni sikin hong sansuaktu hrang lak tûte om mahai; tûte le khom irkopna rêng rêng nei mahai; Beth-rehob bul irhôra om a ni. Khan, khua chu an siaminsat nôka, khataka khan an om tâka.
An irchibul Dana, Israela nâi irhming chôiin kha khua irhminga khan Dana an phuaa, ar hming masa chu Lais a ni.

Dana irchihaiin thing millim sumrua inluan chu an biak tâka. Mosia nâi Gersoma nâipa Jothama chu ochaia an hmanga; kha mi irchihai chu suaka intâng ten khan Dana hai ochaia an changa; Mika millim siamhai chu a om mai tâka.
Khanchu, Mika’n a isiam millim siam chop kha Silo khuaa Pathian in a om sûng ten kha a oma.
Kha laia Israel rama rêng an nei no lai khan Levia irchi mi inkhat Efraima tâng ram mongna tiang a oma, Judai ram Bethlehem khuaa mi lâksîr a neia.
A lâksîrnu’n a mâksana, a pa in tiang, Judai rama Bethlehem khuaa khan a kîra, tha minli vêl a va oma.
A pasal chu a thoia, chonghoia inthêma hruaikîr nôk tumin siahlo inkhat le sakuartung inhni leh ile a va fea. Nupangin a pa ina a hruai lûta, nupang pa chu a sân a lôma.
Khan, a nupang pa a tarpu khan a kuanga om hrangin a chela, sûn thum chu an fâka, an inah, kha khan a riaka.
A sûn minli nî khan zînga a thoia; ama khom suak tumin an irsiama; khannisian, a tarpu’n, “Imo khôk fâk nêk fa bak unglân, suak nin ti,” a tia.
Khanchu, an toi khôma, an ruaiin an fâkin an in tâka. A tarpu’n, “A vuan zân chu riak nôk phot roi, nin lungrîl chu râifân takin om roi,” a tia.
Kha nî khan suak an tum nôka; khannisian, a tarpu’n a khap nôka, an châm nôk tâka.
A sûn ringa ni khan suak ta hrangin zîng taka an thoia, a tarpu’n, “Misa a la’rhnuai mân chu om phot unglân, imo khôk fâk nêk fa bak roi,” a tia.

Khan ama chu a lâksîr le a siahlo leh ile fe hrangin an irthokin chu a tarpu’n, “Irngai ta, khohloi a ini tâk kêng, la châm nôk hi roi. Misa a tâk hrang reng a ni tâka, hi hin riak unglân, bu le anh la hei fa nôk hi rei. Nangtûk zînga thoi nin ta, in tiang fe nin ti,” a tia.
Khannisian, ama chu châm nôk hrangin chu nuam maka, a thoia, a suak tâka, Jebus-hai khua Jerusalem kôl chu a puakpêl ngai sakuartunghai leh an tunga, a lâksîrnu khom a om saa.
Jebus-hai khua an tungin misa ar hnuai ok tâka, a siahlo khan, “En ta, Jebus-hai khuaa hin riak ta ei ti,” a tia.
A pu’n, “Israel mi ni loi, nam dang khuaa ei iriak hrang ni mah. Gibea khua pan ei ti,” a tia.
A siahlo kuang, “Gibea khuaa mo Rama khuaa mo ei iriak hrang a ni,” a tia.
An fe zêl tâka Gibea khua an tungin misa a tâk tâka. Gibea chu Benjamina-hai khua a ni.
Riak tumin Gibea chu an pana, anni intungtir hranga lei koi tukhom an om no sikin, khopui kholaidung chu an pana, an toi tâka.
Kha lai taka khan, khohloia tar inkhat a loia fe hi a honga; ama chu Efraima tâng ram mi a nia, Gibea khuaa om mai ngai a ni; Gibea mihai chu Benjamina irchihai an ni.
Kha mi khan khopuia kholaidung a hong enin chu mikhual toi a hmua, “Kho taka fe hrang moh? kho rengata hong mo ni ni?” a tia.
Levia mi khan, “Judai ram Bethlehem-a om kin nia, Efraima tâng ram monga kin va ife a ni, Judai rama Bethlehem-a kîr nôk hrang kin nia,
Sakuartung fâk hrang faponhai khom kin neia, kei le ki lâksîrnu leh ki siahlo ruatharte hrang khom bu fâk hrang kin nei, ite irsam nei viat ma ung,” a tia.
Putar khan, chardong tho no roi, nin innang murdi chu keima’n tum zit ki ti, kholaia hin chu riak viat no roi,” a tia.
Khanchu, a ina a hruai inlûta, sakuartunghai chu fapon a pêka, an ke an irsûka, an fâkin an in tâka.

Râifân le lômtaka bu an fâk laiin khopuia mi sual pôlin in kha an hong irhuala, mikot chu an hong suk tuk tuka, in neipu tarpa kuang, “Ni ina mikhual tunghai kha hong hruaisuak ta, lei irpôlpuihai ro ung,” an tia.
In neitupa chu a suaka, “Ni make, ki urênghai, khaanga thil saloi tak chu tho tum no roi; hi mi hi ki ina mikhual tung a ni, hi thil saloi hi a chunga tho no roi,
en ta, ki nâinu, pasal la pôlloi le hi mi lâksîr hi, hong hruaisuak ki ta, lei hruai roi, nin nuamlam ang angin lôhai roi, hi mi chunga rêk hin chu thil saloi tho no roi,” a tia.

Aniachu, mihaiin a chong irngai pe nuam mahaia; khanchu, kha Levia mi khan a lâksîr chu a hruaisuaka, anni’n an lei irpôlpuia, zân sôtin an soisaka, zîng khua a hong vâra, misa a hong suak vângin chu an insua tâka.
Nupang chu zînga a pasal tungna ina khan a va fea, mikot bula khan a’rtet raka, khovâr mân chu kha khan a om tâka.
A pasal chu zînga a thoia, fe suak tumin mikot chu a hong inhonga, a lâksîrnu chu mikot bula a lei irtet raka, a kutin mikot chelin a hmua.
Ama’n, “Thoi ro, fe ei ti,” a tia. Khannisianlân, ite sâm maka. Khanchu, a sakuartung chunga khan an kâitira, a thoia, a in tiang a fe tâka.
In a va tungin chu chemte a lâka, a lâksîr chu a ru pumin sômkhat inhni’n a’rchanchita, Israel ram sûng pumpuia a thon suaka.
A lei hmu murdi’n chu, “Israelhai laia Aigupta ram rengata an hong suak ata hiang thi rêng rêng hi la om viat ngai ma; ngaitua unglân, chong khômin ngaidân lei hril ta rei,” an tia.
Israel mi murdi chu thukhat chelin Mizpa khuaa
Israel nam tin hruaituhai khom Pathian mihai pungkhômhai laia khan an changa. Sipaihai khandai le thal irlek thei mi nuai minli an ni.
Benjamina irchihaiin Israelhai kha Mizpa khuaa an irbukkhôm ti an lei inhriata.
Israel mihaiin, “Itina mo hi thil saloi tak hi a hong itung dân hi nin hril u ta,” an tia.
Levi irchia, nupang an ithat pasal khan, “Benjamina-hai khua Gibea ki va tunga, ki lâksîrnu leh kin riaka.
Gibea mihai chu zâna ni doi hrangin an hong irthoka, ki tungna in kha an hong irhuala; ni that an tuma, ki lâksîrnu chu an siatpuia, a thi chak tâk a ni.
Ki lâksîrnu ruak chu insûnga ki hruaia, a taksa chu ki’rchanchita, Israel rama ki thon darh a ni kha, hiang dôra porinchea hur an ni.
Irngai u ta, Israel nâihaio, hi hin nin om irkip zita, itina tho hrang mani, nin ngaidân hril u ta?” a tia.
Khanchu, mipui murdi chu thu inrual takin an thoi huaka, “Tukhom mâni puan in tiang mo mâni in tiang mo, tûte kîr no ma ni.
Hiang hin Gibea chu soisak ei ti, tasânin doi ei ta, mi senkhat Gibea doi hrangin inthanghai ei ti.
Kin laia sôma inkhat ei fâk hrang tum kin ta, mi dangin Gibea mihai chu hremhai an ti, hiang thil hurna porinche an tho sikin,” an tia.
Khanchu, Israel rama pasal murdi chu lungirrual takin khopui chu insiat tumin an irbukkhôma.
Israel namhaiin Benjamina namhai ram tina palâi an tîra, “Ithoa mo hianga thilsual hi nin itho?

Gibea khuaa mi, hianga thilsual thohai hi hong hruai unglân, that hrang kin ni, hianga thilsual hi Israel laia kin inboi hrang a ni,” an tia. Khannisianlân, Benjamina-haiin Israelhai chong kha ite uksak mahai.
Benjamina-haiin kho tin ata Israel mi danghai lei doi hrangin Gibea khuaa an hong irbukkhôma.
Gibea khua mihai bâka Benjamina mi kho dang dang ata honghai chu khandai le thal chôi mi sînghni le sângruk an ni. Gibea mi khom inthang sai mi irzasari an ni.
Hi mi inthangsuakhai laia mi irzasari chu vei kut hmang mi an ni, sâilungdêngin sammal khom insel loiin dêng thei an ni.
Israel mi, Benjamina-hai doi hrangin mi nuai minli khandai thal chôi sipai an ni, khahai kha irdoi mi ving an ni.
Israel mihai chu an irthoka, Bethel-a an fea, Pathian an zonga, “Benjamina irchihai doi hrangin tu nam mo fe masa hrang?” an tia.
Khanchu, Israel mihai chu zînga an thoia, Gibea khua irhualin riakbuk an khuara.
Benjamina irchihai doi hrangin an irthoka, an suaka, khopui tiang irnghatin an sipaihai chu an irtânga.
Benjamina irchihai chu Gibea khua ata an hong suaka, kha nî khan Israel mihai chu mi sînghni le sânghni an thata.
Israel mihai chu an irthor irhlom nôka, an tho phut nia an irsiamna hmun ngêt khan an irdarh nôka.
Kha nikhua mân khan Israelhai chu
A voihnina khom khan Israelhai chu Benjamina irchihai doi hrangin an irthoka.
Benjamina irchihai chu a sûn hni nî khom khan Gibea khua ata an hong suaka, râlthuam chôi mi sipai sîngkhat le sângriat an that nôk tâka.
Israel mi murdi chu Bethel-a an fea,
Kha lai khan Pathian Thuthung Bôm chu kha khan a oma,
Arona nâi Eleazara nâipa Finehasa chu Thuthung Bôm enkolpu a ni. Mipuiin
Khasikin Israel mihaiin Gibea khua kôla râl sipai inrûkin an lei thuphaia.
Sûn dang ang ngêtin Israelhai chu a sûn thum nî khan, Benjamina irchihai doi hrangin Gibea khopui tiang irheiin an irzara.
Benjamina irchihai chu lei doihai hrangin an va suaka, khua ata an irzûl suakhaia, sûn dang ang ngêtin loia, lampuilian Bethel le Gibea panna lamhaia khan Israel mihai sômthum an that nôka.
Banjamina irchihaiin, “Matona ang khan kin thathai nôk tâk,” an tia. Israelhaiin, “Tho intân ei ti, khopui ata hi lamliana hin va suak ei ti,” an tia.
Israel sipai murdihai chu Baaltamar hmuna an irbukkhôma, sirsan an lâk tâka, khan Gibea khua irhuala lungpui kâra irbîk inrûkhai kha an zuang suak saa.
Khan, Israel mihai laia inthang mi sîngkhatin Gibea khua chu an doi tâka, Benjamina irchihai khan an ihrât loi hrang ti inhre viat mahai.
Israelhai chu Benjamina irchihai an hnêtira, Israelhaiin mi sînghni le sângringa le irzakhat an thata. Khahai kha Benjamina mihai sipai zit an ni.
Benjamina irchihaiin an ihrât loi hrang ti an inhriat tâka.
Israel sipai bulpuihai khan Gibea khua irhuala lei irbîk inrûka an isiahai kha irnghatin Benjamina mihai chu hnung tiang an siasanhaia.
Kha mihai chu Gibea khuaa khan irningloiin an intân lût thuta, an irsemdara, an ihmu ta phot chu an thata.
Israel sipai bulpui le lei irbîk inrûka omhai khan irsinsiana an siama, khua ata meikhu a suak zut zut an hmu’n chu,
irdoina hmuna Israel omhai chu an tho nôk hrang ti a ni. Kha lai khan Benjamina irchihaiin Israel mi sômthum an lei that tâka. “Matona kin itho ang takin kin itho nôk hrang a ni,” an tia.
Khua rengata meikhu a suak zut zutin chu Benjamina irchihaiin an hong thîra, khua a kâng zit tâk ti an hmu’n chu ar khêl an ti tak taka.
Khan Israel mihai chu an hong irhei nôk tâka, Benjamina mihaiin thi zit hrang kin nih ti an inhriatin a sân an char an indong tâka.
Israel mihai ata ramchâr tiang an intân tâka, tûte om loina tiang intân an tuma; khannisian, intânsuak thei mahai, sipai bulpuihai le khua ata hong suakhai khan kiang tiang kiang tiang an doihaia,
Israel mihaiin an râlhai chu an irhualhaia, misa suakna tiang Gibea tiang an intâna, an irzûlhai pata, an that zêla.
Benjamina sipai satak tak mi sîngkhat le sângriat an thata.
Senkhat chu Rimon khur panin an intâna, lampuia mi sângringa vêl chu an thia. Israelhaiin Gidon dênin an irzûlhaia, mi sânghni chu an thata.
A rêngin, Benjamina mihai chu mi sînghni le sângringa irdoi mi ringot an ithi a ni.
Mi irzaruk chu ramchâr tiang Rimon rôl khura an intâna, kha khan tha minli vêl an oma.
Israelhai chu Benjamina mihai an doi zêla, pasal le nupang nâipang khom, an insûng sâhai ten khom an that fâi zita. Kha vêla an khua murdi chu an hâl fâi zit tâka.
Israel mihai chu Mizpa khuaa an irbukkhôma, khan
Khanchu, Israel mihai chu Bethel-a an fea, Pathian makunga khohloi dênin an toia, inringtak le beiindong takin an chapa,
A tûk zînga chu zîng taka maichâm an siama, irngeina thilinhlan le hâlirvôm thilinhlan an inhlana.
“Israel nam laia Mizpa khuaa irbukkhômna hmuna chang sa loi an om mo?” tiin an irdon irhlôma. Mizpa khuaa
Israelhaiin an urêng Benjamina irchihai chu an lunginkham tak taka, “A vuan hin Israelhaiin kin laia nam inkhat chu kin inchân a ni ta.
Benjamina nam la dam sunhai ta hrangin itin mo dôngma kin izongpuihai ta hrang?
Khan anni’n, “Israel nam laia mi a tu nam tak hi mo Mizpa khua inkhômpuia chang sa loi?” an tia. Kha inkhômpuia khan, Gilead rama, Jabes khuaa mi chu inkhat lua hong mahai ti an hmu tâka.
Irhming an hong koihaiin chu Jabes khuaa mi chu tûte om mahai.
Irbukkhôm nahruaituhaiin an laia mi huaisen sîngkhat le sânghni an tîra, “Fe unglân, Jabes khuaa mi murdi, nupang le nâipang khom va that zit roi,
pasal that zit unglân, nupang khom pasal lei siatpui tâkhai rêng rêng chu that zit roi,” an tia.
Jabes-hai laia khan dôngmate, pasal la isiatpui loi irzaminli an hmua, Silo khuaa Kanaan rama khan an hong hruaihaia.
Rimon rôl khura om Benjamina irchihai kuang palâi an tîra, irdoi inmong ta hrang thu an hrila.
Benjamina irchihai chu an hong kîra, Israelhaiin Jabes dôngmate, an ithat loihai chu an dôngmahai hrangin an pêka; aniachu, chuk mahaia.
Irbukkhôma hruaituhaiin, “Benjamina laia nupang om ta mahai, a la damhai dôngma hrang hi itin mo ei izongpuihai ta hrang?” an tia.
Israel nam sôm nam hnihai laia hin nam khat khom irhmang phal ma ung. Khasikin, Benjamina la dam sun omhai ta hrangin irchi ei inneitirhai ngêt hrang a ni.
Khannisian, ei nâinuhai lak dôngma inneitirhai hrangin phal mak mea. “Mi tukhom mâni nâinu Benjamina mi inneitir chu vânnisalin om ri se, tiin chong ei lei inkung tâka,” an tia.
“Irngai ta,
Benjamina irchihai chu chong an bêhaia, “Fe unglân, Grep irhuanhaia lei irbîk unglân,

lei thîr mai unglân, Silo khuaa dôngmate rual lâm hrangin hong suak an ta, nangni khom grep irhuan ata hong suak unglân, Silo khuaa dôngmatehai chu mâni dôngma hrang seng chel unglân, Benjamina rama nin ihruaihai hrang a ni.

An pahai mani an nuchahaiin mani nangni an hong inbuai khomin, “Lungkham takin inneitirhai mai roi, râl anga irdoiin dôngmaa an ichelhai khom ni maka; nangni lakin nin nuam sika nin ipêk khom ni ual loia, nin chonginkung khom nin insiat ual mani, lei ti kin ti,” an tia.

Khan Benjamina irchihaiin an ihrilhai angin an thoa, Silo khuaa dôngmate rual lâmhai laia mi, mâni dôngma hrang seng an chela, an ram tiang an fepuihai tâka, khopuihai chu an siam insata, kha khan an om tâka.
Kha rengata kha Israel danghai chu mâni rama an irchi chi le mâni nam ram senga an kîr nôk tâka.
Kha lai khan Israel rama rêng om mahai, sa an iti ang angin mi tin an om ngai a ni.
Tianlaia roirêltuhaiin roi an rêl lai khan, Israel rama châm a tâka. Judai ram Bethlehem khuaa mi inkhat chu a dôngma le a nâipasal hnihai leh Moab rama om hrangin an fea.

A’rhming chu Elimelek a nia, a dôngma irhming chu Naomi a ni, a nâipasal hnihai irhming chu Mahlona le Kiliona an ni. Judai ram Bethlehem khuaa Efrata mi an ni. Moab rama khan an fea, kha khan an om mai tâka.
Naomi pasal Elimelek chu a thia, khanchu, Naomi le a nâipasal hnihai leh vai an om tâka.
A nâipasalhaiin Moab mi dôngma’n an neia, inkhat irhming chu Orpi a nia, inkhat irhming chu Ruthi a ni. Kha rama khan kum sôm vêl an om hnungin,
Mahlona le Kiliona khom an thia, khanchu Naomi kha a pasal leh a nâipasal hnihaiin an thisan tâk a ni.
Khan
Khanchu a moihai inhni leh khan an omna mâksanin Judai ram an pan tâka.
Naomi’n a moihai inhni kuang, “Fe unglân, nin nuhai in tiang kîr nôk chian ta roi, nin pasal thi tâkhai le ki chunga satna nin inlangtir lam ang takin,
Nin ruaiin pasal dang nin nei nôk theina hrangin
A moihai khan, “Fe no ni ung, ni mihai kuang ni ifena hrang hmuna nang zui kin ti,” an tia.
Naomi’n, “Ki nâinuhaio, kîr nôk chian roi, ithoa mo nin ni zui nuam bâka! Nin pasal hrang nâipasal ki la inei nôk thei hrang ma ni?
Ki nâinuhaio, nin in tiang kîr nôk ta roi, pasal la nei nôk hrangin chu ki tar ok tâk sikin. Khan tûngna ki la nei itinin, a vuan zân ngân hin pasal neiin nâipasalhai hong nei ngân ta inlân,
an ulian dênin nin inghâk mai hrang ma ni? Pasal boiin nin iom mai hrang mo? Ni thei make, ki nâinuhaio, nangni sikin ki milung a sân a na,
Khanchu, irhâi inringtakin an chap nôk tâka, Orpi’n a tarpi kha a tuma, a kîrsan tâka, Ruthi rêkin chu a tarpi a chel ngita.
Khan Naomi’n, “En ta, ni moi chanpuinu chu a mihai le a pathian tiang a kîr nôk tâk so, nang khom ni moi chanpuinu zuiin ni in tiang kîr nôk ta roh,” a tia.

Khannisianlân Ruthi’n chu, “Nang mâksan hrang le nang zui loi hrangin chu nin thêm no ro; ni fena ti tiang fe ki ta, ni riakna ti tiang riak ki ta, nir chihai chu ki’rchihai ni an ta, ni Pathian chu ki Pathian ni a ti.
Ni thinaa thi ki ta, kha khan phûmin om ki ti. Nang le kei hi thina ni loia thil dangin ni sen hrang nêkin chu
Ama zui a tum ngit a nih ti an hriatin Naomi’n a dâisanhrek tâka.
Khanchu, an ruaiin Bethlehem dên rakin an fe tâka. Bethlehem an tungin chu, a kho mihai an lei inlâi phuata, nupanghaiin, ‘Hi nu hi Naomi kha ma ni?’ an tia.
Naomi’n an kuang, “Naomi ni ti ta no roi, Mara ni ti ta roi. Tinrêng thotheitu’n na takin a nin tuangtir tâk a ni hi te.
Irkip takin ki suaka,
Khanchu, Naomi chu a moinu Moab mi Ruthi leh Moab ram rengata an hong kîra, barli ât a’rphut laitakin Bethlehem khua chu an hong tung tâk a ni.
Naomi khan a pasal Elimelek urêng irnaipui, a’rhming Boaza, mi neinung tak a neia.
Moab mi Ruthi’n Naomi kuang, “Loi tiang va fe ki ta, faôi va zong ki ti, ni lei inrentu chu va hmu ngêt ki ti,” a tia. Naomi’n, “Fe ro ba, ki nâinu,” a tia.
Khanchu a fea, bu âttuhai lâksel chu a va zong irkhôm tâka. Elimelek urêng Boaza loi khera khan a va fe tâka.
Boaza khom Bethlehem rengata a hong tunga, bu âttuhai kuang, “
Boaza’n a siahlo, bu âttuhai chunga hruaitu kuang, “Hi hi kho tianga nupang ma ni?” a tia.
A siahlo, bu âttuhai chunga hruaitu’n, “Hi mi hi Moab nupang, Moab ram ata Naomi leh hong kha a ni.
‘Bu âttuhai hnung zuiin, an bu irkhôm zoi mihlia zong irvai thiai ki ti,’ tiin a ni ngêna; zoro sôtloite ichua a’rngam ti no chu zîng rengata atûn ten hin a la izong irkhôm mai a ni,” tiin a sâma.
Khan Boaza’n Ruthi kuang, “Ki nâinu, irngai ro. Loi danga chu faôi zong hrangin fe no’n lân, hi hmun ata hmun danga irson no roh, ki siahlo dôngmatehai kuanga hin om maiin lân;

kho tiang mo bu an ât en vêlin lân, dôngmatehai hi zuihai mai roh. Ruathartehaiin ite nang an ti loina hrangin ki hrilhai ta; ni tui an hrâlin chu tuibêla ruathartehai tui chôi sai kha va in ngai ro,” a tia.
Khanchu, Ruthi chu irnênga a kûna, “Kei nam dang mi hi ni nin hriat nuama, hiang taka lung ni ni inkham hi, itina ma ni tâk?,” a tia.

Boaza’n hiang hin a sâma, “Ni pasal a thi rengata ni tarpi chunga ni sintho murdi mi’n an nin hrila; ni pahai, ni nuhai, le ni’rsiangna ramhai mâksana, mi ni la inhriat ngai loihai laia om hranga ni hong dânhai ti khom mi’n an nin hril zit a ni.
ni sinthôna man nang thuan sianlân;

Ruthi’n, “Ka pu, nangin ni nin ren sikin ki’rtha a’rngam ta. Ni siahlo dôngmatehai laia mi ni no khom inlân, ni siahlonu hi satakin ni ni ichongpui hi ki ta hrangin lunginkhamtu liantak ni ni,” a tia.

Khanchu, bunêk zoro laiin Boaza’n Ruthi kuang, “Hitaka hin hongin lân, baihai hi hong fa ro, bai tanghai hi uain thûra inchie sa ro,” a tia. Bu âttuhai kôla a toia; Boaza’n changpêr a lei pêka, khop telin a fâka, a khop hnungin a fâk mihlia a la nei ok.
Khan, faôi zong irfuang hrangin a’rthok nôkin chu, Boaza’n a ruathartehai kuang, “Bumût laia bu khom la sianlân hal no roi.
A têl lai ata bupâr khom kaidok pe unglân, mâksan rak unglân hrût ri se, hal viat no roi,” tiin chong a bêhaia.
Ruthi chu khohloi dênin faôi a zong irkhôma, a irkhômhai kha an chîla, barli epna khat vêl a ni.
A bu zong irkhôm kha kho sûng tiang a pêla, a tarpi chu an entira, bai a fâk zoiloi khom a kêlsuaa, a tarpi a pêka.

A tarpi’n a kuang, “A vuan sûn hin kho tianga faôi mo ni izong irkhôm? Tu loia mo ni va isin? Nang a lei inrentu chu satvurin om ri se,” a tia. Ruthi’n a tarpi kuang a va sinna chu, hiang hin a hrila, “A vuan sûna sin ki va ithônapa irhming chu Boaza a ni,” a tia.
Naomi’n a moinu kuang, “
Moab mi Ruthi’n, “A ni duah, bu hi an ât zoi mâka chu ki sinthotuhai laia hin sin sa mai ro, a ni iti kêng,” a tia.
Naomi’n a moinu Ruthi kuang, “A sa kha te, ki nâinu, a sinthotu dôngmatehai laia vai sintho ro, loi danga chu buaina ni tong itinin,” a tia.
Khanchu, Ruthi’n chu Boaza siahlo dôngmatehai sinthoin a oma, barli le gohu ât zoi dênin faôi a zong irfuangin a om ngai. A tarpi kuang a om mai tâka.
Kha zoiin, Naomi’n Ruthi kuang, “Ki nâinu, ni ta hranga vângsakna in hoitak nang ngaitua pe ki ti.
A siahlo dôngmatehai leh sin ni va ithôna loi neitupa kha kin urêng irnaipui Boaza a ni. Irngai ro, a vuan zân hin hruizôla barli a zâp infâi zân a ni.
Khanchu tui irsilin lân, sahriak mirimhoi irpolin lân, ni sil le kai puan satak irbelin hruizôla khan zu fe roh. Aniachu, fâk nêk a zong zoi mâka chu a kuang, inlang no roh.
A zâl tika a zâlna kha irsinsia’n lân, khanchu fe’n lân, a ke tianga puan kha lîmin lân zâl roh, khanchu, ama’n ni tho hrang chu nang lei inhril zel a ti,” a tia.
Ruthi’n, “Ni ti anglam takin tho ki ti,” a tia.
Khanchu, hruizôla khan Ruthi a zu fea, a tarpi ihril lam ang takin a thoa.
Boaza chu fâk nêk ar zoiin raifân takin bu pông kôla khan zâl hrangin a fe tâka.
Zân chimrip tena chu Boaza a hong hara, a va’rheiin chu a ke thuana nupang lei zâl mai kha a hmu tâka.
“Tu mo ni ini?” a tia. Ama’n, “Ni siahlo Ruthi ki ni, kin urêng irkaipui bulpui ni ni sikin ni puan kha ni hong irkhu sa ro,” a tia.
Boaza’n, “Ki nâinu,
Atûn hin, ki nâinu, chi no ro; ni izong ang lam takin ni chunga nang tho pe ki ti. Kin khuaa mi murdihaiin nupang fel tak ni nih ti nang an inhriat ving kêng.
I khom ni sian, ni urêng irkaipui chu ki ni, aniachu keima nêka irnaipui ual a la om.
A vuan zân chu riak photin lân, nangtûka ni urêng irnaipuiin a itho hrang a tho nuam no’n chu keima’n tho ki ti, ti Pathian hring irhmingin chong kin kung, khovâr mân chu zâl phot ro,” a tia.
Khanchu, zîng khovâr dênin a ke thuana khan a zâl tâka, mi tukhomin an hmu infel thei loina hrangin zînga a thoia; Boaza’n, “Hruizôla ni ihong hi mi tukhomin inhre no ri sehai,” a tia.
Boaza’n a kuang, “Ni puan sil kha hong chôiin lân, dô ro,” a tia. Khanchu a dâpa, barli tîn khat ar tê pea, an pêltira. Ruthi chu a khua tiang a fe tâka.
A tarpi kuang a hong tungin chu, “Ki nâinu, imo ni hong chang?” a lei ti pea. Ruthi’n a chunga Boaza’n thil a itho pe murdi kha a hril zita.
“Ni tarpi kuang kut korongin kîr no ro, tiin hi barli tîn khat hi a ni ipêk a ni” a tia.
Naomi’n, “Ki nâinu thil hong om hrang dân nin hriat mâka chu lei nghâk zâm ro; a vuan hin thil a hong infel mâka chu om chian no ni,” a tia.

Boaza chu roirêlna hmun, dâi mikota a hong fea, a toia. An urêng irkaipui tak chungchâng thu Boaza’n a ihril kha a honga. Boaza’n, “Ki rualpa, hi tiang hongin lân, hong toi ta,” a tia. Ama chu a va fea, a toi tâka.
Boaza’n kha khuaa mi upa sômkhat a koi bûmhaia, an kuang, “Hitaka hin toi khôm u ta,” a tia; khanchu an toi tâka.
An irkaipui irnai takpa kuang, “Moab ram ata hong kîr, Naomi’n ei urêngpa Elimelek ram kha zuar a nuama;
