nangma hi inhril masa zât ni nih ti kin hriata, ni’rtan nuama ni’n chu hi upahai inhriata hin irtan roh; ni’rtan nuam no’n chu nin hril ro; nangma ti no chu tûte a’rtan zât om mahai; khan, ni’rtan thei no’n chu kei hi a’rtanrua ki ni,” a tia. Ama’n, “Irtan ki ti,” a tia.
Boaza’n, “Naomi kut ata ram ni’rchôk nî khan meithâi Moab mi, Ruthi ni inei sa hrang a om maia, a’rchon luatu hrang an om zêl theina hrangin,” a tia.

An urêng irkaipuipain, “Keima ta hrangin chu thei no ning, anino’nchu keima irchon luana hrang tiang inbuaina ki ti, irtan theitu ki nina chu nangma’n chang ta ro; keima’n chu ki irtan thei ta loi a ni hi,” a tia.
Tianlaia Israelhai laia thil an irchôkin mo an irthûlin mo an namindetna hrangin a zuartu’n a kekok khek a ta, ar chôktu kuang a pêk ngai. Hi hi Israelhai laia thil namindet dân chu a ni.
An urêng irkaipuipa khan Boaza kuang, “Nangma’n ni ta hrangin ircho ta ro,” tiin a kekok chu a kheka a pêk tâka.
Boaza’n upahai le mipui murdihai kuang, “A vuan sûn hin Elimelek thil nei murdi le Kiliona le Mahlona thil nei murdi chu Naomi kut ata ki’rchôk tah ti inhriatpuituhai nin ni.

Khabana, mithi chu a’rhming a om maina hranga ar chon luatu siam pe hrang le mithi chu a urênghai laia le a omna mikota ar hming ar hmang loina hrangin, Moab meithâi, Mahlona dôngma chu ki dôngma ni hrangin ki nei ta; a vuan hin nangnihai hi an hriatpuituhai nin ni,” a tia.
Khanchu, dâi mikota mipui murdihai le upahaiin, “An hriatpuituhai kin ni. Ni ina nupang hong lût chu Israel in sûngkua indingtu inhni Rakili le Leaii angin
Khanchu Boaza’n Ruthi chu dôngma hrangin a hruaia, an omsuam tâka.
Khataka nupanghaiin Naomi kuang, “Nangma nang enkol hrangtupa nang inneitirtu
ama chu ni ta hranga hringna inthar nôktu le ni tar tianga nang a donsuitu la hong ni a ta, ni moinu nang lungthungtu hi nâipasal sari nêka tama hlu ual, ama chu nang a nei pe tâk a ni,” an tia.
Naomi’n nâite kha a lâka, a rôpsuama a poma, a donsui tâka,
Khanchu, a tualbôm nupanghaiin, nâite irhming an hong phua tâka, “Naomi’n nâipasal a nei ta,” ti’n a’rhminga Obeda an phuaa; ama chu Davida pu Jesaia pa a hong ni ta.
Hi hi Pereza irchi hong omdân chu an ni; Pereza chu Hezrona pa a ni.
Hezrona chu Rama pa a ni, Rama chu Aminadaba pa a ni.
Aminadaba chu Nasona pa a ni, Nasona chu Salmona pa a ni.
Salmona chu Boaza pa a ni, Boaza chu Obeda pa a ni.
Obeda chu Jesaia pa a ni, Jesaia chu Davida pa a ni.
Efraima tâng rama Ramathaimzofim khuaa hin Efraima nama mi inkhat ar hming Elkana a oma. Ama hi Zufa panama mi, Tohua in sûngkuaa mi Elihua nâi Jerohama nâipasal a ni.
Elkana hin dôngma inhni a neia, Hani le Penini hai an ni. Penini hin nâi a neia, Hani hin chu nâi nei ma.
Elkana kha, Rama khua ata Silo khuaa, tinrêng thothei
Elkana’n irbôlna an hlan rikipa a dôngma Penini le a nâihai murdi dongtum a siam pehai ngai.
Hani kha lungthung ok khom sianlân,
Nâi a nei thei no sika a beidongna irbôktir pe ual hrangin ama irsiatpuinu Penini hin hmusitin a lei êsêl ngaia.
Khaang khan a kum tin a hong ni maia,
Khanchu a pasal Elkana khan a kuang, “Hani, itho mo ni chapa? Itho mo bu ni inêk loi? Itho mo beidong ngaisiata ni iom? Nâipasal sômkhat nêk khomin ni tah hrangin chu ki isa ual loi ma ni?” a ti pea.
Sûn khat chu Silo khuaa
Khanchu
Hani khan chong an kunga, “O itinrêng sin thei
Hani kha
Hani khan a lungrîl taka chongchai a nia; a hmûr chu an chânga, ar hâi chu inhre thei ni maka. Khasikin Elia hin zu a inrui ni le hin a iama.
Khan Elia hin a kuang, “I dôra sôt mo ni inrui ta hrang? Ni uain tui kha pai ta ro,” a tia.
Hani khan, “Ka pu inrui ma ung, nupang beidong inren om tak ki ni; uain khom, zu khom in viat ma ung.
Ni suaknu hi Beliala nâinu’n ni bê no ro. Ki lungrîla sipliam beidongna le chardongna ki insîr a ni hi,” tiin a sâma.
Elia khan, “Irtharngam takin fe ro, Israelhai Pathian khan ni thil ngên chu nang pe ri se,” a tia.
Hani khan, “Ni suaknu hin ni mit tungin om ri se,” a tia. Khanchu nupangnu chu a fe tâka, bu a nêka, beidong hmêl irput ta ma.
Zîng nôka chu Elkana le a in sûng mihai kha zînga an thoia.
Khanchu Hani khan nâi a vong tâka, nâipasal a neia; “R
Elkana le a in sûng mihaiin a kum tina
Khannisian hi zoro hin chu Hani chu fe sa maka. A pasal kuang khan, “Kei chu nâite hin irhnu nêk a bâng tena
A pasal Elkana khan a kuang, “A dik ni iti lam takin tho ro; irhnu nêk nin bângtir mân chu in sûnga om ro.
Irhnu nêk a bâng tena chu baidi her sômkhat le uain ûm khat chôiin le sehrâtchal tuai inthum mi kaiin Hani khan a nâipa chu Silo khuaa
serâtchal tuai kha an that zoiin chu nâipangte kha Elia kuang an hruaia.
Hani khan a kuang “O ka pu, ni’rhming inzakpumin hi hi ki hril, keima hi chu ka pu, hi hmuna hin ni kôla ngîra
Hi nâipang ngên hin ki ichongchai a ni;
Khasika khan keima khomin
Hani kha a chongchaia,
ki hrâtna chu
ki râlhai chu ki bâiin a phenênga,
Pathian saninhringna khan ki lôm tak tak a ni ta.
Ama ang zel om mahai.
Ei Pathian anga lungpui det zel tûte om mahai.
Lârirpâk chong hmang irngam unglân,
Ni bâi ata ite irsongna chong suak ta no ri se.
Ama’n a nitina nin sintho kha a izêk ngai a ni.
Mi hrâthai thalngul an khiaka,
mi hrât loihai an hong hrât ta.
A lei khopa omhai kha fâk hrang zongin an irhlo tâka,
phîngchâma lei omhai kha an hong khop ta.
A ni, nupang chingnu khan nâi sari a nei tâka.
Nâi tamtak neinu kha kut korongin a om ta.
an hring nôk thei ngai;
thâna an fetira, a hong hruai nôk ngai.
a’rchongtirhai nôk ngai.
An temtirhai ngaia, a chôiirsângtirhai thei.
Vâiphin ata inriang kha a kaithoi thei ngai.
Inriangtengtêr kha vâiphin ata an domirsângtir theia,
Mi lianhai kuang an omtir thei.
Roiinpuina rêngtoihmun an lua theina hrangin.
Irnêng irnghatnahai hi
a chunga khan rammual hi a irnghat tâk a ni.
A mi irthianghai ke chu a hrung inzôk ngaia,
Mi siathai chu an thimbup zoro hin an irhmang ngai;
hrâtna ringotin chu tûte’n inhnêna chang thei no ni.
Irvân ata khonri’n doi a ti.
a rêng kha hrâtna pe a ti.
A hriak irthu ngai hrâtna kha chôiirsâng a ti,” a tia.
Khanchu Elkana kha Rama khua, a ina khan a kîr tâka. Khannisian nâipangte Samuela chu Silo khuaa a om mai ta, ochai Elia makunga khan
Elia nâipasalhai kha mi chanlamboi an nia,

mipuihai chunga ochaihai tho dân khom ngaisak ngai loi mi an nia. Mi’n irbôlna an hong inhlan rikipa hin ochai hnungzui, sa inthilna thîrtûl irzum inthum nei ngai chôiin an honga, sa an suang lai takin.

Sa suangna bêla khan sa inthilna thîrtûl leh khan zu sun a ta, kha sa inthilna thîrtûla a ikêlsua dôr kha ochai dongtum ni a ti. Khaang khan Israel mi Silo khuaa irbôlna inhlan hranga hong murdihai kha an lei itho ngai a ni.

Khabana khan, a thâi kha an lâkpaia, an hâl mân zelin, ochai hnungzui kha hongin ar bôltu kuanga khan, “Ochai ta hrangin ir-em inhmin hrang, sa ni pe ro; ni sa suang sai kha nuam maka, a sel kêng a inuam,” a ti ngaia.

Ama khan an kuang, “A thâi kha hâlpai bak ni sianlân, kha hnung chu ni inunuam la ta ro,” tiin a lei sâmin chu ochai hnungzui khan, “Ni ngai ma, atûn ni pe zel ro, ni ni pêk no’n chu nakhrât songin ki ilâk hrang a ni,” a ti ngaia.
Hi Elia nâipasalhai sualna hi
Khannisianlân Samuela chu nâipangte ni khomsian, puan irphân ochai songkol innghâkin
Khakhêla khan a nu’n songkol irfual an sui pea, a kum tina irbôlna inhlan hranga a pasal leh an fe’n an chôi pe ngai.
Khante, Elia khan Elkana le a dôngma kha sat a vurhaia, an kuang, “
Elia kha a hong tar ok tâka; Israel mi murdihai chunga a nâihai sintho murdi leh irhmûna puan in kotbâi kôla sinthotu nupanghai an lei zâlpuihai ngai thu an hriata.
Khanchu an kuang, “Itho mo khaanga thil nin itho hi? Mi tinin nin thiltho saloihai an nin sîr pea.
E he! ki nâihai, nin thurchi ki inhriat hi a siatna tiang inzen a ni.
Mi inkhatin mi dang chunga a sualin chu porinchetir a ni, Pathianin a chunga rêl pe a ta, khannisianlân, mi
Nâipang Samuela kha a hong irsôn tîr tîra; Pathian le mihriam mit tungin a om tâka.
Elia kuang khan Pathian mi inkhat a honga, a kuang

Khante Israel nam murdihai laia ki maichâma fea, mirimhoi hâla, ki makunga ochai songkol innghâk hrangin, ki ochai chang hranga ama kha ki inkung mo ni ma? Ni’rchibulhai kha Israel mihai hâlirvôm thil mo ki inhlanhai ni ma?

Itho sika mo ki omnaa inhlan hranga ki inkung, ki kuanga irbôlna le ki dongtum thilinhlan kha nin sirbea? keima nêkin ni nâipasalhai ni inhlu ual, nangni irvâi marna hrangin mo ki mi Israelhai irbôlnaa sahai nin ihmang hi?
Khasikin keima
Irngai ro, ni in sûngkua le ni panam laia vânglaihai murdi ki thatna hrang nikhua chu a hong itung thiai tâk a ni, khanchu ni ina tar kûna dam zel om ta no nihai.
Khanchu Israel mihai vângsakna ki ivur murdi kha irzukin thîr ni ta, inchop irkhêl takin om ni ta; khanchu ni ina tar kûna dam zel om no ni.
Khan ni mi ki maichâm ata ki irhmangtir loi chu, ni mit en inkhamtirtu le, ni milung innatirtu vai ni a ti. Ni ina zuang suak dang murdi chu an vânglai zoro takin thi an ti.
Khante ni nâipasalhai ruai Hofnia le Finehasa chunga thil hong tung hrang kha ni ta hrangin irsinsiana ni a ta, sûn khat sûngin an ruaiin thi an ti.
Ochai iamom tak ki ta hrangin inthang nôk ki ta, ama khan ki lungdo inchuk a ti. Sûngkua det takin siam ki ta, kumtuangin ki sahriak irthu makunga khan sintho a ti.

Hiang hin ni a ta, ni ina la om murdihai kha tangka le bai ngênin, kha ochai kuang khan fe an ta, bai a chînte lua fa hrang ki hmu theina hrangin ochai sin, i khôk mani nin thotir ro, ti an ti,” a tia.
Khan nâipang Samuela kha Elia makunga
Kha zoro khan zân khat chu Elia mit zîng tâk khan, ama tentan sûnga a zâla;
Samuela chu Pathian Thuthung Bôm omna hmun biak ina khan a zâla, khovâr mân meiser a lan chok mai laiin,
khan Samuela chu a koia. Ama’n, “Ka pu hin ki om,” a tia.
Khante, Elia kuang khan a van tâna, “Hin ki om, ni ni ikoi ma ni,” a tia.
Khannisianlân Elia khan, “Nang koi ma ung, va zâl nôk ta ro,” a tia. Khanchu Samuela chu a fea, a va zâl nôk tâka.
khan Samuela kha a koi nôka, kha lai khan nâipang Samuela khan
Khanchu Samuela chu a thoia, Elia kuang khan a fea, “Hin ki om ni ni koi maia,” a tia. Khan Elia khan a sâma, “Nang koi ma ung, ki nâipa va zâl nôk ta ro,” a tia.
Voithumna tena chu
Khanchu Elia khan Samuela kuang khan, “Fe’n lân, va zâl nôkin lân, nang a koi nôkin chu,
Kha hnung chu
Kha nikhua khan Elia in sûng mi thurchi ki insîr murdi kha a bula irthokin a mong dênin ki itho hrang a ni.
A nâipasalhaiin Pathian an insîrinsiatna sual kha inhriat chakin a khap no sikin a in sûngkua chu kumtuanga hrangin kuttum ki itho hrang a nih ti hi ki lei ihril zoi tâk a ni.
Khasikin Elia in sûng mihai siatna kha irbôlna hrangin mani, thilinhlanin mani, itiklai khomin irlêk thei ni no nih tiin chong ki lei inkung tâk a ni,” a tia.
Samuela kha a vâr dênin a zâlhmuna khan a oma; khanchu a hong thoia,
Khanchu Elia khan Samuela kha a koia, “Samuela ki nâipa,” a tia. Samuela khan, “Hin ki om ka pu,” a tia.
Elia khan, “I thil mo
Khanchu Samuela khan itinrêng a hril pe ving tâka; ite ip nei viat loiin. Elia khan, “Ama chu
Samuela chu a hong irsôn tîr tîra, a kuang
Khanchu Dan khua ata Beer-seba dên rakin Israel mi murdihai khan Samuela chu
chu Silo khan an lâr nôka, kha khan

Kha laia khan Filistia mihai chu Israelhai doi hrangin an irfôka. Khasika khan Israel mihai kha Filistia mihai doi hrangin an irthok suaka. Ebenezar kôla omhmun an khuara; Filistia mihaiin Afek-a hmun an khuara.
Filistia mihai kha Israel mihai lei danh hrangin an lei irzara; an hong irdoiin chu Filistia mihai kuanga khan, Israel mihai chu an dok tâka, irdoina hmuna khan sipai sângminli vêl an thata.
A la dam sipaihai kha an riakbuka an va kîr nôkin chu Israel ulianhai khan, “Itho sika mo a vuan hin Filistia mihai kuta
Khanchu mipuihai khan Silo-a khan mi an tîra. Khatak ata kha Cherubim chunga toi, Itinrêng sin thei
Thuthung Bômin an riakbuk a zuang tungin chu, Israel murdihai kha inring takin an khêk dur dura, irnêng an tor chita.
Filistia mihaiin an khêk irhâi an inhriatin chu, “Hebraihai riakbuka mi khêk irhâi kha itho sika ma ni tâk?,” an tia. Hebraihai riakbuka
“An riakbuka Pathian a izuang a ni. Ei ta hrangin intak a ti! matona khan chu hianga hi la om ngai maka, ei ta hrangin irhel zap a ti!
Kha Pathian kut hrât tak ata kha tu mo nin zôk thei ta hrang? kha Pathian kha a ni, Aigupta mihai ramchâra hripui chi tinrêng that theitu kha.
O nangni Filistia mihaio, nin suaka an iom anga khan Hebraihai suaka nin om loina hrangin hrât takin om unglân pasal hrâtin om roi: Pasal hrât takin om unglân, pasal hrât angin doi mai roi,” an tia.
Khanchu Filistia mihai khan hrât takin an doia. Israel mihai chu an doka, an mâni insûng tiang lâizâm an tho tâka, an that intamhai oka: Israel mi sipai sîngthum an ithi a ni.
Pathian Thuthung Bôm kha an lâk pehaia; Elia nâipasalhai ruai Hofnia le Finehasa hai kha an that saa.
Sipaihai laia Benjamina irchia mi inkhat irsualbual ata kha an tâna, a puan diar chet duarin le a lu chunga pil kop zuakin, kha nî sûn ngêta khan Silo a hong tunga.

Elia khan lampui sîra a toihmuna toiin a lei thîr chiana, Pathian Thuthung Bôm sika khan a lungrîl chu irlo’nthingin a oma. Kha mi kha kho sûnga a hong tunga, thurchi kha a hon sîrin chu an kho pumpuiin irlo’nthingin an khêk vung vung tâka.
Elia khan an khêk irhâi a len hriata, “Kha dôra irhâi a isiat so itho sika mo a ini,” a tia. Kha mi kha irhnot takin a va fea, Elia kha a va hrila.
Elia chu kum sômkuak kiriat mi a nia, a mit a zîng pe tâka, khua hmunfel thei ta maka.
Kha mi khan Elia kuang khan, “Irsualbual ata hong zôk ki nia, a vuan hin irsualbual ata hong rot ki ni,” a tia. Elia khan, “Ki nâipa itin mo thil a iom lam?,” a tia.

Thurchi hong intungpu khan a sâma, “Israel mihai chu Filistia mihai ata kha lâizâm an thoa, mipui laia irthatna irkhêl tak a oma, ni nâipasalhai ruai Hofnia le Finehasa hai khom an thia; Pathian Thuthung Bôm khom an lâkpai pehai ta,” a tia.

Kha mi khan Pathian Thuthung Bôm thu a hon sîr zela khan, kotbâi kôla a toihmun ata kha Elia chu a thal tiang an rîla, a ring a kiak pea, a thi tâka, a tar ok tâka, a mar sika a ni, Israelhai chunga kum sômminli roi lei rêl tâk a ni.

Elia moinu Finehasa dôngma khan nâi a vonga, a neina hrang anâi teng tâka, Pathian Thuthung Bôm an lâkpai pe ti thu an hriata, a pu le a pasal an thi thu a hon hriatin chu a lu a kûna, nâiha’n a sea, nâi a nei tâka.
A thi vâng tâka, a kôla nupanghai khan a kuang, “Chi no ro, nâipasal ni nei ta hi te,” an tia. Khannisianlân irngai viat maka, a sâm khom sâmhai mah.
“Roiinpuina khan Israel chu a mâksan ta,” tiin nâite irhming chu Ikaboda a ti tâka. Pathian Thuthung Bôm chu an lâkpai pea, a tarpu le a pasal an thi tah ti tetûkna a ni.
“Pathian Thuthung Bôm chu mi’n an lâk tâk sikin Roiinpuina khan Israelhai chu a imâksan tâk a ni,” a tia.
Khan Filistia mihaiin Thuthung Bôm an lâk hnunga khan chu; Thuthung Bôm kha Ebenezara ata Asdod khuaa an hong chôia,
an Dagon pathian ina an lâk lûta, Dagon irlim kôla khan an siaa.
Khante, Asdod kho mihai kha zînga an thoiin chu,
Zîng nôka zînga an thoiin chu
Khasika khan Dagon ochaihai le Dagon biak ina hong ngaihai khomin Asdod khuaa Dagon kotbâia khan atûn ten hin an ilût ngam loi a ni.
Khanchu Asdod kho mihaiin khaanga om a nih ti an inhriatin chu, “Israelhai Pathian Thuthung Bôm kha ei kôla om mai ta no ri se, eini chunga le pathian Dagon chunga a kuttum thâk a nahrai ta,” an tia.

Khanchu Filistia rêng ringahai kha an koibukhaia, “Israelhai Pathian Thuthung Bôm kha imo kin ilo hrang?,” an tia. Anni khan, “Gath khuaa va thak roi,” an tia. Khanchu Israelhai Pathian Thuthung Bôm kha Filistia khuaa ngêt Gath khuaa khan an va thak tâka.
Khannisianlân kha khua kha an van tungin chu

Khanchu Thuthung Bôm kha Filistia-hai khuaa ngêt, Ekron-a khan an thon nôka, khannisianlân kha khua kha a va tungin chu Ekron kho mihai khan, “Israelhai Pathian Thuthung Bôm kha eini le ei nâihai ni thatna hrang pialin an hong ichôi a ni,” tiin an khêk nôk sup supa.

Khanchu Filistia rêng ringahai kha an koibukhai nôka, “Israelhai Thuthung Bôm hin keini le kin in mihai a ni that irhmang zoi loina hrangin a omna hmun ngêta thonpai nôk ni ri se,” an tia. Pathianin natakin kuttum a tho sikin an kho pumpuiin an buai nôk tâka.
A thi loihai kha an popa, khanchu kha kho sûnga mihai kha changpuina zongin an pathianhai an zong ta.
Filistia mihaiin ochaihai le tasân theihai an koihaia, “

Anni’n, “Israelhai Pathian Thuthung Bôm hi nin thak kîr khoma, a korongin infetir no roi, a kuang siat irbôlna thilinhlan thon sa roi, khan kêng damin nin iom hrang, khanchu itho mo a kuttum nin ituang ti inhre suak nin ti,” an tia.

Mipuihai khan, “Ama kuang kin siat irbôlna inhlan hrangin imo kin itho hrang?,” an tia. Anni khan, “Filistia rêng om dôrin pangpo millim ringa le châichek millim ringa; rângachakin siam unglân; nangni le nin rênghai chunga hri lêng kha hmunkhat a ni.

Pangpo millim ringa le nin ram insiattu châichek millim ringa nin isiamhai khan Israelhai Pathian kha chôiindôm roi. Khanchu nangni le nin pathianhai le nin ram kha kuttum nangni a tho ta no khom a ni thei.

Aigupta mihai le Faroa lungrîl an inngar anga khan itho mo nin lungrîl nin inngar hi? Aigupta ram ata Israel mihai kha an tîrpaihai mâka chu Pathianin anni kha chanlamboiin a isiam dân kha irnghil no roi.
Khasikin, atûn hin tâli thar kha sinsiam unglân, sehrâtpui hni dût sôm lai, ringkol la pêl ngai loi kha tâlia khan thung pe khak unglân, a têhai kha insûng tiang hong hruaipai pe roi.

Thuthung Bôm kha la unglân, tâlia khan bâng unglân, siat irbôlna nin inhlan rângachak thil hluhai kha bakot sûnga thunin a kôla khan se roi. Tâli kha a fena hrang lampuia irthok sianlân, a bingin infetir roi.

Khanchu en chian unglân, Beth-Semes khua tiang a fe’n chu ei chunga thil saloi tak hong tung hi Israelhai Pathian itho ni a ti. Khaang khan a fe no’n chu kuttum ni thotu kha ama ni mah ti inhre suak ei ta, ei chunga a hong iom angin bê ei ti,” an tia.
Mihai khan khaang khan an thoa, sehrâtpui a dût sôm lai inhni an hruaia, tâlia khan an khit pehaia, a têhai chu in sûnga an khum pehaia.
Thuthung Bôm kha tâlia an siaa, rângachaka siam châichek millim le pangpo millim siana bakot leh khan.

Sehrâtpuihai khan Beth-Semes tiang panin an fe thal thala; inhrâm thiaiin a lampuia khan an fea, chang tiang vei tiang pêt viat mahaia, Filistia-hai rêng ringahai khan Beth-Semes ramri dên thalin an zuihai ta.
Beth-Semes kho mihai khan phâizôla khan bu an lei âta, an hong irheiin chu Thuthung Bôm kha an hong hmua, an lômtak taka.
Tâli kha Beth-Semes kho mi Josua loia khan a hong lûta; lungpui lianpa kôla khan a ngîr chiana, mihaiin tâlia thinghai kha an tuka, sehrâtpuihai kha an thata,
Levi irchihai khan,
Kha kha Filistia rêng ringahaiin an en zoiin chu, kha nî ngêt khan Ekron kho tiang an kîr nôk ta.
Filistia mihaiin rângachak le pangpo millim ringa
Rângachak châichek millim kha, kha kho sûnga an kulpui nei le thingtâng khuaa khom tep vinga Filistia rêng ringahai khua dôr ang a ni.
Khan,
Beth-Semes kho mihai khan, “Hi Pathian irthiang
Khaang khan Kiriath-jearim kho mihai kuang khan, “Filistia mihai khan
Khanchu Kiriath-jearim kho mihai kha an zu fea,
Khante Samuela khan Israel mihai kuang khan, “Nin lungrîl taka
Khanchu Israel mihai khan an Baal millimhai le Asterothi millimhai kha an pai vinga,
Kha hnung chu Samuela khan, “Israel mi murdihai chu Mizpa khuaa koibûmhai ving unglân,
Khanchu Mizpa-a khan an irbûm tâka, tui an chôia,
Filistia mihai kha Israelhaiin Mizpa-a khan an irbûm ti an inhriatin chu Israel mihai doi hrangin Filistia rêng ringahai kha an hong irthoka, Israelhaiin an len hriatin chu an lei chia.
Khanchu Israel mihai khan Samuela kuang, “Filistia mihai kut ata nin zôk hranga
Samuela’n kêlbelrate irhnu nêk lai kha a lâka, a thata, pumhâl thilinhlanin
Samuela’n hâlirvôm thil an hlan lai takin Filistia mihai khan Israelhai doi hrangin an hong suaka; khannisianlân kha ni khan chu
Israel mihai kha Mizpa ata khan an suaka, Filistia mihai kha Bethkar dên thalin an irzûlhaia, an ithathai thiai a ni.
Kha hnung chu Samuela khan lung a lâka, Mizpa le Sen kâra khan a phuna, “Hi ten dên hin
Khanchu Filistia-hai kha an dok tâka, Israelhai ram kha hong rûn nôk ta mahai.

Filistia mihaiin Israel mihai khua an ilâkhai chu Ekron-a irthokin Gath dênin Israel mihai an pêk kîr nôka. Khaang khan Israel mihai khan an ram murdi chu an idong nôk tâk a ni. Israel mihai le Amor mihai chu irngeiin an om ta.
Samuela dam sûng kârka chu Israel mihai roi a rêl pehai ta.
A kum tin Bethel le Gilgal le Mizpa hi a ihrosuak ngai a ni; kha hmunhai khan chu Israel mihai thubuai a irêl pehai ngai a ni.
Kha hnung chu ama omna Rama khuaa khan a kîr nôk ngaia; kha hmuna khom khan Israelhai roi a rêl pehai sa a ni. Rama khua khan
Khanchu hiang hin a hong ni ta, Samuela kha a hong tar tena chu a nâipasalhai kha Israelhai laia roirêltu’n a siamhaia.
A nâi ulian irhming chu Joela a nia; a nâipang ual chu Abija a ni; Beer-seba khuaa roirêltu an ni.
Khannisianlân, anni khan an pa omdân zui loiin, sum le puan tiang an huatirhama, khasikin fâk inrûkhai an hmanga, dik loi takin roi an rêl ngaia.
Khanchu Israelhai laia hruaitu murdi an irbûma, Rama khuaa Samuela kuang an fea;
a kuang, “En ta, ni hong tar ok tâka, ni nâipasalhai lakin ni omdân kha zui thei mahaia, khasikin nam dang murdihai anga kin chunga roi ni rêl pe hrangin rêng ni siam pe ro,” an tia.
Khannisianlân a kuang, “Roi ni rêl pe hrang rêng ni pe ro,” an iti thu khan Samuela chu lôm thei rak maka; khanchu
khan Samuela kuang, “Mipuihaiin ni kuanga an iti hi irngai ro; nangma nang an indit loi ni maka, an chunga rêng chang hrangin keima hi an ni indit loi a ni.
Aigupta ram ata ki hruai suakhai nî ata atûn tena an thil tho dân murdi, hnung ni songsana pathian dang sinhai an itho ngai ang dênin, ni chunga an itho a ni hi,
khasikin an thu kha irngai ro. Khannisian irningna thu ngartak pehaiin lân, an chunga rêng roirêltu chang hrang dân fel takin insîr pehai ro,” a tia.
Samuela khan

“Nin chunga roirêltu hrang rêngin nangni a ilo hrang chu hiang hin ni a ti. Nin nâipasalhai kha sipaiin siamhai a ta; senkhat chu râlhai tâlia, senkhat chu sakor chung chuang mi, senkhat chu tâlihai matona intân hrangin hmang a ti.

Senkhat chu sipai sângkhat hruaitu, sômringa hruaitua nangni phun a ta; senkhat chu ama loia irnêng pil tuk nin ta, a bu ât hrang le irdoina hmang hrang râltukfam siamtu hranghai, a tâlia hmangrua siam hrang leh khan nangni hmang a ti.
Nin nâinupanghai kha ama hrangin mirimhoi siamtu, bu an suangtu le bai siamtuin hmanghai a ti.
Ama’n nin loihai, nin grep irhuanhai, nin oliv bilhai, a sa u ualhai nangni lapai pe a ta, a mi lianhai pehai a ti.
Nin bu le nin grep irhuana mi sôma inkhat nangni la pe a ta, a mi lianhai le hruaituhai pehai a ti.
Nin suakhai le nin sâhai le nin sakuartunghai a sa u ual nangni la pe a ta, a sin thôna hrangin hmang a ti.
Nin kêlbelra pâla mi sôma inkhat nangni la pe a ta, nangni zel kha a suak chang nin ti.
Kha tena chu nin la inthang hrang rêng hrangin lan rung nin ta; khannisianlân, kha tika khan chu
Nikhomsianlân, mipuihaiin Samuela thu kha pom nuam mahaia, “Ni ma, rêng kin inei ngêt hrang a ni;
khan kêng nam danghai angin kin hong iom hrang; kin rêngin roi ni rêl pe a ta, kin râl doihai ni doipui a ta,” an tia.
Samuela khan mipuihai thuhril kha ar ngaia, khanchu a fea,
khan Samuela kuang, “An thu kha pomin lân, rêng phun pehai ro,” a tia. Khanchu Samuela’n Israel mihai kuang khan, “Mi tin mâni kho sûnga fe nôk ving ta roi,” a tia.
Benjamina rama, Benjamina irchia mi inkhat, mi hrât mi huaisen inkhat hi a oma, ar hming chu Kisa a nia, kha mi kha Afia panama mi Bakoratha in sûngkuaa Zerora nâi Abiela nâipa a ni.
Ama hin nâipasal a neia, ar hming chu Saula a nia, ruatharte hmêl sa le vânglai tak a nia, Israel mihai laia khan ama nêka hmêl sa dang zel om mahaia.
Saula pa Kisa sakuartung senkhat an irhmanga, khanchu Kisa khan a nâipa Saula kuang khan, “Thoiin lân, ni hnungzui laia mi inkhat hruaiin lân, sakuartunghai va zonghai ro,” a tia.

Khanchu Efraima tâng ramhai kha a’rfanga, Salisa ram khom a’rfang saa, khannisian hmuhai maka; khanchu Saalim ram a’rfang nôka, kha hmun khom khan sakuartunghai kha om maka. Kha zoiin chu Benjamina mihai ram an irfang nôka, khannisianlân hmu ual mahai.
Zufa ram an tungin chu Saula khan a hnungzuitu kuang khan, “Tho, in sûng tiang kîr nôk ta ei ti, khano’nchu ka pa’n sakuartunghai insâp ta loiin, eini kêng a ni insâp hrang tâk,” a tia.

A hnungzuitu khan, “Irngai ro, hi khuaa hin Pathian mi a oma, mi mahripom tak a ni, a insîr murdi chu a hong itung indik ngai a ni. Tho kha khan fe ei ta, sakuartunghai omna a nin hril thei duai khom a ni thei,” a tia.
Saula khan a zuitu kuang khan, “Fe ta ngân inlân, imo ei ichôi pe hrang? Ei phura ite bai lak nei ta mak mea, Pathian mi kha ite lômman chôi pe hrang lak nei mak mea, imo ei irhmu ta hrang o?” a tia.
A zuitu khan Saula kuang, “Tangka sum tômte chu ki la nei; hi hi pe ki ta, sakuartunghai ei hmu theina hrang lam a nin hril duai khom a ni thei,” a tia.

Khante Saula khan a zuitu kuang khan, “A sa khate, tho fe ei ti,” a tia. Khanchu Pathian mi omna khua panna lam tung an hong lui laia khan, dôngmate tui chôi hranga zuanghai leh an irtonga, an kuang, “Hi hin hmutheitu mo a om?” tiin an irdona. (Matona khan chu Israelhai laia, mi’n Pathian chongpui an nuama hin chu, “Tho hmutheitu kuang fe ei ti,” an ti ngaia.

Anni khan, “O, a om nin matona a lei fe chak a ni. Irhnot unglân la va phâk nin ti. Kho sûng nin hong lût le hmu zel nin ti, a vuan hin kho sûng a zuang itung a ni. A vuan hin tâng chunga maichâma mihaiin irbôlna an inhlan a ni. Kha irbôlna kha bor pêktu hrang a lei ni sikin a tung mâka chu mipuihaiin khalâi an irhîl thei loi hrang a ni. Bor a pêk zoi tena kêng an ikoihai khan an la ifâk thei ngai a ni, khasikin nin fe lata niin chu tâng chunga bu nêk hrang a fe mân hong hmu zel nin ti,” an tia.
Khanchu Saula le a zuitu kha kho sûnga khan an fe tâka, khua an hong lûtin chu Samuela kha chubai mûkna hmun irsâng panin anni tianga hongin an hmua.
Khan sûn khat mâna

“Nangtûk hi zoro lai taka hin Benjamina nam ata mi inkhat ni kuang hong tîr hrang ki ni, ki mi Israelhai chunga hruaitu ni hrangin sahriak lei pol ro. Ama khan Filistia mihai kut ata ki mihai inzôk a ti. Ki mihai tuangna kha ki hmu tâka, an khêk irhâi ki kuang a hong itung tâk a ni,” a tia.
Khan, Samuela’n Saula a hmu’n chu,
Khanchu Saula’n kul mikota khan Samuela kha a va pana, “Hmutheitupa in chu kho tiang mo a inih nin hril ro ba,” a tia.

Khanchu Samuela’n Saula kha a sâma, “Keima hi Hmutheitu chu ki ni, ki maton tiang bozôl panin fe’n lân, a vuan hin ki kuang bu ni inêk hrang kêng, khan kêng nangtûk zîng nang ki infetir hrang, ni milunga om murdi khom nan hril ki ti.

Khanchu ni sakuartung sûn thum le’rhmang tâk kha ni kângindoitir ual no ro, an hmuhai nôk ta. Israelhai laia roiinpuina hi tuhai ta hrang mo a ini? Nangma le ni pa ina mi om murdihai ta hranga mo ni ma?,” a tia.

Khanchu Saula’n a sâma, “Israel nam laia a chîn tak, Benjamina nama mi mo ni ma ung. Khanchu kin in sûng khom hi Benjamina nam laia a chîn tak mo ni ma. Itina mo hianga keima kuanga ni ihril hi?,” a tia.
Khanchu Samuela’n Saula le a sinthopuihai kha a hruaihaia, mikhual omna tentana khan a hruai lûthaia, mi an koia sômthumhai laia khan hmun roiinpui taka an toitira.
Khan Samuela’n bu erpu kuang khan, “Ni kuang a bingin hrê roh tia hme nang ki ipêk kha hong chôi ro,” a tia.

Khanchu bu erpu khan a malpui le a chunga hmê kha a hong chôia, Saula makunga khan a va siaa. Khan Samuela’n “En roh nangma ta hrang piala a bingin ki lei isia a ni! O ti’n lân fa ro, hi hi a zoro taka nang kin lei inkung pe a ni, mi khom ki lei fialhai ta,” a tia.

Khanchu kha ni zela khan Saula chu Samuela hai leh khan bu khalâi hmunkhatin an otsuam tâka. Khanchu bozôl ata kho sûng an fea, Samuela chu Saula leh in chunga Saula zâlna an isiam pena khan an zâl tâka.
Zînga kôl a hor sal tena chu Samuela’n Saula in chunga zâl kha a koia, “Thoiin lân nang tîr ta ki ti,” a tia. Khanchu Saula kha a thoia, Samuela leh an ruaiin an suak ta.

Khan kho kôl an zu tung tena chu Samuela’n Saula kuang khan, “Sinthotu hi ki maton tiang infetirin lân, (ama kha a fe tâka) Khannisian nangma chu la ngîr viatin lân, Pathian ata thu suak kha nang lan hril bak hi rong,” a tia.
Khanchu Samuela’n sahriak bûr kha a lâka, Saula lu chunga khan a buaka, a tuma.

A vuan ni ni fesan hnungin Benjamina ramria, Zelza hmun, Rakili thân kôla mi inhni hmu ni ti. Anni khan nangma kuang, sakuartung ni izonghai kha an hmu ta, irngai ro, ni pa khan sakuartung kha insâp ta maka, nangma kêng nang a insâp ual tâk, ki nâipa hi imo ki ilo ta hrang, a ti mai, ti thu nang hril an ti.

Khanchu kha rengata fe maiin lân, Tabor-a seso thing ni va tung tena chu, kha khan mi inthum Bethel-a Pathian kuanga fe hranghai leh irtong nin ta, inkhatin kêlte inthum pom a ta, inkhatin bai tiam inthum chôi a ta, inkhatin savun koka uain chôi a ti.
Anni khan chubai nang mûk an ta, bai tiam hni nang pe an ta, kha bai kha la ro.

Kha hnung chu Filistia sipaihai omna Pathian tâng va tung ni ta, hiang hin hong ni a ti, kha khua lûtnaa khan, deipuhai perkhuang, khuangte, theihle le serânda chôia bozôl ata zuanghai irtongpuihai ni ta, khêkpuma lâmin om an ti.
Khanchu
Hi thilhai hi a hong tung tena chu Pathianin nang a ihruai lam takin tho ro.

Khanchu ki fe mân hin Gilgal-a lei zu fe’n lân, keima khom pum hâlirvôm thilinhlan le irngeina irbôlnahai inhlan hrangin nangma kuang zuang ki ta; ki zuanga, ni itho hrang dân nang ki zuang hril mân sûn sari ni lei iom hrang a ni,” a tia.

Khanchu khaang khan a hong ni tâka, Saula’n Samuela kha teipui hrangin hnung a songsan tena chu Pathianin lungrîl danglamna a pêk tâka; kha ni khan Samuela’n a kuanga a ihrilhai kha a tung irkip ving tâka.
Khanchu tâng kha an hong tung tena chu, deipuhai khan an irtongpuia,

Khanchu hiang hi a hong nia, matona ama lei inhriatpuihai deipuhai thuhrilna hmuna khan a kop sa tâk, ti an inhriatin an hrila, “Kisa nâipa chunga thil zuang tung hi imo a ini tâk? Saula khom hi deipuhai laia a ikop sa tâk ma ni?” an tia.
Khanchu a omna khuaa mi inkhatin a dona, “An pa chu tu mo a ini ual?,” a tia. Khasikin, “Saula khom deipu a ini tâk ma ni?” ti chu tufiam thôna takin an hmang tâka.
Khan an thuhrilna a kop zoiin chu bôzôl chu a tung tâka.
Khan Saula pa urêngpa’n ama le a sinthopuitu kuang khan, “Khôn mo nin ife?,” a tia. Ama’n, “Sakuartung kin izong kêng, kin hmu no tena chu Samuela kuang kin ife a ni,” a tia.
Khan, Saula pa urêngpa khan, “Samuela’n ni kuang imo a ihril, nin hril ro,” a tia.
Saula pa urêngpa kuang khan, “Sakuartunghai kha an hmu tah ti thu an nin hril,” a tia. Khannisianlân rêng hong chang hrang chungchâng thu Samuela’n a ihril chu hril mah.
Khan, Samuela’n mipuihai chu Mizpa-a
Khannisian a vuan nin milung inzîngnahai le nin dengtheinahai ata nangni inzôkpu nin Pathian kha indit mak chêia, a kuang rêng ni siam pe roh nin tia,’ tiin. Khasikin, atûn ar chi le a panamin
Khanchu Samuela’n Israel irchi murdihai chu an langtira, khan Benjamina irchi chu inthangin an om tâka.

Khan Samuela’n Benjamina irchihai chu a in sûngkua tam dôrin an langtirhaia, Matria in sûng mihai kha inthangin an om tâka. Khanchu Kisa nâipa Saula kha inthang a ni tâka, ama an zonga, khannisian hmu mahai.
Khanchu
Khanchu an van tâna, an va hruai suaka, khanchu mipui laia a ngîr suaka ni’n chu mi danghai nêkin a sei uala.
Khanchu Samuela’n mipuihai kuang, “
Khanchu Samuela’n mipuihai chu rêng om dân hranghai a hrilhai a hrilhaia, lekhabua a’rziaka, hmun irthianga a siapai tâka. Khanchu Samuela’n mipuihai chu an mâni in sûng tiang an kîrtirhai nôk tâka.
Khan Saula khom kha Gibe khuaa a in tiang a fea; khan mi hrât senkhat, Pathianin an lungrîl a itôn pehai khom kha an fe saa.
Khannisianlân, Beliala nâi senkhathaiin chu “Hi pa hin itin mo a ni isansuak thei hrang?” an tia. Khanchu an hmusita, lômman ite pe nuam mahaia, khannisian ama chu ite ti loiin a dâihreka.

Khan, tha khat a’rzoiin chu, Amon rêng Nahasa chu Gilead rama Jebes khopui doi hrangin a sipaihai a hruaihaia. An inhnê tâka. Jebes khuaa mihaiin Nahasa kuang, “Kin kuang thu inkungin lân, khan kêng kin roirêltu hrangin nang kin ipom hrang,” an tia.
Nahasa khan hiang hin a sâma, “Hiang hin nin kuang thu inkung ki ti: Nin chang tianga mitru murdi kêlsua ki ta, kha kha Israelhai irhming siatna ni a ti,” a tia.

Khanchu Jebes khuaa hruaituhaiin, “Israel ram murdia mi kin tîr theina hrangin sûn sari ni la nghâk phot ro, kha tena khom a ni saninzôk hrang mi tûte an om noa ni’n chu, nangma kuang irpe zel ta kin ti,” an tia.
Khanchu mi an itîrhai khan, Saula omna Gebe kha an va tunga, mipui inhriatin kha thu kha an hrila; mipui vântânghai chu inring takin an chap tâka.
Khan Saula chu loi rengata sechalhai leh an hong tung chak a nia, Saula khan, “Itho sika mo hianga mipuihai hi an ichap?” a tia. Khanchu Jebes khua mihai thuhril kha an inhrila.
Kha thurchihai kha an hriat infel tena chu, Saula chunga khan Pathian irtha a satêrengin a zuang chuma, a ning a sate’n an mur pe tâka.

Khanchu sehrât bop khat a thata, a hme ar chan chita, Israel ram hmun tina a sem suak vinga; “Mi tukhom Saula le Samuela irdoina zui nuam loitu kai chu an sehrâtchal hiang hin iloh ni a ti,” tiin. Khanchu mipuihai chunga
Khanchu Saula’n Bezek hmuna khan a bukkhômhaia, Israel mi chu nuai thum an nia, Juda mi chu sîngthum an ni.

Jebes rengata palai an itîrhai kuang khan, “Nin mipuihai kha hrilhai unglân, nangtûk misa a lum lai takin sansuak nih nin ti, va ti roi,” an tia. Khanchu Jebes mihaiin kha thu kha an inhriatin chu a sân an râi a fân pehai tâka.
Khanchu Nahasa kuang, “Nangtûk nin kuang irpe kin ta, nin nuam takin ni lo ta roi,” an tia.

Khanchu zîng nôka chu a mihai kha pâl thumin a zêkhaia, thingchangvârro vêla hin an irdoipuihai riakbuka an va lût khumhaia, Amon mihai chu sûn misa lum dên rakin an thathaia; an ithat selhai chu an indarh chita, a bopa om rêng irhmu ta mahaia.
Khanchu Israel mihaiin Samuela kuang, “Tuhai mo an ini, Saula hin ei chunga thu a inei hrang ma ni? tituhai kha? kha mihai kha hong hruai suakhai unglân, lei thatpaihai kin ti,” an tia.
Khannisianlân, Samuela’n, “A vuan sûn lele hin chu tûte that ni no ri sehai,
Khanchu Samuela’n mipuihai kuang, “Tho Gilgal-a fe ei ti, khatak ata ram hi inding thar nôk tah ei ti,” a tia.
Kha tena chu mipui murdi Gilgal panin an fe tâka, Saula chu
Khan Samuela’n Israel mipuihai kuang, “Irngai hi roi, keima kuanga tho hranga nin inkung chu ki tho zoi tâka, nin laia roirêl hrangin rêng khom nangni kin thang pe tâka.
Atûn chu nangni hruai hrang khom nin nei tâka, kei lak ki tarin ki samhai khom a chuak ta, nâi pâl khom nin laia hin ki neihaia, ruatharte ki ni lai ata atûn ten hin nangni ki lei ir-ôi mai tâka.
Tho’nchâi ki lei nei duai khomin, hi hmuna hin ki om
Khan mipuihaiin, “Ni huang mak che, deng khom nin thei mak che, tûte kuang ata khom ite la ngai mak che,” tiin an sâma.
Khan Samuela’n, “
Samuela’n mipuihai kuang, “Mosia le Arona inthangtu le Aigupta ram ata nin irchibulhai hruaisuaktu chu
Khasikin
Aigupta rama Jakoba le a in mihai an fe lai khan, Aigupta mihaiin deng an intheihaia; nin irchibulhaiin
Khannisianlân
Khanchu
Khan
Khannisianlân, Amon mihai rêng Nahasa chu nangni doi hrangin a hong ti nin inhriat tena chu
Khasikin nin rêng inthang le nin izong chu en roi,
chu nin chia, a sin nin thoa, a hê nin irngaia,
Khannisianlân
Khasikin nin omna hmun senga khan ngîr unglân,
Bu ât zoroa om mo ni mak me? khannisianlân,
Khanchu Samuela’n
Khanchu mipui murdi’n Samuela kuang khan, “Kin thi loina hrangin
Khan Samuela’n mipuihai kuang, “Chi no roi, hi thil saloi hi a tho chu nin lei tho tâka, khannisianlân
Ite irfêna boi le nangni sansuak thei loi hrang chu zuiin pêtsan ual no roi, khahai kha ite hmang hmunboi a ni.
A chonginkung dettak sika hin
Kha vai kha ni loiin nin ta hranga chongchai hi mongin,
chu chi phot unglân, nin milung murdi’n ama sintho unglân, nin laia a sintho roiinpuihai le nin milung sûnga vong mai roi.
Khannisianlân sual sin nin la tho maia ni’n chu, nangni le nin rênghai khom la’rhmang ving nin ti,” a tia.
Saula chu kum sômthum mi a ni’n a hong inlala, Israelhai chunga kum hni an lala.

Saula khan Israelhai laia mi sângthum an thanghaia; sânghnihai kha Mikmas-a le Bethel tânga ama kuang an oma, sângkhat kha Benjamina rama Gibe khuaa Jonathana kuang an oma. A danghai chu an in omna chita an fea.

Jonathana khan Gibe khuaa Filistia sipaihai kha a doi inhnêa, Filistia mihaiin an len hriata. Kha hnung chu Saula khan Hebrai mi murdi irdoina koi hrangin mi a tîra, an ram pumpuia khan bekul an tuma.

Israelhai murdi khan Saula kha Filistia sipaihai a doi ti le Israel mihai chu Filistia mihaiin ngam takin an ngam ti thu an len hriat tâka. Khanchu mipuihai kha Saula kuang Gilgal-a an irbukkhôm ving tâka.

Filistia mihai kha Israelhai doi hrangin an irbukkhôm zoi tâka; tâli sîngthum, sakor chung chuang mi sângruk, sipaihai chu tuikhanglian kôla chiai tamtak an nia. Anni chu Bethaven nisua tiang panga Mikmas-a khan an fea, omhmun an khuara.
Kha hnung chu anni khan ichiom tak zelin an hong doihaia, Israelhai chu an hong hmosonghaia. Israel mi senkhathai chu rôl kâra hai, khur sûnga hai, lungpui kâra hai, tuisunsua haia an irbîka;
senkhathai chu Jordan râla Gad le Gilead ram tianghai lâizâm an thoa. Saula chu Gilgal-a a la om maia, a kuanga om mipuihai kha irlo’nthing natin an chia.
Samuela’n he a ibehai ang takin sûn sari Samuela kha an nghâka, khannisianlân Samuela kha Gilgal-a khan la zuang maka. Mipuihaiin Saula kha an mâksan thiai tâka.
Khanchu Saula khan, “Hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrang le irngeina thilinhlan hranghai kha keima kuang hong chôi roi,” a tia. Khanchu hâlirvôm thil kha an inhlana.
Hâlirvôm thil an hlan zoiin chu Samuela kha a zuang tung tâka. Saula kha chubai va mûka lei va don hrangin a hong suaka.

Khannisian Samuela’n, “Imo ni lei itho tâk na?” a tia. Saula khan, “Mipuihaiin an ni mâksan thiaia, nangma lak ni sûn inkung sûnga zuang suak mak chea; khabana Filistia mihai khom Mikmas-a an irchun ving tâk ti kin hriata.
Khasikin, Filistia mihaiin Gilgal-a hin an ni zuang idoi hrang a ni tâka.
Samuela’n Saula kuang khan, “Ni sintho hi into sintho dân a nia,
Khannisian atûn chu nin lalna hi hek hrang a ni ta.

Samuela chu a thoia, Gilgal ata kha a rot tâka. Mipuihaiin Saula chu a sipaihai inthêm hranga a fe kha an zuia. Gilgal ata kha Benjamina rama Gibe khuaa khan an hong fe tâka. Saula khan mipui a zuituhai kha a tephaia, irzaruk vêl an ni.
Saula le a nâipa Jonathana le an kôla mi omhai kha Benjamina rama Gibea khua khan an oma; khannisianlân Filistia mihai khan Mikmas-a khan omhmun an khuara.
Khante an râl doi pâlhai kha Filistia mihai omhmun ata kha pâl thumin an hong suaka, pâl khathai khan Sual rama Ofra tianga panin an fea;
pâl khathai khan Beth Horon tiang panin an fea; pâl dang nôk khan, Zeboim phâi dep le ramchâr tianga panin an fea.
Israelhai ram pumpuia khan thîrsu tûte om mahaia; Filistia mihai khan, “Hebrai mihai hin khandaiin mani, ufeiin mani, an irsiam duaiin chu,” an iti a ni.
Israel mihaiin kodâl, tutho, hreipui le kôite, lângkol thîrhai a môl le incher inngaihna hrangin Filistia mihai kuang an zu ife ngai a ni.
Kha an lângkol thîr le kodâl incher inngaina man chu Sekel hmun thuma semin hmun hni a nia, hreipui le tutho incherna man chu sekel hmun thuma semin hmun khat a ni.
Khaang khan an irdoi nî khan Saula le Jonathana ti no chu Israel sipaihaiin tûte’n khandai le ufei nei mahaia.
Filistia-hai khan sipai pâl Mikmas panna lama khan len ruang hrangin an tîrhai tâka.
Sûn khat chu Saula nâipa Jonathana khan râltukfam chôitu ruathartepa kuanga khan, “Tho so varâl tianga Filistia mihai riakbuka son la va fe rei,” a tia. Khannisian Jonathana’n a pa chu inhril maka,
Saula khan Gibea kho kôl Migron-a theipui kung hnuaia a oma; a kuang mi irzaruk vêl an oma.
Khante, Silo khuaa
Jonathana’n Filistia mihai riakbuk fena hranga rotna hrang Mikmas fena tiang khan hi tiang hi tianga lungpui irdo hi a oma; inkhat irhming chu Bozez a nia, inhnina chu Senea a ni.
Lung irdo inkhat kha chu hmâr tianga om a nia, Mikmas tiang a’rheia, a dang inkhat kha chu sim tianga om a nia, Geba tianga irhei a ni.
Jonathana khan a râltukfam chôitu ruathartepa kuang khan, “Tho sertan loi Filistia sipaihai omna son la va fe rei.
Ruathartepa khan, “Ni lungrîla hong om tak ang khan tho ro, nangma lungrîl ang kha keima khom a ni,” a tia.
Jonathana khan, “A sa, an kuang va fe ei ta, Filistia-hai son ni lei hmu ri sehai.
Khanchu ei kuang, ‘Nin laia kin zuang tung mâka chu lei om roi,’ an ni ti’n chu ei omna hmuna lei om chian ei ta,
khannisianlân keini tiang hong roi, an ti’n chu fe ei ti, kha kha
Khanchu an ruaiin Filistia mi râl entuhai mithmu hranga khan an var langa; Filistia-hai khan, “En roi Hebrai mihai an irbîkna khur sûng ata an hong suak ta,” an tia.
Kha hnung chu Jonathana le a râltukfam chôitu ruathartepa kha an koia, “Hong roi, thil nangni kin ihril hrang a om,” an tia. Jonathana khan a râltukfam chôitu ruathartepa kuang khan, “Ni zui ro;
Khanchu Jonathana kha a kut le a ke hmangin a luia, a râltukfam chôitu khan a zuia. Jonathana khan, Filistia-hai chu a doia, an intâl rum tâka, râltukfam chôitu khom khan a hong thathai thiaia.
Khaang khan Jonathana le râltukfam chôitu ruathartepa le an that maton taka an kâr irhla lam chu nôl dung tuan khat sûnga zel khan mi sômhni vêl an ithathai a ni.
Filistia mi murdi tâng rama omhai khom an irlo a len thing sêpa; râl hrungtuhai le riakbuka omhai khom a satêrenga irlo inthinga ichiin an oma, irnêng inhnînga, chardong irkhêl tak an ituang a ni ta.
Khan, Benjamina ram Gibea khuaa Saula râl hrungtuhaiin an hong thîrhaia. Filistia-hai chaninvâia intânhai kha an hmuhaia.
Khanchu Saula khan a kôla mipui omhai laia khan, “Atûn hin irtep unglân tu mo a om loi infel roi,” a tia. An hong irtepin chu Jonathana le a râltukfam chôitu kha om mahai ti an inhriat suaka.
Saula khan ochai Abija kuang khan, “Ochai songkol kha hong chôi ro,” a tia. Hi nî hin Abija’n Israelhai makunga a hong ichôi a ni.
Saula khan ochai le an chong lai takin Filistia mihai riakbuk tianga buaina kha ar sâng ual ual sikin, khanchu Saula khan ochai kuang khan, “Pathian chongpui zoro om thei ta ma,” a tia.
Kha hnung chu Saula le a kôla mipui omhai murdi kha an irbûma, Filistia mihai buaia lungzîng taka an binga irdoi, khandaia irthathai doi hrangin irdoina bual panin an suak tâka.
Filistia mihai thopa anni laia an riakbuka lei fe tâk, Hebrai mi senkhathai khom kha Saula le Jonathana kuanga om Israel mihai tiang an hong kop nôka.
Khaang dênin Efraima tâng rama Israel mi irbîk murdihai khom khan Filistia mihai lâizâm an tho ti an len hriata, anni khom irdoina kop sain Filistia-hai an le’rzûlhaia.
Bethaven khêl rakin an doihaia, khaang khan

Kha ni sûn khan chu Israel mihai chu châmsôl an irveia a sân an irzala. Saula khan, “Ki râlhai chunga phuba ki lâk mâka mi tukhom a vuan hin fâk zongtu chu vânnisalin om ri se,” itia khomâk irsâmin mipuihai thu ngar tak a pêkhai sikin. Mi tûte khom kha ni sûn chu ite fâk reng zong viat mahaia.
Mipuihai khan ram hnuai an va tunga, khuaihlutui a lei oma.
Ram hnuai kha khuaihlutuiin a sipa, khannisian tûte’n irtem viat mahai; mipuihai khan Saula khomâksâmna kha an ichi a ni.
Khannisianlân Jonathana khan a pa Saula’n mipuihai kha khomâk irsâmin a lei insîhai kha inhre maka; a khianghrol chôi leh khan khuaithâr kha a suna, a fâk tâka. Voikhat fâk zelin a hong har hupa.

Khanchu mipui laia mi inkhatin a kuang khan, “Châmsôl irveiin kin isôl ok chu a ni ta, khannisianlân ni pa’n mipuihai hi, ‘a vuana fâk zongpu tak chu vânnisalin om ri se,’ tiin thu ngar tak a ni ipêk a ni,” an tia.
Jonathana khan, “Ka pa hin kin mihai lungzîng a isakhai a ni hi te na! En ro, khuaihlutui a chînte ki hong in khoma ki hong ihar ok a nia!
Mipuihai hin an râllâk thil an ihmu dôr a vuan hin an inuam dôr fahai sian chu Filistia mihai hi, hi nêk hin an la ithat intamhai hrang a ni,” a tia.
Hi ni sûn hin Israel mihaiin Filistia-hai an inhnêa, Mikmas-a irthokin Aijalon dênin Filistia-hai an doia, Israel mihai chu châmsôl irveiin an sôl ok tâka.
Khanchu mipuihai khan an râllâk thilhai kha irchu zelin an irchua, kêlbelra hai, sechal hai, sehrâtte hai an chelhaia, kha zela khan an thathaia, a hme thisen kop pumin an fâka.
Khanchu, “Irngai ro, mipuihai khan, thisen kop puma fâkin
Khanchu Saula ngêtin, “Mipui laia fe unglân, an kuang, ‘Mi tinin mâni sehrât le kêlbelra fa ri se, a thisen kop pumin
Saula khan,

Saula khan, a mihai kuang, “Zâna Filistia-hai zu rûnhai ei ta, zîng khovâr dênin inmokhai ei ti, thatpaihai ving ei ti,” a tia. Khanchu anni khan, “A sa ni ti lam takin tho ro,” an tia. Khannisianlân ochaiin, “Pathian chongpui bak hi rei,” a tia.
Khanchu Saula khan Pathian a chongpuia, “Filistia-hai kha zu doihai ning mo? Nin hnêtirin mo?” a tia. Khannisianlân hi nî hin Pathianin sâm maka.
Khanchu Saula khan, mipui hruaituhai laia, “Hin hong unglân, a vuan hin i thil mo ei itho insual zongsuak ei ti.
Israelhai saninzôk ngaitu
Kha hnung chu Saula khan an kuang, “Nangni chu a bingin om unglân, keima le ki nâipa Jonathana, a bingin om kin ti,” a tia. Mipuihai khan, Saula kuang, “A sa ni ti lam takin tho ro,” an tia.
Khanchu Saula khan
Khanchu Saula khan, “Keima le ki nâipa Jonathana kâra infel ni ri se,” a tia. Khanchu Jonathana chunga khan a chum tâka.

Kha zoiin chu Saula khan Jonathana kuang, “I zât ual mo ni itho, insîr ro,” a tia. Jonathana’n, “Ki khianghrol hmor leh a chînte khuaihlutui ki irtem a ni: hin ki om, thi hrang khom ki irhuam a ni,” a tia.
Saula’n a kuang, “Nang a that noa ni’n chu Pathianin nang a ilo lam takin nang lo ri se, kha nêka intak ual khomin,” a tia.
Khannisian mipuihaiin Saula kuang khan, “Israelhai laia hin saninzôkna roiinpui tak thosuaktu Jonathana chu a ithi hrang ma ni? Ni thei no ni.
Kha zoiin chu Saula’n Filistia mihai a irzûl kha a’rngama, a kîr tâka; Filistia-hai chu an omhmun panin an fe nôk ta.
Saula kha Israelhai chunga rêng a chang hnunga hin, hmun tina a râlhai, Moab-hai, Amon-hai, Edom mihai, Zoba rênghai, Filistia mihai kha a doia. A ithôna tiang ang khan an hnêhai thiaia.
Hâitakin a doihaia, Amalek mihai khom an hnehaia, Israelhai chu a doituhai kut chung ata a isansuakhai a ni.
Saula nâipasalhai chu, Jonathana, Isvia le Malkisua hai an ni. A nâinupang ulian ualnu chu Merabi a nia, nâipang ualnu chu Mikali a ni.
Saula dôngma chu Ahinoami a ni, Ahimaaza nâinu a ni. A sipai ulian tak chu Abnera a ni, Saula pa nâipang Nera nâipa a ni.
Saula pa Kisa le Abnera pa Nera kha Abiela nâipahai an ni.
Saula dam sûng kârka chu Filistia mihai leh a satêrengin an irdoi mai ngaia, khasika khan Saula’n mi hrât le mi hâi a ihmu murdi chu, ama sipai hrangin a ilâklût ngai a ni.
Samuela’n Saula kuang, “
Itinrêng sinthei Pathian khan, Amalek mihaiin Israelhai chunga an thil tho, Aigupta ram ata an hong suak laia an lei idoihai dân kha ki inhriat mai a ni.
Amalek-hai doi hrangin fe’n lân, an thil nei murdi hôi viat loiin thathai ving ro, nupang pasal, nâi irhnu nêk laihai, sechalhai, kêlbelrahai, saringseihai, sakuartunghai; a iti a ni,” a tia.
Khaang khan Saula’n mipuihai kha a bukkhômhaia, Telem khuaa a tephaia, Israel ata irthokin sipai nuai hni le Juda ata sipai sîngkhat an nia.
Khanchu Saula kha a mihai leh Amalek-hai khuaa khan a fea, ivadung kôl phâizôla an irsanga.

Saula’n Ken mihai kuang khan, “Suak unglân, Amalek-hai lai ata hi irthîn roi, khano’nchu nangni ki that irnghil duai khom a ni thei; nangni’n chu Israel irchi murdihai Aigupta rama irthoka an hong suak lai khan lung nin len khamhaia,” a tia. Khanchu Ken mihai kha Amalek mihai rengata an le’rkhâi tâka.
Saula khan Amalek mihai kha Havila irthokin Aigupta nisua dep tianga Sur dênin a doihaia.
Amalek mihai rêng Agaga kha a hringin an chela, mipuihai chu a thathai ta.
Khannisianlân Saula le a mihaiin Agaga kha an inzôka kêlbelra satak takhai le sehrâtchal satakhai le, kêlbelrate a sa murdihai khom that mahaia, a sa ok loi an inpâm loihai chu an thatpai vinga.
“Saula rêng ki lei inchang hi chu ki irsîr a ni; hnung a ni songsana, ki thupêkhai zôm maka,” a tia. Samuela chu a ning an mur pea, zân khovârin
Zînga chu Samuela’n Saula irtongpui hrangin a fea, “Saula chu Karmel khuaa a fea, ama inhriat maina hrang lung a phuna, kha hnung chu Gilgal-a a fe ta,” tiin Samuela kha an hrila.
Samuela chu Saula kuang a fea, Saula khan a kuang, “
Khanchu Samuela’n, “A ni no’n te, sial le kêlbelra inhrâm ki inhriat hi imo a omzia?,” a tia.
Saula khan, “Ki mihaiin Amalek-hai ta an hong ilâk pehai a ni.
Samuela khan Saula kuang, “Dâihrek ro, zânina
Samuela’n, “Nangma insâpin mi chînte angin irbe khomin lân, Israel nam pumpui hruaitu kêng ni ini,
Ama’n nang a tîr suaka, ‘Fe’n lân, Amalek mihai a lei siat tâkhai kha thatpaiin lân, an irhmang zoi mâka chu doihai mai ro,’ nang a tia.
Khan, itho sika
Saula khan Samuela kuang, “
Khannisianlân, ki mihai khan, râllâk thil kêlbelrahai le sehrâtchalhai that irhmangpai ving hrang laia a sahai kha Gilgal khuaa
Samuela’n, “
A chunga sualnahai hi tasân theihai sualna leh hmunkhat a ni, tukulliannahai hi millim biakna leh hmunkhat a ni.
Saula khan, Samuela kuang, “A ni ki lei isual ok tâk a ni.
Khannisianlân atûn hin ki sual ngaidamin lân,
Samuela’n Saula kuang, “Nang fepui viat no ning,
Kha hnung chu Samuela kha fe hrangin a hong irsiamin chu, Saula’n a puan hmor kha a hon pota, a têr pe tâka.
Samuela’n a kuang, “A vuana irthokin
Israelhai roiinpuina Pathian kha irsîr no nia, a lungrîl khom thûl no ni. Ama chu mihriam anga lungrîl irthûl ngai ni ma,” a tia.
Saula khan, “Ki lei isual tâk a ni; khannisian ki mihai le hruaituhai Israel mipuihai kôla hin ni chôiindôm hrangin nang ki ingên a ni.
Khanchu Samuela’n Gilgal-a a fepuia, Saula khan
Khaang khan, Samuela’n, “Amalek mihai rêng Agaga kha keima kuang hong hruai roi,” a tia. Khanchu Agaga kha irlo’nthing puma chiin a va fea, a lungrîlin, “Thina chu ki zôk tâk chu ni a ti,” a tia.
Samuela’n, “Ni khandaiin nu tamtak nâi boiin a isiam angin, ni nu khom nupang laia nâi boia siam ni ta a ti,” a tia. Khanchu Samuela khan, Agaga chu Gilgal khuaa
Kha hnung chu Samuela kha Ramah khuaa a fea, Saula in omna Gibea khua khan a fe tâka.
Khaangin Samuela chu a thi nî dênin Saula chu va’rtongpui nôk ta maka; khannisianlân, Samuela kha Saula sikin beiindong takin a iom tâk a ni.
Samuela khan, “Itin mo ki ife thei hrang? Saula’n a len hriatin chu a ni ithat hrang kêng,” a tia.
Irbôlna khan Jesaia kha koiin lân, ni tho hrang dân nan hril ki ti. Mi ar hming nang ki ihriltak kha rêng hrangin sahriak ni irthutir hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu Samuela’n
Ama khan, “A sa lam tianga chu a ni.
Khan an hong tungin chu, Samuela khan Jesaia nâipa Eliaba a lei ena, a lungrîlin “Hi mi hi
Khannisianlân
Kha hnung chu Jesaia khan a nâipa Abinadaba a koia, Samuela kuang a hong hruaia. Khannisianlân Samuela’n, “Hi khom hi
Khan, Jesaia khan Sama a hong hruai nôka. Samuela khan, “Hi khom hi
Khaang khan Jesaia’n a nâipasal sari Samuela makunga a hong hruaihaia. Samuela khan Jesaia kuang, “
Kha zoiin chu Samuela’n Jesaia kuang khan, “Hi hin ni nâihai chu an om irkip ving mo?” a tia.
Jesaia’n, “A mitum takte chu a la oma, khannisian kêlbelra enkoltu a ni,” a tia.
Khan, Samuela’n, “Va’nkoitirhaiin lân, a hong tung mâka chu irbôlna thil ei inhlan hrang ni ma,” a tia.
Khanchu Jesaia’n a va’nkoitirhaia, a hong hruaia. Ama chu mi mar hmêlsa, a mit meng enhoi a nia,
Khanchu Samuela khan sahriak thunna sial irki kha a lâka, a urênghai mithmua khan Davida chu sahriak a’rthutira. Voikhat zelin
Saula zuituhai khan a kuang, “Irngai ro, Pathianin nang inbuai hrangin ramilhli a zuang itîr a ni.
Khasikin ka pu thu ni pe’n lân, perkhuang suk thei tak zong kin ti. Khanchu ramilhli’n nang a chel rikipa, kha mi khan perkhuang suk a ta, hong dam nôk zôi ni ti,” an tia.
Saula khan a zuituhai kuang khan, “A suk thei tak kha ni zong pe unglân, keima kuang hong hruai roi,” a tia.

A kôla om ruatharte inkhat khan hiang hin a ti pea, “Bethlehem kho mi Jesaia nâipa ki hmu tâka, kha mi kha irhâihoi tum thei tak chu a ni, khakhêla mi hâi le hmêl satak sipai satak le thuhril thei tak a ni, a kuang
Khanchu Saula khan, Jesaia kuang mi a tîra, “Ni nâipa Davida kêlbelra enkola om ngai kha keima kuang hong tîr roh,” ti hrangin mi a tîra.
Jesaia khan sakuartung, bai le uaina kop sipin kêlte a lâka, a nâipa Davida kuta Saula pe hrangin an chôitira.
Davida khan Saula kuang a va tungin chu, a makunga a ngîra, Saula khan a lei kan oka, râltukfam chôitu hrangin a len thanga.
Khanchu Saula khan Jesaia kuang, “Davida hi keima kuang om ri se, ki milung a inchuktir a ni,” itia hril hrangin mi a tîra.
Khaang khan Saula chu ramilhli’n a chel rikipin, Pathian itîr Davida khan perkhuang a lâka a suk pea. Khanchu ramilhli’n a mâk ngaia. Saula chu a hong hara, a hong idam nôk ngai a ni.
Khan Filistia mihai khan irdoi hrangin Judai ram sûng Soko khuaa an sipaihai an bûma; Soko le Azeka kho kâra Efes Damim hmuna khan, omhmun an khuara.
Saula le Israel mihai kha an irbûma, Ela phâia omhmun an khuara.
Filistia mihai kha tâng dunga an oma, Israel mihai kha varâl tianga tâng panga an oma, an kâra phâizôl a oma.
Khan, Filistia-hai omhmuna irthokin an mi hrât, ar hming Goliatha, Gath kho mi, mûk ruk le khâp khata dung sei hi a hong suaka, Israelhai kha a hong saraihaia.
Ama hin thîr dâr lukhum a khuma, dâr suma inluan rôppho an nghâka; a pho rik dân chu her sômringa le her sari vêla rik a ni.
A’rngala khan khom pho a’rbela, a dâra khan dâr ufei a’rvâ saa.
A ufei ngul chu puan rikol anga om a nia, a ufei lu tianga khan thîr her saria rik a ni. A pho chôitu sipai kha a maton tiang a fea.

Goliatha kha a ngîra, Israel sipaihai kha a khêkkhumhaia, an kuang, “I lo hrang sika irdoi hranga nin zuang irtâng mo? keima chu Filistia mi ki nia, nangni chu Saula suak kêng nin nia! Nin laia mi inkhat inthang unglân, ni hong irsualpui ri se.
Ama khan a nin hnêa, a ni thatin chu, nin suak chang kin ti. Khannisianlân, keima’n kin hnêa, ki thatin chu kin suak chang nin ti.
Atûn hin Israel sipaihai chu nangni ki saraiin nangni ki i-ot a ni, mi inkhat hon thang unglân, lei irsual hi ro ung,” a tia.
Khan Saula le Israelhai murdi’n Filistia mi thu’nsîr kha an inhriatin chu irlo’nthingin an chi tâka.
Khan, Davida chu Jesaia nâipa a nia, Judai ram Bethlehem-a Efrata mi a nia, Jesaia’n nâipasal kiriat a neia; ama chu Saula inlal lai khan a lei tar ok tâka.
Jesaia nâi ulianhai inthum khan irdoina hmuna Saula kha an zuia. A nâipasalhai irdoina fehai irhming chu, a ulian tak Eliaba, inhnina Abinadaba, inthumna Sama hai an ni.
Khan Davida chu a mitum tak a nia, khan a urêng inthumhai kha Saula kuang an om laiin,
Davida chu Saula kuang ata Bethlehem-a a pa kêlbelra enkolin a va fe ngaia.
Goliatha’n zîng le khohloi rikipa hin sûn sômminli sûng Israelhai kha a sarai mai ngaia.
Sûn khat chu Jesaia khan a nâipa Davida kuang khan, “Bu inzêi her sôm le bai tiam sôm hi chôiin lân, ni urênghai kuang an riakbuka va fepui zel ro.
Khan dût thâi inkang hlûm sôm hi an laia mi hruaitu kha chôi pe’n lân, ni urênghai itin mo an om hong irdonin lân, an thurchi hon hre’nfel roh.
Reng Saula le ni urênghai le Israel mi murdihai kha Filistia mihai doiin Ela phâizôla an iom a ni,” a tia.

Davida chu zînga âr khuangin a thoia, kêlbelrahai kha mi dang a len enkoltirhaia, Jesaia iti pe lam angin fâk zâthai kha a chôia, a fe tâka. Israel sipaihai kha irdoina hmuna fe hrangin an irthok lai takin le an lei khêk sup lai takin, an riakbuk kha a va tunga.
Khan Israelhai le Filistiahai chu irdoi hrangin an le’rtâng tâka, sipai le sipai hmâi irsongin an lei oma.
Davida khan fâk zât a ichôi kha fâk nêk enkoltu kuang khan a pêka, sipaihai tiang khan a van tâna, a uhai kha chubai a va mûkhaia.
Khan an chong lai takin Goliatha kha Filistia mihai sipai pâl lai ata kha a hong suaka, matona a itho ngai ang dênin Israelhai kha a saraihaia. Kha kha Davida’n an hriata.
Israel mi murdihai khan kha mi kha an hong hmu’n chu chipumin lâizâm an thoa.

Israel mihai khan, “Kha mihriam hong suak kha nin hmu mo? Israel mihai sarai hrang ngêta hong suak a ni. Tukhomin kha mi kha a that theitu chu rêngin lômman satakin satvur a ta, a nâinu kha dôngma’n inneitir a ta, khanchu a pa insûngkua kha Israelhai laia hin khâzana khom chôi ni no ni,” an tia.

Khanchu Davida khan a kôla ngîrhai kha ar donhaia, “Hi Filistia mi hi that theia, Israelhai irhming siatna inboitirtu kha imo an ipêk hrang? Hi sertan loi Filistia mi hi tu ngân mo a ini, Pathian hring sipaihai a isarai ngân hi?,” a tia.
Mipuihaiin, “A thatpu tak chu kin iti angin itinrêng tho pe ni a ti,” an tia.

Khan a uliantak Eliaba kha Davida chunga khan a ning an mur pe thuta, a kuang, “Hi hin imo ni zuang izong? Ramkâra ni kêlbelra omhai, tu mo ni zuang inenkoltir ngân? Ni lârirpâk lam le ni lungrîl saloi lam hi kin hriat. Irdoi en hrang ringota ni izuang papai a ni,” a tia.
Davida khan, “I ngân mo ki tho? Chongbâi khat lua mo ki irdon thei loi hrang,” a tia.
Mi danghai tiang a’rheia, kha ngêt kha a’rdonhaia; mipuihai khan matona an iti ang ngêt khan an tia.
Mi senkhatin Davida thu’nsîr kha an inhriatin chu, Saula kuang an insîr pe nôka, ama khan a koia,
Khan Davida’n Saula kuang, “Ama Filistian mi sika son tukhom chi no ri sehai, kei va fe ki ta, va doi ki ti,” a tia.
Saula’n Davida kuang, “Nangma’n chu Filistia mihai so la doi thei no chi ni, ni la nâiinpang hraia. Ama kha chu a thoibop ata irdoi mi a lei nia,” a tia.
Davida khan Saula kuang khan, “Ni suak hin ka pa kêlbelra ki enkol ngaia; kâmkeibaknei hai, savom hai an honga kêlbelra laia kêltehai an that tumhai hin,
ki’rzûlhaia, ki’rsualpuihaia, kêltehai kha an bâi sûng ata ki isansuakhai ngai a ni. Kâmkeibaknei le savomhai hin ni sê hrangin an honga an bak mula ki chelhaia ki ithathai ngai a ni.
Kâmkeibaknei le savom ki thathai suam thei ngaia, kha sertan loi Filistia mi, Pathian hring sipaihai hong saraitu kha lo pol chit ki ti.
Kâmkeibaknei le savomhai kut pâr ata ni sansuaktu
Khanchu Saula khan Davida kuang khan, “A sa fe ngânin lân,
Saula khan Davida kha a râltukfam ar beltira, dâr lukhum an khumtira, rôppho a’rbeltira.

Davida khan a râltukfam chunga khan Saula khandai kha a vonga; ama khan a la’rvo ngai no sikin, chângpui thei ta maka, khanchu Davida’n Saula kuang khan, “Hiang hin chu irsualpui thei no ning, hiang hin ki la tho ngai no sikin,” a tia. Khanchu Davida kha ar khek nôk vinga.
A kêlbelra hôlna khianghrol kha a chôia, ivadunga lung irhlûm nâmtak chêng ving ringa a hrûta, a hmarsa sûnga khan a thuna, a sâilung dêng kha a chôia, Goliatha kha a va pan tâka.
Filistia mi kha a hong irthoka, Davida kha a hong pana; a pho chôitu kha a matona a fea.
Filistia mipa khan a hei ena, Davida kha a va hmu infelin chu a hmusit oka, Davida chu takmar pama om, mit meng enhoi, a thoibop a nia.
Khanchu Filistia mi khan Davida kuang khan, “Ui mo ni ni isôn, khianghrol leh ni ni hong ipan kha?,” a tia. Khanchu Filistia mi khan a pathian insamin Davida kha khua a sâla.
Davida kuang khan, “Hong ro, tho ni hmehai kha chung tianga vuang, vâhai le ramsahai lei pehai hi rong,” a tia.
Davida khan, “Nangma’n chu khandaihai, ufeihai chôiin ni hor thoka; khannisian keima chu itinrêng sin thei Israel sipaihai Pathian ni ihmusit irhmingin ki hong irthok a ni.
A vuan hin
Khanchu hitaka ar bûmhai murdi’n
Goliatha kha a hor thoka, Davida doi hrangin a hong nâi tîr tîrin chu, Davida kha Filistia mihai irtongna tiang Goliatha doi hrangin inrang takin an tâna,

Davida khan a hmarsa a zu’npûra, lung sâihlûm a lâka, a sâilungdêng leh khan Goliatha kha a hong dênga. A chaldôr taka a hong dêng pea, a michala khan lungsâihlûm kha a lûta, Goliatha chu a khupin an rîl tâka.
Khanchu Davida’n khandai chôi loiin Goliatha kha sâilungdêng le saihlûmin a thatpai ta.
Kha hnung chu Davida kha an tâna, Goliatha khandai kha a phôia, a lu a tan pea, a that tâka. Filistia mihaiin an rêngpa kha a thi ti an inhriatin chu lâizâm an thoa.
Israel mi le Juda mihai kha an thoia, huaizâm an thoa, Filistia mihai chu Gath dênin le Ekron kul dênin an irzûlhai ta. Filistia mi popliamhai kha Saraim lam tuanin Gath le Ekron dênin an dalh phôta.
Israel mihaiin Filistia mihai irzûl an hong kîr nôka, an riakbuk an inmok pehai chita.
Davida khan Goliatha lu kha a lâka, Jerusalema a chôia, khannisian Goliatha râltukfamhai chu a puan ina a siaa.
Saula khan Goliatha doi hranga Davida fe kha a hmu’n chu a sipai hruaitu Abnera kuang khan, “Abnera hi nâipangte hi tu nâi mo a ini?,” a tia. Abnera’n, “O rêngpa, ki inhriat viat loi kêng,” a tia.
Saula khan, “Khanchu fe’n lân, hi nâipang hi tu nâi mo a inih irdon infel ro,” a tia.
Khanchu Davida khan Goliatha a that zoia, a hong kîr nôk tiang khan Abnera’n Saula kuang a hruaia, Davida khan Goliatha lu kha a la chôi maia.
Khan, Saula khan a kuang, “Ruatharte tu nâi mo ni ini?,” a tia.
Davida khan, “Bethlehem mi, ni suak Jesaia nâipa ki ni,” a tia.
Saula le Davida chongna a hek tâka, kha zoiin chu Saula nâipa Jonathana khan Davida kha a’rngaiinnat ual tâka. Khanchu ama hringna lung a inkham angin Davida kha lung an kham tâka.
Saula khan hi nî ata hi Davida chu ama kuang an omtir zôi tâka. A pa ina fe khom phal pe ta maka.
Khaang khan Jonathana’n ama hringna lung a inkham angin Davida kha lung a thung sikin rual irchangna thuthung an neia.
Khanchu Jonathana khan a songkolirfual a innghâk lai kha a kheka, Davida a pêka, a râltukfam le a khandai le a kongkhithai khom a pêka.
Saula’n a itîrna hmun tina Davida chu a fea, hlo a chuk maia; khanchu Saula khan a sipai hruaitu ni hrangin a siama, ama kha Saula mi lianhai le mi murdi irngai dâna khom a sa an iti ok a ni.

Davida kha Goliatha a that zoia a hong kîr nôka, a sipaihai leh insûng tiang an honga khan, Israel nupang kho tina hla sakhaiin lâm pumin khuangte le têngrephai sukin râifân takin rêng Saula irhmupui hrangin an hong suaka.
Khanchu nupanghai khan lâm pumin hla an irkhena; “Saula’n a sâng a sângin a thata, Davida’n chu a sîng a sîngin a thata,” an tia.

Saula’n kha kha irngai nuam maka, a ning an mur pea. Ama khan, “Davida chu a sîng a sîng a thatin an bêa, keima chu a sâng a sâng vai thatin an ni bêa. Inhnunga chu ama hi kêng rêngin an la isiam ngêt hrang a nih hi te,” a tia.
Khanchu Saula khan kha nia irthokin Davida kha mitsunin a nei tâka.

Khan, zîng nôka chu Saula chunga khan Pathian itîr ramilhli a hong tunga, insûnga khan invêt angin a chiar suat suat ngaia. Davida khan sûn danga a itho ngai ang dênin perkhuang a suka; Saula khan ufei a’rlên chiana.
Saula khan a lungrîlin, “So banga son Davida len kho irmantir rak rong,” a tia. Khanchu Davida kha voihni zel a len khoa, khannisian an kho rikipa khan Davida kha a le’rthîn pe hena.
Davida kuang khan
Khanchu Saula khan a kuang ata Davida kha a thonpaia, a sipai sângkhathai chunga hruaitu ni hrangin a siama. Khan, Davida chu sipai hruaiin a lûtin a suaka.
A sinthôna hmun tina hlo a chuk maia.
Saula khan Davida hlochuk lam kha a hmu’n chu, a chi ual tâka.
Khannisianlân, Israelhai le Judahai murdi khan Davida chu an irngaiirsâng ual tâka, hruaitu hlochuk tak a ni sikin.
Kha hnung chu Saula khan Davida kuang, “Irngai ro, ki nâinu ulian ual Merabi hi dôngma’n nang inluatir ki ti, sipai hâitak le iamom takin ni thop khakin lân;
Davida khan Saula kuang, “Tu ngân mo ki nia, Israelhai laia ka pa insûngkua khom kha imo a nia, rêng mâkpa ki nina hrang hi?,” a tia.
Khannisian Saula nâinu Merabi kha Davida innei zoro a hong ni’n chu Meholat mi Adriela dôngma hrangin a pêk tâka.
Khannisianlân, Saula nâinu Mikali khan Davida kha lung a thunga; Saula khan an hriatin chu a lôm oka.

Saula khan a lungrîlin, “A khitna hranga châng a ni theina hrangin le, Filistia mihaiin a chunga kut an thâk theina hrangin, Mikali hi chu Davida inluatir hi rong,” a tia. Khanchu Saula khan voihnina khan Davida kuang, “A vuan hin ki mâkpa ni ichang hrang a ni,” a tia.

Kha hnung chu Saula khan a mi lianhai kha dâihrekin Davida kha chongpuia, a kuang, “Reng chu ni chunga hin a lôm oka, a mi lianhai murdi khomin nang an irngaisânga; atûn hin rêng mâkpa ni ta hrangin a isa a ni,” ti hrangin thu a pêka.
Khanchu kha thu kha Davida mikuar inhriata khan an insîra. Khanchu Davida khan, “Mi inriang le tûte inhre loi keima anga hin rêng mâkpa ni hrang hi an dôk nin isôn ma ni?,” a tia.
Saula mi lianhai khan, Davida chonghai kha an insîr pea.

Khanchu Saula khan anni kha Davida kuang, “Reng khan a râlhai phuba lâkna’n Filistia mihai an servun irzakhat ti no chu a man ite la no ni,” va ti hrangin thu a pêka. (Khaang khan Saula khan Davida chu Filistia mihai kuta that hranga a insâp a ni.)
Saula mi lianhai khan, kha thu kha Davida an hong hrilin chu, rêng mâkpa a hong ini hrang kha Davida hin a lôm oka. Irnei hrang nî sûn an ikhit kha a hong phâk mân khan,

Davida le a mihai kha an fesuaka, Filistia mihai irzahni an va thathaia. Khanchu, Davida khan an servun a hong chôia, khanchu rêng mâkpa a ni theina hrangin rêng kha irkip takin a pêka. Khanchu Saula khan, a nâinu Mikali chu dôngma’n anneitir tâka.
Saula khan Davida kuang khan Pathian a om ti an hriat infel tâka; kha bana a nâinu Mikali khan Davida chu lung a thung tak tak iti an hriata.
Khanchu Saula khan Davida chu a chi ual tâka, khanchu Saula chu a dam sûng kârka chu Davida râl a ni tâka.

Khaang khan Filistia sipaihai kha hong irthok suakin, an hong doihai ngaia. Khannisianlân, an irdoi rikipa Davida chu Saula mi lian danghai murdi nêkin hlo a chuk ual ngaia. Khasika khan Davida irhming chu a hong inthang tâka.
Saula khan a nâipa Jonathana le a mi lianhai murdi’n Davida that hrangin hê a bêa, khannisian Jonathana khan Davida kha arngaiinnat tak taka.
Khanchu Jonathana khan Davida kuang, “Ka pa Saula hin nang that a inuam a ni; khasikin nangtûk zîng chu irdîn ro, hmun irthupa irbi chian roh.
Khan fe ki ta, ni irbîkna rama ka pa makunga va ngîr ki ta, ni chungchâng thua ka pa chongpui ki ta; i mani ki inhriat a omin chu nan hril ki ti,” a tia.

Jonathana khan a pa Saula makunga Davida chu an pâka, a kuang, “Reng khan a suak Davida chunga hin thil sual tho viat no ri se. Ni chunga ite tho’nsualna nei maka, kha nêkin a sinthohai kha ni ta hrangin a sa inzen a ni ual.
Thi khom chi loiin Goliatha kha a doia, khan
Khaang khan Saula khan Jonathana thu insîr kha a poma, Saula khan chong ar khâma, “
Khanchu Jonathana khan Davida kha a koia, kha thuhai kha an sîr pehaia. Kha hnung chu Jonathana khan Davida chu Saula kuang a hruaia, matona ang ngêt khan rêng sin kha a tho nôk tâka.
Khan, Filistia mihai leh irdoina a hong om nôka, khanchu Davida kha a’rthok suaka, Filistia mihai chu a va doia, a thathaia, khanchu lâizâm an tho tâka.
Sûn khat chu Saula khan a ina ufei chôi chiana a om laiin
Saula khan a ufei leh khan Davida kha banga inkho de khap a tuma; khannisianlân Davida kha a lei irhei lata, ufei kha banga a chum rak tâka. Davida kha an tâna, kha zâna khan a zôk ta.
Kha zân ngêta khan Saula khan Davida in tiang zînga len ruanga, that hrangin mi a tîra. Davida dôngma Mikali khan, “A vuan zân hin ni rot no’n chu, nangtûk nang an ithat hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu Mikali khan Davida kha tukvera an suma; khanchu Davida chu a rot tâka.
Kha hnung chu Mikali khan millim kha a lâka, zâlhmuna khan an zâla, khanchu a lu tiang khan kêl mul a siaa, puan leh ar khûa.
Davida hruai hranga Saula’n mi a hong itîrhai kuang, Mikali khan, “Dam maka,” a lei tia.
Khannisianlân Saula khan Davida kha anni ngêtin va en hrangin a hong tîrhai nôka, an kuang khan, “A zâlhmun pumin, hin hong irzôn unglân, keima’n lei that ki ti,” a tia.
A mi tîrhai kha an va tungin chu zâlhmuna khan millim kha a lu tianga kêl mul lukham khampumin an va hmua.
Saula khan Mikali kuang, “Ithoa mo hianga ni ni ihuang, ki râl ni inzôk hi?” a tia. Mikali khan Saula kha a koia, “A zôkna hrang ki san no’n chu ni that kêng a itum,” a tia.
Khan Davida kha a rota a zôk tâka. Ramah khuaa Samuela kuang a fea, a chunga Saula thil tho murdi a hrila. Kha hnung chu ama le Samuela kha an fea. Naioth khan an om tâka.
Davida chu Ramah khuaa Naioth-ah khan a om ti Saula kha an hrila.

Khanchu Davida hruai hrangin Saula khan mi a tîrhaia. Anni khan deipu pâlhai lâm puma thu’nsîr sup sup lai le Samuela chu an chunga hruaitu a nih ti kha an va hmua. Khanchu Saula mi tîrhai chunga khan Pathian irtha a zuang tunga, anni khom khan lâm puma thu’nsîrin an om tâka.
Kha thu kha Saula’n a len hriatin chu, mi dang a tîrhai nôka, anni khom khan lâm pumin thu an van sîr sup supa. Saula khan voithumna khan mi a tîr nôka, anni khom khan lâm pumin thu an van sîra.
Kha hnung chu ama khom kha Ramah khuaa khan a va fe sa tâka. Seku hmuna tuikuang irzatak kha a va tunga, Samuela le Davida hi kho tiang mo an iom, a tia.
Ramah khuaa Naioth-ah a fe laia khan Pathian irtha a chunga khan a zuang tung sa tâka, lampui tuana khan Ramah khuaa Naioth tung dênin lâm pumin thu an sîr buan buana.

Khanchu ama khomin a silkaihai a’rkheka, Samuela makunga khan a lâma, thu an sîr sa tâka. Kha nî sûn intuanin le kha zân intuanin korongin a zâl tâka. (Khasika khan, “Saula khom kha deipu a ini sa tâk ma ni?,” iti hi an isôn tâk a ni.)
Kha hnung chu Davida kha Ramah khuaa Naioth rengata kha a rota, Jonathana kuang a fea, “I ngân mo ki itho? Imo ki itho inchâi? Ni pa chunga hin imo ki tho’nsualna, hianga ni that a itum hi?,” a tia.
Jonathana khan, “Nang that no nia, thi viat no chi ni, ka pa khan ite nin hril loiin lian ri se, chîn ri seh khom tho ngai ma. Itho sikin mo hi thu hi keima kuang a iip hrang, ip viat no ni,” a tia.

Khannisian Davida khan, “Ni pa khan lung ni ni inkham dân hi an hriat infel vinga, khasikin Jonathana khan hi thu hi chu inhre ual no ri se. khano’nchu, a lungrîl a na pe hrai itinin, a iti khom a ni thei. Khasikin
Kha hnung chu Jonathana khan, “Ni inuamtak nang tho pe mai ki ti,” a tia.

Khanchu Davida khan, Jonathana kuang, “Nangtûk hi tha thar kût nî sûn a nia, rêng kuang khalâi irhîl ngêt hrang ki nia. Khannisian, a sa ni ti’n chu nangtûk pên khohloi dên thaiin rama irbi hrangin fe ki ti.
Ni pa hin ki omna hi a hon hriat suak duaia ni’n chu, Davida khan a khua Bethlehem-a va fe vak a ni ngêna; a in sûngkuahai hrangin an kum tina irbôl zoro a nia, lei ti’n lân.
Khan, ‘A sa a ti’n chu,’ ki izôk ni a ta, khannisian a ning an murin chu thil saloi tho a itum a nih ti zel ro.

Irngaihoi takin lung nin khamin lân, keima kuang ni thuthung siam kha vong mai ro. Khannisianlân, pualoina nei ki nia ni’n chu nangin ni that zel ro. Itho hrangin mo ni pa kuanga ni fepui ngêt a inang?,” a tia.
Jonathana khan, “Khaanga thil kha ngaitua viat no ro. Ni chunga thil saloi tho, ka pa’n a tum iti kin hriat ngânin chu nang ki inhril loi hrang mo?,” a tia.
Kha hnung chu Davida khan Jonathana kuang, “Ni pa khan henhrum takin nang lei don ta sianlân, tu’n mo nin hril ta hrang?,” a tia.
Jonathana khan Davida kuang, “Thoiin lân, rama va fe ro,” a tia. Khanchu rama khan hmunkhatin an fea.
Jonathana khan Davida kuang, “
Khanchu ka pa khan ni chunga thil saloi tho a tuma nang ki hong hril noa, ni zôkna hrang lampui nang ki zong pe no’n chu
Ki hring sûng chu, ni thuthung irthiang vong ngitin lân, ki chunga iamomin om ro; khannisian ki thi duai tâka a ni khomin,
Kumtuangin ki in sûngkuahai kha lungkhamhai mai ro.
ei ruaia thuthung hi khiakin om no ri se, a kiakin a omin chu
A thar vangin Jonathana khan ama lungthungna sikin Davida kuang chong ar khâm nôka, ama hringna lung a ithung ang takin Davida kha lung a ithung a ni.
Kha hnung chu Jonathana khan a kuang, “Nangtûk hi chîmu thar kût a nia; ni toina a rong hrang sikin ni omna hmun inlang ngêt hrang a nia.
Nangtûk pên a inlang ual hrang a ni; khasikin matona nir bîkna ngai hmun ngêta khan fe zelin lân; lung buk irhlia khan irbi chian ro.
Ki iti tâk ang khan a kôla ki thal inthum hong kâp ki ta,
kha hnung chu ki hnungzuihai laia, fe’n lân, thalhai kha va zong ro, tiin tîr ki ta. A ni zuitu kuang khan, ‘En ro, thalhai kha ni sîr tiang khan a oma, lan lân, hong ro,’ ki ti’n chu
Khannisianlân a ni zuitu kuang khan, en ro, thalhai chu nangma khêl tiang son an om, ki ti’n chu rotpat ro,
eini ruai kâra thu ei ithung chungchânga chu
Khanchu Davida kha rama khan ar bîk tâka. Tha thar kût nî sûn khan, rêng Saula kha khalâi irhîl hrangin a honga;
sûn danga a toina ngai bang kôla khan a toia. Jonathana kha Saula irdîna maton taka khan a toia, Abnera kha Saula kôla a toia. Davida hmun kha chu a ronga.
Nikhomsianlân, Saula khan kha ni khan chu ite ti maka, a lungrîlin, “A chunga thil i mani a tunga, a irthiang loi ni ngêt a ti,” a tia.

Khan, zîng nôk nî tha thar kût nia khan Davida hmun kha a la rong maia; khanchu Saula khan a nâipa Jonathana kuang khan, “Itho mo Davida hi mizân le a vuan hin khalâi irhîl hrangin a ihong loi hi?,” a tia.
Jonathana’n Saula kha, “Davida’n Bethlehem-a fe a ni ngên ngota.

Irngaihoi takin nin fetir ro, kin insûng mihai khom kin khuaa irbôlna an nei hrang sikin, ki urênghaiin om sa hrangin an ni hong ngêna, khasikin lung ni nin kham theiin chu nin fetirin lân, ki urênghai la va hmuhai rong,” a tia. Khasikin kha zoro taka khan a iom loi a ni, a tia.
Kha hnung chu Jonathana chunga Saula ning an mur pe tâka, a kuang, “Invêtpa! atûn hin Jesaia nâipa Davida kha ni mualinphoina hrang le ni nu mualphoi irlatir hrangin ni ithop a nih ti kin hriat.
Davida hi, hi irnêng chunga a om kârka chu hi rama hin rêng chang no chi nih ti ni inhriat loi ma ni? Atûn hin fe’n lân, va hruai ro, a ithi ngêt hrang a ni,” a tia.
Jonathana’n a pa Saula kha hiang hin a tia, “Itho sikin mo an ithat hrang? I sin mo a insiat?,” a tia.
Kha tena chu Saula khan that tumin Jonathana kha ufei leh an khoa; khasika khan Jonathana khan a pa’n Davida kha that a lei itum mai a nih ti an hriat tâka.
Kha hnung chu Jonathana kha khalâi dokâng ata kha ningmur irlâkin a thoia, kha nia tha thar kût sûn hnina khan ite fa ta maka. A pa Saula khan Davida mualphoi a sak tâk sikin ar ngai a siatpui oka.
Zîng nôka chu Jonathana kha nâipangte hruaiin ram tiang Davida leh an hmun indangna khan a fe tâka.
A nâipang hruai kuang khan, “Intânin lân, ki thal kâphai so va zong ro,” a tia. Nâipang kha an tân lai khan, a kôla khan thal a va kâpa.
Nâipang khan Jonathana thal kâp tâkna hmun a va tungin chu, Jonathana’n nâipang kuang khan, “Thal kha ni pên tianga khan kêng a om.
Kha khan ngîr chian no ro; irhnotin lân, ir-ial no ro,” a va tia. Nâipang khan thal kha a hrûta, a pu kuang a hong chôia.
Khannisianlân, nâipang khan ite inhre maka, Jonathana leh Davida vai khan thil omzia kha an inhriata.
Jonathana khan kha nâipang kha a hriamhreihai a pêka, a kuang, “Fe’n lân, kho sûng hong chai ro,” a tia.

Khanchu nâipang kha a fe zoiin chu, Davida kha a omna hmun lung buk ilhlî ata kha a hong thoia, khûksadelin, a hmâi irnêng sikin voithum an boka, Jonathana leh an ruaiin an irphâma, an chapa. Khanchu Davida kha Jonathana nêkin a lungrîl a na pe uala.
Kha hnung chu Jonathana khan Davida kuang, “Irtharngam takin fe’n lân,

Khan, Davida kha Nob khuaa ochai Ahimeleka kuang khan a fea, Ahimeleka khan irlo’nthing pumin Davida kha a’rtongpuia, a kuang, “Ithoa mo ni bing vaiin te ni hong tâka, chanpui khom hong nei mak chea,” a tia.

Davida khan ochai Ahimeleka kuang khan, “Rengin sintho hrangin thu a ni pêka, ki itho hrang chu tûte inhre loi hrangin hê a ni bêa. Ki ruathartehai chu hmun ki indang pena khan ni’rtongpui hrangin ki iti pehai a ni.
Atûn hin imo ni kuta fâk zât ni inei, bai tiam ringa ni pe’n lân, a ninole ni inei tak,” a tia.
Ochai khan, “Bai papai chu nei ma ung, bai irthiang vai kêng ki inei; ni ruathartehai kha nupang chunga an irthiangin chu fa thei ni ti,” a tia.

Davida khan ochai kha hiang hin a sâma, “Nupang chunga chu a’rthiang inzen kin ni. Sintum narân sin hranga kin fe luaa khan ruathartehai kha an irvong irthiang maiin an om ngai, a vuana sintum roiinpui tho hrang le vâng hin chu an irvong irthiang nôk ual a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu, ochai khan Davida kha bai irthiang kha a pêka; a san chu dokâng irthianga irthoka a ilâk tâk Pathian kuanga inhlan sai ti no chu bai dang ite a inei ta loi a ni.
(Kha ni khan Saula kêlbelra entu ulian tak Doega, Edom mi kha
Davida khan Ahimeleka kuang khan, “Ufei mani, khandai mani, ite mo nei mak che? Reng sintho kha irhnot a nang hrai sikin ki khandai leh ki hriamhrei ite ki hong ichôi irman loi a ni,” a tia.

Ahimeleka khan, “Filistia mi Goliatha, Ela phâizôla ni thata khandai kha chu a om; ochai songkol irfual khêla, puan irtuamin a om. Ni nuamin chu la ro, kha ti no kha chu a dang om ma,” a tia. Davida khan, “Kha ti no kha imo a la nanga, ni pe ro,” a tia.
Khanchu Davida kha a thoia, kha nî khan Saula chiin laizâm a thoa, Gath-a rêng Akisa kuang a fe tâka.

Akisa mi lianhai khan Akisa kuang, “Hi mi hi an rama rêng Davida kha mo ni ma? Saula’n a sâng a sângin a thata, Davida’n a sîng a sîngin tia lâm puma a chungchâng thu nupanghaiin hla an isak dur dur kha ni ma mo?,” an tia.
Davida khan kha thuhai kha a lungrîla a vong maia, Gath ata Akisa kha a chi tâka.
Khanchu kha mihai makunga khan a om dân an danglamtira, an mithmua khan invêt orhto a thoa, khopui kotbâihai kha an kêlterhaia; a hnerkamulhai khan khasuai a kâi dêng duanga.
Khanchu Akisa khan a mi lianhai kuang, “En hi roi ni invêt a nih ti nin inhriat maia, ithoa mo keima kuang nin hong ihruai hi?
Invêt ki irsam sika mo, an vêtzia inlangtir hranga ki makunga nin hong ihruai? Hi mi hi mo ki insûnga hong lût hrang?,” a tia.
Davida kha Gath khua ata a rota, Adulam kho kôla rôla khan a fe tâka. A urêng le a pa insûng mihaiin kha hmuna khan a om ti an len hriatin chu a kuang an zu fea.
Mi ihnuaisiahai, lâkai intânghai, milunghoi loihai laia khan an irbukkhôma, mi irzaminli vêl an nia, hruaituin a oma.
Davida chu khatak ata kha Moab rama Mizpa-a a fea; Moab rêng kuang khan, “Pathianin thil a ni itho pe hrang kin hriat mâka chu ka nu le ka pahai hi ni kuang lei om ri sehai duah,” a tia.
Khanchu Davida khan a nu le a pahai kha Moab rêng kuang khan a mâkhaia, khanchu Davida kha rôla khan ar bîk sûng chu an lei om tâka.
Kha hnung chu deipu Gada kha Davida kuang a honga a kuang, “Rôla hin om chian mai ta no ro; suakin lân Judai rama fe zel ro,” a tia. Khanchu Davida kha a suaka, Hereth ramkâra khan a fe tâka.
Sûn khat chu Saula kha Gibea tânga Tamarik thing hnuaia ufei chôiin a toia, a kôlvêla khan a mi lianhai kha an ngîra, Davida le a kuanga omhai kha an hmu tâk ti Saula kha an hrila.
Saula khan a mi lianhai kuang khan, “Nangni Benjamina mihaio, irngai roi; Davida hin loi le grep irhuanhai nangni a pêka, a sipai sâng hruaituhai, irza hruaituhaiin nangni a isiam ving hrang ma ni?

Khasika nin ichinrûk mo a ini? Ki nâipa’n Jesaia nâipa kuanga thu a ithung, keima kuanga inlang zel om mak chêia, lunghnâng nir lâkpui zel om mak chêia, ki nâipa’n keima mihriam Davida hi ni doi hrang le a vuan sûnhaia ni that hranga râlruang ni chuan hranga an thortu hi ki kuanga inlang om mak chêi,” a tia.
Saula mi lianhai kôla ngîr Edom mi Doega khan hiang hin a sâma, “Davida chu Nod khuaa Ahituba nâipa Ahimeleka kuanga hong ki hmua.
Ahimeleka khan
Khanchu rêng Saula khan, Ahimeleka le a urênghai, Nod khuaa ochai om murdi a koihai vinga, a kuang an honga,
Saula khan Ahimeleka kuang, “Ahimeleka irngai ro,” a tia. Khanchu ama khan, “I ma nih ka pu,” a tia.
Saula khan a kuang, “Itho sika mo nangma le Davida hin nin ni ithup? Itho sika mo bai le khandai ni pêka, ama hrangin
Ahimeleka hin rêng kha a sâma, “Davida chu mi lian murdihai laia mi iamom tak a ni. Ama kha ni mâkpa a nia, nang a hrungtuhai laia a lian tak, ni rêng ina khom mi mahripom tak a ni.

A dik, a ta hrangin Pathian ki chongpui pea, khan voikhatna chu ni maka. Nang an ithupinrûk chungchâng thu chu rêng kha keima mo ki ni, ka pa in sûngkuahai mo an ni, ite nin tum no ri se. Hi thua hin chu ite ki inhriat loi a ni,” a tia.
Reng khan, “Ahimeleka, nangma le ni pa insûng mihai hi nin ithi ngêt hrang a ni,” a tia.
Kha hnung chu rêng khan a kôla ngîr sipaihai kuang khan, “Fe unglân,

Khanchu Saula khan Doega kuang khan, “Nangma’n ochaihai hi thathai ro,” a tia. Khanchu Edom mi Doega khan an rêngin a thathaia. Kha nî khan puan irphân ochai songkol innghâk mi sômriat ringa a ithathai a ni.
Kha bana Saula khan Nob ochai khua kha khandai leh a rûna; nupang pasal nâipang le irhnu nêk lai dênin, sehrâthai, sakuartunghai, kêlbelrahai a rêngin a thatpai vinga.
Khannisianlân Ahimeleka nâipa laia inkhat a’rhming Abiathara kha a zôka, Davida kuang an tân pata.
Abiathara khan Saula’n
