Davida khan Abiathara kuang, “Edom mi Doega kha, kha nî khan khataka om ki hmu ata kha Saula inhril ngêt a tih iti ki inhriat sai a ni. Khasikin ni pa insûng mihai murdi chu keima sika thi ni an ti.
Nang chu keima kuang omin lân, chi no ro. Saula khan, nangma le keima ei ruaiin ni that a itum a ni, khannisianlân keima kuang ni omin chu zôk ni ti,” a tia.
Davida’n Keila khua chu Filistia mihaiin an doia, hruizôla buhai khom an lâk pehai ving ti thu a len hriata.
Khanchu Davida khan
“A sa, Filistia-hai khu zu doiin lân, Keila khua chu zu’nzôk ro,” a tia.
Khannisianlân Davida mihaiin Davida kuang, “Irngai ro, Judai rama om khom hin ei ichi a nia, Keila khua zu fea, Filistia mihai zu doi hrang chu ichi teh a om bâka!” an tia.
Khanchu Davida khan
Khanchu Davida le a mihai chu Keila khuaa an zu fea, Filistia mihai kha an zu doia, mi tamtak an thathaia, an ramhai an lâk pehaia. Khaang khan Davida’n Keila khuaa mihai kha a inzôk a ni.
Ahimeleka nâipa Abiathara a zôka, Keila khuaa Davida kuang lâizâm a tho laia khan ochai songkol irfual chôia fe a ni.
Keila khuaa Davida a fe ti Saula an hrila; Saula khan, “Pathianin ki kuta a ni ipêk a ni ta, Davida chu kulpui le dâimikot kalna khuaa lûtin ar khum sikin,” a tia.
Khanchu Saula khan râl kâptuhai kha irdoi hrangin Keila khua zu doia, Davida le a mihai zu hual hrangin a bukhaia.
Davida chu Saula’n a chunga thil saloi tho hrang a tum ti a len hriatin chu, ochai Abiathara kuang khan, “Ochai songkol kha hin hong chôi ro,” a tia.
Khanchu Davida khan, “O
Keila kho mihai hin Saula kuta ni pe nihai mo? Ni suak hin ki lei inhriat lam ang hin Saula khi zuang ni mo? O
Davida khan, “Keila kho mihai khan keima le ki mihai hi Saula kuta ni pe nihai mo?,” a tia.

Khanchu Davida le a mihai irzarukhai kha an thoia, Keila khua ata kha an suaka, fena hrang inchumna tiang an fea, Davida kha Keila khua ata a rot tah ti Saula’n an hriatin chu a thiltum kha a’rlêktira.
Davida chu Zif ramchâr kôla tâng rama irbîkin a om chiana. Saula khan a zong maia, khannisianlân a mi Davida chu a kuta pe maka.
Davida khan ama that hrangin Saula a hor thok ti an hriata. Davida chu Zif ramchâr kôla Hores-a khan a oma.
Saula nâipa Jonathana kha a thoia, ramkâra Davida omna khan a fea, Pathianin nan zôk mai a tih ti lungngam a va saka.
A kuang, “Chi viat no ro, ka pa Saula kutin nan siat thei viat no ni. Israelhai rêngin nangma om ni ta, keima ni thuai zela om ki ti, ti khom hi ka pa Saula hin a inhriat chian a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu an ruaiin
Zif ata mi senkhathai kha Gibea khuaa Saula kuang an fea, “Davida chu kin rama Hores-a Judai ramchâr sim tiang pang Hakila tânga khin ar bîk chian.
Khasikin o rêngpa ama khi chel ni inuam a nia, khasikin kin rama zuangin lân, keini lei tho dân hrang chu rêng kuta ama lei inhlan kin ti,” an tia.
Saula khan, “
Fe unglân, van fel nôk ual roi, a hnung va sui unglân, a hmutu khom kha van fel roi. Ama chu vârirlet takin thil a tho ngai ti mi’n an nin hril.

Khasikin ar bîkna ngai hmunhai infel ving unglân, keima kuang hong nôk ngêt unglân, khanchu nin kuang zuang ki ta, kha rama khan a la om ngânin chu Judai ram pumpuia zong hrang a ni khoma zong suak ki ti,” a tia.
Khanchu kha khan Saula fe mânin Zif rama an fe tâka. Davida le a mihai chu Judai ramchâra sim tiang Araba rama Maon ramchâra khan an oma.
Saula le a mihai kha Davida zong hrangin an fea, khannisianlân Davida’n a len hriata, khanchu Maon ramchâr lungpui tânga khan a luia, khatak khan a om tâka.
Saula le a mihai kha tâng kiangdang tiang an oma. Davida chu Saula chiin irhnot takin an tâna. Saula le a mihai khan Davida le a mihai kha chelhai hrangin an hong pan nâihai tâka.
Kha lai taka khan thanginthei mi a hong tunga, Saula kuang, “Irhnot takin zuang ro, Filistia mihaiin ei ram an hong idoi a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu Saula khan Davida irzûl kha a mâka, Filistia mihai doi hranga khan a fe tâka. Khasika khan kha hmun irhming kha Sela-hamalekot irsenna tâng an iti tâk a ni.
Davida chu khatak ata kha a rota, Engedi rama khan a fea, khatak khan a irbîk tâk a ni.
Saula hin Filistia mihai a va irzûlhai zoiin chu, “Davida chu Engedi ramchâra a om,” ti an hrila.
Khanchu Saula khan Israel mi murdihai lai ata sipai sa inthangsuak, mi sângthum a hruaihaia, sarza lêngna ngai lungpui bil tiang khan Davida le a mihai zongin an fe tâka.
Khan lam laia khan kêlbelra irkul, rôl omna hi a va dêna, Saula chu irngam viat hrangin a va lûta. Kha khan Davida le a mihai kha rôl sûngrîl tiang khan an oma.
Davida mihai khan, Davida kuang, “Irngai ro,
Khannisianlân nakana chu Saula puanhmor a va i-ât khan Davida lungrîl a na pe oka.
Khanchu a mihai kuang khan, “
Khanchu Davida’n kha thua khan a mihai a khapa, Saula va doi hrang kha phal pehai ta maka. Saula kha rôl ata kha a suaka, a fe nôk ta.
Kha hnung chu Davida khan a zuia, “
Davida khan Saula kuang, “Irngai ro, Davida’n ni siatna hrang a izong a nih itia mihaiin ni kuanga an insîr kha itho mo tak ni isôn ngai?
En ro, a vuan hin

Kha vai kha ni loiin, ka pa en ro, hi ni puanhmor ki ichôi chian a ni. Nang ki ithat thei a nia, khannisianlân, hi nêka hin ni puanhmor ki i-ât a ni. Hi hin thil saloi le tho’nchâina om mah ti le ki hringna la hrangin ni zong mai khomin lân, ni chunga ite sual ma ung ti hi inhre suak ngêt ro.
nangma le ei chungchâng chu rêl ri se,
Tianlaia thuvârin, ‘Mi suala irthokin sual a hong suak ngai,’ iti khom nin hriata. Khasika khan ni chunga kut tha no ning.
Israel rêng kha tu zonga zuang suak mo a ini? Tu ngân mo a irzûl? Ui thi sai, uihrikte kha!
khan rêl sianlân, tu khôk mo a dik loi ei ini infel ri se. Thu kha ngaitua sianlân, ni thop sianlân, ni kut ata ni sansuak ri se,” a tia.
Davida’n Saula kuang hi thu hi a ti zoiin chu, Saula khan, “Nangma ni nina, ki nâipa Davida?” a tia. Saula chu a chap ngûk ngûk tâka.
Kha hnung chu Davida kuang khan, “Nangma ni dika, keima ki idik loi a ni, nangin chu ki chunga thil sa ni thoa, keima’n chu thil saloi ni chunga ki itho a ni.
A vuan hin ki chunga thil sa ni thozia ni inlangtir a ni;
Mi’n râl hmu sianlân, a la insua hrang ma ni? Khasikin a vuana ki chunga ni thil tho hin
Irngai ro, atûn hin Israelhai rêng la ni ngêt ni ta, ni roirêlna hnuaia ram chu inding mai a ti, iti kin hriat suak ta.
Khasikin ka pa insûngkua irhming irhmang phara a om loina hrangin ki hnunga ki’rchihai hôihai hrangin
Khaang khan Davida khan Saula kuang chong an kunga, kha hnung chu Saula kha a in tiang a kîr tâka, Davida le a mihai chu an irbîkna ngai hmuna khan an fe nôk ta.
Samuela chu a thi tâka, Israel mihai kha an irkoi bûma, an châ tâka. Kha hnung chu Ramah khuaa a in kôla khan an phûm tâka.
Kha zoiin chu Davida chu Paran ramchâra a fe tâka.

Maon khuaa khan Kaleba irchia mi inkhat ar hming Nabala a oma, Karmel kho kôla khan hmun a neia, mi irchong tak a nia, kêlbelra sângthum le kêl sângkhat a neia. A dôngma Abigaili khom nupang bengvâr tak le satak a nia. Khannisianlân Nabala kha chu mi tiksia le lungrîl saloi tak a nia. Nabala khan Karmel tânga khan a kêlbelra mul a epa.
Davida khan ramchâra irthokin Nabala’n kêlbelra mul a ep ti a len hriata.
Khanchu Davida khan ruatharte sômkhat a tîra, ruathartehai kuang khan, “Karmel tânga fe unglân, Nabala kuang thengthai unglân, ki’rhmingin chubai hong mûk roi.
Nabala kuang khan hiang hin ti roi, nangma chunga le ni insûngkuahai chunga le ni inei murdi chunga irtharngamna om ri se.
Ni kêlbelra mul epin ni om iti ki len hriata, ni kêlbelra enkoltuhai kha ki kuang hin an om ngaia, an ningmurna ite sin ma ung, Karmel tânga an om sûng chu ite dok mahaia.

Ni ruathartehai irdonhaiin lân, nang hril zêl an ti. Khasika khan ruathartehai hi lunginkhamhaiin lân; hruaithe nî sûn takin kin ihong a ni. Irngaihoi takin, ni inei lam ang takin ni suakhai le ni rualpa Davida hi lei pe ro. Davida’n a ti va ti roi,” a tia.
Davida ruathartehai kha an va tungin chu, Davida irhmingin kha thu murdi kha Nabala kuang khan an hrila. Khanchu an nghâk tâka.
Nabala khan Davida ruathartehai kha an samhaia, “Davida kha tu mo a ini? Jesaia nâipa kha tu mo a ini? lan hre ngai ma ung. Atûn lai hin suak tamtak an puhai in ata rot an tam a ni.
Ki baihai, ki tuihai le ki belra mul eptuhai hranga ki sa that kha tuhai mo an ini ite khom ki inhriat phâk loihai hi ki ipêk hrang mo?” a tia.
Davida ruathartehai kha an kîr nôka, Nabala ihril murdi kha Davida an hrila.
Davida khan a mihai kuang khan, “Nin khandai vong chit roi,” a tia. Davida khomin a vonga, mi irzaminli vêlin an zuia, mi irzahni chu neinun nghâkin an oma.
Nabala suak inkhatin, Nabala dôngma Abigaili kuang khan, “Irngai ro, Davida khan ramchâra irthokin ka pu chubai hong mûk hrangin mi a hong tîra, ama’n a lei hala.
Nikhomsianlân kha mihai kha kin chunga an sa oka, kin theimâk ite tho mahai, rama kin om laia hmunkhatin kin om kâra khan ite dok ual ma ung.
Kêlbelra enkolin an kuang kin om sûng chu sûn le zân kin ta hrangin kul an ni ichang pe a ni.
Khasikin imo ni itho hrang a satak ngaitua ro; kin pu chunga le a insûngkua murdihai chunga hin thil saloi a itung thei a ni. Ama lak hi lungrîl saloi, tûte ichongpui thei loi a ni,” a tia.

Abigaili khan irhnot takin bai tiam irzahni le uain kok hni le kêlbelra ringa ir-em inhmin sai le bu inzêi her sôm her sari le, grep inhroi inchâr irzakhat le theipui bai hlûm irzahni a lâka, sakuartung an pêltira.
Kha hnung chu a zui ruathartehai kuang khan, “Ki matona hin fe mai unglân, nangni hong zui ki ti,” a tia. Khannisianlân a pasal Nabala kha chu inhril maka.
A sakuartung chunga chuangin mual le mual kâra a fe laiin Davida le a mihai kha a’rtongpuihaia.
Davida khan a lungrîlin, “Hi pa neinun hi ramchâra hin a man boiin ki inrûk pe a ni hi te; thil sa kha thil saloiin a ni tuam tâka.
Nangtûk zîng khovâr mân, kha pa ta murdi laia pasal nâipang inkhat lua khom ki hôi pea ni’n chu Pathianin Davida hi a nuam nuamin ni lo ri se. Hi nêka na ual khomin ni lo ri se,” a ti tâka.
Khanchu Abigaili khan Davida a hmu’n chu, a sakuartung ata kha a chum zôi zela. Davida makunga khan irnêng sikin chubai a mûka.
Davida ke bula inbok pumin a kuang, “Keima’n ka pu, keima ngêtin pualoina chu pêl ki ti, irngaihoi takin nir ngai pe ro.
Irngaihoi takin mi chanlamboi Nabala kha ite bêin bê no ro, ar hming om lam ang chie hi a nia, Nabala an iti ang hin into a ni, keima ni suaknu lak hin ruatharte ni hong itîrhai kha lei hmu ma unga.
Khasikin atûn hin ka pu,
Khan irngaihoi takin ka pu, ni ta hranga thilpêk ki hong ichôi hi ni pom pe’n lân, ka pu ruathartehai hi pêk ni ri sehai.
Nang a zuinu tho’nchâina hi irngaihoi takin inza roh.
Nangma irzûl hrang le ni hringna irhmangtir hrangin mi hor thokhai khom sianlân, ni hringna chu
ni chungchâng thu chu, a thil sa inkung murdi ni chunga a tho tika Israelhai rêngin nang a siam tika chu,
a bi om loia, thisen nin sua noa, phuba ni ilâk viat loi hi ni ta hrangin lungchuk loina mani, irsîrna mani ite ni viat no ni.
Davida khan Abigaili kuang khan, “A vuana ni lei don hranga nang a tîrtu
Ni bengvârna kha satvurin om sianlân, thisen insua thei loi changna ata nin zôktu le keima kuta phuba la loia ni siamtu, nangma chu satvurin om roh.
Nangma khan ni lei don zel no’n lân chu,
Kha hnung chu Davida khan a thil hong chôi pehai kha a lâka, a kuang khan, “Irtharngam takin in tiang kîr nôk tan lân; ni hê ki lâka, ni ingên kha nang ki pom pe duah,” a tia.
Abigaili chu Nabala kuang a hong fea, khanchu a ina khan, rêng hruaithe ang dôrin hruai a len thea, an rui ok sikin Nabala chu a râi a fân pe vura. Khasikin zîng khua a vâr mâka chu ite hril pe maka.
Kha hnung chu zîng tiang Nabala inrui kha a hong harin chu, a dôngma khan kha thu kha a hong hrila; a lungrîl an thing pe raka, a hnang zuak tâka.
Sûn sôm zoia chu
Davida khan Nabala a thi ti a hon hriatin chu, “Nabala’n a ni hmusitna sikin Nabala chunga phuba a lâka, a suak hi thil saloi tho loiin a ni khaptu
Davida zuihai khan Karmel tânga Abigaili kuang an va tungin chu, “Davida khan a dôngma hranga nang hruai hrangin a ni hong itîr a ni,” tiin an chongpuiin an biaka.
Abigaili khan a hmâi leh irnêng sikin an boka, “Irngai roi, a zuinu ki nia, ka pu zuituhai ke irsûk hrangin ki irsiam chian a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu Abigaili chu a thoi hluta, sakuartung chunga a chuanga, a dôngmate ringahai leh khan, Davida hong itîrhai kha an zuihaia, a dôngma a chang tâka.
Davida khan Jezreel-a mi Ahinoami a lei nei sa tâka, khanchu Abigaili leh khan a dôngma changin an omsuam tâka.
Kha laitaka khan Saula’n a nâinu Mikali, Davida dôngma kha Galim kho mi Laisa nâipa Paltia a lei inluatir tâk a ni.
Zif mi senkhathaiin Gibea khuaa Saula kuang an fea, “Davida chu Judai ramchâr kôla Hakila tânga khan ar bîk chian a ni,” iti an va hrila.
Khanchu Saula kha Israel mihai lai ata sipai inthang ngot mi sângthum hruaiin Zif ramchâra Davida zong hrangin a fe zel tâka.
Saula khan Hakila tânga lampuia khan riakbuk a khuara. Davida chu ramchâra khan a om maia, Saula chu ama zongin ramchâra a hong ti an hriatin chu,
a enirchik hrang mi a tîra, Saula a ihong ta tak a nih ti an hriat infel tâka.

Kha hnung chu Davida kha a thoia, Saula riakbuk khôrna khan a fea, Davida khan Saula le a sipai hruaitu Nera nâipa Abnera zâlna kha irsin a siaa, Saula chu riakbuk sûnga khan a zâla, a kôlvêla khan riakbuk an irfûktira.
Kha hnung chu Davida khan Hit mi Ahimeleka le Joaba sangpa Abisaia kuang, “Tu mo keima kuanga Saula riakbuka hong hrang?,” a tia. (Joaba le Abisaia-hai nu chu Zeruii a ni.)
Khanchu kha zâna khan Davida le Abisaia chu Saula riakbuka an fea. Saula chu riakbuk inlaina taka khan a lei zâla, a luthun tiang ufei kha irnênga a thun nguta. Abnera le sipaihai khan an lei hrunga.
Abisaia khan Davida kuang, “A vuan hin Pathianin ni râl kha ni kuta nang a ipêk a ni, khasikin ufei leh hin irnêng la hong sun bê ta hi rong duah, voihni chu sun no ning,” a tia.
Khannisianlân Davida khan Abisaia kuang, “A chunga kut tha no ro,
Davida ngêt khan, “
Khanchu Davida khan Saula luthuna ufei le tuiûm kha a lâka, an fe tâk, tûte’n hmu mahaia, tûte a har khom om mahai.
Kha hnung chu Davida kha varâl dang tiang a fea, hla vita tâng inkhata khan a ngîra, ram hlatak a ni ta.
Davida khan sipaihai le Abnera kha, “Abnera nin hriat thei mo?,” tiin ar dona. Abnera khan, “Pâi pumin, rêng inthangtu tu ngân mo ni ini kha?,” a tia.
Davida khan Abnera kuang, “Abnera, Israelhai laia mi hâi tak mo ni mak che? Ithoa mo, ni pu rêng kha ni ihrung inzôk loi? Atûn hin rêng ni pu that hrangin tu ma ni riakbuka a zuang lût kha te.
Abnera, ni sinthôna hlo ni isam a ni.
Saula khan Davida irhâi kha a hon hriata, “Nangma mo ni ini, ki nâipa Davida?,” a tia. Davida khan, “O, rêngpa ka pu, keima ki ni,” a tia.
Davida ngêt khan, “I tho hrangin mo ka pu ni suak hi ni ni’rzûl maia? I zât thil mo ki itho? I zât sual mo ki isin?
rengpa ka pu, ki thu’nsîr hrang hi irngai ro, ni doi hranga ni lungrîl nan thortirtu kha
Khasikin ki thisen chu

Saula khan, “Thil ki itho inchâi a ni hi. Ki nâipa Davida hong kîr nôk ta ro. A vuan hin ki hringna ni ni hôi pe sikin, ite nang ti ta ngai no ning. Thil invêt tak ki lei itho tâk a ni, ki lei itho insual ok tâk a ni,” a tia.
Davida khan a sâma, “O rêngpa ni ufei, hin a om, ruatharte inkhat hong sianlân, hong la ri se.
khan, mi tin an felna le iamomna man chu a ipêk ngai a ni. A vuan hin
A vuana ni hringna nang ki irngaiinhlu pe ang hin,
Saula khan Davida kuang, “Ki nâipa Davida, Pathianin sat nang vur ri se. Ni sinthôna kipa manchangsua mai ni ti,” a tia. Khanchu Davida kha a fe tâka, Saula chu a in tiang a kîr nôk tâka.

Davida khan a lungrîlin, “Itik nî mani chu Saula kuta hin ki la ithi ngêt hrang chu ni a ti; khasikin Filistia mihai kuanga laizâm tho ti no hi chu a sa dang om no ni. Khanchu Saula khan Israel ram pumpuia a ni zong hi a beidong pe ta a ti. Khanchu a kut ata zôk ki ti,” a tia.
Khanchu Davida le a kuanga om irzaruk omhai kha Maoka nâipa, Gath-a rêng Akisa kuang an fe tâka.
Davida kha ama le a mihai, an in sûngkuahai leh, Davida khom a dôngmahai a hruaia, Jezreel mi Ahinoami le Nabala dôngma Karmel tânga mi Abigaili hai leh Gath khuaa Akisa kuang an om tâka.
Davida chu Gath khuaa laizâm a tho ti Saula’n a len hriatin chu, zong tum ta maka.

Davida khan Akisa kuang, “Lung nin khamin lân, ni ram sûnga khua inkhata hin om hmun ni pe’n lân, khatak khan lei om ta rong, ni suak hi i lo hrangin mo rêng khuaa nangma kuang a iom mai hrang?,” a tia.
Khanchu Akisa khan Ziklag khua kha a pêka, khasika khan Ziklag kha atûn ten hin Judai ram rênghai ta a ini mai a ni ta.
Davida kha Filistia-hai rama khan kum khat tha minli a oma.
Kha sûnga khan Davida le a mihai kha an fea, kha rama khan tian rengata lei om tâk Gesur mihai, Girzi mihaiin, Amalek mihai an rûna. An ram kha Aigupta dên rakin Sur khua dênin an irûn a ni.
Nupang pasal an rêngin an ithathai a nia, kêlbelrahai, sialhai, sakuartunghai, saringseihai, an sil le kaihai an lâk pehaia; khanchu a hong kîr nôka, Akisa kuang a fea.
Akisa khan, “A vuan hin kho tiang mo ni irûn?” a tia. Davida khan, “Juda sim ramhai, Jeramil-hai ram, Ken mihai omna ram,” a iti pe a ni.
Davida khan nupang pasal a rêngin a thathaia, Gath khuaa a fea, ama le a mihai thiltho hon sîr hrang kha a ihôi ngai loi a ni.
Khannisianlân, Akisa khan Davida thu’nsîr kha a pompuia, “Ama mi Israelhai khan an ngam sabaka. Khasikin a hring kongkâr chu ki sin a itho mai hrang a ni,” a tia.

Zoro sôt ian hnunga chu Filistia mihai khan an sipaihai kha Israel mihai doi hrangin an irbuka. Akisa khan Davida kuang, “Nangma le ni mihai kha keima ni thopin nin idoi hrang a nih ti nin hriat kha te na,” a tia.
Davida khan Akisa kuang, “O kin hriat, ni suak thil tho thei dân hi nangma ngêtin hmu ni ti,” a tia. Akisa khan Davida kuang, “A sa! a ni hrungtu det takin nang siam ki ti,” a tia.
Samuela kha a thi tâka, Israelhaiin an châ tâka. Ama omna khua Ramah khuaa khan an phûm ta. Saula khan tasân theihai le dôi theihai kha a ram ata an hnotsuakhai tâka.
Filistia mihai an irbûma, Sunam khuaa khan omhmun an khuara. Saula khan, Israelhai a bûma, Gilbo khuaa omhmun an khuara.
Saula’n Filistia sipaihai a hmu’n chu a chia, ar lo an thing tâka.
Khanchu

Kha hnung chu Saula khan a mi lianhai kuang, “Tasân thei nupang ni zong pe unglân, a kuang fe ki ta, lei chongpui rong,” a tia. Anni khan a kuang, “Endor khuaa tasân thei nupang inkhat a oma,” an tia.

Khanchu Saula kha irvo danglamin a’rvoa, puan danglam a sila, zâna khan mi dang inhni hruaiin nupangnu kuang khan an fe tâka. Khanchu ramilhli, tasân theinu kuang khan, “Tâ ni sân pe’n lân, ni kuanga a’rhming ki isâm kha ni koi pe ro,” a tia.
Nupangnu khan a kuang, “Irngai ro, Saula thiltho kha nin hriata, a ram sûnga tasân theihai le dôi theihai kha an hnot suakhaia, i lo hrang mo ki thina hrangin châng ni ikam hrang?” a tia.
Kha hnung chu Saula’n chong an kunga, “
Khanchu nupangnu khan, “Tu mo nang ki ikoi suak pe hrang?,” a tia. Saula khan, “Samuela ni koi suak pe ro,” a tia.
Nupangnu khan Samuela a hong hmu’n chu a khêk raka, Saula kuang, “Itho mo ni ni huanga, rêng Saula kêng ni ni duah,” a tia.
Reng khan nupangnu kuang khan, “Chi no ro, imo ni hmu?” a tia. Nupangnu khan Saula kuang, “Irnêng ata pathian nia irhoi tak a hong suak ki hmu,” a tia.
A kuang khan, “Itin mo a om?” a tia. Nupangnu khan, “Tarpa hi a hong suaka, songkol irfual an nghâka,” a tia. Kha hnung chu Saula khan Samuela a nih ti an hriata, a hmâi irnêng sikin chubai a mûka.

Samuela khan Saula kuang, “Itho mo hianga ni ni inbuai? Itho mo zuang nôk hrangin ni ni dona?,” a tia. Saula khan, “Ki milung a zîng tak taka. Filistia mihaiin an ni doia, Pathian lakin hnung a ni songsana, deipu’n mani, irmangin mani lua khomin ni sâm maka; khasika khan ki sin hrang nin hril hrangin nang ki ikoi a ni,” a tia.
Samuela khan, “Khaanga
Keima hmangin a insîr ang khan ni chunga a itho tâk a ni hi.
Kha vai kha ni loiin
Kha hnung chu Samuela thu’nsîr sikin Saula chu a chi tâka, voikhat zelin irnênga an rîl raka, a zâl rak tâka. Sûn le zân ite a fâk viat ta no sikin irnak irvun nei ta maka.
Khan nupangnu kha Saula kuang a fea, a bei a dong ti an hriata, khanchu a kuang, “Irngai ro, ka pu nang a zuinu hin ni iti ang ki zôma, ki thi le thi tiin ki kuanga ni thu’nsîr kha ki ipom a ni.
Atûn hin irngaihoi takin nangma khomin ni suaknu hi a thu irngai pe ro duah. Bu a chînte nang siam pe ki ta, khanchu ni kîr nôk tika irnak ni nei theina hrangin ne ngêt ro,” a tia.

Khannisianlân Saula khan nuam maka, “Ite ne no ning,” a tia. Khannisianlân a mi lianhai khom khan fâk nêk zong hrangin an inthêm maia, an he a lâk tâka, khanchu irnêng ata kha a thoia, zâlhmuna khan a toia.
Nupangnu khan sehrâtte a mar tak kha a lâka, a thata, kha hnung chu baidi kha a lâka, an hmeta, chol pol loi bai hriamin a sina.
Saula le a mi lianhai makunga khan khalâi a va doa, an nêk tâka, kha hnung chu a thoia, kha zân zela khan a fe tâka.
Filistia mihai le an sipaihai chu Afek-ah an irbûm vinga; Israel mihai khan Jezreel phâia tuipui kôla omhmun an khuara.
Filistia-hai rêng ringahai kha an sipai irzakhat vêlin, sâng têlin an irkôi zun zuna, Davida le a mihai chu Akisa leh inhnung an intaa.

Filistia sipai hruaituhai khan an hmua, “Hi Hebraihai hin imo an itho?,” an tia. Akisa khan, Filistia hruaituhai kuang khan, “Ama hi Davida, Israelhai rêng Saula mi lian a ni, zoro sôttak ki kuang a om tâka. Ki kuang a hor bei ata atûn ten khom hin a sualna ite ki la ihmu loi a ni,” a tia.

Khannisianlân, Filistia hruaituhai kha Akisa chunga an ning an mura, a kuang, “Kha mi kha chu khua ni ipêkna khan tîrpai nôk ta ro, irdoina hmuna keini kôla chu hong no ri se. khano’nchu irdoina hmuna khan ei râlhai tiang kop duaina a ti, a pu le irngei nôkna hrangin ei mihriamhai lu lana a ti.
Hi Davida hi ni ma mo, nupanghaiin lâm puma ‘Saula’n a sâng sângin a thata, Davida’n a sîng a sîng,’ tia hla an isak kha?,” a tia.

Kha hnung chu Akisa khan Davida kha a koia, a kuang, “Israelhai Pathian hringna irhmingin ki iti a ni, mi diktak ni nia, sipaihai laia ki kuang ni fea, irdoina ni ni doipuia, ki inuam a ni. Ki kuang ni zuang nî ata, a vuan sûn ten hin ni chunga ite saloina la hmu viat ma ung. Khannisian rêng danghai hin nang an ipom loi a ni.
Khasikin Filistia-haiin an milung a chuk theina hrangin kîr nôkin lân, milungchuk takin fe ro,” a tia.

Davida khan Akisa kuang, “Ka pu imo ki itho insual tâk? ni iti lam angin, ni kuang ki om sûng kârka ki tho insualna ni hmu no’n te, i lo hrangin mo ka pu le rêng râlhai kha doi loiin ki ikîr nôk hrang?,” a tia.
Akisa’n Davida kuang, “A dik, ki mithmua khan Pathian vântirtôn ang dôrin ni isa a ni. Khannisianlân Filistia rêng danghaiin, ‘Irdoina hmuna kin kuang hong sa no ri se,’ an tia.
Khasika khan ni kuanga hong sa ni pu Saula zuituhai leh hin zînga thoi unglân, khua a vâr le nin irot hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu Davida le a mihai kha Filistia rama kîr nôk hrangin zîng taka an suaka, Filistia mihai chu Jezreel-a an fe tâka.
Sûn thum ni tena chu Davida le a mihai Ziklag an tungin chu, Amalek-haiin, Judai sim tiang le Ziklag khua kha an lei rûn tâka. Ziklag khua kha an hâla.
Nupanghai le kha khuaa om murdihai kha a lian a chîn an chelhaia, tûte that loiin an hruaihaia, an rotpuihai ta.
Davida le a mihaiin kho sûng an va tungin chu, a lei kâng inhek zoi tâka; an dôngmahai, an nâipasalhai, an nâinuhai chu an lei hruaipaihai tâka.
Kha hnung chu Davida le a kuanga omhai chu an chap tâka, sôl takin an oma.
Davida dôngmahai ruai Ahinoami le Abigaili khom an ihruaihai sa a ni.
Davida milung a zîng pe sabaka, a mihai le an nâihai an inchân zoi tâk sikin, an lungrîl a na hraia, ama kha lung leh dêng that hrangin an insî sikin, khannisianlân Davida kha Pathian
Davida khan Ahimeleka nâipa ochai Abiathara kuang khan, “Ochai songkol ni va la pe ro,” a tia. Abiathara khan ochai songkol kha a va lâk pea.
Davida khan
Khanchu Davida le a mi irzarukhai kha an irthoka, Besor vadung kha an va tunga, kha tena khan a sen a zârhai kha an va phâkhaia.
Davida le a mi irzaminlihai khan chu an irzûlhai maia, mi irzahnihai kha chu an sôl hrai tâk sikin Besor vadung kha irkân thei ta mahaia, khatak khan an lei iom tâk a ni.
Davida kuanga la omhai khan rama hin Aigupta nâipang hi an va hmua, Davida kuang an hong hruaia, bai le tui in hrang an pêka.
Theipui chârhai le Grep hroi irku hni an pêka. Khahai kha a fâk zoiin chu a hong har suak nôka, sûn thum le zân thum chu bu le tui in loi a nia.
Khanchu Davida khan a kuang, “Tu mo ni ini? Khôtaka irthoka hong mo ni ini?,” a tia. Ama khan, “Aigupta mi ki nia, Amalek mi suak ki ni. Sûn thum a ni ta, ki dam no sikin, ka pu’n a ni mâk raka.
Judai sim tiang pang ram Keret mihai ram kha kin rûna, Kaleba irchihai ram khom kin rûna, Ziklag khua khom kin hâl,” a tia.

Davida khan a kuang, “Khahai omna khan ni hruai theiin mo?,” a tia. Ama khan, “Ni that loi hrang le ka pu kuanga ni pe ta loi hrangin Pathian irhming sâmin keima kuang chonginkungin lân, khanchu annihai omna khan nang hruai ki ti,” a tia.
Khanchu Davida kha anni kuang a hruai tâka. Khan, a rûntuhai khan Filistia rama le Judai rama râllâk tamtak an lâk sikin, hruai an inthea, an fâkin an ina, an le’rthek bet buta.
Khanchu Davida khan zîng khua a vâr u uai ata khohloi dênin annihai kha a doihaia, ruatharte irzaminli le saringsei chunga chuangin lâizâm thohai bana chu tûte a zôk zel om mahaia.
Davida khan Amalek mihai an ichelhai kha an zôkhaia, an thil lâkhai khom a lâkpai pehaia, a dôngmahai ruai khom kha a saninzôkhaia.
Ite dok viat maka, Davida khan a mihai, a nâihai, murdi le râllâk thil, Amalek-hai lei ilâkhai kha a ilâk kîr nôk ving a ni.
Davida khan kêlbelra pâlhai le sa pâl murdi khom kha a lâka, a mihaiin a maton tiang an hôla, “Hihai hi Davida râllâkhai an ni,” an tia.

Kha hnung chu Davida kha, an sôl hrai sika a kuanga fe thei ta loia, Besor vadunga lei om tâkhai mi irzahnihai kuang a fea. Anni khan Davida le a kuanga omhai don hrangin an lei honga, Davida’n an kuang a va tungin chu, lôm takin chubai a mûkhaia.

Khannisian Davida kuanga fehai laia mi senkhat mi chanlamboi, mi tiksiahai khan, “Eini kuanga an fe no sikin ei râllâk thilhai chu semhai no ih. An dôngmahai le an nâihai chu hruaihai sian fe ri sehai,” an tia.
Khannisianlân, Davida’n, “Urênghaio,
Khasikin tûte’n nin thu kha pom no nihai. Irdoina zu fehai dongtum ang dên kha, neinun enkola lei omhai khomin an idong hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu Davida’n kha dân kha a siam tâka, kha rengata atûn ten hin Israelhaiin an la hong izui mai a ni.
Davida khan Ziklag khua a tungin chu, râllâk thil senkhat kha Juda hruaitu, a rualhai kuang a thona, “Hi hi,
Bethel-a omhai, Judai ram sim tiang panga Ramah khuaa omhai, Jatir khuaa omhai,
Aroer khuaa omhai, Sifmot-ah omhai, Estemoa omhai,
Rakal-ah omhai, Jerameel khuaa omhai, Ken mi khuaa omhai,
Horma khuaa omhai, Barosan-ah omhai, Athak-ah omhai,
le Hebrona omhai kuang a thona. Ama le a mihai chênginbualna ngai hmun murdia om Juda hruaitu a rualhai kuang a ithon a ni.
Filistia mihaiin Israelhai chu Gilbo tânga khan an doia, kha tânga khan Israel mi tamtak thatin an oma; rêng Saula le a nâipasalhai le mi danghai kha Filistia mihai ata lâizâm an tho tâka.
Khannisianlân Filistia mihai khan Saula le a nâipasalhai an irzûlhai thala, an phaa, Saula nâipasalhai kha Jonathana le Abinadaba le Malkisua kha an thata.
Khan, Saula kha an doi natinsat tak taka, thalin a tok tâka, a sate’n a popa.

A râltukfam chôitu ruatharte kuang khan, “Ni khandai phôiin lân, ni that ro; khano’nchu hi sertan loihai hi hong an ta, ni that an ta, ki chunga irpâkna an ti,” a tia. Khannisianlân râltukfam chôitu khan that hrangin ngam maka. khanchu Saula khan a khandai kha a lâka, ar sun that ta.
A râltukfam chôitu khan Saula a thi ti an hriatin chu, ama khom kha a bingin ar sun that sa tâka, an ruaiin an thi ta.
Khaang khan Saula le a nâipasal inthumhai le a râltukfam chôitu kha an ithi a ni. Kha nî khan Saula mihai murdi an thi ving ta a ni.

Israel mi Jezreel phâi varâl tianga omhai le Jordan râl nisua tianga omhaiin, Israel sipaihai lâizâm an thoa, Saula le a nâipasalhai an thi ti an inhriatin chu lâizâm an tho tâka. Khanchu Filistia-haiin an khua an va ilua tâk a ni.
Irdoi nî zîng nôka chu Filistia-haiin an râl thathai inmok hrangin an va fe’n chu Saula le a nâipasal inthum, Gilbo tânga lei thi, ruak zâl kha an va hmua.
Saula lu kha an tana, a râltukfam kha an khekpai pea, kha thurchi kha an millim biakna ina le an mihai kuang inpuang hrangin Filistia rama khan mi an tîrhaia.
Khanchu Saula râltukfamhai kha Astoret biak ina an siaa, a ruak kha Beth-san khopui kul banga an târa.
Jabes Gilead-a omhaiin Filistia mihaiin Saula an tho dân chungchâng thu kha an inhriatin chu,
mi murdi an irthoka, zân sôtin an fea, Saula ruak le a nâipasalhai ruak kha Beth-san kul bang ata kha an lâka, khanchu Jabes khopuia an hong tungpuia, an hâl tâka.
Kha hnung chu an ruhai kha an irkhôma, Jabes hmuna Tamarik thing hnuaia an phûma, khanchu sûn sari bu an nghei tâka.
Khan, Saula thi zoi hnungin Davida kha Amalek-hai a rûn zoiin a hong kîr nôka, Ziklag khuaa khan sûn hni a om tâka.

Sûn thum nî khan chu ruatharte inkhat Saula riakbuk ata irthokin a zuang tunga. A beidong inlangtirna hrangin a puanhai an pot thêra, a lua pil ar thua. Ama kha Davida kuang a fea, irnênga inbokin chubai a mûka.
Davida’n a kuang, “Kho tianga irthoka zuang mo ni ini?,” a tia. Ama khan, “Israelhai omhmun ata zuang ki ni,” a tia.

Davida khan a kuang, “Itin mo thil a iom nin hril ro,” a tia. Ama khan a sâma, “Irdoina hmun ata ei sipaihai kha laizâm an thoa, ei mihai tamtak an thata, Saula le a nâipa Jonathana khom an thi sa tâk,” a tia.
Davida khan a hriltu ruathartepa kuang, “Itin mo Saula le a nâipa Jonathana an thi ti ni inhriat thei?,” a tia.
Ruatharte khan, “Gilbo tânga khan ki lei va om ropa, Saula kha ufei irhnêla ngîrin ki hmua, râlhai tâlihai le sakor chung chuang mihai lakin an hong nâi tâk sikin.
Khanchu a hnung tiang ar heiin ki hmua, a ni koia ‘Imo ki itho thei hrang,’ ki tia.
Khanchu ki kuang, tu mo ni ini? a ni tia. Keima’n, ‘Amalek mi ki ni,’ ki tia.
Kha hnung chu ama’n ki kuang, ‘Hin hongin lân, ni that ro, ki sâbe tuang a na hrai ta, ki ithi ngêt hrang a ni ta,’ a tia.

Khanchu a kôla ki fea, an rîlin chu a ithi ngêt hrang a nih ti kin hriat sikin, ki ithat tâk a ni. Kha hnung chu a lu rênglukhum le a bâna bâla kha ki lâka, ka pu, hin ni kuang ki zuang ichôi a ni,” a tia.
Kha hnung chu Davida hin beidongin a sil le kaihai an potthêr a ni; khaang khan a kôla om murdihaiin an thoa.
Khanchu Saula le a nâipa Jonathana le
Davida khan thurchi zuang hriltu ruatharte kuang khan, “Kho tianga mi mo ni ini?” a tia. Ama khan, “Amalek mi ki nia, khannisian nin rama om ki ni,” a tia.
Davida khan a kuang, “
Khanchu Davida khan a mi inkhat a koia, “Fe’n lân va that ro,” a tia. Amalek mi kha a va tuk that paia.
Davida khan Amalek mi kuang khan, “Ni thisen chu nangma lu chunga om ri se. Ni bâi ngeiin
Davida khan Saula le a nâipa Jonathana kha hiang hin a châhaia.
(Hi hla hi Juda irchihai irchuhai hrangin thu a pêka; khanchu hi hla hi Jasara lekhabua chuang a ni.)
“Israel tânghaia khan ei hruaituhai an thi ta na!
Ei sipai hrâthai an inrîl zoi ta!
Gath khuaa khan insîr no unglân,
Askelon kotsuahai khan inpuang no roi;
khano’nchu Filistia nâinuhai lôm an ta,
sertan loi nâinuhai raifânin pâi an ti.
Gilbo tânghai khan irdo le rua tho no sian,
Loia khom ite vâng no ri se!
kha hmuna mi lian pho kha mualphoi takin paiin a oma,
Saula pho ngei kha sahriak pol ta loiin a iom a ni.
An ithathai thisena irthok le,
mi lian thala irthokin Jonathana thal kha kîr ngai maka,
Saula khandai kha chanlamboiin kîr ngai ma.
Saula le Jonathana chu inditomin an sa vang na!
An hring khomin, an thi khomin,
irsen ngai mahai.
Irmupuihai nêkin an hrât uala,
kâmkeibakneihai nêkin an ihrât ual a ni.
Nangni Israel nâinuhaio,
Saula kha châ roi, puan sen satakhai leh nangni a’rvotira,
rângachak le lunghluhaia nangni irvotu kha.
Sipai hrâthai an inrîla,
irdoina khan an thi tâk e;
Jonathana chu tâng chunga khan a thi ta.
Ki’rzirpuipa Jonathana,
ni chungthua hin ki bei a idong a ni;
ki ta hrangin ni hlu vang na!
Lung ni ni thung dân hi ar khêla,
nupanghai lungthungna a ikhêl a ni.
Sipai hrâthai an inrîla,
An hriamhreihai khom ar hmang zoi tâk e,” tiin.
Kha zoiin chu Davida khan
Khanchu Davida chu Hebrona a fea, a dôngmahai ruai Jezreel mi Ahinoami le Karmel mi Nabala dôngma Abigaili-hai kha a hruaihaia.
Davida khan a mihai leh a insûngkuahai khom kha a hruaihai saa, Hebron kôlvêla khuahai khan an om tâka.
Kha hnung chu Judai rama mihai kha Hebrona an honga, Juda mihai chunga rêng hrangin Davida kha sahriak an irthûtira.
Davida’n Saula phûmtuhai chu Jabes Gilead mihai an nih ti an hriatin chu,
an kuang khan Davida’n mi a tîra, an kuang, “Nin rêng Saula chunga nin iamomzia inlangtirin nin lei phûm sikin
khan nin chunga lungkhamna le thutak inlang sianlân; hi thil nin tho sika hin kei khomin nin chunga satakin tho ki ti.
Hrât tak le hâitakin om roi! Nin rêng Saula chu a thi tâka, Juda irchihai khan an rêng hrangin sahriak an ni irthutir tâk a ni,” a tia.
Nera nâipa Abnera, Saula sipaihai hruaitu kha Saula nâipa Isbosetha leh khan Jordan râl Mahanaim hmuna laizâm an thoa.
Kha khan Abnera khan Isbosetha kha Gilead, Asera Jezreel, Efraima le Benjamina ramhai chunga, a ni Israel ram pumpui chunga rêngin an siam tâka.
Saula nâipa Isbosetha kha Israel chunga an lal phut laia khan kum sômminli mi a nia, kum hni a inlal a ni.
Khannisianlân Juda mihaiin Davida chunga iamomin an om maia,
Davida’n Hebron khuaa khan Juda irchihai chunga kum sari le tha ruk roi a irêl a ni.
Isbosetha mi lianhai le Abnera kha Mahanaim rengata suakin Gibeona an fea.
Zeruii nâipa dîla khan an irtongpuia; khanchu senkhathai kha dîl râl kiang tiang panga an toia, senkhathai nôk kha kiang dang tiang an toia,
Abnera khan Joaba kuang, “Hi tiang le hi tiang ruathartehai inthanghai ei ta, irsual ri sehai,” a tia.
Joaba khan, “A sa,” a tia.
Khanchu an sûn nikhua a hong tung tena chu, Benjamina irchi, Isbosetha tianga kop mi sômhleihni le Davida mi sômhleihnihai kha an irsuala.

An irotpuihai leh khan an lua an irchela, an i-âthai kha an kuanga khandai leh an irsuna, khanchu mi sômhni minlihai kha an rêngin an inrîl vinga, an thi tâka. Khasika khan Gibeon hmun kha Helkat-Hazurim an ti tâka.
Kha hnung chu, kha nî zela khan irdoipui a suak tâka; Abnera le Israel mihai kha Davida mihai ata khan an dok tâka.
Kha hmuna khan Zeruii nâipasalhai inthum Joaba, Abisaia le Asahela hai an oma. Asahela kha sazuk ang dôra ngalhrât a nia.
Khanchu Asahela khan Abnera kha a’rzûla; Abnera irzûl kha vei tiang mani, chang tiang mani pêt viat loiin a’rzûl thala
Abnera chu a hong irheia, “Nangma kêng hi ni inina, Asahela?,” a hong tia. Asahela khan a sâma, “O keima ki ni,” a tia.

Abnera khan a kuang, “Ni’rzûl ta no ro, ni chang tiang mani, ni vei tiang mani pêtin lân, ruatharte inkhat kha chelin lân, a râltukfam irvonahai kha lapai pe ro,” a tia. Khannisianlân, Asahela khan Abnera kha a’rzûl maia.
A thar vangin Abnera khan Asahela kuang, “Ni’rzûl ta no ro, i lo hrang mo nang ki isun that hrang? Itin mo ni upa Joaba hmêl ki ihmu ngam ta hrang?,” a ti nôka.

Khannisianlân, Asahela khan pêt nuam ual maka, khanchu Abnera khan a ufei hmor leh khan a phînga a suna, ufei khan a hnung tiang ar hlet thala, Asahela chu irnênga an rîla, a thi tâka. Khan, Asahela inrîlna a thina hmun hong tunghai kai chu an irngama, an ngîr chian ta.
Khannisianlân Joaba le Abisaia khan Abnera chu an irzûl maia; Gibeon ramchâr lampuia Gia nisua tiang Amma tâng an tungin chu misa a tâk tâka.
Benjamina irchihai kha Abnera kuang an irbûma, pâl khatin an irsiama, tâng sîpa khan sirsan an va lâka.

Kha hnung chu Abnera khan Joaba a koia, “Kumtuangin ei irdoi mai hrang ma ni ta? A mongna chu beidong ngaisiat om tak a ini hrang iti hi nin hriat mo? I dôra sôt mo ni mihai khan an urênghai irzûl an imong hrang iti ni ihril ta hrang?,” a tia.
Joaba khan, “Pathian hringna irhmingin ki iti a ni, ite ti no’n lân chu, nangtûk zîng dênin ki mihaiin nangni an irzûl hrang a ni,” a tia.
Kha hnung chu Joaba khan bekul a hong tuma, mipuihai an inding chiana, Israel mihai kha irzûl ta mahaia; irdoi nôk ta mahaia.
Abnera le a mihai kha Jordan phâi an hroa, zân sôt an fea; Jordan dung an irkâna, zîng nôka sûn sôtin an fea, Mahanaim an tung nôk tâka.
Joaba kha Abnera irzûl a kîr nôkin chu, a mihai a bûmhai vinga, mi sôm hleikuak le Asahela chu irkip ta loiin a om ti an hmu suaka.
Davida mihai khan Benjamina nama irthokin Abnera mihai kha irzathum sômhni an thata.
Joaba le a mihai khan Asahela ruak kha an chôia, Bethlehem-a a pa thâna an phûma. Kha hnung chu Joaba le a mihai kha zân sôtin an fea, khua a vârin chu Hebron an tung nôk tâka.
Khan Saula insûngkua thophai le Davida thophai kha zoro sôttak an irdoia. Davida kha a hong hrât ual uala, Saula insûngkuahai kha an dok tîr tîra.
Davida khan Hebron khuaa khan nâipasal ruk a neia; a ulian dônin hihai hi an ni. Amnona, a nu chu Jezreel mi Ahinoami kha a ni.
Kileaba, a nu chu Karmel mi Nabala dôngma Abigaili kha a ni. Absaloma, a nu chu Gesur rêng Talmaia nâinu Maaki a ni;
Adonija, a nu chu Hagithi a nia. Sefatia, a nu chu Abitali a nia.
Ithreama, a nu chu Egli a ni. Hihai hi Davida nâi Hebrona suakhai chu an ni.
Saula in sûngkua tianga thophai le Davida mihai an irdoi sûnga khan Abnera kha Saula thoptuhai laia khan thu a hong nei u uala.
Sûn khat chu Isbosetha khan Abnera kuang, “I lo hrangin mo ka pa Saula lâksîrnu Rizpii, Aii nâinu kha ni izâlpui?,” a tia.

Isbosetha thuhril khan Abnera lungrîl a dêng pe hraia, a ning an mur pe oka, “Judahai ui lu ang ringot hi mo ki ini? A vuan tena hin ni pa Saula chunga le a urênghai chunga le a rualhai chunga iamomna kin langtira, Davida kuta nang inhlan ma unga, nikhomsianlân a vuan hin nangma’n hi nupang chunga sualin ni ni ibe tâka.
Saula le a insûngkuahai kut ata ram kha lapai pea, Israelhai le Judahai chunga Dana irthokin Beerseba dênin Davida rêngtoihmun indingtir nôk hrangin
Khanchu Isbosetha khan Abnera kha a chi sik ringotin ite don ngam maka.

Abnera khan Hebrona om Davida kuang mi a tîra, a kuang, “Hi ram sûnga hin tu mo roirêl hrang? Keima kuang thuthungin lân, khanchu Israel mi murdihai hi nangma tianga kop chang hrangin nang thop ki ti,” a tia.

Davida khan, “A sa, nangma kuang thu thung ki ti. Khannisianlân, thil inkhat nan phût hrang ki nei, nir hmupui hrangin ni hong tika Saula nâinu Mikali hong hruaiin lân, khanchu ki hmêl hmu thei ni ti,” a tia.
Davida khan Saula nâipa Isbosetha kuang khan, “Filistia mihai servun irzakhata ki irchôk ki dôngma Mikali kha ni hong pe ro,” tiin mi a tîra.
Khanchu Isbosetha khan a pasal Laisa nâipa Paltiela kuang ata kha an hruaia.
A pasal khan chap pumin Behurim kho dênin a hong zuia. Khannisianlân Abnera’n a kuang, “Kîr nôk ta roh,” a tia. A kîr nôk tâka.
Abnera kha Israel hruaituhai kuang a fea, an kuang, “Matona khan chu Davida kha nin rêng hrangin nin nuam ngaia.
Atûn hin nin tah hrangin zoro inchum a ni.
Abnera’n Benjamina namhai khom kha a chongpuia, kha hnung chu Abnera kha Israel mihai le Benjamina nam murdihaiin, a sa an iti murdi Hebrona Davida mikuar inhriata insîr hrangin a fe tâka.
Abnera kha Hebrona Davida kuang mi sômhnihai leh an fea, Davida khan Abnera le a kuanga sômhleihnihai ta hrangin hruai an thea.

Abnera khan Davida kuang, “Thoi ki ta, ni kuang thu an thung theina hrangin Israel mi murdihai hi ki rêngpa kuang koi bûmhai hrangin fe ta ki ti,” a tia. Davida khan, Abnera kha a tîra, khanchu irtharngam takin a fe tâka.

Inhnung ual viata chu Joaba le Davida mihai ram riak kha an hong kîra, râllâk sum tam tak an hong chôia. Khannisianlân Abnera kha Hebrona Davida kuang khan lei om ta maka; Davida’n a lei tîr tâk sikin, ama khom irtharngam takin a ife tâk a ni.
Joaba le a kuanga mipuihai kha an hong tungin chu, “Nera nâipa Abnera rêng kuang a honga, ama khan a len fetir nôk tâka,” ti Joaba kha an hrila.
Khanchu Joaba kha rêng kuang a fe thala, “Ni thil lei tho hi itina mo a ini? Abnera kha ni kuang a honga, itho mo khaanga ni lei itîrpai nôk?
Ama khan nang huang hrang le ni fena, ni hongna le ni thiltho murdi inhre hranga hong kêng a ini,” a tia.
Davida kuang ata a hong suakin chu Joaba khan Abnera irzûl hrangin mi a tîra, Sira tuisunsuaka irthokin an hong hruaipai nôka, nikhomsianlân Davida khan kha thu kha ite inhre maka.
Abnera kha Hebron a hong tungin chu Joaba khan kul kotbâia inrûkin chongpui zâi hrangin a koia khanchu Joaba khan a sangpa Asahela thisen suak thuanna hrangin Abnera kha a phînga a sun that tâka.
Inhnung Davida’n an hriat tena chu, Davida khan, “Nera nâipa Abnera thisen suak thua hin keima le ki ram chu

Kuttum kha Joaba le a insûngkuahai murdi chunga chum ri se. A irlo rikipa Joaba insûngkuahai laia khan pân saloiin mani, inphârin mani, nupang sin vai tho theiin mani, khandaia thi mani, fâk irsamin om ri sehai,” a tia.
Khaang khan Joaba le a sangpa Abisaia khan an sangpa Asahela kha Gibeona irdoina khan a that sikin Abnera kha an ithat tâk a ni.
Kha hnung chu Davida khan Joaba le a kuanga mipui om murdihai kuang khan, “Nin puanhai inpotthêr unglân, bora puan sil unglân, Abnera kha sûn roi,” ti thu a pêka. Reng Davida khan irlâng kha a chela.
Abnera kha Hebrona khan an phûma, rêng kha Abnera thâna khan a chap ngûk ngûka; mipui om murdi khom an chapa.
Davida khan Abnera kha a châ sabaka,
“Itina mo Abnera hi into thi angin te a ithi tâk hi o?
Ni kut kha khitindet ni ual maka,
Ni ke khom thîrhrui bun ni ual maka,
Mi sualhai makunga mi an inrîl angin te nin rîla?,” a tia.
Khanchu mi murdiin an châ nôk tâka.

Sûn sôtin mi murdihai khan Davida kha fâk inzongtir hrangin an inthêma; khannisianlân Davida khan, “Misa a tâk mâka chu bu mani, thil dang mani ite ki irtem a omin chu, Pathianin a ilo loin ni lo ri se, hi nêka irkhêl ual khomin,” tiin chong an kunga.
Ama kha mi murdi’n an inhriatin an lôm oka, rêng thiltho murdi khan mipuihai kha an lômtirhai maia.
Davida mi murdihai le Israelhaiin Nera nâipa Abnera thata om kha rêng thu suak ni mah ti an hon hriat suaka.
Reng khan a mi lianhai kuang, “A vuan hin Israel mi lian le roiinpui a ithi a ni, iti nin inhriat loi ma ni?
Reng hranga Pathian sahriak irthutir ni khomin lân, a vuan hin ki irzal zap a ni. Hi mi Zeruii nâipa hai hi ki ta hrangin an ivîk hrai a ni.
Saula nâipa Isbosetha khan Hebrona Abnera a thi ti an hriatin chu a lei chi tâka, Israel mihai kha an phûk an thing tâka.
Isbosetha khan sipai pâl hruaitu inhni Baana le Rekaba a neia; anni kha Benjamina irchia Beerot mi Rimona nâipasalhai an ni. (Beerot chu Benjamina rama ibe a ni.
Lei om masa a ram mihai kha Gataim-ah laizâm an thoa, atûn ten hin an iom mai tâk a ni.)

Saula irchia mi dang la om chu Jonathana nâipa Mefiboseta a nia, Saula le Jonathana an that laia khan kum ringa mi vai a la nia. Jezreel-a irthokin Saula le Jonathana thi thu an len hriatin chu a enkoltunu khan a poma, laizâm a thopuia; khannisianlân laizâm thopui hranga a’rhnot hrainaa khan an thâka, a ke a hon bâi tâk a ni.
Rekaba le Baana kha Isbosetha in panin an fea, sûn laitaka Isbosetha sûn irngam laitakin an va tunga.
Kotbâia nupang bu lei irkheinu kha inmusuin a oma, a in irnghila, khanchu Rekaba le Baana kha insûnga an lût zâia.
Insûng an va lûtin chu, Isbosetha zâlna tentana an fea. Isbosetha lei in irnghil kha an suna, an thata. Kha hnung chu a lu an tana, an chôia, Jordan phâi fe thalin zân sôt an fea.
Isbosetha lu kha Hebrona Davida kuang an hong chôia, rêng kuang khan, “En ro, hi nang that tum ni râl Saula nâipa Isbosetha hi;
Davida khan Rekaba le Baana kha a sâmhaia, an kuang, “
Thurchi sa zuang tung hrang irngaiin, Saula kha a thi ta, tiin mi inkhatin a ni zuang hrila, ama kha ki chela, Ziklag khua khan ki thata; ama kha thurchi sa zuang intung mâna ki lei ipêk kha a ni.
Mi fel ama insûngluma, a zalhmuna om, Saula an ithat thisen man khan nin chunga ki inphût nôk ual, atûn hin irnêng ata nangni irhmangtir hrang ki ni,” a tia.

Kha hnung chu Davida khan a ruathartehai kha thu a pêkhaia, anni kha Rekaba le Baana kha an thata, an kut le ke an tan pehaia, Hebron dîl kôla khan an inkhâihaia. Isbosetha lu kha an lâka, Hebrona Abnera thâna an phûm tâka.
Kha hnung chu Israel nam murdihai chu Hebrona Davida kuang an honga, a kuang “Kin thisen irzompui ni nia.
Zoro lei fe tâka khan Saula chu ei chunga an lal lai khom khan irdoina buala Israelhai hruai ngaitu a ni;
Khanchu Israel hruaitu murdi’n Hebrona rêng Davida kuang an honga, Reng Davida khan Hebrona khan
Davida an lal phuta khan kum sômthum mi a ni, kum sômminlia inlal a ni.
Hebrona khan Judahai chunga kum sari le tha ruk an lala, Jerusalema Israelhai le Judahai murdi chunga kum sômthum inthum a inlal a ni.

Davida le a mihai kha, kha rama om Jebus mihai rûn hrangin Jerusalema an fea; khahai khan Davida hong lût thei loi hrangin an iama. Davida kuang, “Hin hong lût thei viat no chi ni; mitcho le ke’nbâihai luan nang lei khap thei an ti,” an tia.
(Khannisianlân Davida khan an Zion kulpui kha a lâka, kha kha Davida khopui a hong inchangtir a ni.)

Kha nî khan Davida’n a mihai kuang, “Jebus mihai ki ingamhai dôr chu that irhmang ngam mo nin om? Mitcho le ke’nbâihai doi nuamhai chu tui luangna zuiin lût khum ri sehai,” a tia. (Khasika khan mitcho le ke’nbâihai kha
Kulpui kha a lâk zoiin chu Davida kha, kha hmuna khan a om tâka, “Davida Khopui,” iti a ni ta. Davida khan Milo sûng tianga irthokin a kôlvêla khan khopui kha a siam tâka.
itinrêng sin thei Pathian kha a kuang a om mai sikin, Davida chu a hong iroiinpui u ual a ni ta.
Khan, Tura rêng Hirama’n Davida kuang mi a tîra, meisâr thing a thona, kut theithiamhai le lung suktuhai a tîrhai saa, Davida rêng in chu an sin pea.
Davida kha
Davida khan Hebrona irthokin Jerusalema a’rthon hnunga khan, dôngma le lâksîr a nei belsaa, nâipasal le nâinupanghai a nei intam ual tâka.
Jerusalema a nâi neihai chu Samua, Sobaba, Nathana, Solomona,
Ibara, Elisua, Nefega, Jafia,
Elisama, Eliada le Elifeleta hai an ni.
Filistia mihaiin Davida kha Israel mihai rêng hrangin sahriak an irthutir ti an hriatin chu an sipai murdi kha Davida chel hrangin an irthoka. Davida khan a len hriata, kulpuia a lei zu fea.
Filistia mihai kha Refaim phâizôl an hong tunga, kha khan an irzara.
Davida khan, “Filistia mihai doi hrangin ki ife hrang mo?,” tiin
Khanchu Davida kha Baal-perazim-ah a fea, kha khan Davida’n Filistia mihai chu an hnê tâka. “
Filistia mihaiin laizâm an tho lai khan an millimhai an mâksana; Davida le a mihai khan an lâkpai tâka.
Kha hnung chu Filistia mihai kha an fe nôka, Refaim phâizôla an irzar nôka.
Davida’n
Thingtheimu kung rêla lui irhâi nin hriat tena châng ro! Filistia sipaihai doi hrangin ni matona keima
Khan,
Davida khan Israel mihai laia sipai inthang ngot mi sîngthum a buk nôka.
Judai rama Baala khuaa irthokin cherubhai chunga chuang itinrêng sinthei
Pathian Thuthung Bôm kha tâng chunga Abinadaba in ata an lâksuaka, tâli thara an bânga. Abinadaba nâipasalhai Uza le Ahioa hai khan tâli thar kha an chalaia;
Ahioa kha Pathian Thuthung Bôm maton tiang khan a fea.
Davida le Israel mihai khan an hrâtna murdi le hlasaka lâm pumin
Nakona hruizôl kha an tungin chu sehrât kha a pêmlûta, Uza khan a hon bana, Thuthung Bôm kha a hong intûka.
ning kha Uza chunga an mur pe thuta, Thuthung Bôm a hong tôn sika khan Pathianin kha zela khan a thata. Pathian Thuthung Bôm kôla khan a thi tâka.
Khasika khan kha hmun irhming hranga khan Pereza Uza iti a ni ta.
Kha hnung chu Davida khan
Khanchu Davida khan
Reng Davida khan Pathian Thuthung Bôm sika khan Obed-edoma in sûngkua le loi murdi
Thuthung Bôm irzôntuhai kha kal ruk an phêt tena chu Davida’n a’rngamtirhaia, sehrâtchal le sehrâttehai kha irbôlna hrangin
Davida khan puanzâiirhmi ochai songkol irfîngte vai innghâkin thei dôrin
Khaang khan Davida le Israel mihai kha râifâna pâi pumin le bekul tum irhâi inring du durin
Khan,
Thuthung Bôm kha an hong chôia, a siana hranga Davida indang sai, puan in sûnga a hmun hranga khan an sia tâka. Kha hnung chu Davida kha hâlirvôm thilinhlanhai le irngeina thilinhlanhai
Davida’n hâlirvôm thilinhlan le irngeina thilinhlanhai kha an hlan zoiin chu itinrêng sinthei
mipui murdi, Israel pumpuihai kha nupang le pasal, mi tinin bai tiam inkhat le sa tin inkhat le grep ra châr a sem pehai chita. Khanchu an mâni in chita an fe ta.

Kha irzoiin chu Davida kha a insûng mihai satvur hrangin a kîr nôk tâka. Saula nâinu Mikali kha Davida don hrangin a hong suaka, “A vuana Israel rêng chu a roiinpui vang na! Mi chanlamboi inzakna inhre viat loi, korongboia om ang dôra a vuan hin a zuitu dôngmatehai mithmua korongboiin a iom kha na!,” a lei tia.
Davida khan Mikali kha a sâma, a kuang, “Ni pa le a in sûngkuahai murdi nêkin Israelhai chunga rênga nin thangtu
Hi nêk khom hin inzakpuiin om ki ti, keima le keima khom la’rsit ki ta; khannisianlân kha a zuitu dôngmate ni itihai chôiindômin om ki ti,” a tia.
Khaang khan Saula nâinu Mikali khan a thi dênin nâi nei ta maka.
Reng Davida kha a ina a oma,
Kha hnung chu rêng khan deipu Nathana kuang, “Hin keima chu, sidar thinga siam ina ki oma, nikhomsianlân Pathian Thuthung Bôm kha chu puan in ma maia a oma,” a tia.
Nathana khan, “Ni lungrîla om lam takin tho ro,
Khannisian kha ni zân ngêta khan
“Fe’n lân, ki suak Davida kha va hril ro,
Israel irchihai Aigupta ram ata ki hruai suaka irthokin atûn ten hin tempila la om mai ma ung, puan ina kêng ki la iom.
Israel irchihai laia ki fena hmun tina khom ki mi Israelhai enkol hranga thu ki ipêk nam hruaituhai kuang, itho mo sidar thing leh in nin ni isin pe loi? ti ngai ma ung.
“Khasikin ki suak Davida kuang, itinrêng sinthei
Ni fena hmun tina ni kuang ki om maia, ni maton tianga râl omhai ki’rzûlpaihai ngaia. Irnênga mi inthangtak takhai irhming angin irhming inthangin nang ki siama.

Ki mi Israelhai hrang hmun kin kung, kha khan anni chu mihai sirbea an om loina hrangin ki inomtir tâk a ni. Hi ram an hong lût ata mi pualoihai deng an intheitirhaia, khannisian khaang kha chu om viat ta no ni.
Ni râlhai lai ata zôkin nang inomtir ta ki ti, khabana irchi suanpâr nang pe ual ki ti.
Ni zoro a heka ni puhai kuang ni zâl tika khan, nir chi, ni rîla ra nâipasal inkhat rêng inchangtir ki ta, a ram kha indet ni a ti.
Ama khan keima tempil sintu chu ni a ti, a ram rêngtoihmun chu kumtuanga hrangin indettir ki ti.
A pa ni ki ta, ama kha ki nâipa ni a ti. Khan, ama khan thil a tho insualin chu mihriamin nâi a ihêm ngai angin hêm ki ti.
Nikhomsianlân, rêng ni chang theina hrangin Saula ki ikhâi irhmang kuang ata lungkhamna ki ilâkpai pe ang khan ama chu masan ual no ning.
Ni in sûngkua le ni ram kha kumtuangin indet ni a ta, ni rêngtoihmun kha kumtuangin indet ni a ti,” tiin
a kuang thu a inlang murdi kha Nathana khan Davida kuang an sîr tâka.
Khanchu Davida kha irtongna puan ina khan a lûta,
O
Davida kuang hin imo la hril infel ual hrang? Ni suak hi ni nin hriat hleta, O
Ni suak hi nir chutir hrangin ni lungdo le thiltum ang lam takin hi thil roiinpui tak hi ni tho tâka.
Khasika khan O

Nangma mi innitir hrang, sal ata ni irtansuakhai, ni mi Israelhai anga rêng rammuala hin om mahai. An ta hranga thil roiinpui le thil irkhêl ni ithohai khan rammual pumpuia nir hming chu inthangin a iom a ni. Aigupta ram ata ni dongtum hranga ni inzôkhai kha, ni mihai kha maton tiang an fe mai lai khan nam dang le an pathianhai kha nin hnotsuak pehaia.
Khaang khan Israelhai chu kumtuanga ni mihai ni hrangin ni siamhai tâka. Nangma,
“Khan, atûn hin O
Itinrêng sinthei Pathian chu Israelhai Pathian a nia tiin nir hming chu kumtuangin chôiindômin om ri se. Khanchu ni suak Davida in sûngkua khom ni makunga indetin om ri se.
O itinrêng sinthei
O
Khasikin ni suak in sûngkuahai chu ni makunga kumtuanga a om mai theina hrangin satvur ro; o Rêngpa P
Zoro sôt ian hnunga chu rêng Davida khan Filistia mihai kha a doia, an hnea. Khanchu Davida khan Filistia mihai thuneina bulpui kha a lâk pea.
Kha zoiin Moab mihai a doi inhne nôka, a hringa a ichelhai kha irnênga an zâltirhaia, inthum laia inhni a thathaia. Khanchu Moab mihai kha a thuhnuaia an om tâka, khâzana an hong ichôi ngai a ni ta.
Kha hnung chu Davida khan Eufrates vadunga a ram la nôk hrangin a fe malamin Zoba rêng Rehoba nâipa Hadadezera khom a doi inhnêa.
Khanchu Davida khan a sakor chung chuang mi sângkhat irzasari le sipai sînghni a chel pea. Khan Davida khan, tâli irzakhat kai hrang sakor rukbak a lâka, a dang kai chu an irthahrui a tuk sat pehaia.
Damaska-a Suria mihai Zoba rêng Hadadezera san hranga fehai kha Davida khan a lei doia, mi sînghni le sânghni a thata.
Kha hnung chu Davida khan Suria rama Damaska khan sipai a siaa; khanchu Suria mihai kha Davida thuhnuaia an om tâka; khâzana an hong pêk ngaia.
Davida khan Hadadezera mi lianhai rângachak phohai a lâkpai pea, Jerusalema a chôia,
Hadadezera khua Beta irthokin, Berothai-a irthokin, Davida khan dâr tamtak a lâka.
Hamath rêng Toia khan Hadadezera sipai murdi Davida’n an hnê ti a len hriata.

Khanchu Hadadezera kha a doia, an hne sikin chubai mûk hrang le lômpui hrangin Toia khan a nâipa Jorama kha Davida kuang a tîra. Hadadezera khan Toia hi a lei idoi ngai a ni. Khante, Jorama khan sumru le rângachak hai, dâra siam thil a hong chôi pea.
Reng Davida khan kha thilhai kha
Khahai kha Suriahai ta, Moabhai ta, Amona irchihai ta, Filistia-hai ta, Amalek-hai ta, Zoba rêng Rehoba nâipa Hadadezera rengata a râllâkhai an ni.
Davida kha michi phâizôla, Edom mihai sîngkhat le sângriat a that zoia a hong kîr tena len vâng chu ar hming kha a inthang ual hrang a ni.
Edom ram hmun tina sipai a siahaia, khanchu Edom mi murdi kha Davida thuhnuaia an om tâka, khâzana an hong chôi ngaia.
Davida khan Israel mihai chunga roi a rêla, mi murdi chunga khan fel takin roi a rêla.
Zeruii nâipa Joaba kha sipai hruaitu ulian tak a nia; Ahiluda nâipa Jehosafata kha thurchi irziaktu a ni;
Ahituba nâipa Zadoka le Abiathara nâipa Ahimeleka kha ochai an nia; Seraia kha ziaktu a ni;
Jehoiada nâipa Benaia kha Davida hrungtu laia hruaitu a nia; Davida nâipasalhai kha ochai an ni.
Sûn khat chu Davida khan, “Jonathana sika lungkhamna kin langtir theina hrangin Saula insûng mihai laia mi mo la om nihai o?,” a tia.
Khante, Saula in sûngkuahai zui inkhat ar hming Ziba a oma, Davida kuanga fe hrangin a koia, rêng khan a kuang, “Ziba mo ni ni?,” a tia. Ama khan, “O ki ni, ka pu nang a zui hi,” a tia.
Reng khan, “Pathian lungkhamna kin langtir theina hrangin Saula insûng mihai laia mi a la dam mo an om?,” a tia.
Ziba khan rêng kuang, “Jonathana nâipasalhai laia inkhat a la om, ama chu ke’nbâi a ni,” a tia.
Reng khan a kuang, “Kho tiang mo a iom?,” a tia. Ziba khan rêng kuang, “Lo-debar khuaa Amiela nâipa Makira ina a om,” a tia.
Khanchu rêng Davida khan mi a tîra, Lo-debar ata Amiela nâipa Makira in ata kha a va hruaia.
Saula nâipa Jonathana nâipa Mefiboseta kha Davida kuang khan a hongin chu, a hmâi irnêng sikin Davida kha chubai a mûka. Davida khan “Mefiboseta,” a tia. Ama khan, “En ro, nang a zuitu hi,” a tia.
Davida khan a kuang, “Chi no ro, ni pa Jonathana sikin lung nang inkham ngêt ki ti, ni pu Saula ram murdi nang pe nôk ki ta, ki dokânga khalâi ot sa mai ta ni ta,” a tia.
Mefiboseta khan chubai a mûka, a kuang, “Keima ui thi sai ang maia nang a zuitu chunga hin hiang dôra ni satna ni insua hi?,” a tia.
Khanchu rêng khan Saula zuitu Ziba kha a koia, a kuang, “Saula thil murdihai le a in sûngkuahai thilhai kha ni pu tupa hi ki ipêk ving a ni.

Nangma le ni nâipasalhai le nang a zuituhai ta hrangin ram kha chîmu song pehai nin ta; ni pu nâipa khan fâk hrang a nei theina hrangin ni chîmu invânghai kha ni hong ichôi pe ngai hrang a ni. Mefiboseta hi chu ki dokânga khalâi a iot mai hrang a ni,” a tia. (Ziba khan nâipasal sôm hleiringa le a zuitu sômhni a ineihai a ni.)
Ziba khan rêng kuang, “Rêng ka pu’n thu ni ni ipêk lam ang takin tho ki ti,” a tia. Khanchu Mefiboseta khan rêng nâi inkhat anga rêng dokânga khan khalâi a ot mai tâka.
Mefiboseta khan nâipa, la nâipangtê a neia, ar hming chu Mika a ni. Ziba ina om murdi kha Mefiboseta zui an hong ni tâka.
Khanchu Mefiboseta a ke inhnia inbâi kha Jerusalema a oma, rêng dokânga khalâi a iot mai tâk a ni.
Zoro sôttak hnunga chu Amon rêng Nahasa kha a thia, a nâipa Hanuna kha rêng a hong chang tâka.

Reng Davida khan, “A pa Nahasa khan lung a ni lei inkham ang khan kei khomin Hanuna hi lung ki inkham hrang a ni,” a tia. Khanchu Davida khan a pa chungchâng thua lungngam sak hrangin a mihai a tîra. Davida mihai kha Amona irchihai omna ram an va tungin chu,

Amona irchihai hruaituhai khan an rêng Hanuna kuang khan, “Davida hin ni pa mahrip a tho sikin lungngam nang sak hrangin a mihai ni kuang a hong itîr ni isôn ma ni? Ni ma, Davida hin a nin hnê theina hranga le hi khua hong en infel hranga anni hi, a hong itîrhai an ni,” a tia.
Kha hnung chu Hanuna khan Davida mihai kha a chela, an hnerkamulhai a ep inkolpai pehaia, an silkaihai khom a chimrip an zer bul tena hin a tan inbongtir pehaia, a tîr paihaia.
Insûnga hong kîr kha an inzak ok tâka, Davida’n kha thu kha an hriatin chu, a don hrangin mi a tîra, “Nin hnerkamul a mônga a sei mâka chu Jeriko-a om unglân, kha zoi le la hong ta roi,” a tia.

Amona irchihai khan Davida kha râl an inchangtir tah ti an hriat tâka. Khanchu Amon irchihai khan Bethrehob-a le Zoba ata Suria sipai sînghni, Tob ata mi sîngkhat sânghni le rêng Maaka mi sângkhat an hruaihaia.
Davida’n kha kha a len hriatin chu Joaba le sipai irdoi mi murdihai kha anni doi hrangin a tîra.

Amon irchihai kha an hong suaka, an rêngpa khopui, Raba lûtna kotbâi tianga khan omhmun an siama; mi danghai Zoba le Rehoba ata Suria sipaihai le Tob mihai le Maaka mihai kha chu a bingin irnak songna hmun an siama.
Khaangin an maton tiang le an hnung tiang râlhai khan an hong idoi hrang a nih iti Joaba’n an hriatin Israel sipaihai laia mi hrât le sa an thanghaia, Suria mihai doi hrangin omhmun an lei siama.
A sipai danghai murdi kha a sangpa Abisaia hruaina hnuaia a siahai vinga, Amon irchihai doi hrangin irnak songna hmun a lei siam saa.
Joaba khan a sangpa Abisaia kuang, “Suria mihai kin hnê no hrangin chu, nangin ni hong san ni ta; khante nangma’n Amon irchihai nin hnê no hrangin chu, nang hong san ki ti.
Hrâttak le hâitakin om unglân, ei mihai le ei khopuihai sanin pasal satakin doi ei ti duah;
Joaba le a mihai khan, doi hrangin an hong panin chu Suria mihai kha laizâm an tho tâka.

Amon irchihaiin Suria mihai laizâm an tho ti an inhriatin chu anni khom kha Abisaia kuanga khan laizâm an tho tâka, khuaa khan an lûta, kha hnung chu Joaba khan Amon irchihai kha a mâkhai raka, Jerusalema a kîr tâka.
Suria mihaiin Israelhai kôla an dinghmun siatzia an hon hriatin chu, an sipai murdi an koi bûma,
Reng Hadadezera khan mi a tîra, Eufrates vadung nisua tiang Suria mihai kha a hruai suakhaia, Zoba rêng Hadadezera sipai hruaitu Sobaka khan a hruaihaia, Helama an fea.
Kha kha Davida’n a len hriatin chu Israel sipaihai a bûm nôka, Jordan dung an irkâna, Helema khan an fea, Suria mihai khan Davida doi hranga khan omhmun an lei siama, an lei doia.

Suria mihai kha Israelhai kuanga khan laizâm an tho tâka, Davida le a mihai khan Suria mi tâli chunga chuang mi irzasari le sakor chung chuang mi sîngminli an thata, an sipai hruaitu Sobaka khom an inphop nenga, irdoina hmuna khan a ithi tâk a ni.

Khaang khan Hadadezera thuhnuaia an rênghai khan Israelhai makunga an dinghmun a siat tâk ti an inhriatin chu, Israelhai leh irngeina an siama, an thuhnuaia an om tâka. Khanchu Suria mihai khan Amon irchihai kha san nôk ngam ta mahai.

Kum a hong heka, rênghai irdoi hranga an suak zoroa khan, Davida’n Joaba kha a mi lianhai le Israel sipaihai leh khan a tîra, anni khan Amon irchihai kha an inhnêhaia, Raba khua kha an irhual vinga, khannisian Davida chu Jerusalema a oma.
Sûn khat chu, khohloi misa dâia zâlhmun ata Davida kha a thoia, rêng in chunga a hong fea. In chunga a hong fe’n chu nupang inkhat tuiirsil lai hi a hmua, kha nupang kha hmêl satak a nia.
Khanchu Davida khan nupang thurchi inhriat infel hrangin mi a tîra. “Eliama nâinu, Bethsebi, Hit mi Uria dôngma a ni,” an tia.
Davida khan hong hruai hrangin mi a tîra, an hong hruaia, a lei zâlpui tâka. (Ama kha a tha tina irvei a hmua irthâr zoi chak a nia.) Khanchu a in tiang a kîr nôk tâka.
Khanchu nupangnu kha a hon râi tâka; “Nâi ki vong ta,” iti kha Davida a hong inhrila.
Kha hnung chu Davida khan Joaba kuang, “Hit mi Uria kha ki kuang hong tîr roi,” ti’n chong an thuana, khanchu Joaba khan Uria kha Davida kuang a tîr tâka.
Uria kha a hong tungin chu, Joaba le a sipaihai kha an dam mo, irdoina te itin mo a om iti ar dona.
Kha hnung chu Davida khan Uria kuang, “Ni ina fe’n lân, ni sôl zu irngam ro,” a tia. Uria kha rêng in ata a suaka, rêng khan fâk zât a zun thaktirhaia.
Khannisian Uria kha a ina fe maka, rêng hrungtuhai laia rêng in kotbâi kôla khan a riaka.
Davida khan Uria kha a ina fe mah ti an hriatin chu Davida’n Uria kuang, “Nikho thang a sôt ok zoia hong mo ni mak che, Itho mo ni ina ni ife nuam loi?,” a tia.

Uria khan Davida kuang, “Israelhai le Judahai kha irsual buala an oma, Thuthung Bôm kha an kuang a oma, ka pu Joaba le a mi lianhai kha rama riakbuka an oma. Itin mo keima hi ki ina fein, ki fâkin ki in hrang, ki dôngma kôla ki izâl ngam hrang? Khaanga thiltho irhoiloi chu tho viat no ning,” a tia.
Khanchu Davida khan Uria kuang, “A vuan chu hin om tan lân, nangtûk la fe ta roh,” a tia. Khanchu Uria kha Jerusalema khan, kha nî sûn le zînga khom a om tâka.
Davida khan khohloi bu khalâi otpui hrangin a koia, an ruitir nenga. Khannisianlân kha zân khom khan Uria kha a ina fe maka; a hrungtuhai tentana khan a riak nôk tâka.
Zîng nôka chu Davida khan Joaba kha lekha a thona, Uria kha an chôitira.
A lekhathona khan, “Uria kha râl ichiomna tiang taka maton insatir unglân, an thata a thi theina hrangin a bing ualin om ri se,” tiin a’rziaka.
Khanchu Joaba’n khua a’rhual khap laia khan râl hrât omna tia inhriatna hmuna khan Uria kha a tîra.
Kho sûnga mihai kha an hong suaka, Joaba kha an doia, mi senkhat Davida mi lianhai laia mihai kha an thata, Hit mi Uria khom kha a thia.
Khanchu Joaba khan irdoi chungchâng thu kha Davida hril hrangin mi a tîra.
A mi tîr kuang khan, “Reng kuang irdoi thurchi murdi nin sîr zoia,
a ning an mur thuta, ‘I lo hrang mo khaang dôr nâirêta nin va idoi? Kulpui ata nangni an ikâp hrang ti nin inhriat loi ma ni?

Jerubesetha nâipa Abimeleka kha tu mo a thatpu? Nupangin bu nôina lungin kulpuia irthokin a zu dênga, Thebez-ah khan a thi mo ni ma? Itina mo kulpui nâirêta nin ife a niin te, ni mi lian Hit mi Uria khom kha a thi sa tâk,’ ti ro,” ti’n a hrila.
Khanchu a mi tîr kha Davida kuang a fea, Joaba’n a itîrna san murdi kha a hril tâka.
Davida kuang, “Ei râlhai kha an hong suaka, rama an ni hong doia, khannisian keini’n a kho lûtna kotbâi dên rakin kin irzûlhaia.
Khanchu kulpuia irthokin an ni hong kâpa, khanchu rêng mi lian senkhathai kha an thia, ni mi lian Hit mi Uria khom kha a thi ta,” a tia.

Davida khan thurchi hong hriltu kuang khan, Joaba kuang khan hiang hin van sîr ro, “Hihai hin ni milung insôltir bâk no roh, khandaiin tûte inhnê thei ual ma, hi nêka na ual hin doi unglân kho sûng kha insiat chit roi, tiin inthorhai ro,” a tia.
Bethsebi khan a pasal Uria a thi ti a len hriatin chu a sûna.
A sûn zoro a khêl tena chu Davida khan a in tiang a hruaia, dôngma’n a nei tâka, nâipasal a nei pea. Khannisian Davida thil tho kha
Mi irchongpa khan kêlbelra tamtak le sâ tamtak a neia,

mi inriangpa khan kêlbelra a chînte inkhat vai ar chôka, a ivâi inkhat vai a neia. A insûnga a nâihai leh seilian an ni, a ifâk ang an fâktira, ama khilâta ngei an intir ngaia, a mal chunga pomin a moinu angin a ibe a ni.

Sûn khat chu mi irchongpa kuang khan khualinzin mi inkhat hi a va tunga; mikhual hong tung kha ama belra le kêl thatpui nuam loiin, mi inriang belrate kha a va sutpaia, a mikhualpa kha a ithatpui a ni,” a tia.
Davida kha mi irchongpa chunga khan a ning an mur pe tâka; Nathana kuang khan, “
Khaanga thil kha a tho sikin le lungkhamna a nei no sikin, a kêlbelrate lak kha ama’n bâk minliin a ithuan hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu Nathana khan Davida kuang, “Kha mi kha nangma hi ni ni,”
a rêng ram le dôngmahai nang ki pêka; Israelhai chunga le Judahai chunga rêngin nang ki siama. Khahai kha a la tôm hraiin chu thil danghai khom nang ki ipêk nôk hrang mo ni ma?
Itho mo ki thupêkhai zôm loia, hi thil saloi tak hi ni itho tâk? Hit mi Uria kha irdoina hmuna nin thattirhaia, Amon irchihai nin thattirhaia, khanchu a dôngma kha ni luapai pea.
Khasika khan khandai khan ni insûngkua kha masan viat no ni, nangma’n ki thu zôm loiin Hit mi Uria dôngma ni sutpaia.
Irngai roh, nangma insûngkua laia irthokin ni chunga thil saloi insua ki ta, ni mithmu ngêta ni dôngmahai nang sut ki ta, ni kôla mihai pehai ki ti. Khanchu sûn khovâra ni dôngmahai zâlpuihai an ti.
Nangma’n chu inrûkin sual ni sina, keima’n chu Israel mi murdi mithmua sûn khovâra, khahai kha nan tungtir pe hrang ki ni,” a tia.
Davida khan Nathana kuang, “
Khannisianlân hi ni thil tho hin
Kha hnung chu Nathana kha a ina a fe tâka.
Uria dôngma’n Davida nâi a ineipui chunga khan
Davida’n nâite ta hranga khan Pathian kuang a chongchaia, bu a ngheia, a tentana a lûta, zânsôt irnênga a zâl raka.
A ina mi lianhai kha an hong lûta, irnêng ata kaithoi an tuma, khannisian thoi nuam maka, an laia khom bu khalâi ot nuam maka.

Sûn sari nî chu nâite kha a thi tâka. Davida mi lianhai khan nâipangte kha a thi tah ti hril kha an chia. Anni khan, “Nâite a dam laia an kuanga thu a insîr kha ei chong irngai nuam ngai maka, nâite kha a thi ta, itin mo ei insîr ngam ta hrang? thil saloi a tho itinin,” an tia.
Khannisian Davida khan an chonginrûk kha a hmuhaiin chu nâite kha a ithi tâk a nih ti an hriat tâka. Khanchu Davida khan an kuang, “Nâite kha a ithi ta mo?,” a tia. Anni khan, “O a thi ta,” an tia.
Khanchu Davida kha irnêng ata a thoia, tui a’rsila, sahriak a’rthua, a silkai a thûla, khanchu
A mi lianhai khan a kuang, “Ni thil tho hi itina mo a ini? Nâite a la dam lai khan bu ni ngheia, ni chapa, khannisian nâite a thi leh chu ni thoia, bu ni inêk tâk hi,” an tia.
Davida khan, “Nâite dam lai khan bu ki ngheia, ki chap ngaia. Nâite a dam theina hrangin

Khannisian atûn hin chu a thi tâka, itho mo bu ki la inghei mai hrang? Nâite kha ki la ikoikhîr thei hrang mo? Itik nî mani chu ama kuang keima hi ki la ife ngêt hrang a nia. Khannisianlân, ama chu keima kuang zuang kîr ta no ni,” a tia.
Kha hnung chu Davida khan a dôngma Bethsebi kha lungngam a saka, a kuang a va lûta, a zâlpuia, nâipasal a neipuia. Davida’n a nâi irhming kha Solomona tiin a phua tâka. Nâipang kha
Khanchu deipu Nathana kha a tîra, nâipang kha
Kha laia khan, Joaba khan Amon irchihai khopui Raba kha a rûna, khopui kha a lâk tâka.
Joaba khan Davida kuang mi a tîra, “Raba kha ki rûna, a tui fâk chu ki lâk tâka.
Atûn hin ni sipai la omhai kha bûmhaiin lân, khopui kha rûnin lân, nangma ngêtin la roh. Keima’n khopui kha ki lâkin chu irhming satna irputna ki ti,” a tia.
Khanchu Davida khan a sipaihai kha a bûma, Raba-ah khan a fea, an va rûna, an va lâkpai tâka.

Amon irchihai pathian Milkoma illima irthokin Davida khan rângachak rênglukhum her sômthum ringa dôra rik kha a lâka, lukhama khan lunghluhai khom a kop saa. Davida khan a lâka, a lua a khuma. Khopuia irthokin râllâk sum tamtak an lâka.

Khopuia mihai kha thing âtna hai, kodâl hai, hreipui hai, hmangin sin an thoa, pilrôngar hai an siama, Amon irchihai khopui murdihai chu khaang khan an loa. Kha hnung chu Davida le a mihai kha Jerusalema an kîr nôk tâka.
Davida nâipa Absaloma khan farnu hmêl satak hi a neia, ar hming chu Tamari a ni. Davida nâipa ngêt Amnona’n an dita.
Khanchu Amnona khan a farnu Tamari sika khan a buai ok tâka, dam loiin a oma; ama lak kha dôngmate irthiang a nia; a chunga i mani thil hong tho kha Amnona ta hrangin thil saloi tak a nia.
Khannisianlân Amnona khan rual a neia, ar hming kha Jonadaba a nia, Davida upa Simeia nâipa a ni. Jonadaba kha vârirlet tak a nia.

Jonadaba khan Amnona kuang, “Reng nâipa ni nia, khannisian itho mo a sûn tin ni ingûi mai ngai hi? I sika mo a ini?,” a tia. Amnona khan, “Ki irzirpuipa Absaloma farnu hi ki indit tak tak a ni,” a tia.

Jonadaba khan, “Ni zâlhmuna zâl chianin lân, dam loi orhto tho’n lân, ni pa’n nang a hong en tika, ‘Irngaihoi takin ki farnu Tamari kha ki kuang hong sianlân, bai ni hon fatir ri se. Hin ki mithmu theina hin fâk hrang ni sinsiam pe sianlân nin fatir ri se,’ khanchu ama kut ngêtin khalâi nir fûktir pe ri seh lei ti roh,” a tia.

Khanchu Amnona kha a zâla, dam loi orhto a tho tâka. Reng Davida khan a va enin chu Amnona’n a kuang, “Irngaihoi takin ki farnu Tamari hong sianlân, ki mithmu ngêta hin bai tiam inhni ni sin pe sianlân, ama kut ata lei fa ki ti,” a tia.
Khanchu Davida khan Tamari kuang, “Ni nuchapa in tiang fe’n lân, fâk hrang va sinsiam pe ro duah,” ti hrangin mi a tîra.
Tamari khan a nuchapa Amnona in tiang khan a fea, ama kha a lei zâl chiana. Khante, bai hlûm kha a lâka, an hmeta, a mithmua bai tiam kha a siam pea, an zêia.
An zêina ata kha a fâk hrangin a makunga a sia pea, khannisian fa nuam maka. Amnona khan, “Mi murdi suak ving ri sehai,” a tia. Khanchu an suak pe vinga.

Amnona khan Tamari kha, “Ni kuta ki fâk theina hrangin fâk hrang kha hong chôiin lân ki tentana hin hong lût ro,” a tia. Tamari khan a bai tiam kha a chôia, a nuchapa Amnona kuang a tentan sûnga khan a lûta.
Infatir hrangin a kôlhrêta a va fea ni’n chu a chelthunga a kuang, “Hongin lân hmunkhatin zâl ei ti,” a tia.
Ama khan, “Ni ngai ma, ki nuchapa, hi thil mualinphoi tak hi ni thopui no roh. Israelhai laia hianga thil hi tho hrang ni mah; hi thilsual porche hi tho no roh.

Ki ta hrangin mualinphoina ni a ta, khôn mo ki mit ki imeng ngam hrang? Nang khom Israelhai laia hin mi invêt kêng nang an iti hrang a ni. Khasikin rêng chongpuiin lân, ni ni ilua nuama ni’n chu sêl ual no ni,” a tia.
Khannisianlân a chong kha irngai maka; ama nêkin hrât lak a hrât ual sikin, nakhrâtin a namphaa, a zâlpui tâka.
Kha hnung chu Amnona khan a hmumâk nôk tâka, a ihmumâkna kha an dit laia nêkin a ien nuam loi a ni ta. Khanchu Amnona khan a kuang, “Thoiin lân, rot ta ro,” a tia.

Tamari khan a kuang, “Hiang hin chu a ini hrang ni ma, hianga dik loi taka ni ni irzûlpai hi chu ki chunga ni thil tho tâk leh khan a isa nôk ual loi a ni,” a tia. Khannisianlân Amnona khan a chong kha irngai pe ual maka.
A sinthotu a zui kha a koia, “Hi nupang hi ki kuang ata kêlsuapaiin lân, inkhâr kal pe khap ro,” a tia.
Khanchu a zuitu khan pên tiang a kêlsuaa, inkhâr a kal pe khak tâka. Khanchu, Tamari khan songkol irfual ze da danga irziak, rêng dôngmate irthianghai innghâk ngai kha an nghâka.
Tamari khan a lua irvut ar thua, a songkol irfual kha an potthêra, a kut leh a hmâi a hîpa, inring taka chapin a fe tâka.

A nuchapa Absaloma khan a lei hmu’n chu a kuang, “Amona kha ni kuang a hong ilût a ni na? Khannisianlân ki farnu ni irngaiinsiat hrai no ro. Ama khom ni nuchapa a nia, khasikin hi thu hi tûte hril no ro,” a tia. Khanchu Tamari kha a chapa a nuchapa Absaloma ina beidong takin ar khum zêt tâka.
Reng Davida khan kha thilhai kha an hriatin chu, a ning an mur pe oka.
Absaloma khan a farnu Tamari nakhrâtsonga a zâlpui pe sikin Amnona kha a hmumâk khak tâka, chong lua chongpui viat ta maka.
Kum hni a hek zoiin chu, Efraima kho kôla Baal Hazora-a Absaloma’n a kêlbelra mul a epa; ama’n rêng nâipasalhai kha a koihaia.
Absaloma kha rêng kuang a fea, “
Rengin Absaloma kuang, “Ni ma, ki nâipa, kin rêngin kin zuangin chu, ni ta hrangin rik hrai a ti,” a tia. Absaloma khan a ngên ngut nguta, khannisian rêng kha fe nuam ual maka, sat a vura.
Khanchu Absaloma’n, “khano’nchu, ki irzirpuipa Amnona chu kin kuang zuang ri se,” a tia. Reng khan a kuang, “Itho mo ama kha a izuang bîk hrang?” a tia.
Khannisian Absaloma khan a ngên hrai tâk sikin, Davida khan Amnona le rêng nâipasalhai kha fe hrangin a tihaia. Absaloma’n hruai roiinpui tak an thea.

Absaloma’n a zuituhai kha chong a bêhaia, “Amnona’n uain a ina an rui kha lei en chak unglân, that hrangin thu nangni ki pêkin chu, that roi, chi no roi. A mophurna chu keima’n pêl ki ti. Hâitakin om unglân, lungôkinchain om no roi duah,” a tia.
Khanchu a zuituhai khan Absaloma he bê lam angin an thoa, Amnona kha an that tâka. Davida nâipasalhai murdi kha an thoia, an sakuartung chunga an chuanga laizâm an tho tâka.
Lam laia an la om laiin, Absaloma’n, “Rêng nâipasalhai murdi kha a thathai vinga, inkhat lua hôi ta maka,” ti’n Davida kuang thu a hong tung tâka.
Khanchu rêng kha a thoia, a silkaihai kha an potthêra irnênga a zâl rak tâka. A zuitu a kôla om murdihai khom khan an sil le kaihai an inpotthêr sa tâka.

Khannisianlân Davida upa Simeia nâipa Jonadaba khan, “Ka pu rêng nâipa ruatharte murdihai kha thathai zoi mah. Amnona vai kêng a thi. A farnu Tamari kha Amnona’n nakhrâtin a zâlpui pea irthoka khan Absaloma’n hianga tho hi a lei itum mai tâk a ni.
Khasikin ka pu, rêngpa hin a nâipasalhai murdi kha an ithi ving tâk a nih ti iamin lungkâng tuang ta no ri se; Amnona vai kêng a thi chu a ini,” a tia.

Absaloma kha chu laizâm a tho tâka, râl hrungtu ruatharte khan a mit an lêngtira Hononaim-a irthokin tâng lampui tiang khan mi tamtak hong a hmuhaia. Ama kha rêng kuang a fea, a thil hmu kha a va hrila.
Jonadaba khan rêng kuang, “Khahai kha rêng nâipasalhai hong thak a ni, ki iti ang lam tak kha a ini a ni,” a tia.
A hril zoiin chu rêng nâihai kha an hong tung zela, an chap tâka. Davida le a mi lianhai khom kha an rêngin an chapa.
Absaloma kha chu laizâm a thoa, Gesur rêng Amihuda nâipa Talmaia kuang a fea, kha khan kum thum a va oma. Davida khan zoro sôttak a nâipa Amon kha a chûlpuia,
khannisianlân Amnona thina chungchâng thua khan ar tha a hor ngam tena chu a nâipa Absaloma kha ar ngaia a bei a dong pe tak taka.
Joaba khan rêng Davida lungrîl kha Absaloma chunga a om pe mai ti an hriata.

Khanchu Joaba khan Tekoa khuaa om nupang vârtak inkhat va hruai hrangin mi a tîra. Nupangnu kha a hong tungin chu Joaba khan a kuang, “Lusûn angin irsiamin lân, lusûn puan silin lân, sahriak khom irthu loiin nupang sôttaka mithi chûl angin om roh.
Kha hnung chu rêng kuang fe’n lân, ki he nang bê lam ang tak hin va ti ro duah,” a tia. Khanchu Joaba khan a ti hrang kha an hril tâka.
Nupangnu kha rêng kuang a fea, a makunga irnêng sikin an boka, chubai a mûka, rêng kuang khan, “O rêngpa, ni san ro,” a tia.
Reng khan a kuang, “Imo a ini tâk?,” a tia. Nupangnu khan, “Meithâi ki nia, ki pasal a thi tâka.
Ka pu, nâipasal hni ki neia, sûn khat chu loia an ruaiin an irsuala, tûte a sel hrang lak om mahaia, inkhat khan a thatpai tâka.

Atûn hin ki urênghaiin an ni hmumâka, a’rzirpuipa thattu kha, a urêngpa a that sikin an that theina hrang zongin ki nâipa kha an kuta bâng hrangin an ni tia. Khaang khan an that nôkin chu nâipasal boiin om ki ta, ki sabeina la omsun lua kha a ihek hlet hrang a ni. Ki pasal kha irhming nei loi le irnêng chunga irchi nei ta loiin a iom hrang a ni ta,” a tia.
Reng khan nupangnu kuang, “Ni ina fe nôk tan lân, ni chungchâng chu la ngaitua rong,” a tia.
Nupangnu khan rêng kuang, “O rêngpa, ka pu i khom tho’n lân, a mophurna chu keima leh ki in mihaiin la pêl ro ung; rêng le rêng insûngkua khan mophur no ri sehai,” a tia.
Reng khan, “Mi tukhomin nang an insîin chu, ki kuang hong hruaiin lân, nangni inbuai ta no nihai,” a tia.
Nupangnu khan, “O rêngpa, ki nâipa thina chungchânga thisen phuba lâk hrang chu ki takmitihai hin ki nâi la omsun, thatpai nôkna hrangin irkhêl tak an tho ta loina hrangin
Nupangnu khan, “Irngaihoi takin, o rêngpa ni kuang thu bâikhat ngot la ti nôk ki ti duah,” a tia. Ama khan, “Ti roh,” a tia.

Nupangnu khan, “Itho hranga mo Pathian mihai chunga hianga dik loi ni itho mo? Ni nâipa lele kha a laizâm thôna hmun ata hong kîr nôk hrangin phal pe mak chea. Khasikin atûna ni thu tihaia irthokin nangma le nangma thei loi ni ichang a ni.

Ei rêngin ei la ithi ngêt hrang a ni; eini chu tui irnênga irpai tâk ei ihrût thei ta loi ang hi ei nia; Pathian lua khomin mi thi tâk chu hringna pe ual ta ngai ma, khannisian rêng khan a rot tâk mi kha hong hruai kîr nôk hrang dân lampui a izong thei a ni.
Atûn hin rêngpa hi thu insîr hranga ki ihong khom hi mi’n an ni khâl luan ni lei intungtir pe a tih ti ki sabei.
Reng khan keima le ki nâipa hi Pathianin a mihai a ipêk ram lua loi hranga irhmangtir tumtu ata ni saninzôk hrangin ni lei irngaitua pe ni ti, ki tia.
Hiang hin nang a zuinu ta hrangin ka pu, ni thu kha irtharngam om tak a ni; a sia le sa theithâk hrangin rêng chu Pathian vântirtôn ang an nih ti ki iti a ni.
Reng khan, nupangnu kuang, “Thu inkhat nang irdon ki ta, ite ip viat loiin thudik ni insîr hrang a ni duah,” a tia.
Nupangnu khan, “
Reng khan, “Hi thu rêng rênga hin Joaba hin kopna mo a nei?,” a tia. Nupangnu khan, “
Khannisianlân hi chungchâng thuhai hi siam intûn nôk hrangin Joaba khan a itho a ni.
Inhnunga chu rêng khan Joaba kuang, “Irngai ro, ni inuam lam taka tho hrangin ki inuam a ni. Fe’n lân, ruatharte Absaloma kha va zongin lân, hin hong hruai nôk ta ro,” a tia.

Joaba kha a hmâi irnêng sikin Davida makunga khan an boka, chubai a mûka, a kuang, “O rêngpa, Pathianin sat nang vur ri se. Ki ingênna kha hlo a nin chuktir pe sikin. A vuan hin ni mit ki tung ti kin hriat ta,” a tia.
Kha hnung chu Joaba kha a thoia, Gesur-a khan a fea, Absaloma kha Jerusalema a hruaia.

Khannisian rêng khan Absaloma kha rêng ina om loi hrangin thu a pêka, “Ama in tiang fe sianlân, ki hmêl la hong hmu no ri se,” a tia. Khanchu Absaloma kha ama in tiang khan a om tâka, rêng hmêl kha la va hmu maka.
Israel murdi laia Absaloma ang dôra hmêl sa le inpâk inruk tûte om mahaia. A kemitin ata a lusîp dênin demna zel a iom loi a ni.
A sam khom a tama, a sei pe’n chu a rik hrai ngai sikin, a kum tin voikhat chu a iep ngai a ni. A sam ep kha an var ngaia, rêng varna ngai khan her hni nêka rik a ni ngai.
Absaloma khan nâipasal thum le nâinu inkhat a neia, ar hming chu Tamari a nia, hmêl satak a ni.
Absaloma kha kum hni Jerusalema a oma, khannisian rêng hmêl kha hmu viat maka.
Kha hnung chu Absaloma khan rêng kuanga tîr hrangin Joaba kha chong an thuana, khannisian Joaba kha hong nuam maka. Absaloma khan chong an thuan nôka, Joaba kha nuam pe nôk maka.
Khanchu Absaloma khan a zuituhai kuang, “Tho Joaba loi chu ki loi kôla om a nia, barli a neia, fe unglân va hâl roi,” a tia. Khanchu an fea loi kha an va hâlpai tâka.
Kha hnung chu Joaba kha Absaloma ina a fea, a kuang, “Itho sika mo nang a zuituhai khan ki loi an ihâl?,” a tia.

Absaloma khan Joaba kuang, “Irngai ro, i lo hranga mo Gesur ata hi ki ihong? Gesur-a khan om mai inlân, ki ta hrangin a isa ual hrang ti hrangin rêng kuanga fe hrangin nang ki tia, ni ihong nuam loi. Khasikin rêng hmêl ki hmu theina hrangin zoro nir fûktir pe hrangin nang ki inuam a ni. Siatna ki neiin chu ni thatpai zel ri se,” a tia.

Khanchu Joaba kha rêng Davida kuang a fea, Absaloma thu hril murdi kha a hril tâka. Reng khan Absaloma kha a koia, rêng kuang a fea, rêng makunga khan irnêng sikin an boka. Reng khan Absaloma kha a lei tuma a lôm oka.
Kha zoiin chu Absaloma khan tâli le sakorhai le mi sômringa a matona fe hrangin a’rsiamtirhaia.

Absaloma kha zîng taka thoiin a fea, kul kotbâi lampuia khan a lei ngîra, rêng kuanga an thubuai hong intung hranga honghai kha Absaloma’n a lei koihaia, “Tu kho mi mo nin ini?,” tiin a lei irdonhaia, khante mihai khan tu nama mi mo an inih ti an hril zoiin chu,
Absaloma khan, “Nin sûnga nin thu kha a dikin a isa a ni; khannisian a lei irngaitu rêng khan tûte phun ual ma,” a lei ti pehaia.

Absaloma khan, “Mi tin thubuai neihai mani, zong hrang neihai mani chu keima kuang an hong theina hrangin keima hi, hi rama roirêltu’n ni siam sianlân, ki inuam a ni. Khanchu fel takin rêl pehai ki ta, a lei ti pehai sa ngaia.
Kha bana tukhom ama chubai mûk hranga honghai kha a lei chelhaia, an kuahaia, a tum tumin chubai a lei thohai ngai.
Khaang khan Israel mi, rêng kuanga an thu intung hranga honghai kha Absaloma khan a lei ilômhai ngai a ni, khanchu an lungrîl kha a len hôp inhnê pehai tâka.
Kum minli ar zoi tena chu Absaloma khan rêng Davida kuang, “RENGPA kuanga ki chonginkung thangsua hrangin Hebron khuaa ni tîr ro.
Suria rama Gesur-a ki om laia khan,
Reng khan a kuang, “Irtharngam takin fe ro,” a tia. Khanchu Absaloma kha Hebron khuaa a fe tâka.
Khannisian, Absaloma’n nam tin laia palai a tîrhaia, “Bekul irhâi nin inhriat tena chu Absaloma chu Hebrona khan rêng a chang ta ti roi,” tiin an hriltirhaia.
