Israelhaiin Kanaan ram an lûta khan thathai zoi loi, Solomona’n sintho hrangin nakhrât pâl a ihmanghai irchi chu atûn ten hin suak angin an om mai ta.
Solomona’n Israel mi tukhom suak angin hmang ngai maka, sipai hrang le hruaitu hrangin chu a hmanghai.
Solomona’n a sintuhai enkol hrangin mi irzaringa sômringa an om.
Solomona dôngma Aigupta rêng nâinu chu Davida khopui ata ama hrang piala a in sina khan ar thona, kha zoiin chu khopui nisua tiang chu an bit zoi tâka.
Solomona’n
Reng Solomona’n Edom rama Eloth kôla Agaba irkuang irngamna Eziongeber khuaa irkuang tamtak a siama.
Reng Hirama’n irkuanga mihai kha, Solomona changpui hrangin a tîrhaia.
Ofir rama an fea, rângachak her sângkhat irzaminli a va lâka, Solomona an va pêk ta.
Seba rêngnu’n Solomona irhming inthang thu an hriata, thu’ntakhai irdon infel hrangin Jerusalema a honga.
Hnung zuitu tamtak neiin, saringsei tamtak a hruaihai saa, lung mantam Mosola le rângachak hai chôiin, Solomona le an irhmua, a irdon nuam murdi ar dona,
A irdon murdi Solomona’n a hril pe thei vinga; ite intak ti viat reng nei maka.
Seba rêngnu khan Solomona vâr dân kha a hmua, a in sin hoitak khom a hmua.

Solomona fâk zong an irfûk pe dân hai, a siahlohai omna inhai, rêng sinthotuhai sin irzêk dân hai, an tukfam sa lam dânhai, a enkoltu hai tukfam sa lam, tempila hâlirvôm thilinhlan a inei intam lamhai a hmu’n chu, a’rkhêl tiin a enhaia, a mit insim loi rakin.
Rengnu khan Solomona kuang, “Ni sinthohai le ni vâr lamhai kin ram ata ki inhriat hi a dik a ni.
Ki honga, ki mitin ki hmu mân chu lei iam thei ngai ma unga, khannisian, ni vârna le nir chong lamhai hi a chimrip lua an insîr loi kêng a lei ini, an insîrhai nêka roiinpui a ni.
Ni dôngmahai chu râlvân satak an ni! ni siahlo ni kôla sinthotuhai khom hi râlvân satak an lei ini! pial a ni,
ni Pathian
Thilpêk hranga a ichôi chu a pêka, rângachak her sângminli vêl, mosola tamtak, le lung mantam tamtak tak a pêk sa a ni. Mosola thil mirimhoi itiklai khom kha dôra tam a la iman ngai loi,
Hirama irhming hai, Ofir ram ata rângachak zuang pêltuhaiin Almug thing le lung mantam tamtak an zuang chôi sa.
Reng khan kha thinghai kha
Reng Solomona’n Seba rêngnu chu a izong murdi a pêka, khakhêla, a thil zuang chôi nêka tam a pêk a ni. Khanchu, a zuituhai leh khan an ram tiang an kîr nôk ta.
Solomona’n a kum tin rângachak her sîngthum le sângthum a hmu ngaia.
Irvai mihai le dukan thotuhaiin an tho manhai an pêk ngaia, Arabia rênghai le Israel rama bial tina ram optuhaiin an pêk saa.
Solomona’n pho lianpa hai, rângachak siana khêng irzahni a siama, pho inkhat sinna khan rângachak her sari a hmang a ni.
Pho chîn ualhai chu rângachak her hni vêl polin a inluan sa ngai a ni, phohai chu Lebanon roiinpui an iti sûnga khan an siaa, rângachak inluan saiin.
Reng toihmun irthiang chu sâiha leh siam a nia, rângachaka inluan a ni.
Rengtoihmun a luina leidâk khuat ruk neiin a siama, tûkbân neiin, leidâk sîr tiang khan kâmkeibaknei irlim an ngîrtira,
sômkhat inhninaa rêngtoihmun hnung tiang khan, sehrâtchal lu irlim a oma, a sîr tianghai khan kâmkeibaknei irlim a om sa, khaang dôra rêng toihmun hoi le roiinpui chu kho rama khom la om ngai mah.

Solomona khilâthai chu rângachak inzen a ni, Lebanon rampui an iti in sûnga an fâk zongna bêlbûrhai khom rângachaka siam ving a ni. Solomona zoro lai khan chu sumruhai hi inhlu rak maka, a hmangna khom om rak mah.
Irkuang a neihaia, rêng Hirama irkuanghai leh khan an irkopa, Tarsis tianga fein, kum thum zoia an hong kîr ngaia, rângachak hai, sumru hai, sâiha le zôngte hai le vahrohai an irkat ngai a ni.
Reng Solomona chu rêng danghai nêkin ar chonga, a vâr khom a ivâr ual a ni.
Pathianin a kuang vârna a ipêk kha irchu hrangin ram tina mihaiin an hong ipan ngai a ni.
A kuanga hong murdihaiin sumru le rângachaka siam, puan mani, râl doina neinun, mosola, sakor, le sakor puak pêl theihai an hong ipêk ngai a ni. Hiang hin a kum tin an ipêk ngai a ni.
Solomona’n sakor tâli sângkhat irzaminli le sakor chung chuang thei sîngkhat sânghni a neia. Senkhat chu Jerusalema a siaa, a danghai chu khopui hmun da danga a siahaia,
An lal sûng chu sumru chu lungtehret anga tamin Jerusalema khan a tama. Sidar thing khom mual puia bit angin a bit khak a ni.
Rengin mi a idônhai khan Musri le Kue ata sakor an thon suaka;
Aigupta rama sakor tâli an thon sa. Hit mi le Suria rênghai kuang sakor tâli inkhatin sumru irzaruk le sakor inkhatin sumru irzakhat sômringa’n an izuar a ni.
Solomona’n Faroa nâinu dok ni loiin nam dang dôngmatehai lung ar thungpuihaia, dôngma hrangin Moab mi, Amon mi, Edom mi, Sidon mi le Hit mihai dôngma’n a neihaia.
Solomona’n rêng nâi irzasari dôngma’n a neia, lâksîr irzathum a neihai sa, a dôngmahaiin an ihruai insual tâk a ni.
A hong tar hnungin chu, a dôngmahaiin an pathian biak hrangin an ihruai tâk a ni, a pa Davida ang khan
Sidon mihai pathiannu Asterothi le Amon mihai pathian intirom tak Milkoma chu a izui a ni ta.
Solomona’n
Jerusalem nisua tianga Moab mihai pathian intirom tak Khemosa biakna hmun a siama, Amon mihai pathian intirom tak Milkoma biakna khom a siam saa.
Nam dang mi a inei, a dôngmahai pathian kuang mirimhoi hâlna le irbôlna hmunhai a siam pehaia.
Solomona’n

chu Solomona chunga a sate’n a ning an mura, a kuang, “Nangma leh ei thuthung chu êsêl takin nin siata, ki thupêkhai zôm ta mak chea, khasikin ram chu nang sutpai nôk ki ta, ni mihai laia mi inkhat kuang pe ni ta a tih ti nang ki hril.
Khannisianlân, ni pa Davida zârin ni dam sûng chu ni no nia, ni nâipa roirêl sûngin kha thil kha chu inlangtir ki ti.
Ram pumpui nang sut zit no ninga, ki siahlo Davida le ki ta hranga ki inding Jerusalem sikin nam inkhat chu la chang a ti,” a tia.
matona khan Davida le Edom mihai an irdoia, Davida sipai ulian Joaba chu an mi thathai phûm hrangin a hong fea.
Joaba le a sipaihai chu Edom rama tha ruk an oma, kha hmuna an om sûngin pasal murdi chu an thathai vinga.
Hadada chu a pa siahlohai leh Aigupta rama an rota, nâipangte a la ni sikin.
Midian ram an suaksana, Paran-ah an fea, mi senkhatin an zuia, Aigupta-a an oma, rêngin an omna hrang ram, in le loi fâk le nêk hrang a pêkhaia.
Hadada chu rêngin a tûng zoi sikin rêngnu Tahpenesi urêngnu chu Aigupta rêngin dôngma’n an neitira.
A dôngma khan nâipasal Genubata a neipuia, rêng nâi danghai angin rêngnu khan a enkola.
Davida thi thurchi le sipai ulian Joaba thi thu Hadada’n Aigupta ram ata a len hriata, rêng kuang khan, “Kin rama nin fetir nôk ta ro,” a tia.

Reng khan, “Imo ni iti na?” “Imo a’rsam ti ni inhriat, nin rama fe ni irzuk,” a tia. Hadada’n, “Ite ual chu irsamna nei ma ung; Khannisian, nin fetir ta hi ro,” a tia. Edom rêng Hadada chu Israelhai râl inhnê intak tak a hong ni ta.
Pathianin Eliada nâipa Rezona chu Solomona an hmumâktira, Rezona chu a pa Hadadezera, Zoba rêng kuang ata a rota.
Irhel pôlhai hruaitu a chang tâka, hi hi Davida’n Hadadezera an hnêa, a râlhai le a mihai chu an suaka, Damaska khuaa an oma, a zuituhai khan Suria ram rêng hrangin an inkunga,
Solomona dam sûng chu Israelhai râl a ichang a ni ta.
Solomona doitu mi dang inkhat chu a hnungzui laia mi Jeroboama, Nahata nâipa, Efraima ram Israel khua mi, a nu chu Zeruii, meithâi a ni.
A tehelzong lam chu hiang hin a ni, Solomona’n Jerusalem nisua tiang ram a lua inbita, kulhai a siam insata,
Jeroboama chu ruatharte feltak le takirtâi tak a nih ti inhriatin Manasea bial le Efraima bial sûnga sinthotuhai enkol hrangin a hmanga.
Sûn khat chu Jerusalem ata Jeroboama chu a honga, Silo khua ata hong deipu Ahija le ram hnuaia an irtoka.
Ahija’n a songkol irfual a khek pea, Jeroboama kuang inhni inchangin ar ekthêr pea,
Jeroboama kuang, “Thêr sôm hi nangin la ro;
Ki siahlo Davida zârin Israel ram pumpui ki ta hrang bîka ki inhlan, Jerusalem sikin nam inkhat chu chang ri se.
Ama’n chu Sidon mihai pathiannu Asterothi hai, Moab mi pathian Khemosa, Amon mi pathian Milkoma hai zômin, ki lampuia irlôiin, le ki mihai mithmua thil dik a tho no sikin,
khannisian Solomona chu ram pumpui chu sut ving no ninga, ki siahlo Davida ki inthang le ki dân thupêkhai zômtu sikin a dam sûng chu inlaltir ki ta.
A nâipa kut rengata ram chu sutpai ni a ti, nam sômkhat nang pe ki ta.
Nam khat chu a nâipa pe ki ti, an ni biakna hranga ki inthang Jerusalem khuaa Davida irchihaiin roirêl an ti.
“Nangma rêk chu ram liantak chunga roirêl ni ta, Israelhai rêngin om ni ti.

Ki siahlo Davida anga, ki thu zôma, ki dân ngîka, ki mithmua satakin ni omin chu ni kuang om mai ki ta, Israelhai rêngin nang phun ki ta; Davida kuanga ki inkung angin, nir chihaiin ni hnunga khom roirêl mai an ti.
Solomona sualna sikin Davida irchihai chu dengintheitirhai ki ti, kumtuangin chu ni ual no ni,” a tia.
Solomona khan Jeroboama chu that a tum tâka, Jeroboama chu Aigupta rêng Sisaka kuang a rota, Solomona thi mâka chu a iom a ni ta.
Solomona thurchi dang, a sin thôna le a vârna thuhai chu Solomona thurchi irziakna bua a chuanga.
Israel ram pumpuia kum sômminli sûng Jerusalema roi a rêla.
Solomona chu a thia, a pa Davida khopuia an phûma, a nâipa Rehoboama chu a pa irthûlin an lal nôk ta a ni.
Rehoboama chu Sekem khuaa a fea, kha hmuna khan rêng inthang hrangin Israel hmâr tianga omhai an irbukkhôma.
Nebata nâipa Jeroboama chu Solomona a chi sikin Aigupta rama a rota, a thi ti thu inhriatin a hong nôk tâka.
Hmâr tianga Israelhai khan an va pana, Rehoboama hai leh an fe suam tâka, a kuang khan,
“Ni pa khan chu a sân a ni hmanga, kin phur a nin riktir pe ok ngaia, nangma’n chu ni ni hmang khomin kin phur nin zâng pe ualin lân, nin khua le tuia om kin ti,” an tia.
Rehoboama khan, “Sûn thum zoia zuang nôk unglân,” a tia. Mipuihai chu an chîn ta.
Reng Rehoboama’n a pa Solomona dam laia a iompui ulianhai ar donhaia, “Hi mihai hi itin mo ki iti pehai hrang?” a tia.
Anni khan, “Hi mihai hi sataka enkol ni nuamin chu, an izong hi satakin donhaiin lân, khanchu ni ta hrangin iamom takin kumtuangin om an tih tiin,” an sâma,
ulianhai ihril kha pom nuam maka, thoithar, ama rualhai ar donhai nôka.
“Hi mihai hi kin phur nin zângtir pe ual ro tihai hi, itin mo ki iti pehai hrang?” a tia.
Ama rualhai thoitharhaiin chu, “Hihai hin, ni pa khan kin phur a nin riktir pea, nangma’n nin zângtir pe ual roh tihai hi, hiang hin ti pehai ro; ki kutte khom hi ka pa kong nêkin chu ngar ual a ti.

Ka pa’n nin phur a inriktir a ni’n chu, keima len vângin chu kha nêka rik nang ni bôk pe nôk ki ti. Hmolin nangni a vîkin chu, keima’n chu, sakor isep angin nin chunga chuangin nangni sep ki ti,” ti roh an ti pea.
Sûn thum zoia chu Jeroboama le Israel mihai chu Rehoboama iti angin an hong pan nôka.
Reng khan ulianhai iti pe chu zôm nuam maka, kha mihai kha henhrum takin a le’rkôkhaia.

A rualhai iti ang khan, kha mihai kuang khan, “Ka pa khan nin phur a inriktir ok a ni mo? keiin chu nangni bôk pe sa ki ti, hmolin nangni a vîka, keiin chu sakor isep chung chuang irchu angin nangni soisak ki ti,” a tia.
Silo khuaa deipu Ahija Nebata nâipa’n Jeroboama kuanga a ihril kha a tak a chang theina hrangin
Israel mihai khan rêngin an thu irngai pehai mah ti an inhriatin chu rêng kha an irdona.
“Davida rama imo kin dongtum hrang?
Jesaia irchihai laia imo kin dongtum nei hrang?
Davida irchihai chu an om balamin om ri sehai,”
an tia.
Israel mihaiin chu an in tiang an rotsana.
Judai rama Israel mi omhai chunga vai Rehoboama chu an lal tâka.

Reng Rehoboama chu sintho hranga a ihmanghai hruaitu Adonirama chu Israelhai koi hrangin a tîra. Ama chu lung leh an lei dêng that ti an hriatin chu Rehoboama chu a tâlia a chuanga, Jerusalem tianga intânin a fea.
Kha tena chu hmâr tiang rama om Israel mihai chu Davida irchihai lai ata atûn ten hin tehel an izong tâk a ni.
Israel mihaiin, Jeroboama chu Aigupta ram ata a hong ti an inhriatin chu, an irbukkhômna ngaia an koia ama chu Israelhai rêng hrangin an siam ta. Juda namhai vai kêng Davida tianga om an ni ta.

Reng Rehoboama Jerusalem a tungin chu, Benjamina mi le Juda mihai laia sipai hrâttak takhai nuaikhat sîngriat (1,80,000) a bukhaia. Hmâr tianga om Israelhai chu ama hnuaia om hranga doi hrangin ar siampuihaia.
Khannisian, Pathian mi Simeia kuang khan,
Juda rêng Solomona nâipa Rehoboama kuang khan, Juda nam pumpui le Benjamina namhai le mi dang omhai kuang,
Israel rêng Jeroboama’n Efraima tâng rama Sekem khua kha irkulin, zoro sôtnote a oma. A suak nôka, Penuel khua chu a’rkul nôka.
Jeroboama’n chu, “Ram hi Davida in sûng mihaiin lua nôk ta ri sehai mani! ti’n an chonga;
Mihai chu Jerusalema

Khaanga thil ar ngaitua zoiin chu, rângachakin sehrâtte irlim inhni a siama, a mihai kuang khan, “Nin ta hrangin Jerusalema fe mai mai nangni an tak pe hrang sikin, hi hi nin Pathian, Aigupta ram ata nangni hruai suak kha a ni hi,” a tia.
Khan inkhat chu Bethel-a a siaa, inkhat dang chu Dana a siaa.
Mihaiin Bethel le Dan khuaa fein thil an lei tho’nsual tâka.
Jeroboama’n chu, tâng sîphaia Pathian biakna hmun a siama, Levi irchi khom ni loi, a inunuam ochai hrangin an thanghai tâka.

Jeroboama’n chu Judai rama kût an inei ngai angin, tha riatna ni sûn sôm sûn ringa ni sûn chu, kût hmang ni sûn an danga. Bethel maichâma khan, rângachaka siam sehrâtte kutsinhai kuang khan ar bôl tâka. Tâng sîp irbôlna hmuna ochaihai a isia ang khan Bethel-a khan ochaihai a siahaia.
A tha riatna sûn sôm sûn ringa ni sûn Israel mipuihai hranga sûn inkung kût ni khan Bethel-a a fea. Maichâma khan irbôlna thil an hlan ta.
Jeroboama chu maichâm bula thilinhlan hranga a ngîr laiin,
Deipu khan a sunzom maia, hi maichâm hi khoiphat a ta, a chunga meirivâm khom indarh ving a ti. Khanchu
Bethel-a maichâm chu Pathian mi’n ar kôk a nih ti rêng Jeroboama’n an hriatin chu, maichâm bul ata a va’rkôka, “Chelpai roi,” a tia. Kha zela khan rêng kut chu châng thei maka, inban thei ta maka.
Maichâm chu a’rphaltir hlanga, meirivâm chu
Reng Jeroboama’n deipu kuang khan, “Lungkham takin
Reng khan deipu kuang, “Ki ina hongin lân, ki kôla fâk nêk zong ro; khanchu lômman nang pe ki ti,” a tia.
Deipu khan rêng kuang, “Ni sum a chimrip ni ni pêk hrang khomin, ni ina chu hong no ning, ite fâk nêk khom fa no ning.
khan ite fâka in loi hrang le ki hongna khom kîr loi hrangin a ni ti a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu Bethel panna a hongna lampui tiang fe loiin a dang tiang a fe ta.
Deipu tar inkhat hi Bethel-a khan a oma. A nâipa inkhatin kha nia Judai ram ata deipu hong Bethel-a a sintho le rêng Jeroboama kuanga a thuhrilhai chu an sîr pea.
Deipu tar khan a nâihai kuang, “kho tiang mo a ife tâk kha,?” a tia. A fena lampui an inhrila,
Sakuartung kha irsiamtir roi a tia, a fena hrang an irfûktir pe zoiin chu;
Judai ram ata deipu hongpa chu a’rzûl tâka. Ama chu Sesua thing dâihlim hnuaia a lei toia, “Judai rama deipu kha mo ni ni?” a tia. Ama khan, “O ki ni” a tia.
Deipu tarpa khan, “Hongin lân ki ina bu hong ne ro,” a tia.
Judai rama deipu khan, “Nangma leh hmunkhata fe zât ni ma unga, ni kôla bu anh fâk zât khom ni ma ung.
ite fa loi hrang le ki hongna lampui tiang kîr loi hrangin a ni iti kêng,” a tia.
Bethel-a deipu tarpa khan a kuang, “Kei khom nangma ang dênin deipu ki nia,
Judai rama deipu khan deipu tarpa chu a zuia, a kuang bu a nêkpui ta.
Bu a nêk laiin
Judai ram ata hong deipu kuang khan, “
Ni kîr nôka, fâk nêk zong loi hrang a itihna hmuna ni fâk ni nêk sikin thi ni ta, ni ruak chu ni in mihai thâna phûm ni no ni,” a tia.
An nêk zoiin chu, deipu tarpa khan Judai rama deipu chuangna hrang sakuartung ar fûk pea.
An chuangtira, lampuia kâmkeibaknei a va’rtokpuia, a lei sêthat ta. A ruak chu lampuia a lei thal raka, a kôla sakuartung le kâmkeibakneihai an ngîra.
Lampuia mi irlôihaiin a ruak chu an hmua, kâmkeibaknei a kôla nghâkpu leh khan, Bethel khuaa an van tâna, an thil hmu chu an insîr ta.
A lei hruaitu deipu tarpa khan an hriatin chu, “E,
A nâihai kuang khan, “Ki Sakuartung kha chuangna hrang ni hong sin siam pe roi,” a tia. An sinsiam pe zoiin chu,
an tâna deipu pa ruak lampuia a thal rak chu a va hmua, sakuartung le kâmkeibaknei lei ngîr a hmuhaia, kâmkeibakneiin deipu ruak chu fa viat maka, sakuartung khom ite lei ti viat ma.
Deipu tarpa khan a ruak chu a tuama a sakuartung chunga a chôia, Bethel-a phûm hrangin.
Deipu tarpa khan, a in mihai thâna a phûma, “O ki urêngpa, ki urêngpa,” tiin a nâihai leh an châa.
An irvûi zoiin chu a nâihai kuang khan, “Ki thi tena chu hi thâna hin kei khom ni phûm unglân hi pa kôla hin nin zâltir roi, a tia.
thupêk Bethel maichâm thu le Samari irbôlna hmun thurchi a lei insîrhai chu a hong itung indik ngêt hrang a ni,” a tia.

Israel rêng Jeroboama’n a nunchan sualna ata irlet nuam loiin, mi narânhai lai ata a maichâm siam ata sinthopui hrang deipu tharhai a siamhaia. Deipu chang nuam murdi’n hmun irsânga sintho hrangin a tihaia.
Hi thil sual a ithohai hin, ama siatna le ar chihai dêna irhmangna a intung ta a ni.
Jeroboama nâipa Abija chu dam loiin a oma,

Jeroboama’n a dôngma kuang khan, “Ki dôngma ni nih ti tûte’n nang an inhriat thei loina hrangin irvo danglamin tho’n lân, Israel rêng ki ichang hrang thu ni hriltu deipu Ahija Silo khuaa om kuang son va fe’n lân,
bai tiam sôm le kêk tômte le khuaitui chînte chôi pe’n lân, ei nâipa om hrang lam hi nang lan hril thei a ti,” a tia.
A iti angin a dôngma chu Silo khuaa Ahija ina a va fea. Ahija chu a lei tar tâk sikin len fel thei ta maka.
khan Ahija kuang, “Jeroboama dôngma a nâi dam loi thu irdon hrangin a honga, hiang hin lei ti pe roh. Mi papai angin irvo danglam pai a ni,” a tia.
Inkhâra a hong lût irhâi Ahija’n a len hriatin chu, “Hong lût ro, Jeroboama dôngma kha mo ni mak che? Ithoa irvo danglam mo ni ni? Thurchi saloi tak nang len hril rong,” a tia.
Fe’n lân,
Davida-hai in mi ramhai nang ki lâk pea, ipêk ni nia, khannisian, Davida angin om mak chea, ama’n chu ki thupêkhai a zôma, a dik takin a ni zuia, ki mithmua thil dik a tho ngaia.
Nang chu ni matona mihai nêkin ni sual uala; ki itheimâk tak, pathian danghai, millimhai siamin ni ni mâksana.
Hitak sik hin nir chia pasal nâi om murdi nâite ata ulian dênin inram ving ki ti, sahrok phît infâi angin nir chihai phît infâi la ni a ti.
Jeroboama urênghai, khopuia thihai ruak chu uihaiin fa an ta, ram danga thihai ruak chu chunglêng vahaiin hrût an ti, hi hi
“Nang khom fe’n lân, khua ni lût chakin ni nâi chu thi a ti,
Israel mi murdi’n châ an ta, phûm an ti, Jeroboama in mihai laia chu ama vai hi
Jeroboama-hai in sûngkua inhekpai hrangin
Israelhai chu soisakhai a ta, tuipui kôla phâiruang kung angin inhnîng sup sup an ti. Israel mihaiin pathiannu Aseri irlimhai an siama,
Israelhai chu Jeroboama’n a hruai sualhai sikin,
Jeroboama dôngma chu Tirza khua tiang a kîr nôka, in sûng a va tung le zel a nâi chu a thi pe ta a ni.
siahlo Ahija’n a lei ihril tâk angin Israel mihaiin nâipang chu an châ tâka, an iphûm a ni ta.
Jeroboama thurchi dang chu a râl doina, le a roirêl dânhai chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna bua a chuang.
Jeroboama chu kum sômhni inhni sûng an lala, a thia phûmin a oma, a nâipa Nadaba khan a hmun a lua nôk ta.
Solomona nâipa Rehoboama chu kum sômminli kum khat a ni leh Judai rama an lal irphuta. Israel pumpuiin ama biakna hmun hrang
Juda mihai chu
Millim pathian biakna hmun tamtak an siama, tâng sîphai le thing hnuai haia, lung saloi le pathiannu Aseri irlimhai an phuna.

Khahai nêka la sual ual chu an millim siam laia nupang le pasal enhoi loitaka an om laihai siamin an oma, Israel nâihai Kanaan rama an hong lûta an inhriat suakhai nam an omdân saloi murdi chu Judahai hin an irchu tâk a ni.
Reng Rehoboama inlal kum ringana Aigupta rêng Sisaka khan Jerusalem a doia.
Reng Rehoboama’n kha pho an ilâkpai pehai irthûlin dâr thîrin pho a siam nôka, rêng in enkoltu kuta a pêkhaia.
Reng khan
Rehoboama thurchi danghai le a sin thôna thu chu Juda rênghai thurchi irziakna bua a chuang.
An lal sûngin Rehoboama le Jeroboama chu an irdoi maia.
Rehoboama chu a thia, Davida khopuia an phûma, a nu chu Naami, Amon mi a ni. A nâipa Abija’n a ithûl nôk a ni.
Nebata nâipa Jeroboama, Israelhai rêng chu kum sômhleiriat an lal kumin, Judai rama Abija khom an lala.
Jerusalema kum thum an lala, a nu chu Maaki, Absaloma nâinu a ni.
A pa angin thil sual a thoa, a pu Davida inhlan angin a lungrîl chu
Khannisianlân, Davida zârin
Hit mi, Uria chunga thil saloi a tho ti no chu Davida’n a dam sûngin
Abija roirêl sûng chu Jeroboama leh an irdoi maia.
Abija thurchi dang, a sinthohai chu Juda rêng thurchi irziakna bua a chuang.
Abija chu a thia, Davida khopuia an phûma, a nâipa Asa chu a pa irthûlin an lal nôk ta.
Israel rêng Jeroboama inlal kum sômhni a niin, Asa chu Judai rama an lala.
Kum sômminli inkhat Jerusalema an lala, a pi chu Absaloma nâinu Maaki a ni.
Ama khom a pu Davida angin
Millim pathian biakna hmuna nupang le pasal irzuar mihai chu an hnotsuakhaia, a puhaiin millim pathian an isiam murdi an siatpai pehaia.
A pi Maaki’n Aseri irlim intirom tak a phun sikin rêngnu a initna ata a paia. Asa’n millim pathianhai chu a tukirkithaia, Kidron phâiruama a hâla.
A ram sûnga pathian dang an ibiakna ngai hmun murdi khom rêng Asa hin an siat pehai zoi no khomin, khannisianlân, a dam sûng chu
A pa’n Pathian kuanga a thilpêk murdi chu Asa hin tempila a siaa, ama kut ngêtin rângachak le sumru a inhlan chu a siaa.
Juda rêng Asa le Israel rêng Baasa chu an inlal sûng an irdoi maia.
Israel rêng Baasa’n Judai ram a hong doia, Judai ram ata mi an zuang suaka, mi dang Judai rama an lût thei loina hrangin Ramah khuaa kul a siama.

Asa’n tempil sum thunna rengata le rêng ina rângachak le sumruhai chu a lâksuaka, Damaska khuaa om Suria rêng Benhadada kuang a thona. Benhadada chu Heziona tupa, Tabrimona nâipa a ni. A mi tîrhai khan hiang hin an hrila.
“Ka pa le ni pa an irkop ang khan, en roh rângachak le sumru nang ki hong thon. Israel rêng Baasa le rual nin irchangna hi teipuiin lân, ei ram sûnga sipaihai hruai paihai ri se,” a tia.

Benhadada’n Asa iti pe angin a lei pompuia, a sipai ulian a koia, a sipaihaiin Israel ram chu an rûnhaia. Ijon hai, Dan hai, Abela Beth Maaka hai an lâka, Galili dîl kôla ramhai khom Naftalia bial pumpui an lâkpai pehai tâka.
Kha thu kha rêng Baasa’n an hriatin chu Ramah khuaa a kul siam chu a’rngama, Tirza khuaa a om ta a ni.
Reng Baasa’n Ramah khuaa a kul siama lung le thing a ihmanghai chu va la hrangin Asa’n Juda rama mihai chu an phûthaia. Benjamina biala Geba le Mizpa khua kul siamna hrangin a hmanga.
Reng Asa sin tho dang, a hâi lamhai, khua a irkul lamhai chu Juda thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuanga. A tar tiang chu a kea natna saloi irveiin kalchôi thei loi bokvâkin a oma.
Asa chu a thia, Davida khopui rêng irphûmna hmuna an phûma, a nâipa Jehosafata chu ama irthûlin an lal nôk ta.
Judahai rêng Asa inlal kum hnina rengata chu rêng Jeroboama nâipa Nadaba chu Israel rama an lal nôka, kum hni roi a rêla.
A pa ang ngêtin
Ahija nâipa Baasa Isakara nam a inei khan Nadaba chu a huanga a sipaihai leh Filistia rama Gebethon khuaa an om lai takin Baasa’n Nadaba chu a thata.
Juda rêng Asa inlal kum thumna chu Baasa’n Nadaba chu a thata, ama irthûlin Israel rama an lal tâka.
Reng a hong chang zoi le zel Jeroboama in mihai chu a thathai vinga.
Jeroboama thil saloi tho sikin, Israelhai chu a hruai insualhaia, kha thua khan
Nadaba thurchi dang, a sintho murdi chu, Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Judahai rêng Asa le Israel rêng Baasa chu an inlal sûng an irdoi mai a ni.
Juda rêng Asa inlal kum thumna Ahija nâipa Baasa chu Israel mihai chunga an lala, Tirza khuaa kum sôminhni kum minli roi a rêla.
mithmua thil sual a thoa, Jeroboama angin Israelhai hruai insualtu a ni.
Baasa chungchâng, deipu Jehua, Hanania nâipa kuang, hiang hin
“Ite bêa ibe ngai loi chu, Israelhai roirêltu hrangin nang kin thang. Atûn hin Jeroboama angin thil saloi tho’n ki mi Israelhai hruai suala, an sualna’n ki ning an inmurtir ta a ni.
Khasikin, Nahata nâipa Jeroboama in sûng mihai laia ki itho angin, ni in mi murdi nangni inboipai ving ki ti.
Nin in mi khopui sûnga thi chu uihaiin fahai an ta, ramkâra thi chu chunglêng vahaiin irsemdarh an ti,” a tia.
Baasa thurchi dang, a sin thôna le a hâi lamhai chu Israelhai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Baasa chu a thia, Tirza khuaa an phûma, a nâipa Ela chu ama irthûlin an lal ta.
Baasa le a in mihaiin,
Juda rêng Asa kum sômhni kiruk an lal tena chu Baasa nâipa Ela chu Israel rama an lal nôka. Tirza khuaa kum hni an lala.
A rualhai laia mi inkhat Zimria, a tâli hmang laia hruaitu hranga a isia pa chu tehel a zong pea, kha laia khan Ela chu Tirza khuaa om a nia. Reng in enkoltu Arza ina zu a len rui pea.
Zimria chu in sûnga a va lûta Ela chu a thata, ama irthûlin an lala. Kha thu kha Juda rêng Asa inlal kum sômhni sarina kuma a ni.
Zimria khan rêngtoihmun a luaa, a pa Baasa in mihai a thathai nôk vinga, pasal a urêng sûngsuak tûte hôi nei viat loiin,
Baasa chungchânga deipu Jehua kuang
Millim pathian an biaka, Israelhai an hruai insual sikin Baasa le a nâipa Ela khan
Ela sintho murdi chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Judahai rêng Asa kum sômhni kum sari an lal kumin, Zimria chu Tirza khuaa sûn sari Israelhai chunga an lala, Israel sipaihaiin Filistia khuaa Gibethon chu an irhuala.
Zimria khan rêng chu a khit phiara, a thatpai ti an inhriatin chu, an khua irhualtuhai khan, an riakhmun zela khan an hruaitupa Omria chu Israel rêng an inchangtir zela.
Omria le a kôla mi om murdihai khan Gibethon chu an rotsan tâka, Tirza khua an hong irhual nôk a ni.
Khua kha an hong rûn ti Zimria’n an hriatin chu, rêng in sûng rîla an tân lûta, irkalkhum pumin a ikâng that a ni.
mithmuin thil a tho insual sikin, Jeroboama lampui a hroa, Israelhai hruai sualna sikin thil chu a chunga a itung a ni ta.
Zimria thurchi dang, ikhit phiar a tuangnahai thurchi chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Israel mipuihai chu pôl hniin an irsema, a chimriphaiin Ginata nâipa Tibnia chu rêng inchang nuam pôl an oma, a chimripin Omria zui pôl an om nôka.
Omria zuituhaiin Ginata nâipa Tibnia zuituhai chu an inhnêhaia. Tibnia chu a thia, Omria a hong inlal tâka.
Judahai rêng Asa inlal kum sôm thum inkhatna kumin Omria chu a hong inlal phuta, kum sômhleihni an lala, a maton tianga kum ruk sûng chu Tirza khua a opa.
Semera kuang ata Samari tânga sumru sângruk leh a’rchôka, kha hmuna khan khopui an dinga, kul a siama, kha tâng neitu irhming Semera chôiin a khua irhming khom Samari a tia.
Omria’n
Nebata nâipa Jeroboama omdân saloi murdi a lâka, Israelhai chu a hruai sualhai a nia, an millim biakhai sik ualin
Omria thurchi dang, a sinthotheiziahai chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Omria chu a hong thi tâka, Samari khuaa an phûma, a nâipa Ahaba chu a pa irthûlin an lal nôk ta.
Judahai rêng Asa chu kum sômthum kiriat a hong inlal kumin Omria nâipa Ahaba chu Israelhai chunga an lala, Omria nâipa Ahaba chu Samari khuaa kum sômhleihni a ophaia;
Omria nâipa Ahaba’n a matona rênghai nêkin thilsual a tho nôk uala,
Nebata nâipa Jeroboama angin sual mai a nuam sikin, Sidon rêng Ethbaala nâinu Jezebeli chu dôngma’n a neia, Baal pathianhai a biakpui tâka.
Samari khuaa Baal pathian maichâm an dinga, Baal biakna hrang in a sina,
Ahaba’n Asera millim a phuna, a matona Israel rêng murdihai nêkin
Ahaba inlal laiin Bethel mi Hidaia’n Jeriko khua an ding thar nôka; Nuna nâipa Josua kuang
Gilead rama Tisbe mi Elija’n Ahaba kuang khan, “
thu chu Elija kuang a zuang tunga.
“Hi hmun ata hi suakin lân, nisua tiang fe’n lân, Jordan nisua tiang Kerit tui kôla irbi roh.
Vadunga tui chu tûng thei ni ti, nang an fâ hrangin vaâkhai thu ki pêkhai ta,” a tia.
iti angin a thoa, Jordan nisua tiang Kerit tui chu a pana a om tâka.
Zîng le khohloia vaâkhaiin bai le hme an hong pêk ngaia, vadunga tuihai inin a oma.
Kha rama khan rua a tho ta no sikin vadung tui khom a kang zoi tâka.
Khan,
“Thoiin lân Sidon biala Zarefat khuaa fe’n lân, kha khan om ro, nang an fa hrangin meithâi inkhat nang kin thang pe ta,” a tia.
Zarefat khuaa khan a fe tâka; kha kul mikot a va tungin chu, meithâi inkhat hin thing a lei tana, kha meithâinu kha a hon sama, “Tui chînte nin sua pein lân lei in rong,” a tia.
Pe hrangin a hei fein chu, “Lungkham takin bai chînte ni hong chôi pe sa ro,” a ti nôka.
Meithâinu khan, “
Elija’n, “Ni charindong no ro, inhongin lân, nin fâk hrang chu va siam roh. Khannisianlân, bai a chînte a ni khomin ni siam pe bakin lân, ni hong pe ro, a dang chu ni nâipa leh la fa ta roi,” a tia.
Israelhai Pathianin hiang hin a ti; “Rua kin thotir mâka chu baidi omna hmun chu rong no nia, sahriak bûr khom châr no nih a iti kêng,” a tia.
Meithâinu chu a fea, Elija ihril angin a va tho pea, khanchu an rênga fâk hrang sûn tamtaka hrangin a lei om pea,
Elija kuanga a iti angin baidi siana bêl chu rong maka, sahriak bûr khom châr maka.
Kha hnung chu meithâinu nâipa dam maka, a na an rik pe sisita, a thipui tâka.
Meithâinu khan Elija kuang khan, “Pathian mi, itho mo hianga ni ni ilo? Pathian kuang ki sualna târinlang hrang le ki nâipa that hranga ni ihong kêng a ni hi te,” a tia.
Elija’n, “Ni nâipa chu ni hong pe hi ro,” a tia, a nu ipominkua chu a hruaia, a omna hmuna pomin a lûtpuia, a zâlhmuna an zâltira.
Khanchu inring takin a chongchaia, “O
Khanchu nâipang chunga khan voithum an boka, a chongchaia, “O
khan Elija chongchaina chu a sâma nâipang chu a hong har suaka, a dam nôk ta.
Elija khan nâipang kha a nu kuang a fepui nôka, a kuang khan, “Hi ni nâipa chu a dam nôk ta,” a tia.
Meithâinu khan, “Pathian mi ni nia,
Kum thum ten khua a châr zoiin chu, “Ahaba kuang fe ro, rua inthotir hrang ki ni a ti, va ti ro,” a tia.
Elija chu Ahaba kuang a va fea, Samari rama a sate’n châm a tâka,
Khan, Ahaba’n rêng in enkoltu Obadia a koia, ama hi
Jezebeli’n

Ahaba’n Obadia kuang khan, “Tho vadung murdi chaiin tui la va zong rei ba, sakor le saringseihai hi ei saninhringhai theina hrangin hloisûl sana va zong ei ti; khano’nchu, ei sialhai hi ei inchânhai zoi hrang kêng,” a tia.
Khanchu an fena hrang ram chu an irzêka, Ahaba le Obadia chu mual da danga an fe tâka.
Obadia chu a fe maia, lampuia khan Elija a’rtongpui thuta, Obadia hin ama hi a len hriat ngaia, kûnin chubai a mûka, a kuang khan, “Ka pu Elija, nang mo ni ini?” a tia.
Ama khan “O keima ki ni, fe’n lân ni pu kuang Elija hin a om va ti ro,” a tia.
Khan Obadia’n, “Imo ki itho insual tâk, ni siahlo hin thi hranga Ahaba kuanga pêk ni itum?
ni Pathian hring sâmin nang ki hril, ka pu’n ramhai hi mi murdi’n an zong lai tak a ni. Hi hin om mah titu chu rêng in hmu ngai mahai a nih ti felna hrangin khomâk a irsâmtirhai ngai a ni.
Nangma rêkin chu, ka pu kuang fe’n lân, Elija kha hin kêng a om ti thu va hril hranga ni ni iti,” a tia.
Nang ki rotsan zoi le hin,
Ka pu hin Jezebeli’n, “
Atûn ka pu kuanga fea, Elija hin a om, ti thu va hril hranga ni ni iti hi chu a ni lei ithat nuam hrang a ni,” a tia.
Elija khan, “A sin ki itho ngai
Obadia chu Ahaba irhmupui hrangin a fea, a va hrila, Ahaba chu deipu Elija irhmupui hrangin a fe nôka.
Ahaba’n Elija a hmu’n chu a kuang, “Israel ram inbuaituhai mo ni lei iom?” a tia.
Elija’n, “Israelhai inbuai ngai ma ung, nangma le ni pa kêng an buaihai ngai nin ni.
Khasikin, Israel mi murdi ni hmupui hrangin Karmel tânga koihai ro; Baal deipu irzaminli sômringa le Asera deipu irzaminli Jezebeli infâhai kha hong hruaihai ro,” a tia.
Ahaba khan Israel ram murdia thang an theia, Baal deipuhai chu Karmel tânga a koihaia.
Elija chu mipui lai ata a ngîra, an kuang, “Sirirkain i dôr ten mo nin iom hrang?
Elija’n mipuihai kuang, “

Sechal inhni hong kai unglân, inkhat chu Baal deipuhai hrangin thathai sianlân; inchârin thing chunga sehai sian, hâl no ri sehai. Sechal dang chu keima’n sinsiam ki ta, thing chunga sia ki ta hâl ual no ning.
Nangni Baal deipuhaiin nin pathian koi nin ta, kei khom
Elija’n Baal deipuhai kuang khan, “Nangni nin tam ual sikin sechal hi sinsiam bak unglân nin pathian koi roi, a hâl chu hâl no roi,” a tia.
Khan, anni hranga sechal chu an lâka, an sinsiama, “O Baal ni zuang sâm ta ro,” tiin zîng ata sûn sôtin an khêka, an maichâm siam chu namhrualin an khêka. Khannisianlân, ite sâmhai maka.
Sûna chu Elija’n innuipumin, “khêk ual roi ba, Pathian a ini loi ma ni? a la insâp mani ramfe itin ma ni, aninole khual a inzin ma ni! a in irnghil mani, kaithoi roi ba,” a tia.
An khêk inring ual uala, an lei itho lam angin, chemte le ufeiin thisen suak rarakin an irvit phopa.
Misa kôlkai dênin irbôlna hmuna khêkin, tûte a sâmtu om loiin, ite irhâi inhriat hrang om loiin an oma.
Elija’n mipuihai kuang khan, “Hong nâi ual hi roi,” a tia. Mipuihaiin an va nâia,
Kha lung leh khan

Maichâm chunga khan thingher a siaa. Mipuihai kuang khan, “Sehrâtchal kha thatin thing chunga khan se unglân, Bêl minli vêl tui thun inbit unglân, hâlirvôm thilinhlan le thinghai hi buakkhum roi,” a tia.
An buakkhum vinga, voithum rak an buak irzo zoiin chu,
maichâm kôla tui siana a ichoi khom kha an buak irzo vinga.
Khohloi irbôlna zoroa chu deipu Elija’n maichâm chu a hong nâia, a chongchaia, “O
O
mei a zuang tîra, hâlirvôm thilinhlanhai le thing le lunghai chu a kâng irvôm vinga, irnêng khom sen vungin a kânga, khura tui khom an dôp inhekpaia.
Mipuihaiin kha thil kha an hmu’n chu irnênga an khûksadela, “
Elija’n mipuihai kuang khan, “Baal deipuhai tûte insuahai loiin chelpaihai ving roi,” a tia. An chelhaia, Elija’n Kison phâiruama a hruaihaia, khataka khan an thathai ving ta.
Elija’n Ahaba kuang, “Tho atûn chu fâkin in ta ro, rua zuang tho hrang a ni ta,” a tia.
Ahaba chu fâk nêk zong hrangin a fea. Elija chu Karmel tâng sîp panin a fea, hnuai tiang kûnin, ar khûk le ar khûk kâra a lu a siaa.
Khan a siahlo kuanga khan, “Fe suakin lân, tuikhanglian tiang thîr ro,” a tia. Khanchu a thoia, a hei thîr vêla; ite hmu ma ung a tia. Elija’n khaanga tho hrangin voisari vêl a tîra.

Voisari changna tena chu a siahlo khan, “Tuikhanglian rengata kuttum tiata sûm a hong so,” a tia. Elija’n a siahlo kuang khan, “Fe’n lân, Ahaba chu a tâli sinsiam lat sian suak lat hrangin va hril ro, ropuiin danna a ti,” a tia.
Sôtloite hnunga chu sûm dum irvân dâpin an langa, phâivua a hong thoa, ropuivânsâng a zuang thoa, Ahaba chu a tâli lâkin a chuanga, Jereel tiang intânin a fe ta.
sinthotheina khan Elija chunga a tunga, a songkol irfual chu a kong tiang a khit indeta, Jereel panin Ahaba khêlpaiin a fe ta.
Khan Ahaba’n Jezebeli kuang, Elija sintho murdi chu deipuhai khandaia a ithathai thu a hril.

Jezebeli’n Elija kuang khan, “Deipuhai chunga ni itho angin nangtûk, hiang zoro hin nang ki that no’n chu pathianhaiin an inuam angin ni lo ri sehai, a sate’n deng nin theitir ri sehai,” a tih tia hril hrangin mi a tîrhaia.
Khan Elija’n a chia, irbîkna a lei zonga, Judai rama Beerseba a hong tunga, a siahlohai a mâkhaia,
ama chu sûn sôtin ramchârna hmuna a oma, thing daihlîm hnuaia a toia, thi hrangin a’rzonga, “Inruk ta ma ung, o
Thing hnuaia toiin a in irnghil tâka, vântîrtônin a kaithoia, a kuang khan, “Thoiin lân fa ro,” a tia.
Khanchu a hei en vêla, a luthuna khan baitiam le tuiûm hi a lei oma. Khanchu a fâka, a ina, a zâl nôk tâka.
Khan
Khanchu a thoia a fâkin a ina, fâk a zong sikin a hong hrât uala, Pathian tâng Horeb a tung dênin sûn sômminli le zân sômminli lam a ni.
Kha hmuna rôl inkhata hin riak hrangin a lûta,
“Itinrênga hin
a kuang khan, “Hong suakin lân, tâng sîpa hin hongin lân,
Khan hnîngnu a tho zoiin chu mei a hong suaka, kha mei laia khom khan
Elija’n an hriatin chu a songkol irfual leh a hmâi a hîpa, rôl kotbâia hin imo ni itho? a tia.
Elija’n, “Itinrêng chunga
Nimsia nâipa Jehua khom kha Israel rêng hrangin sahriak pol roh. Khanchu Abel Mehola khuaa, Safata nâipa Elisa chu ni’rthûla deipu sintho hrangin sahriak pol sa roh.
Khan Hazaela khandai ata zôk murdi khom Jehua’n nangni that a ta, Jehua khandaia zôk khom Elisa’n nangni that a ti.
Khannisian, Israel rama hin Baal chubai la mûk ngai loi le la tum ngai loi mi sângsari, keima hrang hôi ki ti,” a tia.
Elija chu a suaka, Safata nâipa Elisa-hai khan sehrâtchal bop sômkhat inhni âl an lei inkaitirhaia, Elisa’n bop sômkhat inhnihai kha a hôlhaia. Elija’n a va pana, a puansil chu an siltira.

Khanchu Elisa’n a sialhai chu a mâksanhaia, Elija a zui ta. Elija kuang khan, “Ka nu le ka pa chubai va mûkhai bak ki ta, khanchu nang zui ki ti,” a tia. Elija khan, “Va fe ro, ni chunga ki thil tho kha nin hriat kha te?” a tia.

Elisa chu a hong kîr nôka a sialhai chu a thathaia, a sin thôna rua thinghai chu bu anh suangna’n a hmanga, a hme chu mihai semhaiin an fâka, kha hnung chu Elija zui hrangin a suaka, a sin a itho pe a ni ta.
Suria rêng Benhadada’n a sipaihai a bukkhôma, rêng sômthum inhnihaiin an sakor le tâlihai inhmangtirin tâ an sâna. Samari khua panin an idoihai phut a ni.
Ama’n khopui sûnga mi a tîra, Israel rêng Ahaba kuang khan,
“Ni irchongna murdi le nin dôngma le nin nâihai le irpe ta roi,” tiin a ngoa.
Khan Israel rêngin “O rêng inthang ka pu, ni iti angin keima le ki inei murdi hi ni ta a ni,” a tia.
Benhadada’n Ahaba kuang mi a tîr nôka, “Nin sumruhai le rângachak, nin dôngma le nin nâihai leh irpe roi ki ti nâkin,
nangtûk hiang zoro hin ki mihai zuang tîrhai ki ti; ni in le ni mi lian ualhaiin zuang irfang an ta, nin irchonhai nangni la pe an ti,” a tia.

Khanchu Israel rêngin a rama hruaitu murdi a bukkhômhaia, an kuang khan, “Hi mi hin ni that inhek ving a itum a nih ti nin inhriat, ki dôngma, ki nâihai, ki sumru le rângachak a ni nghia, pêk ki lei inkung a ni,” a tia.
Khan hruaituhai le mipuihaiin, “A hê la no’n lân, a izong ite pe no ro,” an tia.

Khanchu Ahaba’n Benhadada kuang mi a tîra, “Reng inthangtak ka pu kha hiang hin va hril ro, ni siahlo hin ni izong masa chu a sa ki tia, khannisian, inhnunga ni izong nôk hi chu nuam ma ung a tia” tiin mi a itîrhai khan an va hrila.

Khan Benhadada’n hiang hin a hong hril nôka, “Samari khua irhmangtir chit hrangin ki mi tamtak zuang tîr ki ta, ite inzôk no ni ung. Khaang khan ki tho no tâkin chu, Pathianhaiin an inuam angin ni soisak ri sehai” a tia.
Khan Israel rêngin, “Sipai hrâthai chu irdoi mân ni loiin, irdoi zoia kêng chong an la irpâk ngai ti va hril roi,” a tia.
Khan Benhada le a rual rêng danghai le an puan ina zu an in laiin, kha thu kha an inhriata, a sipaihai chu khopui doi ta hrangin thu a pêkhaia, an irsiam ta.
Kha laitaka khan, deipu inkhat hi rêng Ahaba kuang a honga, “
Khan Ahaba’n “Tu’n mo a ir-ôi hrang?” a tia. Deipu khan,
Khanchu Ahaba’n ram dang hruaitu hnuaia sipai hrât takhai a koi bukhaia, an rêngin irzahni sômthum an ni, Israel sipaihai khom a koi bukhaia, sângsari an ni.
Khan sûna irdoi an phuta Benhadada le a rual danghai rêng sômthum inhnihai chu an puan ina a sân an len ruia.
Ram dang hnuaia sipaihaiin an hong panhaia, Benhadada râl vêngtu khan, “Samari khua ata sipai an hong suak ta,” a tia.
Khan ama khan, “Irngeina thu hril hranga mo, a ni doi hranga mo an ini, a hringin lei chelpaihai roi,” a tia
Ram danga sipai irchunhai khan an doihaia, sipai a zuituhai leh khan,
mi tukhom an irdîna om chu an thathaia, Suriahai chu an intân tâka. Israelhai khan an irzûlhaia, Suria rêng Benhadada chu a sakor chung chuang zât senkhathai leh an intân suak hrâma.
Israel rêngin a va pana, sakor le tâlihai chu a doia, Suria mihai chu a thathai oka.
Khan, rêng Ahaba kuang deipu a honga a kuanga khan, “Fe’n lân sipai intam sa ro, irdîn takin thil irfûkpuihaiin lân, nakum sâla chu Suria rêngin nang doi nôk hrang a ni,” a tia.
Khan Suria rêng kuanga a hnung zuihaiin, “Israel Pathian chu tâng ram Pathian a nia, khasika ei inhnê loi a ni, phâizôla doi inlân chu inhnêhai ei ti,” an tia.
“Reng sômthum inhnihai kha an thuneina sutpaihaiin lân, an irthûl hrang mi dang pehai roh.

Khanchu sipai ni lei inchân ang dôr chie kha la thar nôkin lân; sakor le tâli ni inei dôr ngêt ang kha irsiamin lân, khanchu, Israelhai chu phâizôla doihai ei ta inhnêhai ngêt ta ei ti,” an tia. Khanchu Benhadada’n an iti angin a pompuihai tâka.
Khan kum nôk, sâla chu Benhadada’n a sipaihai a koi bukhaia, Israelhai doi hrangin Afek khuaa a fepuihaia.

Israelhai khom an irkoibuka, fâk hrang an sin siama. An hong suak tâka, Suriahai vaiin hmun hnia omhmun an khuara. Suriahai enin chu Israelhai chu kêltehai tômtea irbukkhôm ang an ni. Suriahai chu ram pumpuia an sip vinga.
Khan deipu inkhat hi Israel rêng Ahaba kuang a honga, “
Khan sûn sari sûng chu Suriahai le Israelhai chu an omhmun ata an irsiama, sûn sari nî tena chu an irdoi tâka. Israel sipaihai khan Suria sipai nuaikhat vêl sûn khatin an thathaia.
A la damhai chu Afek khua sûnga an intân lûta, a khua kulbang chimin sînghni sângsari a del thathai nôka; Benhadada chu khopui sûnga an tân lûta, a in ikil irthupnaa ar bîka.

Khan a mi la damhaiin a kuang khan, “Irngai roh Israelhai chu an nun a hoi ti thu kin inhriat, bora puan silin kin ringa hruizêlin, Israel rêng kuanga fe hrangin ni phal ro, khanchu nang an zôk khom a ni thei,” an tia.
Khanchu, bora puan sila hrui inhliin Israel rêng kuang an fea, “Ni siahlo Benhadada’n, lungkham takin nin zôk ri se a ti,” an tia. Ahaba’n, “A la idam chu ma ni? ki urêngpa kêng a ini,” a tia.
Khanchu mihaiin chonghoiin, “O ni urêngpa a ni,” an tia. Reng khan, “Va fe unglân hong hruai roi,” a tia. Benhadada chu a hong suaka, Ahaba’n a kuang, tâlia chuang hrangin a ti pea.

Khan Benhadada’n, “Ka pa’n ni pa khua a lei ilâk pehai chu nang pe nôk ki ta, ka pa’n sum irvaina hmun Samari khua a isiam ang khan Damaska khua siam ni ti,” a tia. Khan Ahaba’n, “Khaanga chonginkung tâk sikin nan sua ta ki ti,” a tia.
Khanchu deipu laia mi inkhatin
Deipu khan, “
Deipu khan, mi dang a va hmu nôka, “Ni hong vîk ro,” a ti nôka. Ama’n chu a satea nain a vîka, a pop ta.
Deipu khan, hmêl thupna’n a hmâi puan leh a tuama, Israel rêng hong hrang nghâkin lampuia a lei oma.

Khan rêng a hongin chu, deipu khan a len sama, “Ni siahlo hi irdoina hmuna ki fea, mi inkhatin râl a hong tuanga, ama hi ensui ro, a rotin chu ar thûl nangma nang that hrang, khano’nchu, tangka irzathum ni ichôi hrang, a ni tia.
Ni siahlo hin thil dang ki tho lai takin a ni lei rot pe tâka,” a tia. Israel rêngin, “Ni idik loi a ni, a mô chu nangin pêl ni ti,” a tia.
Kha renga khan deipu’n a mit tuamna a sûta, Israel rêng khan deipuhai laia inkhat kha a nih ti an hriat suak tâka.
Khanchu deipu’n rêng kuang khan, “
Khanchu Israel rêng chu a ning an mur pea, nuar pumin Samari khuaa a fe tâka.
Jereel khuaa Samari rêng Ahaba in kôla khan Jezreel mi Nabota an iti khan grep irhuan a neia.
Ahaba khan Nabota kuang, “Ni grep irhuan hi ansuangrua songna hrangin ni pe roh. Hi nêka sa grep irhuan nang pe ki ti, ni nuam paiin chu sum khom a’rphu lam tôkin nang pe sa ki ti,” a tia.
Nabota’n Ahaba kuang, “Kin puhai hun lai ata kin irchon a ni sikin, hianga nangma nang pêk hi chu
Jezreel mi Nabota’n, kin puhai irhuan irchon nang pe thei no ning a ti sikin ningmur puma nuarin a in tiang Ahaba chu a rota. Bang tianga irheiin a zâlhmuna a zâla bu khom ne nuam ta maka.
A dôngma Jezebeli a va fea a kuang khan, “Ithoa mo ni ngûirula bu ni inêk nuam loi?” a tia.

Ama khan, “Jezreel mi Nabota’n a grep irhuan nir chotir ro ki tia, ni nuam paiin chu hi nêka sa grep irhuan dang nang pe ki ti,” ki tia. Ama’n, “Ki grep irhuan dang nang pe thei no ning tiin a ni sâm sika a ni hi te,” a tia.
Khan a dôngma Jezebeli’n, “Thoiin lân, raifân takin bu ne ro, Jezreel mi Nabota grep irhuan ni lâk thei hrang dân nang ngaitua pe ki ti,” a tia.
Khanchu, Ahaba irhmingin lekha a’rziaka, irsinsiana an danga, Nabota omna khuaa ulian roirêltuhai a thona.
Hiang hin a’rziaka, “Bu nghei hrangin inpuang unglân, mipui koibûmin Nabota kha mipuihai makunga intoitir unglân,
mi sual inhni ama sêl hrangin a maton tiang inlôitirhai unglân, ‘Pathian le rêng nin sîrinsiat a ni,’ tiin sêlhai sian kho sûng ata hruaisuak unglân, dêng that roi,” tiin.
Khanchu, Nabota omna khuaa ulianhai le roirêltuhaiin Jezebeli’n a iti lam angin an thoa.
Bu nghei ni sûn an inpuanga, mipui an bukhaia, Nabota chu a laia an intoitira.
Mi sual inhni hin “Pathian le rêng an sîrinsiat a ni,” tiin an sêla. Nabota chu kho sûng ata an hruaisuaka, an dêng that ta.
Khanchu Jezebeli kuang khan, “Nabota chu a thi ta,” tiin an hrila.
Jezebeli’n Nabota an dêng that tah ti an hriatin chu, Ahaba kuang khan, “Thoiin lân Jezreel mi Nabota grep irhuan nang irchotir nuam loi kha, va nei ta ro, ama chu a thi ta,” a tia.
Khan Ahaba’n Nabota a thi tah ti an hriata a grep irhuan lua hrangin a suak tâka.
“Thoiin lân, Samari khuaa om Israel rêng Ahaba irhmupui hrangin fe roh. Atûna Nabota grep irhuan lua tumin kha khan a om.
A kuang
Khan Ahaba’n Elija kuang khan, “A ni inhriatsuak a ni ta hi te ki râlpa’n?” a tia. Elija’n, “O nang kin hriat ta,
Ni chunga siatna zuan tungtir ki ti. Nin in sûngkuaa patung nâi murdi chu nâipang le tar khom, nangma le nin rêngin nangni inhekpai ving ki ti.
Ni in mihai chu Nabota nâipa Jeroboama in mihai ang le Ahija nâipa rêng Baasa in mihai angin nangni soisak ki ti; ki ning nin murtira Israelhai ni hruai insualhai tâk sikin.
Ram hnuaia thi murdi chunglêng vahaiin fahai an ti,” a tia.
A dôngma Jezebeli’n thil saloi hrila
Israelhai kuanga,
Elija’n kha thu a hril zoiin chu Ahaba khan a puansil an potthêra, bora puan a sila, bu a ngheia, bora puan leh a zâla, ngûi takin a om tâka.
thu chu Tisbe mi Elija kuang a zuang tunga,
“Ahaba ki makunga a’rngaiintômzia hi nin hriat mo? hianga irngaiintôm sikin a dam sûng chu a chunga siatna intungtir pe no ning, a nâipa zoro sûnga a in mihai siatna intungtir ki ti,” a tia.
Kum thum sûng chu Suriahai le Israelhai irdoi loiin an oma.
Kum thum changna tena chu Judahai rêng Jehosafata’n Israel rêng Ahaba kuang a zu fea.
Israelhai rêng khan a ulianhai makunga, “Gilead rama Ramot khua hi kin ta a nia, itina mo Suria rêng kuang ata kin ilâk kîr loi?” a tia.
Jehosafata kuang khan, “Ramot khua hi ni doipui theiin mo?” a tia. Jehosafata’n Israel rêng kuang khan, “Nangma ni nuam ni tak ti ro, ki sipaihai leh nang doipui hrangin kin irsiam.
Khannisianlân,
Ahaba’n deipu irzaminli vêl a koibukhaia, “Ramot khua mo hong doi ning?” tiin ar donhaia. Anni khomin, “Doi roh
Jehosafata’n, “Deipu dang,
Israel rêngin Jehosafata kuang khan, “Imla nâipa Mika a om. Ama hin ite thil sa ni zong pe thei ngai ma, en nuam ma ung. Thil saloi kêng i zât ma ni a ihrilsuak rêk hrang,” a tia.
Khanchu rêngin hruaitu inkhat a koia, Mika hruai hrangin a tîra.
Rêng inhni chu Samari khopui lamsua pêna hruia rêngtoihmun an isiama khan an toia, deipuhaiin an vêlhaia, thu an hrilpuihaia.
Anni laia inkhat Kenaana nâipa Zedekia’n, thîrsum seki illim a siama, Ahaba kuang, “
Deipu danghai khomin khaang khan an tia, “Fe’n lân Ramot khua chu hong doi ro, inhnê ngêt ni ti,
Mikaia hruaitu hranga an iti kuang khan, “Deipu dang murdi’n a sa lam takin rêng kuang an puanga, nang khomin khaang khan ti pe ro,” a tia.
Khan Mikaia khan, “
Rêng Ahaba kuang a va tungin chu rêngin, “Mikaia, Gilead rama Ramot khua hi ki idoi hrang mo doi loi hrang?” a tia. Mikaia khan, “Hong doi ngân roi ba, inhnê ni ti,
Khan Ahaba’n, “
Mikaia khan, “Hruaitu nei loi belra angin Israelhai chu tânga an irthekindarh rumin ki hmua,
Ahaba’n Jehosafata kuang, “Irngai ta ro, ki kuang keima hrangin ite thil sa hril ngai ma, nang ki iti pe kha, thil saloi lam vai kêng a ihril ngai,” a tia.
Mikaia’n a hril maia, “
‘Tu mo Ahaba kuang zu fe hrang, Ramot doia thi hranga zu huang thei hrang?’
Irtha inkhat hi a zuanga,
Mikaia’n, “Khaang khan a ni,
Deipu Zedekia’n Mikaia chu a pana, a mikuar kôla, “Itiklai khan mo
Mikaia’n hiang hin a sâma, “Ni ikil sûnga nir bîk tena inhria ni ti,” a tia.
Ahaba’n hruaitu inkhat kuang, “Mikaia kha chelin lân, khua optu Amon kuang hruaiin lân, rêng nâipa Joasa khom irhmutir sa roh.
Zâm zâma ki hong kîr nôk mâka chu lei khum unglân, bai le tui vai lei pe ri sehai,” a tia.
Mikaia’n, “A hring a dama ni hongin chu
Rêng Ahaba le rêng Jehosafata chu Gilead biala Ramot khua doi hrangin an suak tâka.
Ahaba’n Jehosafata kuang, “Ei irdoi tika chu ki’rvôna indanglamtir ki ta, nang chu ni rêng tukfam leh irvo mai ro” a tia. Rêng Ahaba chu irvo danglamin a’rvoa, irdoina buala a kop sa tâka.
Suria rêngin tâli chalaitu hruaitu sômthum inhnihai chu, “Israel rêng ti no chu tûte a dang ir-otpuihai no roi,” a tia.
Khahai khan Jehosafata an hmu’n chu Israel rêng sônin an doi tâka. Jehosafata chu a khêka,
Tâli chalaitu hruaitu khan Israel rêng ni mah ti an hriatin chu, irzûl nuam ta maka.
Suria sipai thal kâphai hin rêng Ahaba chu a râlthuam irbel kâra khan a kâpa, a tâli chalaitu kuang khan, “Sâbe ki tuang ta hi te, kîrin lân, irdoina hmuna intân ta ro,” a tia.
An irdoi lai takin Ahaba chu a tâli bang irhnêlin, Suria mihai thîrin ar tunga, thisen chu a tâli chunga irting hlukin a suaka, khohloi tiang chu a thi tâka.
Misa tâk tôna chu Israel sipaihai kuang thu a zuang tung nôka, “Mi murdi mâni khua chita kîr nôk hrang,” an tia.
Reng Ahaba chu a thi tâka, a ruak chu Samari khuaa an fepuia, an phûm ta.
A tâli chu notizuarhai tui irsilna ngai Samari dîla an irsûk infâia; uihaiin a thisen chu an inliaka,
Reng Ahaba sintho danghai, a rêng in irvotir dânhai, khopui a irvotir dânhai chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
A thi zoiin chu a nâipa Ahazia chu ama irthûlin an lal nôk tâka.
Israel rêng Ahaba rêng kum minlina, Asa nâipa Jehosafata chu Judai rama an lala,
Jehosafata inlal ar phutin kum sômthum ringa mi a ni. Jerusalema kum sômhni ringa ten roi a rêla, a nu chu Azubi Silhia nâinu a ni.
A pa angin Pathian mithmua sin sa a thoa. Millim biakna hmun irsâng chu insiat ual maka; khasikin mipuihai chu kha hmun irsânga khan an la irbôl mai ngaia, mirimhoihai an la ihâl ngai a ni.
Jehosafata chu Israel rêng leh an irngeia.
Jehosafata sintho danghai, irdoina hmuna a ihâi dânhai, chu Juda rênghai lekhabu irziakna bua a chuang.
A pa Asa dam laia pasal le nupang millim biakna hmuna irzuar ngai chu a khap vinga.
Edom ramin rêng nei mahaia. Juda rêngin a’rthûl a siaa.
Ofir rângachak pêl hrangin rêng Jehosafata’n irkuang a siamhaia; khannisian, Ezion-geber a siat tâk sikin inzin thei ta mahai.
Israel rêng Ahazia’n a mihai chu Jehosafata mihai leh inzin suam ri sehai a tia; khannisian Jehosafata’n nuam maka.
Jehosafata chu a thi tâka, Davida khopuia rênghai thâna an phûma. A nâipa Jehorama chu ama irthûlin an lal nôk ta.
Judahai rêng Jehosafata inlal kum sômhleisarinaa chu Ahaba nâipa Ahazia chu Israelhai chunga roirêl hrangin Samari khuaa an lala, kum hni sûng roi a rêla.
RENGPA nuam loi lam thil a tho insuala, a pa Ahaba, a nu Jezebeli rêng Jeroboama hai angin thilsual a thoa, Israelhai hruai sualtu a ni.
A pu ang ngêtin Baal pathian sin a tho sikin Israelhai Pathian RENGPA chu a ning an murtir pea.
Israel rêng Ahaba a thi zoiin chu Moabhai chu kha Israelhai leh ir-en nuam mahaia.
Reng Ahazia chu Samari khuaa a omna in chung sîpa a tâka, a na oka a dam le damloi hrang thua Filistia Ekron khuaa pathian Baalzebuba irdon hrangin mi a tîra.
vântîrtônin Tisbe mi Elija kuang, “Thoiin lân, Samari rêngin mi a itîrhai irtongpui hrangin fe roh. Israel rama Pathian a iom loi ma ni, itho sika Ekron pathian Baalzebuba irdon ni ife?.
hiang hin a ti, ni omna zâlhmun ata kha chum thei ta no chi nia, thi hrang ni ni ta, ti pe hrangin a tîra.” Elija chu a fe tâka.
Rengin mi a itîrhai khom an hong nôk lata, an kuanga, “Itho mo nin hong ikîr nôk lat?” a lei tia.
Anni’n, “Mi inkhat leh kin irtoka, a tîrtu rêng kuang khan kîr nôk unglân,
“Hi thu nangni hriltu hi i ang mihriam mo a ini?” a tia.
Anni khan, “Pa mul tamtak nei mi a ni; savun kongkhit ar buna,” an tia. Ama khan, “Tisbe mi Elija ni a ti,” a tia.
Rengin a sipai hruaitu, sômringa sipai leh a tîra. Anni khan tâng sîpa Elija lei toi an va hmua, a kuang, “Nang Pathian mi, rêngin zuang ro nang a ti,” an tia.

Elija’n, “Pathian mi ki niin chu irvân ata mei zuang ta sianlân, nang le ni mi sômringahai kha nangni kâng that ri se,” a tia. Irvân ata mei a zuang tâka, sipaihai chu an hruaitupa leh a kâng thathaia.
Rengin sipai dang sômringa le hruaitu a tîrhai nôka. Ama’n hiang hin a tia, “Nang Pathian mi, rêngin zuang lat ro nang a ti,” a tia.

Elija’n, “Pathian mi ki niin chu, irvân ata mei zuang ta sianlân, nang le ni rualhai kha nangni kâng that ri se,” a tia. Pathian mei chu a zuang tâk zela, hruaitu leh a sipaihai chu a kâng thathai vinga.
Rengin sipai le hruaitu dang sômringa sipai a tîrhai nôka. Tânga a hong luia, Elija hmâikunga a khûksadela, “O Pathian mi, kei le ki sipaihai hi lung nin khamin lân, kin hringna hi ni hôi pe roh.
Sipai hruaitu inhni le an sipaihai irvân ata meiin a kâng thathai tâka, keini hi chu lungkham takin nin zôk ta ro,” an tia.
Reng kuanga khan, “Ekron pathian Baalzebuba irhmupui hrangin mi ni itîr ma ni? Israel rama Pathian irdon hrang ni iiam loi mo? ni zâlna hmun ata kha chum ta no chi ni, ni ithi ta hrang kêng,” a tia.
Elija ihril
Reng Ahazia sintho danghai chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna bua a chuang.
“Hi hin lei om ro,
Kha laia deipu pâl omhai khan, Elisa kuang an va fea, “A vuan hin ni pu hi
Elija’n Elisa kuang, “Hi hin lei om ro,
Khataka deipu rual omhai chu Elisa kuang an honga, “A vuan hin
Elija’n Elisa kuang, “Hi hin lei om ro,
An fe nôk suama, deipu sômringa’n an zuia, hla vit ata an thîrhaia, Jordan dung kôla khan an ngîra.
Elija’n a puan ar kheka, a thepin, vadung tui a vîka, a’rsen phata, tui tôn viat loiin an irkâna,
Tui an irkân zoiin chu, Elija’n Elisa kuang, “Nangma rengata ilâkin ki om mân, imo nang tho pe inlân ni nuam?” a tia. Elisa’n, “Ni’rtha man bâk hni ang hi dong ki nuam,” a tia.
Elija’n, “Thil intak tak ni izong a ni; khannisianlân, an ni lâk lai tak ni ni hmu’n chu chang ni ta, ni ni hmu no’n chu chang no chi ni,” a tia.
Fe puma an chong lai takin, mei sakor le mei tâli ikai an honga, an laia a senhai raka. Elija chu kêllaiherin irvân tiang an lâkin a vuangpui tâka.
Elisa’n a hmua, “Ka pa, ka pa, Israelhai hruaitu inthang, ni ife tâk mo?” a tia. A hmu no tena chu, a puansilhai a kheka, bong hniin an potthêra.
A chunga Elija puan zuang tâk chu a lâka, a kîr nôk ta. Jordan tui kôla khan a ngîra.
A chunga Elija puan zuang tâk kha a lâka, tui kha a vîknaa, “Kho mo Elija Pathian
Jeriko-a om deipu sômringahaiin an hmua, “Elija irtha dong ang kha Elisa chunga a iom a ni ta hi te,” an tia.
Ama irtongpui hrangin an fea, a makunga an khûksadela, “Irngai ro, mi hrâttak tak sômringa kin oma, ni pu chu
Elisa ta hranga inzak rak ang dôrin an ngên sikin, “Va fe roi,” a tia.
Kha tena chu mi sômringahaiin sûn thum an zonga, hmu mahaia, Jeriko-a Elisa a om laiin an kîr nôka, “Fe no roi nangni ki ti kha te,” a tia.
Jeriko khuaa mi a senkhathai Elisa kuang an honga, “Kin khua hi ni ihmu tâk angin kho hoitak a nia. Khannisianlân, kin tui fâk a sa no sikin nâi inhring thei ma ung,” an tia.
Ama’n, “Berbu thara michi se unglân, ni hong pe roi,” a tia. An lâk pea.
Tuikuanghaia khan a fea michi a phul pehaia, “
Atûn ten hin Elisa iti angin tuihai hi a irthiang tâk a ni.
Kha hmun ata kha Bethel khuaa a fe tâka; lampuia a fe laiin kho sûng rengata nâipang an honga, innuisanna hrang takin, “Lukol, lukol, kîr nôk ta ro,” an tia.
A hong irheiin chu a hmuhaia,
Khatak ata chu Samari khua tiang a pan nôk ta.
Judai rama Jehosafata kum sômhleiriat an lal kumin, Ahaba nâipa Jehorama chu Israel rama an lala. Samari khuaa kum sômhleihni an lala.
mithmua thilsual a thoa, a nu Jezebeli le a pa ang dôra sual chu ni maka. A pa millim, Baal biakna hmun a isiahai chu an siatpai pea.
Khannisian, a matona rêng Nabota nâipa Jeroboama thilsual tho chu masan thei maka Israelhai a hruai insuala, irlet nuam maka.
Moab rêng Mesa khan kêlbelra a vâia, a kum tin Israel rêng kuang chôirual angin belrate nuaikhat le belrachal nuaikhat mul a pêk ngaia.
Israel rêng Ahaba a thi’n chu, Moab rêng chu Israelhai a doia.
Reng Jehorama chu Samari khua ata a suak lata, a sipaihai a buk khômhaia.

Judahai rêng Jehosafata kuang, “Keini chunga hin Moab rêng a ni tehel pe tâka, ni doipui theiin mo?,” tiin chong an thuana. Reng Jehosafata’n, “Nangni hong san ki ti; ki mihai le ni mihai chu pumkhat kêng ei ni.
Kho tiang ata mo hong doihai ning?” a tia. Jehorama’n, “A hlana tiang Edom tâng châr ata hong phut ki ti,” a tia.
Reng Jehorama, Judai rêng le Edom rênghai chu an hong irsiam suaka, sûn sari an fe tena chu tui an irsama. Mihriam in hrang le an puakpêl sahai in hrang ite an nei ta no sikin.
Jehorama’n, “Ei Pathian
Reng Jehosafata’n, “
Reng Jehosafata’n, “Deipu diktak a ni kha te,” a tia. Reng inthumhai chu deipu Elisa kuang an va fea.
Elisa’n Israel rêng kuang khan, “Itin mo nangni ki isan hrang nin nu le pahaiin an lei irdonhai ngai deipuhai var donhai unglân sa no ni mo,” a lei ti pehaia.
Jehorama’n, “Ama
Elisa’n, “A sin ki tho mihring
Elisa’n, “Irhâihoi tum thei hong hruai hi roi” a tia. Irhâihoi tum theiin a hong tum inringin chu,
“Hi irhôra hin khur choi unglân,
hiang hin a ti, ‘Phâivua tho loiin sûm hmu khom unglân, hi irhôrhai hi tuiin sip zit a ti; khahai kha nin neinun vâihai le nin rêngin in ta nin ti,’ a tia.
Khaanga hai kha chu
Kul neihai le khua hoi ualhai insiat unglân, thing sa chihai irkit unglân, tuikuang sûnga buk unglân, loi hoina hmunhai khom lung dêng hnôk inbit roi,” a tia.
Zîngkhua a hong vâra hâlirvôm thil an inhlan zoro a hong phâkin chu, Edom ram rengata tui a zuang luanga, an omna hmunhai tuiin a sip tâka.
Moab haiin, an nihai doi hranga rêng inthumhai an hong tih an inhriatin chu pasal diarkai thei murdi’n, nâipang ata ulian dênin an irbuka, an ramrihai an hrung tâka.
Zîngkhua a hong vâra, misa a hong suakin chu tui a êl insen phuta, thisen anga senin an langa.
“Thisen a ni khu te, sipai pâl thumhai an irdoia, an irthat ngêt ni a ti. Tho an omna hmun zu en ei ti,” an tia.
An râlhai omna hmun an zu tungin chu Israelhaiin an lei doihaia, an irzûl kîrhaia, Israelhaiin an irzûlhai maia, Moabhai chu an thathai oka.

An khua khom an insiat pehaia, an loi hmun hoihaia khan Israelhai fe hongna lamin lung an intheka, an loihai chu lungin a sip zoi tâka. An tuikuanghai khom thing leh an inbit pehai tâka, a hnungkhôn taka chu an khopui Kir-hareseth vai la siat maka, kha khom kha sâilungdêng hmang theihaiin an irhuala.
Moab rêngin a râlhai inhnê loi hrang ti an hriatin chu khandai chôi sipai irzasarihai leh a râlhai chu nakhrât songin a palthûthaia, Suria rêng rama intân a tuma; khannisian intân thei maka.

Khanchu, a nâipa uliantak, ama thûl hrangtu chu, a chela, Moabhai pathian kôla kulbang bula khan a thata, ar hlan tâka. Israel mihaiin an hmu’n chu an chia, kha khua kha an mâksana, an rama an ikîr nôk tâk a ni.

Deipu pâlkhat laia mi inkhat dôngma chu deipu Elisa kuang a honga, “Ka pu, ni siahlo ki pasal chu a thia, ni inhriat angin Pathian chi mi a nia; a lâkai len tângnapa’n ki nâipasal hni suaka intânga, ki pasal intângna tuam hrangin ni lâk pe hrangin ar siam,” a tia.
Elisa’n, “Imo nang ki itho pe ta hrang! ni ina neinun sa ni inei mo a om” a tia. Ama khan, “Ite nei ma ung, oliv sahriak bûr chînte inkhat vai ki nei,” a tia.
Elisa’n, “Fe’n lân ni tualbômhai bûr, ni theidôr va’rfuangin lân.
Ni nâihai leh in irkhârkhum unglân, a bit dôr chu a bingin se thiai unglân,” a tia.
A fea, a nâihai leh in an irkhârkhuma, bûr rong chu a nâihaiin an lâka, ama’n a thun insiphaia.
An bûr irfuang a thun insip zoiin chu, “Bûr dang hong zong nôk roi,” a tia. Anni khan, “Bûr dang om ta ma,” an tia. Sahriak khom kha a kang tâka.
Pathian mi kha a va hrila, ama’n, “Fe’n lân, sahriak kha va zuar ta ro, nin lâkaihai chu tuam unglân, a la zôk chu ni nâihai leh fa roi,” a tia.
Sûn khat chu Sunam khuaa Elisa a fea; kha khuaa khan nupang irchongnu a oma. Elisa chu bunêk a koia, kha ni rengata chu Sunam khua a fe paiin chu, kha nu kuanga khan bu anh a fâk ngaia.
A pasal kuang, “Hi ni hong hro ngaitupa hi Pathian mi irthiangtak chu nih a ti.
Tho in sûnga a riakna hrang tentan siam pe inlân, zâlhmun, dokâng, le toihmun do pe inlân, a ni hong hro rikipa a omna hrangin,” a tia.
Sûn khat chu Elisa a hong nôka, a zâlhmun hranga tentana khan sôl a’rngama.
Sunam nupangnu koi hrangin a hnungzui Gehazia chu a tîra, nupangnu chu a honga.

Elisa’n Gehazia kuang, “Hi nu hin a nin ren bâka, imo ei itho pe ta hrang? Reng mo, sipai hruaitu chongpui a inuam mo a om irdon ro,” a tia. Kha nu khan, “Mâni irchipuihai laia om kêng ki nia, ite innang nei ma ung,” a tia.
Elisa’n, Gehazia kuang, “I tak mo ki itho pe ta hrang?” a tia. Ama’n, “Nâipasal chu nei ma, a pasal lak a tar ok tâka,” a tia.
Elisa’n, “Hin hong hi ri se,” a tia. A honga, mikota a ngîra.
Elisa’n a kuang khan, “Nakum hiang tika hin chu nâipasal pom tah ni ti,” a tia. Kha nu khan, “Pathian mi ni nia, minlak thu ni hril no ro,” a tia.
Elisa iti lam angin nâi a vonga, a kum nôk a phâkin chu nâipasal a nei tâka.
Nâipang chu a hong lian tîr tîra, voikhat chu a pa kôla bu âttuhai leh an bu âtna hmuna a fea.
A pa kuang khan, “Ki lu, ki lu,” a tia. A siahlo kuanga khan, “A nu kuang puakin lân fepui ro,” a tia.
A siahloin a nu kuanga puakin a fepui tâka, sûn sôt a nu’n a poma, a thi pe tâka.
Elisa omna tentana a lûtpuia, a zâlhmuna an zâla; a suaka, in a khârkhuma.
A pasal a koia, “Siahlo inkhat leh sakuartung inkhat hong tîr ro, Pathian mi kuang la va fe hi rong, hong kîr nôk zôi ki ti,” a tia.
Ama’n, “Tha thar kût khom ni maka, Sabat ni khom ni ual maka, itho sikin mo a vuan sûn kher a kuanga fe ni inuam?” a tia. Khan ama khan, “Fe a nang a ni,” a tia.
Sakuartung chu ar siam infel zoiin chu a siahlo kuang khan, “A hrât thei dôra hrâtin sakuartung hi chalai ro; ite nang ki ti mâka chu ir-ial viat no ro,” a tia.
Elisa omna Karmel tâng panin an suaka.
Hlataka an la om laiin Elisa’n a lei hmuhaia, a hnungzui Gehazia kuang khan, “En ro, Sunam-ah nupangnu kha a hong so,
a pasal le a nâihai chu an dam mo tiin lei va don lat ro,” a tia. Ama’n “Kin dam,” tiin a lei sâma.
Tânga Pathian mi kuang khan a tungin chu a ke a chel pe khaka, Gehazia’n, namirthîn a tuma, khannisian Pathian mi khan, “Ite tho pe no ro, a milung a na pe a ni,
Nupangnu khan, “Ka pu nâipasal mo nang ki nghi? ni huang no roh mo nang ki iti ni ma kha?” a tia.

Gehazia kuang khan, “Irsiamin lân, ki khianghrol hi chôiin lân fe roh. Mi ni irtokpui khom chubai mûk no’n lân, chubai nang an mûk khomin donhai viat no roh. Ki khianghrol hi nâipang hmâi chunga va’rnghat ro,” a tia.
Nâipangte nu khan, “

Gehazia chu maton tiang a lei fea, nâipang hmâia khianghrol a lei khanga; khannisian ite danglam maka, a om balamin a om maia. Elisa irtongpui nôk hrangin a lei hong kîra, “Nâipang chu thoi ta ma,” a hong tia.
Elisa chu in a va tunga, nâipang chu a thia, a zâlna khan a lei zâla.
A lûta, an ruai vaiin an irkalkhuma.
Zâlhmuna khan nâipang chu an bokdela, a hmûr le a hmûr, a mit le a mit, a kut le a kut, a’rtôn irhlômpuia; khaanga a thopuiin chu nâipang takpum chu a hong lum irphuta.
Zâlhmun ata a chuma, hnuaia voihni vêl ar lôi zoiin a lui nôka, nâipang chunga khan an bok nôka, nâipang chu voisari a ha a hong riala a hong hring nôk tâka.
Gehazia chu a koia, “Sunamnu kha hong koi ro,” a tia. A hong koia, a zuangin chu, “Ni nâipa hi pom ta ro,” a tia.
A tentan sûnga khan a lûta a ke bula khûksadel pumin, a nâipa chu a pom suak tâka.
Voikhat chu, ram pumpuia châm a tâk laiin Elisa chu Gilgal-a a fea, deipuhai ar chutirhaia; a siahlo kuang khan, “Bêl lian kha lan lân, deipu irchulaihai fâk hrang inchuan ro,” a tia.
An laia mi inkhat chu rama, anh-a thâk sa hrang zong a fea, hruirâng i zât mani khôk a hong pom hluka, a zena anh-a khan a thâk sa tâka.
Fa hrangin an chomin chu, “Ei Pathian mihai an bêla hin tûr a om,” an tia, fa thei ta mahaia.
Ama’n, “Baidi hong la nôk roi” a tia. Bêla khan a thâka, a mihai kuang khan, “Thur roi fa thei ta nin ti,” a tia.
Baal-salisa rengata mi inkhat a honga, Pathian mi chu bai dang (barli) sômhni le buvûi a hong chôi pea; “Hi mihai hi infatirhai ro,” a tia.
A siahlo khan, “Itina ni iti mo? hi tê leh hin ulian pâl irzakhat vêl an iruk hrang” a tia. Ama’n, “Sem phot ro, fa ri sehai,
Khanchu, a semhaia an fâka,
Suriahai sipai hruaitu ulian Naamana chu
Suria sipaihai a papâlin ram kâra an riak ngaia. Israel rama mi nupang nâipangte hi an chela, Naamana dôngma’n a siahlo ni hrangin a hmanga.
A pi kuang khan, “Ka pu hi Samari khuaa deipu kuanga va fe sianlân chu an phâr hi dam ngêt a ti,” a tia.
Naamana’n an hriatin chu a pu rêng kuang khan a fea, “Israel rama nupang nâipangtenu khan khaang khan te ni zu ti tâka,” a tia.
Suria rêngin, “Va fe’n lân, Israel rêngpa hrang lekha nan chôitir ki ti,” a tia. A fe tâka, sumru sîngthum, rângachak sângruk le puan irnêm sil sômkhat a chôia.
Israel rêng kuang lekha chu a pêka, hiang hin a’rziaka, “Hi lekha chôitu hi, ki siahlo, Naamana hi an phâra, len dam hrangin ki hong itîr a ni,” tiin a’rziaka.

Israel rêngin lekha irziak kha a tepin chu, a puan an potthêra, “Mi thata indamtir thei Pathian mo ki ni, hi mi hin inphâr indamtir hranga a ni hong iti? a ni doi theina hrang lampui a izong mai a ni,” a tia.

Reng chardong hraiin a puan an potthêr tah ti Pathian mi Elisa’n a len hriatin chu rêng kuanga mi a tîra. “Itho mo ni puan teh nin potthêra? ki kuang zuang sianlân, Israel rama deipu a om ti inhria a ti,” a tia.
Naamana chu a sakor le sakor tâlihai hmangin Elisa kuang a fea.
Elisa’n mi a tîra, “Fe’n lân, Jordan vadung tuia voisari irsilin lân, ni vun diktak ang ni nôk a ta, irthiang ta ni ti,” a tia.
Naamana chu ningmur hmêl irputin a fea, “Hong suak a ta, ki kôla ngîrin Pathian
Damaska kôla Abana le Pharpar vadung tui chu Israel vadung tui nêkin a irthiang ual mo ni ma?” tiin ningmur takin a fe tâka.
A siahlo inkhat a honga, “Ka pu deipu khan thil ichiom tak tho roh nang ti khom sianlân, ni itho loi hrang ma ni? var silin lân, irthiang ni ti, nang a iti a ni’nte, var sil ta ro ba?” a hong tia.
Deipu iti angin Naamana chu Jordan dung a pana, voisari a’rphûma, a vun chu nâipang vun a hong ang pe nôka, a’rthiang tâka.

A neinun hmang murdihai leh khan Pathian mi kuanga a hong kîr nôka, a hmâikunga a ngîra, “Israel rama ti no hin chu ram danga Pathian om mah ti kin hriat ta, en ro, ni siahlo hin thil nang ki ipêk hi lungkham takin ni la pe ro,” a tia.
Ama khan, “Matona ki omna ngai mihringhai
Naamana’n, “Ni lâk nuam zel no’n chu ni siahlo hi sakuartung inhni pêl inruk irnêng ni pe’n lân, ni siahlo hin
Khannisianlân, Suria pathian Rimon biak hrangin ka pu a fe zoro hin a hnung ki zui ngaia; khaanga Rimon tempila ki fea, khûksadelin chubai ki mûk khomin
Ama’n, “Irtharngam takin fe ro,” a tia. Kha tena chu a fe tâka.
Hlataka a fe mân zel khan, Pathian mi Elisa hnungzui Gehazia’n, “Ka pu hin Naamana chu ite la loiin an fetira, kha Suria mipa’n pêk a itum kha la sianlân a isa hrang,
Khanchu Naamana chu Gehazia’n a va’rzûla, Naamana mi inkhatin a ho’rzûl a nih ti a hmu’n chu a tâli ata chumin a lei va dona, a kuang, “A sat lama ni ihong chu ma ni?” a tia.
Ama khan, “A sa lama chu a ni, ka pu’n, Efraima tâng ram rengata deipu inhni an honga, tangka sum sângthum le puan sil inhni mo pe thei ni?” a ti va ti ro, a tia.
Naamana khan, “Tangka sum sângruk vai hi ni la pe ro,” a tia. La ngêt hrangin an kunga tangka chu hmarsa inhnia a thuna, puan sil hni leh a siahlohai an pêltirhaia an fe tâka.
Tâng sîp an hong tungin chu an kut ata a lâkpai pehaia, a ina a hrê zoi hnungin, a tîrhai nôk ta.
Ama chu in sûnga a lûta, a pu kôla khan a va ngîra, Elisa’n, “Gehazia kho rengata hong mo ni ni?” a tia. Ama khan, “Kho te lua fe ma ung kha te,” a tia.

Ama khan, “Nang a don hranga a tâli ata a zuang lai khan ki’rtha kha ni kôla khan a iom loi ma ni? tangka le puan kha ni ilâk mo ni ma? grep irhuan, belra le sehrâthai kha, siahlo pasal le nupang irchohai ta roh.
Naamana inphâr irvei hi nangma le nir chihai chunga nangni kâi pe ta ri se,” a tia. A pu makung ata a suakin chu, ivur anga vârin a vun chu inphârin a tuam invâr pe ta.
Deipu irchuhaiin Elisa kuang khan, “Kin omna in hi a chîn hrai sikin,
Jordan tui kôla fe’n lân, ei omna hrang in lian ual zu sin kin ti,” an tia. “Fe roi,” a tia.
Anni laia mi inkhatin, “Lungkham takin nang khom zuang ro,” a tia. “O, a ni le zuang ki ti,” a tia.
An rêngin an fe tâka, Jordan dung an zu tungin chu thing an tana.
Mi inkhat thing a tan lai takin, a hrei ar khek pea, tuia a tâk pea, “Ka pu itina hrang ma ni ta, mi ta kêng kin ihmang,” a tia.
Pathian mi khan, “Kho taka mo a itâk?” a tia. A tâkna lai tak chu an khîk irhmua.
Thing ôn a tana, a zu dêngnaa, hrei chu a hong kêlsuaa, “La ta ro,” a tia; a hon bana a lâk tâka.
Suria rêngin Israel rêng doi a tuma, kho hmun tianghai hin mo an inruanghai hrang ti a rualhai leh an hrila.
Pathian mi Elisa’n, Israel rêng kuang khan, “Hi hmunhai hin chu fe no roi, Suria rênghaiin nangni an inruang hrang kêng a ni,” a ti pe thiaia.
Israel rêngin Pathian mi iti pena hmuna omhai chu a hrila, an le’rtûng irman vinga; voi tamtak an hrilhai a ni.
Suria rêng chu irmang a phana, a rualhai a koihaia, “Israel tianga kop ei laia hin tu mo a ini nin hril roi” a tia.

A hruaituhai laia mi inkhat hin, “Keini laia hin hianga milung inchong inkhat lua om ma ung, an chungtakpu, Israel laia, deipu Elisa’n, ni in sûnga ni thu hril murdi khom, Israel rêng a ihril mai a ni,” a tia.
Ama khan, “khôn mo a om va zong roi, mi tîr ki ta, va chel roi,” a tia. “Dothan khuaa a om” an tia.
Khanchu, sakor le tâlihai irfûkin sipai tamtak a tîra, kha khua kha zâna an va irhuala.

Pathian mi siahlo ruatharte an laia a ngîra, zînga a thoiin chu, a suaka sipai tamtak le sakor leh tâli hmangin an khua an irhual chu a hmua, a pu kuang khan, “Ka pu dik loi kêng a ni ta! itin mo ei itho ta hrang? eini tianga ni san hrang an tam,” a tia.
Khan, Elisa’n, “Chi no ro, anni tianga kop nêkin eini tianga kop an tam ual,” a tia.
Elisa a chongchaia, “O
Elisa chu,
Elisa’n an kuang, “Hi hi lampui ni mah, nin mihriam hong zong omna khua lak ni maka, a omna hmuna nangni hruai ki ti,” a tia. Samari khuaa a hruaihai tâka.
Samari khua an va tungin chu, Elisa’n, “O
Israel rêngin Elisa kuang, “Thatpaihai ning mo,” a tia.
Elisa’n, “Khandai le thala nin irdoipuia nin ichelhai lua that loiin te, an fâk hrang bu le tui pehaiin lân fâkin inhai sianlân, an pu kuang tiang inkîrtirhai ro,” a tia.
Bu tamtak a er pehaia, an nêka, an khop tena chu an suahaia, an pu kuang tiang an fe ta. Suria rêng sipaihaiin chu Israel ram chu doi ngam ta mahaia.
Zoro sôt ian hnunga chu Suria rêng Benhadada’n sipai a bukhaia, Samari khua panin ar hualpuihaia.
An irhual sôt tâk sikin Samarihai chu a sân an châm tâka, sakuartung lu inkhat hi tangka sômriatin an zuara, phervali gram khat irzahni hi tangka ringa man a nia.
Israel rêng chu kul bangbul irfangin a fea, nu inkhat hin, “Ni changpui ro, o rênginthang ki rêngpa,” a tia.
Rengin, “Imo ni itihna?” a tia. Ama khan, “Hi nupang hin ni nâi kha hong hruaiin lân, a vuan fâk ei ta, nangtûk ki nâi fa nôk ei ti, a tia.
Ki nâi chu kin suanga, kin fâk tâka. Nangtûk chu ni nâi hong hruaiin lân, fa ei ti ki tia; khannisianlân a nâi chu a thuppaia,” a tia.
Rengin kha thu kha a hon hriatin chu a puan an potthêra; kulbang ar fang maia, mipuiin an enin chu a puan hnuaia bora puan a sil chiana.
“A vuan misa a tâk mân hin Safata nâipa Elisa lu hi ki lâk no zelin chu

Elisa chu a in sûnga a toia, ulian danghai leh rêngin mi a tîra, kha an mi tîrpa tung mân Elisa’n ulianhai makunga khan, “Irngai roi, hi mi that ngaipa hin ki lu la hrangin mi a hong itîr a ni. A mi hong tîrpa chu in khârkhum unglân, lei danh khak roi. Kha a hong zuitu irhâi khan a pu rêng kalchôi irhâi mo ni mah?” a tia.
A lan sîr laiin rêng chu a hong tung zel tâka. “Hiang dôra chardong nin lâktirtu chu
Elisa’n, “
Reng hrung ngaitu sipai hruaituin, Pathian mi chu hiang hin a sâma, “
Samari khua pên tiang khan inphâr minli hi an oma, “Itho sika mo a thi ringot nghâkin ei iom hi?

Kho sûnga lûtin lân, khano’nchu phîngchâmin ei ithi hrang kêng, hitaka om mai hi chu. Tho Suriahai hnuaia va irpelût ta ei ti, an nuam le ni thathai sian; a that tak chu ni ngam ual no nihai,” an tia.
A zîngbup tena chu Suriahai kuanga fe hrangin an irsiama, Suriahai omna an va tungin chu tûte lei om mahaia.
Suriahai kha sakor tâli le sakor intân irhâi an hriattirhaia, “Israel rêng hin Hit rêng Aigupta rênghaiin ni doi hrangin an hong irsiam a ni hi,” an ti a ni.
Khasika, a zîngbupa hin bâk lêng angin an isuak a nia, an in sakuartung le an in tuala thilhai mâksanin an irotsan pher phur a ni ta.
Inphârhaiin tual an va tungin chu, in inkhata an lûta, an va thup irsiata, a danga an irthon nôka, khaang ngêtin an tho nôka.

An chonga, “Ei tho dân hi a idik ta loi kêng. A vuan hin zoro a la om, ei dâihreka khovâr ei nghâkin chu an ni la isoisak hrang kêng; khasikin thurchi sa hi rêng in sûng mihai inhrilhai ei ti,” an irtia.

Khua kul mikota khan an fea, mikot hrungtu kuang khan, “Suriahai tuala kin va fea, tûte lei om mahaia, tûte chongpui hrang lei om mahai. An sakorhai, an sakuartung chu an la khithaia, an inhai khom a om balamin a la om chiana,” an tia.
Mikot hrungtuhai kha rêng in sûnga an va fea, an hrilhaia;

zâna rêng chu a thoia, a rualhai kuang khan, “Suriahaiin an ni irdoitir dân hi nangni hril ki ti. An khuaa kin châm hrang hi an inhriata, an in mâksanin ramkâra an irbîk nih a ti, kho sûng ata hong suak an ta, a hringin chelhai ei ta, an khua lua pehai ei tih an irti ni a ti,” a tia.
A rualhai laia mi inkhatin, “Hi khuaa mi hi ei irchêk ok tâka, ei thi ok tâk sikin, sakor ringa ei la neia, a chunga chuang thei inthang ei ta, hi thu hi van fel ri sehai,” a tia.
Mi an inthanghaia, rêngin sakor tâli inhni a pêkhaia, Suria sipaihai thurchi inhriat infel hrangin a tîrhaia.
Kha mihai kha Jordan vadung an va dêna, Suria sipaihai puandiar mâk zen zun an va hmua, an hong kîr nôka rêng kuang an hong hrila.
Samari mihai chu an khua ata an suaka, Suriahai hmun khuar chu an lût khumhaia.
Israel rêngin ama hrung ngaitu sipai hruaitu kha mikot hrung hrangin a lei phun khera. Elisa hmu hrangin rêng leh an honga, a iti angin sipai hruaitu chu mipuiin an bôma a thi tâka.
Elisa’n, “Nang, hiang tik zoro hin baidi a sa chi her thum le barli her ruk, tangka dârkhat man ni ti,” a tia.
Kha sipai hruaitu khan, “
Khaang khan a hong om tâka, khua kul mikot kha mipui an bita, an ihneng that a ni ta.
Pathian mi thu chu a zôma, an rêngin Filistia rama an fea, kum sari an va om tâka.
Kum sari a hek hnungin chu nupangnu chu Israel rama a kîr nôka, rêng kuang khan a in le a ramhai chu ni pe kîr nôk ta roh tiin a hrila.
Reng le Elisa hnungzui Gehazia chu an lei chonga, Elisa thil irkhêl tho chu rêngin an hriat nuama, a le’rdona.

Elisa’n mithi an hringtir nôkna thu Gehazia’n a hril lai takin nupangnu kha rêng makunga a hong ngîra. Gehazian, “Ka pu, ki insîr nupang kha hi nu hi a ni; Pathian mi Elisa’n a inhring nôk khom kha a nâipa a ni,” a tia.

Rengin a dik le dikloi ar dona, “O a dik,” a tia. Rengin a thu ngaitua infel hrang hruaitu inkhat an thang pea. “A inei ngai murdi pe kîr nôkin lân, a om no kâra a ram ata thil thar suak khom a man hrang dôr insâpin pe ro,” a ti pea.
Suria rêng Benhada dam loi lai takin Elisa chu Damaska khua a hong lûta, “Pathian mi a hong tiin an hrila.
Rengin Hazaela kuang khan, ‘Imo khôk thilpêk hrang chôiin lân, Pathian mi var hmupui ro, ki la idam suak hrang le damloi hrang,

Khanchu, Hazaela chu var hmupui hrangin a fea, Damaska khuaa thil sa le hluhai a chôia, saringseiin voisôm minli pêla tam a chôia, a fea a kuang khan, ‘Ni nâipa Suria rêng Benhadada’n, a ni hong itîr a ni, a natna ata hi la dam ning mo? a ti,’ a tia.
Elisa’n a kuang, “Fe nôkin lân, la dam suak ngêt a ti, ti va hril roh. Khannisianlân,
Hazaela chu inzak hmêl irputin a hei ena; Pathian mi chu a chapa.

Hazaela chu, “Ka pu, itho mo ni chapa,” a tia. Ama’n hiang hin a sâma, “Israel mihai chunga thil saloi ni itho hrang ki hmu sikin, an kulhai la hâl pehai ni ta, an ruathartehai khandaiin tukhai ni ta, an nâitesuihai hnuai changa vîk thathai ni ta, an kho nupui, nâi vonghai khom an phînga irkhit thathai tum ni ti,” a tia.
Hazaela’n, “Kei ni siahlo hin an nihai ang tho thei hrangin mo ni ni ibe?” a tia. Elisa’n, “
Elisa’n a mâksana, a pa kuang a va fea, “Ama’n Elisa’n imo nang a lei ti pe?” a tia. “Ni la idam suak ngêt hrang ti thu a hril,” a tia.
Zîng nôka chu Hazaela’n puan a lâka, tuia a phûma, rêng kha a’rkhûa a thatpai ta. Hazaela chu Benhada irthûlin Suria rêng a chang nôk ta.
Israel rêng Ahaba nâipa Jorama rêng inlal kum ringana tena chu Jehosafata nâipa Jehorama chu Judai rama rêng a changa.
Kum sômthuminhni a niin an lal irphuta, Jerusalema kum riat an lala.
A dôngma chu Ahaba nâinu a ni. Ahaba irchihai om dân ang ngêtin Israel rênghai omdân saloi lâkin a oma.
Jehorama inlal lai tak hin Judai ramhai chunga Edom-hai tehel an zonga, an bingin rêng an neia.
Jehorama chu Zair tiang panin a sakor tâli chôiin a fea, Edom-haiin an irhuala zân laia a tâli chalaituhai leh an intân suak thei hrâma, a sipaihai chu an indarh chita, an mâni in tiang an rot nôka.
Khatak ata chu Edom-hai hi Judahai hnuaia om nuam ta mahaia, hi zoro ngêt hin Libna khuahai khom tehel an zong phut nôk sa a ni.
Jehorama sintho dang murdi chu Juda rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Jehorama chu a thia, Davida khopuia rêng irphûmna thâna an phûma, a nâipa Ahazia chu a’rthûlin an lal nôk ta.
Israel rêng Ahaba nâipa Jorama rêng kum sômhnina tena Jehorama nâipa Ahazia chu Judai rama rêng a changa.
Kum sômhni inhni a niin an lal irphuta, Jerusalema kum khat an lala, a nu chu Ahaba nâinu Athali, Israel rêng Omria tunu a ni.
Ahazia’n Ahaba nâinu dôngma’n a nei sikin Ahaba urêng danghai angin
Reng Ahazia le Israel rêng Jorama chu Suria rêng Hazaela doi hrangin an inthuruala. Gilead biala Ramot khuaa, an sipaihai an irdoia; Jorama’n irdoina khan sâbe a neia.
A damna hrang zongin Jezreel khuaa a honga, Ahazia’n a va pana.
Kha zoroa khan deipu Elisa’n deipu ruatharte nâipang tak hi a koia, “Irsiamin lân, hi sahriak bûr hi chôiin lân, Ramot Gileada va fe roh.
Ni va tungin chu Nimsia tupa Jehosafata nâipa Jehua zong suakin lân, a omna ina lûtin lân, a rualhai lai ata in sûngrîla hruai lûtin lân,
a lu chunga hi oliv hriak hi buak pe’n lân, ‘
Deipu ruatharte nâipang chu Ramot-gilead-ah khan a fea.

A va tungin chu sipai hruaituhai an le’rbukkhôma. “Ni kuanga thu hril hrang ki nei, sipai hruaitu,” a tia. Jehua’n, “Kin laia hin tu hi mo ni ichongpui nuam?” a tia. Ama khan, “O sipaihai hruaitu nang kha ni nih nang ki ichongpui nuam chu,” a tia.
A thoia, in sûnga a lûta, a lua sahriak a buaka, “Israelhai chunga rêng hrangin sahriak nang ki buak ta a ti a ni,” a tia.
“Ni pu Ahaba in mihai that ni ta, ki siahlohai thisen,
Ahaba irchihai chu thatpaihai hlet ni ta, nâipang khom ulian khom pasal chu hek ving an ti.
Ahaba in mihai chu Nebata nâipa Jeroboama in mihai le Ahija nâipa le Baasa in mihai ang khan soisakhai ki ti.
Jezebeli chu Jezreel-a uihaiin a hme fa an ta; tûte a phûm hrang om loiin,” a tia. Inkhâr kha an honga, a suakpat tâka.
Jehua chu a puhai lai ata a hong suaka, mi inkhatin, “I thurchi ma ni tâk? mi’ntopa kha i lo hranga ni hong ihruai mo?” a tia. Jehua’n, “A izong chu nin inhriat kha te,” a tia.
Anni khan, “Inhre ma ung dua, hril ro ba,” an tia.
Sipai hruaitu danghaiin an puan an kheka, Jehua omna hrangin an dâpa, bekul an tuma, “Jehua hi rêng a ni ta,” an tia.
Nimsia tupa, Jehosafata nâipa Jehua’n Jehorama chu a khitphiara.

Jorama chu Suria rêng le Ramot khuaa irdoi lai khan sipai lei nei tâk a nia. Jezreel khuaa lei irngam hranga fe a ni, Jehua’n a rualhai kuang khan, “Keima tiang nin kopin chu Ramot khuaa irthokin Jezreel mihai kôla tûte thurchi hril hrangin insua no roi,” a tia.
A tâli chunga a chuanga, Jezreel khua panin a fea, Jorama chu la dam infel maka, Juda rêng Ahazia’n a va pana a lei om lai tak a ni.

Jezreel in irsâng chunga râl entu khan Jehua le a rualhai hong lai chu a hmuhaia, “Sakor chunga chuang mi tuhai mani ki hmu,” a tia. Jorama’n, “Râl an ini le ni loi eninfel hrangin sakor chuang thei mi inkhat va tîr roi,” a tia.
An itîrpa chu Jehua hai omna a va tunga, “Rengin rual sa anga hong ni ini le ni loi an hriat nuam,” a tia. Jehua’n, “Nangma inhriat ite nang ma, hnung tiang khan fe nôk ro,” a tia.
Râl hrungtu khan, “Mi honghai khan, ei mi tîr chu a va huanghaia, hong kîr nôk ta ma,” a tia.
An hruaitu khan, a tâli chu invêt angin a chalaia Jehua angin a om a tia.
Reng Jorama’n, “Ki tâli sinsiam unglân,” a tia. An sinsiam zoiin chu Juda rêng Ahazia le an tâlihaia chuangin Jehua var hmupui hrangin an suaka. Nabota irhuana an va hmua.
Jorama’n, “Jehua, a sat lama ni ihong chu ma ni?” a tia. Jehua’n, “Ni nu Jezebeli’n millim biak le irdoi hmang thu inthang kâra hin thil sa lam hril hrangin itin mo a ini thei hrang?” a tia.
