Jorama’n, “Ahazia hi, hi mihai hin that an itum a ni,” tiin a khêka, a tâli a kai irhêla, an tâna.
Jehua’n a thalngul chu a thei dôra irnak songin a kaidoka, Jorama hnung tiang a kâpa, a thalin a milung irbutak a va toka, a tâli chunga khan a thi tâka.
Jehua’n a hnung zuitu Bidkara kuang khan, “A ruak so Nabota irhuana pai roi. Jorama a pa Ahaba hnungzui, a sakor kin chuang laia Ahaba chungthu
Nabota le a nâihai mizâna an thi dânhai kha kin hriat mai a ni; khasikin hi hmuna hin ki la isoisakhai hrang a ni; a iti kha, Jorama ruak chu a lâka, Nabota irhuan sûnga,

Juda rêng Ahazia’n hi thilhai hi a hmu’n a tâli leh Beth Hagan tiang a fea, Jehua’n, a’rzûla, a rualhai kuang khan, “A tâlia chuangpu so that roi,” a tia. Ibleam kho kôla Gur pana a fe laiin an kâp inphopa, Megido tiang a fea; kha hmun khan a thipui tâka.
A rualhaiin a ruak chu tâli chunga chôiin Jerusalema an chôi tâka, Davida khopui rêng thâna, an phûm ta.
Ahaba nâipa Jorama kha Israel rêng kum sômhleikhat a ni kumin Ahazia hi Judai ram rêng a ni.
Jehua’n, Jezreel a hong tung ti Jezebeli’n an hriatin chu a mit an hânga, a sam sinsiam indanglamin rêng in irsângtak ata a thîra.
Kul mikota Jehua hong lût lai khan, “Ama puhai thattu Zimria, khan a sat lama hong mo ni ni?,” tiin a khêka.
Jehua chu a hor heia, “A ni san hrang mo nin om?” a tia. Hruaitu inhni inthum tukvera an hong suaka.
Jehua’n an kuang, “Zuang namtha roi,” a tia. Khanchu, Jezebeli chu an namthâka, a thisenin a sûta, bang le sakorhai khom a sût chita, a ruak khom an inrâk phiar saa.
In sûnga Jehua a lûta, bu a nêka, “Kha nupang sualnu ruak kha phûm roi, rêng nâinu a ni sikin,” a tia.
Phûm hrang an va fea, a lu, a ru le a kut le ke ti no chu hmu hrang om ta mah.
Jehua an hong hril nôka, “A siahlo Tisbe mi Elija bâia
an ifâk mihlia chu tu ruak mo a inih ti inhre thei loi rakin ar thek indara a iti kha a hong itung a ni ta,” an tia.
Samari khuaa khan Ahaba nâipasal sômsari an oma. Samari khuaa a pahai leh hruaitu Ahaba nâi enkoltuhai kuanga Jehua’n lekha a thona hiang hin a’rziak.
“Reng nâihai chu nin kuta an oma. Tâli, Sakor, râlthuam le kulnei khuahai khom nuamin nin hmang theia.
Ki lekha hi nin hmuin chu rêng nâihai laia a feltak inthang unglân, rêngin siam roi, pu thar nin inei sûnghual roi,” tiin.
Samari khuaa hruaituhaiin nangni an chia. “Reng inhni luan nangni ngam loiin, keini hin itin mo nangni kin ingam hrang?” an tia.

Reng in enkoltuhai, kho sûng hruaituhai upahai le rêng nâi enkoltuhaiin an sâma, “Ni siahlo kin nia, tho hranga ni ni inphût dôr chu tho hrangin kin irsiam mai. Tûte mi dang rêng inchang nuam ma ung, a sa ni iti lam takin tho ro,” an tia.
Jehua’n lekha dang a thon nôka, “Keima tianga kop nin nia, ki thu nin zôm hrangin chu, nangtûk hiang zoro hin Jezreel khuaa rêng nâihai lu lahai roi,” tiin.
Ahaba nâi sômsarihai chu Samari khua hruaitu enkolna hnuaia seiliana om an nia.
Jehua lekha an hmu’n chu Samari khuaa hruaituhaiin Ahaba nâi sômsarihai chu an thathaia, an lu chu bêma an thunhaia. Jezreel khuaa Jehua kuanga an thon tâka.
Ahaba nâihai lu an hong lâk tah ti Jehua an hrila. Anni’n, “Khopui kul mikot bula buk hniin le’rbukkhôm unglân, nangtûk ten lei om ri sehai,” a tia.
Zînga kul mikot bula a va fea, khataka lei omhai kuang khan, “Reng Jorama khitphiara thattu ki ni, ama mô kha chu nangni’n pêl no chin ni. A mihai hi tu ithat mo?
Ahaba nâihai chungchânga
Jezreel khuaa Ahaba urênghai le sipai hruaituhai le a rual sahai le ochai inkhat lua hôi loiin a thathaia.
Jehua’n Jezreel a suak sana, Samari khuaa fe a tuma, Lampuia belrapu tual; an itihna khan,
Juda rêng Ahazia in mihai a’rtongpuihaia, “Tuhai mo nin ini,” a tia.
“Ahazia urênghai kin ni, rêngnu Jezebeli nâihai le rêng in mihai chubai mûk hrangin Jezreel khuaa fe kin itum a ni,” an tia.
Jehua’n a rualhai kuang khan, “A hringin chelpaihai roi,” a tia. An chelhaia, Betheged in khur kôla khan an thata an rêngin mi sômminli inhni an ni, inkhat lua hôihai mahai.

Jehua chu a fe maia, Rekaba nâipa Jehonadaba’n a’rtongpuia. Jehua’n chubai a lei mûka, “Ni chunga ki milung inchong ang hin, ki chunga lungrîl sa mo ni’rput?,” a tia. Jehonadaba’n, “Ki’rput” a tia. Jehua’n “Ni’rputin teh ni kutin ni hon ban ro,” a tia. An kut an irtûka, Jehua’n tâli chunga an chuangtira.
“Ni hong zuiin lân,
An va tungin chu, Ahaba urêng murdi chu inkhat lua hôi loiin a thathai vinga. Elija kuanga
Jehua’n Samari mihai a koi bukhaia, an kuang, “Reng Ahaba khan intôm takin Baal tah hrangin sin a thoa, Jehua rêkin chu a sân uar ok a ti.

Baal deipuhai, ama biaktu murdi le ochai murdi koibukhai roi. Tûte irnghil loiin, Baal kôla thil roiinpuitak inhlan hrang ki ni, a suak loi kai chu thatpai ni an ti,” a tia. (Baal biakhai thatpaihai ving a tum sikin, khaanga vâr irlet thu a insuak a ni.)
“Baal biakna hrang nî sûn indang roi,” Jehua’n a tia. A sûn an indang tâka.
Jehua’n Israel rama mihai chu a bukkhômhaia; Baal biaktu murdi chu an honga, a hong loi zel om mahaia. Baal tempila an irbukkhôma.
Ochaihai songkol enkoltuhai kuanga, “Baal biaktu murdihai sil hrang chu an lâka.
Jehua le Rekaba nâipa Jehonadaba chu Baal tempila khan an lûta, Baal biak ngai ni loi,

Hâlirvôm thilinhlan le thil dang inhlanin Baal tempila khan an lût tâka. Jehua’n mi sômriat pên tiang khan a thuphaia, an kuang khan, “Hihai hi nin ithathai ving hrang a ni, nin inzôkhai paiin chu an zôktu tak chu suak nêkin thatpai zôi zel ni nin ti,” a tia.

Hâlirvôm thil ar hlan zoiin chu Jehua’n a sipai le a hruaituhai kuang, “Lût unglân, tûte hôihai loiin thatpaihai ving roi,” a tia. Baal tempila khan an lûta khandai irdok saiin, an thathaia; an ruakhai an hong kêlsua paihaia; tempil sûngrîla an lûta.
Kha hmun khan Baal illim thinga an isin, phun indet kha an lâka, an hâlpaia.
Baal illim lungphuna an isinhai an inkhiak pehaia, tempil kha an insiata, atûn ten hin mihaiin ramfenahaiin an ihmang tâk a ni.
Khaang dôra siatin Baal biakna hmun Israela om chu insiat a ni.
Nebata nâipa Jeroboama sualna sikin, Israelhai hruai insualna chu Jehua’n thathai zoi nuam maka. Bethel le Dan khuaa rângachak illima siam sehrât illim kha an la biak mai a ni.
Jehua kuang, “Ki mithmua thil sa ni thoa, ki inuam lam angin Ahaba in sûng mihai ni soisak thei sikin nir chihai chu irlo minli dênin Israel rama inlal an ti,” a tia.
Khannisianlân, Jehua’n
Kha lai khan Israel ram chu
Jordan dung nisua tiang panga ram, Gilead hai, Gad hai, Reubena hai le Manasea hai omna ram Arnon tui kôlhaia, Aroer, an khopui Gilead le Basan dênin a lâkpai tâka.
Jehua sintho danghai chu, a hrât lamhai chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna bua a chuang vinga.
Jehua chu a thia, Samari khuaa an phûm tâka. A nâipa Jehoahaza chu ar thûlin an lal nôka.
Kum sômhni kiriat sûng chu Samari khuaa Jehua chu a inlal a ni.
Reng Ahazia thina thu a nu Athali’n an hriatin chu rêng in sûng mihai an thattirhaia.

Ahazia nâipa Joasa irchia mi ithat zoi loi, rêng Jorama nâinu Jehosebi, Ahazia farnu’n a thup inrûk a ni. A dontu leh tempil hmun khata hin Athali hmu thei loina hrangin thup inrûk a nia, thatpai theiloi a ni.
Athali inlal zoro kum ruk sûng chu Jehosebi khan tempila thupin, a ienkol a ni.

A kum sarina tena chu ochai inlaltak Jehoiada’n rêng hrungtu Keret sipai irzakhat hruaitu le rêng in hrungtu sipaihai chu a koibukhaia; an thiltho tum chu a hrilhaia, tempil sûnga khomâkirsâmin a sa a tipuia, rêng Ahazia nâipa Joasa chu a hmua.
Khan ama’n, “Nin tho tum chu hiang hin a ni: nin laia irngam nia hong hranghai hi hmun thuma sena, hmun khatin rêng in chu hrung ri sehai.
“Hmun thuma hmun khatin Sur lampui hrung unglân; a dang hmun khathaiin a hrungtuhai hnunga lampui hrung roi,
a hrungtu pâl hni Sabat nia irngam hranghaiin rêng in hrung hrangin tempila an iom hrang a ni.
Reng Joasa hi khandai kêlsua saia chôiin nin ihrung hrang a ni, a fena hmun tina zui unglân; a hong nâi murdi chu lei thathai roi,” a tia.
Sipai hruaituin Jehoiada thu suak chu an zôma, an sipai Sabat nia irngam hranghai le sintho hranghai chu an hong hruaihaia.
Tempil sûnga an ihrê insa rêng Davida ufei le a phohai chu sipai hruaituhai kuta an pêka.
Tempil maton tiang khandai kêlsua sai chôiin rêng in hrung hrangin ar tângtirhaia.

Jehoiada’n Joasa chu a hruai suaka, rêng lukhum chu an khumtira, rêng om hrang dân hrang irziakna bu chu a pêka; Joasa chu sahriak a pola, rêng a chang tâka. Mipuihaiin an kut an inbên dur dura, “Reng chu dam sôt ri se,” an tia.
Rengnu Athali’n a hrungtuhai le sipaihai irhâi an hriatin, mipui irbukna tempil tiang inrang takin a fe suaka.

Reng thar chu rênghai ngîrna hmun hranga inkungna tempil lûtna bang bula khan a lei ngîra. Sipai hruaitu le bekul tum theihaiin an le’rhuala, mipuihai chu raifân takin an len nui dur dura. Bekul an tuma. Athali chardongin, a puan an potthêra, “An ni ihuang kêng a ni hi te,” a tia.
Jehoiada’n tempil irkulna sûnga Athali that chu a sa ti maka, sipai hruaituhai kuang khan, “Sipai irtânghai laia hruai suak unglân, a san hranga hong murdi lei thatpaihai roi,” a tia.
Athali chu an chela, rêng in tiang panin an hruaia, sakor mikot an itina hmuna khan an thatpai tâka.
Ochai, Jehoiada’n rêng Joasa le mipui chu
Mipuihai chu Baal tempila an fea, an insiata, maichâmhai insiatin, millimhai chu an vîk siathai vinga. Baal ochai Matana chu a maichâm kôla khan an thata.
Ochai Jehoiada’n tempil hrung hrangin mi a siaa.

Reng hrungtu Keret sipai irzakhat hruaitu, rêng in hrungtu sipai hruaitu leh khan, tempil rengata rêng chu reng ina an hruaia, mipuiin an zuia. A hrungtuhai mikota Joasa chu a lûta, rêngtoihmunna khan a toi tâka.
Mipuihai chu a sâna raiinfânin, Athali chu rêng ina an that sikin, kho sûnga ite buaina om ta mah.
Khanchu Joasa khom kum sari a niin Judai rama rêng a chang tâka.
Israel rama Jehua kum sari an lal kuma khan Joasa khom Judai rama an lala, Jerusalema kum sômminli an lala. A nu chu Berseba khuaa mi Zibi a ni.
Ochai Jehoiada ikaihruai ngai a ni sikin a dam sûng chu
Khannisian nam danghai pathian biakna hmunhai chu masan thei loiin a oma, mihaiin thil an la inhlan thei mai a ni.

Jehoiada’n ochaihai chu a koi bukhaia, tempila thilinhlan balamin thil pêk an hong chôi ngai a ni, senkhat chu thilinhlana khan pe ngêt hranga hril a ni sikin, lômna thilpêkhai chu sataka se hranga hril an ni.
An sinthotuhaiin kha sumhai kha a chôitu chu ochai sinthotuhaiin dong an ta, tempil siam insatna’n an ihmang ngai a ni.
Kum sômhni inthum Joasa an lal zoi khomin tempil chu siam insat loiin a om maia.

Jehoiada le ochai danghai chu a koihaia, “Itina mo tempil nin la isiam insat mai loi hi? Atûn ata chu nin poisa dôn ngai kha dôn ta no roi, a siana nin isia ngêt hrang a ni ta; khan kêng tempil siam insat a ini ta hrang,” a tia.
Ochaihaiin mihai kuang ata tangka la ta loi le tempil siat siamtu ni loi chu a sa an tia.

Ochai liantak Jehoiada’n bôm a siama, a sîng a’r-ôngtira, maichâm kôla tempil lûtna chang tiang a siaa. Tempil lûtna bula ochai lei ompu khan Pathian kuanga thilpêkhai lâk ngaitu khan a lei lâka, bôm sûnga khan a thona.
Bôm sûnga sum a tam tena chu rêng lekha irziaktu le ochai Jehoiada chu an honga, tangka sum chu an hâl inzôia, irkhîsiarin an siaa.
An irkhî zoiin chu tempil siam insatna sin enkoltuhai kuang an pêka, annihaiin sinthotu mistirihai hlo an pêka.
Lungtukhai le a sintuhaiin tempil siam insatna hrang thing le lung an irchôka, poisa hmangna hrang hmuna poisa an pêkhaia.
Tholôm poisa chu tangka ru le berbu hai, bekul le meiser enkolna hmangrua hai, sumru le rângachak thil chi dang dang siamna’n chu hmang nuam viat mahai.
Sin thotuhai hlo le neinun irchôkna vaiin an hmang a ni.
Sin thotuhai chu mi diktak an nia, an poisa hmang lam khom ite enpui nang mahai.
Sual irbôlna le siatna man thilinhlan balama an thilpêkhai chu sia sa ni maka, ochaihai dongtum pial a ni.
Kha laia khan, Suria rêng Hazaela’n Gath khua a rûna, an hnêa, Jerusalem khom rûn a tuma.
Juda rêng Joasa’n a matona rêng Jehosafata hai, Jehorama hai le Ahazia haiin
Reng Joasa thiltho dang murdi chu Juda rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang;
Joasa chu a rualhai inhni leh an khitphiarhaia.
A thattuhai chu Simeata nâipa Jozakara le Somera nâipa Jehozabada an ni. A thia, Davida khopuia rêng thâna an phûma, a nâipa Amazia chu a’rthûlin an lal nôk ta.
Ahazia nâipa Joasa chu Judai rama kum sômhni inthum an lalna kum a niin chu, Jehua nâipa Jehoahaza khom Israel rêngin an lala. Samari khuaa, kum sômhleihni an lala.
Reng Jeroboama Nebata nâipa angin
Khasikin Israelhai chunga
Jehoahaza chu
Israelhai kôla a san hrang a tîr pehai ngaia. Suriahai ata chu a sansuakhaia, irtharngam takin an om nôk ngai.
Nebata nâipa rêng Jeroboama in sûng mihaiin Israelhai an ihruai insualna dikloi ata irlet nuam loiin, an la sual maia, Asera illim chu Samari khuaa khan an la donsui mai ngaia.

Jehoahaza chu sipai tômte a nei tâk sikin, sakor chung chuang mi sômringa, tâli sômkhat le kea fe sipai sîngkhat vai a neihai tâka, Suria rêngin an hnê hrai sikin, kea pil vâiphin sir angin a isirbe a ni.
Jehoahaza thil tho danghai chu, a ihâi lam dân chu Israelhai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
A thia, a nâipa Jehoasa’n ar thûlin a inlal nôk a ni ta.
Judai rama Joasa kum sômthum sari an lal kumin Jehoasa chu Israel rêng a nia; Samari khuaa kum sômhleiruk an lala.
Ama khomin
Jehoasa thil tho dang Judahai rêng Amazia le an irdoia, a ihâi lam dân thuhai chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Jehoasa chu a thia, Samari khuaa rênghai thâna an phûma. A nâipa Jeroboama inhnina chu ar thûlin an lal nôk ta.
Deipu Elisa chu a thipuina hrangin natna tuangin zâlhmuna a zâla, thi anai pe tâk sikin rêng Jehoasa’n a va pana; “Ka pa, ka pa, Israelhai inzôktu roiinpui tiin,” a châ tâka.
Elisa’n a koia, “Thal ngul nei le thal chi danghai ni pe hi roi,” a tia.
Israel rêng kuang khan, “Thal ngulnei hi chel ro,” a tia. A chel zoiin chu Elisa’n rêng kut intûkin, “Sak tianga tukver kha inhong hi roi” a tia. an inhong pea.
“Thal kha hei kâp ta” a tia. A hei kâpa, deipu Elisa’n, “Suria inhnê hrang
Elisa’n rêng kuang khan, “Thal dang kha la nôk ro,” a tia. A hei lâka, “Irnêng kha sun ro,” a tia, voithum a suna a mong tâka.
Pathian mi kha a ning an mur pea, voiringa voiruk khom sun ro, Suriahai chu inhekhai zoi ni ti, voithum kêng ni inhnêhai hrang a tia.
Elisa chu a thia, an phûm tâka, kum a hong thar rikipin Moabhaiin Israel ram an hong doihaia.
Mi inkhat hi a thia, phûm an irsoi lai takin Moab rual pâl khat an honga, Elisa thâna khan an van boka an intâna. Kha pa ruak leh khan Elisa ru a zu tônin chu a hong hring zela, a ngîr suak tâka.
Jehoahaza dam sûng chu Suria rêng Hazaela’n Israelhai chu deng an theitira.
Khannisianlân,
Suria rêng Hazaela chu a thia, a nâipa Benhadada chu ar thûlin an lala.
Jehoahaza nâipa Jehoasa’n Hazaela nâipa Benhadada kut ata a pa Jehoahaza khua le tui an ilâkpai pehai chu a lâk kîr nôka, an irdoina voithum an hnêa, Israel ram khuahai chu a sutpai zoi tah a ni.
Jehoahaza nâipa Jehoasa chu Israel rêng nih a ta, kum hninaa khan Joasa nâipa Amazia chu
kum sômhni ringa mi a niin Judai rama rêng a changa, Jerusalema kum sômhni kum kuak an lala, a nu chu Jerusalem khuaa mi Jehoadini a ni.
mithmua sin a thoa, a pu rêng Davida ang dôr a ni no khomin, a pa Joasa ithohai anga tho theiin a oma.
Nam dang pathian an ibiakna hmunhai chu insiat ual maka, mipuihaiin thilinhlanin rimhoi an la hâl mai ngai a ni.
Amazia an lal det ata chu, a pa thattuhai a thathaia.
An nâihai chu thathai ma; Mosia dân bua
Amazia chu michi suakna hmuna, Edom mi in sûngkhat a thathaia, Sela khua a doia an hnêhaia, ar hming khom Joktheel tiin a phuaa, atûn ten hi khua irhming a la ni mai.
Amazia chu Jehoahaza nâipa Jehoasa, Israel rêng kuang palai a tîra, “Pasal le pasal ir-en ei ti,” a tia.

Israel rêng Jehoasa’n Judahai rêng Amazia chu chong an thuana, “Lebanon tânga thing saiso kôla khan, ni nâinu kha ki nâipa dôngma hrangin ni pe ro, a tia. Ramsahai hin thing sûlhnahai hi an isir siat zoi hrang nêkin chu, a tia.
Edom-hai kin hnê ta ni tia, ni irsorpui ok mani ta; lunghoi takin in sûnga irngam chian ta ro, nangma le Judai ram siatna hrang buaina kêlsua ta no ro,” a tia.
Amazia’n ite bê’n bê maka, Israel rêng Jehoasa chu ar siam irfôk nôka, Juda khuaa khan, pasal le pasal an irtong tâka.
Judahai chu dokin, an in tiang an rot tâk a ni.
Israel rêng Jehoasa’n Juda rêng Amazia chu Beth-Semes-a khan an chela. Jerusalema an hruaia, kul bang Efraima inkhâr ata kul lampui kôina inkhâr dênin, mûk irzaminli tena hla chu an siata.
tempil sûng le rêng sum siana in tangka le rângachak bêl le bûrhai a lâka, Samari khua tiang panin an fe tâka.
Jehoasa sintho dang, a roiinpuina; Juda rêng Amazia leh an irdoina thuhai chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Jehoasa chu a thia, Samari khuaa rênghai thâna an phûma, a nâipa Jeroboama inhnina chu ar thûlin an lal nôk tâka.
Israel rêng Jehoahaza nâipa Jehoasa thi hnungin Amazia chu kum sômhlei ringa a la dama.
Amazia sintho danghai chu Juda rênghai thurchi irziakna bua a chuang.
Jerusalema, Amazia chu an khita, Lakis khuaa an tâna; khannisian a râlhaiin an irzûla an thatpai ta.
A ruak chu Jerusalem tiang sakorin an pêla; Davida khopuia, rênghai thâna an phûma.
Judai ram mihaiin a nâipa kum sômhleiruka, a nâi Uzia chu a pa Amazia irthûlin rêng an inchanga.
A pa thi zoiin Uzia’n Elat khua chu Judai ram an changtira, a isiam insa nôk a ni.
Joasa nâipa Amazia chu Juda rêng kum sômhlei ringa a ni kumin Jehoasa nâipa Jeroboama inhnina chu Israel rêng a nia. Samari khuaa kum sômminli an lala.
mithmua thilsual a thoa, an pu Nebata nâipa Jeroboama thilsual tho, Israelhai a hruai insualna chu masan nuam maka.
Israel ram lei ni ngai, Hamath fena tianga tuipui thi kâra ram chu a lâk kîr nôka. Kha ram kha a siahlo Gath Hoper mi Amitaia nâipa, deipu bâia
Israelhai ituang intak lam chu
Israelhai chu insiathai chit chu tum maka, a sanhai hrangin Jeroboama inhnina hi a zuang ihmang nôk a ni.
Jeroboama sintho dang murdi chu, irdoina hmuna a hâi lam le Damaska le Ferkânna Hamath, Israelhai ram a ilâkna thuhai chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Jeroboama chu a thia, Samari khuaa rênghai thâna an phûma, a nâipa Zakaria chu a’rthûlin an lal nôk tâka.
Jeroboama inhnina chu Israel rama kum sômhni sari an lal kumin,
Amazia nâipa Uzia chu kum sôm kum ruk mi a nia. Judahai rêng a nia, Jerusalema kum sômringa kum hni an lala. A nu chu Jerusalem mi Jekoli a ni.
A pa Amazia angin
Khasikin, rêng kha
A nâipa Jothama’n rêng in sûngkua chu a hruaia, Judai ram chu a ilua a ni ta.
Uzia sintho danghai chu Juda rênghai thurchi irziakna bua a chuang.
Uzia chu a thia, Davida khopuia rênghai irphûmna thâna an phûma, a nâipa Jothama chu ama irthûlin an lal tâka.
Uzia chu Judai rama kum sômthum kum riat an lal kumin, Jeroboama nâipa Zekaria chu Israel rêng a hong nia, Samari khuaa tha ruk an lala.
Ama matona rêng danghai angin,
Jabesa nâipa Zaluma khan Zekaria chu a khitphiara, Ibleam khuaa a thata, ar thûlin an lal ta.
Zekaria sintho danghai chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Jehua kuanga
Uzia chu Juda rêng, kum sômthum kuak a ni kumin Jabesa nâipa Saluma chu Israel rêng a nia. Samari khuaa tha khat an lala.
Gadia nâipa Menahema chu Tirza rengata Samari khuaa a honga, Saluma chu a thata, ar thûlin an lal tâka.
Saluma sintho danghai chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.

Tirza rengata Menahema a hong hro lai khan Tapua khua chu ama thu hnuaia an om nuam no sikin, an siatpaia, a sûnga omhai le a ram vêla omhai chu a thathaia, nupang inrâi laihai khom an phîng vun a sunthêr pehai a ni.
Uzia chu Juda rêng kum sômthum kuak a ni kumin, Gadia nâipa Menahema chu Israel rêng a nia. Samari khuaa kum sôm an lala.
mithmua thilsual a thoa, Nebata nâipa Jeroboama thilsual tho, Israelhai hruai insualna sual kha a dam sûngin masan thei maka.
Reng Tiglat Pilesera’n Israel ram a doia, Menahema’n tangka sumru her sîngthum sângminli a lei pêka, ni nuampui a tih iti sabeiin.
Menahema’n Israel mi irchonghai tangka sômringain a suthaia, kha sum kha a pêka; khanchu, Tiglat Pilesera chu an ram tiang a fe nôk ta.
Menahema sintho danghai chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
A thia, an phûma, a nâipa Pekahia chu a’rthûlin an lal nôk ta.
Uzia chu Juda rêng kum sômringa a ni kumin, Menahema nâipa Pekahia chu Israel rama an lala, Samari khuaa kum hni an lala.
mithmua thilsual a thoa, Nebata nâipa Jeroboama thilsual tho, Israelhai hruai insual kha masan nuam loiin,
a sipai hruaitu inkhat Ramalia nâipa Pekahia’n Gilead khua mi sômringahai leh an khithaia. Pekahia chu Samari khua kul Argob le Aria kôla an thata. ar thûlin an lal nôk ta.
Pekahia sintho murdi chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Uzia chu Juda rêng kum sômringa inhni a ni kumin, Remalia nâipa Pekahia chu Israel rêng a nia. Samari khuaa kum sômhni an lala.
mithmua thilsual a thoa, Nebata nâipa Jeroboama thilsual tho Israelhai hruai insualna masan loiin a oma.

Pekahia inlal zoro hin Assuria rêng Tiglat Pilesera hin Ijon khua, Abela Bethmaka, Janoa, Kades le Hazor khua hai lâkin, Gilead ram, Galili ram le Naftalia ramhai a lâk saa, mipuihai chu Suria rama a thonhaia.
Uzia nâipa Jothama chu Judahai rêng kum sômhni a chang kumin, Ela nâipa Hosea’n Pekahia chu khitphiarin a doia, a that tâka, ar thûlin an lal ta.
Pekahia thiltho danghai chu Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna bua a chuang.
Remalia nâipa Pekahia chu Israel rêng kum hni a chang kumin, Uzia nâipa Jothama chu,
kum sômhni ringa mi a nia, Judahai rêng a changa, Jerusalema kum sôm kum ruk an lala, a nu chu Zadoka nâinu Jerusi a ni.
A pa Uzia sintho angin
Nam dang pathian biakna hmun irsânghai chu masan loiin; mihaiin thil an la inhlan nôk maia, thil rimhoi an la ihâlna mai a ni. Tempil hmâr tianga inkhâr hi Jothama isiam a ni.
Jothama sintho danghai chu Juda rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
An lal lai hin
Jothama chu a thia, Davida khopui rênghai thâna an phûma, a nâipa Ahaza chu a’rthûlin an lal nôk ta.
Remalia nâipa Pekahia chu Israel rêng kum sômhleisari a ni kumin, Jothama nâipa Ahaza chu
kum sômhni mi a nia, Juda rêng a changa. Jerusalema kum sômhleiruk an lala. A pu Davida angin
Israel rênghai tho dân saloi a zui a ni. Ama nâipa inkhat chu hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrangin a thata. Millimhai makunga ar hlana; Israelhai kôla
Tâng tianghaia, thing inhripom tak takhai omna rikipa thilinhlanin, rimhoihai a hâla.
Suria rêng Rezina le Israel rêng Pekahia khan Jerusalema an doia; khannisianlân, inhnê loiin an oma.
Hi zoro hin Edom rêng Rezina’n Ela khua a suthaia, Juda omhai chu an hnotsuakhaia, Edomhai chu Ela khuaa atûn ten hin an iom tâk a ni.
Ahaza’n Assuria rêng Tiglat Pilesera kuang palai a tîra, “Ni siahlo, ni nâi ki ni, Suria rêng le Israel rêngin an ni doia, khasikin anni kut ata hi ni sansuak ta ro,” a tia.
Khan Ahaza’n
Assuria rêngin Ahaza ingên angin Damaska khua chu a sipaihai leh an doia, a lâka, Rezina chu a thata, a mihai chu a khopui Kir khuaa suakin a dônhaia.
Assuria rêng Tiglat Pilesera hmu hrangin Ahaza chu Damaska khuaa a fea, Damaska khuaa maichâm chu a ena, ochai Uria a koia, an maichâm siam dân chu chipchiar takin an entira.
Uria’n Damaska khuaa maichâm ang zekin a siama, Ahaza hong kîr mân a siam zoia.
Damaska khua ata a hongin chu, Ahaza’n maichâm siam zoi sai chu a hmua.
Rengin hâlirvôm thilinhlanin, bu le bâl thil inhlanin, Uain thilhai le, a fâk nêk zongtu thisen nei thil inhlanhai chu maichâma khan an theka.
Dâr maichâm,

Uria kuang khan, “Ki maichâm hi a lian ual a nia, zîng tiang le khohloi tianga hâlirvôm thilinhlanna’n hmang inlân, rênghai le mipuihai hrang bîka thilinhlanna’n bu le bâlhai khomin hmang sa inlân, mipui uain thilinhlan khan bun sa ngai ro. Hâlirvôm le thil dang thisen khom hi maichâm hi inthek ngai ro. Dâr maichâm chu ki Pathian biakna hrangin hrê irthiangtir ro,” a tia.
Uria’n rêng thupêk angin a thoa.
Reng Ahaza’n dâr irbu irsût thei chu a kheka, tui siana tuibêl chu a lâka. Dâr tuipang sechal sômhleihni chunga om chu a sonpaia, lung irchuan chunga a siaa.
Assuria rêng hrât loi lungchukna’n Ahaza chu tempil ata irthokin rêngtoihmun irkulna toihmun a lâk sona, tempila rêng lûtna hrang bîka siam lampui an hrukpai tâka.
Reng Ahaza sintho dang murdi chu Juda rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Ahaza chu a thia, Davida khopui rêng thâna an phûma, a nâipa Hezekia chu a’rthûlin an lal nôk ta a ni.
Ahaza chu Judahai rêng kum sômhleihni a ni kumin, Ela nâipa Hosea chu Israel rêng a nia, Samari khuaa kum kuak an lala.
mithmua thilsual a thoa, matona Israel rênghai ang dôra sual chu ni ual maka.
Assuria rêng Salmanesera’n a doia, Hosea khom a le’rpêk saa, kum tin khâzana a chôipuihaia,

Kum khat chu Hosea’n Aigupta rêng Soa kuang palai a tîra, a changpui hrangin a ngêna, a kum tin khâzana chôia Assuria kuanga a ipêk ngai kha pe nuam ta maka. Salmanesera’n kha thu kha an hriatin, Hosea a chela, zêl ina a khum tâka.
Salmanesera’n Israel ram chu a doi tâka, Samari khua kha ar huala; kum thum ar hual tena chu,

Hosea kum kuak an lal kumin, Samari khua chu Assuria rêngin a lâk tâka; Israelhai chu suakin a hmanghai ta. Assuria rama a hruaihaia, senkhat chu Hela khuaa an omtirhaia, senkhat chu Gozan bial Habor tui kôla le Media ram khuaa an omtirhaia.
Israelhaiin an Pathian
Nam dang, anni ata inhnotsuakhai omdân kha an lâka, Israel rênghaiin thil saloi tak an itho ngai kha an la tho nuam maia.
An Pathian nuam loi lam tak Israelhaiin an thoa; an omna khua a chîn le a lian hmun tina, nam dang pathian biakna hmun irsâng an siamhai maia.
Mual le tâng tam dôrin, thingkung sa le inhrip omna dôra lung millim le pathiannu Aseri irlim thing an phun insiphaia.
Ram ata
thupêk, millim biak loi hrang a iti zôm nuam loiin an oma.
Khannisian, zôm nuam viat mahaia, an puhai angin tukullian an songa, an Pathian
A thupêkhai kha zôm nuam loiin an oma, an pahai le thuthung chu an mâksana, an irchutirna inkhat khom zôm nuam loiin an oma. Chanlamboi thu, millimhai biakin an oma,
An nâinu le nâipahai khom nam dang pathian makunga hâlirvôm thil inhlanin ram khohri le mitphil theihai leh irthopin.
Israel mihai chunga
Judahai khomin an Pathian
Israel murdi chu a ihnôlhai a ni ta, deng an theihaia, râl ichiom tak takhai kuta a pêkhaia, a hmu phâk loina hrang hmuna a tîrhai ta a ni.
Jeroboama hnung an zuia, thilsual a itho dôr, anni khomin an thoa.
A siahlo deipuhai hmanga a ihril angin a hmuphâk loina rama a inhnotpai sabak a ni ta. Khanchu, Israel mihai chu Assuria rama atûn ten hin sala an intâng a ni ta.
Assuria rêngin Babulon hai, Kuth hai, Iva hai, Hamath le Sefarvaim khuaa omhai chu a hruaia; Israel suaka hruaia omhai irthûlin Samaria rama an omtira; kha khuahai kha an luaa an iom a ni ta.
An om phut laiin chu
Assuria rêng chu Samari ram khuaa mihriam siahaiin kha rama an Pathian dân inhre loiin an oma, khasikin chung Pathianin kâmkeibaknei a sê hranga a itîr a nih ti thu a hrila.
Rengin, “Suaka kin ichel ochai inkhat kha insuain lân, an ram Pathian dân irchutira, an laia oma irchutirhai hrangin tîr roi,” a tia.
Khanchu, Israel ochai inkhat Samari khua ata suaka an ichel chu a fea, Bethel-a a lei oma; khatak ata mihaiin
Samari rama om tâkhaiin anni millim an siamhaia. Israelhai Pathian biakna hmun hranga an isiama khan an siaa, pôl tamtakhai khomin an omna hmun tina millim an siamhai maia.
Babulon ata honghaiin Sukoth Benot illim an siama, Kuth mihaiin Nergal-a illim an siama, Hamath-haiin Asima illim,
Iva mihaiin Nibaza illim le Tartaka illim, Sefarvaim haiin an pathian Andramelek le Anamelek illim kôla an nâinu le nâipahai hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrangin an thathaia.
Hi mihai hin
chu an biaka, an hongna ram tho dân angin an pathianhai an ibiak sa mai ngai a ni.
A vuanhai tena an tho dân milui an la itho mai a ni.
Israel mihai le
A zoi tâkhai le thei taka Aigupta ram ata la suakhai thu hi zôm roi, chubai ni mûk nin ta, thil khom nin inhlan hrang a ni.
Nin ta hranga ki irziak, dân le thupêkhai hi nin izôm mai hrang a ni, pathian danghai thu nin izôm hrang ni ma.
Thuthung nangni ki isiam pehai hi nin irnghil viat hrang ni ma.
Kei nin Pathian,
Khannisianlân, kha mihai khan an mikuar lût no ni, an tho tum chu tho mai an ti.
Hi mihai hin
Ela nâipa Hosea chu Israel rêng kum thum an lal kumin, Ahaza nâipa Hezekia chu
kum sômhni ringa a ni kumin Judahai rêng a changa, Jerusalema kum sômhni kum kuak an lala. A nu chu Zekaria nâinu Abija a ni.
A pu Davida angin

Nam dang pathian biakna hmun irsânghai an siata, an lungphunhai khom an khiakpaia, pathiannu Asera illim, thing an iphunhai khom an siatpaia, Mosia dâr mirûl illim siam Nehustan an iti khom kha an siatpaia, kha zoro dênin Israelhaiin dâr mirûl illim ta hranga hâlirvôm thilinhlan ngai a ni.
Hezekia’n
A
Khasikin,
Filistia mihai a soisakhaia, an omna murdia a doihaia, khua lian le chîn Gaza le a kôlvêla ramhai khom an mâk zoi ta.
Hezekia kum minli an lal kumin, Hosea chu Israel rêng kum sari a lei ni tâka, Assuria rêng Salmanesera khan Israel ram a hong doia; Samari khua a hor huala.
Kum thum an irhual kum Hezekia rêng kum rukna tena chu an lâk tâka, Hosea inlal kum kuakna a ni.
Assuria rêngin Israelhai chu suaka an hruaihaia, Assuria rama an hruaihaia, Gozan ram Habor tui kôlhaia le Media khuahaia an inomtirhaia.
Israelhaiin an Pathian
Hezekia kum sôm kum minli an lal kumin, Assuria rêng Senakeriba’n Judai ram kul neina khuahai chu a doia, an hnêhaia.

Lakis khua Senakeriba khuaa om chu Hezekia’n, “Thil ki lei itho indik loi kêng a ni ta. Ni rotsan ta ro, ni izong tak nang pe ki ti,” tiin lekha a thona. Assuria rêngin sumru her sîngkhat le rângachak her sângkhat chôi ro, a ti pea.
Tempil le rêng sum koka sum om murdi chu a thona,
Tempil mikota rângachak bêl illimhai khom a khoka, a kutin inkhâr irvôna rângachak kha a khoia, Senakeriba chu a thon tâka.

Assuria rêngin Jerusalema Hezekia doi hrangin sipai tamtak a tîra, sipai hruaitu lian inthum, Tartana, Rab-saria le Rab-sakea hai a hruaihaia. Jerusalem an hong tungin chu dîl sak tiang ata tui lama puan irsûkna hmun fena lama khan an oma.
Reng chu an insama, rêng in enkoltu Hilkia nâipa Eliakima lekha irziaktu Sibna, Asafa nâipa, thil irsinsia ngaitu Joa chu a zuang suaka.
Rab-sakea’n a kuang khan, “Hezekia hi hong hril ro, rêng roiinpui Assuria khan hiang hin a ti, Tu mo ni la isabei, hianga ni la irsong!
Hmûrthiam ringotin sipai hrâtna irdoi theihai hi ni la ingam mai mo a ini? Assuria doi hrangin tu ngân mo nang a la hong san hrang?

Aigupta’n ni la san a tih ni la isôn mai ma ni? thingluang ang mamaia om a ni, ni la inhriat loi ma ni, kiak a ta ni kut kêng nang a la isun pena hrang. Aigupta rêng Faroa chu ama iamtuhai chu ite bêa an ibe loi a ni ta.
Nin Pathian
Khanchu, ka pu Assuria rêng leh hin irngei unglân chu; nang a san hrangin sakor sânghni, atûn zel nang pe ki ti, a tia.
Assuria sipai hruaitu laia nâipang tak khom pha mak chêia, sakor puakpêl, le sakor chung chuang theihai hi nang hong thon nuam viat no ni?
Nin ram kin hong rûna, ki ilâk hi
Eliakima, Sebna le Joa haiin, “Suria chongin thu hril ro, kin inhriat thei; Juda chong chu hmang no ro, kul bang bula toihai hin an irngai nuam a ni,” an tia.

Ama’n, “Assuria rêngin nangni le nin rêng Hezekia kuang ringot thuhril hrangin nin ni itîr ma ni? ni ma, mipui atûna kul bang bula toihai le nangnihai ang dêna mizun le êk la fâk hranghai laia khom thu ki ihril a ni hi,” a tia.
Khanchu, Rab-sakea a ngîra, Juda chongin a khêka, “Reng roiinpui Assuria thu hi irngai roi,
Hezekia’n nangni huang no ri se, keima ata hi zôk ual bîk no ni, rêngin a ti.
ni san a ti. Assuria rêngin hi khua hi inhnê no ni, tiin

Hezekia thu irngaiirsâng pe no roi, Assuria rêngin, irngeina siam unglân, hong suak roi, ki hong tung nôk mâka chu mâni grep ra fa unglân, mâni theipui ra lei tûng roi, mâni tui panga tui lei in mai roi.

Rengin ram sataka, grep irhuan satak taka uain tamna rama nangni lan omtir a ti, baidia siam hrang bu sana rama, oliv kung, le a hriak, le khuaitui tamna rama nangni inomtir a ti, a thu nin zômin chu a hring, a damin la suak nin ta, thi no chin ni.
Assuria rengata irthokin a ram san suakpui thei hrang nam, tu Pathian mo om?
Hemat le Arpad pathianhai kha khôn mo an om zoi ta? Sefarvaim pathianhai Hena le Iva pathianhai kha khôn mo an om zoi ta? Samari khua sansuak thei mo an om?
Hi ram murdia pathianhai hin itika khan mo an ram an idok ngai?
Rengin, tûte’n sâm no roi a ti sikin, an dâihreka bâi khat khomin ite sâm mahai.
Reng in sûng enkoltu Hilkia nâipa Eliakima changpuitu Sebna irsinsiatu Asafa nâipa Joa haiin an puan an inpotthêra, an honga, Rab-sakea thu chu Hezekia an hril ta a ni.
Reng Hezekia’n kha thu kha an hriatin chu a puan an potthêra, bora puan a sila,
Reng in sûng enkoltu Eliakima, changpuitu Sebna le ochai laia ulianhai chu bora puan sil deipu Isaia kuang a tîra.
Reng Hezekia’n hiang hin a tia. “A vuan hin kin ta hrangin lungzîngna a itung a ni ta, an ni hmumâka, an ni hnuaisia ok ta a ni. Nâi nei zoro a tunga nuhai an irzal ngôi ngôi angin kin iom a ni ta.
Pathian hring êsêl hranga Assuria rêng itîr, Rab-sakea ihril ang kha,
Reng Hezekia mi a itîrhai khan Isaia kuang an va tunga,
Isaia’n an kuang, “
Irngai ro, a lungrîl indôptir ki ta, thu nan hretir ki ti; a rama kîr nôk a ta, a ram sûnga ngêt chemseiin thatpai an ti, tiin nin pu makunga hril roi,” a tia.
Rab-sakea chu a chuma, Lakis ata Assuria rêng chu a’rsona Libna khua a doi ti an hriatin chu, kha lam kha a pana, a va hmua,
Ethiopia rêng Tirhaka thurchi Assuria rêng chu an hrila. Ama doi hrangin a hor thok a nih ti an hriatin Hezekia kuanga tirtôn a tîra, lekha a thona,
“Judai ram rêng Hezekia kuang, ni iam ngai ni Pathianin Assuria rêng kuta Jerusalem chu pe no ni, tiin nang ni huang no ri se.
Assuria rênghaiin a ram lua murdia an sinthohai le, an ram an insiat thu chu nin hriata. Nangma hi mi nin zôk thei ual bîk hrang ma ni?
ka pahaiin an insiathai nam Gozan, Haran, Rezep le Telasar-ah om Edom mihai kha an pathianhaiin an isan theihai hrang mo?
kho tiang mo Hamath hai rêng, Arpad rêng Sefarvaim khuaa om rêng Hena rêng Iva rênghai kha an iam ta va ti ro,” an tia.
Rual koi fe lekhathon chôitu kha Hezekia’n a lei hmu’n chu a lekhathon a tepa,
Hezekia chu
ni mikuar sungin lân irngai ro. O
O
An pathianhai chu meia an hâl pehaia, khahai kha chu pathian chu ni mahaia, mihriam kuta siam thing le lung mamai an ni, siat thei thil chu an ni.
O
Amoza nâipa Isaia’n Hezekia kuanga mi a tîra, a kôla ni chongchaina chungchâng le Assuria rêng Senakeriba chungchânga
Israelhai Pathian
Zion nâinu’n nang en nuam maka, nang an nuisana.
Jerusalem nâinu’n nang a rotsana a lu nang an thik khuma.
Tu mo nin nuisana,
nang a inlâp pe?
tu hrangin mo ni hnuk irhâi ni inringtir?
Tu kôla mo mualphoi ni irlâk loi?
Israel mi irthianghai lai ata a ni.
Ni siahlohai hmangin “
tâli tamtak le tâng irsânghaia ni luia,
Lebanon tâng hmun tin ki’rfanga,
Sidar thingkung irsâng ki ngôta,
Meisâr thing sa zâthai ki iphûr ngai a ni.
A tâng irsânghaia ramrîlhai khom ki’rfang vinga.
Tui ki sun suaka,
ki in ngai a ni,
Aigupta tuihai ki kezaphain ki sira.
ki sir chîl ta,” ni tia.
Tian ata ki lei itho nuam a nia,
lan hre mak che mo?
Atûna thil hong tung hi tiana ki lei irêl zoi tâk a ni.
Kulnei khuahai nin siatpaia.
A sûnga omhai an thâiindôp lam le beidong taka mual an inphoi dân,
ram le muala hloisûl pâr In chung laia phâizôl anga omhai le,
phâivua lum isêm inthêmhai khom ki lei irêl sai tâk a ni.
Ki chunga ni hla irkhenhai,
ni toi le ni lûthai khom ki irêl sai a ni.
Ki chunga hin ni chiar ngaia,
ni mualinphoi dân ki len hriat ta,
ni hnâra hin hnâr infôktirna irbun ki ta.
Pat ritui hmuam angin,
ni hongna lam tiang kaizang ki ti tiin.

Reng Hezekia kuanga, “Hi hi ni hrangin irsinsiana ni a ti. Kumin hin farhli tûng nin ta, nakum khom kha farhli ngêt kha la tûng nin ti. A kum thumna tena chu ansuangrua song nin ta, a ra irhmal ta nin ti. Grep ling unglân, a ra fa ta nin ti.
Judai rama la dam sunhai chu theikung, inthûk taka irzungthâka ra irkukhak ang la ni an ti.
Jerusalem ata la dam suak hrang an oma, Zion tânga a thi zoi loi an iom ngêt hrang a ni.
Khasikin Assuria rêng chungchânga
A hongna lama ngêt kîr nôk a ta, khua lût viat no ni.
Hi khua hi keima le ki siahlo Davida sikin hrung ki ta, ki inzôk hrang a ni,” a tia.
Kha zâna khan,
Assuria le Senakeriba chu an chîna, Ninevi khuaa an om ta.
Nisroka tempila Pathian a biaka, a kûn lai takin a nâipa Andramelek le Sarezera haiin khandaiin an tuk thata, Ararat rama an rotsan tâka. A nâipa Esarhadona chu ar thûlin an lal nôk ta.
Kha laia khan rêng Hezekia chu thi hrang angin a naa. Amoza nâipa Isaia’n a hong pana. “
Hezekia’n bang tiang a’rheia, a chongchaia:
O
Isaia chu a fea, rêng in tual a khêlin an
“Kei
Kum sôm kum ringa ni dam sûng kum nang ki bôk pe. Assuria rêng kut ata nangma le ama khua hi kei leh ki siahlo Davida zârin inzôk ki ti, a ti va ti ro,” a tia.
Isaia’n, “Theipui ra hmin hor hmal roi,” a tia. Thei ra hmin chu an lâka, a sakhuaia khan an khop pea, a hong dam pe ta.
Reng Hezekia’n, “
Isaia’n, “
Hezekia’n, “kal sôma infetir chu a olhrai ta, kal sômin kîr nôk ri se,” a tia.
Isaia chu a chongchaia, rêng Ahaza irhlîm siam chu
Kha laitaka khan Babulon rêng Balada’n nâipa Merodak-baladana’n Hezekia chu a dam nôk tah ti an hriatin thilpêk le lekha a hong thona.
Hezekia chu a sân a lôma, a sum siana inhai an entira, a sumru, le rângachak hai, a mosola le mirimhoi danghai, a râlthuam hrêna inhai le a ram sûnga hmun poimohai inentir loi zel nei maka.
Deipu Isaia chu Hezekia kuanga a fea, “Hi mihai hi kho rengata hong mo an ini, imo an hong ihril?” a tia. Hezekia’n, “Ram hlatak, Babulon ata hong an ni,” a tia.
Isaia’n, “Reng ina i zât thil mo an hmu?” a tia. Rengin, “Itinrêng an hmu ving thil hrênahai khom itinrêng hmu loi zel nei mahai,” a tia.
Isaia’n Hezekia kuang, “Irngai roh
ni ina thil om murdi, ni pahaiin a vuan sûn tena an ihrêkhômhai hi Babulon-a an lâk ving zoro hong tung hrang a ni, ite mâksan ni no nihai,
Nangma inei ngei, ni nâipasalhai chel an ta, an til la pehai an ta, Babulon rêng sintho pe ta an ti,” a tia.
Reng Hezekia chu a dam sûng kum chu raifân takin om a ta, an izôk hrang tiin ar bêa, “
Reng Hezekia thil tho danghai chu, a hâi lam le tui lût thei loina hmun Akera khuaa tui a inlûtna thu hai, Juda rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang ving.
Hezekia chu a thia, a nâipa Manasea chu ar thûlin an lal nôk ta.
Kum sômhleihni a ni kumin Manasea chu Judahai rêng a chang irphuta, Jerusalema kum sômringa an lala. A nu chu Hezibi a ni.
A mipuihai laia,
A pa Hezekia insiat, nam dang pathian biakna hmun irsânghai chu a siam insata, Baal ta hrangin maichâm a siama, Israel rêng Ahaba ang khan Aseri irlim a phuna, irvâna ârsihai khom a biak ngaia.
Jerusalem khua hi nin ni ibiakna hrang hmun chu a ni; tiin
Tempil sûnga tentan inhnia khan irvâna ârsihai hrang maichâm ar tâng inbita.
A nâipa inkhat chu hâlirvôm thilinhlanna hrangin a thata. Kutzia en le tasân a hmang uara, ramkhohri le mithi kaithoi theihai an phûthai ngaia.
Davida le a nâipa Solomona kuanga
“Israel mihaiin ki thupêkhai an zôma, ki dân, Mosia ihril kha an zôm zita a niin chu an irchihai hi, ram ki ipêkhai ata hi inhnothai no ning, a ti a ni.
Judai rama mihaiin
a siahlo deipuhai hmangin hiang hin a hril.
‘Manasea’n thil intiromtak takhai, hi rama an om mân ata om Kanaan mihai itho ngai nêka intirom a thoa, millim siamin Judahai a ihruai insual a ni.
Khanchu, kei
Samari khua le Israel rêng Ahaba ki isoisak ang khan, Jerusalem khom soisak ki ti. Khêng ei irsûkinfâia ei inkhub ang hin Jerusalem khom a sûnga omhai hi irsûkinfâihai ki ti.
Ki mi, la thi zoi loihai khom hi hnôlhai ki ta, an râlhai kuta la pe ki ta, khanchu an nuam takin soisakhai an ti.
An irchihai Aigupta ram ata an hong suaka irthokin, atûn ten hin, an la itho insual a ni! ki iti anga om loiin ki ningmak an la itho mai ang hin ki mihai a sate’n la soisakhai,’ ki ti.
Manasea’n ite ti loihai a that intamhaia, Jerusalema thisen a iluang hluk a ni. Juda mipuihai chu millim biak an uartirhaia,
Manasea sintho dang thilsual a ithohai chu Juda rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Manasea chu a thia, a rêng irhuan, rêng Uzia irhuan sûnga an phûma, a nâipa Amon chu a’rthûlin an lal nôk ta.
Amon chu kum sômhni inhni a ni kumin Judahai rêng a changa, Jerusalema kum hni an lala, a nu chu Jotba khuaa mi Haruza nâinu Mesulemiti a ni.
A pa Manasea angin
A pa tho dân a lâka, a millim biak ngai a biak uara,
An irchibulhai Pathian
A ituanghai laia mihaiin an khitphiara, rêng in sûnga an thata.
Judahaiin Amon nâipa Josia chu ar thûlin rêngin an siam nôk ta.
Amon sintho danghai chu Juda rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Amon chu Uzia irhuan thâna khan an phûma, a nâipa Josia chu a’rthûlin an lal nôk ta.
Josia chu kum riat a ni kumin Judahai rêng a changa. A nu chu Boskat khuaa mi Adaii nâinu Jedidi a ni.
Josia chu
Kum sômhleiriatna an lal kumin Josia’n a’rziakpuipu Safana, Azalia nâipa, Mesulam tupa
“Ochai inlaltak Hilkia kuang fe’n lân, tempil mikot bula mipuihai tholôm ochaihai irfuang kha i dôr mo a ni ta tiin var donhai roh.
Tempil siam insatna hranga mi an inthanghai kuta pehai sian, anni haiin,
mistiri hai le, in sintu dang le lungtukhai kuanga pe ri sehai; tempil siam insatna hranga thing le lung ircho ri sehai.
Hi mi ei inthanghai hi mi iamom tak tak an ni, ite enpui ual nang no nihai,” a tia.
Ochai inlaltak Hilkia’n a’rziakpuipu Safana kuang, “Tempil sûnga dân lekhabu ki man,” a tia. a pêka, Safana’n a tep inlanga,
Reng kuang a hong kîr nôka, “Ni siahlohaiin in sûnga tangka an iman kha an phora,
Reng kuang khan, “Ochai Hilkia khan hi lekhabu hi a ni lei ipêk a ni,” a tia. Reng inhriat hrangin Safana’n a tep pea.
Rengin dân lekhabu thu kha an hriatin chu a puan an potthêra.
Ochai Hilkia Safana nâipa Ahikama, Mikaia nâipa Akbora, irziaktu Safana rêng in enkoltu Asaia hai makunga rêngin,
“Fe unglân mipuihai le Judai rama mi murdihai hranga hi dân bu irchutirna chungchânga hin

Ochai Hilkia, Ahikama, Akhora, Safana le Asaia hai chu deipunu, Mika nâipa Saluma dôngma Huldaii kuang an fea. A pasal Saluma hi Tikva nâipa a ni, rêng silkai enkoltu a nia, Harhasa tupa a ni, Jerusalem kho thara om an ni.
An kuanga khan, “Israelhai Pathian
Juda rêngin a itep lekhabua chuang ang khan Jerusalema omhai chu a sate’n soisakhai ki ti.
An ni rotsana, pathian dang kuanga thil an inhlana, an sintho dânhai hi ki ning a inmur a ni. Jerusalem chunga hin ki milung ir-al a ta, doi thei ta no ni.
irdon hranga nangni zuang tîrtu rêng kuang khan hril roi, Israelhai Pathian
Jerusalem le a vêla omhai ki soisak dân hrang nin hriata, a na ni iti a ni,
Ni thi mâka chu Jerusalem chu soisak no ning, irtharngam takin nang chu la thi ni tih a ti,” a tia. Reng kuanga kha thu kha an hong hril nôk a ni.
Rengin Judai le Jerusalema upahai a bûmhaia.
Judai le Jerusalema om ochai le deipuhai, mipuihai, inriang le irchonghai, an rêngin tempila an honga, kha tempila an ihrût thuthung bu kha rêngin an rênga inhriat hrangin a tep suaka.
Ngîrna hranga an isiama khan rêng kha a ngîra,
Reng khan ochai inlaltak Hilkia le a hnuaia ochai danghai le mikot hrungtuhai khom

Juda khopui le Jerusalem vêla nam dang pathian biakna hmun irsânga thil inhlantu hranga Juda rênghaiin ochai an lei isia, Baal kôla, misa le tha kôlhaia ârsi le irvâna thil omhai kôla thilinhlan murdi kha a mâka.
tempil sûnga pathiannu Aseri irlim an iphun kha a lâka, Jerusalem dâi Kidron irhôra khan a hâla, a’rvâm chu an hmet india, vântâng thânmuala khan an thek ta.
Tempila notizuarhai omna, Aseri biakna hranga, nuhaiin puan an ikhôngna hmun khom a set pehaia.

Judai ram sûnga khopui tamtaka Geba le Berseba kâra om ochaihai a hruaihaia, nam dang pathian ta hranga thilinhlanna hmunhai an siat pehaia, khopui lûtna vei tianga inkhâr, khopui optu Josua isiam mikot kôla maichâm kêlhai illim an ibiak ngai khom an siat pehaia,
khaanga ochai lei changhai kha chu tempila Pathian biak phalhai maka, an rual ochai danghai kôla an bai chol pol loi man tum ti no chu fa thei mahai.
Molekhai, an nâipasalhai an that thei ta loi hranga Hinom irhôra Tofet kha a soisak ngheka.

Juda rênghaiin misa ta hranga thil inhlan hrang sakor an ipêkhai kha chu tempil inkhâr tuala khan, sorkâr mi liantak Nathan-meleka omna in ata hla ok loiin an siahaia. Khahai kha hrêpaiin, a kaia an ikai ngai tâli chu a hâlpaia.
Reng in le Ahaza in chung inzôla an maichâmhai le tempil sûnga maichâm inhni Manasea isiamhai leh khan a sutpaihaia an siat pehai vinga, Kidron irhôra a paia.

Jerusalem nisua tianga oliv tâng sim tianga Sidon pathian intirom Asterothi illim, Moab pathian intirom Khemosa, Amon-hai pathian hmumâkom tak Milkoma illim an biakna hrang hmun irsâng Israel rêng Solomona isiamhai kha maimang an changhai vinga.
Josia’n lungphunhai chu ar chûm khoihaia, pathiannu Aseri irlim kôla tûngsam thing an iphun khom a tan irkita; kha hmunhaia khan mihriam ru a sia pehaia.
Israelhai hruai insualtu Nebata nâipa Jeroboama’n bethel khuaa Pathian biakna hranga maichâm a isiamhai khom Josia’n an siatpaia, a lunghai an khoihaia. Aseri irlim khom a hâlpaia.

Josia’n a hei thîr vêla, mual inkhata khan thân a hmua, a choia, mihriam ruhai kha ar fuanga maichâma khan a hâla, Khaanga thil hong om hrang chu matona kût hmang laia rêng Jeroboama’n maichâma thil ar hlan laia deipu’n thil a lei insîr kha Josia’n a hei insâp vêlin chu kha laia thu lei insîrtu
deipu thân a hmua, “Tu thân mo?,” a tia. Bethel khuaa mihaiin, “Judai ram ata hong deipu, hi ni thil thohai len sîrtu thân a ni,” an tia.
Josia’n, “Inthem viat no roi, a ruhai khom hiang hin om chian ri se,” a tia. Khanchu a ruhai khom tûte’n inthem loiin an oma, Samari khuaa mi deipu ru khom ite inthem mahai.
Israel ram hmun tina Israel rênghaiin nam dang pathian biakna hmun siamhai an siata, kha rênghai khan kêng
Khaanga sinthotu ochaihai a thata maichâma khan mihriam ru a hâla, Jerusalema a hong kîr nôk ta.
Thuthung lekhabua irziak angin an Pathian
Hi zoroa kût roiinpui hi Israel rêng, Juda rêng tu roirêlna hnuaia khom la om ngai ma.
Khaangin Josia rêng kum sômhleiriatna kuma hin Jerusalema ferkân kût an ihmang a ni.

Ochai inlaltak Hilkia’n tempila dân lekhabu a imana chuang, dânhai chu an zôm theina hrangin Josia’n Jerusalem khua le Judai ram ata kutzia en theihai mi chinginrîla thi len tumhai ngai, in sûngkua pathian lei biakhai, millim le nam dang pathian biakhai khom an paitirhaia.
Lungrîl taka thutakin theitôp insuakin
Reng Manasea sintho sika khan Judahai chunga
“Israelhai chunga ki itho ang kha Judahai chunga khom tho ki ti, Judahai chu ki ihmu phâk loina rama inhnotsuakhai ki ti. Ki omna thân hmun, ki inkung tempil chu suaksan ki ti,” a ti a ni.
Josia sintho danghai chu Juda rênghai thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Josia inlal lai hin Aigupta rêng Nekoa khan a sipaihai Eufrates tuia Assuria rêng changpui hrangin a hruaia. Reng Josia hin lei khâl a tuma. Megido le an irdoina hin a thi ta a ni.
A rualhaiin a ruak chu tâlia an bânga an chôia, rênghai thâna an phûm ta. Judahaiin Josia nâipa Jehoahaza kha rêngin an inthanga, hriak an pol tâka.
Jehoahaza chu kum sômhni inthum a niin Judahai rêng a changa, Jerusalema tha thum an lala. A nu chu Libna khuaa mi Jeremia nâinu Hamutali a ni.
A puhai angin
Aigupta rêng Nekoa khan Hamath biala Ribla hmuna suakin an tânga, an lal zoro a ihêk a ni. Aigupta rêngin Judahai chu sumru her sângringa le rângachak her sômringa an chôitirhai a ni.
Reng Nekoa’n Josia nâipa inkhat Eliakima chu a pa irthûlin rêng an changtira, a’rhming a thûl pea Jehoiakima a iphua a ni, Jehoahaza chu Aigupta rama a hruaia a thi ta a ni.
Reng Jehoiakima chu Aigupta rêngin khâzana chôi an phûta, pe ngêt hrang mipuihai kôla ar chong an riang ti loiin an phûthai a ni.
Jehoiakima chu kum sômhniringa a niin Judahai rêng a changa; Jerusalema kum sômhleikhat an lala. A nu chu Ruma khuaa mi Pedaia nâinu Zebidi a ni.
A puhai ang dênin Jehoiakima’n
Jehoiakima an lal lai hin Babulon rêng Nebukadnezara’n Judai ram a doia, a hnuaia Jehoiakima chu kum thum an lala, a tehel pe tâka.
Babulon sipai rualhai, Moab hai, Amon sipaihai hmangin Jehoiakima a doia. Judai ram insiat hrangin a tîra. Hianga a tho hrang thu hi
Reng Manasea thilsual tho hai, ite ti loia a thathai hluk sikin, a hmuphâk loina rama Judahai a’rzûlhai theina hrangin hi thil hi
Manasea thilthohai hi a ingaidam thei loi a ni.
Jehoiakima thiltho danghai chu Juda rênghai thurchi irziakna bua a chuang.
Jehoiakima chu a thi tâka a nâipa Jehoiakina an lal nôk tâk a ni.
Eufrates tui le Aigupta hmâr tiang ramri kâr murdi hi Babulon rêng thuneina hnuaia a om tâk sikin Aigupta rêng le a sipaihai chu irthok suak ngam ta mahai.
Jehoiakina chu kum sômhleiriat mi a niin Judahai rêng a changa, Jerusalema tha thum an lala. A nu chu Jerusalema mi Elnathana nâinu Nehusti a ni.
A pa angin Jehoiakina khomin
An lal lai hin rêng Nebukadnezara sipaihaiin Jerusalem an hong irhuala.
An irhual lai hin rêng Nebukadnezara chu Jerusalema a lei hon zin lai tak a nia.
A nu nâi a sipaihai le rêngin a mi lian omhai le Jehoiakina chu Babulon kuta a irpêk lût a ni. Nebukadnezara’n an lal kum riatna hin Jehoiakina chu suakin a chela.
Tempil le rêng ina sum om murdi le Babulon khuaa a chôia,

Reng Nebukadnezara’n Jerusalem khua mi, rêng in sûng mi murdi mi lian ualhai sîngkhat suak chang hrangin a hruaihaia. mi kut theithiam, thîrsuhai khom a hruaihai zita. Judai rama chu mi’nmôltehai vai a mâksanhai ta.
Nebukadnezara’n Jehoiakina chu a nu le a dôngma a mi lianhai le Judai rama mi lian ualhai chu Babulon suaka an omtira.
Nebukadnezara’n sipai chang thei loihai chu Babulon tiang a hruaihai zita, mi sângsari le kut theithiam, thîrsuhai sângkhat a hruaihai a ni. Sipai chang zit an ni.
Nebukadnezara’n Jehoiakina pa sangpa Matania chu Judahai rêngin a siaa, a’rhming a thûl pea, Zedekia a iphua a ni.
Zedekia chu kum sômhni inkhat a niin Judahai rêng a changa. Jerusalema kum sômhleikhat an lala. A nu chu Libna khua mi Jeremia nâinu Hamutali a ni.
Reng Jehoiakina angin

Zedekia chu Babulon rêng kôl ata a’rhela; khanchu Zedekia kum kuak an lal kuma tha kuakna sûn sôm niin, Nebukadnezara chu a sipaihai leh an honga, Jerusalem an hong rûna an khuaa dâi kôla hmun an khuara, bang an irkul vinga.
Zedekia inlal kum sômhleikhatna dênin an irhuala.
Kha kuma tha minlina sûn kuak nî chu an khua khom châm a sate’n a tâka, tûte fâk hrang nei ta mahaia.
Khua an irkulna bang chu an inseta, Babulon haiin irhualhai khomsian sipai le rênghai zâna an suak tâka. Reng irhuan kôla an fea, kulbang inhni kâra mikota an suaka, Jordan tui panin an intân tâka.
Babulon sipaiin rêng Zedekia chu an irzûla Jeriko kôla phâirama an chela, a sipaihaiin an rotsan vinga.
Zedekia chu Ribla khua Nebukadnezara makunga an hruaia, a chungthu a lei rêl pe zôia.
Zedekia mithmua ngeiin a nâihai chu Nebukadnezara’n a thathaia, Zedekia mit ru khom a kêlterpai pe sa; kut khit pumin Babulon-a a hruai ta.
Babulon rêng Nebukadnezara inlal kum sômhleikuakna tha ringa le sûn sari ni sûn chu Nebukadnezara hrungtuhai laia an ulian Nebukadnezara chu Jerusalem khuaa a lûta.
Tempil chu a hâla, rêng inhai le Jerusalema mi lianhai in khom a hâl pehaia.
A sipaihaiin khua an irkulna bang an seta.
Nebukadnezara’n khopui sûnga mi la omhai chu Babulon tiang a hruaihaia, mi kut theithiamhai le Babulon la hmu ngai loihai khom suak hrangin a hruaihaia.
Mi chukloitehai vai grep irhuan le loi infâi hrangin Judai rama a mâksanhaia.
Kaldaihaiin tempil dâr chopui, tâli le tuipanghai an insiat, a dâr pumin Babulon-a an chôi.
Maichâma irvut luakna le a siana, meiser siana hmangrua, thilinhlan zoro thisen dôna tâbor, mirimhoi hâlna, tempil sin thôna an ihmang dâr lam pang rêng rêng chu an lâk vinga.
Rângachak le sumrua siam murdi chu berbu lian le a chîn tetehai ite hôi loiin an ilâk infâi ving a ni.
Solomona’n tempila hrang dâra siam chopui, tâli, tuipanghai chu var thei loi raka rik a ni.
Chopui inhnihai chu an irang mai, mûk sômhleiriata irsâng an ni.
Sipai uliantak Nebuzaradana’n ochai inlaltak Seraia le a hnuaia ochai Zefania le tempila ulian inthumhai khom Babulon-a a hruaia.
Kho sûnga ulian dang la omhai, sipai hruaitu dang sipai irdâi tianga thei le mi kâmnang a dang sômrukhai chu,
Nebuzaradana’n Hamath bial Libna khua Nebukadnezara omna khuaa khan a hruaihaia.
Reng a vîkhaia, a lei that polhaia. Khaang khan an rama suaka hruai an ni ta.
Babulon rêng Nebukadnezara’n Ahikama nâipa Gedalia, Sefama tupa chu Judai ram op hrangin an thanga, Babulon-a hruai loihai enkolin a kuta pêkin a oma.

Juda sipai le an ulian Babulon rêng kôla irpêklût nuam loihaiin an inhriatin chu Mizpa khuaa Gedalia kuang an fea; kha sipaihai kha Nethania nâipa Ismaela, Karea nâipa Johana’n le Netofa khua mi Tanhumeta nâipa Seraia le Maaka khua mi Jaazania le a mihai an ni.
Gedalia’n an kuang le an mihai inhriatin, “Kaldai sorkâr sinthohai hi chi no ro. Rama hin om papai unglân, Babulon rêng hnuaia kûn unglân nin ta hrangin sa a ti,” a tia.

Kha kum sûng tha sarina chu Nethania nâipa Ismaela Elisama tupa, rêng irchia mi chu mi sômkhathai le Mizpa khuaa an fea, Gedalia chu a doia, a thatpai tâka. A kôla om Israel le Babulon mihai khom a thathai saa.
Israel mi murdi inriangtehai le sipai ulian lei ni tâkhaiin Babulon-hai an chi no sikin Aigupta ram an fe ta.

Evilmerodaka babulon rêng a ni kumin, Judai rêng Jehoiakina chu lung an khama, intângna in ata an suaka, Jehoiakina chu kum sômthum sari le tha sômhleihni sûn sômhni sûn sari ni an tâng zoiin an insuaka.
A sate’n a chong a hoia, a rêngtoihmun chu rêng danghai nêkin a’rsângtir pea.
Intângna ina songkol a kheka, a dam sûng chu rêng kôla bu a nêk tâka.
Sûn tin a bituk neiin a innang murdihai chu an pêk mai ta ngai a ni.
Adama irchi ar lo fe dân angin Setha, Enosa,
Kenana, Mahalalela, Jareda,
Enoka, Methusela, Lameka,
Nova, Nova hin nâipasal inthum a nei, Setha, Hama le Jafeta, an ni,
Jafeta nâihai Gomera, Magoga, Madaia, Javana, Tubala, Tirasa,
Gomera hi Askenaza hai, Difat hai, Togarma mihai irchi an ni.
Javana hi Elisa hai Tarsis hai, Kitima hai, Rode hai, irchi an ni.
Hama hi Kusa hai, Mizraima hai, Puta hai, irchi an ni.
Hama nâi Kusa hi Seba hai, Havila hai, Sabta hai, Raama hai Sapteka hai irchi an ni.
Kusa hin nâipasal, rammual inhnêtu roiinpui masa tak Nimroda a nei.
Khan, Mizraima’n Ludima hai, Anamima hai, Lehabima hai, Naftuhima hai,
Patros hai, Kaslu hai, (Filistia mihai hi an hong suak a ni) Kafto hai a neia.
Kanaan nâilutîr Sidon le Hetha hi Sidon hai le Hit hai irchi an ni.
Kanaan hi Jebus hai Amor hai, Girgas hai,
Hiv hai, Arka hai, Sin hai,
Arvad hai, Zemar hai, Hamath hai irchi an ni.
Sema irchihai chu Elama hai Asura hai, Arpaksada hai, Lud hai, Arama hai, Uzi hai, Hula hai, Gether hai, Mesek hai hi an ni.
Sema nâi Arpaksada khan Sela a neia, Sela’n Ebera,
Ebera’n nâi inhni a neia, inkhat chu a dam laiin mihriamhai an irsem indarh sikin ar hming khom Pelega an phua a ni. Inkhat irhming chu Joktana a ni.
Joktana hi an irchia mi a ni. Almodada, Selef, Hazarmavetha, Jera,
Hadorama, Uzal hai, Dikla hai,
Ebal, Abimael, Seba,
Ofir, Havila le Jobaba.
Sema irchi ata Abrahama dênin hihai hi an ni: Arpaksada, Sela,
Ebera, Pelega, Reua,
Seruga, Nahora, Tera,
Abram, Abrahama ti irhming pêl tak hi.
Ama hin Isaka le Ismaela a neihaia.
Ismaela’n nâi sômhleihni a nei, a lutîr tak chu Nebaiota a ni. A nâihai hi anni irchia mi an ni; Nebaiot hai, Kedara hai, Adbeela hai Mebsam hai
Misama hai, Duma hai, Masa hai, Hadada hai, Tema hai,
Jetura hai, Nafis hai, Kedema hai an ni.
Abrahama lâksîrnu Keturi hin nâipasal kiruk a nei. Zimrana, Joksana, Medana, Midian, Isbaka le Sua. Joksana’n Seba le Dedana a neia.
Midian hi Efa, Efera, Hanoka, Abida, Elda hai a nei, hihai hi Keturi irchihai an ni.
Abrahama nâi Isaka’n nâi inhni Esaua le Jakoba a neia.
Esaua nâihai chu: Elifaza, Reuela, Jeusa, Jalam, le Kora hai an ni.
Elifaza hi Temana hai, Omara hai, Zefi hai, Gatama hai, Kenaza hai, Timna hai, Amalek hai irchi an ni.
Reuela hi Nahat hai, Zera hai, Sama hai, le Miza hai irchi an ni.
Edom rama lei om masahai chu Seira nâihai an ni. Seira nâihai chu Lota’n, Sobala, Zibeona, Ana Disona, Ezera, Disana an ni.
Lota’n Horia hai le Homana hai irchi an ni, a farnu chu Timnai a ni.
Sobala chu Alian hai, Manahat hai, Ebal hai, Sefi hai le Onam hai irchi a ni.
Ana hin Disona a neia, Disona chu hihai irchi hi a ni; Hamrana, Esbana, Ithrana, Kerana hai hi.
Ezera chu Bilhana hai, Zavan hai, Jaakana hai irchi an ni. Disana chu Uz-hai le Arana hai irchi a ni.
Israel rama rêng om mâna, Edom rama rêng lei omhai chu hihai hi an ni; Beora nâipa Bela chu Edom rama rêng a changa; a khopui chu Dinhaba a ni.
Bela a thi zoiin Bozra kho mi Zera nâipa Jababa’n ar thûl a changa.
Jababa thi zoiin Temana ram mi Husama’n a thûla.
Husama a thi le chu Bedada nâipa Hedada’n a thûl nôka, ama hi Moab rama Midian hai inhnêtu kha a ni. A omna khopui chu Avit a ni.
Hadada a thi zoiin chu Masreka kho mi Samla a’rthûlin a oma.
Samla a thiin, Rehobot kho omna tuipui an iti ata hong Saula chu a’rthûlin a oma,
Saula a thiin chu, Akbora nâipa Baal-Hanana’n a thûla.
Baal-Hanana a thiin, Hadada’n a thûla, a omna khopui irhming chu Pai a ni. A dôngma chu Mehetabeli a ni, Matreda nâinu a ni, a pu chu Mezahaba a ni.
Hadaba chu a thia, Edom-hai chi dang dang hiang hin an om; Timna, Alva, Jethetha,
Oholibami, Ela, Pinon,
Kenaza, Temana, Mibzar,
Magdiel le Iram hai an ni.
Jakoba’n Reubena, Simeona, Levi, Juda, Isakara, Zebulun,
Dana, Josefa, Benjamina, Naftalia, Gada le Asera a neihaia.
Juda hin nâipasal ringa a nei; Kanaan nupang Batsuii leh nâi inthum Era, Onam le Sela a neihai. A nâilutîr tak Era hi a sual hrai sikin
A moinu Tamari leh nâi inhni Pereza le Zera a neihai sa.
Pereza hin Hezrona leh Hamula a neihaia.
Zera hin nâipasal ringa; Zimria, Ethana, Hemana, Kalkola le Dara hai an ni.
Zera irchi laia mi Karmia nâi Akhara hin Pathian ta hranga ser ir-uptir hlat a tum tâk sikin Israelhaiin an lei tuanga.
Ethana hin Azaria a inei a ni.
Hezrona hin nâi inthum Jerameela, Rama, le Kelubaia a neia.
Rama hin Aminadaba a neia. Ama hin Juda nam laia mi roiinpui tak Nasona a neia.
Nasona hin Salmona a neia, ama hin Boaza a neia.
Boaza nâi chu Obeda a ni, Jesaia neitu a ni.
Jesaia hin nâipasal sari a neia; a ulian dônin Eliaba, Abinadaba Simea,
Nathanaela, Radaia,
Ozema, Davida.
An farnuhai chu Zeruii le Abigaili an ni. Zeruii hin nâipasal inthum Abisaia, Joaba, Asahela hai an ni.
Abigaili hin Amasa a neia, a pasal chu Ismaela irchia mi Jethera a ni.
Khan, Hezrona nâipa Kaleba’n a dôngma Azubi, Jeriotha nâinu ata khan nâi a neihaia; Khan, hihai hi a nâipahai chu an ni: Jesera, Sobaba le Ardona.
Azubi thi zoiin Kaleba’n Efrati dôngma’n a nei nôka, nâipasal Hura an neia.
Hura’n Uria a neia, ama hin Bezalela a nei nôka.
Kum sômruk a niin Hezrona’n Makira nâinu Gilead farnu dôngma’n a neia. Nâipasal Seguba an neia.
Seguba khan Jaira a neia, hi mi hi Gilead rama khua sômhni inthum chunga rêng a ni.
Gesur hai le Amor haiin kha hmuna ram, khua sômruk kha an lâka, Jair le Kana khua le a kôlvêlhai chu an lâka. Kha khuaa omhai kha chu Gilead-a le Makira irchihai an ni.
Hezrona chu a thia, a nâipa Kaleba’n a pa dôngma a ithisan Efrati chu dôngma’n a neia, nâipasal Asura an neia, ama hi Tekoa khua indingtu masatu kha a ni.
Hezrona nâipa ulian tak Jerameela’n nâipasal ringa a neia, a uliantak chu Rama a ni, a danghai chu Buna, Orena, Ozema le Ahija hai an ni.
Rama hin nâipasal inthum Maaza, Jamina le Ekera hai an ni.
Jerameela hin dôngma dang Atari a neia, nâipasal Onam an neia.
Onam hin nâipasal inhni Samaia le Jada a neia. Samaia khom hin nâi inhni, Nadaba le Abisura a neia
Abisura hin dôngma Abihaili a neia, nâi inhni Abana le Molida an neia.
Abisura upa Nadaba khom hin nâipasal inhni Seleda le Apaima a neia, Seleda chu nâi nei loiin a thia.
Apaima’n Isia a neia, Isia’n Sesana, Sesana khan Ahlaia a neia;
Samaia sangpa Jada’n nâipasal inhni Jethera le Jonathana a neia, Jethera chu nâi nei loiin a thia,
Jonathana’n nâipasal inhni Peleta le Zaza a neia. Hihai hi Jerameela irchihai chu an ni.
Sesana hin nâipasal nei maka, nâinupang vai a nei a ni. Siahlo Aigupta mi Jarha an neia,
Ama hi a nâinu an luatira, nâipasal Ataia an nei.
Ataia hin Nathana a neia, ama hin Zabada a nei a ni.
Zabada hin Eflala a neia, ama hin Obeda a neia.
Obeda hin Jehua a neia, Jehua’n Azaria a neia,
Azaria hin Heleza a neia, ama hin Eliasa a neia.
Eliasa hin Sismaia a neia, ama hin Saluma a neia.
Saluma hin Jekamia a neia, ama hin Elisama a nei a ni.
Jerameela upa Kaleba nâi ulian tak chu Mesa a ni, Zifa irchibul chu a nia. Zifa hin Maresa a neia, ama hin Hebron a neia.
Hebronin nâipasal minli, Tepua, Kora, Rekema, le Sema hi an neia.
Sema chu Rahama pa a ni, Rahama hin Jorkeama a neia, Sema upa Rekema’n Samaia a neia.
Ama hin Maona a neia, Maona hin Bethzura a neia.
Kaleba’n chu lâksîr Efaii a luaa, ama leh hin nâi inthum, Haran, Moza, Gazeza hai an nei a ni. Haran khom hin nâipasal Gezeza ngêt a phua nôk a ni.
Mi inkhat Jadaii khan nâipasal kiruk, Regema, Jothama, Gesana, Pelet, Efa le Saafa hai hi an neia.
Kaleba hin lâksîr dang Maaki a nei nôka, nâipasal inhni, Sebera le Tirhana a neipuia.
Zoro sôtvit hnunga nâi inhni Saafa le Seva a neipui nôka, Saafa hi Madmana khua indingtirtu a nia, Seva hi Makbena le Gibea khua chuan masatu a ni. Kaleba’n nâinupang Aksaii a nei a ni.
Hi mihai khom hi Kaleba irchi an ni; Kaleba le Efrati nâi ulian tak chu Hura a ni. Hura nâipasal Sobala chu Kiriath-jearim khua indingtu a ni.
A nâipa Salma chu Bethlehem khua indingtu a ni, a nâi mi tumtak Harefa chu Bethgadar khua indingtu a ni.
Kiriath-jearim indingtu Sobala chu Haroe le Menuhot-ah omhai a chimriphai irchibul a ni.
Kiriath-jearim-ah omhai Ithra hai Put hai, Sumat hai le Misra hai irchi a ni sa. Zera le Estaol khuaa omhai khom, hihai hi an irchi suanpâr a ni sa.
Bethlehem khua indingtu Salma chu Netofat, Atrot-beth-Joab khuaa omhai irchi sûnga mi a ni. Manahat-ah om a chimriphai dôr chu Zor-hai irchi sûnga mi an ni.
Lekha irziak mi, Jabez khuaa om Tirat-hai, Simeat-hai, Sukat-hai le Kenhai leh hin irchi khata mi an nia, Rekab-hai leh hin an irneipol a ni.
Davida Hebron khuaa a om laia a nâilutîr dôna a ineihai chu Amon, a nu chu Jezreel mi Ahinoami a ni; Daniela nu chu Karmel mi Abigaili a ni.
Absaloma, a nu chu Gesur rêng Talmaia nâinu Maaki a ni; Adonija, a nu chu Hagithi a ni;
Sefatia a nu chu Abitali a ni; Ithreama, a nu chu Egli a ni.
Hebron khuaa kum sari le a chimrip an lal laiin Davida hin nâipasal kiruk a nei irmana. Jerusalema kum sômthum inthum an lala,
Nâi khom tamtak a nei; Amiela nâinu Bethsebi leh hin nâipasal minli, Simea, Sobaba, Nathana le Solomona hai a nei a ni.
Nâipasal dang kuak, hihai hi a nei sa; Ibhara, Elisua, Elfeleta
Noga, Nefega, Jafia
Elisama, Eliada le Elifeleta
Hi khêla lâksîrhai leh a nâihai khom an om sa, nâinupang Tamari khom hi a ni.
Reng Solomona irchihai khom hihai hi an ni. Rehoboama, Abija, Asa, Jehosafata,
Jehorama, Ahazia, Joasa
Amazia, Uzia, Jothama
Ahaja, Hezekia, Manasea,
Amon, Josia,
Josia hin nâipasal minli, Johanana Jehoiakima, Zedekia, le Saluma a neia.
Jehoiakima hin nâipasal hni Jehoiakina le Hezekia a neia.
Babulon sala hruai rêng Jehoiakina khan nâipasal sari, Sealtiela
Malkirama, Pedaia, Senazara, Jekamia, Hosama, Nedabia a neihai.
Pedaia hin nâipasal inhni, Jerubabela le Simea, Zerubabela hin nâipasal hni Mesulama le Hanania a neia, nâinupang Selomiti a nei.
Nâipasal dang ringa Hasuba, Ohela, Berekia, Hasadia le Jusab-heseda hai an ni.
Hanania hin nâipasal hni Pelatia le Jesaia a neia. Jesaia hin Refaia a neia, hi mi hin Arnana a neia; Arnana hin Obadia a neia, ama hin Sekania a neia.
Sekania hin nâipasal inkhat Semaia a neia, tû ringa Hatusa, Igala, Baria, Nearia le Safa hai a neihai.
Nearia hin nâipasal inthum Elioenaia, Hizkia, Azrikama a neihai.
Elioenaia hin nâipasal sari Hodavia, Eleasiba, Pelaia, Akuba, Johanana, Delaia le Anania hai an ni.
Hihai hi Juda irchi senkhathai chu an ni. Pereza, Hezrona, Karmia, Hura, Sobala,
Sobala’n Reaia a neia, ama hin Jahata a neia. Jahata hin Ahumaia le Lahada Zora khuaa omhai neitu a ni.

Kaleba le Efrati nâilutîr chu Hura a ni, Bethlehem khua indingtirtu a ni. Hura’n nâipasal inthum Etama, Penuela le Ezera a neia. Etama’n nâipasal inthum Jereel, Isma, Idbasa hai a neia, nâinupang inkhat Hazelelponi a nei.
Penuela hi Gedor khua indingtirtu a ni, Ezera hi Husa khua indingtirtu a ni.
Tekoa khua indingtu Asura’n dôngma inhni Heli le Naari a neia,
Naari leh nâipasal minli, Ahuzama, Hefera, Temenia le Hahastaria a neia.
Heli leh nâipasal inthum, Zereta, Izhara, Ethnana hai an ni.
Khan, Hakoza’n Anuba hai, Zobeba hai, Haruma nâipa Aharhela irchihai a neia.
An irchi laia mi mahripom tak Jabeza a oma, a nu hin, “Na ti ngôia ki inei a ni sikin,” tiin ar hming khom Jabez a iphua a ni.

Israel hai Pathian kuang Jabeza chu a chongchaia, “O Pathian, sat ni vurin lân, ram irzat tak ni pe’n lân, nâ ki tuang loina hrangin thil saloihai ata ni hrungin lân, ni ompui mai ro,” a tia. Khanchu Pathianin a izong angin a ompui a ni.
Suha urêngpa Kaleba’n nâipasal Mehira a neia, Mehira’n Estona a neia,
Ama hin nâipasal inthum, Bethrafa, Pasea, Tehina a nei hai, Tehina hi Nahas khua indingtu a ni. Hi irchihai hi Reka khuaa om an ni.
Kenaza khan nâipasal inhni, Othniela le Seraia a neia. Othniela hin nâipasal hni, Hathata le Meonothaia a neia.
Meonothaia hin Ofra a neia, Seraia hin Joaba a nei a ni. Hitaka omhai hi kut theithiam inzen omkhôm an ni.
Jefunea nâipa Kaleba’n nâipasal thum, Irua, Ela, le Naama hai a neia. Ela hin Kenaza a neia.
Jehalela nâipasal minli, Zifa, Zifaia, Tiria le Asarela hai a neihai.

Ezra’n nâi minli Jethera, Mereda, Efera le Jalona a neia. Mereda hin Aigupta rêng nâinu Bithiaii dôngma’n a neia, nâinupang inkhat Miriami leh nâipasal inhni Samaia le Isba a neia, Isba hi Estemo khua indingtirtu a ni.

Mereda hin Juda nama mi dôngma’n a neia, nâipasal inthum Jereda, Hebera le Jekuthiela a neihai, Jereda hi Gedor khua indingtirtu a ni, Hebera hi Soko khua indingtirtu a ni; Jekuthiela hi Zano khua indingtirtu a ni.
Hodia hin Nahama farnu dôngma’n a neia, an nâihai chu Keila khua Garm hai le Estamo khuaa om Maaka hai irchibul a ni.
Simona hin nâipasal minli Amnona, Rina, Benhanana le Tilona a neia. Isia hin Zoheta le Benzoheta a neia.
Juda nâi Sela irchihai chu hihai hi an ni. Era, Leka khua indingtirtu; Laada chu Maresa khua indingtirtu a ni; a’rchihai chu Beth Asbe khua omhai hi an ni, Ladek mi an ni.
Jokima Kozeba khuaa omhai leh hin; Joasa le Sarafa a nei. Moab dôngmate dôngma’n a neia. Bethlehem khuaa an om ta. (Hi thurchi hi tianlaia irchi irsuina ata lâk a ni.)
Reng ihmanghai bêl vuak mi an nia, Netaim le Gedera khuaa om an ni.
Simeona nâipasal ringa, Nemuela, Jamina, Jariba, Zera le Saula hai an ni.
Saula hin Saluma a neia, ama hin Mibsama a neia, Mibsama hin Misma a neia,
Misma hin Hamuela a neia, ama hin Zakura a neia, Zakura hin Simeia a neia,
Simeia hin nâipasal sômhleiruk le nupang kiruk a neia, khannisian a urêng danghaiin chu nâi nei intam mahai; Simeona irchihai chu Juda irchihai angin pung thei mahai.
Davida inlal zoro dên khan chu Simeona irchi hi Beerseba, Molada, Hazarsuala,
Bilha-ah, Ezem-ah, Tolad-ah,
Bethuel-ah, Horma-ah, Ziklag-ah,
Beth-markabot-ah, Hazarsusim-ah, Bethberi-ah, Saaraim khuahaia an om ngai.
Etam haia, Ain haia, Rimon haia, Token haia, Asan khuahai le
a kôlvêl khua Baalath khua sim tianga tâng an omna a ni. An sûngkua thurchi le an omna hmunhai irziakna lekhabua an nam hruaituhai chu hihai hi an ni.
Mesobaba, Jamleka, Amazia, nâipa Josa,
Joela, Jehua, (Jehua hi Josibia nâi a ni, a pu chu Asiela nâi Seraia a ni).
Elioenaia, Jakoba, Jesohaia, Asaia, Adiela, Jesimiela, Benaia,
Ziza, Ziza hi Sifia nâi a ni; kha pa kha Alona nâi a ni; Alona hi Jedaia nâi a ni, a pa chu Semaia nâi Simria a ni.
Hihai irchi hi an pung hrât tak taka.

Nitâk tianga Gerar dênin an indarh zoia, kha khua omna irhôr kho nisua tianghai khom kêlbelra an insuahai a ni. Ram ôl lian, hloisûl satna hmun, ram hrisêl irtharngamna tamtak an hmu a ni. Hihai lai hin Hama hai an om ngai a ni.

Judai ram rêng Hezekia zoro lai khan annihai khi Gerar-a an fea, khataka lei omhai puan in le bokrop neihai an insiatpai pehaia. An belra satna hrangin hloisûl a sa pehai hrai sikin, kha hmuna lei omhai kha an inhnotpaihaia, anni’n an iluapai a ni ta.
Isia nâi Pelatia, Nearia, Refaia le Uziela haiin Simeona irchihai laia mi irzaringa chu nisua tiang Edom rama an fea.
Amalek leh omhai chu an thathaia, atûn ten hin an iom ta a ni.
Khan, Amalek mi rothai a la om sunhai kha an thata, an hmuna khan a vuan sûn ten hin an la om a ni.

Jakoba nâi ulian tak Reubena irchihai chu hihai hi an ni. (Reubena hin a pa lâksîr a zâlpui sikin a nâilutîr tak sutpai a nia, Israel nâi Josefa inchanga pêk a ni, khasikin nâilutîr irtepna hin ar hming a iom ta loi a ni).
Juda irchihai hin an urênghai an khêla, anni lai ata rêng a hong suak mâka chu nâilutîr nitna chu Josefa changtum a ni ta.
Israel inei masa tak Reubena’n nâipasal minli, Hanoka, Palua, Hazrona, le Karmia a neihaia.
Joela irchihai chu a’rlo fe dân angin Semaia, Goga, Simeia
Mika, Reaia, Baala
le Beera hai an ni, Beera hi Reubena irchihai laia a hruaitu tak a ni. Assuria rêng Tilgatpilnesera’n a chela, salin a hruaia.
An sûngkua thurchi irziakna hin Reubena irchi laia hruaituhai irhming vai hi a chuang. Jeiela, Zekaria,
Bela hi Azaza nâi a ni, a pu chu Sema, Joela irchi mi a ni. Joela irchihai hi Aroer khuaa an om. Hmâr tiang ram Nebo le Baal-meon dênin an donga.
Gilead rama hin belra le kêl an nei intama; khasikin nisua ramchârna ram, Eufrates vadung dênin an ilua a ni.
Reng Saula zoro lai khan Reubena hai hin Hagari hai an doihaia, an thathaia, Gilead ram nisua tianga an ram an sutpaihai tâka.
Reubena hai zoia chu Basan rama hin Gada irchia mihai an oma, nisua tiang Saleka dênin an sipa.
Joela irchia mi hi a tam ual tak an nia, Sefama irchia mihai hi anni zoi renga tam an ni. Janaia le Sefata irchi hi Basan rama irchi dang viat omhai chu an ni.
Gada nam laia hi irchi sarihai khom hi tep sa an ni; Mikaela, Mesulam, Seba Joraia, Jakana, Zia, Ebera hai hi, an rêngin sari an ni.

Hihai hi Huria nâipasal Abihaila irchihai an ni. Huria pa chu Jaroa a ni, kha mi pa kha chu Gilead a ni, a pa chu Mikaela a ni. Mikaela pa chu, Jesisaia a ni, ama pa nôk chu Jadoa a ni, a pu chu Buza a ni.
Hi irchihai sûnga a hruaitu tak chu Abdiela nâipasal Ahia a ni, a pa chu Gunia a ni.
Gilead le Basan rama khua chîntea om a ni, Saron ram hnuaia an irthek indarh a ni.
Juda rêng Jothama le Israel rêng Jeroboama hai zoro lai hin rêngin hi irchi irsui dân hi an irziak suak a ni.
Reubena hai, Gada hai le nisua tianga om Manasea nam tômtehaiin pho, khandai le thal hmang dân thei sipai sîngminli sângminli le irzasari sômruk an neia.
Hagari nam Jetura, Nafis, Nodab hai leh an irdoia.
Pathian an iama, changpui hrangin an ngêna, Pathianin an chongchaina chu a sâmhaia, Hagari hai chu an lei irsanpui namhai leh an inhnêhai tâka.
An râlhai saringsei sîngringa, belra nuaihni sîngringa, sakuartung sânghni le mihriam nuaikhat an chelhaia.
Pathian irhminga irdoi an nia, mi tamtak an ithathai a ni. Sala an intâng mân chu kha rama khan an om ta a ni.
Nisua tianga Manasea irchia mi omhai chu Basan le hmâr tianga om Baal-Harmon, Senir, Hermon tâng dênin an oma, a sate’n an pung hrâta.
An laia hruaituhai chu Efera, Isia, Eliela, Azriela, Jeremia, Hodavia le Jadiela hai an ni. Sipai hâitak tak an ni, an irchihai laia chu hruaitu satak an ni.
Mihaiin an pahai Pathian mâksana; kha rama lei om, Pathianin a inhnotsuak hai pathian an biak tâka.

Khasikin Pathianin Assuria rêng Pula, Tilgatpilnesera an iti pa chu an omna ram a hon doitira, Reubena irchihai, Gada irchihai le nisua tianga om Manasea irchihai chu a koibukhaia, Hala, Habor, Hora, le Gozan tui kôla an omtirhai tâka.
Levi hin nâi inthum, Gersona, Kohata, Meraria a neihaia.
Kohata hin nâi minli Amrama, Izhara, Hebron, le Uziela a neihaia.
Amrama hin nâipasal hni Arona le Mosia a neia, nâinupang Miriami a nei sa. Arona hin nâi minli Nadaba, Abihua, Eleazara le Ithamara a neia.
Eleazara irchihai chu a dôntea suiin hihai hi an ni. Finehasa, Abisua
Bukia, Uzia,
Zerahia, Meraiota,
Amaria’n, Ahituba,
Zadoka, Ahimaaza,
Azaria, Johanana
Azaria (Jerusalem tempil Solomona isina sinthotu kha a ni).
Amaria, Ahituba,
Zadoka, Saluma,
Hilkia, Azaria,
Seraia, Jehozadaka.
Jehozadaka hi rêng Nebukadnezara’n salin Judai ram le Jerusalema mi danghai laia khan a hruai sa,
Levi hin nâi inthum Gersona, Kohata, le Meraria a neia.
Khaang khan nâipasal an nei vinga. Gersona’n Libna le Simeia a neia.
Kohatha nâipahai chu Amrama, Izhara, Hebron le Uziela a neia.
Meraria hin Mahlia le Musia a neia.
Gersona irchihai khom hiang hin an ni. Libni, Johatha le Zima,
Joa, Idoa, Zera, Jeatheraia,
Kohata irchihai khom hihai hi an ni, Aminadaba, Kora, Asira,
Elkana, Ebeasafa, Asira,
Tahata, Uriela, Uzia, Saula.
Elkana’n Amasaia le Ahimota a neia.
Ahimota irchi khom hiang hin an ni; Elkana, Zofaia, Nahata,
Eliaba, Jerohama, Elkana
Samuela nâi ulian chu Joela a nia, a nâipang ual chu Abija a ni.
Meraria irchihai khom hihai hi an ni. Mahlia, Libnia, Simeia, Uza,
Simeia, Hogia, Asaia.
Jerusalem khuaa Thuthung Bôm an lâklût zoiin rêng Davida’n hi mihai hi Pathian biak zoroa zaipôl sak hrangin an kunghaia.
Reng Solomona’n tempil a sin zoiin hi mihai hi pôla irsiamin irtongna puan ina hlasak hrangin an irthûl irtheng ngai a ni.
Hi mihai irchi suina chu hiang hin a ni.
Kohata irchihai, zaipôl inkhat hruaitu chu Joela nâipa Hemana a ni. Hemana nâihai chu hihai hi an ni; Joela, Samuela,
Elkana, Jerohama, Eliela, Toa,
Zufa, Elkana, Mahata, Amasaia,
Elkana, Joela, Azaria, Zefania
Tahata, Asira, Ebiasafa, Kora,
Ishara, Kohata, Levi Jakoba.
Asafa chu zaipôl dang hruaitu a ni, Asafa irchihai chu hihai hi an ni. Berekia, Simea,
Mikaela, Baaseia, Malkija,
Ethnia, Zera, Adaia,
Ethana, Zima, Simeia,
Jahata, Gersona, Levi.
Meraria irchi Ethana chu zaipôl dang hruaitu a ni, Ethana irchihai chu hihai hi an ni. Kisia, Abdia, Maluka,
Hasabia, Amazia, Hilkia,
Amazia, Bania, Semera,
Mahlia Musia, Meraria, Levi.
An irchibul Levi irchi danghai chu Pathian biakna hmuna sintho hrang danga irzêkin sin an irsem chit a ni.

Arona le a’rchihai hi maichâma mirimhoi hâlin, hâlirvôm thilinhlan ngaitu an ni. Hmun irthianga Pathian biak hi, annihai tho hrang bîk a ni. Pathianin a mihai sualna a ngaidamna hrangin, thilhai khom annihai hin an inhlan ngai hrang a ni. Pathian siahlo Mosia ihril ang takin an itho ngai a ni.
Arona irchihai chu hiang hin an ni, Eleazara, Finehasa, Abisua,
Bukia, Uzia, Zerahia,
Meraiota, Amaria, Ahituba,
Zadoka, Ahimaaza.
Arona irchi Kohata hai omna ram chu hihai hi a ni. Levi irchihai omna hranga inkung masa khan an oma.
Judai rama khan Hebron-ah an inomtira, a kôlvêla ram satnahai khom ama idong sa a ni.
Hi khua huam sûnga kho ulenâi le a lei ram tâk chu Jefunea nâipa Kaleba dongtum a ni.
Arona irchihai omna ram chu hihai hi a ni, Hebron hai zôkna khua an iti. Libna, Jatir, Estamo,
Hilen, Debir,
Asan, Beth-Semes kho kôl sa lêngna hmunhai le,
Benjamina hai biala hi khua le sa lêngnahai an indongtir a ni. Giba, Alemeta, Anathot. An in mihai omna hranga an ipêkhai chu kho sômhleithum a ni.
Nitâk tianga Manasea irchihai biala Kohata irchia mi danghai omna hranga tasânin an in mi tam angin kho sôm an pêkhai a ni.
Gersona irchihai a in mi, a omna hrang Isakara hai rama, Asera-hai Basan rama khua sômhleithum an pêkhai.
Khaang dênin Reubena hai, Gada hai le Zebulun hai omna rama khua sômhleihni Meraria irchihai omna hrang an pêkhaia.
Khaang dênin Israel mihaiin Levi irchihai omna hrang khua le sa lêngnahai an indang pehai a ni.
Juda hai, Simeona hai, Benjamina hai, ram an indang pehai khom tasânin an ipêkhai a ni).
Kohata irchi senkhathai chu Efraima hai omna ram le a kôlvêla sa lêngna laihai chu lua hrangin an inkung pehaia.
Efraima tâng rama zôkna khua Sekem, Gezer,
Jokmeam, Beth-Horon,
Aijalon le Gath-rimon hai hi.
Nitâk tianga Manasea hai ram khom Aner le Bileam hai chu a kôl vêla sa lêngna lai vêl chu an dongtum nia ipêk an ni.
Gersona irchihai omna hrangin hi khuahai hi a kôlvêl sa lêngna hmun pêk inkung a ni. Nisua tianga Manasea hai omna Basan biala Golan le Astarot khuahai hi.
Isakara hai omna, Kades khua, Deberat khua,
Ramot khua, le Anem khuahai hi a ni.
Asera hai omna, Masal khua, Abdon khua,
Hukok khua, Rehob khua hai hi.
Naftalia hai omna, Galili Kedes khua, Hamon khua, Kiriathaim khua hai hi.
Meraria irchia mi danghai chu hi khua le sa lêngnahai hi pêk inkung an ni. Zebulun hai omna. Rimon le Tabor khua
Jordan nisua tiang pang Jeriko irdîn Reubena hai omna; tâng sîp zôla, Bezer khua, Jaza khua,
Kedemot khua, Mefaat khuahai hi a ni.
Gad-hai omna, Gilead biala Mahanaim khua.
Hesbon khua le Jazer khuahai hi a ni.
Iskara hi nâipasal minli, Tola, Pua, Jasuba, le Simrona a neihaia.

Tola hin nâi kiruk, Uzia, Refaia, Jeriela, Jamaia, Ibsama le Semuela hai an ni. Hihai hi Tola irchia an hruaitu, mihai le irhming inthanghai an ni, Davida zoro lai hin an irchia mi chu sînghni sânghni le irzaruk an ni.
Uzia hi nâipasal inkhat Izrahia a neia, Izrahia hin nâipasal minli a neia, hihai hi an ni. Mikaela, Obadia, Juda, Isahia hai hi an hruaitu an nia.
Dôngma an nei intama, nâi khom an nei intam a ni, irdoi mi sîngthum sângruk an om.
Iskara irchi sûnga hin sipaia chang thei mi sîngriat sângsari irhming irziak a ni.
Benjamina nâipasal thum, Bela, Bekera, Jadiela hai an ni.
Bela hin nâi ringa, Ezbona, Uzia, Uziela, Jerimota le Iria hai a neia, irchi khat laia hruaitu an ni seng, an irchia mi hi sînghni sânghni le sômthum minli sipaia hmang thei an ni.
Bekera hin nâipasal kuak a neia, Zemira, Joasa, Eliazara, Elioenaia, Omria, Jeremota, Abija, Anathota, le Alemeta an ni.
Irchi tina an irtep dânin sipai fe thei mi sînghni irzahni an ni.
Jadiela hin nâi inkhat, Bilhana a neia. Bilhana hin nâipasal sari Jeusa, Benjamina, Ehuda, Kenaana, Zethana, Tarsisa le Ahisara hai a neia.
Annihai kha irchi khat lu seng an nia an huaisenin irhming inthang an ni, an irchi laia mi sipaia fe thei sîngkhat sângsari le irzahni an om.
Supim le Hupima hai khom anni irchia tep inlût an ni, Husima hi chu mi dang irchia mi a ni.
Naftalia hin nâipasal minli, Jaziela, Gunia, Jezera le Saluma a neihaia. (Annihai hi Bilhaii irchihai chu an ni.)
A dôngma Arama mi le Manasea hin nâi inhni Asiriela, Makira a neia. Makira hi Gileada pa a ni.
Makira hin Hupima le Supim ta hrangin dôngma a zong pehaia. A farnu chu Maaki a ni, Makira nâi inhnina chu Zelofehada nâi, ama hin nâinupang ngot a neia.
Makira dôngma Maaki hin nâipasal inhni Peresa le Seresa a neia, Peresa hin nâipasal inhni Ulama le Rekema a neia.
Ulama hin nâi inkhat Bedana a neia, a pu chu Manasea a ni.
Gileada farnu Hamoleketi’n nâipasal thum a neia: Isoda, Abiezera, Malaa hai hi an ni.
(Semida hin nâipasal minli, Ahiana, Sekema, Likhia le Aniama a neia.
Efraima irchihai chu hihai hi an ni, Suthela, Bereda, Tahata, Eleada, Tahata
Zabada, Suthela hai hi. Efraima hin nâipasal Ezera, Eliada, a neihaia. Khannisian Gath khua mihai belra an inrûk an that pehaia.
An pa Efraima’n a chûla, a urênghaiin an hong pana, irtharngam an saka.
A dôngma a’rpôlpui nôka, nâi a vonga, nâipasal a neia, an chunga buaina a tung sikin ar hming khom Beria an iti a ni.
Efraima’n nâinupang Seeri a neia, Beth-Horon chuanchung le chuanhnuai le Uzen-seer khuahai hi a siam a ni.
Efraima hin nâipasal dang Refa a nei saa, a’rchihai chu hihai hi an ni. Resefa, Tela, Tahana,
Ladana, Amihuda, Elisama
Nuna le Josua.
An ram thar lâk an omna ram Bethel le a kôlvêl khua ata nisua tiang Naaran khua a tunga, nitâk tiang Gezer le a kôlvêl dênin Sekem le Ai khua, le a kôlvêl khuahai a huam sa.
Hi khopui Beth-Sean Taanak, Megido, Dor le a kôlvêl khua Manasea irchihai thu hnuaia an om, kha hmunhai khan Jakoba nâi Josefa irchihai omna ram a ni.
Hi hi Asera irchihai suina chu a ni. Nâipasal minli Imna, Isva, Isvia le Beria hai an ni. Nâi nupang sari a nei sa.
Beria hin nâipasal Hebera le Malkiela a neihaia, Malkiela hin Birzait khua hi a inding a ni.
Hebera hin nâipasal thum Jafleta, Somera le Hothama a neihaia, nâinu Suai a nei sa.
Jafleta khomin nâipasal thum Pasaka, Bimhala, Asvata a neihai.
A sangpa Somera khom hin nâipasal thum, Roga, Jehuba le Arama a neihai.
An mitum tak Hothama hin nâipasal minli, Zofa, Imna, Selesa le Amala a neihai.
Zofa nâihai chu hihai hi an ni, Sua, Harnefera, Saula, Beria, Imra,
Bezera, Hoda, Sama, Silsa, Ithrana, Beera.
