Solomona khilât chu rângachak inzen a nia. Lebanon rampuia in an iti tentana khan an nêk fâkna bêl le bûrhai khom rângachaka sin a ni. Solomona zoro lai khan chu tangkarua hi chu ite bê’n bê mahai.
Irkuang khom a nei intam oka, a rêng Hurama irkuanghai leh an irhlopa, Tarsis haia fein kum thum dana an hong nôka, rângachak hai, sumru hai, sâiha hai, zông hai, vahro hai an hong chôi pe ngaia.
Reng Solomona chu rammuala rêng danghai nêkin ar chonga, vâr khom a vâr tak a nia.
Solomona kuanga Pathianin vârna a ipêk chu inhriat nuamin an hong pan sup sup ngaia;
sumru le rângachaka thilsiamhai, puanhai, râltukfam hai, mosola hai, sakor hai, sakor puakpêl zâthai an hong pêk zut zuta, a kum tin hiang hin an tho ngaia.

Reng Solomona’n sakor vâina hmun sângminli a neia, khatak khan a sakor tâli le sakorhai a siahaia, irdoina sakor khom sîngkhat le sânghni a neia, senkhat chu Jerusalema an oma, a danghai chu kho dang danga a siahaia.
Eufrates vadung le Filistia ramria, Aigupta tui dênin kha ram sûnga khan an lal tâk a nia,
Solomona inlal laiin Jerusalem khuaa khan tangkaruahai chu lungtehai ang ma mai an nia, sidar thing lak tâng sîphai, thang tianga phâia theipui thinghai angin tamtak a nia.
Solomona’n Aigupta ram le hmun dang dang ata sakor leh a’rthaka.
A phut ata a mong dênin Solomona thurchi hi deipu Nathana lekhabua hai, Silo mi Ahija thuhril irziakna bu hai, Nebata nâipa Israel rêng Jeroboama chungchânga deipu Idoa inlârna irziakna bua a chuang.
Solomona chu Jerusalema Israel mi murdihai chunga kum sômminli an lala.
Khan, Solomona chu a thia, Davida khopuia an phûma, a nâipa Rehoboama chu ama irthûlin an lal tâka.
Rehoboama chu Sekem khuaa a fea, kha khan rêng chang hrangin Israelhai, hmâr tianga omhai chu an lei irbukkhôma.
Nebata nâipa Jeroboama chu Solomona chiin Aigupta rama a rota, a thi thu an hriatin chu a hong kîr nôka.
Hmâr tianga Israelhai an va pana, Rehoboama kuang khan an fesuama, an kuang,
“Ni pa khan a sate’n a ni len nang ngaia, kin puak a nin riktir pe ok ngaia, nangin chu ni nin nang khomin kin phur nin zângtir pe’n lân, ni khua le tuia om kin ti,” an tia.
Ama khan an kuang, “Sûn thum zoia hong nôk unglân,” a tia, khanchu mihai kha an fe tâka.
Reng Rehoboama chu a pa Solomona dam laia a kôla om ngai ulianhai ar donhaia, “Hi mihai hi itin mo ti pehai inlân nin ni tipui?,” a tia.
Anni’n chu, “Hi mihai chunga hin khonzâna neiin lân, satakin chongpuihai ro, kumtuangin ni mi ni an ti,” tiin an sâma.
Ulianhai iti kha irngai nuam loiin, ruatharte, ama rualhai kha ar donhaia,
ni pa khan kin puak a nin riktir pe hi nin zângtir pe ro, hong tihai hi itin mo ti pehai inlân sa ni?, a tia.

Ama rual ruathartehaiin, “Hihai hi ni pa’n kin puak a nin riktir pea, khasikin nangma’n chu kin puak nin zângtir pe ro, tihai hi, hiang hin ti pehai ro, ki kutte khom hi ka pa lampui nêkin ngar ual a ti,
ka pa khan nin puak a inriktir ok a ni’n chu keima’n chu bôk sa nôk ki ti; hrui leh vîkna tonghaiin keima’n chu âinuvêt leh nangni hrem ki ti, ti ro,” an tia.
Sûn thum zoia chu Jeroboama le Israelhai chu Rehoboama kuanga a ihril angin, an honga.
Rengin ulianhai chongbe kha irngai nuam loiin mihai kha inhram takin a chongpuihaia.

Ruathartehai chongbe angin Rehoboama’n, mihai kuang, “Ka pa khan nin puak an riktir hrai ma ni? keima’n bôk sa nôk ki ti. Hrui leh vîkin nangni a hrema, keima’n chu âinuvêt leh nangni hrem ki ti,” a tia.
Rengin mipuihai thu irngai nuam loiin Silo mi deipu Ahija kuanga Nebata nâipa Jeroboama chungchânga Pathianin a iti kha
Israel mihaiin rêngin an thu a irngaitua pehai loi a nih ti an inhriatin chu, hiang hin an tia.
“Davida rama imo dongtum kin neia? Jesaia irchihai lai ata dongtum i ual mo kin nei? Davida irchihai chu an omin om ri sehai,” an tia. Israel mihai chu anni in tiang an fe tâka.
Judai rama om Israel mihai chunga vai khan Rehoboama chu an lal tâka.

Reng Rehoboama’n Hadorama, sintho inphûthai pâl hruaitu chu Israelhai koi hrangin a va tîra, anni’n lung leh an lei dêng thata. Khasika khan Rehoboama chu a sakor tâlia khan a va chuanga, Jerusalema an tân tâka.
Khataka irthokin Israel mihai chu Davida irchihai lai ata atûn ten hin tehel an izong tâk a ni.
Reng Rehoboama Jerusalem a va tungin chu, Benjamina mi le Judahai laia sipai sahai nuaikhat le sîngriat a bukhaia, hmâr tianga om Israelhai chu a thuhnuaia siahai nôk hrangin a ibei tum a ni.
Khannisian, Pathian mi, Semaia kuang
Reng Rehoboama hai, Juda le Benjamina mihai kuang hiang hin an hriattira:
“Nin urêng Israelhai chu doihai no roi, rot ving ta roi. An sintho chu keima thua an itho a ni,” tiin
Rehoboama chu Jerusalema a oma, Judai ram le Benjamina-hai ram sûnga hi khuahai hi ar kula.
Bethlehem hai, Etam hai, Tekoa hai,
Bethzur hai, Soko hai, Adulam hai,
Gath hai, Maresa hai, Zip hai,
Adoraim hai, Lakis hai, Azeka hai,
Zora hai, Aijalon hai, Hebron hai,
Hi khuaa kulhai hi iamom takin a sina, kho tina hruaitu an thanghaia, kho tina buhai, oliv hriakhai, uainhai a bukkhôma.
Ufeihai le pho a buka, khaang khan Judai ram le Benjamin rama mihai chu a thuhnuaia a isiahai thei a ni.
Israelhai ram bial tina om ochaihai le Levi irchihaiin sim tiang an pana, Judai rama an lûta.
Levi irchihaiin an sâ vâina sahai leh an ram an inhroi kha an mâksana, Judai rama Jerusalema an honga, Jeroboama le a thûl hrangtuhai khan
Jeroboama khan nam dang pathian biakna hmun irsânga sintho hrang, sehrâtchal irlim siam chophai le khohri biakna hmuna sin hrangin ama ochai a inkung a ni.
Israel namhai laia
Hi sika hin Judai ram chu Solomona nâipa Rehoboama tiang an kopa, rêng Davida le Solomona inlal lai ang khan an iom a ni.
Rehoboama’n Davida nâi Jeremota nâinu Mahalati chu dôngma’n a neia, a nu chu Eliaba nâinu, Jesaia tunu Abihaili a ni.
Nâipasal inthum Jeusa hai, Semaria hai, Zahana hai an neia,
zoro hong sôt ual tena chu Absaloma nâinu Maaki a nei nôka, nâipasal minli Abija hai, Ataia hai, Ziza hai, Selomita hai a neihaia.
Rehoboama hin dôngma sômhleiriat le lâksîr sômruk a neia, nâipasal sômthum kiriat le nâinupang sômruk kiriat a neia. A dôngma le a lâksîrhai laia Maaki hi an dit tak a nia,
Abija hi a nâihai laia a inhlutak a nia, ama thûl hranga rêng chang hrangin a inthang a ni.
Rehoboama’n a nâihai hmang dân a theia, Judai le Benjamina ram sûng khopui kul nei murdia hruaitu a siahaia, anni hrangin ar phal oka, dôngma khom an neitirhai tuaia.
Rehoboama rêng a hong chang indet zoiin chu a mihai leh
Rehoboama kum ringa an lal kumin
sakor tâli sângkhat irzahni, sakor chung chuang mi sîngruk le sipai tep zoi loi, Lub hai, Suki hai le Sudan sipai pâlhai leh Jerusalem chu an hong rûna.
Judai ram kho kul neihai an hong lâka, Jerusalem khom an hong tung tâka.
Sisaka chia Judai ram hruaitu Jerusalema hong rothai le rêng Rehoboama kuanga khan deipu Semaia chu a fea, an kuang, “Hi hi
Reng le hruaituhaiin, “Thilsual kin itho a ni,
An sinthohai kha an hriatin
Sisaka’n khua chu la a ta, irnêng rêng sintho le ki sintho an nang loizia inhria an ti,” tiin.
Sisaka’n Jerusalem chu a doia, a tempil le a rêngin thilhlu omhai chu a lâkpai vinga. Reng Solomona’n rângachak pho a isinhai khom a rêngin a lâkpai vinga.
Khahai nêkin Rehoboama’n dâr le pho a sina, rêngin mikot hrungtuhai kuta a pêka,
rêng chu tempila a fe richamin a hrungtuhaiin pho an chôia, an zuia; a hrungna sûnga an sia nôk ngaia.
kuang irhnuai takin an intûklût tâk sikin,

Rehoboama chu Jerusalema an lala, a rêng chang chu a det pe oka, rêng a changa hin kum sômminli mi a nia, Jerusalema kum sômhleisari roi a rêl saa. Israel ram murdia khuahai chu ama chubai mûkna hmun hrangin,
nuamlam sin tho hrang a ngaitua no sikin thilsual a thoa.
A phut ata a mong dênin Rehoboama sintho le a in mihai thurchi chu deipu Semaia thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang. Rehoboama le Jeroboama chu an irdoi mai a ni.
Rehoboama chu a thia, Davida khopuia an phûma, a nâipa Abija chu ama irthûlin an lala.
Israel rêng Jeroboama kum sômhleiriat an lal kumin Abija chu Judai rama rêng a changa,
Jerusalema kum thum an lala, a nu chu Gibea kho mi Uriela nâinu Mikaii a ni. Abija le Jeroboama chu an irdoia,
Abija chu sipai hâi inthang nuaiminli a hmanghaia,
Efraima tâng ram Zemaraim tâng sîpa Abija a ngîra, Jeroboama le Israelhai chu an khêka, “Ki thu hi lei irngai roi,
, Israelhai Pathianin, Davida le a’rchihai kuang Israel mihai chunga rêng nina chu thuthung neiin a pêk tâka, ti nin la inhriat loi ma ni?
Davida nâipa, Solomona siahlo Nebata nâipa Jeroboama chu a pu kuang ata tehel a zonga, mi chanlamboihaiin an inpâka.
Solomona nâipa Rehoboama chu ite bêin bê maka; ama lak nâipang a nia, annihai ngam hrangin a lungrîl la puihling maka.
Davida irchihai kuang rêng thuneina

ochaihai le Levi irchihai kha nin inhnot dokhaia, nam danghai tho dân angin ochai hrang nin inkunghaia. Sehrâtchal hong kaihai chu kêlbelra sari mani, hong hôlhai kai chu, kin ochai tiin nin lei hmang nuamhai ngaia.
“Keini’n chu kin Pathian
Zîng tin le khohloi tina
Pathian chu a ni hruaitu a nia, a ochaihai khom irdoina bekul tum hrangin an irsiam diam a ni. O Israelhai, nin irchibulhai Pathian
Khaang khan Jeroboama’n a sipai senkhathai chu Juda sipai hnenghai hrangin a siahaia, senkhat chu an hnung tianga doihai hrangin an fetirhaia.
Judahaiin an hong thîrhaia, an râlhaiin an irhualhai tâka,
Judahai chu an khêklula, Abija’n a hruaihaia, an doia, Pathianin Jeroboama le Israelhai chu an hnêhai tâka.
Israelhai chu Judahai makunga an intâna, Pathianin Judahai chu an hrâttirhai tâka.
Abija le a sipaihaiin Israel sipaihai chu an doktirhai tâka. Israel sipai sahai nuairinga vêl an thathai a ni.
Judahaiin an irchihai Pathian
Abija’n Jeroboama sipaihai chu a’rzûlhaia, an khopui senkhat Bethel hai, Jesana hai, Efron hai le a kôlvêla khuahai a sutpaihaia.
Abija dam sûngin Jeroboama chu ngîrsuak thei ta maka,
Abija chu a hong hrât sit sita, dôngma sômhleiminli a neia, nâipasal sômhni inhni le nâinupang sômhleiruk a neia.
Abija thurchi dang, a thuhril le a sin thohai chu deipu Idoa thurchi irziakna lekhabua a chuang.
Reng Abija chu a thia, Davida khopuia rênghai thâna an phûma. A nâipa Asa chu ama irthûlin an lala. Asa inlal kum sôm sûng chu râl irvei loiin an oma,
Asa’n thil dik le thil sa, a Pathian
Nam dang maichâmhai le an pathian biakna hmun irsânghai a pai pehaia, an lung millimhai an khoipai pehaia, Aseri irlim an iphun kha an siat pehaia.
Judai rama mihai chu an irchibulhai Pathian
Judai ram sûng kho tina nam dang pathian biakna hmun irsânghai le an mirimhoi hâlna maichâmhai chu a pai pehaia, an lal sûng chu lungthi takin an iom a ni.
khan lungthi takin an omtira, irdoina a om no kâr hin Judai rama kulhai an sintira.
Judai rama mihai kuang, “Tho ei khuahai hi siam insa nôk ei ta, lung kulhai sin ei ta, râl hrungna kul irsânghai mikot le a kalnahai sin ei ti.
Reng Asa’n pho le ufeihai chôiin, Judai ram ata sipai nuai thum le Benjamina ram ata irdoi thei, rôppho innghâk le thal chôi sipai nuai hni sîngriat a neia; mi hrât irdoi thei tak tak an ni.
Ethiopia mi Zera khan sipai nuai sôm irzakhat le sakor tâli irzathum hruaiin Judai ram a hong rûna, Maresa a hong tung rak tâka.
Lei doi hrangin rêng Asa chu a le’rsiama, Maresa kôla Zefata irhôra khan a le’rsang tâka.
Asa chu a Pathian
Asa le a rualhaiin Gerar dênin an irzûlhaia, Ethiopia mihai chu an thathai oka, a lei pût thei zel om ta mahai.
Gerar le a kôlvêla khopuihai khom an insiat thei ving a ni; khataka mi lei omhai khan
Belrapu omnahai an hâla, belra tamtak an chelhaia, saringseihai an chelhaia, Jerusalema an kîr nôk tâka.
Obeda nâipa Azaria chunga Pathian irtha a zuang tunga.
Reng Asa irhmupui hrangin a fea, a khêka, “Reng Asa nangni Judai le Benjamina mihaio, ki thu hi irngai roi. Ama tiang nin kop sûng chu
Israelhaiin chu Pathian tak biak loiin zoro sôttak an oma, ar chutir hrang ochai khom nei mahaia, dân khom inhre mahai.
Khannisian chardongna an tong zoro’n Israelhai Pathian
Kha lai khan ram a buaia, ite mumal a nei no sikin tûte irvâksuak ngam zel om ngai mahai.
Nam le nam deng an irthei irhlôma, kho sûng le kho sûng deng an irthei irhlôma. Pathianin buaina le chardongna a intungtir a ni.
Nangni’n chu chi loiin irnaksong unglân, nin sintho ra chu hmu ngêt nin ti,” a tia.
Reng Asa’n deipu Azaria, Obeda nâipa thu an hriatin chu a’rsongpuia, Judai le Benjamina rama millim om murdi chu a paihai vinga, a pa’n tâng ram khua a ilâk murdi an boipai vinga. Tempil tuala
Asa inlal kum sômhleiringa tha thumna khan chu Jerusalema an irbukkhôm nôka.
Kha ni khan an râllâk sehrât irzasari le kêlbelra sângsari
An irchihai Pathian
Ulian khom nâipang khom, pasal khom nupang khom, Israelhai Pathian
Inring taka khêkin
A diktakin thu an thung indet tâk sikin, Judai rama mihai chu an lôm tak taka.
A pi rêngnu, Maaki’n Aseri irlim intirom tak a phun sikin rêngnu nina a pai pea; Aseri irlim kha Asa khan a tuka ilhlek hlekin Kidron tui kôla a hâlpai vinga.
Ram sûnga hmun irsâng pathian dang an ibiakna murdi chu rêng Asa’n pai zoi no khomsian a dam sûng chu,
A pa Abija’n Pathian kuanga thilpêk murdi chu Asa’n tempila a siaa, ama ngêtin rângachak le tangkarua a inhlanhai khom a sia saa.
Asa hin kum sômthum ringa roi a rêl sûng chu irdoina om nôk ta maka.
Judai rama Asa kum sômthum ringa an lal kumin, Israel rêng Baasa’n Juda rêng Asa ram ata tûte an hong thei loina hrangin le tûte an fe loina hrangin Rama khuaa kul a sina.
Asa’n Tempila sum kok ata tangkarua le rângachak a lâksuaka, Damaska khuaa om Suria rêng Benhadada kuang a thona, a kuang,

“Ka pa le ni pa an irsan ang khan, eini khom irkop ei ta, en ro, tangkarua le rângachak ki hong thona, Israel rêng Baasa leh nin rual irchang masan tan lân, ki ram ata a sipaihai khâipai sian,” a tia.
Benhadada’n Asa iti chu a sa a tia, a sipai hruaitu a koia, Israel ram chu a rûn tâka, Ijon hai, Dan hai, Abel-maim hai le Naftalia hai biala neinun omna khua murdi chu a lâka.
Kha thilhai kha rêng Baasa’n a inhriatin Rama khuaa kul a isin chu a’rngamsan tâka.
Rama kul sinna hrang lung le thinghai chu la hrangin Judai rama mi murdi chu Asa khan a pana, Geba le Mizpa kul sinna’n a hmanga.
Kha laia khan deipu Hanania chu rêng Asa kuang a honga, a kuang, “Pathian
Ethiopia le Libua mihai khan sipai le sakor tâli tamtak le sakor chung chuang mi tamtak an inei mo ni ma?
ama iamzoi loihai chu changpui hrangin rammual pumpuia a mit a inlêngtir ngai a ni. Atûn ata chu doi hrang nei mai ta ni ti, inzakpuiom takin thil ni itho a ni hi,” a tia.
Deipu chunga khan Asa chu a ning an mur pea, a kut thîr bânhrial leh a khita, intângna ina a khuma, khatak ata chu mi dang chunga khom nghaltôk song a phut tâka.
Asa inlal phut ata a mong dêna thurchi chu Juda le Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna bua a chuang.
Asa chu kum sômthum kuak an lal zoiin a ke a pân pea, an bâi tâka,
Kum hni zoia chu a thia;
Davida khopuia, a thân hranga a ichoina khan an phûma. An phûm mân mosola hai, sahriak mirimhoihai an pola, ama sûnpuina’n meipui an sêm ir-al tâka.
A pa Asa irthûlin Jehosafata chu rêng a changa, Israelhai doi thei hrangin ar sinsiama.
Judai ram kul omna khuahaia sipai a siaa, Judai ram thingtânga sipai a siahaia.
An lal phut laia a pa itho ang khan Jehosafata khomin a thoa, Baal biak nuam maka.
A pahai Pathian sin a zonga, Pathian thupêkhai a zôma, Israel rênghai angin om maka.
Jehosafata chu Judai rama an lal indettira, mihaiin khâzana an hong pêk ngaia, a irchong ok tâka, mihaiin an irngaiirsâng tâka.
sintho chu a inuam lam tak a nia, an millim biakna hmun irsânghai, Aseri irlimhai Judai ram ata an boipaia.
Kum thum an lal zoiin Benhaila hai, Obadia hai, Zekaria hai, Nethanela hai, Mikaia hai, Judai ram khopuia irchutirtu a tîrsuaka.

Levi irchia mi kuak le ochai inhni an fe saa, Levi irchihai chu Semaia hai, Nethania hai, Zebadia hai, Asahela hai, Semiramota hai, Jehonathana hai, Adonija hai, Tobija hai, Tobadonija hai an nia, ochaihai chu Elisama le Jehorama an ni.
dân lekhabu chu an chôia, Judai rama khuahai chu an irfangpuia, mihai an irchutirhaia.
An omna ram sûnga chu Jehosafata doi ngam loi hrangin
Filistia mi senkhathaiin khâzana tangkarua le thilpêk dang tamtak an hong pêk ngaia. Arab mi senkhathai khomin kêlbelra sângsari irzasari le kêl sângsari irzasari an hong pêk saa.
Khanchu, Jehosafata chu a hon lal ual uala, Judai ram sûnga a dung le a khangin kulhai a sina, khopuihai an dinga.
Khahai hmuna khan fâk zât a hrê pehai oka. Jerusalem khuaa sipai hruaitu lian mi hâitak takhai a siahaia.
An irlo fe dân angin hruaitu a siahaia. Juda irchia sipai hruaitu tak chu Adna a ni, sipai nuai thum ar ôia.
A hnuai renga chu Jehohanana a ni, sipai nuai hni le sîngriat ar ôia,
inthumna chu Zikria nâipa Amasia a ni, sipai nuai hni ar ôia.
Benjamina irchia sipai hruaitu tak chu sipai songinruk tak Eliada a ni, sipai nuai hni rôppho le thal chôihai ar ôia.
A hnung renga chu Jehozabada a ni, irdoi irsiamchak sipai nuai khat le sîngriat ar ôia.
Jerusalema, hi sipaihai hi rêngin a isonghai a nia, hi khêla hin Judai rama kho kulhaia sipai a sia sa a ni.
Juda rêng Jehosafata chu ar chong ok tâka, ar hming an thang ok zoiin chu Israel rêng Ahaba leh irkop hrangin an tia, an nâihai an irneitirhaia.

Kum tamtak zoia chu Jehosafata chu Samari khuaa Ahaba hmu hrangin a suaka. Jehosafata le a rualhai lômna’n Ahaba’n kêlbelra le sehrât tamtak a thata, hruai an thea. Gilead biala Ramot khua doipui hrangin a koia.
“Ramot khua doi hrangin ni fe nuam mo?,” a tia. Jehosafata chu, “Ni fe nuam te tena kei le ki sipaihai fe an irsiam mai, nang san ki ti,” a tia.
Ahaba’n deipu irzaminli vêl chu, “Ramot khua ki idoi hrang le doi loi hrang?” tiin ar dona. Anni khan, “Doi ro, Pathianin nang ompui a ti,” an tia.
Jehosafata’n, “Deipu dang

Ahaba’n, “Inkhat, Imla nâipa Mikaia chu a la om, sin sa ite ni la zongpui thei ngai ma, ennuam ma ung, sin saloi i mani a ihrilsuak ngai kêng,” a tia. Jehosafata’n, “Reng takin khaanga ti hrang chu ni ma duah,” a tia.
Reng khan hruaitu inkhat a koia, Mika hruai hrangin a tîra.
Reng inhni chu Samari khopui lampui pên tiang hruizôla rêngtoihmuna khan an toia; deipuhaiin an hrilhaia, thu an hril khumhaia.
An laia mi inkhat, Kenaana nâipa Zedekia’n thîr se’rki illim a sina, Ahaba kuang, “Suriahai chu hi leh hin beihai ei ta, inhnêhai ei ti,” a tia.
Deipu danghai khomin khaangin an tia. “Fe’n lân, Ramot khua chu doiin lân, man ngêt ni ti.
Mikaia hruai hranga an tîrin chu a kuang, “Deipu dang murdi’n a sa tiin rêng kuang khan thu an hrila, nang khomin ang khan ti ro,” a tia.
Mikaia’n, “
Reng Ahaba makunga a va tungin chu, rêngin, “Mikaia, rêng Jehosafata leh Ramot khua kha doi hrang mo doi loi hrang mo?,” a tia.
Mikaia khan, “Hong doi ngân u ta, nin inhnê mo,
Mikaia’n, “Kêlbelra hrungtu nei loi angin Israel mihai chu tânga an indarh ki hmua. Hihai hin hruaitu nei mahai; mâni in lama, a chîn tete’n fe ri sehai, a ti e,” a tia.
Ahaba’n, Jehosafata kuang, “Irngai ro, keima hranga thil sa hrang ite hril ngai mah ti nang kin hril. Thil saloi inzen a hril ngai,” a tia.
Mikaia’n, “
Tu mo Ahaba kuanga fe hranga, Ramot doia thi hranga zu huang hrang?
Irtha inkhat hi a zuanga,
Irtha khan, ‘Ahaba deipuhai minlak inthotir hrang,’ a tia.
Khaang khan a ni,
Deipu Zedekia’n Mikaia a va pana, “Itiklai khan mo
Mikaia’n hiang hin a sâma, “Tentan sûngrîla irbîk hranga ni fe tika, inhria ni ti,” a tia.
Ahaba’n hruaitu inkhat kuang, “Mikaia kha chelin lân, kho sûng hruaitu Amon kuang hruaiin lân, rêng nâipa Joasa khom irhmutir roh.
Dam takin ki hong kîr nôk mâka chu intângnaa khumin lân, bai le tui vai pe ri se,” a tia.
Mikaia’n “Dam taka ni hong kîrin chu
Reng Ahaba le rêng Jehosafata chu Gilead biala Ramot khua doi hrangin an fe tâka.
Ahaba chu Jehosafata kuang, “Ei irdoi tena irvô indanglam ki ta, nang chu rêng irvôna leh irvô mai ro,” a tia. Reng Ahaba chu a tukrivo a thûla, irdoina khan a va kop sa tâka.
Suria rêngin tâli chalaitu hruaitu chu, “Israelhai rêng ti no chu tûte doihai no roi,” a tia.
Khahai kha Jehosafata’n a hmu’n chu Israel rêng mani a sôna, a hong bei tâka. Jehosafata chu a khêka,
Tâli chalaitu hruaituhai khan Israel rêng ni mah ti an inhriatin chu, irzûl ta mahaia.

Suria sipai thal kâpte hin mo rêng Ahaba chu râltukfam leh irvo a kârhai hin hong tok pal lik a ti, a tia. A tâli chalaitu kuang khan, “Sâbe ki tuang ta e, kîrin lân, irdoina hmun ata hi rot ta ro,” a tia.
An irdoi lai taka hin Ahaba chu tâli chunga a bânga, misa a tâkin chu a thi tâka.
Jerusalema a omna ina Jehosafata chu dam takin a kîra.
Deipu inkhat, Hanana nâipa, Jehua’n rêng kha a hmua, a kuang, “Mi sual changpuia
Kha sûnga khom khan satna viat chu ni nei; mihai ibiak Aseri irlim murdi inboia Pathian nuamlam ni izong hi,” a tia.
Jehosafata chu Jerusalema a oma, a takirtâi zapa; sim tiang Beerseba ata hmâr tiang Efraima tâng hekna tianga khuahai chu an irchihai Pathian
Judai rama kul nei khuahai murdi chu roirêltuin a siahaia, hiang hin a hril pehaia:
“Roi hi rêlinsat pa pai no roi, nin sin hi mihriamhai irchama tho ni mak chêia,
kha chi unglân, irdîn takin itinrêng tho roi,
Jerusalem khuaa khan Levi irchihai, ochaihai le kho sûnga hruaitu ual senkhathai chu roirêltu’n a bêhaia.
Hiang hin a tia, “
khô khua ata khom nin irchi chanpuihai leh mihriam that hrangin mo, dân le thupêk insiatna thu mo an hon tungin chu, an thu ngaitua pumin an omdân hrang fel takin hrilhai roi; R
Sakhua tiang thila ochai inlal tak Amaria thu inlal tak a ta, khotâng thila chu Judai ram optu inlal tak ni a ti. Levi irchihaiin hi roirêltu thu hi an izôm hrang a ni. Hâitakin ama hi zômhai sian,
Zoro hong sôt ual tena chu Moab le Amon-haiin an irkoppui Meun-hai le Jehosafata ram chu an hong doia;
mi senkhat an honga, Jehosafata kuang, “Tuipui thi râl Edom ram ata sipai tam takin nang hong doi an ta, Hazazon Tamar khua chu an lâkpai ta,” a tia.
Jehosafata chu a char a dong pe oka, thil tho dân hrang
Judai ram kho tin ata
Annihai le Jerusalema mihai chu tempil tual sin intharna khan an irbuka, rêng Jehosafata chu an makunga a va ngîra.
Inring takin a chongchaia, “O
Hi rama lei om ngaihai kha ni mi Israelhai makunga nin hnotsuakhaia, ni rualpa Abrahama irchihai inei kumtuanga hrang ni ipêk mo ni ma? o kin Pathian!
Hi rama hin an om tâka, nangma biakna hrang hmun Irthiang an sina.
A ni hremna hrangin irdoina hai, hri hai, châm hai, thil saloi chi tinrêng hong tung khomsian, hi in mikot, nangma biakna hranga ni inkunga hin ngîr kin ta, ni san ni ti, an iti a ni.

Irngai ro, atûn hin Amon mihai, Moab mihai le Edom mihaiin an ni doia, kin irchibulhai Aigupta rengata an hong suak khom khan an rama fe phalhai mak chea. Kin puhaiin an ram chu an irhuala, insiat thei mahai.
Irngai ro, ramchâra kin inei ta hranga ni ni ipêk ram rengata nin hnotsuak tumin an hong irthok tâk a ni!
O kin Pathian an chunga roi hong rêlin lân; a ni doi hrang sipaihai hi an tama, ite châng thei ma ung. A thôna lam zel inhre ta ma ung, ni makunga kin hong intung phot a ni hi,” an tia.
Judai rama mi murdi chu an dôngma le an nâihai leh tempil mikota an ngîra.
Khataka om sa Levi irchia mi inkhat, Zekaria nâipa Jahaziela chunga
Jahaziela’n, “Judai rama mi murdi le Jerusalema omhai le nang Jehosafata,
Nangtûk chu Zif irkânna an hongin lei doihai unglân, phâizôl tung mân Jezruel kôl, ram irhelna laia lei inruanghai roi.
Hi irdoinaa hin nin idoihai nang no ni, nin omna hranga khan lei inruanghai phot roi.
Reng Jehosafata chu a hmâi kûnin irnêng a sika, mipuihai khom an kûna,
Levia irchi, Kohata le Kora pâlhai chu an ngîra, Israelhai Pathian
Zînga chu mihaiin Tekoa khua kôl ram irchêpna tiang an pan hrang a nia, an suak hranga khan Jehosafata’n an kuang, “Juda le Jerusalem ruathartehaio,
Rengin mihai kha a chongpuihaia, Levi irchia zaipôl sakhai chu hun ser bîka innghâk hrang tukfamhai irbelin sipaihai mahruai hrangin an tia;
Khaanga hla an sak laiin a doitu sipaihai an tei phuata,
Amon-hai le Moabhaiin an doihaia, an that phiarhaia, a sate’n an irdoi tâka.
Judai rama sipaihaiin ramchâra in irsâng an va dêna, an râlhai an thîrhaia. An rêngin hnuaichanga an inrîl dûla, an lei thi vinga, inkhat lua an tânsuak om mahai.

Jehosafata le a rualhai chu râllâk sum la hrangin an fea. Kha laia khan sehrât tamtak an om saa, fâk hranghai, tukfamhai, le thilhlu tamtak an hmu sa. Râllâk sum lâk hrang tamtak a nia, sûn thum sûng chu an ilâk mai a nia, an ipêl zoi loi rakin an ilâk a ni.
A sûn minli nî chu, Baraka irhôra an irchuna, anni hranga a sinthohai sikin
an râlhai an hnêtirhai tâk sikin Jehosafata le a rualhai chu lôm takin Jerusalema an fe tâka.
Khua an tung tôn chu, perkhuanghai, têngrephai le bekulhai tum pumin tempil an pana.
Israelhai râl,
Jehosafata chu râl boiin an lala,
Jehosafata chu kum sômthum hleikhata khan Judai rama rêng a changa, Jerusalema kum sômhni ringa an lala. A nu chu Azubai, Silhia nâinu a ni.
A pa Asa ang khan
Nam dang pathian biakna, hmun irsânghai insiat zoi maka, mipuihai khomin an irchibulhai Pathian biak uar ok ta mahai.
Jehosafata sintho murdi, rêng a chang phut ata a thi ni dêna thuhai chu Hanania nâipa, Jehua thurchi ti irziakna lekhabua a irziak a ni. Israelhai rêng thurchi ti irziakna lekhabua a om.
Voikhat chu Judai rama rêng Jehosafata’n Israel rêng Ahazia, thil dikloi tho ngaitu leh rual an irchanga.
Ezion-Geberah Tarsis khuaa fe hrangin irkuanga an kâia.
Maresa kho mi, Dodavahua nâipa Eliezera’n Jehosafata kuang, “Israel rêng Ahazia-hai leh nin irrualpuihai sikin,
Jehosafata chu a thia, Davida khopuia an phûma, a nâipa Jehorama chu ama irthûlin an lala.
Judai rama rêng Jehosafata nâipa Jehorama’n nâi kiruk, Azaria hai, Jehiela hai, Zekaria hai, Azarihua hai, Mikaela hai, Sefatia hai a neihaia.
An pa’n rângachakhai le irchonhlu tamtak a pêkhai vinga, Judai ram khopui kul nei, enkoltu hrang an kung pehai vinga. Jehorama chu a nâi ulian tak a ni sikin Jehosafata’n an laltira.
Jehorama chu a hon lal indeta, a sanghai chu an thattirhaia. Israelhai laia hruaitu senkhat khom an thattirhai sa.
Kum sômthum hleihni a ni kumin Jehorama chu rêng a changa, Jerusalema kum riat an lala,
Israel rêng Ahaba le rêng dang sual ta takhai angin an oma, Ahaba nâinu khom dôngma’n a neia.
khannisian,
Jehorama inlal laiin Judahai ata Edom-hai tehel an zonga, rêng a bingin an neia.
Jehorama le a rualhai chu sakor tâli leh Edom-hai chu an va rûnhaia, Edom sipaihaiin an le’rhualhaia; khannisian zân inthim laia an la pût thei hrâm sikin,
khatak ata chu Edom-haiin Judahai hnuaia om loiin atûn ten hin rêng dang an inei mai a ni ta. Jehorama’n,
Judai ram tâng rama pathian dang biakna hmun irsâng a sinhai hluka. Judai ram le Jerusalem mihai chu
Deipu Elija’n lekha a thona, “Ni’rchibul Davida Pathian,

Israel rênghai omdân angin ni om tâk sikin, Ahaba’n Israel mihai pathian danghai kuang a uirepui ang khan nang khomin Judai rama mi le Jerusalema mihai chu ni uirepuia. Nangma nêka sa, ni sanghai lak ni thatpaihaia.
Khasikin,
Nang khom, ni sûng nang innatir pe a ta, a nitin nang na pe mai a ti,” tiin.
Filistia mi le Arab mi senkhat, tuipui kôla Ethiopia mi lei omhai kôla an oma.
Judai ram chu an hong rûna, rêng inhai an inmoka, rêng dôngmahai le an nâipasalhai chu suaka an chelhai vinga, a nâi mitum Ahazia chu chel mahai.
Kha irzoiin chu
kum hni sûng chu a na pe mai tâka, a rîl a hmon pea, a satea natna tuangin a thi tâka. A puhai thia an itho ngai angin a mihaiin ama sûnna hrangin meipui sêm inchok ta mahai.
Jehorama chu kum sômthum hleihni a niin an lal irphuta, Jerusalema kum riat an lala, a thi hi tûte’n a poi ti om mahai, Davida khopuia khan an phûma, rênghai thâna chu phûm mahai.
Arab mi senkhathaiin Jehorama chu an doia, a nâi mitum Ahazia ti no chu a nâi danghai chu an that pe vinga. Jerusalema mihaiin a pa irthûl hrangin Ahazia chu rêng an inchangtira.
Ahazia chu kum sômhni inhni a ni le an lal irphuta, Jerusalem-a kum khat an lala. A nu chu Athali, Israel rêng Ahaba nâinu, Omria tunu a ni.
Ama khom Ahaba in mihai omdân angin a oma, a nu thu a zôm ngaia.
mithmua thilsual a tho ngaia, a pa thi zoiin Ahaba in sûng mihai laia senkhat chu a thu lâkna tak an ni tâka, a isiatpui tâk a ni.
An thu irdon angin Suria rêng Hazaela doi hrangin Israel rêng Jorama rual ar changpuia, Gilead biala Ramot khua an doia, an irdoina rêng Jorama chu sâbe a neia.
Jezreel-a om hrangin a fea, Juda rêng Jehorama nâipa Ahazia an va hroa.
Jorama a va hro chu Pathianin Ahazia siatna hranga a inkung a ni. An omsuam laiin mi inkhat Nimsia nâipa Jehua a honga, ama hi Ahaba inkamangtir hranga
Jehua chu Ahaba irchihai chunga kut a thâk laiin Jorama dam loi en hrangin Ahazia hai Juda hruaituhai le Ahazia urênghai chu Jehua’n a hmua, a thatpaihai sa tâka.
Ahazia kha an zonga, Samari khuaa a le’rbîka, Jehua kuang an hruaia, a lei thatpaia. A pu Jehosafata’n theidôr insua’n
A nu Athali’n Ahazia thi an hriatin chu, Juda rêng in mihai an thattirhaia.

Ahazia khan farnu Jehosebi a neia, a ochai Jehoiada chu pasalin a neia. Ahazia nâipasal inkhat, Joasa chu inrûkin an ruanga, rêng nâi dang thi hranghai ata a lâksuaka, tempila zâlna tentan inkhata a thupa, a om tâka. A thup khak sikin Athali’n that thei maka.
Kum ruk sûng a thupa, Athali chu rêng a chang tâka.

A kum sarina khan chu ochai Jehoiada le sipai irza hruaitu ringahai chu an irhlet irhlôma. Kha mihai kha Jehorama nâipa Azaria hai, Jehohanana nâipa Ismaela hai, Obeda nâipa Azaria hai, Adaia nâipa Maaseia hai, Zikria nâipa Elisafata hai an ni.
Judai ram an irfangsuaka, Levi irchihai le nam dang hruaituhai chu Jerusalema an hruai bukhaia.
Tempila khan an irbuka, Joasa, rêng nâipa leh khan chong an irkhâma. Jehoiada khan an kuang, “
Hiang hin thil tho ei ti, Sabat nia ochai le Levi irchihai sintho hrangin an hong tena, hmun thuma semin hmunkhat chu tempil mikothai hrung an ti.
Hmun thuma hmun khathaiin chu rêng in hrung an ti, a danghai chu ‘Lung phûm’ mikot kôla om an ti. Mipuihai chu tempil tuala an iom hrang a ni.
Tempil sûnga chu ochai le Levi irchi sintho lai tak ti no chu, tûte an ilût hrang ni mah. Anni chu serindang an ni sikin, lût thei an ti; mi danghai chu
Levi irchihai chu rêng hi irhual khak an ta, khandai phôi sai chôiin an ihrung hrang a ni, rêng fena hmun tina an izui hrang a ni. Tempil sûnga lût tumtuhai chu an ithathai hrang a ni,” a tia.
Levi irchihai le Judai rama mihaiin Jehoiada ihril angin an thoa. Sabat nia irngam hranghai chu an chela.
Davida’n tempila a siaa, ufei le phohai chu Jehoiada’n a sema.
Tempil mikota khandai phôi sai chôiin ar tângtirhaia, rêng kha an hrungtirhai khapa.
Jehoiada’n Joasa kha a hruaisuaka, rêng tho hrang dân bu kha a pêka, rêngin an siam tâka, ochai Jehoiada le a rualhaiin Joasa chu sahriak an pola, “Reng hi dam sôt ri se,” tiin an khêka.
Athali’n rêng an chôiindôm ti an hriatin chu, mipui irbukna tempil tiang a fea.

Reng thar chu rêng ngîrna hranga an indang, tempil sûng lûtna kôl bang kôla ngîr kha a hong hmua, sipai hruaituhai le bekul irputhaiin an irhuala. Mipuihai chu raifân takin an khêk dur dura, bekul an tuma, tempila zaipôlhaiin an thil tum irhâi leh hla an hruaia. Annihai kha a hong hmuin chu ningmurin a puan an pot thêra, “Nin ni ihuang a ni,” tiin a khêka.
Jehoiada’n tempil vêla that nuam maka, sipai hruaituhai kha a koia, “A hrung hrangin sipai irtâng unglân, a lei inruang nin hmu’n chu thatpai roi,” a tia.
Athali chu an chela, rêng in tiang an hruaia, sakor mikot an itina kôla khan an thata.
Baal an ibiakna hmuna khan an rêngin an fea, an insiata. Maichâm kha an insima, millimhai kha an irfûi inkhoia, Baal ochai Matana chu maichâm kôla an thata.
Jehoiada chu ochaihai le Levi irchihai chu tempila an sintho hrang, an inthotirhaia, rêng Davida iti angin an tho hrang an semhaia, Mosia dân bua irziak angin
Jehoiada’n chu tempil mikothai an hrungtirhaia, mi porinche tûte inlûttir phal hrang ni ma.
Sipai hruaituhai, ram hruaituhai le mipuihaiin Jehoiada pâlin lampuia an irkôia, rêng chu tempil ata rêng ina an hruaia, mikotpuia an lûtpuia, rêngtoihmuna khan rêng chu a toia.
Mi murdi’n an râi a fâna: Athali chu an tuk that tâk sikin kho sûnga khan buaina om ta mah.
Joasa chu kum sari mi a niin Judai rama rêng a changa, Jerusalema kum sômminli an lala, a nu chu Zibi, Beerseba khuaa mi a ni.
Ochai Jehoiada dam sûng chu Joasa’n
Jehoiada’n rêng Joasa chu dôngma inhni an neitira, nâinupang le pasal a neipui oka.
A hong inlal ual tena chu tempil irvo insatir a tuma.
Ochai le Levi irchihai chu Judai ram khopui ar fangtirhaia, a kum tina tempil irvotirna ruk hrang dôr tholôm ar fuangtirhaia. Irhnot hrangin a tia, khannisian Levi irchihai chu an ir-ial pe oka.
Khanchu Jehoiada a koia, “Levi irchihai hin Judai ram le Jerusalem mihai kuang ata, ‘Irtongna in,’ enkolna hrang
(Mi sualnu Athali zuituhai kha tempila an lût khumhaia, thil irthiang tamtak Baal biakna makunga an ilâksuak a ni.)
Rengin Levi irchihai chu tholôm kok sina, tempil lûtna mikot bula sia hrangin a tia.
Jerusalem le Judai ram murdia Pathian siahlo Mosia’n ramchâra mipui tho hrang a indang pehai ang khan hong chôi mai hrangin he a bêhaia.
Mipuihai le a hruaituhaiin lôm takin tho hrang bituk zât chu an hong chôia, bôm kha an thâk inbit tâka.

Levi irchihaiin bôm chu a ni tin, a enkol hrangin rêngin a indang pehai kuang an lâk ngaia, bôm kha a bitin chu ochai ulian tak Jehoiada irthûlpuitu le rêng mi indang irziaktu khan an lei lâksuaka, bôm chu a siana khan an sia nôk ngai. Tangka tam tôktak an thosuak tâka.
Reng le Jehoiada khan tempil irvo insatirna sin enkoltuhai kuang poisa kha an pêkhai ngaia, anni’n lungtuk mihai, thing sin theihai, thîrsuk theihai, tempil irvo insatir hrangin an hmanghaia.
Inhnê takin mistirihaiin an sina, tempil chu a phuta angin an irvo insa’n an indettira.
Sintho hrang an tho zoiin chu rângachak le tangkarua an ihmang ban chu ochai inthang tak Jehoiada an pêka; ama’n tempila hmang hrang tâbor le bêlbûr dang a sina.
Jehoiada dam sûng chu a nitin tempila thil an inhlan ngaia.
Tar kûnin a dama, kum irzakhat sômthum a dênin a thi tâka.
Israel mihai kuang Pathian ta hrang le tempil ta hrangin sin a tho insa sikin, Davida khopuia rênghai thâna an phûma.
Jehoiada a thi zoiin chu Judai rama mipui hruaituhaiin an thu irngai ual hrangin rêng kha an inthêma.
Mipuihaiin an irchibulhai Pathian
anni chu hruai kîr hrangin deipuhai a tîra; khannisian mihaiin an thu irngai pe mahaia.
Ochai inlal tak Jehoiada nâipa Zekaria kuang Pathian irtha a zuang tunga, mipuihai hmu theina hranga khan a ngîra, inring takin a khêka, “
Zekaria kha an thuphana khan, rêng thuin tempil tuala khan an dêng thatpai tâka.
Rengin Zekaria pa Jehoiada, ama ta hranga a kâmnang kha a’rnghilpaia, Zekaria chu an thattirhaia. Zekaria thi hrangin chu, “Ni sintho hi
Kum a hong tharin chu, Suria sipaihaiin Judai ram le Jerusalem chu an hong doia, hruaitu tamtak an thata, râllâk sum tamtak Damaska khuaa an chôia.
Suria sipaihai chu an huanghai nâkin, anni nêka tam ual Juda sipaihai chu an inhnê a ni. An irchibulhai Pathian

Joasa’n sâbe lian tak a tuanga, râlhai an chîn zoiin chu a rualhai inhni an irruala, ochai inlaltak Jehoiada nâipasalhai a ithat, phuba chu an lâka, zâlhmuna zâl kha an thata, rêng thâna ni loi, Davida khopuia an phûm tâka.
(Irruala thattuhai kha Amon mi Simeata nâipa Zabada le Moab mi Simriti nâipa Jehozabada hai an ni.)
Renghai lekhabu hrilfiana bua Joasa thurchihai, a chungchânga deipu thu leihrilna hai, tempil irvo insatir thuhai a chuang. A nâipa Amazia chu ama irthûlin an lal tâka.
Kum sômhni ringa a niin Amazia chu an lal irphuta, Jerusalema kum sômhni kuak an lala. A nu chu Jerusalema suak Jehoadini a ni.
nuamlam a thoa; khannisian ngîk pu pumin a itho ngai a ni.
Reng a chang indet tena chu a pa thattuhai kha a thathaia.
An nâihai chu tônhai maka, Mosia dân bua,

Reng Amazia chu Juda mihai le Benjamina mihai chu a panam ang dungzuiin sipai chi dang dangin an omtirhaia; sângkhat pâlhai, irzakhat pâlhai, hruaitu hrang an dang pehaia. Pasal kum sômhni chung tianga chu an om vinga, an rêngin mi nuai thum an ni.
Hihai bâka hin hmâr tianga Israelhai, mi nuai khat, tangkarua her sângthum irzaminliin a hruaihaia.
Reng kuang khan deipu inkhat a honga, “Hi Israel sipaihai hi hruaihai no ro. Hmâr tianga mihai tiang
Irdoina khan hrâtpuihai hrangin irtûng no ro. Irdoina inhnêtu nina hi Pathian thu kêng a ini; ni râlhaiin nan hnêna an ti,” a hong tia.
Amazia chu deipu kuang, “Tangka ki lei ipêkhai kha te, itin mo a ini ta hrang?” a tia. Deipu khan, “
Amazia chuangna sipai pâl, Efraima ram ata honghai chu an banhaia, an fetirhaia, Judahai chunga ningmur irlâkin an fe tâka.
Amazia chu ngam takin a sipaihai leh michi irhôra a fepuihaia, Edom sipaihai leh an irdoia, mi sîngkhat an thathaia.
Mi sîngkhat an chelhaia, Sela kho kôla rôlpûka an hruaihaia, an namthâkhaia, an thi zoi vinga.
Amazia’n irdoina a itîrhai loi sipaihai khan Samari le Beth-Horon kâra Juda khopui chu an doia, mi sângthum vêl an thata, râllâk sum tamtak an lâka.
Amazia’n Edom-hai an hnêa, a hongin chu, an millimhai a hong chôia, a siana a sina chubai a mûka, an makunga mirimhoi a hâla.
Hi sika hin

Rengin, “Itiklai khan mo rêng kuanga thu irdon hrangin nang ki ibe, dâihrek ro, nang thatpaina ki ti,” a tia. Deipu’n, “Ki thu ti irngai nuam mak chea, hi hi ni tho tâk sikin, Pathianin nan boipai a itum a nih ti kin hriat ta,” a ti phota, a dâihrek ta.
Juda rêng Amazia le a ulianhaiin Israel doi an tuma, Jehua nâipa Jehoahaza nâi Israel rêng Jehoasa kuang, “Pa le pa, irdoi ei ta,” tia inphût hrangin mi a tîra.

Jehoasa’n hiang hin a sâma, “Voikhat chu Lebanon tânga ilhling kunghai hin Lebanon-ah sidar thing kuang, ‘Ki nâipa dôngma hrangin ni nâinu ni pe ro,’ a tia. Ramsa chaihaiin ilhling kung chu an palthût tâka.
Amazia, Edom mihai ni zu inhnêhai hi ni irsong a ni hi na! in sûnga om chi chian ta ro. Nang le ni mihai ta hranga poi hrang thil phordok ta no ro,” a tia.
Amazia khan a thu kha ite bê’n bê pe maka, Edom mihai pathian irlim a biak sikin Pathianin Israelhai kuta pêk a lei itum a ni.
Israel rêng Jehoasa le Juda rêng Amazia chu irdoi hrangin an suaka, Judai rama Beth-Semes kho kôla an irdoi tâka.
Juda sipaihai chu hrât ta mahaia, mâni in lam panin an intân tâka.

Israel rêng Jehoasa chu Juda rêng Amazia, Joasa nâipa, Ahazia tupa chu a chela, Jerusalema a hruaia, khopui kulbang chu, Efraima mikot ata bang kil tianga inkhâr an iti dênin kulbang mûk irzaminli chu an siatpaia.
Râllâk sum le tempil rângachak le tangkarua hai, Obed-edoma irchihai ihrung ngai tempil bêl le bûr le rêng ina sum hrêna sahai chu a lâka, bândaa khit hrangin mi a tuanghaia.
Juda rêng Amazia chu Israel rêng Jehoasa nêkin kum sômhlei ringain a dam sôt uala.
An lal phut ata a mong dênin Amazia sinthohai chu, Israel le Juda rênghai thurchi ti irziakna bua a chuang.
Khan, Amazia chu
A ruak chu sakor an inpêltira, Davida khopuia rêng thâna an phûm tâka.
Judai rama mi murdihaiin kum sômhleiruka ulian Amazia nâipa Uzia chu a pa irthûla rêng hrangin an inthanga.
(Amazia thi zoiin Uzia hin Elat khua a lâk nôka, Judai ram inding nôktu kha)
Uzia chu kum sômhleiruk a niin an lal irphuta, Jerusalema kum sômringa kum hni an lala. A nu chu Jerusalema mi Jekoli a ni.
Amazia angin
Pathian thu tianga kaihruaitu Zekaria dam sûng chu
Uzia chu Filistia mihai a rûna, Gath khua kul banghai an siata; Askelon kôla le Filistia ram hmun da danga kul a sina.
Pathianin Filistia mihai, Gurbala om Arab-hai le Meun-hai chu an hnêpuia,
Amon-hai khomin, Uzia kuang, khâzana an chôia; roiinpuiin Aigupta ram dênin ar hming an thang tâka.
Jerusalem kul bang chu a sinsiam inthara, bangkil mikot an itihai, Irhôr mikot an itihai, kul kôina taka inkhârhaia in irsâng a sina.

Khan, kholaia khom kul nei khua an dinga; tuipang a choi saa; nitâk tianga omhai, tâng sîphaia sehrât a vâi intam hluka, loi inmân tiang ar hnik oka, tâng rama khom grep an phuntirhaia, phâiram sahai khan thôl an thotirhaia.
Sipai tamtak, irdoi thei zât a neia. An thurchi irziakna chu ziaktu Jeiela le Maaseia, rêng milian Hanania haiin an vonga.
Hruaitu sânghni irzarukin a sipaihai an hruaia.
Reng tianga kop, râlhai doi thei zât, mi nuai thum sângsari le irzaringa a nei.
Uzia’n chu a sipaihai phohai, ufeihai, thîrlukhumhai, thîr songkolhai, thalhai, sâilungdênga hrang lung inhlûm a pêk saa.

Jerusalema khan a mi kut theithiamhai isin thal kâpna khôlhai, lung lianpahai hlôn theina khôlhai, in irsânghai le kul kalnahai a buna, a’rhming khom an thang pe ok tâka. Pathianin a changpui sikin khaang taka roiinpui a ni.
Reng Uzia chu a roiinpui ok zoiin chu, a’rsong pehaia, a isiatpuina chu a ni. A Pathian
Ochai inlaltak Azaria le ochai hâitak takin
khap tumin an zuia, “Uzia
Uzia chu tempil sûnga mirimhoi hâlna dokâng kôla khan a ngîra, mirimhoi hâlna bûr a chôia, ochaihai chunga khan a ning an mur pea; khannisian an makunga ngêt,
Azaria le ochaihaiin rêng michal an ena niin chu, an inlâi raka, tempil sûng ata kha an inhnotsuaka.
A natna sikin rêng Uzia chu a dam sûngin a porinche tâka, tempila lût a’rthiang ta no sikin, ama ina a om chian tâka, a sin tho thei ta maka, a nâipa Jothama’n ram chu a op tâka.
Khan, Uzia inlal sûnga a sintho murdi chu deipu Isaia’n a’rziaka.
Uzia chu a thia, rênghai thânmuala an phûma, pân irvei a ni sikin rênghai thâna se nuam mahaia. A nâipa Jothama chu ama irthûlin an lal tâka.
Jothama chu kum sômhni ringa mi a niin an lal irphuta, Jerusalema kum sômhleiruk an lala. A nu chu Zadoka nâinu Jerusaii a ni.
A pa angin
Tempil hmâr tianga lampui hi Jothama isin a ni, kho kulbang khom a siam insa intama, ‘Ofel’ an itihna len vâng chu a sate’n a sinsiam a ni.
Judai ram sûnga khuahai a sina, rampuia kulhai le râl hrungnahai a sinhai hluka.

Khan, Amona irchihai rêng a doia; an hnê tâka. Khan, Amona irchihai khan kha kuma khan tangkarua her sângthum irzaminli le gohu phur sîngkhat le barli phur sîngkhat an pêka. Khaang dênin Amona irchihai khan a kum hnina le a kum thumnaa khom an pêka.
Khanchu Jothama khan
Jothama rêng a chang laia thil tunghai thurchi, an irdoina thuhai le a thil rêl dânhai, Israel le Judahai thurchi irziakna bua a chuang ving a ni.
Jothama chu kum sômhni ringa a niin an lal irphuta, Jerusalema kum sômhleiruk an lala.
A thia, Davida khopuia an phûma, a nâipa Ahaza chu ama irthûlin an lal tâka.
Ahaza chu kum sômhni a niin an lal irphuta, Jerusalema kum sômhleiruk an lala. A pu Davida tho dân ang zôm nuam loiin
Israel rênghai tho dân a lâka, Baal irlim an sintirhaia.
Hinom irhôra mirimhoi a hâla, Israel mihai makunga
Tânga nam dang pathian biakna hmun irsânghai, thing dâihlim satak hnuaia hai, Ahaza chu ar bôl ngaia, mirimhoihai a hâl ngaia.
Ahaza’n thilsual a tho sikin, Suria rêng kuta Pathian
Israel rêng Remalia nâipa Pekahia khomin Ahazia chu a doia, an hnêa. Juda sipaihai satak tak mi nuai khat le sînghni a thata. Judai rama mihai chu an irchibulhai Pathian
Israel sipai Efraima pasal sa Zikria’n Ahaza nâipa Maaseia chu a thata. Reng in enkoltu Azrikama a that saa; rêng hnuaia mi Elkana khom a thata.
Judahai chu a urênghai an ni nâkin, Israel sipaihai chu nupang le nâipang nuai hni suaka an chelhaia. Samari khuaa an kalkhumhaia, râllâk sum tamtak an chôi pehaia.
Samari khuaa khan
Jerusalem le Judai rama om pasal le nupang suaka inomtirhai nin itum mai a ni hi. Nangni khomin
ki thu hi irngai hi roi, hi sala nin ichelhai hi nin urênghai, nin farnuhai kêng an ini, insuapaihai roi, khano’nchu,
Hmâr tianga rêng hruaitu lian minli, Jehohanana nâipa Azaria hai, Mesilemota nâipa Berekia hai, Saluma nâipa Zehiskia hai, Hadlaia nâipa Amasa hai khomin sipaihai sintho chu a sa ti mahaia.
An kuang, “Nin sala nin ichelhai hi, hin hong hruaihai no roi,
Khanchu, sipaihaiin sala an ichel le râllâk sum an hong ichôi chu mipui le an hruaituhai kuta an inhlan tâka.

Mi minlihai hi an râllâk sum ata sala an ichelhai kuang sil le kai pehai hrangin an tia, silkai hai, kekok bun hranghai an pêka, an sâbe pol hrangin oliv hriak an semhaia. Mâni kea fe thei loi raka irzalhai chu sakuartung chunga an inchuangtirhaia; sala an ichelhai murdi chu Judai ram Jeriko-a an hruai kîrhai vinga. Khan, Israelhai chu Samari tiang an fe tâka.
Kha laia khan rêng Ahaza chu ama changpui hrangin Assuria rênghai a koia.
Edom-haiin Judai ram an hong doia, an inhnêa, mi tamtak an chelhai a ni.

Filistia-hai lakin nitâk tianga tâng mongna phâi khuahai le Judai ram Negeb-hai an hong doi nôka. Anni len vâng chu Beth-Semes hai, Aijalon hai, Gederot hai, Soko le a kôlvêla khuahai, Timna le a kôlvêla khuahai Gimzo le a kôlvêla khuahai an lâka, an lua pehaia.
Juda rêng Ahaza chu a mihai satna hrang ngaitua viat loiin,
Assuria rêng Tiglat-Pilesera chu Ahaza chu va san nêkin intakna an tungtir pea.
Ahaza chu tempila rângachak hai, rêng ina mihai le mi irchong ualhai ina mihai a lâkhaia, Assuria rêng chu a pêka, khannisian a’rfêna om maka.
A sân a charindong lai tak khomin Ahaza chu

Ama inhnêtu Suriahai pathianhai chu chubai a mûkhaia, Suria pathianhai hin Suria rêng an changpuia, khasikin an kuang thilinhlan hrangin ni changpui ngêt a ti, iti a ni. Kha kha a mihai leh an isiatpui nôkna chu a ni.
Khakhêla tempila hmangrua a lâksuaka, an siata, tempil chu a khâra; Jerusalem khuaa maichâm a sinhai hluka;
Judai ram khopuia le kho sûnga hai nam dang pathian biakna hmun irsâng, mirimhoi hâlna hrang a sin pher phura. Hiang hin ar chibulhai Pathian
A roirêl sûnga a thurchi danghai chu a phut ata a mong dênin, Juda le Israel rênghai thurchi irziakna bua a chuang.
Ahaza chu a thia, rênghai thâna ni loiin Jerusalema an phûma, a nâipa Hezekia chu ama irthûlin an lal tâka.
Hezekia chu kum sômhni ringa a niin Judai rama rêng a chang irphuta, Jerusalema kum sômhni kuak an lala. A nu chu Zekaria nâinu Abija a ni.
A pu Davida’n
An lal phut kum, tha maton taka, Hezekia chu tempil inkhârhai chu an honghaia, a siathai chu an sintirhaia.
Tempil nisua tianga tuala khan ochaihai le Levi irchihai a koibukhaia.
An kuang, “Nangni Levi irchihaio, irthiang infâi unglân, nin pahai Pathian
Kin pahai chu
Tempil mikot chu an kala, meiser an thata, mirimhoi hâl mahaia, hmun Irthianga Israelhai Pathian ta hrang hâlirvôm thilinhlan inhlan mahai.
Hi sika hin
Kin pahai chu khandai leh tukthat an nia, kin nâinuhai le nâipahai, kin dôngmahai leh sala an chelhai a ni.
Kin chunga a ningmurna hi an tômtir sabeiin Israelhai Pathian
Ki nâihaio, omchian ta no roi,

Khahai laia khan Levi irchihai hi an oma: Kohata irchihai laia mi, Amasaia nâipa Mahata le Azaria nâipa Joela, Meraria irchihai laia mi: Abdia nâipa Kisa le Jahalelela nâipa Azaria; Gersona irchihai laia mi. Zima nâipa Joa le Joa nâipa Edena.
Elizafana irchi laia mi: Simria le Jeuela; Asafa irchi laia mi; Zekaria le Matania;
Hemana irchi laia mi: Jehuela le Simeia; Jeduthuna irchi laia mi: Semaia le Uziela.
Hi mihai hin an irchipui Levi irchihai an bukkhôma, an irthiangtirhaia; rêng thupêk angin tempil an irthiangtira.
tempil sûnga ochaihai an lûta, thil porche an ihmu murdi chu

Tha khatna, sûn maton taka tempil irthiangtir an phuta, a sûn riatna nî chu tempil sum omna dênin an infâia. Sûn riat dang, sûn sômhleiruk dênin tempil sûng chu Pathian biakna inruk hrangin an infâi nôka, an irthiangtir tâka.
Levi irchihai chu rêng Hezekia kuang an fea, “Tempil sûng kin irthial irthiangtir ta. Hâlirvôm thilinhlan hâlna maichâmhai, bai ser siana dokânghai le a hmangrua murdi kin irthiangtir ta.
Ahaza’n
Reng Hezekia chu Jerusalema hruaitu u ualhai chu a koibukhaia,
sherâtchal sari, kêlbelrachal sari, kêlbelrate sari le sual irbôlna thilinhlan kêlchal sari an hong chôia; ochaihai chu
Sehrâthai chu an thata, an thisen chu maichâma an intheka, kêlbelrate khom kha an thata, a thisen chu maichâma an intheka.
Reng le pungkhômhai makunga khan sual irbôlna thilinhlan hrangin kêlchalhai an hong kaia, an lu chunga an kut an irnghata,

ochaihaiin an thata, an thisen chu sual irbôlna’n an hmanga, Israel mi murdihai sual irbôlna’n an inhlan a ni. Reng thu angin hâlirvôm thilinhlan le sual irbôlna thil inhlan chu Israel mi murdi ta hranga inhlan a ni.
Reng deipu Gada le deipu Nathana hmanga Davida kuang
Davida itum ngai ang tum zât an chôia. Ochaihai khom bekul chôiin an ngîra,
Reng Hezekia chu hâlirvôm thilinhlan chu inhlan hrangin an hrila; an hor hlanin chu mipuihaiin
Khataka om murdihaiin Pathian chubai an mûka, hla an saka, an thilinhlan a kâng zoi mân chu mirimhoi an hâl zui pata.
Reng Hezekia le mipuihai chu an khûksadela Pathian chubai an mûka.
Reng le hruaituhaiin Davida le deipu Asafa hla phua,
Hezekia’n mipuihai kuang, “

A’rbukkhômhai khan thilinhlanhai, lômthu hrilnahai an hong inhlana, a nuam murdihaiin hâlirvôm thilinhlanhai an inhlana. A’rbukkhômhaiin hâlirvôm thilinhlan hrang an hong ichôihai chu sehrâtchal sômsari le belrate irzahni le belra irzakhat a ni.
Sehrâtchal irzaruk le belra sângthum khom thilinhlan chi danga an inhlana.

A that hrang ochai an ruk no sikin an that zoi mân chu Levi irchihaiin an sanhaia. A hnungkhôn tiang chu ochai tam ual khom an thâr irthianghai tâka. Levi irchihai hi ochaihai nêkin an lei irvong irthiang thei ual a ni.

Mipuihai thilinhlan hâlhai hi ochaihai tho hrang a nia, an sa that mipuihai fâk hranghai khom hi an ihâl hrang a ni; hâlirvôm thilinhlan leh irrualin uain an hong inhlanhai khom hi ochaihaiin an ibun bak hrang a ni. Khanchu tempil sin thôna chu an phut nôk tâka.
Reng Hezekia le mipuihai chu an râiinfân oka, Pathianin hianga tho thei nôk hranga a tempila hmang thei hrang le hruai theia an om sika hin.
Mipuihaiin a zoro taka Ferkân kût hmang thei mahaia, ochai tamtak irthâr irthiang zoi irman mahaia, mipui khom Jerusalema irbuk an la tôma.
Reng Hezekia le a rualhai le Jerusalema mihai an irhrila, a tha khatna ni loiin, tha hninaa Ferkân Kût hmang an inchuka, rêngin Israel ram le Judai rama thu a thonhaia.
Efraimahai le Manasea-hai len vâng chu Jerusalem tempila honga
Reng le mipuihaiin an thil tho chu a sa an tia.
Hmâr tianga, Dan rengata sim tiang Beerseba kâra Israel mi murdi chu Jerusalema a tam thei dôr honga, ferkân kût hmang hrangin an koihaia.
Reng le a rualhaiin palaihai chu Judai ram le Israel rama mihai va fialhai hrangin an tîrhaia, ngênna lekha hiang hin an thonhaia, “Israel mihaio, Abrahama hai, Isaka hai, Jakoba hai Pathian
Nin pahai le nin uhai nin irchibulhai Pathian
Anni angin nin tukulinlian ta no roi,
tiang nin hor hei photin chu nin râlhaiin sala an ichel nin rual lungthunghai kha, len renhai an ta, hong hruaihai an ti.
An mi tîrhai chu Efraima le Manasea irchihai omna ram kho tina an fea, Zebulun ram khom an tunga; khannisian mihaiin an nuisohaia.
Khaang pum khom khan Asera hai, Manasea hai, Zebulun hai, Jerusalema hong nuam an oma.
Judai rama khom Pathianin sin a thoa, rêng le a rualhai thu anga lungrual taka Pathian nuamlam tho an irzuk ok tâka.
Tha hni zoia chu bai chol pol loi kût hmang hrangin Jerusalema mi tamtak an irbuka.
Jerusalema pathian dang, biakna maichâm om murdi chu, mirimhoi hâlna maichâmhai leh an lâka, Kidron tuia an paia.
Sûn sômhlei minli ni chu ferkân kûta thilinhlan kêlbelrate chu an thata. Ochai le Levi irchi, porinchehai kha an inzâhai hrai sikin
Pathian mi Mosia dân bua hril angin an omna hrang hmun indanghaia an om vinga. Levi irchihaiin thilinhlan thisen chu ochaihai an pêka, anni’n maichâma an intheka.
Mi tamtak chu an porche sikin ferkân kûta kêlbelrate that irthiang maka, Levi irchihai khan an that pehaia,
Efraima hai, Manasea hai, Isakara hai, Zebulun hai laia mi tamtakhai chu an irthâr irthiang no sikin dân loi angin ferkân kût an ihmang a ni.
Reng Hezekia chu khahai ta hrangin a chongchaia, “O
Râifân takin sûn sari sûng chu Jerusalema honghaiin bai chol pol loi kût chu an hmanga, a sûn tin Levi irchihai le ochaihaiin hnuk inring takin
biakna hranga an thil neihai leh inkhôm kaihruai an thei sikin, Levi irchihai chu rêng Hezekia’n an pâkhaia.
An irchibulhai Pathian
sûn sari dang kût hmang nôk an nuama, raifân takin an hmang nôka.
Reng Hezekia chu sehrât sângkhat le kêlbelra sângsari, mipui thilinhlana hruai an inthea, an hruaituhaiin sehrâtchal sângkhat le kêlbelra sîngkhat an tho saa. Ochai tamtak an irthâr irthiang tâka.
Mi tukhom Judai rama mi honghai le Levi irchihai, ochaihai, Israel ram ata honghai, Judai ram le Israel rama nam dang oma honghai khom an raiinfân tak taka.
Jerusalem khuaa khan tukhomin an lôma, Davida nâipa Solomona thi hnunga khaang dôra raifânna la om ngai ma.
Levi irchihai le ochaihaiin mipui ta hranga satvurna an hrila,

Kût an chînin chu Israel mihai chu Judai ram kho tina an fe irtheka, an lungphunhai, an pathiannu Aseri irlim an iphunhai an naminrîla, maichâmhai le hmun irsâng, nam dang pathian an biakna hmunhai an insiata, Judai ram khêla Benjamina hai, Efraima hai le Manasea biala mihai khom an insiata, mâni in tiang an kîr nôk tâka.

Reng Hezekia chu ochaihai le Levi irchihai chu sin an irsem ngai ang khan an tho hrang dân an fel pehaia. An sin hrang chu hâlirvôm thilinhlanhai, irngeina thilhai le tempila Pathian biakna bukhalâi hai, tempil mikot kôla
Hezekia chu ama sehrât le kêlbelra rual rengata a sûn tin le a zân tin hâlirvôm thilinhlan hranghai le, sabat nihai, tha thar nihai le kût zoroa hâlirvôm thilinhlan
Khaanga thu a pêkin chu Israel mihaiin an thilpêk bai indi a sa zâthai, uainhai, oliv hriakhai, khuaihlutui hai le an thil tharhai le an inei murdi an sôma inkhat leh an hong pêk tâka.
Judai ram khopuia om murdihaiin an sâ sôma inkhathai, an Pathian
A tha thumna ata chu an hong pêk phut tâka, tha sari tena an hong ipêkhai chu a irbuk hluk tâk a ni.
Reng Hezekia le hruaituhaiin thilpêk tam lam kha an hmu’n chu
Rengin ochaihai le Levi irchihai kuanga thilpêk lam chu an ikhop le khop loi ar donhaia.
Zadoka irchia ochai inlaltak Azaria’n, “Mihaiin thilpêk tempila an hong chôia ta hi chu fâk hrang kin nei tâka, fâk sêng loi tamtak a izôk a ni,
Reng thupêk angin tempil ram sûnga hin neinun siakhômna an sina.
An thilpêk le sôma inkhat chu a porinche loina hrangin an siaa. A enkol hrangin Levi irchia mi Konania an inkunga, a sangpa Simeia’n a changpuia.

Anni hnuaia sin hrangin Levi irchi Jehiela hai, Azazia hai, Nahata hai, Asahela hai, Jerimota hai, Jazabada hai, Eliela hai, Ismakia hai, Mahata hai, Benaia haiin chu rêng Hezekia le ochai inlaltak Azaria kha an inkunga.
Imna nâipa Korea, tempil nisua tianga mikot hrungtu hruaitutak chu

Kho dang, ochaihai omna khan hi Levi irchi Edena hai, Miniamina hai, Jesua hai, Semaia hai, Amaria hai, Sekania hai chu fâk hrang kha satakin an sempuia, an Levi irchi chanpuihai khom; a poimo le poimo loihai khom ti loiin an isem sîp sîp ngai a ni.
Pasal kum sômthum chung tiang, tempila sintho theihaiin chu an dinghmun enin an donga.
Ochaihai chu an irchi anga irsan thei hrangin sin an irsema; Levi irchi kum sômhni chung tianga mihai chu a pa pâla sintho hrangin an semhai a ni.
An irhming chu an dôngmahai, an nâihai le an iompui indethai leh an irziak vinga, itiklai khoma sintho hranga koihai thei an ni.
Arona irchihai omna hrang thingtâng khua le a kôlvêla sâ vâina ram inkunga om, ochaihai kuanga fâk le nêk hrang sem hrang an inkunghaia, Levi irchihai irhming chuanghai khom an pêkhai ngai.
Judai ram pumpuia rêng Hezekia chu a Pathian
A diktakin a Pathian sin a thoa, tempil a’rngaiirsânga, a dânhai a zôm hrai sikin, lam tinrênga a irhniangtir a ni.
Hezekia’n
Hezekia’n Jerusalem khom doi a tum ti an hriatin chu
a rualhai leh an irhlet irhlôma, Assuria-haiin Jerusalem an hong nâi tena tui in hrang an nei loina hrangin kho kôla tuikuanghai chu nelinbitpai zit hrangin roi an rêla.
Hruaituhai khan mi tamtak an hruaihaia, tuikuang om murdi chu tui irhmu loiin an nelinbit zita.
Rengin kho kul bang indernahai kha a phoa, in irsânghai a sina, Jerusalem kho milui Milo an iti irnêng an inelinbitna kul banghai a sin insatira, ufei le phô tamtak an sintirhaia.
A kho mihai chu sipai hruaituhaiin an hruaihaia, khopui lûtna mikot tualzôl lian taka khan mihai an bukkhômhaia, ar chuhaia.
An kuang khan, “Huaisen takin om unglân, irnak song roi. Assuria le a sipai tamhai hi chihai no roi, nin ichi viat hrang ni ma, anni nêka roiinpui ei kôla hin a iom a ni.
Ama chu mihriam hrâtnain a’rnghata, eini chu
Senakeriba sipaihai chu Lakis khuaa an om zoiin Hezekia le Judai rama mi a hruaia, Jerusalema omhai kuang palai a tîra.
Assuria rêng Senakeriba’n hiang hin a tia, “Jerusalem lâka om hranga khan imo nin la iam sika nin la iom mai?
Hezekia khan,
Nin Pathian biakna hmun irsâng le maichâmhai setin Jerusalem le Judai rama mihai chu maichâm inkhata Pathian chu chubai mûk nin ta, khatak khan thil inhlan nin ti, titu kha hi Hezekia hi mo ni ma?
Keima le ka pahaiin ram tina nam danghai kin isoisak dânhai kha nin lan hriat mo? Anni pathianhaiin an mihai kha ki kut ata an ni sut thei ngai mo?
Ka pa khan an pathianhai kha an doktirhai vinga, nin Pathian hin a kut ata nangni san le mo nin iam?
Khasikin, Hezekia hin nangni huang no ri se, a he la no unglân, Assuria rengata a biaktuhai khan a san thei tûte nam pathian om mahai. Nin Pathian khomin nangni sansuak zoi ni mo,” a tia.
Assuria sipai hruaitu khan
Assuria rêngin lekha leh Israelhai Pathian
Khua inhnê olsam ual sabeiin Jerusalem kul kôla omhai insî a tuma, Hebrai chongin thu a hrila.
Jerusalem Pathian chu nam dang pathian, mihriam isiamhai angin a soisak a ni.
Reng Hezekia le Amosa nâipa deipu Isaia chu an chongchaia, Pathian an koia.

vântîrtôn a zuang tîra, Assuria sipaihai le an hruaituhai a zuang thata. Assuria rêng chu mualphoi takin an khua tiang a kîr tâka. Sûn khat chu an pathian biak ina a om laiin a nâi senkhathaiin khandai leh an tuk thata.
Reng Hezekia le Jerusalema mihai chu khaangin Assuria rêng Senakeriba le an râlhai kut rengata
Jerusalema
Kha zoro laia khan Hezekia chu thi vângin a naa, a chongchaia, a dam nôk hrang thu irsinsiana
Khannisian, Hezekia chu
Inhnung tiang chu Hezekia le Jerusalema mihai an irsîra, an irngaiintôma, Hezekia dam sûng chu
Reng Hezekia chu a’rchong ok tâka, tukhomin an irngaiirsânga, a rângachak hai, tangkarua hai, lungmantam hai, thil mirimhoi hai, phô le thil dang hlutak tak hrêna hrangin in a sina.
A buhai, uainhai, oliv hriakhai siana hrang siakhômna in a sina; sehrât inhai, kêlbelra irkul a sina.
Hihai khêla hin Pathianin kêlbelra hai, sum le pâi chi tinrêng a pêk saa, khuahai a sinsiama.
Hezekia hin Gibon tui a tiala, tui lam a sina, Jerusalem kho sûnga khur inkhata an luang irchuntirhai a ni. Hezekia chu a sintho hmun tina manchang a suaa.
A chunga sinirkhêl irsinsia hrangin Babulon rêngin palai a hong tîrin chu mi i ang mo a ini iti, Pathianin eninfel hrangin a bingin a isia a ni.
Reng Hezekia sintho danghai, a sintho sahai chu, Amoza nâipa deipu Isaia lekhabu le Israel le Judai rênghai thurchi irziakna bua a chuang.
Hezekia chu a thia, rêng thânmual chuanchunga an phûma, Judai ram le Jerusalemin a thi kha an chôiindôm oka. A nâipa Manasea chu ama irthûlin an lal tâka.
Kum sômhleihni a niin Manasea chu Judai rama an lal irphuta, Jerusalema kum sômringa le ringa an lala.
Khan,

A pa Hezekia’n a lei insiatpai tâk, nam dang pathianhai biakna hmun irsânghai kha a sin insatira, Baal makunga irbôlna inhlanna hranga maichâm an sintira, pathiannu Aseri irlimhai an sintira, ârsihai chubai a mûka.
Kumtuanga
Tempil tentan inhnia khan ârsi biakna hrang maichâm a sina.
Hinom irhôra hâlirvôm thilinhlanna’n a nâipahai an hlana;
tasânhai le kutzia en theihai, ârsi en theihai a hmanga, mithi châ theihai, tasân theihai a hmanghaia.

A millim siam chu tempila a siaa, Pathianin Davida le Solomona kuanga, “Israel nam murdihai laia Jerusalem le hi in hi ki’rhming lamna hranga inthang a ni. Kumtuanga ki thupêk murdi an zôma, ki thu’nkunghai le ki dânhai, ki siahlo Mosia ihrilhai kha an zômin chu Israelhai hi itiklai khoma an pahai kuanga ki ipêk hrang ram ata hi inhnotsuakhai no ning,” a tih tâka.
Manasea’n Judai ram le Jerusalem mihai chu thil dik loi an thotirhaia, Israelhai makunga a inhnotsuak namhai ti nêka sual lian ual an tho tâk a ni.
Manasea chu an chela, zîngziri hrui leh an vîka, Babulon-a thîrhrui leh an kaia.
A chardong hrai sikin Pathian
Manasea chongchaina chu a le’rngaitua pea, a izonghai chu sâmin Jerusalema an fetir nôk tâka. Manasea’n chu

Kha zoiin chu Davida khopui nisua tianga kul bang pên tiang khan Manasea’n in a zom irsânga, Gihon tui omna irhôr hmâr tianga Nga mikot kôla ‘Ofel’ an itihna dênin a sina. Judai rama kul nei khua tina sipai pâl khat, hruaitu inkhatin a siahaia.
Tempil ata nam dang pathian irlim le millim inluan, ama isiahai chu a thonpaia. Tempil mual le Jerusalem khua nam dang pathian biakna maichâm om khom kha a lâka, a paia.
biakna maichâm balhai kha a sina, irngeina thilinhlanhai; lômthu hrilna thilinhlanhai an hlana, Judai rama mi murdi chu Israelhai Pathian
Mipuihai kha irbôlna hmun pângaia la irbôl maihai khomsian,
Manasea thil tho dang murdi, Pathian kuanga chongchaina hai, Israelhai Pathian

Reng Manasea chongchaina le Pathian isâmna hai, a irlet zoia thilsual a ithohai thurchi, nam dang pathian biakna hmun irsânghai, Aseri irlim sina, a millim inluan a ibiakna thu hai, deipuhai thurchi irziakna bua a chuang sa ving a ni.
Manasea chu a thia, rêng ina an phûma, a nâipa Amona chu ama irthûlin an lal tâka.
Amona chu kum sômhni inhni a niin Judai rama an lal irphuta, Jerusalema kum hni an lala.
A pa Manasea angin
Khan, a pa angin irngaiintômna nei maka,
A rualhaiin an khita, a ina an thata,
Judai rama mihaiin Amona thattuhai kha an thathaia, a nâipa Josia chu rêngin an siama.
Josia chu kum riat mi a niin Judai rama rêng a chang irphuta, kum sômthum inkhat Jerusalema an lala.
nuamlam a thoa, ar chibul Davida omdân angin a oma. Pathian dân chu kuluk takin a zôma.

Josia kha kum riat an lal zoiin chu, la nâiinpangte khomsian, a’rchibul Davida Pathian chu a biak zôi tâka; kum minli zoia len vâng chu nam dang pathian biakna hmun irsânghai, Aseri irlimhai le a millim danghai chu an siat vinga.
Ama thuin a rualhaiin Baal biakna maichâmhai chu an insiata, a kôla mirimhoi hâlna maichâmhai khom an insiata; Aseri irlimhai le a millim danghai chu an insiata, ama biaktuhai thâna an phûma.
Nam dang ochaihai ruhai chu an pathian biakna maichâma khan an hâla. Khanchu Judai ram le Jerusalem khua chu an thâr irthiang tâka.
Khaangin Manasea hai, Efraima hai le Simeona ram, hmâr tiang Naftalia ram dênin an khopui mi le an rama mihai chu a thâr irthianga.
Israel hmâr tiang bial sûnga maichâmhai le Aseri irlim an siata, millimhai chu a sunkhoia, mirimhoi hâlna maichâmhai khom an siat vinga, Jerusalema a kîr nôk tâka.

Nam dang pathian biakna an hektira, ram le tempil a’rthiangtir zoi kum sômhleiriat an lal kumin Josia’n tempil sûng sin insa hrangin mi inthum, Azalia nâipa Safana hai, Jerusalem khua optu Maaseia hai, Joahaza nâipa hruaitu inlaltak Joa hai a tîra.

Levi irchi, lampui hrungtuhaiin tempila sum hmang hrang an irfuang kha, ochai inlaltak Hilkia kuang an irhlana. (Efraima mihai, Manasea mihai le Israel hmâr ram tianga mihai kôl ata le Judai ram mihai, Benjamina ramhai le Jerusalema mihai kuang an irfuang ngai a ni.)
Hi tangka hi, hi mi inthumhai kuta hin an pêka, anni’n chu
mistirihai le in sintuhai kuang lung le thing irchôkna thil lei siat tâkhai, Juda rênghai lei ingaisak loi, bangrua hai, tângkhang hai siam insatna hrangin an pêka.
Sinthotuhaiin kuluk takin sin an thoa, Levi irchia mi minli, Meraria irchia Jehata le Obadia hai, Kohata irchia Zekaria le Mesulama haiin an hruaia. Hi Levi irchihai hi thil tum thei mi inzen an ni.
Khan, puakrik pêltuhai enkoltuhai khom an ni saa, sinthôna sin chu lam i anga khom an enkol maia; khan, Levi mihai chu ziaktuhai, hruai tuhai le mikot vêngtuhai an oma.
Sum sia khômna ata tangka an lâkin chu
Safana kuang, “Hi tempil sûnga hin dân bu ki mana,” a tia, a pêka.
Safana khan rêng kuang a fepuia, “Ni ihrilhai chu kin tho zoi ta.
Tempila hrê insa tangka chu kin lâka sinthotuhai le a enkoltuhai hlo hrangin kin pêka.
Hi, Hilkia ni ipêk, lekhabu ki hong chôi,” a tia. Reng inhriat hrangin a tep tâka.
Dân bu an itep kha rêngin a hor ngaiin chu a puan an pot thêra,
Hilkia hai, Safana nâipa Ahikama hai, Mika nâipa Abdona hai, lekha irziaktu Safana hai, rêng enkoltu Asaia hai chu a koihaia.
Hi dân bu chungchâng thua ki isanhai, Israel le Judai rama la dam sunhai hrangin,

Hilkia le rêngin mi a itîr danghai chu Tokhata nâipa Saluma dôngma deipu Huldaii kuang an fea, Tokhata hi Hasra nâipa a ni, Saluma hi tempila ochai tukfam enkoltu Jerusalem kho thara om a ni. Thil omdân a hrila.
Reng kuang a tîr nôka,
thu chu hiang hin an hriattira: “Reng inhriatin an tepsuaka, lekhabu irzuata khosâlnahai kha Jerusalem le a sûnga omhai chunga intungtir ki ti.
Anni hnôla, pathian dang kuang thilinhlanhai an inhlana, an sintho’n ki ning an inmurtir a ni. Jerusalem chunga ki ning an mur tak taka, dâi thei lik no ni.
Reng chungchâng rêk kha chu, keima
ni’rleta, ni’rhnuai tâka. Jerusalem le a sûnga mi hrem ki ti, ki ti lai khan poi ti takin ni puan ni ir-ekthêra, ni chapa.
Jerusalem chu ni thi zoi le vai hrem ta ki ti, irtharngam takin nan thitir ki ti,” tiin. Kha thu chôiin mihai chu rêng kuang an hong kîr nôka.
Reng Josia chu Judai ram le Jerusalema ulianhai chu a koibukhaia.
Ochaihai le Levi irchihai chu tempila an fea, mi irchong le inrianghaiin an zuihaia. Rengin tempil sûnga thuthung bu an ihrût kha mipuihai makunga an tepa.
Reng ngîrna hranga inkung chopui kôla khan a ngîra,
Benjamina-hai le Jerusalema om murdi chu thuthung vong hrangin chong an kungtirhaia. An puhai Pathian le thuthung lei sin sai tho hrang omhai chu Jerusalema mihaiin an thoa.
Reng Josia chu Israel mihai ram sûnga millim intirom tak tak chu an siat vinga, a dam sûng chu kha mihai kha an irchibulhai Pathian
Reng Josia’n
Ochaihai chu tempila an sin hrang a sem pehaia, sataka sin hrangin an thorhaia,
ta hranga ser bîka, dân irziaktu Levi irchihai khom hiang hin a hrilhai. “Davida nâipa Solomona in sin sûnga khan Thuthung Bôm hi chu se roi, nangni irzôn kochok nang ta no ni. Nin Pathian
A chi chiin tempila nin omna hranga om unglân, nin itho hrang rêng Davida le a nâipa Solomona inkung ang khan tho roi.
Sin nin irsem tena Israel in sûng mihai changpuitu hrang mi senkhat nangni bê ki ta,
ferkân kûta sa hrang kêlbelra le kêl nin ithat hrang a ni. Atûn irthâr irthiang roi, an thilin hlan hranghai inhlanpuihai unglân, Mosia kuang
Mipuihai hmang hrangin Josia’n ama sâhai laia mi kêlbelra hai, kêlbelrate hai le kêltak sîngthum le sehrâtchal sângthum a thata.

A ihruai mi lianhai khomin mipuihai, ochaihai le Levi irchihai fâk hrang an tho saa. Tempil hruaitu ochai inlaltak Hilkia hai, Zekaria hai le Jehiela haiin belrate le kêltak sînghni sângruk le sehrâtchal irzathum, kût sûnga thilinhlana inhlan hrangin ochaihai chu an pêka.

Levi irchihai hruaitu Konania hai, Semaia hai le a sangpa Nethanela hai, Hasabia hai, Jeiela hai, Jozabada haiin kêlbelrate le kêltak sângringa le sehrâtchal irzaringa, Levi irchihai thilinhlana hmang hrang an tho saa.
Ferkân kût hmangna hrangin itinrêng an infel zoiin chu, an omna hmun inkunga an oma.
Kêl le belra an that zoiin chu Levi irchihaiin a vun an hlâia, ochaihaiin a thisen kha maichâma an intheka.
Hâlirvôm thilinhlana hmang hrang chu Mosia dân bua a irziak anga inhlan hrangin an sema.
Levi irchihai chu dân angin ferkân kût hme chu an hâl inhmina, hme irthiang senkhat chu bêla hai, thîr bêla hai, bêl lianhaia an suanga, a hme chu mipui an semhaia.
Kha zoiin chu anni fâk hrang le Arona irchi ochaihai hrang an suang nôka, ochaihai khan hâlirvôm thilinhlan le an thilinhlana a thâi hâlna mei chu zânkhuain an buaipuia.

thil tum thei mi, Asafa irchi, Levi irchi, hihai hi rêng Davida tho dân angin an omna hrang hmuna, Asafa hai, Hemana hai, Jeduthuna hai, rêng deipuhai hin sin an thoa. Tempil hrungtuhai hrang khom irthon nang maka, an rual Levi irchi, mi danghai khan ferkân kût hme chu an lei sinsiam pehaia.
Reng Josia thu angin
Sûn ruk sûng chu ferkân kût le bai chol pol loi kût chu Israel mihaiin an hmanga.

Deipu Samuela thi zoiin hianga roiinpui hin ferkân kût la hmang ngai mahaia. Reng Josia hai, ochai hai, Levi irchihai, Juda le Israel rama omhai le Jerusalema omhaiin ferkân kût an ihmang ang hi la hmang ngai mahai.
Reng Josia kum sômhleiriat an lal kumin an ihmang a ni.
Reng Josia’n hiang dôra tempil a’rvôtir zoi hin Aigupta rêng Nekoa chu Eufrates tui kôla, Kharkemisa, irdoi hrangin a sipaihai a hruaia. Josia’n lei danh a tuma.

Nekoa khan, “Nang Juda rêng, hi thila hin ite ni kopna hrang om ma. Nang doi hrangin zuang ma ung, ki râlhai doi hranga zuang kêng ki ni. Pathianin irhnot hrangin a ni tia, keima tianga kop a nia, khasikin ni lei khâl tum no ro, nan siatna a ti,” tiin palai a tîra.
Josia’n lei doi a tum maia, Nekoa hmanga Pathian thu hril chu nuam maka, a irvo danglamin, Megido phâia an irdoina khan a fea.
An irdoi lai khan Aigupta sipaihai thalin Josia kha a tok tâka. A tâli chalaitu kuang, “An nin phop innatir hraia, irdoina hmun ata hi ni suakpui ro,” a tia.
Ama tâli ata an irzôn suaka, tâli dang chunga an siaa; Jerusalema an tuanga. A thia, rênghai thâna an phûma, Judai ram le Jerusalem mihaiin an inhroia, an sûnpuia.
Deipu Jeremia chu Josia sûnna hla a phuaa, Israelhai laia hla sak mi, nupang le pasal rêng sûnna hla an saka. Sûnna hla irziak khômna bua, kha hla kha a chuanga.
Josia thil tho murdi le
a phut ata a mong dênin a thurchi chu Israel le Juda rênghai thurchi irziakna khan a ichuang ving a ni.
Judai rama mihaiin Josia nâipa Joahaza chu rêngin an inthanga, Jerusalema sahriak an pola.
Joahaza chu kum sômhni inthum a niin Judai rama rêng a changa, tha thum an lal irmana.
Aigupta rêng Nekoa’n sala a chela, Judai ram chu, khâzana tangkarua her sângthum irzaminli le rângachak her sômthum minli an chôitira.
Khan, Nekoa’n Joahaza upa Eliakima chu Judai rama rêngin a siama, a’rhming khom Jehoiakima tiin a phua nôka, Joahaza chu Aigupta rama a hruaia.
Jehoiakima chu kum sômhni ringa a niin Judai rama rêng a changa. Jerusalema kum sômhleikhat an lala.
Babulon rêng Nebukadnezara chu Judai ram a doia, Jehoiakima chu a chela, thîrhrui leh khitpumin Babulon-a a hruaia.
Nebukadnezara’n tempila thil hlu senkhat chu a chôi pea, Babulon khua, a ina a siaa.
Jehoiakima sintho murdi chu, thil intirom tak tak a ithohai le thil sual a ithohai chu Israel le Juda rênghai thurchi irziakna bua a chuang ving a ni; ama irthûlin a nâipa Jehoiakina chu an lal tâka.
Jehoiakina chu kum sômhleiriat mi a niin Judai rama rêng a changa, Jerusalema tha thum le sûn sôm an lal irmana. Ama khom

Kholum a hor phut tiang chu rêng Nebukadnezara a honga, Babulon sala a hruaia; tempila thil hlu murdi a chôipai vinga. Nebukadnezara’n Jehoiakina sangpa Zedekia chu Judai ram le Jerusalema rêngin a sia tâka.
Zedekia chu kum sômhni inkhat mi a niin Judai rama an lala. Jerusalama kum sômhleikhat sûng an lala.
mithmua thil sual a thoa;
Zedekia chu Nebukadnezara ata tehel a zonga, Pathian irhmingin iam omna thu an kungpuia, rêngin a siam tâka. Tukullian a songa, irlet nuam maka, Israelhai Pathian
Juda ulianhai, ochaihai le mipuihai lakin an kôlvêla nam sualhai omdân lâkin,
Tempil le a mihai chu a san nuamhai sikin, mipuihai irchutir hrangin an irchihai Pathian khan deipuhai a tîrhai maia.
Khannisian Pathian mi tîrhai chu an lei manêphaia, an thu lak ite la pehai mahaia. Deipuhai chu innuisanhaiin, inhnung tiang chu
Babulon rêngin tempil kha an moka, thilhlu an ihrêhai a lâka, rêng in le mi lianhai ina thil omhai khom Babulon-a a chôi vinga.
Tempil le kho sûnga inhai chu a hâla, khopui kul bang neihai a seta.
A thi zoi loihai chu Babulon-a a hruaihaia, ama le a rualhai chu suaka, Persia hai an hong tung dênin an oma.
Jeremia bâia
Persia rama rêng Kura an lal phut kumin,
“Hi hi Persia rêng Kura thupêk chu a ni.
Persia rêng Kura inlal kum khatna deipu Jeremia hmanga a lei ihril tâk kha
“Persia rêng Kura’n hiang hin a ti, ‘Rammuala ram murdi chu
Nin laia ama mihai murdi chunga Pathian chu om ri se; khanchu Judai ram Jerusalema fehai sian,
Mi tukhom, kho hmuna khom inhnotsuaka om khom ni sian, an omna hmuna Pathian in hrangin, an nuam thua tho hrang ni loiin, sumru, le rângachak, bungruahai le sahai khom lei changpui ri sehai,’ tiin.
Khasikin, Juda le Benjamina irchi, in sûnga a lu u ualhai, ochaihai, Levi hai, Jerusalema
Anni lungrîl nuamlam anga ni loiin, an kôla mi tamtak sumrua siam bungrua, rângachak, sahai, le thil hlu tamtak pêkin, an changpuihaia.
Reng Kura khomin, Nebukadnezara’n
a isiahai kha Persia rêng Kura’n a enkoltu Mithredata kha an kêlsuatira, a tepa, Judahai hruaitu Sesbazara kuang a pêka.
Khan hihai hi a om zât chu a ni: rângachaka siam tâbor sômthum, sumrua siam tâbor sângkhat chemte sômhni kuak;
rângachak khilât sômthum, sumrua khilât chi da dang irzaminli sômkhat, bungrua dang sângkhat le
Rângachak le sumrua bungrua murdi chu sângringa irzaminli a ni. Sal intânghai chu Babulon ata Jerusalema an hruaihai lai khan Sesbazara khan hihai murdi hi a hong ichôi a ni.
Judai rama mi sala hruai, Babulon rêng Nebukadnezara’n a ihruai, Jerusalem le Judai rama kîrhai, mi tin mâni khua tianga kîr nôkhai chu hihai hi an ni.
Hihai hi Zerubabela, Jesua, Nehemia, Seraia, Reelaia, Mordekaia, Bilsana, Mispara, Bigvaia, Rehuma, le Baasa hai an ni. Israel mi pasal sa tam lam chu:
Parosa irchihai chu 2,172,
Sefatia irchihai chu 372.
Ara irchihai chu 775.
Pahat-Moab irchi laia Jesua le Joaba irchihai chu 2,812.
Elama irchihai chu 1,254.
Zatua irchihai chu 945.
Zakai irchihai chu 760.
Bania irchihai chu 642.
Bebaia irchihai chu 623.
Azgad irchihai chu 1,222.
Adonikama irchihai chu 666.
Bigvaia irchihai chu 2,056
Adina irchihai chu 454.
Atera, Hezekia an iti irchihai chu 98.
Bezaia irchihai chu 323.
Jora irchihai chu 112.
Hasuma irchihai chu 223.
Gibara irchihai chu 95.
An irchihai ata hi khuaa omhai khom hiang hin an hong kîra: Bethlehem mihai chu 123.
Netofa mi chu 56.
Anathot mi chu 128.
Azmaveta mi chu 42.
Kiriath-Jarima, Kefira, Beerota mihai chu 743.
Rama le Geba mihai chu 621.
Mikmas mihai chu 122.
Bethel le Ai mihai chu 223.
Neboa mihai chu 52.
Magbis mihai chu 156.
Elam danga mihai chu 1,254.
Harima mihai chu 320.
Loda, Hadida le Ono kho mihai chu 725.
Jerikova mihai chu 345.
Sena mihai chu 3,630.
Ochaihai: Jesua in mihai laia Jedaia irchihai chu 973.
Imera irchihai chu, 1,052.
Pasura irchihai chu 1,247.
Harima irchihai chu 1,017 an ni.
Levi irchi: Hodavia irchi Jesua le Kadmiela irchihai chu 74 an ni.
Hla saktuhai: Asafa irchihai chu 128 an ni.
Mikot hrungtu irchihai: Saluma irchihai, Atera irchihai, Talmona irchihai, Akuba irchihai, Hatila irchihai, Sobaia irchihai chu an rênga irchunin 139 an ni.
Nethinim hai: Ziha irchihai, Hasufa irchihai, Tabaota irchi,
Kerosa irchihai, Siaha irchihai, Padona irchihai;
Lebana irchihai, Hogabaha irchihai, Akuba irchihai;
Hagaba irchihai, Samlaia irchihai, Hanana irchihai;
Gidela irchihai, Gahara irchihai, Reaia irchihai;
Rezina irchihai, Nekoda irchihai, Gazama irchihai;
Uza irchihai, Pasea irchihai, Besaia irchihai;
Asna irchihai, Meunima irchihai, Nefisima irchihai;
Bakbuka irchihai, Hakufa irchihai, Harhura irchihai;
Bazlutha irchihai, Mehida irchihai, Harsa irchihai;
Barkosa irchihai, Sisera irchihai, Tema irchihai;
Nezia irchihai, Hatifa irchihai.
Solomona siahlo irchihai: Sotaia irchihai, Hasofereta irchihai, Peruda irchihai;
Jaala irchihai, Darkona irchihai, Gidela irchihai;
Sefatia irchihai, Hatila irchihai, Pokeret-hazebaima irchihai, Amia irchihai:
Nitin mihai murdi le Solomona siahlo irchihai chu 392 an ni.
Khan mi 652 Delaia irchihai, Tobia irchihai, Nekoda irchihai, Telmela ata, Tel-harsa khuahai, Kerub khuahai, Adam khua le Imer khua ata hong suak an om sa,
khannisian Israel mi an ini le ni loi sui thei mahaia.
Khan ochai irchihai laia Habaia irchihai, Hakoza irchihai, Gilead mi Barzilaia nâinu mi dôngma neia an irhming irput Barzilaia irchihaiin,
irlo suina irhming irziak hmu zoi mahaia, khasikin ochaia pom ni thei mahai.
Ram optuin Urim le Thumim hmang hranga ochai a om mâka chu bu irthiang nêk an khapa.
Mipui irbuk murdi chu 42,360 an nia,
an siahlo nupang le pasal 7,337 tep loiin: khan hla saktu nupang le pasal 200 a neihai sa,
An sakor chu 736 a nia; an sakuartung chu 245 a nia;
an saringsei chu 435 a nia. an sakuartung a chîn zât chu 6,720 an ni.
Jerusalema
An inei ang ang kha an pêka, a rêngin rângachak her 500, tangkarua her 2,800 le ochai innghâk hrang puan 100 a ni.
Kha tena chu ochai irchihai, Levia irchihai, vântâng senkhathai le hla saktuhai, mikot hrungtu le Nethinimhai chu an khuaa an om ta, Israel mi murdihai chu an omna khua chita an pana.
Khan tha sarina a hong tung tena chu Israel mihai kho sûnga an om laiin, mihai kha irrualin Jerusalema an irbûma.

Khanchu Jozadaka nâipa Jesua le a sangpa ochai le Sealtiela nâipa Zerubabela le a urênghai an hong thoia, Pathian mi Mosia dâna chuang angin hâlirvôm thil irhlanna’n Israelhai Pathian maichâm an siama.
Khan maichâm chu a omna hmun pangaia khan an siaa; khataka omhai khan chi zaphai khomsian, maichâma khan
An irziak angin Kairêng kût an hmanga, a nitina tho hranga inkung angin a dôn te’n a nitin thil chu an irhlana.
Kha zoiin chu a nitin thil inhlanhai, tha thar thil inhlanhai,
Tha sarina, sûn khat nî ata hâlirvôm thil inhlanhai
Lung tukhai le kuttheithiamhai sum an pêka; Persia rêng Kura iphal dân angin, Sidar thing Lebanon ata tuipuia Jopa tena lei la hrangin Sidon le Tura mihai chu fâk nêk le sahriakhai an pêka.

Khan Jerusalema Pathian in an intung hnunga kum hni tha hnina nî chu Sealtiela nâipa Zerubabela hai, Jozadaka nâipa Jesua hai, an urêng ochai le Levia irchi danghai sala zôk murdi Jerusalema fehai an rêngin an pûta; Levi irchihai chu kum sômhni chung tianga mihai chu
Kha tena chu Jesua chu a nâihai leh a urênghai le Kadmiela nâihai le, Juda nâipa leh khan Pathian in sintuhai kha an ir-ôihaia: Henadada nâihai; an nâihai le an urêng Levia irchihai le,
Khan a sintuhaiin
“Ama chu a saa,
a lungkhamna khom Israel mihai chunga om kumkhua a ti,”
tiin
an inpâkna khan mipuihai chu an khêk sup supa.
Ochai le Levia irchi leh a ina a lu u ual tamtakin, a in milui hmutuhai putarhai chu an mithmua hi lungphûm hi an hmu nôkin chu an chapa; mi tamtak lôm sikin an khêka:
Khanchu mihai khan an lôm sik le an chap sika an ikhêk kha theitha loiin; mipuihai chu inring ualin an khêka, an irhâi chu hlatak ata inhriat thei a ni.
Juda mi le Benjamina mi râlhai khan, sala intâng zôkhaiin

Jerubabela le an in sûnga a lu u ualhai kuang an va fea, an kuang, “Nangni sinpui kin ti; keini khomin nin izong ang hin, nin Pathian zong kin ti; hitaka ni hong hruaitu Assuria rêng Esarhadona an lal lai ata a kuanga kin irbôl ngai kêng,” an tia.

Khannisianlân Zerubabela le Jesua le Israelhai in sûnga ulianhai leh a danghaiin an kuang, “Kin Pathian in sinna hin, nin kopna hrang ite lampui om mah; Persia rêng Kura’n thu a ni ipêk ang hin keinihai vaiin kêng
Khanchu kha rama mihai khan Judahai kut an irzaltir pehaia, an inbuaihai ta.
Persia rêng Kura inlal sûng chu, Persia rêng Daria inlal dênin an sintumhai sin thei loi hrangin a hrilpui hrang irbe’n an om ta.
Khanchu Ahasuera inlal a hor phut le khan Judai le Jerusalema omhai sêlna lekha an phuaa,
khan Artazerzia inlal laiin Bislama hai, Mithredata hai, Tabeela hai le an rual danghaiin Persia rêng Artazerzia kha lekha an thona; an lekha irziak chu Aramaik chong, Aramaik horopa irziak a ni.
Hruaitu Rehuma le lekha ziaktu Simsaia’n Jerusalema mihai sêlin Persia rêng Artazerzia chu hiang hin lekha an thona:
Lekhathontu chu: Hruaitu Rehuma le lekha irziaktu Simsaia le a rualhai roirêltu danghai, ram optu Persia mihai, Elam rama om ngai Erek mihai, Babulon mi le Susa mihai;
mi roiinpui Asurbanipala’n suaka hruai Samaria khuaa le Eufrates tui kôla tâng tea omhai kha an ni.
Reng Artazerzia chu hiang hin lekha an thona, “Inlaltak Artazerzia ni siahlo Eufrates tui kôla omhaiin chubai nang kin mûk.
Ni kôla Juda mi ki kuanga honghai kha Jerusalema an honga; khua mi he lâkloi ngai le sualnahai an inpunga, a kul khom an pai tâka, a lungphûm chu an siam insa nôk tah ti rêngin inhre ri se.

Hi khua hi an indinga a kulhai an siam zoiin chu, omna man chôina, thil man le irnêng manhai chôi nuam no nihaia, a hnungkhôn taka chu rênghai hrangin siatna vai kêng a ini hrang ti rêngin len hre ta ri se.
Reng michi inliak kin nia, khasikin rênghai satloina hmu hi keini hrangin fel loitak ni a ti;

Khasikin ni pi le puhai thil irsinsiana irziakna lekhabu chu zongin hong hmu ni ta, hi khuaa mihai hi mi irhel le tukullian song le an rênghai le an ram ta hranga ichiom tak an nia, kumtuangin an irhela. Khasikin hi khua hin siatna a itung a ni, ti lekha thonin rêng kin inhriattir a ni.
