Hi khua hi an indinga a kulhai a’rzoi vingin chu tui râl tianga ramhai chunga chu ite ircham nei thei ta no chi nih, ti rêng nang kin inhriattir,” an tia.
Khanchu inlaltak khomin hiang hin lekha a thonhaia, “Hruaitu Rehuma lekha irziaktu Simsaia le an rama rual dang Samari le Eufrates tui tâng rama omhai chubai nangni ki mûk.
Nin lekha hong thon kha, ki kôla fel takin an tepa.
Khanchu thu ki pêkhaia, hi khua hi tian ata rêng chunga hin an irhela, khasikin nuarna le buaina a om ti kin hmusuak a ni.
Jerusalema khan rêng sin tho theihai, varâl tianga roirêltuhai tenin an lei om tâka; khanchu omna manhai, thil manhai an le’rfuang ngai a ni.
Khaang mihai kha irngamtir unglân thu kin sua mâka chu khua kha inding no ri sehai.
Ir-ial ta no roi: Itho ual mo rênghai hrangin thil saloi a hong ipung hrang?” a tia.
Khanchu rêng Artazerzia lekha kha Rehuma le lekha irziaktu Simsaia le a rual danghai makunga an tep zoiin chu irhnot takin Jerusalema Juda omhai kuang an fea, thuneina insuain an inmâksantirhaia.
Kha tena chu Jerusalema Pathian in an isin chu an mâksana; Persia rêng Daria inlal kum hnina dênin an imâksan a ni ta.
Kha zoroa khan deipu inhni Hagaia le Idoa nâipa Zakaria haiin Judai ram le Jerusalema Juda omhai laia Israelhai Pathian irhmingin thu an hrila.
Khanchu Sealtiela nâipa Zerubabela le Jozadaka nâi Jesua’n Jerusalema Pathian in chu an hong sin phut nôk tâka; khan an kôla Pathian deipuhai chu anni changpuihai hrangin an oma.

Khaangin tui varâl tianga ram optu Tatenaia le Sethar-bozenaia le an rualhai an kuang an va fea, hiang hin an va ti pehaia, “Hi in sin nôk hrang le hi kul zoi hrangin tu’n mo thu nangni a ipêk?,” an tia.
Khanchu hiang hin an kuang, “Hi in sintuhai hi an irhming tuhai mo an ini?,” kin tia.
Khannisianlân an Pathian mit chu Juda ulianhai chunga a chuma, Daria kuang an thu kha a tunga, a sâmna an inhriat nôk mâka chu an ram optuhai khan inmatirhai ual mahai.
Tui varâl ram optu Tatenaia le Sethar-bozenaia le a rualhai, varâla om, Apharsak-haiin rêng Daria kuang lekha an thona, hiang hin an irziaka:
“Reng Daria kuang irngeina om ri se:
hi hi rêngin len hre ri se, Judai rama Pathian roiinpui takin, lung liantak taka sin le thing banga sung, takirtâina insua an lei idoina hmun kin fea.
Khanchu hi in sin hrang le kul zoi hrangin tu’n mo thu nangni a ipêk? tiin an ulianhai kin irdona.
An hruaituhai irhming kin irziaka, kin infelhai theina hranga an irhming nangni kin irdon a ni.
“Hiang hin an ni sâma, ‘Irnêng le irvân Pathian siahlohai kin ni, kha dôr kuma sin, Israel rêng roiinpui tak inkhat lei isin sai kin isinsiam nôk a ni.

Khannisianlân kin pi le puhaiin irvân Pathian kha a ning an inmurtir le a milung an inchuk no sikin Kaldai mi Babulon rêng Nebukadnezara kuta a pêka, hi in hi a insiat a nia, mihriamhai chu Babulon tiang a hruaia.
Khannisianlân Babulon rêng Kura inlal kumin, rêng Kura’n hi Pathian in sin insa nôk hrangin thu a pêka.

Khan Pathian ina rângachak le sumrua siam bungrua Jerusalem Pathian ina mi Nebukadnezara ilâksuak, Babulon biak ina a isiahai kha rêng Kura’n Babulon biak in ata a lâksuak nôka, mi inkhat ar hming Sesbazara, ram optu kuang a pêka;
A kuanga khan hi bungruahai hi lan la, fe ro, Jerusalem biak ina sian lân, khan biak in chu a hmun pangaia sin ni ri se, a tia.
Khanchu Sesbazara kha a fea, Jerusalem biak in lungphûm chu a phûma, khatak ata chu atûn ten hin sin a ni ta; khannisian la’rzoi loi a la ni maia.
“Khan rêngin sa a ti a ni’n chu, a iti lam a ni le ni loi, Babulon sum ina mi kha hong zong sianlân, rêngin hi thua hin a inuam lam ni hon hril nôk ri se,” tiin.
Khanchu rêng Daria’n thu a pêka, Babulon-a an irchon bukkhômna, lekhabu in chu an zonga.
Khanchu Media biala Ekbatan khuaa rêkin chu hi thu chuangna hi an hmu suaka:
“Jerusalem Pathian in chungchânga rêng Kura’n an lal irphut kumin hiang hin thu a pêka: an irbôlna ngai in chu siaminsat nôk ni sian; a lungphûm khom dettaka phûm ni sianlân.
A’rsânglam mûk sômruk, a’rza lam khom mûk sômruk, lung lianpahai zora thuma irchuan hnungin, thing phêk leh irmîltir hrang a nia, a sinna hi rêng sumpuan ata pe hrang a ni.

Khan Pathian ina rângachak le sumru bêl le bûr chu Nebukadnezara’n Jerusalem biak in ata a ilâksuak Babulon-a omhai khom pe kîr nôk ni sian, Jerusalema an omna hmun chita sia ni sianlân, Pathian ina hrê hrang a ni,” tiin.
Reng Daria khan hiang hin a sâma: “Eufrates nitâk tianga ram optu Tatenaia hai, Sethar-bozenaia hai le an isinpui Eufrates nitâk tianga omhaio: Tempil chu hong nâi no roi,
hi Pathian biak in an isin nôk hi ite tihai ta no roi; Judahai optu le Juda hruaituhaiin hi Pathian in hi a hmun pangaia sin ri sehai.
Kha in an isin nôkna hranga changpui hrangin thu nangni ki pêk. Sin a’rngam loina hrangin Eufrates tuidop tianga bialhaiin, rêng sum hranga an isia kha pe lat hrang a ni.
Irvân Pathian ta hrangin hâlirvôm thil inhlan hrang an innang murdi, sehrâtchaltuai, Belrachal le a tê, fachî, uain, sahriak hai, Jerusalema deipuhai thu ang takin a nitina pe ngêt hrang a ni.
Khan kêng irvân Pathian kha mirimhoi irbôlnahaiin an irhlan thei hrang, rêng le a nâihai an dam sôt theina hrangin an ichongchai thei pehai hrang.
Mi tukhom hi thu indanglamtirtu chu a ina pakhalâi kaidoka, ama chu khatak khan inkhâi ni ri se, hi sika hin a in chu êk painaa siam ni ri seh ti thu nangni ki pêk.

khan khataka ama irhming inomtirtu Pathian khan Jerusalema Pathian in insiat tuma kut thâkhai chu, an rênghai le nam om murdihai inboipai ving hrang a ni. Kei, Daria hin thu ki pêk a nia; a zôm khom an izôm zôi zêl hrang a ni.
Khanchu tui varâl tianga ram optu Tatenaia le Sethar-bozenaia le a rualhaiin rêng Daria lekhathon sikin, khaang tak khan an tho tâka.
Khan deipu Hagaia le Idoa nâipa Zakaria thuhril sikin Juda ulianhaiin an sin tâka; Israelhai Pathian thupêk ang le Persia rêng Kura le Daria le Artazerzia hai thupêk angin an sina, an zoi tâka.
Kha in kha rêng Daria inlal kum rukna Adar tha sûn thum niin chu zoi a ni tâka.
Khanchu, Israel irchihai, ochaihai, Levia irchihai le sala intâng hong zôkhaiin, kha Pathian kha lôm takin inhlanna an hmang tâka.
Khan, kha Pathian in inhlanna hrangin sehrâtchal irzakhat, kêlbelrachal irzahni, bêlrate irzaminli an irhlana; khan Israel mi om murdi’n an sual irbôlna hrangin kêlchal sômkhat inhni seng an pêka.
Mosia lekhabua chuang angin Jerusalema Pathian sintho hrangin ochaihai, Levi irchihai chu a pôlin an inomtirhaia.
Khan sala intâng zôkhai khan tha khatna, sûn sôm sûn minli nî chu Ferkân kût chu an hmang tâka.

Ochaihai le Levi irchihai chu an bingin an lei irthiang tâk sikin, an rêngin irthiang an ni tâka. Khanchu ferkân kûtna hrangin sala intâng zôkhai leh an urêng ochaihai le, anni ta hrangin an that tâka.
Israel irchi sala zôk nôkhai le
chol koploi bai kût chu lôm takin sûn sari an hmanga:
Khan kha irzoiin chu Persia rêng Artazerzia inlal laiin Ezra chu Babulon ata a honga; ama hi Seraia nâi a nia, ama hi Azaria nâi a nia, ama kha Hilkia nâi a ni,
ama hi Saluma nâi a nia, ama kha Zadoka nâi a nia, ama kha Ahituba nâi a ni,
Ama kha Amaria nâi a nia, ama kha Azaria nâi a ni, ama kha Meraiota nâi a ni,
ama kha Zerahia nâi a ni, ama chu Uzia nâi a ni, ama kha Bukia nâi a ni,
ama kha Abisua nâi a nia, ama kha Finehasa nâi a nia, ama kha Eleazara nâi a nia, ama kha chu ochai rêng Arona nâi a ni:
Ezra chu lekha irziaktu,

Reng Artazerzia an lal kum sarina khan Israel irchia mi senkhat, ochai senkhat, Levi irchi senkhathai, hla sak ngai mi senkhat hai, mikot hrungtu senkhathai le Nethinim mihai chu Jerusalema an hong fea.
Khan, rêng kha kum sari an lal kum, a tha ringa nî chu Jerusalema a hong fea.
Tha khatna sûn khat niin Babulon ata a suaka, Pathian hruaina zârin tha ringana a sûn khat nî chu Jerusalem a tung ta.
Ezra’n
Khan, ama hi rêng Artazerzia ochai, Ezra lekha irziaktu
“Renghai rêng Artazerzia’n, ochai Ezra, irvân Pathian dân irziaktu chubai ki mûk.
Ki ram sûnga Israel mi murdi le ochaihai le Levi irchi Jerusalema mâni irzuknaa fe nuamtuhai chu ni kuanga hong hrangin thu ki pêk.
Pathian dân ang taka Judai ram le Jerusalem thurchi inhriat infel hrangin.
Jerusalema om Israel Pathian, mâni nuam lam ang taka an ipêk sum tangka le rângachak chôi hranga rêng le roirêltu sarihaiin nang an itîr a ni,
Babulon ram tina ni ihmu dôr tangka le rângachak, mâni phal taka mipuihai le deipuhai ipêk, Jerusalema an Pathian in hranga lômtaka an ipêk leh;
khasikin hi tangka hin sehrâtchal, kêlbelrachal, kêlbelrate, fâk le nêk hrang thilinhlan hrang leh irchôkin lân, Jerusalema nin Pathian ina maichâma ni inhlan hrang a ni.
Khan tangka le rângachak hmang banhai chu nin Pathian nuamlam angin, nang le ni urênghaiin a sa nin tihna taka hmang roi.
Khan ni Pathian in sin thôna hranga bungrua nang an ipêkhai chu Jerusalema Pathian kuang inhlan roh.
Khan, ni Pathian in hranga hmang hrangin, a nangna a omin chu rêng sum ina kha hmang zel roh.
“Kei rêng Artazerzia ngêtin tui varâl tianga sum enkoltuhai chu, ‘Ochai Ezra irvân Pathian dân irziaktuin a izong murdi chu,
tangka talênt irzakhat, bu khom irzakhata varin, uain khom botol irzakhat, sahriak khom irzakhat, chîmu chu a zât ti ual loiin pehai zêl roi,’ tiin thu ki pêk.
Irvân Pathianin thu a ipêk murdi chu, khaang takin irvân Pathian in hrangin tho ri se; ningmurna chu rêng le a nâihai ram sûnga hin itho ual mo om a ta?
khan ochaihai, Levi irchihai, hla saktuhai, mikot hrungtuhai, Nethinim hai, ni Pathian ina sinthotuhai hi inhminhai ro, thil man omhai, irnêng manhai khom chôi ta loi hrangin nang kin hriattir.

“Khan nang Ezra, ni inei Pathian vârna nang pêk angin tui varâl tianga omhaiin roirêl theina hrangin an hruaituhai le roirêltuhai, mi Pathian dân inhriat mi inthanghaiin lân, an hriat loihai chu irchutirhai roi.

Khan mi tukhom ni Pathian dân le rêng dân zôm loihai chu thi thei rakin, ram ata inhnotsuakin mani; an bungrua lâkpai pehaiin mani, intângna ina omin mani, an chunga roirêlna om zôi hrang a ni,” a tia.
Jerusalema
Khan
Hihai hi rêng Artazerzia inlal laia Babulon ram ata ki kuanga honghai, in sûngkua le an irchihai irhming chu a ni.
Finehasa irchihai laia Gersoma; Ithamara irchihai laia Daniela; Davida irchihai laia Hatusa;
Sekania irchihai; Parosa irchihai laia Zakaria; pasal irzakhat sômringahai le.
Pahat-moaba irchihai laia Zerahia nâi, Eliehoenaia; pasal irzahni le.
Sekania irchihai laia Jahaziela a nâi, pasal irzathum le.
Adina irchihai laia Jonathana nâi Ebeda, pasal sômringahai le.
Elama irchihai laia Athalia nâi Jesaia, pasal sômsarihai le
Sefatia irchihai laia, Mikaela nâi Zebadia, pasal sômriathai le.
Joaba irchihai laia Jehiela nâi Obadia, pasal irzahni sômhleiriat hai leh.
Selomita irchihai laia Jasifia nâi pasal irzakhat sômrukhai le.
khan Bebaia irchihai laia Bebaia nâi Zekaria, pasal sômhni kiriathai leh.
Azgad irchihai laia Hakatana nâi Johanana, pasal irzakhat sômkhathai le.
Adonikama irchihai laia an irhming chu hihai hi an ni; Elifeleta, Jeuela, Semaia, pasal sômrukhai leh.
Bigvaia irchihai laia Uthaia le Zakura, pasal sômsarihai le
Ahava tuidunga ki buk khômhaia; kha khan sûn thum kin oma; mipuihai le ochaihai ki enhaiin chu, Levi irchihai zel hmuhai ta ma unga.
Khasikin a hruaitu u ualhai, Eliezera, Ariela, Semaia, Elnathana, Jariba, Elnathana, Nathana, Zekaria, Mesulama hai ki koihaia: mi irchutu Joiariba le Elnathana hai khom.
Khan Kasifia hmuna hruaitu Idoa kuanga ki tîra; kin Pathian ina sintho hrang hong hruai hranga Kasifia hmuna Idoa le a urênghai Nethinim hai kuanga an hong tîrhai hrang ki hrilhaia.
Khan Pathian inrenna sikin Issekela; Mahlia irchihai laia; Israel nâipa, ama nâipa Levia; Serebia, a nâihai le a urêng sômhleiriathai le:
Hasabia, Meraria irchihai laia Jesaia, le a urênghai le an nâihai sômhnihai le;
Nethinim hai, Davida le an milianhai le Levia irchi a sintho hranga irpêkhai laia mi Nethinim hai irzahni sômhnihai a ni hruai pea: an rênga irhming irziak an ni.
Khanchu kin Pathian makunga kin irhnuaia; a kuanga keini le kin nâihai leh kin bungrua murdihai kin chôi theina hrangin Ahava tuidunga khan bu nghei hrang thu kin inpuanga.

“Kin Pathian inditna chu ama zongtuhai murdi chunga an sana hrangin an langtir maia; a sinthotheina le a ningmurna chu ama mâksantuhai chunga an langa,” tia rêng kuanga kin hril tâk sikin, lampuia kin râlhai ata ni san hrangin ni sipai le sakor chung chuang mi rêng kuanga zong chu inzak ki tia.
Khanchu bu kin ngheia, kin Pathian kuanga zong tatakin; kin izongna chu hlo a nin chuktir pea.
Khanchu ochai bîk ualhai laia mi sômhleihni Serebia le Hasabia le an urênghai laia mi sômkhat kin danghaia,
rêng le a roirêltu, a milianhai, le khataka om Israelhaiin kin Pathian in hranga thilinhlan sumru, rângachak, bungruahai ki buka, kin hlana;
ki ibuk sûnga an kuta ki inhlan chu sumru, talênt irzaruk sômringa, bungrua talên irzakhat; rângachak talênt irzakhat;
rângachak berbu sômhni, sumthîr sângkhat chitin; dâr irtêk enhoi tak, rângachak anga hlu bungrua inhni a nia.
An kuang, “
Ochai hruaitu inchang ualhai le Levi irchi le Israel mi in sûngkua ar luahai laia Jerusalema,
Khanchu ochaihai le Levi irchihaiin Jerusalema kin Pathian ina chôi hrangin sumru le rângachak le bêlbûr bukhai chu an lâk tâka.
Khanchu Jerusalema kîr nôk hrangin tha khatna, sûn sômhleihni nia chu, Ahava tuidung ata kin suaka; kin Pathianin a nin rena, râlhai ata le lampuia ni len ruanghai ata a nin zôktira.
Jerusalem kin tung tâka, sûn thum sôl irngamin kin oma.

Khan sûn minli nî chu, sumruhai, rângachak hai, bungruahai chu kin Pathian inah bukin ochai Uria nâipa Meremota kuta kin irhlana; a makunga khan Finehasa nâipa Eleazara a oma; an kôla khan Levia irchi Jesua nâipa Jozabada le Binuia nâipa Noadia hai an oma:
Tep le varh ving a nia; an ivarh zât khom an irziak vinga.

Sal ata zôkhaiin Israelhai Pathian kuanga hâlirvôm thil an inhlana, Israel mi murdihai hrangin sehrâtchal sômhleihni, kêlbelrachal sômkuak kiruk, Belrate sômsari sari; sual irbôlna kêlchal sômhleihni: hihai murdi hi
Khan rêng thu’nkunghai chu rêng ulianhai le varâl tianga ram optuhai an hrilhaia; anni’n mipuihai changpuiin Pathian in sin chu an suiirzompuihai tâka.

Khahai kha a’rzoiin chu, mi lianhaiin, “Israel mihai le ochaihai, Levi irchihai chu hitaka mihai leh hin ite danglamna boiin, Kanaan hai, Hit hai, Periz hai, Jebus hai, Amon hai, Moab hai, Aigupta hai, Amor hai sintho intirom an itho angin an thoa.

An nâinuhai khom an nâipasalhai leh an irneipola; kha irchi irthianghai kha, hi rama mihai leh hin an irneipol tâka; an milianhai le roirêltuhai hi irneinahai hin a tu tak mo an inih ti an ni hong hrila.
Kha thil kha kin hriatin chu, ki songkol le ki diar ki’r-ekthêra, ki sam le ki hnermul ki phôia, chardongin ki toirak tâka.
Khanchu sal intâng zôkhai inchâina sika Israelhai Pathian thua irthiang murdihai chu ki kuang an honga; khohloi tianga irbôlna zoro phâk dênin a lô lam inhre loiin ki toi raka.
Khohloi tianga irbôl zoroa khan beidong pumin songkol le diar chet pumin ki thoia; ki khûksadela,
“O ki Pathian, nangma tianga hor hei hi kin zaka, ki hmâi a isen hlut hlut ngai a ni, ki Pathian, kin inchâinahai chu ni delpha thei rakin a punga, kin thei loinahai hin irvân a suna.

Kin pi le puhai ata atûn ten hin theiloi kin ichang zoi a ni; kin inchâinahai sikin kin rênghai le kin ochaihai le ram danga rêng an ichela, khandaia thathai, sala intânghai, inrûknahai kin tonga, a vuanhaia kin iom ang hin.
Atûn hin kin Pathianin kin mit an vârtira, kin sal omna a nin hriat suaktira, a hmun irthianga khan a nin om indet theina hrangin a la om sunhai a nin suaktira,

A’rhmang zoi hrang chu kin nia; khannisian kin Pathianin ar hmang zoi hranga kin om laiin, ni’rnghil maka, nin hartir le kin Pathian in indingtir nôk, a siat tâk irvo insatir nôk hranga Judai ram le Jerusalema Kul nei hranga Persia rêng mithmua kin chunga inrenna a zuang irzâmtira.
“O kin Pathian, atûn hin imo kin ihril ta hrang? Ni thupêkhai kin mâksan tâk sikin,
ni siahlo deipuhai hmanga, nin fena hrang, nin ram lua hrang rama mi omhai, porchena sikin a porche tâka, hmun tin kil tin intir a iom zoi a ni ta.

Khasikin nin nâinuhai khom an rêng nâipasalhai irneitirhai ta no roi, nin nâinuhai khom an nâipasalin nei ta nohai sian, an raifânna le a hoi an itihna ite bê’n bê ta no unglân, nin hrât sikin, kha rama thil kha nin fâka, kumtuanga nin nâihai leh nin irdîn suak theina hrangin.

Kin sintho insual sikin le inchâinahai sikin kin chunga hianga thil a hong itung a nia, nang kin Pathianin kin inchâinahai nêka irnêpin deng ni nin thei zoia khom a la omhai khom ni ni la hôi pe ti inhre maiin,
ni thupêk kin insiat zoi khom hin hianga thil intirom thotuhai leh hin kin la irnei mai hrang ma ni? A zôk le a khêl thei om loiin, irhmang ving hrang anga kin chunga hin ni ning mo inmur no ni?
O
Pathian in tianga irheiin khûksadela chapin Ezra’n a chongchaia, ngaidam ar zong lai takin a kôla khan Israel mi, mi tamtak, nupang pasal le nâipang pâl an hong irbuka; mipuihai kha a sân an chapa.

Elama irchi laia mi Jehiela nâipa Sekania khan Ezra kuang, “Kin Pathian chunga hin, thil kin tho’nsual tâka, hi rama nam dang nupang dôngma’n kin neia; khannisianlân Israel mihai hrangin hi thua hin sabeina a la iom a ni.
Khasikin tho, ka pu le kin Pathian thupêka inthing murdi’n, hi mipuihai anni lai ata suak murdi hi teipuihai hrangin ei Pathian kuanga thuthung ei ti; ama khom hi dân ang taka tho ni ri se.
Tho hi thu hi nangma chunga irnghat a nia, keini khom nangma tianga om kin nia, hâitakin omin lân tho roh,” a tipuia.
Khanchu Ezra kha a thoia, ochai irchi u ualhai le Levi irchi le Israel mi murdihai chu, khaanga tho hrangin khomâk a’rsâmtirhaia. Khomâk an irsâm tâka.

Khanchu Ezra Pathian in tianga irhei kha a hong thoia, Eliasiba nâipa Jehohanana tentan omna hmuna a lûta; kha khan zân khovârin sala hong zôkhai thilsual tho sikin irngaisiatin bu nêk loiin khua an vâra.
Khan Judai ram tin le Jerusalema sala zôk murdihai laia, Jerusalem-a inkhôm vinga;
mi tukhom an milianhai le upahai thupêk anga, sûn thum sûnga hong loihai chu a bungrua murdi khitpai pea, ama khom sal intâng zôkhai lai ata, inhnotpai ni a tih, ti thu an inpuanga.

Khanchu Juda mi le Benjamina mihai chu, kha sûn thum sûngin Jerusalema an irbuk vinga; kha kha a tha kuakna, sûn sômhni ni a nia; Pathian in mikot irzataka khan mipuihai kha an toia, kha thu le ropuivânsâng tho sikin an inthing sup supa.
Khan ochai Ezra chu a ngîra, an laia, “Thil nin lei tho inchâi tâk sikin, Israel mihai thei loina belsa’n nam dang nupanghai dôngma’n nin neia.
Khasikin
Khanchu mipui murdi’n an sâma, inringtaka khêkin, “Kin chungchâng thu chu ni iti ang takin kin itho ngêt hrang a ni.
Khannisian mi kin tam hraia, rotho lai tak a ni sikin, pên tiang hin om thei ta ma unga, khan sûn khat sûn hni sûnga tho zât lak a ni no sikin: hi sika hin a sân kin lei inchâi ok tâka.

Mipuihai irthûlin kin milianhai inkung ni sianlân, kin chunga Pathian ningmurnahai hi a heka, hi thu hi kin infel mâka chu, kin khuaa nam dang dôngma lâkhaiin khua tina an ulianhai le upahai an hong hrang zoro indanga hin hong ri se,” an tia.
Asahela nâipa Jonathana le Tikva nâipa Jahzeia hai vaiin hi thu hi an sêla: Levi irchi Mesulama le Sebethaia’n an changpuia.
Khan sala intâng zôkhaiin khaang tak khan an tho tâka. Ochai Ezra’n in sûngkuaa a luhai irhming hmor a’rziak indang vinga; tha sômna sûn khat nî tena chu kha thu kha ngaitua’n an irbukkhôma.
Khan tha khatna sûn khat ni chu nam dang nupang dôngma neihai chu an infel thei tâka.
Khan ochai nâihai laia nam dang nupang dôngma lâk an inhriathai chu: Jesua le a urênghai laia Jozadaka nâipa le a urêng Maaseia, Eliazara, Jariba, le Gedalia hai
Annihaiin an dôngmahai mâk hrangin thu an inkunga; khan an thei loina sikin, an thei loi changna chu belrahai pâla mi belrachal inkhat leh irbôlin.
Khan Imera irchihai laia Hanania le Zebadia.
Harima irchihai lai ata Maaseia, Elija, Semaia, Jehiela, Uzia hai.
Pasura irchihai lai ata Elioenai, Maaseia, Ismaela, Nethanela, Jozabada le Elasa an nia.
Khan Levi irchi laia Jozabada, Simeia, Kelaia, Pethahia, Juda le Eliazara hai an nia.
Hlasaktuhai laia Eliasiba a nia, mikot hrungtu laia Saluma, Telema le Uria hai an nia.
Israelhai laia Parosa irchia mi Ramia, Izia, Malkija, Mijamina, Eliazara, Malkija le Benaia hai an ni.
Elama irchia mi Matania, Zekaria, Jehiela, Abdia, Jeremota, Elija hai.
Zatua irchi laia mi Elioenai, Eliasiba, Matania, Jeremota, Zabada, Aziza hai,
Bebaia irchia Jehohanana, Hanania, Zabaia, Ahlaia hai
Bania irchi laia Mesulama, Maluka, Adaia, Jasuba, Seala, Jeremota hai.
Khan Pahat-Moab irchia mi Adna, Kelala Benaia, Maaseia, Matania, Bezalela, Binuia, Manasea,
Harima irchi laia Eliazara Isija, Malkija, Semaia, Simeona hai;
Benjamina, Maluka, Semaria, hai.
Hasuma irchi laia Matenaia, Matata, Zabada, Elifeleta, Jeremaia, Manasea, Simeia hai,
Bania irchi laia mi Maadaia, Amrama, Uzia hai;
Benaia, Bedeia, Keluhia hai;
Vania, Meremota Eliasiba hai;
Matania, Matenaia, Jaasua hai;
Bania, Binuia, Simeia, hai;
Selemia, Nathana, Adaia, hai;
Maknadebaia, Sasaia, Saraia, hai;
Azarela, Selemia, Semaria, hai;
Saluma, Amaria, Josefa hai.
Neboa irchia mi Jeiela, Matithia, Zabada, Zebina, Idoa, Joela, le Benaia hai an ni.
Hihai murdi hin nam dang dôngma lâk an ni; senkhathaiin an dôngmahai leh nâi le tê lei nei tâk an ni.
Hakalia nâipa Nehemia thuhai chu hiang hin a nia, kum sômhnina, Kisleu thaa rêng khopui Susa-ah ki om laiin,
ki urêng inkhat Hanania le Judai ram ata mi senkhat an honga; khan Judahai sala om a la damhai thurchi le Jerusalem thurchi ki’rdonhaia.
Khan ki kuang, “Sala om suakhai chu, kha rama khan vânduai taka insîrinsiatin an oma: khan Jerusalem banghai khom a chim rem ruma, a inkhârhai khom a kâng ta,” an tia.
Khan hiang hi a nia, kha thu kha kin hriatin chu ki toiraka, ki chapa, sûn iza vêl mani chu a sân ki ngûipuia; bu ki ngheia, irvân Pathian makunga ki chongchaia,
“O

Israel irchihai sualna, ni chunga kin inchâina ngaidam ki’rzong sûng hin ni mit mengin ni mikuar lei sungin lân, ni siahlo chongchaina, a sûn a zânin ni siahlo Israel irchihai ki zong pehai hi, le’rngaiin lân; kei leh ka pa in sûng mihai kin sual tâka.
Ni chunga saloi takin thil kin lei tho tâka, ni siahlo Mosia kuanga ni thupêkhai le ni dânhai lak lei zôm ta ma unga.
Ni siahlo Mosia kuang, ‘Nin insiatnahai sikin nam tin laia irthekindarh nin ta;

aniachu keima tiang nin hong kîr nôka, ki thupêkhai nin poma, nin zômin chu, nin laia mi, irvân tena inhnot ni khom sianlân, khatak ata khom nangni bukkhôm nôk ki ta, ki’rhming omna hmun ki indangna khan nangni hruai nôk ki ti,’ tia ni thupêk kha irngaihoi takin inhre mai roh.
“Khan hihai hi ni siahlohai le ni mihai, ni sintho theina irkhêltak le kut hrât taka ni irtansuakhai an nia.
O ki
Khan hiang hi a nia, rêng Artazerzia kum sômhni an lal kum, Nisan tha uain an sôm zoiin uain kha ki lâka, rêng ki pêka. Matona khan chu a makunga beidong hmêl irput ngai ma unga.
Rengin ki kuang, “Damloi khom ni ual mak chea, itina mo beidong hmêl ni irput tâk hi te? thil dang ni no ni, ni lungrîl a isôl kêng ni a ti,” a ni tia. Khanchu a sân ki chi tâka.
Keima’n rêng kuang khan, “Reng chu kumtuangin dam sôt ri se: ki irchibulhai thân omna khua chu a ramin a inkhârhai a kânga, beidong hmêl irput loiin mo ki ini hrang?” ki tia.
Khanchu rêng khan, “Imo ni izong?” a tia. Khanchu irvân Pathian kuang ki chongchai tâka.
Reng kuang khan, “Rengin a sa a iti lam a niin chu, ni siahlo hin ni mit ki lei tung ngaiin chu, Judai rama ki’rchihai thân omna khuaa nin fetir ro, khua la va inding nôk hi rong,” ki tia.
Rengin ki kuang, “I dôr ten mo ni va iom hrang, itik tena mo ni ihong thei nôk hrang?” a tia. Khanchu rêngin lôm takin a nin fetira; keima’n hunbi kin danga.
Kha vai kha ni loiin rêng kuanga khan, “Rengin a sa a ti’n chu varâl tianga roirêltuhai irhmupuihai hrangin Judai ram ki fe theina hrangin lekha ni pe’n lân;

khan rêng ram nghâktu Asafa hmu hrangin irhrungna kul inkhâr enna, khopui kul hrang le, ki va iomna hrang in le thing an ni pêk theina hrang lekha ni pe sa ro,” ki tia. Khan ki Pathianin a nin dit sikin rêng kuanga ki izong ang a ni pêka.
Khanchu varâl tianga roirêltuhai kuanga ki va tunga, rêng lekhahai chu ki pêka. Rengin ki kuanga sipai hruaitu le sipai sakor chung chuang mi an fetirhaia.
Khan Horon mi Sanbalata le Amon mi siahlo Tobia haiin an len hriatin chu Israelhai san hrangin an hong a nih tiin an milung chuk pehai maka.
Khanchu Jerusalem ki hong tunga, sûn thum ki’rngam baka.
Zâna chu ki thoia, kei le mi dang tômtein: Jerusalem tah hranga ki itho tum ki Pathianin ki lungrîla a isia chu tûte hril ma unga, ki ichuangna ti no chu sa dang ite chôihai ma unga.
Khan zâna chu phâi tianga mikota ki suaka, Dragon tuisunsuakna tiang le sahrok paina tiang ki fea, Jerusalem kul chim le a inkhâr kânghai ki en vêla.
Khan tuisunsuakna lam le rêng dîl dênin ki fea: khannisian ki chuangna sa fe thei ving loina hmun a nia.
Khanchu zâna vadung ki’rvâka, kulhai kha ki ena; ki hong kîr nôka, phâi tianga mikota khan ki lûta, kha tiang khan ki hong kîr nôka.
Roirêltuhaiin khôn mo ki ife le imo ki itho khom inhre loiin; khan Judahai ochai, mi thathai, roirêltu le mi dang sinthohai ngai khom la hrilhai ual ma unga.

Khanchu an kuang, “Kin ngîrhmun a isiat lam hi nin hmua, Jerusalem a ram ti le, a inkhârhai a kâng ti khom nin inhriata: tho insîrinsiata ei ni loina hrangin Jerusalem kul chu indingtir nôk ei ti,” ki tia.
Khan ki Pathianin a ni inuampui lam kin sîra, ki makunga rêng thuhrilhai khom. Khanchu anni’n, “Thoi ei ta, indingtir tak tak ei ti,” an tia. Khanchu kha sin sa tho hrangin an kut an inhrâttira.

Khannisian Horon mi Sanbalata le Amon mi, siahlo Tobia le Arab mi Gesema’n haiin an inhriatin chu an nin nuisanin, an ni hmusita, “Nin sintho hi itho sika mo? Reng chunga hin nin tehel nin izong ma ni?” an ni tia.

Khanchu hiang hin ki sâmhaia, “Irvân Pathianin ni’rnghil maka; khasikin keini a siahlohai hi thoi kin ta, indingtir nôk kin ti; nangnihaiin chu Jerusalema hin dongtum mani, irchamneina mani, hnungmân mani ite nei thei no chin ni,” ki tia.
Khanchu ochai inlal Eliasiba chu a urêng ochaihai leh an thoia, belra lampui an siama; an irthiangtira, a inkhârhai an sina; Hamea in irsâng dênin an irthiangtira, Hananela in irsâng dênin.
Kha zoiin chu Jeriko mihaiin an siama. Khan anni zoia chu Imria nâipa Zakura’n a siama.
Khan ngahai lampui chu Hasena nâihaiin an sina, a neinunhai an siaa, a inkhârhai an charêla; a kalna le an tûknahai an sina.
Anni zoiin chu Hakoza nâi Uria nâipa Meremota’n a siam insaa. Anni zoia chu Mesezabela nâi Berekia nâipa Mesulama khan a siam insaa, anni zoi nôkin chu Baana nâipa Zadoka’n a siama.
Khan, anni zoiin chu Tekoa kho mihaiin an siam insaa, khannisian an mi lianhaiin an hruaituhai sina khan irpôl nuam mahaia.
Khan inkhâr milui chu Pasea nâipa Joiada le Besodeia nâipa Mesulama mihaiin an siam insaa, a rêla an siaa, a lampuihai an charêla.
Khan anni zoia chu Gibeon mi Melatia le Meronot mi, Jadona’n, varâl tianga ram optu thu hnuaia om Gibeon mi le Mizpa mihai le an siam insa nôka.
Kha zoiin chu rângachak siamtu laia mi Harhaia nâipa Uziela’n a siama. Kha irzoiin chu mirimhoi siamtu laia mi Hanania’n a siam nôka, Kul irsahai dênin Jerusalem chu an siam insa nôka.
Anni zoiin chu Jerusalem bial chimrip hruaitu Hura nâipa Refaia khan a siama.
Khan anni zoiin Harumafa nâipa Jedaia’n a siam insa, kha irzoiin chu Hasabneia nâipa Hatusana’n a siama.
Harima nâipa Malkija le Pahat-moaba nâipa Hasuba haiin hmun dang le meipui sêmna in irsâng an siam insaa.
Kha zoiin chu Jerusalem bial chimrip hruaitu Halohesa nâipa Saluma’n a nâinuhai leh an siama.
Phâiruam inkhâr chu Hanuna le Zanoa haiin an siam insaa; a inkhârhai charêlin, a kalnahai siamin an tûkna an sin insatira. Khan sahrok paina tianga inkhâr dênin kul mûk sângkhat an sin saa.
Sahrok paina inkhâr chu Bet-hakerem bial hruaitu Rekaba nâipa Malkija’n a siam insatira, inkhârhai le a kalna le an tûknahai a siama.

Khan Mizpa bial hruaitu Kolhozea nâipa Saluma, tuikuang lampui chu a siam insaa, ar khûtira, a lampuihai siamin a kalna le an tûknahai irfûkin, khan rêng irhuan kôla, Sela dîl irkulna chu Davida omna khua ata chum theina leidâk dênin a siam insaa.
Kha zoiin chu Azbuka, Betzur bial chimrip hruaitu nâipa Nehemia’n Davida thân irdîn le dîl khua le mi hrâthai in irdîn dênin a siam insaa.
Kha zoiin chu Levi irchihaiin an siam insa nôka; Bania nâipa Rehuma haiin. Kha irzoiin chu Keila bial chimrip hruaitu Hasabia’n a bial irhmingin a siam insaa.
Ama zoiin chu a urênghaiin an siam nôka; Keila bial chimrip hruaitu Henada nâipa Bevaia haiin;
kha zoiin chu Mizpa hruaitu Josua nâipa Ezra’n hmun dang kul kôi irphutna râltukfam siana panna lam a siam insata.
Kha irzoiin Zabaia nâipa Baruka’n, sathnem irngaitakin hmun dang kul kôi irphutna ata ochai inlal Eliasiba in lampui dênin a siam insaa.
Kha irzoiin Hakoza nâi, Uria nâipa Meremota’n hmun dang Eliasiba in lampui ata Eliasiba in hekna dênin a siama.
Khanchu a kôlvêla ochaihaiin an siam insa nôka.
Anni zoiin Benjamina le Hasuba’n an in irdîn an siama. Anni zoiin Anania nâi Maaseia nâipa Azaria’n a in kôl kha a siama.
Ama zoi le chu Henadaba nâipa Binuia’n hmun dang, Azaria in ata kul kôi irphutna a kil dênin a siam insaa.
Uzia nâipa Palala’n kulkôi irphutna irdîn le intângna in kôla rêng in irsâng ual ata irlôinahai a siam insatira. Kha zoia chu Parosa nâipa Pedaia’n a siam insaa.
Nethinim haiin nisua tianga tui mikot irdîn dênin in irsâng irlôina dênin an siam insa nôka.
Kha zoiin chu Tekoa kho mihaiin hmun dang, in irsâng lianpa fena le Ofel kul dênin an siam insa.
Sakor lampui chung tiang chu ochaihaiin mâni in irdînhai an siama.
Anni zoiin chu Imera nâipa Zadoka’n a in irdîn dênin a siam insaa. Kha zoiin nisua tianga mikot hrungtu Sekania nâipa Semaia’n a siam insaa.
Kha zoiin chu Selemia nâipa Hanania le Zalafa nâipa kirukna Hanuna haiin hmun dang an siama. Kha zoiin Berekia nâipa Mesulama khan a omna irdîn a siam insaa.
Ama zoiin chu rângachak siamtu laia mi Malkija’n Hamipkad mikot irdîn Nethinim hai in le bepâr thohai in dênin a kil panna dênin a siam insa nôka.
Khan a kil fena le kêlbelra mikot kâr chu rângachak siamtu le bepâr thohaiin an siam insa a ni.
Khannisianlân hiang hin a nia, Sanbalata’n kul kin sin ti an hriatin chu, a ning an mura, a sate’n a milung hoi pe maka, Judahai a’rzûl tôlhaia.

Khanchu a urênghai le Samari sipaihai makunga thu a hrila, “Hi Juda mi siat le sahai hin i zât mo an itho? khopui siam insa nôk an itum ma ni? An irbôl thei hrang mo an isôn? Sûn khat sûnga hin hlo mo chuk thei nihai? Sahrok om khômna vai a sa tâk hi, lung kâng zoi saihai hi, an indingthar thei nôk hrang mo?,” a tia.
Khan a kuang Amon mi Tobia khan, “Hong inding ngân ri sehai; Sihal khom luihai sian, an lung irkulnahai chu chim pehai ta no ni mo,” a tia.
O kin Pathian irngai ro, êsêlin kin iom a ni; an ni insîr insiatnahai hi anni chunga irlet pehaiin lân, anni khom kho rama mo intângtirhaiin lân;
an insiatnahai irkhû no’n lân, an sualnahai chu irnghil pehai no ro; kul siamtuhai chunga an ning an mur kêng a ni.
Khanchu kul kha kin sina, ar sâng lam chimripin kul lian dôrin kin irsua vinga; mipuihaiin sin hrâtna lungrîl an irput maia.

Khannisian hiang hi a nia, Sanbalata, Tobia, Arab mihai, Amon mihai le Asdod mihaiin Jerusalem kul chu siam insa a ni mai ti le a siatna lai kin pho mai ti an inhriatin chu, an ning an mur pehai uala;
khanchu Jerusalem kha hong doia buaina siam hrang an irti nôk tâka.
Khannisianlân annihai zârin kin Pathian kuang kin chongchaia, a sûn a zân, an ni hrung hrangin kin irbea.
Khan Juda khan, “Sinthotu sahai an irzala, sahrok lak a tama, kul chu kin isin siam thei ta loi hrang kêng,” a tia.
Khan kin râlhai lakin, an laia kin hong fea, kin thathaia, sin kin mâksan mân chu inhre no nihaia, ni hmu thei no nihai an lei ti tâk sikin.
Khannisianlân, Juda mi an kôla omhaiin, kin kuang an honga, kin râlhaiin an ni ikhitna laihai chu an ni hril mai ngaia.
Khasikin kul siatna ar hnuaina lai taka, hmun irthôlna taka mipuihai chu an in sûng mia irpâlin, an khandai, an ufeihai, an thal ngulhai chôiin irbîk hmun an zonga.
Khan ki hong en vêla, ki thoia, mi sahai le roirêltuhai, mipui danghai laia, “Annihai so ite chihai viat no unglân,
Khanchu hiang hin a hong nia, kin râlhaiin an len hriat ti le an sintho tum chu Pathianin ite bê’n bê mah ti an inhriatin chu, kul tianga mâni sin thôna hmuna kin fe nôka.
Hiang hin a nia, kha rengata chu kin ruathartehai a chimripin sin an thoa, a danghaiin ufeihai, pho, thalngul, rôpphohai an dôna; khan roirêltu’n Juda in mihai, kul siamtu murdihai an sanhai maia.
Kul siamna hrang hmangrua pêlhai khomin, an kut kiang khat tiang sin an thoa, kiang khat tiang hriamhrei an chôia;
a siamtuhaiin an khandai an vong chita; khaang dôra intak tuangin an sina, khan bekul tum hrangtu khom an kôla omin.
Khan mi sahai le roirêltuhai le mipuihai laia, “Sin hrang a tam hraia, kula hin irthekindarin an sinnahai lak a’rhla za zapa;
Bekul irhâi nin inhriatna hmun taka chu kin kuang hon tân unglân; ei Pathianin ni doipui a ti,” ki tia.
Hiang hin sin chu kin thoa; khan a chimripin chu a zîngbup ata ârsi ar lang mâka chu ufei an chôi maia.
Kha lai taka khan, mipuihai laia, “Zâna an ni hrunga, sûna sinthoin tukhom an siahlohai leh Jerusalem sûnga riak ving ri sehai,” ki tia.
Khaang khan keima khom, ki urênghai khom, ki ruathartehai khom, a ni zuia ni hrunghai leh, tûte’n kin tukrivô irkhek loiin hriamhrei irbel pumin tui tiang khan kin irvâk ngai a ni.
Khanchu mipuihai le an dôngmahai chu an urêng Judahai chunga nuarin an khêk sup supa.
“Keinihai hi kin nâihai le kin tama, fâk nêk khom kin neia,” an tia.
Senkhatin, “Kin tama, fâk hrang nei ma ung. Kin loihai mi kuta kin pêka,” an tia.
“Reng kuang khazana chôi hrangin sum kin pûka, ama hranga khan kin loi le grep irhuan mi kuta bânda kin intunga,

kin taksa laka kin urênghai taksa ang a nia, kin nâihai khom an nâihai anga om an nia: khannisian hi kin nâinuhai le kin nâipasalhai hi mi siahlo hrangin suaka kin ithunhai zoi hrang a nia: kin nâi senkhathai chu suaka an ilût zel a ni ta: a san hrang dân inhre loi, mihaiin kin loi le kin grep irhuanhai an inei a ni tâka,” iti pâl khom an oma.
Kha ang thu hai khan an khêk irhâi kin hriatin, ki ning an mura.
Khanchu ki lungrîla hiang hin ki ngaituaa, mi sahai le roirêltuhai laia khan, “Mi tinin nin urênghai sumsût omin nin inpûktirhaia,” ki tia. Khan an chungthu ngaitua hrangin mi ki bukhaia.

Anni laia, “Nam danghai laia zuara om, kin urêng Judahai chu thei lalamin kin irtanhaia; nangni’n nin urênghai zuar nin itum a ni mo? keini kuanga hin zuar an ini thei hrang ma ni?,” ki tia. Khanchu an dâihreka, a sâmna lam ite inhre mahai.
“Nin sintho hi a isa viat loi a ni; kin râlhai nam danghai insîrinsiatna sikin kin Pathian ngîka nin iom mo ni ma?
keima le ki urênghai, ki ruathartehai khomin khaang khan a sût omin sum kin inpûktirhai a ni, a sût oma ei itho hi masan ta ei ti.
A vuan sûn ngêt hin nin loihai, grep irhuan, oliv irhuan, an in le sum, an bu le uain, sahriak hmun irzakhat sûnga hmunkhat nin ilâk ngai khom kha pe nôk ving ta roi,” ki tia.

Khanchu anni khomin, “Pe nôk ving ta kin ti, anni ata ite irdon loiin, ni iti ang lam takin tho kin ti,” an tia. Khanchu ochaihai ki koihaia, an kuanga an chonginkung ang lam taka pe hrangin khomâk ki’rsâmtirhaia.

Ki puanbom chu kin thika, “Hi chonginkung anga tho loihai chu Pathianin a in ata le a sin thôna ata hiang hin inthikpai ri se; inthikpaia omin, a korongin om ri se,” ki tia. Khan a hong irbukhai murdi’n, “Amen,” an tia,

Kha ti no khomin Judai rama annihai optu hranga inkung ki ni ata, rêng Artazerzia kum sômhni an lal ata kum sômthum inhni an lal kum dênin, kum sômhleihni sûng chu kei le ki urênghaiin ram optu bu vai la ma unga.

Khannisian matona ram optu chu a le’rchong oka, tangka sekel sômminli tep loiin, an bu le uainhai an lâk pehaia; a hnung le a mân tianga siahlohai chu an inlal oka; khannisian keima’n chu Pathian chitna’n khaang khan tho ma unga.
Hi kul sintho hrang hin ki om maia, ram khom ite ircho ma unga; ki ruathartehai khom sintho’n kha hmuna khan an iom a ni.
Kha vai kha ni loiin, kin kôla nam danghai lai ata honghai tep loiin Judahai le roirêltuhai laia ki bu khalâi ottuhai chu mi irzakhat sômringa om mai an ni.

Khan sûn khata fâk hrang khom sehrâtchal inkhat le kêlbelra kiruk a sa tatak a nia; khan keima hrang khom âr an that saa, sûn sôm dan uain chi dadang tam uala in a nia; kha dôr khan sinsiamhai khomsian, hi mihai ituang hi an takin, ram optu ni hi ki irphu loi a ni.
O ki Pathian, hi mihai hranga ki sintho murdi hi, ki sa theina hrangin inhre mai roh.
Khan hiang hin a nia, Sanbalata le Tobia le Arab mi Gesema leh kin râl danghaiin kulhai ki siama, a chetna om ta mah ti an inhriatin chu, aniachu kha laia khan mikot inkhârhai chu la siam ma ung.
Sanbalata le Gesema’n, “Hongin lân, Ono phâia khua inkhata irhmûna nei ei ti,” tiin thu an ni hong thona. Khannisian ki chunga thil saloi tho an itum chian a lei nia.
Khan keima’n anni kuang, “Sin roiinpuitak ki thoa, khasikin hong thei no ning; nangni kuanga ki hong kârin ki sin a’rngam hrang sikin,” tiin mi ki tîra.
Khaang ngêt khan voiminli an ni hong tia; kei khom khaang ngêt khan ki sâmhai hena.
Khanchu Sanbalata’n khaang ngêt khan a voiringanaa khan a siahlo lekhathon hon chôiin a hong tîra;

khataka khan, “Nang le Judahaiin tehelzong hrang nin lunginchong a nia, khasikin kêng hi kul hi ni isiam ti thu nam danghai laia an thanga, Gesema khomin a ti saa; an ihril dânin chu nangma hi an rêng hrang ni nuam an tia.
Judai rama chu rêng a om tia Jerusalema inpuang hrangin deipu khom nin thang tâka, hi thu hi hril lat an ta; khasikin hongin lân, chongkhôm hi rei,” ti a chuanga.
Khanchu a kuang, “Ni iti ang hin ite tho ni maka, ni iphuakhôm a ni,” tiin a kuang mi ki tîra.
“An sintho chu hlo an chuk loina hrangin an kuthai a’rzalin a om ta,” tia mihai ihril a nia. Khasikin o Pathian, ki kuthai hi nin hrâttir pe roh.

Kha irzoiin chu Mehetabela nâi Delaia nâipa Semaia, suak vak theiloi ina ki fea; ama’n, “Pathian ina, biak in sûng ngêta irhmu inlân, biak in inkhârhai khâr pumin; nangma that hrang tumin an ihong hrang a ni; zâna hong that nang an itum a ni,” a lei tia.
Keima’n, “Keima anga mi hi ki lei intân hrang mo ni ni sôn? Mâni hringna inzôk hrangin tu mo biak in sûnga lût hrang? lût viat no ning,” ki tia.
Khanchu ki hon hriat suaka, Pathian itîr lei ni viat maka, keima ni lei doina hrangin kha thuhai kha a lei ihril a nia, Tobia le Sanbalata lei inphût a nia.
Ki chia, a iti anga nuamin thil kin châia, ki’rhming siatna hrang an hmua, an nin sîrinsiat theina hrangin an lei ihmang a nia.
O ki Pathian, Tobia le Sanbalata sintho ang hin inhre pehai maiin lân, deipunu Goadii le deipu dang mi insî tum murdihai leh hin.
Khanchu kul kha sûn sômringa sûn hnina, Elul tha sûn sômhni le ringa ni sûn tena chu irzoi a ni tâka.
Hiang hin a hong nia, kin râlhai murdi’n kha thu kha an len hriatin chu, kin kôla nam danghaiin an lei chia, dormusiat okin an irhriata, sin chu kin Pathian itho a nih ti an inhriata.
Khan khomin, kha laia khan Juda mi felhaiin Tobia chu lekha tamtak an lei thona, Tobia lekha khom an lei man tâka.
Ama chu Ara nâipa Sekania mâkpa a ni sikin Judai rama mi tamtak khomâksâma a lei irrualpui an oma; a nâipa Jehohanana Berekia nâipa Mesulama nâinu dôngma’n a neia.
Keima inhriata a sintho insa an hrila, ki thuhrilhai khom an insîr pe ngai. Khanchu Tobia’n a ni insî hrangin lekha a hong ithon ngai a ni.
Khanchu hiang hi a hong nia, Kulhai kin siama; a mikothai ki’rfûka, mikot hrunghai, hla saktuhai, Levihai indang an ni zoiin chu,
ki urênghai Hanania le Kul irsâng hruaitu Hanania chu Jerusalem kin optira: mi iamom tak, Pathian chi mi a nia.

Jerusalem kul mikothai misa a hor sâng tal no’n chu inhong no roi, khohloia a hrungtuhai an chîn mân khârhai sian, kal ving ri sehai. Khan Jerusalema omhai laia mi a hrung hrang indanghai unglân, an omna hrang hmuna omhai sian, senkhatin mâni in omna kôlhai khom an ihrung sa hrang a ni.
Khua kha a lianin a’rzat oka; khannisian mihriam omhai chu tômte an nia, inhai khom la sin loi ang a nia.
Pathianin ki lungrîla mi felhai, roirêltuhai le mipuihai koi bukin, an irchihai irhming irziak hrangin a nin hriattira. Khan a phut taka fehai irhming irziakna kha ki hmua, hiang hin irziak ki hmua.
Sala hruai, Babulon rêng Nebukadnezara’n a ihruaihai laia sala om hong suakhai, Jerusalem le Judai rama mâni khuaa om, kha rama om tâkhai chu, hihai hi an ni:
Zerubabela, Jesua, Nehemia, Azaria, Ramia, Nahamania, Mordekaia, Bilsana, Mispereta, Bigvaia, Nehuma le Baana hai rualin an ife a nia. Israelhai laia mi vântâng tam lam chu:
Parosa irchihai 2,172,
Sefatia irchihai 372;
Ara irchihai 652;
Jesua le Joaba irchihai laia Pahat-Moaba mi 2,818;
Elama irchihai 1,254;
Zatua irchihai 845;
Zakaia irchihai 760;
Binuia irchihai 648;
Bebaia irchihai 628;
Azgad irchihai 2,322.
Adonikama irchihai 667;
Bigvaia irchihai 2,067;
Adina irchihai 655;
Hezekia irchia mi Atera irchihai 98;
Hasuma irchihai 328;
Bezaia irchihai 324;
Harifa irchihai 112;
Gibeona irchihai 95;
Bethlehem le Netofa khua mi 188;
Anathot khuaa mi 128;
Bet-azmavet khua mi 42;
Kiriath-jearim hai, Kephira hai le Berot khua mi 743;
Rama le Geba khua mi 621;
Mikmas khua mi 122;
Bethel le Ai khua mi 123;
Nebo kho danga mi 52;
Elam danga irchihai 1,254;
Harima irchihai 320;
Jerikova irchihai 345;
Lod hai, Hadid hai le Ono irchihai 721;
Sena irchihai 3,930.
Ochaihai: Jesua in mihai laia Jedaia irchihai 973;
Imera irchihai 1,502;
Pasura irchihai 1,247;
Harima irchihai 1017.
Levi irchihai: Hodeva irchia mi Jesua le Kadmiela irchihai 74;
Hla saktuhai: Asafa irchihai 148.
Mikot hrungtuhai: Saluma irchihai, Atera irchihai, Talmona irchihai, Akuba irchihai, Hatita irchihai, Sobaia irchihai 138.
Nethinim hai: Ziha irchihai, Hasufa irchihai, Tabaota irchihai;
Kerosa irchihai, Sia irchihai, Padona irchihai;
Lebana irchihai, Hagaba irchihai, Samlaia irchihai;
Hanana irchihai, Gidela irchihai, Gahara irchihai;
Reaia irchihai, Rezina irchihai, Nekoda irchihai,
Gezama irchihai, Uza irchihai, Pasea irchihai;
Besaia irchihai, Meunima irchihai, Nefusesima irchihai;
Bakbuka irchihai, Hakupha irchihai, Harhura irchihai;
Bazlitha irchihai, Mehida irchihai, Harsa irchihai;
Barkosa irchihai, Sisera irchihai, Tema irchihai.
Nezia irchihai, Hatifa irchihai.
Solomona siahlohai irchihai: Sotaia irchihai, Sofereta irchihai, Perida irchihai;
Jala irchihai, Darkona irchihai, Gidela irchihai;
Sefatia irchihai, Hatila irchihai, Pokeret-hazebaima irchihai, Amona irchihai.
Nethinim mi murdi le Solomona siahlohai irchi chu 392 an ni.
Khan Tel-mela, Tel-harsa, Kerub hai, Adon hai, Imer ata honghai chu, hihai hi an ni; khannisianlân an pi le puhai in mihai le an irchihai chu Israel mi an ini le ni loi sui thei mahaia;
Delaia irchi, Tobia irchi, Nekoda irchihai chu 642.
Khan ochaihai laia mi, Hobaia irchi, Hakoza irchi, Gilead mi Barzilaia nâinuhai laia mi dôngma’n a neia; an irhming anga irput Barzilaia irchihai chu:
Khahai khan an irchihai anga tep theia an irhming irziak zongna khan hmu thei mahaia: khasikin intiroma bêin an oma, an ochai ninahai chu an mâka.
Khan ram optu khan anni chu Urim le Thumim irbela ochai an inding nôk mâka chu thil serhai kha an ifâk hrang ni mah tiin a hrila.
Mipui irbuk murdi chu 42,360 an ni.
an siahlo nupang le pasal 7,337 tep loiin: khan hlasakhai nupang le pasal 245 an nia.
An sakor chu 736 a nia: an sakuartung lian zât chu 245 a nia;
an Saringsei chu 435 a nia, an Sakuartung chîn zât chu 6,720 a ni.
Khan a ina ar hlohai senkhatin kha sin tho hranga khan thil an irfûktir a ni. Ram optu khan tholôma hrang rângachak dâr sângkhat, tâbor sômringa, ochai tukfam irzaringa sômthum a pêka.
Khan a ina ar lua senkhatin in sinna hranga tholôm rângachak dâr sînghni le sumru varh sânghni irzahni a pêka.
Khan mi danghai ipêk rângachak dâr sînghni le tangka sumru sânghni le ochai tukfam sômruk sari a ni.

Khanchu ochaihai, Levihai, mikot hrungtuhai, hla saktuhai, le mi senkhathai le Nethinim hai le Israel mi murdi chu mâni khua chita an om tâka. Khanchu tha sarina a hong tungin chu Israelhai chu an khuaa an om ta.
Khan, mi murdi an rênga inrualin tui mikot hmâi tiang hmun irzatna lai taka an irbûma; khanchu lekha irziaktu Ezra chu
Khanchu tha sarina sûn khat nî chu ochai Ezra’n ar bûmhai nu le pa an hriat theihai laia khan dân bu kha a hong chôia.
Khan khataka mi chu tui mikot hmâi hmun irzatna taka nupang le pasal le an hriat theihai laia zîng ata sûn sôt a tepa, mi murdi’n kha dân bu thua khan an mikuar an sung chita.

Khan khaang hrang piala an isin thing dokâng irsânga khan lekha irziaktu Ezra chu a ngîra; a sîr chang tiang khan Matithia, Sema, Anaia, Uria, Hilkia, le Maaseia hai an ngîra; a vei tiang khan Pedaia, Misaela, Malkija, Hasuma, Hasbadana, Zekaria le Mesulama hai.
Khan Ezra’n mi murdi mithmu laia lekhabu irzuat kha a sûta. A hong sûtin chu mi murdi an ngîr vinga:
Khanchu Ezra’n

Khan Jesua hai, Bania hai, Serebia hai, Jamina hai, Akuba hai, Sebethaia hai, Hodija hai, Maaseia hai, Kelita hai, Azaria hai, Jozabada hai, Hanana hai, Pelaia hai, le Levi haiin mipuihai chu dân an hrilfia pehaia; mipuihai chu an omna hmuna an om maia.
Khan lekhabu, Pathian dân bua mi kha fel takin a tepa; a omzia a hrilfiaa, an itep sai kha an hriat infeltirhaia.
Khan ram optu Nehemia le ochai lekha irziat thei Ezra le mipui irchutirtu Levi haiin mipuihai laia khan, “A vuan hin
Khanchu an kuang khan, “Fe unglân, thil thâi fa unglân thil thum in roi, ite suang hrang boihai hrangin thonhai unglân, a vuan hin
Khanchu Levi haiin, “Dâihrek roi, a vuan hin sûn irthiang a ni; nin milung inzîngtir no roi,” mipui murdi chu dâihrekin an irngaia.
Khanchu a thu hrilfia kha an inhriat thei sikin mipuihai kha fâk hrang le in hrang, mihai thon hrang le raifân taka omin an chîn thei ta.
Khanchu, sûn hnina nî chu mipuihai laia a ina ar luahai le ochaihai, Levi hai chu dân thu irchu hrangin lekha irziaktu Ezra kuang an fea.
Mosia kuanga zôm hranga a thupêk dân chu tha sarina kût lai taka Israel irchihai irngamna hmuna, omna thu irziak an hmua.
“Tânga fe unglân, oliv ônhai, irhmûi ôn zârhai, le tûm ôn hai, thing lianpahai irngamna hmun sinna hrangin va la roi,” tiin an khua le Jerusalem khuaa inpuangin a om hrang thu an tepa.
Khanchu mipuihai kha an fea an va lâka, mihaiin an in sûnga, an mikota, Pathian mikota, Tui mikot hmun lianna takhaia, Efraima mikot hmun irzatna haia, irngam hmun an sina.

Sala zôk irbukhaiin ngam hmun an sina, kha hmuna khan an oma; Nuna nâipa Jesua zoro rengata, kha nî sûn dênin Israel irchihai khan khaang khan tho ual ngai mahaia. Khanchu lômna liantak a hong ni pehaia.
A sûn tin a’rphut ata a tôp dênin Pathian dân bu a tepa, khan sûn riat nî chu kût hek nî a nia, thupêk angin ir-up taka inkhômin an ichîn ngai a ni.
Khanchu kha tha sûnga sûn sômhni minli nî chu Israel irchihai chu bu an ngheia, bora puan silin, irnêng tôn duangin an fea.
Israel namhai chu nam danghai rengata a bingin an oma, an ngîra, an sualnahai le an pi le pu sin insiatnahai ngaidam an irzonga.
An omna hmun chita an ngîra, kha nikhua hmun minlia semin, hmunkhat chu
Khasikin, Levi hai dokâng irsânga khan Jesua hai le Bania hai, Kadmiela hai, Sebania hai, Bunia hai, Serebia hai, Bania hai, Kenania hai chu an ngîra inring takin
Khasikin Pathian biak hranga koihai chu; Levi mi, Jesua le Kadmiela hai, Bania hai, Hasabneia hai, Serebia hai, Hodia hai, Sebania hai, le Pethahia haiin,
“Ngîr unglân,
Chôiindômna le inpâkna murdiin a iphâk loi irhming roiinpui chu inpâkin om ri se,” an tia.
Israel mipuihai chu hiang hin an chongchaia, “
Abrama chu tânga, Kaldai ram Ur khua ata hruai suaka, ar hming Abrahama tia phuatu,

khan, a milung khom iam om zoi a nih ti nin hriata, Kanaan hai, Hit hai, Amor hai, Periz hai, Jebus hai le Girgas hai ram chu pe hrangin, ar chihai laia thu ni thunga, hlo nin chuktira, mi feltak ni nia.
Aigupta rama kin pi le puhai intak tuangzia chu ni hmua, Tuikhanglian sen kôla an khêk irhâi chu nin hriata;
Faroa le a siahlohai murdi le a ram sûnga mi murdi laia irsinsiana le thilirkhêl nir langtira; lârirpâk takin an chunga sin an tho ti nin hriata, atûn ten hin irhming nin neitirhai tâka.
Khan an matona tuikhanglian chu ni’rsentira, khanchu tuikhanglian kha tui kangin an fe thei tâka; khan a hong irzûltuhai chu, tui inthûk taka lung ei inthâk angin ni pai lûthaia.
Khan, sûna chu sûmpuiin ni hruaia, zâna khom an fena hrang lampui an hmu theina hrangin meichokin ni hruaia.
Sinai tânga khan ni honga, irvân ata anni laia thu nin sîra, roirêlna dik takhai, dân diktak, thu’nkung le thupêk satak ni pêka.
khan irngam nî irthiang chu nin hriattirhaia, ni siahlo Mosia hmangin thupêk hai, thu’nkung hai, dânhai ni pêka;
an phîngchâm khopna hrangin irvân ata bai ni pêka, an tui inhrâl channa hrangin lungpui sûng ata tui ni sunsuaka, pêk ni inuamna ram chu ni pêka.
Khannisianlân anni le kin pi le puhaiin lârirpâk takin sin an thoa, an tukul a liana, ni thupêkhai pom loiin,

zôm khom zôm nuam mahai, an laia ni thil irkhêl thohai khom irngai nuam ta loiin; an tukullian songin, tehelzongin, an sal changna tianga kîr hrangin hruaitu an irthang ual a ni: khannisianlân, nang chu ngaidam hranga irsiam sai Pathian, mi lunginkham thei, Inrennaa sip, mi ingam, annihai khom irnghil nuamhai mak chea.
Sehrâtte irlim an siama, “Hi hi a ni, Aigupta rama nang a hruaitu Pathian chu,” an tia, ningmur om tak thil an tho lai khomin,
ni phûkdâina khan ramchâra nin thâ mak chea; lampuia hruai hrang khomin sûna sûmin masan maka, anni êl hrang le an fena lampui irhmu hrangin mei anga vârin zâna a êlhaia.
Annihai irchutir hrangin irtha diktak ni pêkhaia, Mana hai le nin fâhaia, dangchârhai tui ni pêka.
Ramchârna hmun khan kum sômminli nin fâhaia, ite irsam loiin; an silkaihai khom inrô loiin, an kehai khom invûng loiin.
Ram le namhai khom ni pêka, an dongtumhai ni sem pea: khanchu Sihona ram, Hesbon rêng ram le Basan rêngin Oga ram an luaa.
An irchihai khom irvâna ârsi nêkin nin punga, an ilua hrang ram an pi le puhai kuanga ni lei ihrilna rama nin tunghaia.
Khanchu an irchihai khan ram an lua tâka, khan kha rama om Kanaan mihai chu an intema, an nuam taka lohaiin an rênghai le a mipuihai kha an kuta ni pêka.

Kul nei khopuihai, ram satak tak an lâka, thil sa tinrênga bitin an luaa, tuikuang tuk saihai, grep irhuanhai, oliv irhuanhai le theikung dang tamtak an neia: khanchu an fâkin, an khopa, an hong mara, ni satna sikin hoi takin an oma.
Khannisian an irhmôla, nang an tehel pea, ni dânhai mâksanin, nangma tianga hong nôk hranga hriltu deipuhai an thata, ningmurom thilhai an thoa.
Khasikin anni dengintheitirtu an râlhai kuta ni pêka; an chardong laia nang an insam kha irvân ata ni len hriata; phûkdâi takin an râlhai ata sansuak hrangin mi’nzôkpu ni pêka.

Khannisian râl irvei loiin an om zoiin, ni mithmua thil saloi an tho nôka; khasikin an râlhai kuta ni pêkhaia, khanchu an chunga thu an neia; an kîra nang an koi lai khan, irvân ata ni len hriata, voi iza ni phûkdâi sikin ni sansuakhaia;

ni dâna ni hruai lûthai theina hrangin nir chutirhaia; khannisian lârirpâk takin sin an thoa, ni thupêkhai pom loiin ni roirêlna sêlin thilsual an thoa, an zôma hringpui nêkin an tukullianin irngai nuam mahai.
Khannisian kum tamtak anni chu ni donhaia, irtha tianga deipuhai hmangin nir chutirhaia; khannisian an mikuar sêt angin an oma; khasikin kha rama mihai kuta khan ni pêk ta.
Khannisianlân ni lungkhamna zârin a hekna chu intungtir pehai mak chea, mâk khom masanhai loiin; Pathian lungkham thei taka sip ni ni sikin.

Khasikin, kin Pathian, roiinpui, itinrêngthothei le ichiom, thuthung dêna lungkhamna inlangtu khan kin rênghai kin mi lianhai, kin ochaihai, kin deipuhai, kin pi le puhai le ni mihai murdi chunga Assuria rênghai inlal lai ata atûn tena dengtheina hong omhai hi a mai maiin insâp no’n lân.
I khomnisian, kin chunga thil hong omhai hi nang chu ni fela; dik takin thil ni thoa, keini’n chu dikloi takin kin oma:
kin rênghai, kin milianhai, kin ochaihai, kin pi le puhai khomin ni dân zôm mahaia, ni thupêk le ni thu inhriattir, anni irchutirna khom pom nuam mahai.
An chunga ni isa pehai hrai hi, an ram khom ram liantak le satak ni ipêk khan ni sintho loiin, an sintho indik loihai mâk nuam loiin.
Irngai ro, atûn hin chu suak kin ni tâka, a sûnga thil sa le thil ra tamtak kin pi le puhai fâk hranga ni ipêkna rama hin suak kin nia.
Kin sual sikin kin chunga rêng hrang ni indanghai lakin an irchongpuia: kin taksa le kin sa chunga khom anni thu tak a ni tâka, kin ikamang zoi a ni ta.
Khahai sika khan thu det kin inkunga, kin irziak; kin milianhai, kin Levihai le kin ochaihaiin an ni indetpui a ni.
Khanchu a ni namindet puituhai chu hihai hi an ni; Hakalia nâipa ram optu Nehemia le Zedekia;
Seraia, Azaria, Jeremia hai,
Pasura, Amaria, Malkija hai;
Hatusa, Sebania, Maluka hai;
Harima, Meremota, Obadia hai;
Daniela, Ginethona, Baruka hai;
Mesulam, Abija, Mijamina hai;
Maazia, Bilgaia, Semaia hai: hihai hi ochai an ni,
Khan Levihai: Azania nâipa Jesua, Henadada, nâihai laia mi Binuia, Kadmiela hai;
An urêng Sebania, Hodija, Kelita, Pelaia, Hanonia-hai;
Mika, Rehoba, Hasabia hai;
Zakura, Serebia, Sebania hai;
Hodia, Bania, Beninua hai;
Mipuihai: Parosa Pahat-Moaba, Elama, Zatua, Bania hai;
Bunia, Azgad, Bebaia hai;
Adonija, Bigvaia, Adina hai;
Atera, Hezekia, Azura hai;
Hodia, Hasuma, Bezaia hai;
Harifa, Anathota, Nebaia hai;
Magpiasa, Mesulama, Hezira hai;
Mesezabela, Zadoka, Jadua;
Pelatia, Hanana, Ana hai;
Hosea, Hanania, Hasuba;
Halohesa, Pilha, Sobeka hai;
Rehuma, Hasabna, Maaseia hai;
Ahia, Hanana, Anana hai;
Maluka, Harima le Baana hai an ni.

Khan, mi dang, ochaihai, Levihai, mikot hrungtuhai, hlasaktuhai, Nethinim hai le Pathian dân zôm tuma kha rama mihai lak ata irkiang murdihai, an dôngma le an nâihai, a sia le sa inhriat thei dôrhaiin,
an urênghai, an milian hai kha mahai loiin Pathian siahlo Mosia pêk Pathian dân zôm hranga,
Kha rama mihai chu kin nâinuhai inluatirhai loia, kin nâipasalhai hrangin an nâinuhai nei loiin,

kha rama mihai irngam nia thil zuar hrang neinun mani, fâk hrang mani, an hong lâka irngam nia mani, sûn ser bîknaa khom ircho pehai loia; kum sarina tena ram man chôina murdi an lâkaihai sîng loi hrangin khomâk an irsâma.
Khan kin Pathian in tianga sin thôna hrangin sekel hmun thuma sena hmunkhat, a kum tina pe hrangin dân kin siama.

Bu siana hrang hai, baidi thil inhlan mai hrang hai le, hâlirvôm thilinhlan mai hrang hai, irngam ni hranga le, tha thara hrang, hunbi nei kûta hrang, thil irthiang hai, Israel mihai hranga irngeina siamna hranga sual irbôlna hrang le kin Pathian in tianga a nang murdi thôna hrang hai.
Kin pi le pu in sûng mihai anga a kum tin zoro bîk indanga dân bua irziak anga
a kum tina kin loia a vâng masatak le thing tinrêng laia a ra masa tak
dân bua irziak angin kin nâilutîr le kin sa laia a suak masa tak, kin sehrât le kêlbelrahai laia a suak masa tak, kin Pathian ina sinthotu ochaihai kuanga Pathian ina hruai hrang hai.

Kin Pathian in tentana ochaihai le kin bai fâk hrang masa tak, kin ngaihoi thilinhlan hrang chi tinrêng rahai le, uain le sahriak chôi hrang hai; kin loia mi sôma inkhat Levi hai pêk hranghai dân kin siama, Levi haiin kin kho sûnga loi tho ngai khua murdia sôma inkhat an lâk ngaia.

Khanchu Levihaiin sôma inkhat an lâk laiin, Arona irchia mi ochai chu Levihai laia a iom hrang a ni: Levi haiin sôma inkhat an lâk ata sôma inkhat chu kin Pathian ina, irchon bukkhômna tentana khan an hong isia hrang a ni.

Israel irchihai le Levi irchihaiin bu le uain le sahriak vôka thil inhlan chu hmun irthiang bêlbûr le sinthotu ochaihai, mikot hrungtu hai, hlasaktu hai, omna tentana khan an isia hrang a ni; hihai anga hin a ni, kin Pathian in chu masan loi hranga dân kin isiam a ni.
Mipui hruaituhai chu Jerusalema an oma; sômkhat laia inkhat khopui irthiang Jerusalema inomtir le sômkhat laia kuak kho danga om hrang hai inhriatna’n mipuihaiin tâ an sâna.
Milungchuk taka Jerusalema om hrang irpêkhai khan mipuihai inpâk an hloa.

Hihai hi mi rama hruaitu Jerusalema omhai chu an ni: khannisianlân Judai ram sûnga khuahaia khan, an omna hrang khuahaia an oma; khahai kha chu Israelhai, ochaihai, Levi hai, Nethinim hai, le Solomona siahlohai irchi an ni.
Jerusalema khan Juda irchihai laia mi: Zekaria tupa, Uzia nâi Athaia; ama hi Juda nâipa Pereza irchi a ni, a puhai chu Amaria hai, Sefatia hai, Mahalalela hai an ni.
Kolhozea tupa, Baruka nâipa Maaseia; ama hi Juda nâi Sela irchi laia mi a ni. A puhai chu Hazaia hai, Adaia hai, Joiariba hai le Zekaria hai an ni.
Pereza irchia mi chu irzaminli sômruk kiriatin Jerusalem khuaa in le loi an nei.
Benjamina irchi laia mi chu hihai hi an ni: Jesaia nâipa Ithiela, ama nâipa Maaseia, a nâi nôk Kolaia, ama nâipa Pedaia, ama nâi nôk Joeda, ama nâipa Mesulam, ama nâi nôk Salua.
Ama zoi nôk chu Gebaia, Salaia, an rêngin Benjamina irchi Jerusalema omhai chu irzakuak sômhni kiriat an ni.
Khan Zikria nâipa Joela chu an hruaitu a ni; Hasenua nâipa, Juda chu a khuaa ulian tak hnuai renga mi a ni.
Hi ochaihai hi Jerusalem-ah an om sa: Joiariba naipa Jedaia le Jakina.
Mesulama tupa Hilkia nâipa Seraia. Ama hi a puhai chu Zadoka hai, Meraiota hai, le Ochai inlaltak Ahituba hai an ni.
Hi mihai irchi hi irzariat sômhni inhniin Tempila sin an itho ngai a ni.
Pelaia tupa Jerohama nâipa Adaia. Ama puhai hi chu Amazia hai, Zekaria hai, Pasura hai le Malkija hai an ni.
An rêngin hi irchihai hi an insûngkuaa hruaituhai le mi irzahni sômminli inhni an ni.
Ahzaia tupa, Azarela nâi Amasaia. Ama hi a puhai chu Mesilemota hai le Imera hai an ni.
Hi irchihai hi mi irzakhat sômhni kiriat an om, sipai hâitak tak an ni. An hruaitu chu Hagadolim nâipa Zabdiela a ni.
Levia irchi Jerusalem-ah omhai: Azrikama tupa, Hasuba nâipa Semaia. Hi Semaia puhai chu Asabia hai le Bunia hai an ni.
Sebethaia le Jozabada. Anni hi Levia irchi, mi inlâr tak, Tempil pên tianga sin enkoltu an ni.

Asafa irchi, Zabdia tupa, Mika naipa Matania. Ama hi Tempil zaipôl lômna hla sak hruaitu a ni. Bakbukia: ama hi Matania changpuitu a ni. Galala tupa, Samua nâipa, Abdia: ama hi Jeduthuna irchia mi a ni.
Jerusalem kho irthianga Levia irchi om murdihai chu mi irzahni sômriat minli an ni.
Kha tih no khom kha mikot hrungin Akuba hai, Talmona le an urênghai kul mikot entuhai irzakhat sômsari inhni an nia.
A ban Israelhai, ochaihai, le Levihai chu Judai ram khua tina mâni ram chita an oma.
Nethinim hai chu Ofel-ah an om: Ziha le Gispa chu Nethinim hai hruaitu an nia.
Jerusalem khuaa Levihai hruaitu chu Asafa nâi, hlasaktuhai laia mi Mika, ama nâipa Matania, ama nâipa Hasabia, ama nâipa Bania, ama nâipa Uzia a ni, Pathian in tiang sinchuan thôtu tak a ni.
An chungchânga hin rêng thupêk a oma, hla saktuhai khom a nitina an sak hrang bituk a oma.
Juda nâipa Zera irchia mi Mesezabela nâipa Pethahia chu mipuihai chunga thuneitu rêng irthûla om a ni.
Khante, mipuihai kha an loimân nâina khuahaia khan an oma. Juda nama mi senkhathai chu Kiriat-arba le a kôla khotehaia Dibon le a kôla khotehaia, Zekabzeel le a kôla khotehaia;
Jesua le Molada le Betpeleta haia an oma.
Khan, Hazarsuala hai, Beer-seba le a kôla khotehaia,
Ziklag-ah le Mekona le a kôl khotehaia,
Enrimon haia, Zora haia, Jarmut haia;
Zanoa hai, Adulam, le an khua vêla Lakis le a ram sûnga hai, Azeka le khua vêla an oma. Khanchu Beer-seba ata Hinom irhôr dênin omhmun an khuara.
Benjamina irchihai chu Geba khêla Mikmas haia, Ai haia le Bethel le khote hai;
Anathot haia, Nob haia, Anania haia;
Hazor haia, Rama haia, Gitaim haia,
Hadid haia, Zeboim haia, Nebalat haia;
Lod haia le Ono haia kuttheithiamna irhôrhaia an oma.
Khan, Judai rama om ngai Levihai pâl senkhathai chu Benjamin hai laia an omtir tâka.
Sealtiela nâipa Zerubabela le Jesua kôla fe ochaihai le Levihai chu hihai hi an ni: Seraia, Jeremia, Ezra hai,
Amaria, Maluka, Hatusa hai,
Sekania, Rehuma, Meremota hai,
Idoa, Ginethoia, Abija hai;
Mijamina, Maadia, Bilga hai;
Semaia, Joiariba, Jedaia hai;
Salua, Amoka, Hilkia, Jedaia. Hihai hi Jesua dam laia ochai le an urênghai laia hruaituhai an ni.
Hihai khêla hin Levihai: Jesua hai, Binuia, Kadmiela, Serebia, Judahai lômthu insîrna an hruaitu Matania hai le a urênghai chu
Bakbukia le Unoa le an urênghai khom a papâlin an irthûl ngai a ni.
Khan Jesua’n Joiakima a neia, Joiakima’n Eliasiba a neia, Eliasiba’n Joiada a neia.
Joiada’n Jonathana a neia. Jonathana’n Jadua a neia.
Khan, hihai hi Joiakima dam laia ochai, a ina ar luahai chu an ni: Seraia irchia mi Meraria hai, Jeremia irchia mi Hanania hai,
Ezra irchia mihai laia Mesulama hai, Amaria irchia mi Jehohanana hai:
Maluka irchia mi Jonathana hai, Sebania irchia mi Josefa hai:
Harima irchia mi Adna hai, Meraiota irchia mi Helkaia hai;
Idoa irchia mi Zekaria hai, Ginethona irchia Mesulama hai.
Abija irchia mi Zikria hai, Miniamina irchia mi, Moadia irchia mi Piltaia hai,
Bilga irchia mi Samua hai, Semaia irchia mi Jehonathana hai,
Joiariba irchia mi Matenaia hai, Jedaia irchia mi Uzia hai,
Salaia irchia mi Kalaia hai, Amoka irchia mi Ebera hai;
Hilkia irchia mi Hasabia hai, Jedaia irchia mi Nethanela hai.
Levi irchihai chungchânga hin, Eliasiba, Joiada, Johanana, Jadua dam laia a ina ar luahai infelna a nia; khaangin ochaihai khom Persia rêng Daria inlal dênin irsinsiana an nia.
Eliasiba nâipa Johanana dam lai dên khomin Levi nâihai in sûngkua irhming irziakna bua chuang a ni.
Khan, Levi ulianhai chu: Hasabia, Serebia, Kadmiela, Jesua le Binuia, a urêng, Pathian mi Davida thupêk anga a pâl pâl irthûla, inpâk le lômthu insîr hranghai leh.
Matania, Bakbukia, Obadia, Mesulama, Talmona, Akuba hai chu mikot kôla neinun siakhômna in le mikot hrungtuhai an ni.
Hihai hi Jesua, Jozadaka, nâipa nâi Joiakima dam laia mi le ram optu Nehemia le Ezra ochai le lekha irziaktu dam laia mi an ni.
Jerusalem kul an inhlana khan, têngrep hai, perkhuang hai, belem hai le hlasaka lômthu hrila lôm taka inhlanna inkhôm hmang hranga Jerusalema hong hrangin Levihai chu an zong suakhaia.
Jerusalem kôlvêl ata Netofa hai khua ata hla saktuhai an honga;
Bethgilgal ata le Gebe-a le Azmaveta ram ata khom hla saktuhai khan Jerusalem kôla khan khophâi an sâta.
Khan ochaihai le Levihai an irthiangtirhaia, mipuihai, kulhai, le a mikothai an irthiangtira.
Khanchu Juda mi ulianhai chu kul sûnga khan ki hruaihaia, thuhrila irzui dûl dûla fe hrang, pâl lian tak tak inhni ki siama, pâl khat chu sahrok paina lampui tiang kul chang tiang an fea;
khan, anni chu lôm takin Hosaia le Juda mi lianhai a chimrip,
Azaria, Ezra, Mesulama hai,
Juda, Benjamina, Semaia le Jeremia hai,
Bekul chôi ochai nâi senkhathai le, Asafa nâipa Zakura, ama nâipa Mikaia, a nâi nôk Matania, ama nâipa Semaia, ama nâi nôk Jonathana, ama nâipa Zekaria;
a urêng Semaia, Azarela, Milalaia, Gilalaia, Maaia, Nethanela, Juda, Pathian mi Davida itum ngai thilhai chôi ngai, Hanania haiin an zuia; khan lekha irziaktu Ezra’n a hruaihaia:
Tuikuang lampui mikot an tungin, kul irphutna an maton tiang Davida khua luina tianga fe’n Davida in sak tiang an fea, sak tianga tui lampui dên thaiin.
Khan lômthu hril hrang pôl danghai chu anni don hrangin an fea, keima’n mipui a chimriphai le meipui sêmna in irsâng saka, kul irsa dênin kin zuia;
Efraima mikot chunga, Jeshana mikot chunga ngahai irlôina chunga, Hananela in irsâng le Hamea in irsâng chunga, kêlbelra mikot dên rakin: intângna in mikota khan an ngîra.
Khanchu lômthu hril hrang pâlhai pôl hnihai chu Pathian ina an ngîra, kei leh roirêltu a chimriphai leh,
Bekul chôi ochai Eliakima, Maaseia, Miniamina, Mikaia, Elioenaia, Zekaria, Hanania hai;
Maaseia, Semaia, Eleazara, Jehohanana, Malkija, Elama, Ezera hai khom. Khan, hla saktuhaiin an hruaitu Jezrahia haiin inring takin an saka.
Kha nî khan irbôlna a sate’n an inhlana, an râi a fân ta taka; Pathianin raifân theina a pêkhaia; nupang le nâipanghai khom an lôma; khanchu Jerusalem lômna chu ram hlatak ata an inhriata.

Kha nikhua khan chu tholômhai, ngaihoi thilinhlanhai, neinun vâng masa tak hai, sôma inkhat siana hmuna tentana hruaitu, dân ang taka an inkung, ochai le Levihai dongtum, khua tina a le’rchûtir hranga inkung an nia; Judahai chu sinthotu ochaihai le Levihai sikin an lôma,
Davida le a nâipa Solomona thupêk angin, hla saktu le mikot hrungtuhai khom an Pathian sintho hrang dân le irthiangtirna dân chu an zôma.
Tianlaia Davida le Asafa dam laia hlasak pâlhai hruaitu an oma, Pathian inpâkna le lômna hlahai an sak ngaia.

Zerubabela dam lai le Nehemia dam laiin Israel murdihaiin hla saktuhai le mikot hrungtuhai chu a nitina an irhoipui lamin thu an neia: khan Levihai dongtum chu a dangin a siaa; khan Levi haiin Arona nâipahai dongtum an indanglamtir pehaia.
Kha nî khan chu mipuihai mikuar inhriatin Mosia lekhabu a tepa; hi lai hin Amon mihai, Moab mihai chu Pathian mihai inkhômnaa khan itiklai khomin an iom thei hrang ni mah ti a chuanga.
Israel irchihai bai le tui khoma dôn loia, anni khomâksâm hranga Balaama an hmang sikin: khannisianlân kin Pathianin khomâksâmna chu satvurna an changtir pehaia.
Khanchu hiang hin a nia, dân an irngai zoiin chu Israel mihai laia lei irzêl tâkhai nam dang mihai an zenhaia.
Khan matona khan kin Pathian in tentan sûnga hruaituin a siahaia, ochai Eliasiba, Tobia tianga kop angin.

Maton tianga Levihai, hlasaktu hai, mikot hrungtuhai dongtum, baidi thilinhlan, mirimhoi, bêlbûr bu, sôma inkhat, uain le sahriak le ochaihai hranga ngaihoi thilinhlan an isiana ngai tentan lian tak kha Tobia hrangin a sinsiam pea.
Khannisian, kha thil a om laia khan, Jerusalema om ma unga, Babulon rêng Artazerzia kum sômthum kum hni an lal kumin rêng kuang ki fea, sûn iza zoia phalna ki zonga
khanchu Jerusalema ki fea, Pathian in irkul kholâia tentan sinsiama Tobia hrang Eliasiba’n thil saloi a itho kin hriata.
Ki milunghoi thei ta maka: khasikin Tobia in sûnga bungrua murdi, kha tentan ata kha kin thekpai pea.
Thu ki pêka, tentanhai an irthiala; khanchu Pathian ina bêlbûrhai chu baithep thil inhlan le mirimhoihai leh ki lâk lût nôka.
Khan Levihai le, hla saktuhai chu an dongtum an pêkhai no sikin, a ni loi lam tiang an rot tah ti kin hriata.
Khanchu roirêltuhai ki halhaia, “Itina mo Pathian ina khan a la irsam thei?” ki tia. Khanchu ki koibukhaia, an omna khan kin omtirhai nôka.
Khanchu Juda nâihai murdi’n bu, sôma inkhat, uainhai, sahriak hai, tholôm bukkhômna khan an hong chôia.

Khan ochai Selemia le lekha irziaktu Zadoka le Levihai laia Pedaia hai chu tholôm siakhômna hruaitu hrangin ki siamhaia; anni leh irhlet hrangin Matania nâi Zakura nâipa Hanana a oma: iamom taka irngai mi a nia, a sintho chu a urênghai laia thil sem ngai a ni.
O kin Pathian, hi thua hin nin hre mai ro, ki Pathian in le sin thôna hrangin ki sintho insahai chu ni pai pe no roh.

Kha laia khan Judai rama irngam nia uain tui sinhai, bumût hong pêl hai, grep, theipui le puakrikhai inpêltir hranga sakuartunga an isiam lai ki hmua, annihai kha irngam nî sûn Jerusalema an hong tungpuia, khan fâk hrang zuar mihai khan a dik loizia kin hriattira.
Tura rama mi, khataka omhai khomin ngahai le hmangrua tinrênghai an hong lâka, irngam ni sûna Juda mihai leh Jerusalema an zuara.
Khanchu Juda mi lianhai kha ki halhaia, “Irngam nî porinchetira thil saloi nin itho hi imo a omzia?

Nin pi le puhai khomin hiang hin an lei thoa, kin Pathianin hi thil saloi murdihai hi kin chunga le hi kho sûnga hin a hong intungtir nin isôn loi ma ni? khaang dôra irngam nî porinchetirin Israel mihai laia ningmurna nin ni la intungtir pe mai,” ki tia.

Khanchu hiang hi a nia, irngam nî a hong ni nôkin chu Jerusalem kul mikot a hong inthim nôka, khanchu mikothai khâr hrangin thu ki pêka, irngam nî a hek mâka chu inhong loi hrangin thu ki pêka; irngam nia an thil hong pêlhai an lâk thei loina hrangin ki ruatharte dônhai mikot kin hrungtirhaia.
Khanchu bepâr thohai le neinun zuar mihai chu voikhat, voihni vêl Jerusalem pên tiang an riaka.
Khanchu an dik loizia kin hriattirhaia, an kuang, “Ithoa mo kul kôla nin iriak? Hiang hin nin tho nôkin chu nin chunga ki kut la tha ki ti,” ki tia. Kha rengata chu irngam nî sûn chu hong ta mahai.
Khanchu Levihai chu irsinsiama, irngam nia irthiangtirna kul mikothai hrung hrangin thu ki pêka. O ki Pathian hi thua hin nin hre mai ro, ni lungkhamna zârin ni la hôiin lân.
Kha zoroa khan Juda mi, Asdod, nupanghai, Amon nupanghai, Moab nupanghai, dôngma neihai ki hmua;
an nâihai chu Asdod chongin an chonga, anni chong ti loiin chu Juda chong an irnghil ta.

Khan annihai kha ki halhaia, khomâk ki sâmhaia, senkhathai chu ki vîkhaia, an samhai kin potpai pehaia, an nâinuhai chu an nâihai pasal an inneitirhai loi hrangin, an nâipasalhai khomin dôngma nei ta loi hrangin Pathian irhmingin khomâk ki’rsâmtirhaia.

“Israel rêng Solomona khom khaanga thil sa tho’n a isual mo ni ma? khaang dôra tho khomin nam tamtak laia ama anga rêng om mahaia, a Pathianin a indit tak a la nia, Pathianin Israel ram murdi chunga rêngin a siama; khannisian ama ngêt khom kha ram dang nupangin an insiattir a ni.
Khasikin ram dang nupang luaa kin Pathian chunga thil saloi thoin, nin thu kin izôm hrang ma ni?,” ki tia.
Khanchu ochai inlal Eliasiba nâi, Joiada nâipa pasal khat chu Horan mi Sanbalata mâkpa a nia, khanchu ki makung ata ki’rzûlpaia.
O ki Pathian, ochai sin le ochai sintho hranga thuthung le Levihai thuthung an porinchetir sikin inhre pehai mai roh.
Khaang khan ram dang mihai ata ni’rthiangtirhai, ochaihai, Levihai sin thôna murdia sin tho hrang dân ki zêk pehaia.
A zoro ang taka thil inhlan hrang le, chîmu vâng masa inhlan hranghai le, o ki Pathian a satna lam takin nin hre mai roh.
Reng Ahasuera’n India ram rengata Sudan dênin ram bial, irzakhat sômhni sari chunga roirêltu a chang laia hi thil hi a hong itung a ni.
Kha laia khan rêng chu Susa khopuia a oma.
Reng a chang kum thumna khan a rama mi lianhai, a sinthotuhai Persia le Media sipai hruaituhai, bial tina ram optuhai le rêng nâihai le mi felhai ta hrangin hruai an thêa.
Tha ruk sûng a ram roiinpui taka a’rchongzia, an lalzia le a neinungziahai an entira.
Kha zoia chu a omna khopui Susa khuaa a fea, mi lian le mi chînhai ta hrangin rêng irhuan sûng tuallaia sûn sari hruai an thê nôka.

Kha khan puan ngoi, puan duk, puan sendukhai an zâra, a zârna hruihrual chu sâilungvâr chopuia tangkarua suankuala khan puanirnêm an thunga. Rângachak le tangkaruaa siam toihmunhai chu siam irfûk an nia; a tualzôla khan sâilungvâr hai, lunghlu chi dang dang a sen, a êm, a dukinpôlhai an dâp saa.
An zû semna khilât chu rângachak khilât a ni, an khilât kha chi dang dang a ni; rêngin uain chu tamtakin a pêkhaia.
A in lam dân khom bituk ual om ma, tukhom an nuam ang taka in intirhai hrangin rêngin a siahlohai chu a ihril diamhai a ni.
Rengnu Vasti khomin rêng Ahasuera in danga nupanghai ta bîk hrangin hruai an thea.
Sûn sari nia chu, uain sikin rêng lungrîl a hong lôm tâka, khanchu, thainuzel sarihai Mehumana, Biztha, Harbona, Bigthana, Abagtha, Zethara, Karkasa ama siahlo bîkhai chu a koihaia.
Rengnu Vasti chu a rênglukhum khum pumin va hruai hrangin a tîrhaia. Rengnu chu nu hmêl satak a ni, a hmêl sa lam chu a mi lianhai le a mikhual murdihai inentir a itum a ni.
Reng thupêk an inhrila rêngnu Vasti chu fe nuam ta maka. Reng chu a sân a ning an mur tâka.
Renghaiin dân le an fepui hrang lam chungchânga dân inhriat mihai an irdon infel ngai. Khasikin, rêng Ahasuera khomin dân inhriat mi a koihaia.
A ikoihai chu Karsena, Sethara, Admatha, Tarsisa, Maresa, Marsena, Memukana, Persia le Media rama milian, rêng kôla om ngaihai an ni.

Rengin, “Kei, rêng Ahasuera’n ki siahlohai kha rêngnu Vasti ki van koitirhaia, ama khan ki thu kha lei pom maka. Hi ang chungchânga ei ram dân hi i ma ni, itina tho hrang ma ni?” tiin anni chu a’rdonhaia.
Memukana’n rêng le mi lian danghai makunga, “Rengnu Vasti hin rêng vai hi a hnuaisia ni maka, a rama mi lianhai le ram pumpui sûnga pahai khom hi a ihnuaisia a ni.
Rengnu thiltho dân hi nuhaiin an inhriat tika an pasalhai hnuaisia an ti, ‘Reng Ahasuera’n rêngnu Vasti a koi khomin fe nuam mah kha te;’ ti an ti.
Misa tâk mân Persia le Media rama mi lian dôngmahai khomin rêngnu om dân an inhriatin an pasalhai thu zôm no nihaia, pahai chu an ninginmur a ti.

Rengin sa a tiin chu rêngnu Vasti hin, ‘Reng hmêl hmu viat ta no ni,’ tiin rêng thupêk insua roh. Thûl nôk thei viat chi ni mah tiin Persia le Media dân bua irziak ni ri se. Rêngin a rêngnu nina hi ama nêka sa ual nei nôk ri se.
Kha thupêk kha ni ram irzat taka khan inpuang a ni zoia chu nuhaiin an pasalhai chu an inriang mo, an irchong mo mahrip tho an ti,” a tia.
Reng le mi lianhaiin kha kha sa an iti tâk a nia, Memukana iti angin rêngin a tho tâka.
A ram bial tina, kha bial chong le horop hmangin thupêk a sem indarh tâka; “In sûngkua tina pa hi an laltak ni a ta, a thu chu zôm ving hrang a ni,” tiin.
Reng kha a ninginmurna a dâi hnung khomin Vasti thiltho dân le a chungchânga thupêk om chu a ngaitua maia.
Reng sinthotuhaiin rêng kuang, “Reng ta hrangin dôngmate irthiang, hmêl satak zong ni ri se.

Bial tina hruaitu inkung sian, anni’n bial tina dôngmate hmêl sa zong suakhai sianlân, hi khopui Susa khuaa rêng ina hong hruai khôm ri sehai. Reng ina nupanghai omna tentan enkoltu, thainuzel Hagaia kuang honghai sianlân, irvô dân irchû ri sehai.
Khanchu dôngmate ni indit tak inthang ni ta, Vasti irthûla rêngnu’n siam ni ti,” an tia. Rengin sa a tia, khaang khan an tho tâka.
Susa khopuia khan Juda mi Zaira nâipa Mordekaia a oma, Benjamina nama Kisa nâipa Simeia irchia mi a ni.
Babulon rêng Nebukadnezara’n Jerusalem ata Judai rama rêng Jehoiakina leh mi a ichelhai sala a hruaihai lai khan Mordekaia khom hi a kop sa.
A pa tianga nu le pa murdi an thi tâk sikin an nâinu Estheri, Hebrai chonga Hadasa an iti chu, a donsui inliana, ama nâinu ang dênin a ienkol a ni, dôngmate hmêl satak a ni.
Reng thupêk an inpuang zoia chu Susa khopuia Hagaia enkol hrangin dôngmate tamtak an hong hruai zut zuta. Estheri khom rêng ina nupanghai omna tentan enkoltu, Hagaia kuang an hruai sa tâka.

Nupang hmêl satak a nia, a lei indot tak taka. a irvôna hrang chu a pêk zut zuta, fâk nêk tui tak tak a pêka, ama sinthotu hrang le ama irvôtir hrangin rêng ina dôngmate sari an thang saa. Reng ina nupang omna hmun hoi taka a siahlohai leh an omtir tâka.
Estheri’n tu nam mo a ini, tu in sûngkua mo a ini ite hril ma; Mordekaia’n hril loi hrangin a khap ngit sikin.
Estheri kha imo a itho, itin mo a hong om ngai, ti inhre hrangin a nitin rêng ina nupanghai omna tentan mikota khan Mordekaia chu a fe mai ngai.

Reng dôngma hrang chu irvôna zoro ringot khom kum khat a nang ngai. Tha ruk sûng chu Mura hriak an irpola; kha zoia tha ruk sûng ngêt sahriak mirimhoi chi dang dang an irpol nôk ngai. Khaanga an irvô zoia vai khan rêng kuang an ife thei ngai a ni.
Reng makunga an fe’n chu nupang omna tentan sûnga an indit tak an hruai sa ngai.
Zân tiang rêng makunga an hruaia, zînga rêng dôngmahai omnaa thainuzel Saazgasa kuta an sia ngai. Rengin a nuama, ar hminga a koi no’n chu rêng makunga fe nôk ta ngai mah.

Khanchu, Estheri chu rêng makunga fe zoro a hong tung tâka. Estheri hi Mordekaia irkaipui Abihaila nâinu a nia, ama nâinu angin a idonsui tâk a ni. Estheri chu rêng makunga fe a hong chuk tikin, nupang omna tentan enkoltu Hagaia’n a ruk tôkin a’rvotira, a hmu murdi’n a sân a hmêl a sa an tia.
Reng Ahasuera, kum sari an lal kum, tha sômna, Tebet tha khan Estheri chu rêng makunga an hruaia.
Rengin dôngmate dang danghai nêkin Estheri chu an dita, an renin lung an kham bîka, rênglukhum an khumtira, Vasti irthûla rêngnu’n a sia tâka.

Khan, rêng khan a rênghai le a siahlohai murdi ta hrangin, hruai roiinpui tak Estheri hruaithe kha a siam tâka, a ram puipuia mihai ta hrangin irngam nî sûn a siam tâka, rêng tikhoina ang takin lômmanhai khom a pêk saa.
Rengin Mordekaia chu sorkâr sin liantak an sintir tâka.
Estheri chu Juda mi a nih ti tukhom inhril maka, Mordekaia’n tûte hril loi hranga a iti kha, a nâipangte ata a thu a izôm ngai ang khan a la zôm mai a ni.
Mordekaia chu rêng ina sorkâr sin liantak rêngin an sintir sikin rêng in mikot nghâktu thainuzel inhni Bigthana le Teresa haiin rêng Ahasuera chunga an nuara, rêng chu that an tum tâka.
Kha thil kha Mordekaia’n inrûkin an hriata, rêngnu Estheri chu an hrila; khanchu, Estheri’n Mordekaia irhmingin rêng an hril nôka.
Thil omdân an suisuak infela, kha kha a dik a ni sikin, an ruaiin an inkhâi thathai tâka. Kha thu kha rêng irsinsiana bua an irziak inlût tâk a ni.
Kha zoia chu Agag mi Hamedata nâipa Hamana chu rêng Ahasuera’n ngîrhmun irsânga a siaa, hruaitu murdi chunga a sia ta.
Reng thupêk angin rêng ina sintho murdi’n Hamana chu khûksadelin chubai mûka, inzâ hrang a ni. Mi tinin chubai an mûka, Mordekaia vaiin mûk mah.
Reng ina sinthotuhaiin Mordekaia kuang, “Reng thupêk hi itina mo ni izôm nuam loi?,” an tia.

Reng thupêk chu zôm ngêt hrangin an inhrila, khannisian, Mordekaia’n, “Juda ki nia, Hamana makunga kûn thei no ning,” a tia. Khanchu Mordekaia om dân chu ar ngai thei mo, irngai thei ma moh ti inhriatna hrangin Hamana chu an inhril tâka.
Mordekaia chu Hamana makunga kûn nuam maka, chubai khom mûk nuam mah ti Hamana’n an hriatin chu a ning an mur ok tâka,
khan, Mordekaia chu Juda mi a nih ti an hriatin Mordekaia vai ni loiin Persia rama Juda om murdi chu that ving a tum tâka.

Ahasuera rêng a changna kum sômhleihnina tha masa tak, Nisan tha khan Hamana tho tum irchûtirna hrangin i nikhua le i tha mo a isatak hrang tih inhriatna hrangin tâ an sâna; kha tasân nî chu zoro’nchum tak angin an bêa.

Hamana’n rêng kuang, “Ni ram sûnga hmun dang danga nam inkhat irzep an oma, bial tina an om indarh a ni. Nam dang dân ang ni loi, an binga dân bîk an neia, a ram dân khom zôm nuam mahai. Annihai hi an om maiin chu nangma hrangin sa no ni.
Rengin, sa a ti’n chu thathai zit hrangin thupêk insua ri se. Khaang takin ni tho’n chu ni ram opna hrangin rêng suma tangkarua nuai thum le sîng minli her nang pe thei ki ti,” a tia.
Thupêk inpuang namindetna kutsabi chu rêngin a lâka, Judahai râlpa Agag mi Hamedata nâipa Hamana chu a pêka.
“Mipuihai leh an sum chu ni kuta nang ki pêk ta, ni nuamlam ang takin tho ro,” a tia.

Tha masa tak tarik sômkhat inthum nî khan rêng lekha irziaktuhai chu Hamana’n a koihaia, rêng thupêk inpuang chu a’rziaktira, a ram sûnga chong chi tinrêng le an horop hmangin ar hlettirhai zôia, rêng irthûla, ram optuhai le roirêltuhai kuang rêng kutsabi lekha a irbela thon suak hrangin ar siam tâka.

Ram pumpui sûnga bial tina, rêng thupêk chu an thon suaka. Kha thupêk kha, kha nikhua ngêt, tha sômhleihni, Adar tha, tarik sômhleiminli nî hmang hrang a ni. Juda mi murdi, vânglai le tarhai, nupang nâipang that zit hrang le, neinunhai khom lapai pehai zit hranga thupêk a ni.
Bial tinin kha thupêk kha tepsuak zit hrang a ni, a zoro taka, thupêk lam ang takin an tho theina hrangin.
Susa khopuia khom thupêk kha rêngin an puangtira; bial dang danga khom lekha chu an intânpuia. Reng le Hamana chu zu an in mai lai takin Susa khuaa mi chu an char a dong zit tâka.
An thiltho dân murdi kha Mordekaia’n an hriatin chu a puan an potthêra, bora puan a sila a lua irvut ar pola, beidong takin a chap ngûi ngûia; kha sûnga khan khua chu ar fanga,
Reng in tual lûtna mikot chu a va tunga; bora puan sil chu tûte inlûttir phal ngai mahai sikin, rêng in tual sûnga khan lût mah.
Ram bial tina rêng thupêk an inpuangna hmun tina, Judahai chu an chap mur mura; bu an ngheia, mi tamtak chu bora puan silin irvut an irthua.
Mordekaia omdân chu siahlo dôngmatehai le thainuzel saihaiin Estheri chu an hong inhrila, rêngnu chu a bêi an dong tâka, bora puan khekpaia a sil hrang puan dang Mordekaia chu a pêka, lei nuam maka.
Ama enkoltu hranga rêngin thainuzel sai inkhat a inkung pe, Hathaka chu a koia, thil omzia irdon infel hrangin Mordekaia kuang a tîra.
Hathaka chu rêng in lûtna mikot tuala khan a va suaka.
Mordekaia’n thil omdân murdi chu a lei inhrila, Judahai that zit an niin chu rêng sum bakota hin Hamana’n sum tamtak thun lût hrang a tum thuhai khom a lei inhrila.
Judahai thatna hranga thupêk Susa khopuia an inpuangna lekha irziak khom Hathaka a pêka. Mordekaia’n lekha chu Estheri pe hrangin a ngêna, thil om dân murdi a hril pe zita.
Hathaka’n kha chong kha a van tungtira.
Estheri’n hianga thu hi Mordekaia inhril hrangin Hathaka a tîr nôka.
