Mihriam mani, ramsa mani khom, kha khan inlôi thei ni no nihai, kum sômminli sûng chu tûte lua thei ni no ni.

Aigupta ram chu rammual pumpui sûnga ram inpon takin siam ki ta, kum sômminli sûng chu Aigupta rama khopuihai chu omin siat chian a ti. Khopui danghai nêkin siat ual a ti. Aigupta mihai chu invâitirhai ki ta, ram tina rotin, nam tinhai laia inomtirhai ki ti,” a tia.
Khan
An irzirna hmun Aigupta ram sim tiang khan inomtirhai nôk ki ti. Khataka khan inriang takin om an ti.
Itiklai khom ram danghai chunga roirêl ta no nihaia, ircham boi dapin siamhai ki ta, tu ram khom an ircham hnuaia inomtir thei ni ta no ni.
Israel khom changpuina zongin irhnêl ta ngai no nihai, Aigupta ngîrhmun siatzia khan Israelhaiin anni lei irhnêl kha a dik loizia inhriattir ni tah a ti. Khanchu Israela’n
Khan kin sal intângna kum sômhni kum hnina, a tha khatna sûn khatna nî khan,

“Mihriam nâipa, Babulon rêng Nebukadnezara chu Tura doi hrangin ar siam tâka. A sipaihai chu puakrik inpêltirhaiin, an lu kol rakin le an dârhai inlông rakin an oma. Khannisian rêng le sipaihai khan Tura rengata ite an sôlna man hmu mahai.
Khasikin atûn, kei
Keima ta hranga sin a lei thôna sikin, Aigupta ram chu pe ki ti. Kei
“Kha thilhai kha a tung tena chu, Israel mihai chu inhrâttirhai ki ta, khanchu nang Ezekiela mi tinin nang an inhriat theina hrangin thu nang inhril ki ta, khanchu
Khan
“Mihriam nâipa,
Sûn ichiom tak a tung ta!
Nikhua chu anai ta,
nam tin ta hranga sûmpui zîngna nikhua le buaina nikhua chu.
Aigupta rama irdoi om a ta,
ram chu longindarin om a ta,
insiat chita mâksanin om a ti.
“Kha irdoina khan Ethiopia ram, Ludia ram, Libna ram, Arabia ram le Kub ram ata sipai hmang laihai le, ki mihai lai ata khom thi sa an ti,” a tia.
Khan,
Khan, kha ram kha rammual pumpui laia ram inpon tak ni a ta, khopuihai chu insiata masan ni a ti.
Khan, Aigupta ram chu ki hâla, a hrungtuhai ki thathai tena chu,

Kha nikhua kha a hong tunga, Aigupta ram insiatpaiin a om tena chu, mihai chu irkuanga tîrhaiin, Ethiopia rama lungthitaka omhai kuang khan thurchi saloi chu inhretirhai ki ta, irthatâk vîkin om an ti, kha nikhua kha hong tung hrang a ni ta,” a tia.
Khan,
Ama le a sipai nunsiathai chu zuang an ta, ram chu insiatpai chit an ta, Aigupta chu khandai leh doi an ta, mithi ruakin a ram chu sip zoi a ti.
Nail vadung chu inkangtir ki ta, mi pualoihai kuta Aigupta chu sia ki ti. Khan, ram dang mihaiin a ram murdi chu insiatpai chit an ti. Kei
Khan
Sim tianga Aigupta ram chu ramchitin siam ki ta, hmâr tianga Zoan khopui chu meiin hâlpai ki ti. Khan, Thebes khopui chu hrem sa ki ti.
Khan ki ningmurna chu Aigupta rama khopui kul nei Pelusium chunga bunthuan ki ta, Thebes irchonhai chu insiatpai ki ti.
Aigupta ram chu hâl ki ta, Pelusium chu dengthei takin om an ti. Thebes banghai chu insimpai ni a ta, khopui chu tuiin sip a ti.
Heleopolis le Bubastis khopuia ruathartehai chu irdoinaa thi an ta, khan mi danghai chu sala hruaiin om an ti.
Aigupta sinthotheina le a hrâtna an irsorpui ngai kha kin boipai tena chu Tahfanes chu inthimin bôm ta a ti. Aigupta chu sûmin bôm a ta, khopuia mi murdihai chu sala hruaiin om an ti.
Khan Aigupta chu hiang hin ki hrem tena chu,
Khan kin sal intângna, a kum sômhleikhatna tha khat le sûn sari nî khan
“Mihriam nâipa, Aigupta rêng kut chu kin khiakpai tâka, a dam nôka khandaihai ar lên thei nôkna hrangin tukhomin thil a ngar zât leh tuam pe mahai.
Khasikin atûn
Aigupta mihai chu rammual pumpuia hin irthekindartirhai ki ti.
Khanchu Babulon rêng kuthai chu inhrâttir ki ta, ki khandai chu a kuta sia ki ti. Khannisian Aigupta rêng bânhai chu inkhiakpai pe ki ti, a râlhai makunga khêkin thi a ti.
A ni, ama chu indoktir ki ta, Babulon rêng chu inhrâttir ki ti. Ki khandai chu ama ki pêka, Aigupta ram tiang an lek tena chu mi tinin
Aigupta mihai chu rammual pumpuia hin irthekindartirhai ki ta, khanchu
Khan kin sal intângna kum sômhleikhatna, a tha thumna a sûn khat nî sûn khan,
“Mihriam nâipa, Aigupta rêng le a mipuihai kuang khan hiang hin hril ro:
Ni sintho theizia hi ar sâng zâp na!
I leh mo nang ki ihrilkhî ta hrang?
Lebanon Sidar thing ang ni nia,
ôn irbuk le enhoi tak nei,
sûm tôn phâk raka thingkung ang chu ni ni.
A’rsônna hrangin tui a tama,
ama infâna hrangin tuirîlpût a tama,
thing môngna hmun kha tui leh an inzotir maia.
Khan rampui sûnga thing murdihai ta hrang khan tuidunghai a om saa.
Ama chu sataka tui hmu’n a oma,
thingkung danghai nêkin ar sâng uala,
a ônhai khom sei le liantak tak a ni.
Chunglêng va chi tinrêngin a ôna khan irbu an kai ngaia,
ramsahai chu a ôn hnuaihai khan an têhai an lêng ngai;
rammuala nam tinhai chu a dâihlîm hnuaia khan an irngam ngai.
Kha thing kha en a hoiin,
ôn sei takhai lâkin, irsâng tak a nia;
a’rzunghai chu irnêng rîla tui luanghai dênin a phâka.
Pathian irhuana Sidar kung danghai leh hrilirkhî thei ni maka,
meisâr kung rêng rêngin khaanga ônhai kha la nei ngai mahai,
Tângêm kunghai khomin a ônhai lua pha mahai.
pathian irhuan thingkunghai lua’n a satna kha pha mahai.
Keiin enhoitak le ôn irzat takhai neiin ki siama.
Pathian irhuan Edena thingkung murdihaiin ama chu an hnarsa ngaia.
“Khasikin atûn, kha thingkungin sûmhai a phâk mân tena irsôna a om chunga khan i zât thil mo a tung hrang ti hi kei
Khasikin ki hnôlpai tâka, ram dang mi roirêltu kuta pe ki ti. Ama’n kha thingkung kha a pualoina dungzuiin a chunga thil tho a ti.
Ram dang mi lungkham boihaiin phûrin masan rak an ta, a ônhai le a suamhai chu tâng tin le phâizôl tin chunga khan tâkin om a ti; a dâihlîm hnuaia nam tin omhai chu rot ta an ti.
Vatehai chu hongin thing kiak sai chunga khan hong chuang an ta, ramsahai khom a ônhai khan inlôi an ti.

Khasikin atûn ata chu thingkung murdi, savinga tui leh donsui khom ni sian, kha tânga khan sei thei ta no nia, a’rzîk khomin sûm dênin sei ta no ni. An rêngin anni chu mihriamhai anga thi hrang an nia, mithi khua lei fe tâkhai zu zompuihai an ti,” a tia.
Khan,

Mithi khuaa ki tîr tena chu, a’rtetna irhâi khan nam tinhai chu inthingtir a ti. Khan Edena thingkung murdihai le, Lebanon-ah thing sa, tui leh donsui inliana omhai, irnêng hnuai tianga fe tâkhai kha a’rtetna sika khan an râiinfântir an ti.
Ama le anni chu mithi khuaa irteta lei om tâkhai zompui hrangin fe an ta, an irhlîm hnuaia om murdihai chu, nam tinhai laia irthekindarin om a ti.

“Thingkung kha Aigupta rêng le a mipuihai chu an nia, Edena thinghai lua khaanga irsâng le milung lâk kha om mahai; khannisian atûn chu, Eden irhuana thinghai ang khan, Pathian nei loihai le irdoina khan ithata lei om tâkhai zom hrangin mithi khuaa fe ta a ti, keiin ki iti a ni,”
Khan kin sal intângna a kum sômhleihnina tha sôm tha hnina sûn khat nî khan

“Mihriam nâipa, Aigupta rêng kha irningchaka om hrangin hrilin lân, hi thu hi a kuang inhretir roh. Namhai laia kâmkeibaknei angin ni oma, khannisian tuidunga tui irsoktir ngai Ole kêng ni ipua ual. Ni kehai leh khan tui innimtirin tuidung ni porinchetira.
Khanchu nam tamtakhai an irbûm tika, ki lên leh nang khum ki ta, anni’n muanga nang kêlsua an ti.
Khanchu tânga nang dêngzuan rak ki ta, rammuala chunglêng vahai le ramsa murdihai chu nangma nang fa hrangin hong tuanghai ki ti.
Tâng sîpa khan ni hme sia ki ta, irhôrhai ni’rngê’n sip zit a ti.
Ni thisen chu tâng chunghaia irthekindarin a om mân ten le tuidunghai a luang sip mâka chu bunthuan ki ti.
Khan, nang kin boipai tena chu, irvân chu inkhumpai ki ta, ârsihai khom inthimtir ki ti. Misa chu sûmin irkhum a ta, tha khomin a vâr insua thei no ni.
Irvâna vâr murdihai inthimtir ki ta, hi rammual chunga hin inthim inlêngtir ki ti. Kei
Ni la inhriat viat ngai loi ramhai laia ni siatna thu hi ki hril indarh tena chu, a sân a poi ti an ti.

Ni chunga ki sintho hranghai hin nam tam takhai khom la kamang zoi an ta, ki khandai kin lek tika chu rênghai chu chipumin inthing an ti. Ni tûk nî tena chu, an rêngin mâni hringna chunga chitinrîmin lan thing an ti,” a tia.
Khan
Nam pualoi sipaihai chu an khandai inkêlsuatirhai ki ta, ni mipui murdihai inthattirhai ki ti. Ni mipuihai le ni omlianpui danghai le insiat ving ni a ti.
Tui kôla ni sa murdihai chu invât tôlhai ki ta, mihriam mani, sa mani khom tui innimtir hrangin om ta no nihai.
Ni tuihai chu invârtirin, ni tuidunghai chu damzanin inluangtirhai ki ti, kei
Aigupta ram chu inpôntir chit ki ta, khataka omtuhai kha kin boipaihai tena chu,
Hi irdînna thu hi chûlpuina hla chang a ta, nam tina nupanghaiin Aigupta le a mipuihai chûlpuina’n la sak an ti, kei
Khan kin sal intângna kum sômhleihnina tha khatna sûn sôm hleiringana nî khan
“Mihriam nâipa, Aigupta rama, mi murdihai hi chûlpuihai ro, nam sinthotheihai le anni chu mithi khuaa tîrpaihai roh.
An kuang hiang hin hril ro:
Mi danghai nêka a sa ualin ni irbe ma ni?
Mithi khuaa fe ni ta,
khataka khan Pathian boihai leh zâlsuam nin ti.
“Aigupta mihai chu irdoia thata omhai leh khan tûk suam an ti, anni thatpaina hrangin khandai chu irfûk diam a ni ta.

Aigupta mihai chu, mi hrât takhai le Aigupta mihai lei san ngaitu khan mithi khuaa an lei lôm inlûthaia, Pathian inhriat ngai loi irdoinaa thata omhai chu hitaka hin an zuang chum tâka. A ni ‘hitaka hin an zâl ta,’ tiin an khêka.
“Assuria chu a kôlvêla sipaihai thân le hlataka khan a oma, an rêngin irdoina khan that an ni.

Khan an thânhai chu mithi khua kilkhôr taka khan a oma, a sipaihai chu irdoina khan thatin an oma, a thân lung chu an thân lunghaiin ar hual khaka, khannisian tiana khan chu mihriamhai rama chitna lei inomtirtu chu a ni.

Elama chu a kôla a sipaihai thân leh khan a oma, an rêngin irdoina khan that an nia, sertan loi lei fe tâkhai mithi khuaa khan an fe tâka. An hring lai khan chitna chu an intungtir ngaia, khannisian atûn chu hmâimôkna thiin an zâl tâka, irdoina thata omhai itong ang kha an tong tâk.

Elama chu irdoinaa thata lei omhai kâra khan a zâl tâka, a kôlvêla khan a sipaihai thân khom kha a oma. An rêngin sertan loi an nia, an rêngin irdoinaa thata om an ni. An hring lai khan chitna chu an inzaptira, khannisian atûn chu hmâimôk taka thiin an zâl tâka, irdoinaa thata omhai itong ang kha an tong ta.

“Khan Meseka le Tubala khom an kôlvêla sipaihai thân le, khataka khan an oma, an rêngin sertan loi an nia, irdoina hmuna ithata om an ni. Khannisian matona khan chu mihriamhai rama chitna lei inomtirtu an ni.

Anni chu tiana mi hrâthai, an luthun hnuaia khandai siaa, an rôp chunga an phohai siain, râltukfam irkip le mithi khuaa lei fe tâkhai ang khan chôiindômna pêka thâna phûmin om mahai. Hi mi hrâthai hi tiana chu mihriamhai rama chitna inlêngtir thei khopin sinthotheina an lei nei ngai a ni.
Khaang khan Aigupta mihai chu sertan loi irdoinaa thata lei om tâkhai laia khan zâlin om an ti.
“Edom chu khataka khan rêng le roirêltuhai leh an oma. Anni chu sipai hrât takhai an nia, khannisian atûn chu irdoinaa thata omhai, sertan loihai le mithi khuaa zâlin an om ta.

Khanchu hmâr tianga roirêltu murdihai le, Sidon mihai khom chu khataka khan an oma, tiana khan chu an sinthotheina khan chitna an lêngtir ngaia, khannisian atûn chu hmâimôka omin irdoina thata omhai leh khan sertan loiin an zâl tâka. Mithi khuaa hmâimôk tuanga omtuhai hmâimôkna chu anni khomin an tong sa tâka.
“Hi thil murdihai hin, irdoina thata omhai kha Aigupta rêng le a sipaihai ta hrangin lungngam chu ni ta a ti,”
Khan
Khan
“Mihriam nâipa, ni mipuihai kuang khan, ‘Hi ram doi hrang hin râlhai sipai ki hong tuanghai tena chu, kha rama mihai khan an laia mi inkhat chu enkoltu ni hrangin inthangsuak ri sehai.
Khan, râl honghai a hmu tena chu bekul tum sianlân, mi tin irningchakin om ri sehai.
Khan mi’n an hriata, khannisian uksak loiin a oma, râlhai chu hongin ama an thata ni’n chu a thina chungthua ama’n mophur a ti.
A thina chu a binga an châina sika a ni, irning hranga hrila a omna kha a uksak no sikin. Lei uksak sianlân chu a izôk thei hrang a nia.
A hrungtu khan râl honghai chu a hmua, khannisian bekul kha tum loiin râlhai kha hongin mi sualhai kha lei that tahai sian, an thina chungthua a hrungtu kha theiloi inchangtir ki ti.
“Khasikin mihriam nâipa Israel nam ta hrangin a hrungtu’n nang ki isiam a ni. Ni kuanga irning hranga thu ki ihrilhai kha anni chu inhrilhai ngêt roh.

Khan mi pualoi chu thi hrangin kin puanga, khannisian nangma’n a hringna saninzôka a om theina hrangin a lampuihai masan hrangin nin hril noa ni’n chu ama sualna khan thi a ta, khannisian a thisen mô chu nangma kuang zong ki ti.
Khan mi pualoi chu nir kôka, khannisian a sual thohai chu a mong noa ni’n chu, a sualna khan thi a ta, khannisian nangma hringna chu inzôkin om a ti,” a tia.
Khan
Khan an kuang khan

Khasikin atûn, o mihriam nâipa, Israel mihai kuang khan hiang hin hril ro: Mi fel kha sual a sina niin chu, a thil lei tho insahai khan saninzôk hliak ual no ni. Khan mi pualoiin a sintho pualoihai a mâksana ni’n chu, ama chu hremin om no nia, khan mi felin sual a sina ni’n chu, a hringna chu inzôk ni no ni.

Khan mi fel kuang hringna pe hrangin chonginkungna chu ki nei theia, khannisian tiana a sin sa lei thohai kha a ruk tôka inhriatin, sual a thoa ni’n chu, a sintho insahai kha inhre mai ta no ning, ama chu a sualna khan thi a ti.
Mi pualoi chu thi hrangin ki’rkôk theia, khannisian a sual sinhai mongin a dik le a fel a thoa ni’n chu,

entîrna hrangin, lakâi lâkna hranga bândaa thil a ilâkhai kha inkhîr nôkin, neinun a inrûkhai kha pêkkîr nôkin, a thil sual thohai chu mongin, hringna hmuna dânhai a zômin chu, ama chu thi no nia, hringin om mai a ti.
A sual thohai chu ngaidam ki ta, ama chu thil sa le thildik a thôna sikin hring a ti.
“Khan ni mipuihaiin, ki thil thohai hi dik mah an ti ngaia, khannisian anni lampui hro kha kêng a idik loi chu a ni.
Mi felin sin sa sin a monga, sin siat a thoa ni’n chu, ama chu a sualna sika khan thi a ti.
Khan mi sualin a sin siat thohai a monga, thil sa le thil dik a thoa ni’n chu, a hringna chu inzôk a ti.
Khannisian o Israel ki thil thohai hi dik mah nin ti ngaia, nin sintho angin nin chunga roirêl hrang ki ni,” a tia.
Khan, kin sal intângna kum sômhleihnina tha sômna, sûn ringa nî khan Jerusalem ata zôk, mi inkhat chu ki kuang a hongin, khopui chu a tûk ta tiin a ni hong hrila.
Khan a hong mân nia khohloi tiang khan
Khan

“Mihriam nâipa, Israel rama khopui siata om mihai khan hiang hin an tia. ‘Abrahama kha mi inkhat dok a nia, ram murdi hi ama chu pêkin a oma, atûn chu tamtak ei ni tâka, khasikin ram hi ei ta a ni tâka,’ an tia.
Khan, kei
Nin khandaihai nin songa, nin sinthohai hi a porinchea mi tin le nin uirea, i zât thil ngânin mo ram hi nin ta a nih tia nangni a inngaituatir?
“Khan an kuang hiang hin ti pehai ro, kei
Ram chu inpon chitin siam ki ta, an irsorpui ngai sinthotheinahai khom kha hek ta a ti, Israel rama tânghai chu ramsêt inchangtir ki ta, khataka khan mi tukhom inlôi thei no nihai.
An sualnahai sikin, mipuihai ki hrema, ram chu kin pontir chit tena chu,
Khan

Khasikin ki mipuihai chu i thu mo ni ihril hrang tih irngai hrangin an irbûm ngai, khannisian tho hranga ni ihrilhai chu tho ngai mahai. Ni thuhai chu hla papai angin an bêa, khannisian an huatirhamna lampuihaia khan an fe mai ngai.
Anni ta hrangin nang chu irdit hla saktu, serânda âttu, tufiam thotu ang ni nia, ni thuhai chu an irngaia, khannisian inkhat lua zôm ngai mahai.
Khannisian ni thuhai kha a tung irkip ving tena chu an laia deipu chu a om ti inhre suak ta an ti,” a tia.
Khan
“Mihriam nâipa, Israel roirêltuhai kha theiloi inchangtirhai roh. An kuang thu hrilin lân, kei
Nangni’n chu irhnutui nin ina, samul silkaihai nin irbela, belra satakhai chu thatin nin fâk ngai, khannisian belrahai chu donsuihai ngai mak chêi.

A’rzalhai donsui ngai loiin, dam loihai khom indamtir tum ngai mak chêia, a pop a liamhai khom tuam pehai loiin, ar hmanghai khom zonghai ngai mak chêi, a rothai khom hruai kîrhai loiin. Nunsia takin kêng nin ilohai ngai.
Belrahai khan belrapu an nei no sikin an irthekindara, ramsahaiin thatin an fâkhai ngai.
Khasikin belrahai chu tâng irsânghai le mualhaia an lêng indara, irnêng chung murdia hin irthekindarin an oma, tukhomin anni chu enin zongsuak khom tum mahai.
“Khasikin, atûn, o nangni belrapuhai, kei

Pathian hring ki ini ang hin nangni ki ti, ki chong hi irngai unglân, khanchu nin ta hrangin sa a ti. Ki belrahai chu belrapu an nei no sikin, ramsahaiin thatin an fâkhai ta a ni. Ki belrapuhai lakin zongsuak tum mahaia. Anni vai an irdonsuia, belrahai chu uksak viat mahai.
Khasikin, o nangni belrapuhai, ki thu hi irngai roi.
Kei
“Kei
Belrapu’n a belra irthekindarhai bukkhôma a idonsui nôkhai angin donsuihai ta ki ti. Kha inthim le sûm zîng nia an inthekindarna hmunhai ata kha hruai kîrhai nôk ki ti.
Ram dang ata kha hruaisuakhaiin bukhai ki ta, an rama ngêt hruai kîrhai ki ti. Tânghai le Israel rama ivadunga hruaihai ki ta, hloi hring hmun hoitaka hruaihaiin infâhai ki ti.
Tâng chunga durba omna hmuna le irhôrhai le Israel ram murdia hloi hring hmunhaia lungthi takin fâk nêk inzongtirhai ki ti.
Keima ngêt hi belrahai belrapu chu ki ni, an ta hrangin irngam hmun zong pehai ki ti, kei

A lei irhmang tâkhai chu zonghai ki ta, a rothai khom hruai kîrhai ki ta, a pop a liamhai khom tuam pehai ki ta, dam loia omhai chu indamtirhai ki ti. Khannisian a dam le a marhai chu inboipaihai ki ti, thil dik tho ngai belrapu chu ki ni sikin.
“Khasikin atûn chu, o ki belrahai kei

Khan nin laia senkhathai chu durba satakhai nin fâk khomin, nin milung chuk hliak maka, nin ifâk loihai ten khom kha nin chîl insiatpai ngai, tui irthianghai nin in ngaia, nin iin loi ten khom kha nin innimtir ngai.
Ki belra danghai khan durba nin ichîl insiathai le tui nin innimtirhai kha an fâkin an in a ni hi.
“Khasikin atûn, kei
A dam loihai chu nin naminzuanhai ngaia, a pâl lai ata a bingin nin siahai ngai.
Khannisian ki belrahai chu saninzôkhai ki ta, nuamninga loin inomtirhai ta no ning. Ki belrahai chu inkha khatin an chungthu rêl ki ta, a sahai chu a siathai lai ata a bingin sehai ki ti.
Khanchu ki sinthotu Davida anga rêng inkhat an belrapu hrangin pehai ki ta, ama’n anni chu donsuihai a ti.
Kei
Lungthi taka an omna hrangin an kuang thuthung siam ki ta, ki belrahai chu zôka an om theina hrangin le ram hnuaihaia an riak theina hrangin, ram sûnga ramsa murdihai chu irzûlpaihai ki ti.
“Satvurhai ki ta, ki tâng irthiang kôla inomtirhai ki ta, khataka khan an innang rikipa satvur rua pehai ki ti.

Thingkunghaiin ra insua an ta, loimânin bu le bâl insua a ti, mi tin chu mâni ram sûnga lungthi takin om an ti. Khan ki mipuihai khitna hrui sût ki ta, suaka siamtuhai ata kin sua zalêntirhai tena chu,
Pathian nei loi namhaiin longindarh ta no nihaia, ramsahai khomin anni chu thatin fa ta ngai no nihai. Anni chu lungthi takin om an ta, tukhomin insî thei ta no nihai.
Ram satakhai pehai ki ta, kha ram ata kha châm khom inboipai ta ki ta, nam danghaiin hmusit ta no nihai.
Mi tinin Israelhai ki hrunghaia, anni chu ki mihai an nih ti inhre ta an ti, kei
Khan nangni ki belrahai, hloi hring hmuna belrahai, ki mihai chu nin nia, kei hi nin Pathian chu ki ni,”
Khan
“Mihriam nâipa, Edom ram chu theiloi inchangtir roh.
Mipuihai kuang khan
O Edom tânghai kei chu nin râlhai ki nia,
ram inponin nangni siam ki ti.
Nin khopui chu kho ramin siam ki ta,
nin ram chu ram inpon inchangtir ki ti.
Khanchu
“Nang chu Israel râlin ni om maia, a sualna sika hremin a om laiin, zoro saloitak a tong laiin, a mipuihai chu khandai sinthotheina, an kuang ni pêkhaia.
Khasikin
Edom tâng ramhai chu ram inponin siam ki ta, khataka inlôituhai chu thatpaihai ki ti.
Mualhai chu mithi ruakin insiptir ki ta, irdoina hmuna thata omhai khan, tâng le irhôrhai chu sip zoi a ti.
Kumkhontuanga hrangin ni ram chu inpon ta a ta, ni khopuihai khan tukhom om nôk ta ngai no ni. Khanchu
“Khan, kei chu an
Khasikin
Khanchu insiatin an om tâka, ei involpaihai theina hrangin ei kuang pêkin an iom tâk a ni hi, tia Israel tâng chunghaia thu lei hrila, anni lei idemna murdihai kha kei
Keima ni doia, lârirpâk taka ni chongchai khom kha kin hriat sa a ni,” a tia.
Khan
Seir tânghai a nia, Edom ram murdi chu ram inpona siamin a om tena chu, mi tinin
Khan
Israel râlhai chu tekirtoi takin hiang hin an hrila, ‘Atûn chu so tâng miluihai so ei ta a ni ta,’ an tia.
“Khasikin thu leihrilin lân, kei
kei
Kei
“Khasikin Israel ram chungthua leihrilin lân, tânghai, mualhai, ivadunghai le irhôrhai kuang khan nam danghaiin hmusit tak le hmâimôk taka an lei ilonahai sika khan kei
Kei
Khannisian Israel tânghai chunga khan chu thingkunghaiin hna la nôk an ta, nangni ki mi Israelhai ta hranga hin ra insua nôk an ti. In tiang kîr nôk lat thei ta nin ti.
Kei chu nangni tianga mi ki nia, nin loihai chu tho nôk nin ta, chîmu nangni insongtir nôk ngêt ki ti.
Nangni inpungtir ki ta, khopuihaia khan om nôk nin ta, a siat a koihai chu indingtir nôk nin ti.

Mihriam le sahai nangni inpungtir ki ta, tiana nêkin tamtak hong ni ta nin ti; nâi le tehai khom tamtak nei sa nin ti. Tiana nin lei iom ngai ang khan, nangni inomtir nôk ki ta, matona nêkin tuanintungin nangni siam ki ti. Khanchu
O, Israel ki mipuihai, nin rama om nôk hrangin nangni hong hruai nôk ki ti. Kha kha nin ram ni a ta, khataka khan nin nâi le tehai châmin om ta ngai no nihai.
“Kei,
Khannisian atûn ata chu mihriam fâktu le nin nâi le tehai longindartirtu ni ta no ni, kei
Ram khan nam danghai nuisona thu inhre ta ngai no nia, mihai innuisan tong ta ngai no ni. Ram khan a nâi le tehai chu longindarh ta ngai no ni,
Khan

“Mihriam nâipa, Israelhai kha an rama an om lai khan, an omdânhai le an sinthôna khan ram kha an porinchetira, an omdânhai kha keima ta hrangin chu nupang a tha tina an hmu zoroa Pathian dâna irthiang loia an om ang dôra porinche chu a ni.
Khan ram sûnga thisen an insuanahai le, millimhai sika khan ram an porinchetirna sikin, ki ningmurna chu an chunga kin sum tâka.
An omdân le an lêng dân sika khan theiloi kin changtirhaia, khasikin ram danga kin thekindartirhai ta.
An fena hmun tina, ki’rhming irthiang chu an porinchetira, a san chu mihaiin, ‘Hihai hi
Kha thil khan ki’rhming irthiang chu a sân a nin ngaituatira, Israelhaiin an fena hmun tina an porinchetir ngai sikin.
“Khasikin atûn, Israelhai kuang khan
Khan ki’rhming roiinpui tak irthiangzia nam tinhai laia nin lei porinchetir tâk kha ki târinlang tena chu
Nam tin le ram tin ata nangni hruai ki ta, nin omna rama ngêt nangni hruai kîr nôk ki ti.
Tui kathâr nangni inthikkhum ki ta, nin millim murdihai ata le nangni a porinchetirtu thil tinrênghai ata kha nangni thâr irthiang ki ti.
Milung thar le ngaituana thar nangni pe ki ta, nin milung, lung anga ngar kha lapai ki ta, thuzôm theina milung nangni pe ki ti.
Khanchu nangnia khan ki’rtha sia ki ta, ki dânhai chu zômin, ki thupêk murdihai chu vongindik ta nin ti.
Khanchu nin irchi bulhai kuanga ram ki ipêka khan om ta nin ta, nangni chu ki mihai ni ta nin ta, kei nin Pathian ni ki ti.
Thil tinrêng nangni porinchetirtu rengata kha nangni inzôk ki ta, khan bu khom pung hrangin thu pe ki ta, khanchu châm rêng rêng inhre ta ngai no chin ni.
Nin theikunghai le nin loihai chu ra tamtak insuatirhai ki ta, khanchu châm rêng rêng om ta ngai no nia, nam tinhai laia hmâimôkin nangni inomtir ta no ning.
Nin omdân pualoihai le nin sin siat thohai kha inhre suak nin ta, khanchu nin porinchenahai le nin sualnahai sikin nin mithmu ngêta khan nin bingin irtir irhlôm nin ti.
O, Israel hi thil murdihai hi nangma sika ki itho ni ma, ti hi nin hriat ki nuam. Nin sinthohai sika khan inzôk le hmâimôka nin iom ki nuam, kei
Khan
Khan nin loihaia inlôituhai khan insûl zuakin hmu an ta, khannisian keiin loi nangni inneitir nôk ki ti.

Khanchu mi tinin, ‘Hi ram hi matona khan chu ramchâr a nia, khannisian itina mo Eden irhuan anga omin, hi khopui insimpaia, longindara, siata mâksana omhai khom kha lua nôkin kulhai indinga a iom nôk tâk ma ni?’ tiin la hril an ti.
Khanchu a kôlvêla nam inzôka omhai khan kei
Khan
Khan atûna khopui siata omhai hi, kha tena chu mihriam insiptirhai ki ta, tiana Jerusalema hruaithe zoroa an inhlan ngai belra sip nguta an iom ngai ang khan. Khanchu
Khanchu
Kha irhôrpa kha a nin hîltir chita, khataka khan ru châr tamtak hi ki hmua.
Khan ki kuang, “Mihriam nâipa, hi ru chârhai hi hong hring thei nôk nihai mo?” tiin a nir dona. Khan keiin a kuang, “
Khanchu ama’n, “Ruhai kuang hin thu hrilin lân, hi ru chârhai kuang hin
Khan an kuang,
Khanchu irthahrui le taksahai nangni pe ki ta, vun leh nangni tuam ki ta. Nin sûnga phûk thun lût ki ta, nangni inhringtir nôk ki ti. Khanchu
Khanchu thupêka ki iom ang khan thu chu ki hril tâka, thu ki hril mai laiin, thil irnok irhâi hi kin hriata, khanchu ruhai kha an hong irzomkhôm tâka.
Khan ki en mai laiin, ruhai kha irthahrui le taksain a tuama, kha hnung chu vunin a hong tuamhaia, khannisian an puma khan phûk chu om maka.
Khan Pathianin ki kuang, “Mihriam nâipa, phâivuahai kuang thu hrilin lân, an kuang khan
Khanchu thupêka ki iom ang khan thu chu ki hril tâka, khanchu phûk kha an taksa sûnga khan a lûta, khanchu hong hringin an ngîr tâka.
Khan Pathianin ki kuang, “Mihriam nâipa, Israelhai chu ki ruhai ang hi an ni. ‘Ei ruhai lak a châr zoi tâka, ei isabeina lak a boi tâka, sûn maton ite nei ta mak me,’ an tia.
Khasikin ki mi Israelhai kuang khan thu hrilin lân, kei
Khan ki mihai phûmna thânhai chu kin honga ki kêlsuahai tena chu
Annia khan ki phûk thunlût ki ta, inhringtirhai nôk ki ta, an rama ngêt inomtirhai nôk ki ti. Khanchu
Khan
“Mihriam nâipa, thing khianghrol inkhat hi lan lân, a chunga hi thu hi irziak ro, ‘Juda rêng ram’ ti hi. Khanchu khianghrol dang la nôkin lân, a chunga ‘Israel rêng ram,’ ti hi irziak nôk roh.
Khanchu khianghrol inkhat anga an inlang theina hrangin a hmor le a hmor kha zomhai roh.
Khanchu ni mipuihaiin, kha thil kha i thôna ma nih tia nang an irdon tena chu,
an kuang
“Khan khianghrol inhnihai kha ni kutin chelhaiin lân, mipuihai irhmutirhai roh.
Khanchu
Anni chu an ram sûnga le Israel tânghaia khan hmunkhatin siamhai ki ta; an chunga roirêltu hrangin rêng inkhat nei an ta, anni chu nam hniin om ta no nihai.

Anni chu millim leh ite porinche ta no nihaia, sualhai tho’n mani le mâni porinchein om ta no nihai. An lei sualna lampui murdihai ata le an lei ihnôlnahai ata kha insuahai ki ta, anni chu ki mihai ni an ta, kei chu an Pathian ni ki ti.
Reng ki sinthotu Davida ang khan an rêngin om an ta, an rêngin roirêltu inkhat hnuaia inthurual takin om an ta, khanchu iamom takin ki dânhai chu zôm an ti.

Khanchu an irchibulhai omna ram, ki sinthotu Jakoba kuanga ki lei ipêk rama khan om ta an ta, khataka khan kumkhontuangin anni le an nâi le tehai le an irchi suanpârhai chu om ta an ti. Ki sinthotu rêng Davida angin an chunga kumtuangin roirêl ta a ti.
Kumtuanga lungthi taka an om theina hrangin anni leh thuthung siam ki ta, khataka khan phunhai ki ta, inpunghai ki ta, ki biakbuk chu an rama sia ki ta, khataka khan kumtuangin om ta a ti.
Khataka khan kei chu anni leh omsuam ki ta, kei chu an Pathian ni ki ta, anni chu ki mihai ni an ti.
Khan, khataka khan ki biakbuk chu kumtuanga hrangin ki sia tena chu, nam tinhaiin kei
Khan
“Mihriam nâipa, Magoga rama Meseka le Tubala namhai chunga roirêltu roiinpuitak, Gog chu theiloi inchangtir roh.
Theiloi inchangtirin lân, khanchu kei

Ama chu irvêltir ki ta, a bâia irkuai infatir ki ta, a sipai murdihai leh kaitôlhai ki ti. A sipaihai le a sakorhai le a sakor chung chuang mihai chu tamtak an nia, sipai tam dôrin pho le khandai an chôi chita.
Persia ata Ethiopia, Libia ata a mihai chu a kuang an om saa, an rêngin pho le lukhum an nei senga.
Hmâr tianga Gomera le Beth-Togarma irdoi mi murdihai chu ama leh an omsuama, kha bana ram dang danghai ata khom tamtak an om sa.
Irsiam diama om hrangin inhrilin lân, a sipaihai chu thupêkna hnuaia irsiam diam ta ri sehai.

Kum tamtak zoia ama chu ram inkhat, kha rama omhai kha nam tamtakhai lai ata hruaisuak an nia, irdoina rêng rêng chi ngai loia om an ni, khahai kha irdoitir ki ta. Khanchu Israel tânghai, kha ten sûnga mâksana lei ramchita omhai, khannisian atûn chu lungthi taka mihai omna so doi sa an ti.
Ama le a sipaihai a kuanga nam tamtakhai khan phâivopui angin doi an ta, ram kha sûmphâi angin bôm a ti,” a tia.
Ram inriang, khopui kul nei loihai le irhrungna boia lungthi taka mipui omhai chu doi hrangin ngaitua ni ta.

Khanchu matona khopui siat hai, khataka om mihai chu longindarin, râllâk sumhai la ni ti. Khahai kha nam tinhai lai ata hruaikhôm an nia, atûn chu sahai le irchonhai neia, rammual laitaka om chu a ni.

Khanchu Seba le Dedan mihai le Tarsis khopuihai ata sum bepâr thotuhaiin, ‘Thil hluhai la hranga ni ihong mo? sumtakhai, rângachak hai, sahai le irchonhai la hrangin ni sipaihai hi ni hong ituanghai mo? kha thil hlu murdihai kha la hranga hong mo ni ini?’ tiin nang sâm an ti,” a tia.
Khasikin
Ni omna hmâr ram hlatak ata kha zuang ni ta, mi tamtak zuang tuanghai ni ta, an rêngin sakor chunga chuang ving an ta, nang chu sipai tamtak le hrât tak chu ni ni.

Phâivopuiin ram a isêm phît angin, ki mi Israelhai chu doihai ni ta, a zoro a hong tung tena chu, ki ram chu doi hrangin, nang tîr ki ti; tu mo ki inih ti hi nam tinhai irhmutirhaina hrang le nangma hmanga ki sinthôna hin ki’rthiangzia inlangtirna hrangin.
Nangma chungthu ngêt hi matona khan ki lei hrila, ki sinthotu Israel deipuhai hmangin ki lei inpuang lai khan Israel doitu hrang mi inkhat hong hruai ki ti, ki lei tia,”
Khan
Ki ninginmurna sikin ki lei hril tâka, kha nî sûn khan Israel rama hnîngnupui tho a ti.
Khanchu tuipuia nga murdihai, ramsa murdihai le mihriam murdihai, irnêng chunga omhai kai chu keima ni chipumin inthing an ta, tânghai chim a ta, bang murdihai khom chim ving a ti.
Gog chu siatna chi tinrêng leh insîtir ki ti, kei
Ama chu hripui le thisen insuana’n hrem ki ta, khanchu ama le a sipaihai le nam tamtak ama tianga kophai chunga khan ropuivânsâng le, irial le, mei le kât chu zuang bunthuan ki ti.
Khaang khan nam tinhai kuang ki sinthotheina le ki’rthiangna chu inlangtir ki ti. Kha tena chu
Khan
Ama chu hmun thar tiang irheitir ki ta, Israel tânghai a zuang tung mâna chu, hmâr tiang hlatak ata kha zuang hruai ki ti.
Khanchu a vei kut tianga sâihli le a chang kuta thal kha inthatir ki ti.
Gog le a sipai le a rual murdihai chu Israel tânghai chunga khan thi an ta, an ruakhai chu chunglêng vahai le ramsahai bu hrangin pe ki ti.
Anni chu kholaidunga thi an ti, kei
Khanchu Magoga le chômbunga omtuhai chunga khan mei insua ki ta; khanchu
Khanchu ki’rhming irthiang kha ki mi Israelhai laia inlârtir ki ta, ki’rhming irthiang porinchetira om hrang chu irngai thei no ning. Khanchu nam tinhaiin,
Khan

Israel ram khopuihaia om mihai kha fesuak an ta, râltukfam mâksana omhai kha thingtua hrangin irkhôm an ti. Phôhai le sâihlihai thalhai, ufeihai le hmolhai kha mei thôna hrangin hmang an ta, khahai kha kum sari ten tua an ti.

Ram kâra thing tua hrang an irkhôm nang no nia, ite rampui hnuaia irkhôm nang viat no ni. Râltukfam mâksana omhai kha an itua hrang a ni sikin. Anni longindartirtuhai le an neinun sampâr inrûktuhai chu, anni longindarhaiin an neinunhai leh pehai an ti,”
Khan
Ram kha irthiangtir nôkna hrangin, Israelhaiin an ruakhai phûmna hrang khan tha sari nang an ti.
Khanchu a ram sûnga mi tinin, anni chu phûmhai an ta, khanchu inhnêna ki chang nî sûn chu chôiindômin om an ti. Kei
Khanchu ram kha an irthiangtir theina hrangin, tha sari zoi tena chu, mithi ruak a la om moh tia zongsuaka phûm hrangin a ram sûng murdi irfangsuak hrangin mi inthang suakin om an ti.
Kha ram kha a suk a tungin irfang an ta, thânkhur choituhaiin Gog sipaihai irhôra khan an phûmhai theina hrangin mihriam ru an hmûna dôra irsinsiana nei an ti.
Kha mithihai khopui kha Hamon tiin ar hming phua an ti. Khaang khan ram chu irthiangtir nôk ta an ti,” a tia.
Khan
Sipaihai hme chu fa an ta, irnêng chunga roirêltuhai thisen chu in an ti. Khahai kha an rêngin belrachalhai, belratehai, kêlhai le sehrât mar satakhai anga that ving ni an ti.
Khan, kha mipuihai kha thilinhlanhai anga ki thathai tena chu, chunglêng vahai le ramsahaiin an thâihai chu fa an ta, an inrui mâka chu an thisen kha in an ti.
Khan ki dokânga khahai khan sakorhai, sakor chung chuang mihai, sipaihai le irdoi mihai hme chu an khop dôrin fahai an ti, kei
Khan
Khanchu kha rengata kha Israelhaiin kei chu
Khanchu nam tinhaiin Israelhai chu ki chunga an sualna sikin sala intângin an om ti inhre ta an ti. Kei chu anni ata a dang tianga irheiin, an râlhai indoitirin irdoina khan thathai ki ti.
An porinchena le an pualoinahai sikin an idongtumhai chu dong an ta, anni ata a dang tiang irheisanhai ki ti,” a tia.
Khan
Khan anni inchitir hrang boiin, lungthi taka an rama ngêt an om tena chu, ki chunga an inchâinahai sikin an inzaknahai irnghil ta an ti.
Khanchu nam tamtak mithmua ki irthiang a nih ti inentirna hrangin, ki mipuihai chu an râlhai ram ata hong hruai kîrhai ki ti.
Anni chu sala intâng hrangin kin fetirhaia, khannisian atûn chu bukkhômhaiin inkhat lua masanhai loiin, an omna rama ki hong ihruai nôkna hin, mihaiin keima chu
Israel mihai chunga ki’rtha chu buak ki ta, anni lai ata itiklai khom a dang tiang irheisanhai ta no ning, kei
Kin sal intângna kum sômhni ringana, tha bul sûn sôm nî chu khopui insiata a om zoi kum sôm hleiminli zoia khan, kha nî sûn ngêta khan
Pathian thil lei hmûna sikin Israel rama a ni hruaia, tâng irsângtak sim tianga khopui hoitak ki hmua, kha khan a nin sum tâka.
Khan, a ni hruai innaitir uala, khan mihriam inkhat sumsen irtêk anga irtêk hi ki hmua; a kuta irkhîna pat zâiirhmi hrui le irkhîna khianghrol hi chôiin ama chu mikota ngîrin.

Kha mi khan keima kuang, “En ro, mihriam nâipa thil tinrêng nang ki irhmu murdi hi savingin irngaiin lân, milung pe takin ngaitua ro; khasikin hitaka hin nang ki hong ihruai a ni, ni thil hmu dôr chu Israel mihai inhrilhai ving ro,” a ni tia.

Khan, ki thil hmu chu biakbuk a nia, a’rhîlin banghai a oma, khan mihriam khan irkhîna khianghrol a lâka, a sei lam chu mûk ruk a nia, bang kha a’rkhi tâka; a’rsâng lam chu irkhîna khianghrol tuankhat a nia, a’rsa lam khom khianghrol inkhat ang dôr a ni.
Khanchu nisua tianga ngha dâi mikot tiang khan a fea, leidâka khan a kâia, khanchu a chunga khan a lûtna kha a’rkhia; kha kha mûk ruka inthûk a ni.

Khakhêla khan lam a om nôka, a sîr inhnia khan irhrungna tentan inthum hi a oma. Tentan tin kha irki minli nei a ni chita, a’rki minli khan mûk ruka sei a ni vinga, a banglâi chu mûk minli vêla irsa a ni. Khan irhrungna tentan khêla khan lampui mûk ruka sei hi a oma, biakbuk tianga ngha tentan liantak dênin a oma.
Khanchu kha tentan kha a’rkhia, mûk riat a nia,
khan dâi mikot tual kha a’rkhia, mûk riat a ni. Khanchu a mikot chu mûk hni a ni, khan a dâi mikot chu insûng tiang khan a oma.
(Lampui sîr hnia tentanhai kha a lian dân chu a ir-ang vinga, a kâra banghai khom a’rsa lam chu a ir-ang chit a ni.)
Khanchu mihriam khan dâi mikot khang lian lam kha a’rkhia, an rêngin mûk sôm hleithum a ni, a dâi mikot khang lian lam chu mûk sôm a ni.

Khanchu a hrungna tentan maton tiang khan bang irhnuai ual hi a oma, a’rsâng dân chu mûk khat a chimrip a nia, a’rsa dân khom mûk khat a chimrip dên a ni. (A tentan chu irki minli neiin mûk ruka lian an ni.)
Khanchu hrungna tentan hnung tianga bang inkhat kha lampui khêla a hrungna tentan bang kha ar khi nôka, kha kha mûk sôm inhnia sei a ni.
Khanchu tentan pên taka om kha tual a va dên raka, kha tentan kha a’rkhia mûk sôma sei a nia.
Dâi mikot bang pên tiang ata tentan a hlataka bang kâr lampui kha mûk sômringaa sei a ni.
Khan tentan pên tianga banghai khan tukver a oma, khanchu tentan le tentan kâra bang khom kha a om saa, khanchu lampui dep tianga banga khan tûm thingkung illim a kera kerin an sina.
Khanchu mihriam khan dâi mikota a ni lûtpuia, khanchu pên tianga banga khan tentan sômthum a oma, kholaidung chu lungphêka dâp ving a nia, a tualzôl dên raka dâp a ni.
Khan hi pên tianga tualzôl hi sûng tianga nêkin chu a’rhnuai uala.
Khanchu dâi mikot chu hmun irsâng uala khan a oma, khataka ta kho sûng tianga tualzôl khan fe theina a oma, kha mihriam khan a kâr kha a’rkhia, a kâr chu mûk sômringa a ni.
Khanchu mihriam khan hmâr tianga dâi mikot pên tianga tualzôl lûtna kha a’rkhia.

A hrungna tentan inthumhai lampui sîr hnia omhai le, a kâra a banghai le tentan lianhai kha, nisua tianga dâi mikot nei le lian ang dôr hi a nia, dâi mikot sei lam kha mûk sômringa a nia, a khang chu mûk sôminhni mûk ringa a ni.

Tentan lian le, tukverhai le a kera an iker tûm thingkung nisua tianga omhai le hmunkhat a ni. Khanchu leidâk sirbi sari dênin a om saa, khanchu tentan lian chu a mong taka khan a oma, a tualzôl tianga hmâi nghain a oma.

Khanchu a tualzôl khêla khan hi hmâr tianga dâi mikot ata hi mikot dang a om nôka, kha kha tualzôl sûnginta ual fena chu a ni, nisua tianga ang khan a oma. Khan mihriam khan kha dâikot inhnihai kha a’rkhia, a sei lam le a lian lam chu mûk irzakhat a ni.
Khanchu mihriam khan sim tiang a ni hruaia, khataka khan dâi mikot dang chu kin hmua; khanchu a’rkhia, dâikot danghai ang dên kha a ni.
Khanchu dâi mikot danghai ang khan tentanhai khan tukver a oma, dâi mikot sei lam chu mûk sômringa a ni, a khang chu mûk sômhni ringa a ni.

Khan kalbi sari ata kha a tung tiang a kâia, a tentan liantak kha a mong taka a oma, a tualzôl tiang hmâi nghain a oma. Khanchu lampui tianga bang sûng tiang khan tûm thingkung illim an iker hi a oma.
Hitaka khom hin tualzôl sûnginta ual lûtna lampui a oma, khan mihriam khan hi dâi mikot inhni hi a’rkhia mûk sômringa a ni.
Khanchu mihriam khan sim tianga dâi mikot ata kha tualzôl sûnginta uala khan a ni hruaia. Khanchu dâi mikot kha a’rkhia, dâikot pên tianga banghai kha an rêngin ar ang zita.
A hrungna tentanhai, a bang danghai, sum hrênahai kha irkhîna leh khan a’rkhia, kha khan tukverhai a oma. A sei lam mûk sômringa a nia, a lian lam chu mûk sômhni a ni.
Khan a kôla khan toina a oma, a sei lam mûk sômhni ringa, a khang mûk ringa a ni.
A tentan lian uala khan tualzôl dang tiang a nghaa, khanchu lampui tuana banghai khan tûm thingkung an iker hi a oma. Hi dâi mikot hi kalbi kiriata irsâng a iom a ni.
Khanchu mihriam khan nisua tianga dâi mikot ata kha tualzôl sûnginta uala khan a ni hruaia, kha dâi mikot kha a’rkhia, a danghai ang dêna sei le lian a ni.

Khanchu a hrungna tentan hai, a tentan lianhai le a sûng tianga banghai kha dâikot danghai anga lian le sei hi a nia. Khanchu a’rhîlin tukverhai a oma, tentan lian kôla khom khan a om sa. A dung tiang chu mûk sômringa a nia, a khang tiang chu mûk sôminhni mûk ringa a ni.
Tentan lian kha tualzôl pên tiang khan a nghaa, a banghai khan lampui tuanin, tûm thingkung illim a kera an iker hi a oma. Hi dâi mikot hi kalbi kiriatnaa om a ni.
Khanchu mihriam khan hmâr tianga dâi mikot khan a ni hruaia, khanchu a’rkhia, a sei le a lian lamhai chu a danghai ang dên kha a ni.
Khahai ang dên khan a hrungna tentanhai a neia, a insûng tiang a bang irvôna a neia, tentan lian khom a neia, tukver khom a’rhîlin a oma, a sei lam chu mûk sômringa a nia.
Khan tentan lian kha tualzôl pêninta tiang a ena, tûm thingkung a kera an iker banghai khan a oma. Hi dâikot hi kalbi kiriata irsânga om a ni.

Khanchu tualzôl pêninta rengata kha hmâr tianga dâikot sûnginta le irzomin tentan le lampuihai hi a oma. Khanchu tualzôl tianga ngha tentan lianna tiang a suaka, khataka khan pum hâlirvôm thilinhlanhai an sôpinfâi ngai.

Hi tentan liana hin dokâng minli hi a oma, a sîr tianghai khan inhni hniin an siaa, hitaka dokânghai hin pum hâlirvôm thilinhlana hmang hranghai, sâhai, sual irbôlna thilinhlana hmang hrang, sahai, ngaidam irzongna thilinhlana hmang hrang sahai, an thatna ngaia.
Khanchu tentan pên tiang khan dokâng ir-angsar minli a oma, hmâr tianga dâikot lûtna khan sîrkhat tiang inhni, a dang tiang inhni siain a oma.
An rêngin dokâng kiriat a nia, khahai chunga khan sa inhlana om hranghai chu thatin an om ngaia; tentan sûnga khan minli, pên tiang tualzôla khan minli.

Khanchu pum hâlirvôm thilinhlana hrangin lung isuka suk, mûk khat le a chimripa sei, mûk khat le a chimripa lian, mûk khata irsâng dokâng minli a oma; khahai chunga khan irbôlna le pum hâlirvôm thilinhlan hranghai thatna hrang hriamhreihai an siaa.
Khanchu dokâng chunghaia khan kutzapha dôra lian a kôla an siaa, khanchu irbôlna hme murdihai chu kha dokâng chunga khan an sia ngai.

Khanchu kha mi khan tualzôl sûnginta uala khan a ni hruaia, a sûnginta uala khan tentan inhni hi a oma, inkhat chu hmâr tiang dâi mikot kôl ata kha sim tiang nghain a oma, inkhat dang chu sim tiang dâikot kôl ata kha hmâr tianga nghain a oma.
Khanchu mihriam khan ki kuang hiang hin a hrila, tentan sim tianga ngha kha biakbuka sinthotu ochaihai ta hranga a nia,
Khanchu tentan hmâr tianga ngha kha maichâma sinthotu ochaihai ta hranga chu a ni. Khahai vai kha Levi irchi ata
Khanchu mihriam khan tualzôl sûnginta kha a’rkhia, mûk irzakhata sei le mûk irzakhata irza a ni. Khan biakbuk chu nisua tiang a oma, a mân tiang khan maichâm chu a oma.
Khanchu biakbuk lûtna tentan khan a ni hruai inlûta, kha kha mûk ringa inthûk a nia, mûk sôm hleiminlia irzat le a banghai chu mûk thuma irsa, a sîr inhnia khan a oma.

Khan kalbi a lûtna tentan tena hong sun kha, a khang mûk sôminhni a nia, mûk sôm hleihnia inthûk a ni. Khanchu chopui inhni, a lûtna mikot kiangkhat tiang khan inkhat a ngîra, a dang tiang khan inkhat a ngîr saa.
Kha hnung chu mihriam khan tentan inlaina taka om, Hmun Irthianga khan a ni hruaia, khataka lûtna lampui kha ar khia.
Mûk ruka inthûk le mûk sôma irza a nia, khanchu a sîr hni tianga banghai kha mûk ringaa irsa a ni. A sûnga tentan kha ar khia, a dung mûk sôm minli a nia, a khang chu mûk sômhni a ni.
Khanchu tentan sûngrîla khan a lûta, khataka fena lampui khom kha ar khia mûk hnia inthûk le mûk ruka irza a ni. A banghai chu mûk saria irsa a ni.
Khanchu kha tentan kha ar khia a dung tiang mûk sômhni, a khang khom mûk sômhni a ni. Khanchu ki kuang, “Hi hi Hmun Irthiang tak chu a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu mihriam khan biakbuk sûng tianga bang irsa dânhai kha ar khia, mûk ruk a nia. Khanchu hi bang pên tianga hin tentanhai mûk minlia irzat hi biakbuk irhîla khan a oma.

Hi chontanhai hi irchuan thuma siam a nia, tentan chîn sômthum a sûnga khan a oma. Khanchu irchuan tin irdîna biakbuk pên tiang bang kha a hnuai tianga irchuanhai nêkin a’rphân uala, tentan kha biakbuk leh khan irzomna boia bang chunga a’rnghat theina hrangin.

Khaang khan biakbuk banghai khom kha pên tiang ata enin chu, a chung dên thaiin ar sa dân kha hmunkhat angin an langa. Khanchu biakbuk pên tianga banga khan tentan pên tiang khan a luina irzatôk tak inhni siam a nia, irchuan hnuai ten kha fe thei a nina hrangin.
Khanchu hi tentanhai pên tiang bang irsa dân chu mûk ringa a nia, khanchu biakbuk hmâr tianga tentanhaia khan mikot inkhat hi a oma.
Khaang dênin sim tianga tentanhai khom khan inkhat a oma. Khanchu biakbuk irhîla khan mûk ringaa irzat hmun rong hi ki hmua;
Biakbuk bang kôla tentanhai lungphun leh khan a’rten maia, irnêng ata mûk ruka irsâng hi a ni.
Khanchu hmun rong le ochaihai omna inkârhaia khan hmun rong a khang tianga mûk sômhnia irzat hi biakbuk zuia khan a om sa.
Khanchu biakbuk nitâk tianga hmun ôla a mong taka khan in inkhat a dung mûk sômkuaka sei le a khang mûk sômsari hi a oma; a banghai chu mûk ringaa irsa a ni.
Khan mihriam khan, biakbuk pên tiang kha a’rkhia, a dung mûk irzakhat a nia, khanchu a hnung tiang ata hmun ôl lâksa’n nitâk tianga biakbuk hmor tena khan mûk irzakhat ngêt a ni.
Khanchu biakbuk mân tianga a sîr hmun ôl kha lâksa’n, mûk irzakhat ngêt a ni.
Khanchu biakbuk nitâk tiang khan a’rkhia, a sîr inhnia lampuihai lûtna ten kha lâkin, mûk irzakhat ngêt a nia.
Khanchu biakbuk lûtna tentan le Hmun Irthiang le Hmun Irthiang tak kha a hnuai ata tukver omna ten kha thingphêk inkhop ving hi a nia, kha tukverhai kha inhong thei ving a ni.
Khanchu biakbuk sûng tianga banghai kha mikot chung tena irsâng hi a nia, an rêng khan tûm thinghai le cherubhai irlim, a kera an iker insip ving a nia.
Tûm thingkunghai chu cherub le cherubhai kâra khan a bang tuan khan a oma. Cherubhai khan hmâi inhni seng hi an neia.
Mihriam hmâi angin an hmâi kha tûm thingkung tianga a nghaa, kâmkeibaknei hmâi kiangkhat tianga tûm kung tiang khan a oma. Khaang khan bang murdi,
a hnuai ata mikot chunghai kha a sip zita.
Khanchu Hmun Irthiang mikot chopuihai chu irki minli nei an ni.

Khanchu Hmun Irthiang tak lûtna mân tiang khan, thil inkhat thing maichâm ni ômtak hi a oma, a’rsâng lam chu mûk thum a nia, a khang chu mûk hni a ni. Khanchu a’rkia chopuihai le a toinahai le a kôlhai kha thinga siam ving a nia. Khanchu mihriam khan ki kuang, “Hi hi
Khanchu Hmun Irthiang fena lampui mong taka khan mikot inkhat hi a oma, khanchu Hmun Irthiang tak fena lampui monga khan inkhat dang hi a oma.
Kha mikothai khan inkhâr inhni seng an neia, a laia irhong thei a ni.
Khanchu Hmun Irthiang inkhârhai khan, banga om ang ngêt tûm thingkunghai le cherub illima oma. Khanchu a lûtna mikot tentan chunga khan miliang lian tak hi a oma.
Khanchu hi tentanhai hin tukverhai a neia, khan a banghai chu tûm thingkunghai leh irvôtir a ni.
Khanchu mihriam khan pên tianga tualzôla khan a ni hruaia, khanchu biakbuk hmâr tianga in, biakbuk nitâk tianga in om hla rak loina khan a ni hruaia.
Hi in hi a dung chu mûk irzakhat a nia, a khang kha chu mûk sômringa a ni.

Khanchu sîr khat tiang khan biakbuk kôla om hmun ôl, mûk sôm inhnia irzat hi a nghaa; sîr khat dang khan pên tianga tualzôl lung dâp tiang kha a nghaa, chadan thum neia siam a nia, a hnuai tak nêka tôt uala siam zit a ni.
Khanchu hi in zui hmâr tiang khan lampui mûk sôma irzat le mûk irzakhata sei, a lûtnahai leh hin a oma.
Khanchu tentan in chung tianga omhai kha a laia le a hnuai tentanhai nêk khan ar têt uala, khahai kha a hnung tiang uala siam a ni sikin.
Khanchu chadan thuma tentanhai kha an rêngin hmun ôla om an nia, tualzôla in danghai anga chopuia irnghat ni mahai.
Khanchu tentanhai leh irdîn mai khan bang a oma, pên tianga tualzôl zuia khan a fea, mûk sômringa sei hi a ni.
Khanchu pên tianga tualzôl zuia khan tentan irtânga omhai kha mûk sômringa sei an ni, biakbuk tianga in sei dân kha mûk irzakhat a ni.
Khanchu nisua tianga in mongna khan bang irphutna hmuna tentan inhnihai hnuaia hin pên tianga tualzôl lûtna hi a oma.
Khanchu biakbuk sim tiang, nitâk tianga biakbuk mongna rengata hla rak loia hin, kha in ang kha inkhat a om nôka.
Khanchu tentanhai maton tiang khan hmâr tianga lampui om ang dên khan lampui dang inkhat a oma. A lian dânhai, a sei dânhai, a’rvo dânhai le a lûtnahai khom ar ang vinga.
Khanchu kha in sim lam pang tiang, nisua tianga a mongna taka bang irphutna tentanhai hnuaia khan mikot hi a oma.
Khanchu mihriam khan ki kuang, “Hi in inhnihai hi in irthiang a ni, khahai sûnga khan
Khan ochaihai chu biakbuk sûng ata pên tianga tualzôla khan an fe nuama ni’n chu hi tentanhai hin
Khan mihriam khan biakbuk sûng tiang a’rkhi zoi tena chu nisua tianga dâikot tiang khan a ni hruai suaka, khanchu a pên tiang kha a’rkhi tâka.
Khanchu irkhîna hmol kha a lâka, nisua tiang kha ar khia, mûk irzaringa a ni.
Khan hmâr tianga khom kha ar hîlin ar khîna hmol leh irkhiin mûk irzaringa a ni.
Irkhîna hmol khan sim tiang khom mûk irzaringa a nia,
khan nitâk tiang kha a’rkhî nôka, mûk irzaringa dên a ni.
A sîr minli khan a’rkhia, a sei lam irzaringa, a khang khom irzaringa a nia, a irhîlin bang a neia, hmun papai le hmun irthiang theithâkna hrangin.
Kha zoiin chu dâi mikot nisua tianga ngha dâi mikota khan a ni hruaia,
khan, irngai ro, nisua tianga irthokin Israel Pathian roiinpuina chu a hong tung ta, khan arhâi khom tui tamtak ang a ni. Khanchu a roiinpuina khan hnuai kha an vârtira.
Khanchu thil ki lei ihmuhai kha, khopui insiat hranga a hong laia ki lei ihmu kha Kebar vadunga ki lei ihmu ang kha a ni; khanchu ki hmâi leh hnuai ki sika.
Khan dâi mikot nisua tianga ngha irthokin
Irtha khan a nin dom irsângtira, irhuan sûng tualzôla khan a ni hruai inlûta, khan irngai ro,
Mi inkhat ki kôla a ngîr laitakin, in sûng ata mi inkhat hin ki kuang thu a hrilin kin hriata,

keima kuang, “Mihriam nâipa, hi hi ki rêngtoihmun le ki ke irnghatna a ni, Israel irchihai laia kumkhontuanga ki omna hrang chu a ni. Israel insûng mihaiin ki’rhming irthiang chu porinchetir ta no nihaia, anni khomin an rênghai khom an hurna’n mani, an irbôlna haia, an rênghai mâk khomin porinchetir ta no nihai.

An tualzôlhai chu ki tualzôla siain, an mikot khârhai chu ki mikot bula, anni le kin kâr chu bang vai a oma. Khan an intir omna an lei itho tâkhai khan ki’rhming irthiang an lei porinchetir tâka, khasikin ki milung hoi loina khan anni chu ki hâlirvôm paihaia.
Atûn hin an hurna le an rênghai ruak chu keima irthokin hlataka sepaihai sianlân, anni laia kumtuangin om mai ta ki ti,” a tia.
“Nang mihriam nâipa, Israel insûngkuahai laia khan in kha inentir ro, an sualnahai ata an inzak theina hrangin; khanchu an itûng kha irkhîtir roh.

Khan an sintho murdihai kha an inzakpuia ni’n chu a itum le a hmêl irput dâna, a fena le a lûtna, a hmêl omziahai murdi khan khataka dânhai kha hrilin lân, an mithmu ngêta khan irziakin lân, kha an hmêl irput dân kha a om maia, a dânhai an zôm thei maina hrangin.
Hi hi nin dân hrang chu ni a ti, tâng sîp chunga a ihuap za chu hmun Irthiang tak ni a ta; irngai ro, hihai hi nin dân chu ni a ti,” a tia.
Khan, hi hi mûka irkhi maichâm lian lam chu a ni, a zer chu mûk khat ni a ta, a khang khom mûk khat ngêt, a kôl chu ar hîla khâp khat ni a ti. Hi hi maichâm zer chu a ni.
Khan hnuai a toina ata a kôl hnuaiinta ata kha mûk hni ni a ta, a khang tiang chu mûk khat, khan a kôl chîn ual ata a kôl lian ual ten kha mûk minli nih a ti, khan a khang tiang chu mûk khat.
Maichâm an chung ual chu mûk minli ni a ta, maichâm inthûk le a chung tiang khan irki minli om a ta.
Maichâm omna chu mûk sôm hleihnia sei mûk sôm hleihni nêka lian ni a ti, a sîr minlia khan irtiat nat a ti.

A sîrhai minlia khan a ring chu mûk sôm hleiminlia sei, mûk sôm hleiminli nêka lian ni a ti; ar kual chu a rêngin mûk chimrip ni a ti; a zer tiang chu mûk khat ni a ta, a sirna kalbihai chu nisua tiang ngha a ti.
Khan, ki kuang a hrila, “Mihriam nâipa,
Levi mi ochaihai, Zadoka irchia mi ngêt kha, keima sintho hranga keima ni nâihai kuang khan sual thilinhlan hrangin sehrâtchal tuai pe ni ti,
Khan kha thisen kha la ni ta, ar ki minli khan pol ni ta, a kôl irki minlia khom khan, a zera a sîrhai khom khan; khanchu irthiangtir ni ta, ama ta hrangin inhlanna siam ni ti.
Sual thilinhlanna hrangin sehrâtchal la ni ta, kha hmun inthang sai irthiang tuala khan hâl ni ti.
Khan sûn hnina nî khan sual thilinhlanna hranga khan kêlchal demnaboi inhlan ni ti.
Khan irthiangtirna sin ni tho zoiin chu sehrâtchal demnaboi le a pâl laia belrachal demnaboi kha inhlan ni ti.
Khan nangma’n
Sûn sari sûng chu a ni tin, sual thilinhlan hrangin kêl ngaitua ni ta, khan sehrâtchal tuai le kêlbelrachal a pâl laia demnaboi zong sa ni ti.
Sûn sari sûng chu maichâm tah hrang khan irhlanna siam pe an ta, irthiangtir an ti, khanchu inhlan irthiang ta an ti.
Khan sûnhai a hong hek tena chu, sûn riat nia irthokin ochaihai khan hâlirvôm thilinhlanhai chu maichâma khan tho an ta, irngeina thilinhlanhai leh khan; khanchu lei lôm ta ki ta,
Khan hmun irthiang dâi mikot nâi uala khan, nisua tianga nghaa khan a ni hruai lût nôka, a lei irkhâr maia.
Khan
Khan rêng chungthu chu
Khan nin hmâia hmâr tianga dâi mikot khan a ni hruaia; khan ki hei thîr vêla, irngai ro,
Khan
Khan mi pualoihai, Israel insûngkuahai laia khan hiang hin hrilin lân,

lungrîla sertan loi le taksa tianga sertan loi, râlhai ki hmun irthianga om hrang le porinchetir hranga ki in ngêta nin hong chôi sika nin intir omnahai hi ruk ta ri se; bai mani, sathâi mani, thisen mani nin inhlan lai khan ki thuthunghai chu nin insiata, nin intir omnahai bôk sana hrang vaiin.
Khan ki thil irthianghai enkolna sin chu nei mak chêia, khannisian ki hmun irthianga khan nin irthûla ki sintho hrangin mi nin inthanghaia.

Pathianin hiang hin a ti a ni: Mi râlhai lungrîla sertan loi, taksa khoma sertan loi mi râlhai i ang khom Israel irchihai laia lei om tâkhai khom chu, ki hmun irthianga khan an ilût hrang ni ma,” a tia.
Khan, “Israelhai, an millim irzûla an irhmang laiin keima irthoka hlataka fe tâkhai, Levi mihai khan anni sualna kha pêl an ti.

In sûnga sin zongin, in dâi mikothaia khan enkolin, ki hmun irthianghai khan sinthotu ni an ti; mipuihai ta hranga irbôlna le pum hâlirvôm thil inhlanna hrang kha that an ta, anni sintho pe hrangin an makunga khan ngîr ki ti.

An millimhai kôla khan a sin an lei tho pe tâk sika khan, Israel sûngkuahai ta hrangin suala irtetna kêng an lei chang ta, khasikin an chunga khan ki kut irlek ki ta, an sualna chu anni ngêtin pêl an ti.

Keima ta hrangin ochai sin chu tho hrangin, keima kôla chu an ihong nâi hrang ni mah. Ki thil irthianga i ang khom, le thil irthiang takhai chu an hong inai hrang ni mah. Khannisian an lei tho tâka, an intir omnahai le an inzakna chu anni ngêtin pêl an ti.
Khannisianlân annihai chu in sintuhai enkol hrangin siamhai ki ta, khataka sinthônahai murdi le, khataka tho hrang murdihai leh khan,” a tia.

Khan, “Ochai Levi irchihai, Zadoka nâipasalhai, keima irthoka Israelhai an rot lai khoma ki hmun irthiang enkolna sin neituhai kha. Keima sintho hrangin ni hong pe an ta; sathâi le thisen kha inhlan hrangin ki kôla khan ngîr an ti,
Ki hmun irthianga khan lût an ta, ki sintho hrangin ki dokâng hong nâi an ta, ki sin chu tho an ti.

Khan, irhuan sûng lai taka khan dâi mikota an lût tena chu hiang hin ni a ti. Puan zâiirhmi puan leh irvo an ta, irhuan sûng tianga le dâi mikot sûnga sin an tho laiin, an chunga samul puan an irbel hrang ni maka.
An lua khan puan zâiirhmi lukômhai kôm an ta, an konga khan puan zâiirhmi kekok bun an ta, kongkhit an ihmang hrang ni mah.

Khanchu mipuihai omna tualzôl pêninta uala khan an fe mânin, biakbuka an sinthôna silkai kha khekpai an ta, tentan irthianga khan an imâksan hrang a ni. Silkai danghai leh irvo an ta, an silkai irthianghai leh khan mipuihai dengtheina an intungtir loina hrangin.
“Ochaihaiin an lu an ivoi inkol hrang ni maka, an sam khom an inseitir hrang ni ual ma, a ruk bakin kêng an ihôi hrang.
Khanchu ochaihai khan tualzôl sûnginta uala an lût mânin uain an iin hrang ni mah.
Ochai tukhomin nupang mâka om rêng rêng an ilua hrang ni ma, Israel dôngmate irthiang mani, aninole, ochai dangin a ithisan, meithâi vai kêng an ilua hrang.
Ochaihai khan ki mipuihai chu thil irthiang le irthiang loi danglam dânhai le Pathian dâna irthianghai le irthiang loihai chu irchutir an ti.
Khanchu thubuaihai a oma niin chu, ochaihai khan ki dân ang takin roirêl an ti. Khanchu, ki kûthai chu ki dânhai le ki thu angin hmang an ti. Ki sabat nî khom chu an ivong irthiang hrang a ni.
“Khan, ochai chu a pa mani, a nâi mani, a urêngpa mani, aninole a farnu pasal la nei loi mani a ni noa ni’n chu mithi ruak tônin a iporinche hrang ni mah.
Khanchu a’rthiang nôk hnung tena chu sûn sari sûng nghâk a ta.
Khanchu biakbuk tualzôl sûnginta uala khan lût a ta, ar thâr irthiangna hrangin thil inhlan a ti. Biakbuka sin a tho nôk theina hrangin, kei
Khanchu ochaihai khan irchon nei an ta, kei hi an irchon chu ki nia, Israel ram sûnga rênghaiin irchon nei no nihai, kei hi an thil nei tinrêng chu ki ni.
Bu thilinhlanhai, sual ta hranga thilinhlanhai tho’nsualna thilinhlanhai kha ochaihaiin fa an ta, khanchu Israel rama thilinhlan tinrênghai chu an ta ni a ti.

Ochaihai khan a ra maton tak laia a satak le thil dang ki kuanga an inhlan murdihai kha dong an ta, khanchu mipuihaiin bai an sin rikipa, bai sin maton tak kha ochaihai kuang thilinhlanna hrangin pe an ta, khanchu ki satvurna chu an insûnga khan tung a ti.
Khanchu ochaihai khan va mani, ramsa mani, a binga thi mani, aninole ramsa danghai ithat mani chu an ifâk hrang ni ma,” a tia.
Khan ram kha ni zêka, nam tinhai dongtum chit chu ni pêkhai tena, hmun irthiang tak hmunkhat chu
Khanchu hi hmun sûnga hin biakbuk hmun hrangin a sei lam chu mûk irzaringaa sei, a khang khom irzaringaa lian a ini hrang a ni, hmun ôl mûk sômringaa sei hi ar hîlin om sa a ti.
Khanchu hi hmun a chimrip, a dung tiang mêl sôm hleihni le a chimrip, a khang tiang mêl ringa chu irkhi ni ta, khataka khan biakbuk le hmun irthiang tak chu om a ti.
Kha kha a rama Hmun Irthiang chu ni a ta, biakbuka
Khan a dung mûk sînghnia irsâng le a khang sîngkhat chu Levi mihai, kha ina sinthotuhai omna khopui hrangin, an dongtum chu ni a ti.
Khanchu hmun irthiang khêl zel kha, a dung tiang mêl hni le a chimrip chu khopui hmun hranga sia ni a ta, khataka khan Israel mi tukhom om thei an ti.

Khanchu roirêltu rêng ta hrang khomin ram chu sia ni a ta, nitâk tianga hmun irthiang ramri ata kha Mediteranean Tuipui nitâk tiang ten ni a ta; khanchu nisua tianga hmun Irthiang ramri ata kha nisua tianga ram ten kha ni a ti. Israel panamhai kuanga ram pêka om le khan a dung sei lam chu ir-ang mai a ti.
Hi hmun hi roirêltu rêngin Israel rama a hmun dongtum ni a ta, khanchu mipuihai chu dengintheitir ni ta no nihai, hmun dang murdi chu Israelhai ta ni ta a ti.
Khanchu
Mi tinin irkhîna le neinun varna diktak chu an ihmang ngêt hrang a ni.

Khanchu neinun tâng irkhîna epha chu neinun zôi irkhîna bath leh khan a keng dân ir-ang mai a ta. Epha khomin homer hmun sôma senin hmunkhat keng a ti. An ruaiin irtênahai kha homer dungzui ang takin ni a ti.
Nin irkhi hrang dân chu hiang hin ni a ti, Gera sômhni chu sekel khat ni a ta, sekel sômruk chu mina khat ni a ti.
Khanchu hiang hin thil nin inhlan hrang lam chu a ni. Bupui homer khat, khan epha hmun ruka senin hmunkhat, fatun homer khatin epha hmun ruka senin hmunkhat pe nin ti.
Khanchu oliv hriak chu kor khata bath hmun sôma sena hmun khat ni a ti; kha kha bath sôm tihna a nia, homer khat a ni.
Khanchu belra pâl irzahni laia belra inkhat ni a ti; hâlirvôm thilinhlan, bu thilinhlan le irngeina thilinhlanhai hong chôi nin ta, khanchu nin sualhai ngaidam ni a ti, kei
“A ram mi murdihai khan Israel roirêltu rêng kuang hi thilinhlanhai hi an ichôi ngêt hrang a ni.

Khanchu kûtna haia, tha thar nikhuahaia sabat nikhuahai le, Israel sûngkua kûtna zoro bi neihai khan hâlirvôm thilinhlan hai, bu thilinhlanhai, Israel sûngkuahai ta hrangin irtanna siamna hrangin, sual ta hranga thilinhlan hai, bu thilinhlan hai, hâlirvôm thilinhlan hai, irngeina thilinhlan hai chu ama’n irbuktir a ti,” a tia.
Khanchu
Ochaiin sual ta hranga thilinhlan thisen kha la a ta, biakbuk chopui mikothai le maichâm irki kil minlihai khan sûnginta ual tualzôl dâi mikot chopuihai khan pol a ti.
Khanchu kha tha, a sûn sari nî khom khan kutkechâi le inhriat loina sika sualna thotuhai ta hrangin khaang dên khan tho ni a ti. Khaang khan biakbuk ta hrangin irtanna chu siam ni a ti.
“Khanchu tha masa tak sûn sôm hleiminli nî khan Ferkân kût chu hmang nin ti, sûn sari sûnga kût chu; khanchu sûn sari sûng chu bai chol pol loi fa ni ti.
Khanchu kha nî khan rêngin ama ta hrangin le kha rama mipuihai ta hrang khan sual ta hranga thilinhlanna hrangin sehrâtchal pe a ti.
Khanchu kût sûng, sûn sari sûng kha a nî tin sehrâtchal sari le belrachal sari demnaboi chu
Khanchu bu thilinhlanna hrangin, sehrâtchal inkhat epha khat, khanchu epha khat senga khan hriak inkhat seng pe sa a ti.
Khanchu tha sarina sûn sôm sûn ringaa irphut, kût sûng, sûn sari sûng kha sual thilinhlanna hranghai, hâlirvôm thilinhlanna hranghai chu ir-ang natin tho a ti,” a tia.
Khanchu

Khan rêng chu dâi mikot bokrop lampuia khan lût a ta, dâi mikot chopui kôla khan ngîr a ti. Khanchu ochaihai khan hâlirvôm thilinhlan le irngeina thilinhlan chu inhlan an ti. Dâi mikot bokropa khan Pathian biak a ta, khanchu fesuak nôk a ta, khannisian khohloi tena chu dâi mikot kha khâr ni no ni.
Khanchu, sabat nikhuahai le tha thar de nîhai chu, kha rama mipuihai khom khan
Khanchu sabat nî chu rêngin
Khanchu bu thilinhlan belrachal le pêk hranga khan epha khat ni a ta, khanchu belratehai le bu thilinhlan pêk hranga om chu a nuam dôr ni a ta, khanchu epha khat sahriak inkhat seng chôi sa ni a ti.
Khanchu tha thar kût zoroa, sehrâtchal tuai inkhat, belrate kiruk le belrachal inkhat inhlan an ta, an rêngin demnaboi ni a ti.
Khanchu sehrâtchal tuai leh khan epha khat pe sa a ti. Belratehai leh khan a nuam dôr pe a ta, khanchu epha khata sahriak inkhat seng pe sa a ti.
Khan rêng kha a va lût tena chu dâikot bokropa khan fe a ta, khataka ngêt khan suak nôk a ti.
“Khan kût zorohaia,
Khan, rêng chu mipuihai an lût zoroa hong lût ngai a ta, an suak tena suak nôk ngai a ti.

Khanchu kûtnahaia le zoro bîk nei kûtnahaia khan bu thilinhlan chu sehrâtchal inkhata khan epha inkhata, belrachal tuai inkhata epha inkhat, belrate pe thei a ta, epha khata hriak litar inthum zêl a ini hrang a ni.
Khanchu roirêltu rêng khan
Khan
Khanchu a zîng tin baidi thilinhlan khom pe sa ni ta, epha hmun ruka zêkin hmun khat le, sahriakin hmun thuma zêkin hmun khat baidi leh irzêl hranga khan. Khanchu kumkhontuangin
Khanchu belrate, baidi le sahriakhai hi kumkhontuangin
Khan,

Khannisian, roirêltu rêng khan a ram chu a sinthotuhai laia a tu khôk mani kuang a pêka ni’n chu, kha ram kha zalênna kum a hong tung nôk tena chu an rêng ngêtin hong om nôk a ti. Ama ta a nia, ama le a nâipasalhai vaiin dong ta tak thei an ti.

Khan roirêltu rêng khan mipuihai irchon rêng rêng anni ata a ilâkpai viat hrang ni maka, a nâipasalhai kuang ram a ipêkhai chu ama ta hranga ram inkunga omhai ta kha a ipêk hrang a ni; ki mipuihai chu an ramhai sutpaia deng an theitirhai loina hrangin,” a tia.

Khanchu, mihriam khan hmâr tianga ngha tentan lûtna tualzôl sûnginta ual sim tianga dâikot kôla khan a ni hruaia. Hihai hi ochaihai ta hranga tentan irthianghai chu an nia, khanchu tentanhai nitâk tianga om hmun chu a nir hmua.

Khanchu ki kuang, “Hi hi a ni ochaihaiin sual ta hranga thilinhlan le tho’nsualna thilinhlan hmehai an suangna hrang le baidi thilinhlanhai an ir-emna hrang chu, thil irthiang rêng rêng tualzôl pêninta uala khan a hong chôi loina hrangin,” a tia.
Khan tualzôl sûnginta uala khan a ni hruaia, tualzôl minlia khan a nin fetira, khan irngai ro, kha irhuan irki tina khan tualzôlhai a oma.
Irhuan sûng tualzôl irki minlihai khan irkul khom mûk sômminlia sei, mûk sômthuma lian hi a oma; hi a’rki minli hin irtiat nat an ni.
Khanchu tualzôl tin khan ar hîlin lung bang hi a oma, bang depa khan mei thôna hmunhai hi siamin a oma.
Khanchu mihriam khan ki kuang, “Hihai hi buhmun inhai chu an nia, mipuihaiin thilinhlan an ipêkhai kha biakbuka sinthotuhaiin an isuangna hrang hmun chu a ni,” a tia.

Khanchu, mihriam khan biakbuk lûtna khan a ni hruai nôka, khanchu irngai ro, tui chu a lûtna hnuai ata kha suakin biakbuk nghana tiang nisua tiang khan a luanga. Khan tuihai chu sim tiang panga biakbuk hnuai tiang ata kha sim tiang panga maichâm omna tiang khan a luanga.

Khanchu mihriam khan biakbuk hmun ata kha hmâr tianga dâi mikota khan a ni hruaisuaka, khanchu nisua tianga ngha dâi mikot vêla khan a ni chaipuia, khanchu ivadungte hi dâi mikot sim tiang pang ata hi a luanga.
Khanchu ar khîna hmol leh khan mihriam khan ivadungte kha mûk sângkhat nisua tianga khan ar khia, khanchu khataka khan, kha ivadungte kha pal hrangin a ni hrila; tui kha ki kechum tena inthûk a nia.
Khanchu mûk sângkhat ar khi nôka, khataka tui kha chu ki’rkhûk ten a nia, khanchu mûk sângkhat dang a’rkhi nôka, kha tui kha chu ki kong ten a nia.
Kha hnung chu mûk sângkhat dang ar khi nôka, kha tui kha chu an thûk sabak tâk sikin pal thei ta ma unga, irhliai ti no’n chu irkân lam om thei ta maka.
Khanchu ki kuang, “Mihriam nâipa, hihai hi savingin ngaitua ro,” a tia. Khanchu mihriam khan tuidung panga a ni hruai nôka.
Kha hmun kha ki tung tena chu, ivakam inhnia khan thing tamtak hi ki hmua.

Khanchu ki kuang, “Hi tuihai hi nisua tiang ata ram hi hroin Jordan phâizôla a lûta, khatak ata kha tuipui thia a luang lûta. Khan tuipui thia a luang lût tena chu kha tuipuia tui al kha tui irthiangin an changtir ngai.
Khanchu tui luangna hmun tina khan ramsa chi tinrêng le ngahai om an ta, tui khan tuipui thia tuihai kha irthiangtir a ta, a luangna hmun tina hringna intungtir a ti.

Khanchu Engedi tuihnâr ata Eneglaim tuihnârhai tena khan nga cheltuhai chu tuipui kôla khan om an ta, khataka khan an lênhai chu kaizarin phoi an ti. Khataka khan Mediteranean tuipuia nga chi tinrêng an iom angin nga chi tinrênghai chu om an ti.
Khannisian khataka tuichir hmunhai le dialdôk hmunhai kha chu irthiangtir ni no ni, michi khurin om mai a ti.

Khanchu tuidung hi tiang le so tianga ivakamhai khan bua ngam hrangin thingkung chi tinrênghai mông a ta, a hnâhai chu itiklai khom thêm no nia, ra insua loiin om no nihai. A tha tin ra thar nei mai an ti. Biakbuk ata tui zuang luangsuak khan an fâhai sikin. Thingkunghai khan fâk hrang insua an ta, an hnâhai chu mihai damna hrangin hmang ni a ti,” a tia.
Nin irchibulhai kuang khan hi ram hi inluatirhai hrangin chong ki len kung tâk sikin, atûn chu ir-angsarin nin rêngin irsem ta roi.
Hmâr tianga ramri chu Mediteranean tuipui ata kha nisua tiang panin Hethlon khopui le Hamath panna lampui tianga fe, Zedad khopuia a suaka.
Hamat le Berotha-ah fe zêl a ta, Hamat le Damaska irdîna Sibraim fe thengin Hauran ramria Hazerhatikon dênin fe a ti.
Hmâr tianga ramri chu Mediteranean tuipui ata kha Enon khopui nisua tiang a fea, Damaska le Hamath ramri hmâr tiang khan a suaka.

“Khan nisua tianga ramri chu Damaska le Hauran ramkâr ata kha sim tiang panin a fea, Jordan dung kha Israel le Gilead ramria omin Israel chu nitâk tiang a oma, Gilead chu nisua tiang a oma; khanchu tuipui thia Tamar hmun a va suna.

Khanchu sim tianga ramri kha sim tianga nitâk dep tiang irkhô riaiin Tamar ata kha Meribath-kadesh tui omna hmun ten kha a nia. Khanchu hmâr tianga nitâk dep riaiin a fe nôka, Aigupta ramri zuiin Mediteranean tuipui ten kha a ni.
Khanchu nitâk tianga ramri chu Mediteranean tuipui zel kha a ni, hmâr tianga Hamath fena lampui nitâk tiang dep ten kha a ni.
Hi ram hi nir chihai kuang khan sem ro;

hihai hi kumkhua irchon hrang chu ni a ta, khanchu ram dang mi nin laia om nâi le tehai lei nei tâkhai khom khan ram kha nin irsem tena anni khomin dongtum nei an ti. Anni chu Israel mihai anga tep sa ni an ta, Israel mihai laia khan tasân pumin ram kha anni’n dong an ti.
Ram dang mihai khan an omna hmuna mihai leh khan an dongtum chu hmu seng an ti. Kei
Khan hmâr tianga ramri chu Mediteranean tuipui ata kha nisua tiang a pana.
Hethlon khopui ata kha Hamath panna lampuia khan a theng thaia. Khatak ata kha Enon khopui tiang fe maiin Damaska le Hamath ramri kha a va suna.
Nam tinhai khan nisua tiang ata hi nitâk dênin del an ta,
khanchu hmâr tiang ata sim tianga delpu
hranghai chu hihai hi an ni.
Dana, Asera, Naftalia, Manasea, Efraima,
Reubena le Judahai hi an ni.

Khanchu Juda ram sim tiang pang kha ram irthiang ni a ta, a khang chu hmâr tiang ata sim tianga dênin mêl sôm hleihni le a chimrip ni a ta, a dung tiang khom nisua tiang ata khaang dên khan nih a ta, nam tinhai kuanga ram zêka om ang khan, khanchu biakbuk chu khataka khan om a ti.
Khanchu hi ram laitaka hin mêl sôm hleihni le a chimrip, a khang tiang mêl sôm chu
Ochaihai khom khan hi ram irthiang hi dong sa an ta, nisua tiang ata nitâk tiang kha mêl sôm hleihni le a chimrip ni a ta, hmâr tiang ata sim tiang kha mêl ringa ni a ti.
Khanchu hi hmun hi Zadoka irchi suanpâra ochaihai ta hrang ni a ti. Anni hin chu iamom takin ki sin an thoa, Levi mihai ang khan Israelhai sual sinna khan kop sa mahai.
Khasikin anni chu Levi mihai hmun kôla khan hmun nei an ta, kha kha hmun irthiang tak chu ni a ti.

Khanchu ochaihai ram sim tiang panga khan, Levi mihai khom khan kha rama khan hmun nei an ta, nisua tiang ata nitâk tiang chu mêl sômhleihni le a chimrip ni a ta, hmâr tiang ata sim tiang chu mêl ringa ni a ti.
Khanchu

Khanchu ram irthiang a la zôk, a dung tiang mêl sômhleihni le a chimrip le a khang tiang mêl hni le a chimrip kha chu hmun Irthiang ni maka, kha kha chu vântâng ihmang hrang ni a ti. Khataka khan om thei an ta, ram kha hmang thei an ti. Khopui chu a ram inlaina taka khan om a ti.
Kil minli nei ni a ta, irki tin kha mûk sângminli le mûk irzaringa ni chit a ti.
Khanchu khopui irhîl irki tina khan hmun ôl, a khang mûk irzahni sômringa hi om a ti.

Khanchu khopui sin zoia a om tena la zôk, hmun irthiang sim tiang kha a dung tiang mêl ringa le a khang tiang mêl hni le a chimrip, nisua tiang khan chu a dung tiang mêl ringa le a khang tiang mêl hni le a chimrip, nitâk tianga kha, khopuia omhai loi thôna hrang ni a ti.
Khopuia om, a tu tukhomin, a tu namhai khomin kha hmun kha loiin nei thei an ti.
Khanchu hi ram irthiang hi irki minli nei ni a ta, irki tin kha mêl sôm hleihni ni zit a ti; kha khan khopui omna hmun khom kha huam sa ta a ti.
Khanchu hi hmun biakbuk le ochaihai ram le, Levi mihai ram le khopui omna khêl nisua tiang le nitâk tianga ram zôkhai chu roirêltu rêng ta hrang ni a ti.
Roirêltu khan Benjamina-hai ram le Judahai ram kârhai chu dong a ti.
Khanchu hi hmun irthiang sim tiang pang murdi hi Jordan dung nisua tianga sûngkua omhai khan del an ta,
sûngkua tin khan nisua ramri tiang ata, Mediteranean tuipui ten khan ram dong chit an ti.
Hmâr tiang ata sim tiang tena dongtu hranghai
chu Benjamina hai,
Simeona hai, Isakara hai, Zebulunhai le Gad-hai ni an ti.
Khan sim tianga Gad-hai ramri chu Tamar ata Meribath-kadesh tui omna hmun ten kha ni a ta, khatak ata kha Aigupta tuidung zuiin Mediteranean tuipui ten kha ni a ti.
Khanchu
Khan hihai hi khopuia irthoka suakhai chu an ni, hmâr tiang khan, irkhîin mûk sângminli irzaringa;
khan khopui dâi mikot chu Israel namhai irhming omdân angin ni a ta, hmâr tiang khan chu dâi mikot inthum; Reubena dâi mikot inkhat, Juda dâi mikot inkhat le Levi dâi mikot inkhat;
khan, nisua tiang khom khan mûk sângminli irzaringa ni a ta, khan dâi mikot inthum, Josefa dâi mikot inkhat, Benjamina dâi mikot inkhat le Dan dâi mikot inkhat;
sim tianga khan irkhîna mûk sângminli irzaringa ni a ta, dâi mikot inthum; Simeona dâi mikot inkhat, Isakara dâi mikot inkhat, Zebulun dâi mikot inkhat;
nitâk tiang khom khan mûk sângminli irzaringa ngêt nih a ta, dâi mikot inthum le Gad dâi mikot inkhat, Asera dâi mikot inkhat; Naftalia dâi mikot inkhat.
A’rhîlin mûk sîngkhat sângriat ni a ta; kha khopui irhming kha, kha nî rengata chu, “Jehova Sammah ni a ti,” tiin.
Juda rêng Jehoiakima roirêl kum thumna khan Babulon rêng Nebukadnezara’n Jerusalem a hong irhuala.
Khan

Khan rêngin Israel nâihai laia mi, rêng irchihai le mi sa irchihai, thoibop demnaboi, hmêl satak, vârna tinrêng nei, inhriatna tianga bengvâr, thil irphut dân khom sûtthei ngai, rêng ina omdân thei ngai hong hruai lût hrang le Kaldai chong le thilsiam irchu hrangin thainuzelhai hruaitu Aspenaza chu a hrila.
Rêng khan rêng bunêk anga nêka, a uain in anga in thei hrang a ngaituaa, khaanga kum thum infâ hrang, kha zoiin rêng makunga an ngîr theina hrangin.
Hihai lai ata hi Juda nâihai laia mi Daniela, Hanania, Misaela, le Azariahai an oma.
Khanchu thainuzelhai hruaitupa’n an irhming a phuahaia; Daniela chu Beltesazzara a tia, Hanania chu Sadraka, Misaela chu Mesak, Azaria chu Abednego a tia.
Khannisian Daniela lungrîlin rêng bu le uain fâk le nêkna khan porche nuam maka; khanchu a porinche loina hrangin thainuzel hruaitupa kuang a ngêna.
Khanchu Pathianin Daniela chu thainuzel hruaitu ata kha inditna le lungthungna an dongtira.

Khan, thainuzel hruaitu khan Daniela kuang, “Nin fâk le nêk ngaituatu, ki rêngpa ki chi ta; ni kum ir-angpui thoibop danghai nêka siat ualin ni hmêl kha a ihmu loi hrang ma ni? Khaang khan a ni’n chu, rêng kuanga ki lu hi ichiom kêng nin ni inchangpui hrang,” a tia.
Thainuzelhai hruaitupa’n, Daniela, Hanania, Misaela le Azaria enkol hranga a isiapa kuang khan Daniela’n,
“Nang ki ngên, ni siahlohai hi sûn sôm ni fia ro, fâk hrang le in hrang vai ni pe maiin lân,
Ni kôla kin inlang dânhai le rêng bu nêk tui entuhai ei ruatharhai inlang dân tetûkin lân, ni ihmulam ang takin, ni siahlohai chunga hin tho ro,” a tia.
Khanchu hi thu hi ar fûk a tipuihaia, sûn sôm a fiahai ta.
Sûn sôm a hek ni chu, rêng bunêk tui entu ruathartehai nêkin an hmêl a sa’n an la mar maia.
Khanchu enkoltu khan an fâk hrang le uain in hrang a lâkpai pehaia, khohloia a pêkhai ta.
Khanchu hi ruatharte minlihai hin theina le vârna murdi le inhriatna le bengvârna, Pathianin a pêkhaia. Daniela’n inlârna le irmang murdi omzia an hriat thei tâka.
Khanchu rêng ina hong hruai lûtna hrang nikhua a hek ni chu thainuzel hruaitu’n annihai kha Nebukadnezara kuang a hon lûthaia.
Khanchu rêng khan a lei chongpuihaia, anni laia Daniela, Hanania, Misaela le Azaria-hai ang kha tûte om mahaia, khasikin rêng makunga an ngîra.
Khanchu, vârna le inhriat thiamna thu tinrêng, rêngin a hor donhaiin, a ram pumpuia dôi tin theihai le tasân theihai nêkin a lêt sômin a dik le a sa ti an hriat suak tâka.
Khanchu Daniela’n rêng Kura kum khatna dênin a sin mai ta.
Nebukadnezara roirêl kum hninaa khan, Nebukadnezara’n irmang a neia; a lungrîl a buai pea, in thei loiin a oma.
Khan rêngin a’rmang hrilfia hrangin dôitheihai, mitphil le tasân theihai Kaldai mihai koi hrangin thu a pêka. An honga, rêng kôla an ngîra.
Rêngin an kuang khan, “Irmang ki neia, kha irmang inhria’nfel hrangin ki lungrîl a sôl zoi ta,” a tia.
Khan, Kaldai mihaiin Aramaik chongin rêng kuang khan, “O rêngpa kumtuangin dam ro: ni’rmang chu ni siahlohai hi hrilin lân, a hrilfiana chu hrilhai kin ti,” an tia.
Rêngin Kaldai mihai kha a donhaia, “Ki kuang ata thusuak sai a ni ta, irmang le a hrilfiana chu ki makunga nin inlangtir thei no’n chu sâtpai ni nin ta, nin inhai khom nimnok siana ni a ti.
Irmang le a hrilfiana nin inlangin chu, keima ata thilpêk le lômman chôiirsângna roiinpui hmu nin ti. Khasikin irmang le a hrilfiana chu nin hril roi,” a tia.
Anni’n hiang hin an sâma, “Rêngin kha irmang kha chu a siahlohaiin nin hrilhai sian, an entirna chu hrilhai kin ti,” an tia.
Rêngin a sâma, “Zoro sôt lam vai kêng nin ingaitua ti kin hriat;

keima ata chu thu a suak tâk khom nin inhriat, keima ata irmang khan nin inlang loina hrang dân inkhat vai a om; minlak hrila, ki kuanga hril hrang minlak le thu chanlamboi nin isin a ni; khasikin irmang kha ni hril roi, khanchu a hrilfiana khom nin entir thei nin tih ti inhria ki ti,” a tia.

Khanchu Kaldai mihai khan rêng kuang, “Rêng ni inphûta entîrthei mi inkhat khom irnêng chunga hin om mahai: rênghai, ulianhai, roirêltu tûte’n hi thil hi dôi theihai, tasân theihai, Kaldai mihai la’rdon ngai mahai.
Khanchu rêng inphût hi thil intak a nia, taksa inlang theiloi mi pathianhai ti no’n chu a entir thei hrang tûte om mahai,” an tia.
Khasikin rêng kha a ning an mur pea, a thang a tôm pe tâka; Babulon mi vâr murdi thatpai ving hrangin thu a pêka.
Khanchu thupêk kha an sua tâka, mi vârhai chu that ni hrang an ni tâka; khan Daniela le a rualhai khom that hrangin an zonghaia.
Khan Daniela’n Babulon mi vârhai that hranga hong suak, Arioka rêng hrungtu chu vâr takin hiang hin a sâma;
Rêng hrungtu pâla hruaitu Arioka kuang khan, “Ithoa mo rêng thupêk chu kha dôra a irhnot?” tiin a va sâma. Arioka’n Daniela kha a hrila.
Khanchu Daniela kha a lûta, rêng kha hrilfiana inentir hrangin hun inkian roi tih a ngêna.
Khanchu Daniela chu in tiang a fea, a rualhai Hanania, Misaela le Azaria a hrilhaia.
Babulon mi vâr danghai laia Daniela le a rualhai an irhmang loina hrangin hi thu’rthup chungchânga hin irvân Pathian kuang lungkhamna an zonga.
Khanchu kha thu’rthup kha zân inlârnaa Daniela kuang a hor lang pea, Daniela’n irvân Pathian an pâk ta.
Daniela’n, Pathian irhming chu kumtuang dênin inpâkin om ri se:
Vârna le sinthotheina khom a ta a ni sikin.
Hunbihai le zorohai an danglam theia:
rênghai a sonpai theia, rênghai an dettir thei:
Mi vârhai kuang vârna a pêka;
an hretheitu kuang inhriat theina a pêka.
Thil inthûk le thil irthuphai an langa:
inthima om inhriatin, a kuanga vâr a pêk ngai.
O, ki’rchihai Pathian, vârna le theina ni petu,
ni kuanga kin izong nin hriattirtu chu,
Lômthu hril pumin nang kin pâk:
Rêng thil chu ni nin hriattir tâk sikin ti a hrila.

Khanchu Daniela’n Babulon mi vârhai irhmangtir hranga rêngin a inkung Arioka kuang a fea, a kuang, “Babulon mi vârhai chu irhmangtirhai no ro: rêng kuang ni hruaiin lân, rêng kuang a hrilfiana inentir ki ti,” a va tia.
Khanchu Arioka’n Daniela kha irhnot takin rêng kuang a hruaia, “Juda sala om nâihai laia rêng kuanga a hrilfiana inhriattu mi inkhat ki hmu ta,” a tia.
Rêngin Daniela, ar hming Beltesazzara kuang khan, “Irmang ki nei nôka a omzia mo ni hril theiin?” a lei ti pea.
Daniela’n rêng kuang khan, “Thil irthup, rêng inhriat nuam tak chu, mi vârhai, kutzia en theihai, dôi theihai le tasân theihaiin rêng an ihrilfia pe theiloi;
khannisian thil irthup inpuangtu Pathian chu irvâna a oma, rêng Nebukadnezara hi thil la hong om hrang a inhriattir nuam a ni hi te. Ni’rmang le ni zâlhmuna inlârna omzia chu hiang hin a ni.
O, inlaltak, ni zâlhmuna thil la hong om hranghai ni’rngaituaa, thil irthup inpuang ngaitu’n thil la om hranghai nang a inhriattir a ni.

Keima hin mi danghai nêka fingna ki nei sika, hi thil irthup hi ki kuanga inpuang ni maka, rêng kuanga a hrilfiana inhriattir hrang vai a ni, ni lungrîla ni ingaituahai nin hriat theina hrang vaia a ni.
O, inlaltak, ni hong tanga, irngai ro, millim roiinpuitak a oma. Kha millim lianpa, irtêk dûra om kha, ni kôla a ngîra; an lang dân khom phûkinthing om tak a ni.
Kha millim kha a lu rângachak irthiang tak a nia, a rôp le a bânhai chu sumru, a pum le a malpuihai chu dâr thîr,
a kehai chu thîr, a kezapha chu thîr le pil irzêl a nia.
Nangma’n chu lung, kuta sin suakna lâk hrang dân ni en laiin, millim khan a ke thîr le pila siam khan a hong dela, an khoi chita.

Khanchu, thîrhai le pil, dâr, sumru le rângachakhai a rêngin a koidara, misa lum laia hruizôla bu’rsi angin an om tâka: phâivua’n a sêm indarhaia, an omna hmun inhriat thei ni ta ma: millim deltu lung chu tâng liantak a chang tâka, irnêng a sip zita.
“Hi hi a ni, ni’rmang chu, a hrilfiana khom rêng kuang hin hril kin ti.
O inlaltak, nang chu rênghai rêng, irvân Pathianin ramhai, sinthotheinahai, hrâtnahai, roiinpuinahai a ipêk chu ni ni;
khasikin kho hmuna khom mihriam nâihai omna murdia, ramsa le vatêhai ten khom ni kuta a pêka, an rênga laia roirêl hrangin a pêk chu ni nia: rângachak lu chu nangma hi ni ni.
Khan ni hnunga hin ram dang mi nangma nêka chîn ual hong lian a ta; khan, dâr, ram inthumna irnêng murdia roirêl hrang chu om nôk a ta.
Khan, ram minlina chu thîr anga ngar om a ta; thîrin chu thil tinrêng a insiat thei angin, ama khom insiatin a idel indi hrang a ni.
A kezapha le a’rzunghai chu bêl siamtu saihlûm, a sen a zâr thîr anga ni ihmu ang taka khan, ram irsen ni a ta, khannisian amaa khan an ngarna chu om mai a ti, thîr le pilhlûm irpol ni ihmu ang khan.
A kezapha tianga thîr le pilpok ni ihmu ang khan ram senkhat tiang a siat ol a ta, senkhat tiang siat loiin om a ti.
Thîr le pil irzêl ni ihmu khan, anni khom mihriam irchi irpol ni a ti. Khannisian thîr le pila irzêl tatak thei loi ang khan, irzêl thei lik no nihai.

Kha nia rênghai khan irvâna Pathianin ram zuan ding a ta, kha ram kha chu siat ta ngai no ni; an lalna khom mi danghai hrangin mâksan ni ta no ni; hi ram murdihai hi insiatin inhek zoi a ti, a ram chu kumtuangin inding mai ta a ti.

Tâng tianga lung, kut ni loia tuk suakin, thîr, dâr, saihlûm, sumru, le rângachakhai a siata ni ihmu ang khan, Pathian roiinpuitak khan rêng makunga hin nakana thil hong om hrang chu inpuang a ni: khanchu irmang kha a tak ngêta, a hrilfiana khom a diktak a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu, rêng Nebukadnezara chu a khûksadelin Daniela kha chubai a mûka, a kuanga thilinhlan le mirimhoihai inhlan hrangin thu a pêka.
Rêngin Daniela kuang khan, “Hi thilirthup ni inpuang theinaa hin, nin Pathian chu pathiante-hai Pathian, rênghai RENG, thilirthup inpuangtu a lei ini pial kêng a ini,” a tia.
Khanchu rêng khan Daniela kha a donsuia; thilpêk roiinpui tamtak a pêka, Babulon ram bial pumpuia roirêl hrang le Babulon mi vârhai murdi chunga a hruaitutak ni hrangin a sia tâka.
Khan Daniela izong angin rêng khan, Sadraka, Mesaka le Abednego-hai chu Babulon bial chungchânga hruaituin a siahaia, Daniela rêk chu inlaltak roirêlna khan a om ta.
Rêng Nebukadnezara’n rângachak millim, a’rsânglam mûk sômruk, a khang lian mûkruk a isiam, Babulon biala Dura phâizôla a siaa.
