Rêng Nebukadnezara’n Thuneituhai, a thûl theihaia, optuhai, roirêltuhai, sum enkoltuhai, le ar fûktirtuhai, le dân inhriat le a rama roirêltuhai murdi chu rêng Nebukadnezara millim siam ser hrang dân ngaituain an irbuka.

Thuneituhai, aiôtuhai, optuhai, roirêltuhai, sum enkoltuhai, irfûktuhai, dân inhre mihai le ram bial hruaituhai murdi chu rêng Nebukadnezara millim siam sernaa khan an hong inkhôma, a millim siamna kôla an ngîra.
Khan inring takin tâng an sama, “O, mi murdihaio, nam tin le chong tin hmanghaio.
bekul hai, theihle hai, têngrep hai, serânda le rosem lianhai, irhâinei murdi’n ar hâi nin inhriatin chu rêng Nebukadnezara rângachak millim siam kha khûksadela chubai mûk hranga thupêk nin ni:
mi tukhom khûksadela chubai mûk loi chu, kha zoroa zel khan kângirhmangna meipuia pai ni nin ti,” tiin.

Khasikin mipui om murdi’n, bekul, theihle, têngrep, rosem le serânda le a dang irhâinei murdi irhâi an inhriatin, mi tin, nam tin, chong tinhaiin rêng Nebukadnezara millim siam chu khûksadelin chubai an mûk tâka.
Kha zoro lai takin Kaldai mi senkhathai an hong nâia, Juda mihai an sêlhaia.
Rêng Nebukadnezara kuang khan, “O inlaltak, kumtuangin dam sôt ro,
Nangma’n, o inlaltak, mi tukhom bekul, theihle, perkhuang, rosem, têngrep le serânda irhâinei murdi’n khûksadelin millim chubai nin imûk hrang a ni:
tia tukhom khûksadela chubai mûk loi murdi hâlirvômna meipuia pai ni an tih tia thupêk nin suaa.

Juda mi senkhat Babulon ram bial chungchânga hruaitua ni isiahai, Sadraka, Mesaka le Abednego hai kha an oma, hi mihai hin, o inlaltak ite bê’n nang an ibe pe loi a ni; ni pathianhai sintho loiin, ni rângachak millim siam chubai mûk nuam loiin,” tiin an hrila.
Khanchu Nebukadnezara ningmur takin Sadraka, Mesaka le Abednego hai chu hong hruaihai hrangin thu a pêkhaia; khanchu hi mihai hi rêng kuanga khan an hong hruaihaia.
Nebukadnezara’n an kuang, “O Sadraka, Mesaka le Abednego, ki pathian sintho loia, ki rângachak millim siam hi chubai mûk loi nin itum ma ni?

Atûn hin bekul, theihle, perkhuang, rosem, têngrep le serânda irhâinei murdi an ringa khûksadela ki millim siam chubai nin la mûk hrangin chu la sa a ta; nin mûk nuam noa ni’n chu, kha zoro zel khan hâlirvômna meipuia lût nin ti; ki kut ata sansuak theitu pathian chu tu mo a ini hrang?” a tia.
Sadraka, Mesaka le Abednego haiin hiang hin an sâma, “O Nebukadnezara, hi thu hin nang kin i sâm nang khomin ite inhre ma unga.
Kin Pathian a sin kin itho pe khan hâlirvômna meipui ata ni sansuak thei a ni, ni kut ata, o inlaltak ni sansuak ngêt a ti, an tia.
Khan ni no khomsian, o inlaltak ni pathianhai sin chu tho no ni ung, ni rângachak irlim siam khom chubai mûk no ni ung, ti hi inhre ro,” an tia.
Khanchu Nebukadnezara chu a sân a ning an mur tâka, Sadraka, Mesaka le Abednego-hai ata kha a hmêl a danglam tâka; hâlirvômna meipui lak a tik danga nêka bâk saria hrâtin tho roi ti thu a pêkhaia.
Khanchu a sipaihai laia mi hrât inthanghai chu Sadraka, Mesaka le Abednego hai chu khitphiara hâlirvômna meipuia pai hrangin thu a pêka.
Khanchu hi mihai hi an silkai puma khit phiarhaiin hâlirvômna meipuia an paihai tâka.
Khanchu rêng thupêk ar hnot sikin le hâlirvômna mei lak a hrât hrai sikin Sadraka, Mesaka le Abednego indomtuhai chu meidôn khan a kâng thathaia.
Hi mi inthum Sadraka, Mesaka le Abednego-hai hi khit pumin meipui laia khan an om raka.

Khanchu rêng Nebukadnezara’n a’rkhêl a ti tak taka, irhnot takin a thoia, ar fûkpuituhai kuang khan, “Mi inthumhai kha khitphiara meipui laia ei ipaihai mo ni ma?” a tia. Anni’n, “O inlaltak, ei ipai lûthai an ni,” an tia.
Ama’n, “Irngai roi, mi minli anga meipui laia irvêlin na tuang viat loiin ki hmu, minlina inlang lam len vâng chu vântîrtôn hmêl irput angin a om,” a tia.

Khanchu, Nebukadnezara chu hâlirvômna meipui mikot bula a hong nâia, “Sadraka, Mesaka le Abednego, nangni anchungtak Pathian suakhaio, hong suak unglân, hin hong roi,” tiin a chongpuihaia. Khanchu Sadraka, Mesaka le Abednego chu meipui lai ata an hong suaka.

Khanchu thuneituhai, ramoptuhai, ar fûkpuituhai le ar bukhai khan, hi mihai chunga hin mei sintho theina lua irdang loia, an sam mal lua kâng irkin loia, songkolhai khom a om balama om, mei mirim lua innam loiin an hmua.

Rêng Nebukadnezara’n thu a hrila “Sadraka, Mesaka le Abednego hai Pathian chu inpâkin om ri se; ama’n irvân tirtônhai a zuang tîra; a siahlo a sinthotuhai chu a sansuaka, kha mihai khan an Pathian ti no chu pathian dang sintho loiin, chubai khom mûk loiin, an taksa an inhlan ngama.

“Khasikin mi tin, nam tin, chong tinhaiin Sadraka, Mesaka le Abednego-hai Pathian chunga thil saloi hril murdi chu sâtpai ni an ta, an inhai khom insiat ni an tih ti thupêk ki siam nôk ta. Ama ang dôra sansuak theitu pathian dang rêng rêng om ta mahai,” a tia.
Khanchu rêng khan, Sadraka, Mesaka le Abednego-hai chu Babulon biala khan an liantirhai ta.
Rêng Nebukadnezara’n, mi tin, chong tin hmanghai laia, irnêng pumpui chunga omhai laia, irngeina inpungin om ri se.
Anchungtak Pathianin thil inentirnahai, thil irkhêl a ithohai hi an langtir ki nuam.
A thil inentirnahai chu a roiinpuiin,
a thil irkhêl tho khom a irkhêl ok a ni.
A ram chu ramhlu a nia,
a roirêlna chu irlo tin tina rêl a ti.
Khan kei Nebukadnezara hi ki ina hoitak le in hoitak sûnga ki fâkin ki nêka.
Irmang ki ichitak ki phana; ki zâlhmuna ki ngaituana le ki lua inlârna khan a nin buaia.
Khasikin Babulon mi vâr murdihai ni hrilfia pe hrangin thu ki pêkhaia.
Khanchu dôi theihai, tasân theihai, Kaldai mi tasân theihai an honga, ki’rmang chu ki hrilhaia, khannisian a hrilfia thei om mahaia.
A hnungkhôna chu Daniela, ki Pathian irhming ang irput, ar hming Beltesazzara Pathian irthiang irtha omna chu ki kuang a honga; ki’rmang chu a hrila,
o, Beltesazzara mitvai dôitheihai hruaitu, nangma hin Pathian irthiang irtha a om ti le thu’rthup murdi’n nan buai ngai mah ti kin hriat sikin: ki’rmanga ki ihmu inlârna le hrilfiana nin hril roh.
Ki zâlhmuna ki lua inlârna chu hi hi a ni: ki hong tanga, irnêng lai taka hin thing a oma; a’rsâng lam chu hril zoi loi a ni.
Thing chu a’rsôna, a’rsânglam chu irvân phâk ang dôr a nia, kôlkil ata an lang thei vinga.
A hnâ en hoiin, a ra khom a tama, thilhring murdihai fâk hrang a oma; ramsahaiin dâihlîmin an hmanga, chunglêng vatehaiin a ôna an riaka, taksa nei murdihai chu ama infâ ang an ni.
Ki zâlna rengata inlârna khan a hong ena, irngai ro, irvân ata enkoltu, mi irthiang a zuang suaka,
inring takin, “Thing chu tukin lân, a ônhai irhlei ro, a hna insil haiin lân, a rahai dêng zuan ro: a hnuaia ramsahai khom irzûlhaiin lân; a ônhaia vatehai khom vuanghai sian.

Khannisianlân rama hloisûlhai laia mông, irnêng thingkung bul chu, thîr le dârsen hruia khitin irnênga khan ma roi. Khanchu, irvân irdo’n buak sian, a dongtum chu irnênga hloisûl le ramsa leh omsuam ni sian.
A lungrîl chu mihriam lungrîl ang ni loiin danglam ni ri se; ramsa ngaitua ang ni sian, a chunga hunbi sari hek ni ri se.

Hi thu hlu hi a entuhai thu a nia, thil inphût hi mi irthianghai thua tho a nia, anchungtakpu’n mihriamhai inlalna rama hin thu a neia, a inuam takhai a pêka, mi irhnuai takhai khom an luatirhai ngai a nih ti mihriamin an inhriatna hrangin,” tia khêkin.

Khan, Nebukadnezara’n, “Hi irmang hi keima rêng Nebukadnezara’n ki iphan a ni,” a tia. “Nang o Beltesazzara, a hrilfiana chu inpuang ro, ki rama mi vâr murdihaiin chu a hrilfiana ni hril thei mahai; nangma’n chu thei ni ti, nangmaa hin chu Pathian irthiang irtha a om sikin,” tiin.
Khanchu, Daniela, ar hming Beltesazzara chu chidêk dôkin, ar ngaituana a buaia; Rêngin a kuang, “Beltesazzara, irmang a hrilfiana’n mo nang a inbuai,” tiin a hrila.
Beltesazzara’n, “Ki rêngpa irmang chu a en nuam loituhai hrang ni sian, a hrilfiana khom ni râlhai hrang ni sian.
Thing ni ihmu irsôn insa, irvân dêna kha, kôlkil ata inlang ving le
a hnâhai satak le ra tamtak, thilhring murdi fâk hrang om le ramsahai oma, a ôna vatehai riakbuk lei ni ngai chu,
o inlaltak, nangma ni nia; nir sôna, ni hrâta, ni roiinpuina chu a’rzata, irvân dênin, ni roirêlna chu kôlkil dên a nia.

Khan irvân ata enkoltu mi irthiang a hong suaka, thing chu phûrin lân, irhmang ri se: khannisian rama hloisûl laia môngin irnêng rîla chu thîr le dâr irzêl chu hôiin lân, irvân irdo’n buak sian, a om hrang dân chu ramsahai angin, a chunga zoro sari a tung khomin a hon lalin a hmua;
a hrilfiana chu hi hi a ni, o inlaltak, a’rsângtakpu thupêk, an lal tak ki rêngpa chunga hong tung chu a ni:

Mihriam lai ata inhnotsuak ni ni ta, ni omna hrang chu ramsahai laia ni a ti, sehrât angin hloisûl fa ni ta, irvân irdo’n nang buak a ta, ni chunga zoro sari hek a ti; anchungtakpu’n mihriamhai inlalna ram chunga thu a neia, a inuam tak a pêk ngai a nih ti nin hriat mân chu.
Khanchu a sûngril hoi hranga thu a ipêk ang khan irvâna thu a nei ti nin hriat hnung le chu ni ram chu ni ta ni mai a ti.
Khasikin o inlaltak, ki thu nang tihai hi pomin lân, ni sualna chu felna’n thûlin lân, nin châinahai chu, mi inrianghai nin renhaiin chu, ni khonhoinahai hi a la sei khom a ol,” tiin a sâma.
Hihai murdi hi rêng Nebukadnezara chunga thil hong tung chu a ni.
Tha sôm tha hni hek tiang chu Babulon rêng in sûnga a lêng vêl laiin,
rêngin, “Hi Babulon inlalna hi keima hrâtna ngêtin rêng omna hmun hrang le ki roiinpui satna hranga ki isiam mo ni ma?” tiin a hrila.
Kha thu kha rêng hmûra a suak lai takin, irvân ata irhâi a hong suaka, “O rêng Nebukadnezara ni kuang thu a hong tung: inlalna ram khan nang a mâksan ta.

Mihriam lai ata inhnotsuak ni ni ta, ni omna hrang chu ramsahai laia nih a ti: sehrât angin hloisûl fa ta ni ta, ni chunga zoro sari hek a ti; anchungtak khan mihriamhai inlalna ram chunga thu a neia, a inuam takhai a pêk ngai a nih ti nin hriat mân chu” tiin.

Kha zoro lai takin kha thil kha Nebukadnezara chunga a hong tung zela; mihriam lai ata inhnotsuakin a om ta. Sehrât angin hloisûl a fâka, a taksa chu irvân irdo irsilin a oma, a sam khom irmu mul ang le a mitinhai khom va mitin anga omin a iom a ni ta.
Khan zoro hek tiang chu kei Nebukadnezara hin irvân tiang ki tanga, ki hor hriat suaka, anchungtakpu sat ki vura, a hring mai chu kin pâka, kin zaa.
A roirêlna khom kumtuanga roirêl a nia:
a ram khom rammuala irlo tamtaka om a ni sikin.
Khan irnêng luatu murdihai hi ite bêa bê loi a ni.
Irvân sipai rualhai laia chu ama thutak a nia,
tûte’n ama kut chu irngamtir thei ni ma,
nangin te itin mo ni ti?
ti lua irdon ngam mahai.

Kha lai taka khan inhriatna ki nei nôka; ki ram sûnga kin lalnahai le ki satnahai chu ki nei nôkin ki’rhriata; khan a nir fûkpuituhai khan an ni hong pana, ki ram indetin a oma, roiinpui tamtak pêk belsa ki nia.
Khanchu kei Nebukadnezara’n irvân Rêng chu kin pâka, ki ichôiirsângin ki inzâ a ni, a sintho a fel sikin; mualinphoia omhai khom a irhnuaitir thei a ni.
Khan zân khat chu rêng Belsazzara’n hruaithe mi sângkhathai hrang lian takin an thea; an kôla khan uain a ina.

Belsazara’n uain a hon rui phol tena chu rângachak le sumrua bêl le bûrhai, a pa Nebukadnezara’n Jerusalem biak in ata a ilâksuak kha ama le a milianhai le a dôngmahai le a lâksîrhaiin uain inna hranga hong lâk hrangin thu a pêka.
Khanchu rângachaka siam bêl le bûrhai, Jerusalema Pathian biak in ata lâksuak kha an hong chôia. Rêng le a milianhai, a dôngmahai le a lâksîrhai khan uain inna’n an hmang tâka.
Uain inna in, rângachak, sumru, thîr, dâr, lunghaia siam pathianhai an chôiirsânghai dup dupa.
Kha lai taka khan mihriam kutpâr hi a hong inlanga, rêng inbang chung meiser inkhâina kôla khan a’rziaka, rêng khan a’rziaktu kuttum kha a hmua.
Rêng kha a hmêl a hong danglama, a lungrîl a buai pea, a ke kut irnak boiin a oma, a’rzalpui tâka.

Rêng chu Mitvai dôithei Kaldai mi tasân theihai hruai hrangin a khêka. Rêng khan Babulon mi vârhai kuang; “Mi tukhom hi irziak hi tepa a hrilfiana ni hril thei chu puan senduk insiltir ni a ti, a ringa rângachak zîngziri inhlitir ni a ta, a ram sûnga roirêltu inthumhai laia thuneitu tak ni a ti,” tiin a hrila.
Khan a mi vâr om dôrhai an hong lûta; khannisian a’rziak kha tep thei mahaia, a hrilfiana khom inhre loiin an oma.
Rêng Belsazzara chu a sate’n chardongin a bôm nôka, a hmêl danglamin a oma, a mi lianhai khom an lung a zîng pehai u uala.
Khan rêng le a mihai khêk irhâi khan rêngnu kha hruaithena ina a hong lûta; rêngnu khan, “O inlaltak kumtuangin dam ro; ni lungrîl inbuai no ro, ni hmêl khom danglam no ri se;

ni rama hin mi inkhat Pathian irtha irthiang nei mi a om; ni pa zoro lai ata, en theina, inhriat theina, vârna, Pathian vârna nei anga mi a om ti len hriat a ni tâka; o inlaltak ni pa rêng Nebukadnezara’n dôi theihai, kutzia en theihai, Kaldai mihai tasân theihai chunga hruaitua a lei isia a ni tâka;

lungrîl feltak irput inhriatna, inhriat theina le irmang hrilfiana, thu intak inhriat theina, dôi sût theinahai chu Daniela rêngin Beltesazzara a itihna hmuna a om ti inhriat a lei ni tâka. Atûn hin Daniela chu koi ni sianlân, a hrilfiana chu ni hril pe thei a ti,” tiin a hrila.
Khanchu Daniela kha rêng ina an hong hruaia, rêngin Daniela kha, “Daniela, Juda sala intânghai laia mi, ka pa inlaltakin Judai ram ata nang a hong ihruai kha mo ni ni?
Nangmaa hin Pathian irtha a oma, en theinahai, inhriat theinahai, vârna sabîk ni nei ti inhriat a nia, ni thu ki len hriata.
Atûn hi irziak hi tep le a hrilfiana nin hril hrangin tasân thei le mi vârhai an hong hruaihaia, khannisian a hrilfia thei om mahai.

Nangma’n chu hrilfia thei ni ta, dôi khom ni sût thei ti ki len hriata; atûn hin ni theiin chu a’rziak hi tepin lân, a hrilfiana khom ni hril ro, khanchu puansenduk insiltir ni ni ta, ni ringa rângachak zîngziri inhlitirin om ni ta, hi rama roirêltu inthumhai laia thuneitu tak ni ni ti,” a tia.
Khan Daniela’n, rêng kuang khan, “Ni thupêk chu nangma ta hrang ni sianlân, ni lômman chu mihai kuang pe ro; khannisian a’rziak hi chu rêng, nang tep pe ki ta, a hrilfiana khom a tia.
O inlaltak, ni pa Nebukadnezara chu inchungtak Pathian khan an laltira, an liantirin a sân a iroiinpuitir tak tak a ni;
liannatak a pêk sikin mi tin, nam tin, le chong tinhaiin an chia, a makunga an inthing ngaia; a inuam angin a thathaia, an hring theia, a inuamhai chôiirsângin, ar hnuaitirhai theia.
Khannisian a lungrîl irsongin, a milung a ngara, mualinphoiin a oma, a roiinpuina chu a lâkpai pea;

mihriam nâihai lai ata inhnotsuakin a oma, a lungrîl khom ramsahai angin, a omna khom rama sakuartunghai laia a nia; sehrât angin hloisûl fâkin, a taksa chu irdo irsilin a oma: Pathian inchungtakin mihriamhai inlalna rama thu a neia, a inuam tak an luatir thei ti ar hriatsuak mâka chu.
Khan nang a nâipa, o Belsazzara hihai hi nin hriat khoma, ni lungrîl irhnuaitir loiin,

irvân Rêngpa nêkin ni lian uala, a ina bûr bêlhai ni lâka, nang le ni mi lianhai ni dôngma le ni lâksîrhaiin uain inna’n nin hmanga; sumruhai, rângachakhai, dâr le thîr, thinghaiin lunga isiam pathianhai hmu theiloi, irngai theiloi, inhre theiloi kha nin chôiindôma; khan Pathian ni hringna murdi a kuta omtu khom inzak loiin.
Khanchu ama ata kut irbu chu a hong tîra, hi hi a hong irziak a ni ta.
“Hi hi a thu irziak chu a ni: MENE, MENE, TEKEL ti le PARSIN ti a ni.
Khan a hrilfiana khom hi hi a ni; Mene ti chu nin lal zoro hrang ten a’rsinsiaa, a inmongtir hrang tihna a ni;
Tekel ti chu ivarh ni nia, chuk ta mak che tihna a ni.
Parsin ti chu ni ram hi sem darh a nia, Media le Persia kuanga pêk a nih tihna a ni,” a tia.
Khanchu Belsazara’n thu a pêka, Daniela chu puan senduk an siltira, a rama khan roirêltu inthum laia inkhat ni hrangin an puang tâka.
Kha ni zân khan Kaldai rêng Belsazzara chu that a ni ta.
Khan Daria Midian mi khan ram chu a ilua a ni ta. Ama chu kum sômruk le kum hnia mi a ni.
Daria ram optu khan thunei hrang mi irzakhat sômhni, ram pumpuia siahai, a sa a tia.
Anni laia mi inthum an kunghai nôka, an laia inkhat chu Daniela a ni, hi thuneituhai hin an thurchi inhriat an irhlet maiin, Daria’n ite siatna a nei loina hrang sikin.
Daniela hi lungrîl diktak irput a ni sikin hruaitu le thuneituhai nêkin an lâr uala; rêng khomin ram pumpuia hruaitu ni hrangin an sâpa.
Khanchu hruaitu le thuneituhaiin an inhriatin chu zoro’nchum an zonga, khannisian zoro inchum hmu thei loiin, a dik loina lak hmu loiin; a iamomzoi sikin, dik loina le sualna mi ni loi a nia.
Kha tena chu hi mihai hin, “An Pathian dân thua hin ei hmu ta no’n chu, hi Daniela chunga hin zoro inchum hmu ta no ih,” an irtia.
Khanchu hruaitu le thuneituhaiin rêng kuanga irbukin hiang hin an hrila. “Rêng Daria, kumkhua’n damin lân.

Ram hruaituhai, thuneitu, ar fûktirtu le optu murdihai chu sûn sômthum sûnga, o inlaltak nang ti no’n chu pathian mo, mihriamhai kuanga zongna nei murdi chu kâmkeibaknei khura pai hrang, tiin rêng hin dân siamin khap sianlân, an irtia.
Atûn hin, o inlaltak, khapna indetin lân, Media le Persia dân danglam loi ang khan irhming irziakin lân,” tiin.
Khanchu rêng Daria khan a lekha irziaka khan ar hming a’rziak tâka.
Daniela’n a thu irziak kha irhming irziak a ni tah ti an hriatin in sûnga a lûta, a itho ngai angin sûn khata voithum a khûksadela, a chongchaia, a Pathian kuang lômthu a hrila.
Khanchu hi mihai hi an inkhôma, Daniela’n a Pathian kuang zongna le ngênna a nei ngai ti an hmusuak tâka.

Rêng kuang khan, rêng dân a ikhapna thu kha an hrila; “Sûn sômthum sûnga, o inlaltak, nangma kuang ti no’n chu pathian mo mihriam laia ite zongna nei loi hrang, a neitu chu kâmkeibaknei khura pai hrang tia dâna khan nir hming ni’rziak mo ni ma?” an tia.
Rengin “Kha thil kha chu a det a ni, Media le Persia dân danglam ngai loi angin,” tiin a sâmhaia.

Kha tena chu rêng kuanga khan, an tia. “Daniela Juda sala om nâihai laia mi khan, ni dân hi ite bêin bê maka, nir hming irziaknahai kha, a sûna voithum khûksadelin a chongchaia, a Pathian kuang,” an tia.
Hi thu hi, rêngin an hriatin chu a poi a ti tak taka, Daniela chu sansuak hrangin sûn sôt a tuma.
Hi mihai hin an hong irbuk nôka, rêng kuang khan, o inlaltak Media le Persia dânin khapna indanglam thei ni mah ti nin hriat, an tia.
Khanchu rêng khan thu a pêkhaia, Daniela chu an hong hruaia, kâmkeibaknei khura an paia. Rêngin Daniela kuang, “Ni Pathian a sin ni itho pe maipu khan nang saninzôk a ti,” a tia.
Khanchu lung an hong lâka, khur kotbâi kha an khâra; rêngin Daniela chungchâng hi a danglam loina hrangin ama kutsabi, a mi lianhai kutsabi leh irsin a pêka.
Rêng kha a ina a fea, bu ngheiin zânkhua an vâra, thil irhâi nei om loiin, zâlna khom do loiin.
Zînga chu rêng kha a thoia irhnot takin kâmkeibaknei khur tiang khan a fea.

Daniela omna khur a hong nâiin chu chap irhâiin an hriata, rêngin Daniela kuang khan, “O Daniela Pathian hring siahlo, ni Pathian a sin ni itho ngai khan kâmkeibaknei khur ata nang a inzôk thei mo?” a tia.
Daniela’n rêng kuang khan, “O inlaltak, kumtuangin dam ro;
ki Pathianin a vântirtôn a zuang tîra, kâmkeibaknei hmûr ar chîptira, ite ni ti mahai, a mithmua hrilsiatna boiin ki oma, ni chunga khom ite insiat ual ma unga,” a tia.
Khanchu rêng kha a lôm tak taka, Daniela kha khur ata kêlsua hrangin thu a pêka, khanchu an lâksuaka, natna tuang viat loiin, Pathian a iamzoi sikin.

Khanchu rêngin thu a pêka, Daniela sêlhai kha an hong hruaihaia. Kâmkeibaknei khura khan an paihaia; an nâi le dôngmahai le kâmkeibakneihai khan an inthikhaia, inpet inpetin khur mong pha loiin an inhekpaihai ta.
Khanchu reng Daria’n, mi tin, nam tin, chong tin hmanga irnênga omhai laia khan lekha a’rziaka, “Nin chunga irngeina inpungin om ri se.
Ki ram op sûnga hin Daniela Pathian hi biakhai sian chi ri sehai, tiin thupêk ki siam.
Ama chu Pathian hring a nia, a det kumkhuaa,
a ram chu insiat thei ni no nia,
a op khom a hek tenin op a ti.
Ama’n a saninzôka, a saninhringa,
irnêng le irvâna irsinsiana le thil irkhêl a tho theia;
ama hi kâmkeibaknei sinthotheina ata Daniela sansuaktu chu a ni,’ tiin.
Kha tena chu Daniela hi Daria roirêl lai le Persia mi Kura roirêl lai chu lam tinrênga a inchumtir tâk a ni.
Babulon rêng Belsazzara kum khatna khan Daniela’n irmang a neia, a zâlhmuna a ihmu chu, khan a’rmang chu a’rziaka, a tângpuiin an sîra.
Daniela’n zân inlârna khan hmu ki neia, irngai ro, kôlkung minlia phâivua hi tuipui lian taka ang khan a hong hrânga.
Khan tuipuia khan sa irkhêltak tak chi minli an hong suaka.
Inkhatna kha chu kâmkeibaknei ang a nia, irmu mitha a neia, a mitha pharin, irnêng ata a phara, mihriam anga ke inhnia ngîr theiin siam a nia, mihriam lungrîl irput angin ki en chiana.
Sa dang inhnina chu savom anga omin, hi tiang a kehai leh a ngîra, a bâia hin kângru inthum a oma, a sê khokhaia, thoiin lân taksa nei fa’n tam ro, tiin an hrila.
Kha irzoiin chu ki ena, irngai ro, a dang kâmkeite anga om a hnung tiang va mitha nei minli angin a oma, ama hin lu khom minli a neia, a kuanga khan roirêlna pêk a nia.

Kha zoia inlârna khan, irngai ro, sa minlina chu sa irkhêltak le ichiom tak ki hmu nôka; thîr ha roiinpuitak neia, a ei chut chuta, an pot thêrhaia, a ifâk mihliahai chu a sirphahaia: matona sa danghai nêkin chu danglam tak a nia, irki sômkhat nei a nia.

A’rki omdân ki ngaituaa, irngai ro, an laia hin irki chînte a hong mônga, matona irki inthumhai chu a bulrêta rênin, ama irkia hin a mit, mihring mit ang hi a oma, bâi khom a neia, thil tamtak a hrila.

Khan, ki thîr mai laiin, rêngtoihmun lei irdo diam hi a oma; kha rêngtoihmun inkhat chunga khan kumkhontuanga om maipu kha a hong toia. A tukrivo chu vur anga vâr a nia, a sam chu samul irthiang ang a nia: a rêngtoihmun chu meichok ang a nia, a tâli chu mei ikâng hrang ang a nia.
Khatak ata kha mei a hong chok suaka, a sânga sângin a sin an thoa, a makunga khan a sîng a sîng têlin an ngîra, roirêlna kha a phut tâka, lekhabuhai a phên tâka.
Kha lai khan irki khan thu tamtak a hril sikin, ki hong ena, sa kha thatpaia, a taksa insiatin, meia hâl hrang dênin ki ena.
Khan sa danghai thu kha chu, an roirêlna lâkpai pein an oma, an hringnahai chu irlokhat ten chu la hôi pe an nia.
Zân inlârnaa khan irngai ro, vân sûmlâia zuang mi inkhat mihriam nâipa anga om ki hmua, kumtuanga om pa kuanga khan an hong hruaia.
Roirêlna hai, roiinpuina hai, le ram hai a kuang pêk a nia, mi tin, nam tin le chong tinhaiin a sin an thôna hrangin; a roirêlna chu roirêlna det hek nî nei loia, a ram khom irhmang loi hrang a nia.
Khan kei Daniela hi ki taksa chunga hin ki lungrîl a sôla, ki lua inlârna ki ihmuhai hin a nin buaia.
A ngîrhai laia inkhat ki hong nâiin chu, an nihai laia thudik chu ki’rdona. khanchu a ni hrila, a thil hrilfiana khom kha a nin hriattira.
Hi sahrâng roiinpui minlihai hi rêng minli irnênga hong suak hranghai chu an nia.
Khannisian inchungtaka mi irthianghaiin ram chu chang an ta, kumtuangin kumkhontuanga ta hrangin.
Khanchu sahrâng minlina, a danghai nêka danglam tak chu ichiom tak, a hahai khom thîr, a mitinhai chu dâr, fâk chût chûta inpotthêra, a ifâk ban chu sirphatu ata kha thutak inhriat ki nuama;
a lua irki sômkhat le irki dang hong suak, a matona inthum irtethai chungchâng le, kha irki mit nei thil tamtak hriltu, bâi neia an langdân khom a rual danghai nêka roiinpui ualhai leh khan.
Ki en maia, ama irki khan mi irthianghai a doia, an hnêa;
kumkhontuang pa a honga, roirêlna chu inchungtaka mi irthianghai kuanga pêk a ni ta, mi irthianghaiin ram an dongtum zoro a hong phâk mân an hnêa.
Khan, hiang hin a tia: Sahrâng minlina chu irnêng chunga ram minlina ram danghai nêka danglam ual, irnêng pumpui fâk bu buana, chîla inpot hrang ni a ti.
Khan irki sômhai thu chu, hi ram ata hi rêng sômkhat la hong suak an ta; an hnunga inkhat hong suak a ta, matonahai nêkin danglam a ta, rêng inthumhai chu inhnêhai a ti.
Inchungtakpu doiin thu hril a ta, inchungtaka mi irthiang irzaltir a ta, hun le dânhai indanglam tum a ti, kum thum le a chimrip chu a kuta pêk ni a ti.
Khannisian roirêlna om a ta, a thuneina inboia insiat ving hrangin hruaipai ni a ti.
Khan ram le roirêlna, irvân pumpui hnuaia ram roiinpuina chu inchungtak mi irthianghai kuanga pêk ni a ti: a ram chu ramhlu a ni sikin, a iop ram murdi’n a sintho an ta, ama iam an ti.
Hi hi thil tin hekna nî chu a ni. Kei Daniela hi ki’rngaituanahai hin a nin buaia, ki hmêl ar paia, khannisian ki lungrîlin thil tinrêng ki vong mai ngai a ni.
Khan rêng Belsazzara roirêl kum thumnaa khan inlârna a voihnina chu ki hmua.
kha inlârnaa hmu ki inei chu hiang hi a nia, ki hmu lai khan Elam biala Susan khopuia rêng ina ki oma; Ulai tui kôla ki oma,
ki mit ki hong inlêngtira, ki hong ena, irngai ro, tui kôla khan kêlbelrachal irki inhni nei a ngîra; ar ki inhnihai chu an seia; inkhat kha a sei ual bîka, ar sâng ual kha a mông inhnung ual a nia.
Belrachal khan hmâr le sim, nisua le nitâk irheiin ki hmua; a kôla sa dang om thei viat mahaia; a nuam ang takin a lênga, a liantak ki ni irtiin.
Ki’rngaitua lai takin, irngai ro, nitâk tiang ata irthokin irnêng pumpui chunga hin kêlchal a hong pûta, irnêng khom tôn loiin; kha kêl khan a mit le mit kâr taka hin irki a neia.
Belrachal irki inhni nei, irnênga ngîr ki ihmu kha a hong pana, a hrât thei dôra hrâtin a hong irzuana.

Belrachal kha a’rtet rakin ki hmua, a ning an mur pe oka, belrachal kha a tâia, a’rki inhni kha an khiakpai pea, ama doi hrangin belrachal kha ite a hrâtna om pe ta maka; irnênga irtettirin a sirpha tâka, belrachal kha a sansuak thei tûte om mahaia.
Kêlchalpa kha lian le hrât ar ti lai takin, a’rki roiinpuitak kha a kiak pea; ama irthûla khan irki dang inlâr ual minli, kôlkung minli irhîlin a hong suak nôka.
Anni laia inkhat khan ar ki an cher pe nôka, sim le nisua tianga irkiin, ram roiinpui tiang a sate’n a’rzata.
Irvâna omhai phâk rakin a liana, ârsihai khom hnuaia an thâkpaihai theia, a sirphahaia.
Kha hmuna omhai rêng angin a liana, hâlirvôm thilinhlan omhai chu a lâkpai pea, a hmun irthiang omna chu inramin a oma.
Khahai omna hâlirvôm thilinhlan hong om ngai siatna sikin, a kuanga pêk a ni ta; thutak chu irnênga a paia, khaanga tho’n, hlo a chuk pea.

Khanchu, vântirtôn inkhat hin vântirtôn dang kuang hianga ar don hi kin hriata, “I dôr ten mo hi inlârnaa thil hmua omhai hi a iom hrang? I dôr ten mo sualna hin a ni tina thilinhlanhai hmun hi a ilâk mai hrang? I dôr ten mo irvân sipaihai leh hi tempil hi sirbea a iom hrang?” tiin.

Khan vântirtôn dang iti hi kin hriata, “Sûn sânghni irzathum sûng chu om mai a ta, kha sûng rêng rênga chu zîng tiang le khohloi tiang thilinhlan inhlan ni no ni. Khanchu tempil chu irthiangtir ni nôk a ti,” tiin.
Khanchu hiang hi a nia, kei Daniela hin inlârna hmuin a omzia inhriat ki tuma; irngai ro, ki kôla hin mihriam anga ngîr ki hmua.
Ulai tui kama mihriam irhâi, “Gabriela inlârna chu ama mi hi inhre thiamtir ro,” tia a hong insam kin hriata.
Khanchu ki ngîrna tiang a zuang nâia; a sân ki lei chia, ki’rtet raka; khannisian ama’n “O mihriam nâipa, inhre thiam ro, inlârna chu zoro hekna hrang a nia,” a tia.
A ni chongpui lai hin ki lei izâl pial a nia, a ni hon thema, a nin ngîrtira.
Ama’n, “Irngai ro, ningmurna hnungkhôna thil hong om hranghai chu nan hril ki ta; zoro hekna lei inkung a ni tâk sikin.
“Belrachal irki inhni nei ni ihmu kha Media le Persia rêng an nia,
kêlchal irmulpa kha chu Grik rêng a ni; a mit kâra irki kha chu rêng masatak a nia,
khan irki kiakna hmuna minli hong suak kha chu, kha nam ata kha ram minli la hong ngîr suak a tih tihna a ni, a sinthotheinahai leh ni loiin.
“Khan an inlalna zoro hnungkhôn tianga insiatna irkhêl an phâk tena chu, rêng hmêl ichiom tak thu intak hril thei mi la suak a ti.
A thuneina hrât tak ni a ta, ama sinthotheina ringot ni loiin; irkhêl takin insiat a ta, hlochuk a ta, mi hrâthai le irthianghai chu insiat a ti.
Khan a sintho dân sikin vâr irletna a kuta hlochuk a ta, a lungrîla irsong a ta, lungthia an om laiin tamtak insiat a ti: Rênghai rêng doi a ta, khannisian kut leh ni loiin inkhiakin om a ti.
Khan zîng le khohloia inlârna ihrilhai kha a dik a ni; khannisian inlârna chu zoro hnungkhôna hrang a nih ti inhren lân,” a tia.
Kei Daniela hi ki’rzal tâka, idôr sûn mani dam loiin ki oma, ki thoia, rêng sin ki tho ta, inlârna chu a’rkhêl ki tia, khannisian tûte’n inhrethiam mahai.
Ahasuera nâipa Daria, Media irchia mi, Kaldai rama rêng kum khatna,
a roirêl kum khatna khan, keima Daniela’n lekhabua chuang deipu Jeremia kuanga
Bu ngheiin, bora puan hai, vâiphin irthua chongchaina le zongin,
ki Pathian kuang khan ki chongchaia, ki’rphuanga, “O
Ni thupêk le roirêlnahai ata rotsanin kin suala, dikloi le felloi takin kin tho tâka;
ni siahlo kin rênghai, hruaituhai, pa le a rama mipuihai murdi kuang nir hminga thuhril ngai deipuhai thu irngai nuam loiin.
O
O
Za’rngaina le ngaidamna chu
a siahlo deipuhai hmangin kin mân tiang a oma, a dânhai zômin
A ni, Israelhai khomin ni he la loia fe’n sualin kin om tâka. Khasikin khosâlna chu kin chunga a itung a ni ta. Pathian siahlo Mosia dâna irziak thuhai le a chunga ei sual tâk sikin.
A thu kin chunga a ihril le kin roirêltu, kin chunga roirêltuhaiin thil saloi tamtak a hong tung irkip ta. Jerusalem chunga tho ang khan vân hnuai pumpuia tho thei ni maka.
Mosia dâna irziak angin hi thil saloi murdihai hi kin chunga a hong itung a ni; khannisian kin dik loinahai mâksanin, ni thudik inhriat theina kin nei theina hrangin
Khasikin,
“Atûn hin o
O
Khasikin o kin Pathian atûn hin ni siahlo chongchaina le zongnahai hi irngaiin lân,

O ki Pathian, ni mikuar do’n lân, irngai ro, ni mit mengin lân, kin chiarna le ni khopui irhming phuaa om hi en ro, nang kin izongnahai hi kin fel sika ni kuanga kin hong intung ni ual ta maka, ni za’rngai theina sika a ni ual.
O
Keima le ni mi Israelhai sualna sikin thuphachôia, chongchaia, thuhrila,
a ni, chongchaia ki zong lai takin, mi Gabriela, a phuta ki ihmu inlârna khan, khohloia thil inhlan zoro lai angin hrât takin a ni hong pana.
Inhriat thiamna a nin neitira, a ni chongpuia, “O Daniela inhriat theina vâr tak inneitir hranga zuang ki ni.
Ni zong phut lai khan thupêk a suak tâka, hril hranga zuang kêng ki ni; inditom tak ni nia; khasikin thil chu irngaitua’n lân, inlârna chu inhre thei roh.

“An insiatnahai irhîptir le, sualna inhek hrang le, dik loina inboi hrang le, kumtuanga felna hrang le, inlârna le lei hrilna irsinsia hrang, hmun irthiangtak chu sahriak inthek hranghaiin, ni mi le khopui irthiang hrang, hapta sômsari inkung a ni.

Khasikin Jerusalem inding nôkna siam insat nôkna hranga thupêk a suak ata hriak inthek rêng a om nî tena hapta sari ni a ta, ti inhre thei ro; khan hapta sômruk le hapta hni, kholâi le irnênghai siam ni a ta, zoro buai lai taka khom.

Khan hapta sômruk inhni zoia hriak inthek chu inboi ni a ta, ite nei ta no ni: khan rêng la hong hrang mihaiin khopui le a hmun irthiang chu insiat an ta; khanchu a mongna chu tuilian leh ni a ta, a mong dênin irdoina om a ta, siatnahai chu inkung sai a ni.

Khan hapta khat hrangin mi tamtak kuang thuthung det siam a ta; khan hapta chimrip hrangin irbôlna le thilinhlan bâng a ta, a chiartu chu intirom tha chunga chuangin zuang a ta; khan a mongna, zuang tung ngêt hranga inkung khan ningmurna chu chiartuhai chunga khan buak khumhai ni an ti,” a tia.

Persia rêng Kura kum thumna khan, Daniela, ar hming Beltesazzara an iti kuang khan thil a hon langa; kha thil kha a dik a ni, irdoina roiinpuitak a ni: khanchu thil kha an hriat theia, inlârna inhriat theina a neia.
Kha nikhuaa khan, kei Daniela chu hapta thum a luzôl hîpin irthanvâiin ki oma.
Bu zel ne ma unga, sa mani uain mani ki bâia thun viat loiin, hapta thum a luzôl a hîp zoi mâka chu sahriak khom irthu loiin.
Khan tha khatna, sûn sôminhni le minli nia tui roiinpui tak Tigris kôla ki om laiin,
ki mit ki hor heia; irngai ro, mi puanze irhmia irvo, a konga Upaz rângachak irthianga irkhit hi a oma:
a taksa khom Berul lung anga om a nia, a hmêl chu kôlirtêk anga om, a mit khom meiser anga, a bân le a kehai chu dâr irtêk anga, a chong irhâi khom mipui irhâi ang a ni.
Kha inlârna kha keima Daniela vai hin ki hmua, ki kôla omhai khan inlârna chu hmu mahaia, khannisian a sate zelin an inthinga, an irbîk zoi ta.
Kha tena chu keima vai ki om tâka, inlârna roiinpui chu ki hmua, hrâtna irthahrui boiin ki oma, ki hmêl satna khom a chuaia.
Khannisian a chong irhâi chu kin hriata; a ni, a chong irhâi kin hriatin chu, inbokin ki hmâi hnuaia siain ki in irnghil tâka.
Irngai ro, kutin a ni hon thema, ki hong har zoka,
ki kuang, “O Daniela nang inditom tak, ni kuanga ki thuhril hi inhre theiin lân, ngîr ta ro; ni kuang a ni hong itîr a ni,” a tia. Hi thu hi a hril zoiin chu inthing pumin ki ngîra.
Ki kuang khan, “Chi no ro Daniela, ni Pathian kuang ni’rngaiintôm hrang le inhrethei hranga nir pêk ni ata ni thuhai chu irngaitua a nia, ni thu sika zuang ki ni.
Khannisian Persia ram hruaituin sûn sômhni sûn khat a nir doipuia; khannisianlân irngai ro, Mikaela hruaitu lian chu ni san hrangin a honga; Persia rêng kuanga khan ki hong oma.
Sûnmaton tianga ni mihai chunga thil hong tung hrang inhriat theina nei hranga zuang ki ni: inlârna chu sûnmaton tiang a la ini hrang a ni,” a tia.
Hi thu ang taka ki kuang a hril laiin, kei chu ki kûna, chong thei loiin ki oma.
Irngai ro, mi inkhat, mihriam nâipa anga inlang hin ki hmûr a zuan thema; khanchu ki bâi ki hong ânga, ki kôla ngîrpa kuang khan, “O
hi ki rêngpa siahlo hin, hi ki rêngpa hi itin mo a ichongpui thei hrang? kei lakin irnak boi angin ki oma, thoi khom thoi thei loiin ki oma,” ki tia.
Khanchu mihriam anga inlang khan a ni hon them nôka, ki hong hrât suak tâka.
Khanchu ki kuang, “O mi inditom tak, chi no’n lân, irtharngam takin om ro, a ni, hong hrât ta ro,” a tia. Ki kuang thu a hril lai takin ki hong hrât thei tâka.
“Ki rêngpa’n thu hril ri se, nangin ni nin hrâttir tâka,” ki tia.
Khanchu, ni kuanga ki izuang nasan hi nin hriat mo? Atûn chu Persia ram hruaitu doi hrangin ki ikîr nôk hrang a ni; ki phut tena chu, irngai ro, Grik ram hruaitu hong a ta.
Khannisian thudik irziaknaa irziak chu hril ki ta: hitaka hin, nin hruaitu Mikaela ti no chu, tûte ni san hrang om no nihai.
Khan keima chu Media mi Daria kum khatnaa khan, ama indet hrang le inhrât hrangin ngîr ngit ki ti.

Atûn hin thudik nan entir ki ti. Irngai ro, Persia rama khan, rêng inthum hong suak an ta, a minlinapu tena chu a danghai nêkin irchong a ta; ar chongna sikin irsong a ta, Grik rama mihai inphûthai a ti.
Khan rêng hrâttak, thu neina roiinpuitak roirêl hrangin hong suak a ta, a thu thuin tho a ti.

A hong suak ata chu a ram chu irsem ni a ta, kôlkil minlia hin irsem ni a ti, ar chihai hrang ni loiin, a thunei laia a irêl ang ni loiin; a ram chu a mihai hrang ni loiin, mi danghai hrang sutpai ni a ti.
Khanchu sim tianga rêng kha hrât a ta; a hruaituhai laia mi inkhat chu ama nêkin hrât a ta, irchamnei tak ni a ti.

Kum hek tiang chu irzom nôk an ta, sim tianga rêng nâinu chu hmâr tianga rêng kuang irngeina siam hrangin zuang a ti, khannisian hrâtna chu nei insôt no ni; a hnông khom hnông ual no nia, a hrâtna khom rêng nâinu pêk ni a ta, a hong hruaihai le ama inhrâttirtu le.
Khannisian a’rzung ata hon cher thar chu, mi dang inkhat ama hmuna hong om nôk a ta, ama kha chu sipai rualhai le zuang a ta, hmâr tianga rêng irkula khan lût a ta, doihai a ta, inhnê a ti.
Khan an pathianhai, an irlim siamhai le an sumru le rângachak bêlbûr sahai leh khan Aigupta rama chôipai ving a ta, kum idôr vêl mani chu hmâr tianga rêng ata lei irngam ni a ti.
Sim tianga rêng rama khan, hmâr tianga rêng kha hong lût a ta, khannisian a rama la kîr nôk a ti.
A nâihaiin doi an ta, sipai pâl tamtak irchunin hong an ta, inhnea paltanhaiin, kîr nôk an ta, doihai an ti, a kuldet khom.
Sim tianga rêng chu ningmurin suak a ta doi a ti, hmâr tianga rêng kha, mipui tamtak leh suak an ta, mi tamtak a kuta pêk ni a ti.
Mi tamtak chu hruai irhmang ni an ta, a lungrîl inrangin, sîngkhat vêl chu naminrîlhai a ti, khannisian zoro sôt ual ni no ni.
Hmâr tianga rêng kha hong pût nôk a ta, mipui matona nêka tam hong hruaihai nôkin, zoro hnungkhôn kum hek tiang chu sipai râltukfam leh tamtakin hong pan an ti.
Kha tika khan chu, mi tamtak, sim tianga rêng doi hrangin irsiam an ta; nir chia mi nakhrâtsong mihai le inlârna chu natakin irlek an ta, khannisian irtet no nihai.
Kha tena chu hmâr tianga rêng hong a ta, khopui kul dettak nei khom luapai a ti: khanchu sim tianga hrâtnahai khan danh zoi no nia, a mi inthanghai khomin, danh zoina hrang hrâtna nei ta no nihai.
Khanchu a doitu khan a nuamlam takin doi a ta, a kôla tûte ngîr ngam no nihai, ama chu ram roiinpuia khan om a ta, a kuta siatna om a ti.
Khanchu a ram pumpui hrâtna songin zuang tum a ta, irngeina siam a ti, khan chanlamboi inchangtir hrangin a nâinu kha dôngma’n pe a ta, hlochuk no nia, an lâp khom inlâp no ni.
Hi zoia hin chu ramchârna tiang irhei a ta, tamtak lâk a ta; khannisian hruaitu inkhatin insîrsiatna sapsuakna chu mong a ta, an sîrinsiatna chu ama chunga irlet a ti.
Khanchu an rama kul omna tiang irhei a ta, khannisian kal khatin irlet a ta, hmu thei ni ta no ni.

Khanchu ama omna hmun khan mi inkhat ram roiinpuina sia irfuangtu khêlpai hrangin hong ngîr suak nôk a ta; khannisian sûn sôtnotea, ningmurna sika ni loiin, irdoina sika khom ni loiin, irhmangtirin om a ti.
Khanchu a hmuna khan mi ien nuamloi, ram chôiindômna a ipêk loi chu hong suak a ta; ram a hoi lai takin hong a ta, chongbâi hoitak hmangin ram chu nei a ti.
Matona mi kha chu tuilian itânin om a ta, koichitin om a ti; a ni, thuthung hruaituhai khom.
Khanchu a kuang thuthung a siam zoiin chu a sate’n siat zôi a ta; hong ngîr suak nôk hrangin, mipui tômte khomin an hong ihrât thei hrang a ni.

Irngei zoro laiin ram bial hoina laia hor siam nôk a ta, a pa le a puhai tho ngailoi la tho a ti; mihai laia râllâk le râllâk thilhaia sum kha sem a ta, a ni kuldet chunga khan, khit thunghai chu la khithai an ta,

a sinthotheina le a hâina chu, sipai pâl tamtak le, sim tianga rêng chunga inphût a ta; sim tiang rêng khan sipai pâl tamtak leh hong doi a ta, khannisian ngîr zoi no nia, a chunga irkhitin a la irkhit mai hrang a ni.
A ni, a bu tuitak nêkhai ngêt khan ama irhmangtir an ta, a sipai pâlhai khom ihnôlin om an ta, tamtak chu thatin om an ti.
Hi rênghai hi chu an lungrîla sat loina irput ni an ta, Dokâng hmun khata minlak tho an ta; hlo chu chuk pe ual no ni, a mongna chu zoro inkung saia ni a ti.
Khanchu sum tamtak chôiin ama rama ngêt kîr nôk a ta, a lungrîla thuthung irthiang doiin om a ta; khaanga thoin, a rama ngêt kîr a ti.
Zoro indang nî khan hong kîr nôk a ta, sim tiang fe a ti, khannisian an hnung ual hin chu matona ang kha chu ni no ni.

Kil tina irhualhaiin ama hong doi an ta; khanchu a milung chuk no nia, kîr nôk a ti, thuthung irthiang chunga khan ningmur irlâk a ta, khaanga tho’n kîr nôk a ti, thuthung irthiang hnung songsanhai chu lôm a ti.
Sipaihai khan doipui an ta, hmun irthianghai porinchetir an ta; a kulhai khom khan hâlirvôm thilinhlan omhai chu pai an ta, irsîna intirom chu inding nôk an ti.
Khan thuthung chunga dik loina sual thotuhai chongbâi hoina khan insiat ni an ta, khannisian mi an Pathian inhretuhai chu det an ta, thil tamtak tho thei an ti.
Khan mihai laia a vârhai chu, mi tamtak irchutirhai an ta, khannisian, khandai hai, meichok hai, sal intângna le inrûk irhmangna’n mi tamtak irlet an ti.
An irlet khomin changpuina chîntea indomin om an ta, mi tamtak êsêlin, êrôhai an ti.
Khan a vârhai laia senkhatin, anni infâi le irthiang hrang le invâr hrangin irtetpui an ta, a mongna ni dênin; zoro inkung a la ni mai sikin.

Reng khan a nuamlam takin tho a ta; ama chôiirsângin, Pathian tinrêng chunga a lian irti a ta, pathianhai Pathian sêlin thil irkhêl hril a ti: khan a ningmurna a hek pe ving mâka chu hlochuk a ta, a iti chu tho ngêt hrang a nia.
A’rchihai Pathian khom ite bê’n bê no nia, nupanghai irngainat pathianhai le pathian danghai khom ngaisak viat loiin: mi murdi chunga lian irti a ti.
Khannisian khahai nêkin kulhai pathian chu chôiindôm a ta, pathian, a pahai inhriat ngailoi khan, rângachak le sumru le, lunghluhai le thil indit omhai le chôiindôm a ti.
Khan pathian dang changpuina’n kuldet taktak chu doi a ta, mi tukhom a pom murdi chu roiinpuitir a ta; tamtak chunga roi inrêltir a ta, a ram chu man neiin sem a ti.

Khan mongna nî chu sim tianga rêngin ama hong nor a ta; hmâr tianga rêngin tâli le sakor chung chuang mi le irhuang tamtakhai le kêllaiher angin ama doi an ta, ramhai lûtin, chin zoi a ta, palthuanhai a ti.
Ram roiinpui khom lûtkhum a ta, tamtak that ni a ti: khannisian a kut ata hihai hi sansuak ni an ti: Edom, Moab, le Amon mihriam sahai chu.
Ram chunga a kut thâk a ta, Aigupta ram khom inzôk ual no ni.
Khanchu rângachak le sumru siakhômhai chunga le Aigupta rama thil hluhai chunga thu nei a ti. Khan, Libna le Ethiopia mihai chu ama hrungtu ni an ta,
khannisian nisua le hmâr tianga thu saloiin buai a ta; khanchu mi tamtak irhmangna le lungkânga ningmurin suak a ti.
Khan Tuipui le tâng irthiang roiinpui tak kâra khan a rêng puan in chu sung a ta, khannisian a mongna tung a ta, tûte’n san thei ni no ni.

“Kha irzoi tena chu ni mipui nâihai san ngaitu, hruaitu roiinpuitak Mikaela kha ngîr a ta; buaina zoro, nam om phut ata, kha ni tena la om ngai loi kha, hong om a ta: kha nî tena chu ni mihai kha sansuakin om an ta, mi tin lekhabua irhming chuang murdihai chu.
Khan an laia tamtak irnêng vâiphina zâlhai chu hong har nôk an ta, senkhat inzâna le senkhat chu kumtuanga hmumâkin.
Hruaitu vârhai chu irvân vâr angin vâr an ta, mi tamtak felna tianga hong kîrhai chu ârsi angin kum kumtuangin vâr an ti.
Khannisian nang o Daniela, thu kha thupin lân, lekhabu kha intukhak ro, a mong dênin; mi tamtak intânin, inhriatnahai hong pung a ti,” a tia.
Keima Daniela hin ki hong ena, irngai ro, mi dang inhni an hong ngîra, inkhat chu tui kôina laia, a dang chu tui kôi loina tiang.
khan mi tu’n mani, mi puan zerhmi sila irvo tuipui chunga om kuang khan, “Hi thil irkhêl mongna hrang hi, itika mo a ini hrang?” a tia.

Khan mi puan zerhmi sila irvo tuipui chunga om khan, a kut chang tiang le vei tiang irvân tianga phar suakin, “Hunbi khat le a chînte, a chimrip sûnga hrang nih a ti; mi irthianghai sinthotheina chu an inkhoi zoi tena hi thil murdi hi irkip a ta; tia hring kumkhua sâmin khomâk a sâm tih kin hriata”.
An hriat chu kin hriata, a’rngailam chu inhre ma ung: khanchu keima’n, “O
Ama’n, “Daniela, fe’n lân, thu chu thup le chelkhak a ni ta, a mong dênin,
mi tamtak chu an irthiangin an ivâr nôk a nia, an isa a ni; khannisian mi siathaiin chu sualin an la om mai, mi siathaiin ar ngai dân inhre no nihai; mi vârhaiin chu a’rngailam inhria an ti.
“Khan hâlirvôm thilinhlan omhai lâkpai a nia, chitna intirom inding nôk a nia irthokin, sûn sângkhat irzahni le sômkuak nih a ti.
Nghâk za zâma sûn sângkhat irzathum sômthum ringa phâkhai chu la hoi pehai a ti.
Khannisian nang chu mongna nî dênin fe’n lân; sûnhai hekna chu irngam a ta, ni man hrang dôra om ni ti,” a tia.
Juda rênghai Uzia, Jothama, Ahaza Hezekia hai inlal lai le Israelhai rêng Jeroboama, Joasa nâipa rêng laia Beeria nâipa Hosea kuanga
Khanchu a fea, Diblaima nâinu Gomeri kha a nei tâka; khan, nâi a vonga, nâipasal a nei pe ta.
Khan,
Khan, kha nikhua khan hiang hin ni a ta, Jezreel irhôra Israelhai thal ngul kha inkhiak ki ta,” a tia.
Khan, nâi a vong nôka, nâinupang a neia. Khan,
Juda sûngkuahai rêk chu inren ki ta, thal ngul mani, khandai mani, irdoina mani sakor mani, sakor chung chuang mi mani anni saninhring loiin,
Khan, Loruhamai kha irhnu nêk an mongtira, khan nâi a vong nôka, nâipasal a nei.
Khan,

Aniachu, Israel nâihai kha tuikhanglian chiai vâiphin, varh theiloi le tep sêng loi zât ni an ta, khan, hiang hin ni a ta, an kuang, ki mihai ni mak chêi, tihna hmuna khan, Pathian hring nâihai nin ni e, ti ni a ti.
Khan, Juda nâihai le Israel nâihai kha pung khôm an ta, an lu hrang inkung an ta, kha rama irthokin hong fe an ta, kha rama irthokin hong fe an ta, Jezreel nikhua kha a iroiinpui hrang a ni.
Nin urêngpahai kuanga khan, Ammia, ti unglân, nin farnuhai kuanga khan, Ruhamai, ti roi.
Nin nu hi bei roi, bei roi; Ama hi ki dôngma ni maka, kei khom a pasal ni ma ung, A hmel ata a notizuar uar hi pai thâk sianlân, A rôp ata a uire uar hi pai thâk ri se;
khano’nchu, bomboiin inomtir ki ta, A suak nikhuaa a om ang khan inomtir ki ta, Ramchâr angin siam ki ta, ramchâr khohroi angin inomtir ki ta, tui inhrâlin that ki ti.
A nâihai khom inren no ning, notizuar nâi an ni sikin.
An nu khan noti a zuar ngaia, anni invongtu kha inzakom takin a om: ki bu hai, ki tui hai, ki samul hai, ki pat hai, ki sahriakhai le ki in hranghai ni pêktu, ki irditpuihai irzûl ki ti, a iti a ni.
Khasikin, irngai ta, ni lampui kha ilhlingin inpingtir ki ta, ama khâlin dâi khit ki ta, a lampuihai hmu no ni;
Khan, a’rditpui irzûl a ta, irzûl pha no ni; annihai kha zong a ta, hmuhai no ni; khanchu, ki pasal masa kuang kîr nôk ki ta, atûnlai nêkin tianlai kha ki ta hrangin a sa ual ti a ti.
Bu, uain, sahriakhai hi, tangka ki inpung pehai hi, rângachak, Baal hranga an ihmanghai le, keima ipêk a nih ti hi inhre mahai.
Khasikin, ki bu kha a ât zoroa, ki uain khom kha a sôm zoroa la kîr nôk ki ti. ki samul le ki pat, a bomboina irkhûna hrang kha, lapai pe ki ti.
Khanchu, a’rditpuihai mit hmua, a bomboina ser inlangtir ki ti, ki kut ata tûte’n sansuak no nihai.
A raiinfânna murdi, a kût hai, a tha thar hai, a irngam nikhua hai le mi pung khômna zoro murdihai, inboipai sa ki ti.
A grep hrui le a theipui kung, hi hi ki irditpuihai ni ipêk ki ihlo kha a ni, A ichitna ngai kha inramtir ki ti: Ram hnuaia siam ki ta, ram sahaiin fa an ti.
Mirimhoi a hâl pe ngai Baal nikhuahai kha a chunga thuan ki ti, kha lai khan a bômzoihai le a irvônahai ar bela, ar ditpuihai a pana, keima a ni irnghil a nih ti hi
Khasikin, irngai ta, inthêm ki ta, ramchâra hruai ki ta, irngai om ang takin ama kha chongpui ki ti.
Khan, kha tena khan chu, a grep irhuanhai kha a kuang pe ki ti, Akor irhôr khom sabeina mikot hrangin: khataka khan a thoibop lai nikhuahai le Aigupta ram ata a zuang suak nikhua ang khan, sâm a ti.
Khan,
A bâia irthokin Baal irhminghai hi ki’rhmangtir pe hrang a nia: an irhming hi sâm viat viat ta no ni.

Kha nikhua khan ramsahai, chunglêng vatehai, irnênga thilhringhai leh an ta hrangin thuthung siam ki ta; thal ngulhai khandai mani le irdoinahai hi irnênga irthokin irhmangtir ki ta, hoi takin inom hmunkhattir ki ti.
Kumkhuain, ki ta hrangin nang hual khak ki ta,
felna mani, roirêlna mani,
lunginkhamna mani, inrenna mani ki ta hrangin hual ki ti.
Iamomna’n ki ta hrangin hual ki ta,
khanchu
Kha nikhua khan hiang hin ni a ta,
changpui ki ta
irvânhai chongpui ki ta,
khan anni’n irnêng chongpui an ti.
Khan, irnêng khan bu mani,
uain mani, hriak mani chongpui an ta;
khan, anni khan Jezreel chongpui an ti.
Khan, kha kha ki ta hrangin irnênga hin song ki ta,
inren loinu kha inren ki ta, ki mi ni loi kha ki mi ni nih ti ki ti,”
khan, ama khan,
“Ki Pathian ni nih,” ti a ti.
Khan,
Khanchu, tangka sômhlei ringa, le barli homer khat le homer a chimripin ama kha ki’rchôka:
Khan, a kuang, nikho tamtak sûng kha ki ta hrangin ni iom hrang a ni; noti ni izuar hrang ni ma, tûte dôngma ni ini hrang ni mah: khaang dên khan kei khom nangmaa om ki ti, ki tia.
Israel, irchihai kha nikho tamtak inlaltak le milian le lungphun ser le ochai songkol mani, millimhai mani nei loiin an iom hrang a ni.
Kha tena chu Israel irchihai kha irlet an ta,
Israel irchihaio,
Khomâksâm, irhuang, irthat, inrûk, uire uarhai a punga, thisen kha thisenin a zui mai.
Khasikin ram khan sûn a ta, a sûnga lêng tinrêng sôl an ti, ramsahai chunglêng vahai le; a ni, tui khangliana ngahai dênin lâkpai ni an ti.
Aniachu, tûte irbei irhlôm no ri sehai. Tûte halirchu no ri sehai; ni mihai kha ochai beituhai ang an nia.
Sûna tûk ni ta, nangma le deipuhai khom zâna tuk a ta, ni nu khom inboipai ki ti.

Ki mihai kha inhriatna an irsam sikin inboipai an nia, inhriatna ni hnôl sikin kei khomin ki ochai ni nina ata nang hnôl ta ki ti. Ni Pathian dân ni’rnghilpaia, kei khomin ni nâihai irnghil pai ki ti.
An hong rikip le ki chunga an sual sit sit saa, an roiinpuina kha mualinphoinaa inchangtir ki ti.
Ki mihai sualna zâra irchong an irtia, an pualoinaa khan an lungrîl an irnghata,
a mipui a ochaiin hmunkhata hrem ni an ta, an lampuihai sika khan anni kha hremhai ki ta, an thil thohai thuan ki ti.
Fâk an ta chu khop no nihai, notizuar uar an ta chu pung no nihai,
Notizuarhai, uainhai, uain tharhai khan, milung a lâkpai ngai.
Ki mihai khan thing millim an irdona, an khianghrolin a hril ngai; notizuarna lungrîl khan a hruai irhmanga, an pathian ata an hur irhmang tâka.

Tâng sîphaia khan an irbôla, mualhaia khan mirimhoi an hâla, thing sesua le bero le tarpin thing hnuaihai khan a raifân a hoi sikin. Khasikin nin nâinuhai khan notizuar an uara, nin moihaiin uire an iuar a ni.

Nin nâinuhaiin noti an zuara, nin moihai an uire’n hrem no ning: anni ngei khom notizuarhai le an bingin an fe sikin. Notizuarhai leh hmunkhatin irbôl suama; inhre thiam loi mipuihai kha tûk siat an ti.
Israel, nang chu notizuar uar khomin lân, Juda kha chu tûk sa no ri se. Gilgal-a khan hong no unglân, Bethaven-a khom hong fe no ro; “
Sehrât irla tukullian ang dênin Israelhai chu an tukul a liana; atûn chu
Efraima khan millim a zompui tâka, a om omin om ri se.
An zu in kha an chîna, nôtizuara an irsiama, an roiinpuina nêkin inzakpuiom kha an irngaiinhlu uala.
Phâivua isêm angin sêm invuangin la om an ta, an sonong irbôlnaa khan lan zak ngêt an ti.

O nangni, ochaihaio, hi hi inhre unglân, nangni Israel sûngkuahaio, irngai unglân, o inlaltak sûngkuahaio, mikuar sung roi, roirêlna kha nin ta hrangin a nia; Mizpa châng le Tabor tânga lên inzar nin ni sikin.
Mi tehelhai khan thatpai an uar tak taka, kei rêkin chu an rênga halirchutu ki ni.
Efraima kin hriat, Israel kha keima ata thup ni mah; atûn hin o Efraim, notizuar ni uar sikin Israel kha porinchetir a ni.
An Pathian tiang irheitir hrangin, an thilthohai kha masan mahaia, notizuar lungrîl an laia a iom a ni,
Israel kôkpoploihai khan a makunga an inhriattira, khanchu Israel le Efraima kha an pualoinaa tûk an ta, Juda khom an kuang tûk sa a ti.
An belra pâlhai le an sehrât pâlhai le
chunga vâr irlet takin an ichai a ni, nam dang nâihai an neia; tha thar khan an loihai le ileh irhmangna tung a ti.
Gibia khuaa bekul tum unglân, Rama khuaa bekul mût roi; Bethaven-a khêk mur mur roi, o, Benjamina, ni hnung tiang kha, tiin.
Efraima kha hremna nikhuaa khan inram ni a ta: thil hong ni ngêt hrang kha Israel irchihai laia kin hriattir tâk a ni.
Juda milianhai kha ramri sontuhai ang an nia; an chunga ki ninginmurna kha tui angin bunthuan ki ti.
Efraima khan sirbe a uara, dikna a paltana, ite ni loi a’rzûla.
Khasikin Efraima hrangin irthî ang ki nia, Juda sûngkua ta hrangin hmonna ang ki ni.

Efraima khan a natna a hmua, Juda khan a pop a hmua. Kha khan Efraima kha Assuria kuang a fea, inlaltak Jareba kuanga khan mi a tîra: khannisianlân ama khan nangni indamtir thei maka, nin ipop kha nangni a indamtir thei sa loi a ni.
Efraima hrangin chu kâmkeibaknei ang, Juda hrangin chu kâmkeibaknei vânglai ang ki ini hrang a nia; keima, keima ngeiin kaithêr ki ta, fe ki ta, rotpui ki ta, sansuaktu tûte om no nihai.
An thiam loina an irhriata, ki hmêl an zong mâka chu, fe ki ta, ki hmun tiang kîr ki ta, an tuangna khan ni zong an ta, hiang hin ti an ti.
Thoi,
Sûn hni tena nin hringtir a ta; sûn thum nia ni kaithoi a ta, a makunga om ei ti.
inhriatna kha irzûl mai ei ti duah, inhria ei ti. Zîng anga irkhêl loiin a hong pûtsuak ngêt ngai a ni; ei kuang rua angin, rua hnungkhôn, irnêng induitu ang dênin zuang tung a ti.
O Efraima, itin mo nang ki ilô hrang? O Juda, itin mo nang ki ilô hrang? ni lungthungna kha zîng sûmphâi angin, inrang taka irdo irhmang nôk angin a ni.
Khasikin, deipuhai hmangin anni kha nôia; ki bâia thuhaiin anni kha ki ithat a ni. Ni chunga roirêlnahai kha vâr fe suak zut zut ang a ni.
Irbôlna nuam loiin lungkhamna ki nuam a ni; hâlirvôm thil inhlanhai nêkin Pathian inhriatna ki nuam ual a ni.
Khannisianlân, Adama angin thuthung kha an tho’nsuala, khataka khan vâr irlet takin ki chunga an itho a ni.
Gilead kha tho’nsualna tho tuhai khopui a nia, thisen a kop mer mur a ni.
Hrâtlâksong pâlin mi an irdîp ngai angin ochai pôlhai khan Sekem lampuia mi an that ngai a ni, thil sual an tho tâk a ni.
Israel sûngkuaa khan thil irkhêl tak ki hmu, Efraima khan nôtizuarna a oma, Israel kha porinchetirin a iom a ni.
Ki mihai sal intângnaa irthokin ki hruai kîrhai tika chu, o Juda, ni ta hrang khoma ra ât hrang inkung a ni.
Israel indam ki tumin Efraima sualna a hong inlanga, Samari sualna le huang an uara, sûng tiang inru a hong lûta, pên tiang hrâtlâksong pâlin an roka.
An sualna murdi kin hrât mai ti an milungin ngaitua mahai: atûn chu an thilthohai ngeiin a ngîm khak tâka. ki hmâi makunga an iom a ni.
An sualna’n inlaltak an lômtira, an milak thu khan mi lianhai an lômtira.
An rêngin uire an nia, bai siamtu’n irtap a ur inluma, baidi a inhmet inpok a thoi inranga, meisom a lei irngamsan ang hi an ni.
Ei inlaltak nikhuaa khan mi lianhai kha uain irhâi takin an inruitira; ama khan hmusittuhai pâlin a kut a phara.
Inrûka an irdîp laiin an milung kha irtap ang dênin an isiam tâk a ni: an ningmur kha zân sôtin a dâia, zînga chu mei ir-al angin ar ala.
Irtap ang dênin an lum zita, an roirêltuhai an hong irhmang tâka, an inlaltak murdi an tûka, an laia tûte mi khêk om mahai.
Efraima lak kha, nam danghai laia ar zêl saa, Efraima kha bai irlet loi a ni.
Mikhualhai khan a hrâtna an fâk zoi pea, ama khan inhre ma: mul chuakin a bôm tuai tâka, ama khan inhre mah.
Israel roiinpuina khan a hmâi makunga an hriattir ngaia, khannisianlân, hihai murdi khom hin,
Efraima kha vasu milung chô, inhriat thiamna nei loi ang a lei nia; Aigupta tiang an khêk mura, Assuria tiang an fe mura,
an fe laiin an chunga ki lên vôr ki ta, chunglêng vate chelin chel ki ta, an thilsual tho ang irphu’n hremhai ki ti.
An chung a rik e! ki kuanga irthokin an fe irhmang tâka, irhmangna an chunga a tung e! ki chunga tehel an zong tâka, keima’n chu ki saninhring nuama, anni rêkin chu milak an ni tho khuma.
An lungrîl takin ni koi mahai, an zâlhmuna an ichiar hnem hnum a ni: bu le uain hrangin an inkhôma, ki chunga lak tehel an zonga.
Keima’n chu ki hruai suaka, kin hrâttira, khannisian ki chunga thil saloi an ingaitua a ni.
An irheikîra, anchung taka kuang ni loiin; thal ngul mirûl ang an ni, an milianhai kha an chong per pur sikin, khandaiin tûk an ti. Hi hi Aigupta rama innuisan an inina ni a ti.
Bekul kha ni hmûra irsuntir ro,
Ki Pathian keini Israelhaiin chu nang kin inhriat, tiin ki kuang khêk an ti.
Israelhai khan thil sa an hnôla, râlhaiin irzûl an ti.
Ki itho ni loiin anni khan rêng an siama; kin hriat loiin hruaituhai an siama, an irhmangna hrangin an tangkarua le rângachakin millim an irsiama.
O Samari, ni sehrâtte irlim kha a hnôl e; an chunga ki ning an mur tak tak a ni. Itik tena mo a irthiang nôk hrang?
Israel kut theithiamhai millim siam kha, Pathian ni ma. A ni, Samaria sehrâtte irlim kha inkhoipai zit ni a ti;
phâivua an songa, phâivua saloi an i-ât hrang a ni: a kung inding nei maka, a’rzîk khan ra insua no ni; a ra insuak khom sianlân, mikhualhaiin fa zoi an ti.
Israelhai kha irlem zoiin an iom a ni: bêl, a sûnga lômna om loi angin atûn hin nam dang laia an iom a ni.
Ram sakuartung inkhât tak angin Assuria rama an kâia, Efraima khan arditpuihai ar hloppui e.
A ni, nam danghai irhloppui khomsian, irkhôm ki ta, rêng le hruaitu hriak an ipol ngai kha inmongtir bak ki ti.
Efraima khan maichâm a inpungtir hi an thil tho sualna sika a nia, an ta hranga sualna rêng rêng kha sualna mai mai a ni.
Ki dân chu ki’rziak pe tu tuaia, khannisian thil dangin an ibe a ni.
Ki ta hranga thil inhlan irbôlnahai chu hmê an inhlana, an fâka; khahai kha
Israel khan a siamtu a’rnghil paia, in roiinpuihai a sina; Juda khan khopui kulhai an pungtira, khannisian a khopuihaia khan mei tîr ki ta, a in roiinpuihai kâng zoi a ti.
O Israel, nam danghai angin raiinfân lûk lûk dôrin lôm no ro, ni Pathian kha nôti ni zuarsana, hruizôl tina a man kha nir ngai inhlua.
Hrui le grep sômna khurhai khan an milung inchuk no nihaia, uain thar hlosam a ti.
rama khan lêng no nihaia, Efraima kha Aigupta tiang kîr lik a ta, Assuria rama bu irthiang loi nêk an ti.
kuang Uain kha bun suak no nihaia, an thil irhlanhai kha a ta hrangin lôm om ni ual no ni; an bai kha lusûnhai bu ang ni a ta, a nêk murdi porinche an ti; an bai kha an hringna hrang vai ni a ta,
Inkhômpui ir-up nikhua le

Irngai roi, siatna zuang tung a ta, indarh an ta, Aigupta khan anni kha hong irkhôm ual a ta, Memfis khan lei phûm a ti; an tangkarua thil inditomhai kha kâng irkholin bôm a ta. An puan inhai khan hloi ilhlingnei om a ti.

Raifânna nikhuahai kha a zuang tunga, thuanna nikhuahai kha a zuang tung e; Israel khan kha kha inhria a ti. Ni tho’nchâina kha a tamin an roi irsâi loina an ipêtsanna kha a’rkhêl sikin, Deipu kha an vêta, irtha nei mi kha a invêt a ni.
Efraima râl enkoltu kha hi Pathian kuanga om a ni, deipu lak kha lamtuanin chângkamtu chânga a oma, a Pathian ina khom roi irbuloina a om.
Gibea khuaa om lai nikhuahai ang khan a sate’n anni kha an tho’nsuala. An pualoina kha inhre mai a ta, an sualnahai kha thuan a ti.

Israel kha ramchâra grep ra ang maiin ki hmua. Nin pahai kha theipui, zoro masaa a ihmin masa angin ki hmu; khannisian anni kha peor tânga Baal chu an pana, thil inzakom taka khan an irpumpêk tâka, an irngaiinhlu tak millimhai ang dên khan an iporinche a ni.
Efraima lak kha, a roiinpuina kha vâ angin vuangpat a ta. Nâi neihai, nâi vonghai, inrâihai om no nihai.
An nâihai puihling khomhai sian pasal reng om loi hrangin insûntir ngêt ki ti. A ni, anni kha ki’rheisan tika chu, an chung kha rik ual a ti.
Tura ki ihmu ang dênin Efraima kha hmunhoi taka sia’n om a ti: khannisian, Efraima khan a nâihai kha thattu kuang la hruai suak a ti.
O

An sualna murdi kha Gilgal-a an tho irphuta, kha khan anni kha ki khôkmâka. An thiltho sual sika khan ki in ata inhnot suak ki ti. Annihai hi lungthung ta no ning; an hruaitu murdihai kha tehel zong an ni.
Efraima kha zêmin a oma, an irzung kha a châr zoia, ra insua maka. A ni, suak khom sianlân, an sul ra inditom tak kha that lele ki ti.
Ki Pathian khan anni kha pai irhmang a ti, ama an uksak no sikin. Khanchu, nam danghai laia chaninvâiin om an ti.
Israel chu grep hrui hong indôn satak, ra nuam tak ang a nia; a ra a itam ang dênin a maichâmhai an pungtira; a ram satzia ang dênin lung incher (millim) phun satak tak a siama.
A sûngril kha irsentirin a oma, atûn chu thiamloi changin om ta an ti. An maichâmhai kha
“Reng taktak chu nei mak me,
Thuthung an siamna tianga khan milaka khomâksâmin thu chanlamboi an hrila; khasikin, irnêng tukirletna (kodâl) sûlhring tûr nei a imông angin, roirêlna a ipung a ni.
Samari rama lênghai kha Bethaven sehrâtte sika khan chardongin om an ta. Ama ata a irhmang tâk angin khataka mihai kha an chardong a ta, khataka ochaihai a roiinpuina chunga la lôm ngaihai khom.
Ama ngêt khom kha inlaltak Jareba kuanga pêk hrangin Assuria rama rotpui ni a ti. Efraima khan inzakna hmu a ta, Israel khan ama thu’nkung ngêt kha inzakpui a ti.
Samari ram lak kha, tui chunga thing ôn a itân ang dênin an rêng kha inboipai a nia.
Israel sualna Aven hmun irsânghai khom kha insiat ni a ta. An maichâmhai khan sûl le hloi ilhlingnei hong mông a ta; tâng kuanga khan, nir khû roh, ti an ta, mual kuanga khan, ni del roh ti an ti.
O Israel, Gibea nikhua ata kha ni isual ni isual a ni: khataka khan nin la sunzoma; tho’nsualna nâihai chunga doina khan Gibea ngêta khan nang a irzûl phâk loi hrang mo?
Ki nuam tika chu anni kha hrem ki ta; khan, an tho’nsualna irthuahni sika hrem an ni tika chu an chunga mipuihai kha pungkhôm an ti.

Khan, Efraima kha sehrât irla irchûtir tâk, bu chîl irzuk tâk a nia; khannisian keima ngêtin a ring enhoi taka khan ringkol irbuntir ta ki ta, Efraima chunga mi inchuangtir ki ta, Juda khom khan irnêng choiirlet a ta, Jakoba khan a’rnêng tanghai kha indartir zit a ti.
Mâni ta hrangin felna tû unglân, lungkhamna ât roi; nin irnêng hoihai choiirlet unglân,
Khannisian sualna nin tua, tho’nsualna nin âta; nin milak ra nin idong a ni.
Khasika khan ni mihai laia buai mur murna hong suak a ta, Salmona khan irdoi nikhuaa Beth-arbel a insiattir ang khan, ni kul murdihai kha insiat ni a ta; nu chu a nâihai le pai inthekin an iom a ni.
Nangni Bethel mihaio, nin sual irkhêl tak sikin kha thil kha nin chunga zuang tung hrang a ni. Israel rêng khom kôlirsal mân thi a ti.
Israel nam kha a nâiinpang lai ata lung ki thunga,
Aigupta ram ata ki nâipa hrangin ki ikoisuak a ni.
Ki koi lia an ni hla liaa, Baalhai kuang an irbôl uala,
Millim siam chophai kuang mirimhoi an ihâl a ni.
Keima rêkin chu Efraima kha ki kuta kalchôi dân ki’rchûtira,
anni kha ki inthotir a nih ti rêk chu inhre mahai.
Mihriam hruihrual, lungkhamna hruihai khan anni kha ki kaia;
an ta hrang khan an irkama kol inhlitirtuhai ang kha ki nia,
indot takin an makunga fâk hrang ki dônhaia.
Khannisian an irlet nuam no sikin, Aigupta rama tîr nôk ki ti, Assuria kha an rêng ni a ti.
A khopuihai khan khandai irlektir a ta, a kulhai kha ar hmangtira, inboipai a ta, anni thu lei irdon sik ngêtin.
Ki mihai khan nir heisan an tum maia, an ringkol riktak sikin, anchungtaka insam an ta, khannisian tûte’n indom irsâng pe no nihai.
O Efraima itin mo nang ki inthapai thei hrang?
O Israel, itin mo nang ki intha thei hrang?
Itin mo Adama angin nang ki isiam thei hrang?
Itin mo Zeboim angin nang ki inomtir thei hrang?
Ki sûnga ki milung a’rleta!
ki lungkhamnahai kha a sêm irvâm lik tâka?
Ki ningmurna irkhêltak kha sua no ninga,
Efraima kha irhmangtir tum nôk ta no ning.
Keima chu mihriam ni loiin,
Pathian ki nia, Nangmaa om mi irthiang kha,
khopui kha hong lût khum no ning.
Aigupta irthokin chongzong angin, Assuria irthok khan vasu angin mitha zâp lop lopin hong an ti: khan, an in lum inluatir ki ta, ti hi
Efraima khan milak thu’n a nir hual vêla, Israel sûnghai khan huangna’n; Juda khomin Pathian tiang ngaisak maka, mi irthiang chunga khan iam a iom loi a ni.
Efraima khan phâivua a iama, nisua phâivua khan a zui ngaia; milak thu le irsen indarna thu an pungtir sit sita, Assuria leh thu an inkunga, Aigupta tiang khan hriak a pêl lûta.
Sula khom khan a urêngpa kha a ke ârtui a hong chela, a hong puihling khan Pathian kha a beia.
A ni, vântirtôn a beia, an hnê tâka; a chapa, ditsakna a ngêna; Bethel hmuna khan ama a hmu tâka, kha khan ki kuang thu an sîra.
ngei, sipaihai Pathian kha,
Khanchu, nangin chu ni Pathian kuang tiang irheiin lân, lungkhamna le roirêlna hmangin lân, ni Pathiana khan irnghat mai roh.
Kanaan-hai angin Israel khan vârna dik loi an leka, ihuang ringot a irzuk ngai a ni.
Efraima khan, ki’rchong ok ta, hlo ki chuk ta a ni: ki sintho murdihaia lak chu keimaa siatna thil sual an ihmu hrang om viat ta mah, a tia.
Khannisian, kei hi Aigupta ram ata kha
Deipuhai kuanga khom thu kin sîr ngaia, inlârnahai kin pungtira; Deipuhai hmangin ki lei hala.
Gilead kha pualoina a ini loi ma ni? ite ni loi chian an ini kêng; Gilgal-a khan sehrâtchal an inhlan ngaia; a ni, an maichâmhai kha irnêng tuk irlet châng kuanga lung dêng khôm ang chian an ni.
Jakoba kha Arama rama khan an tân pata, Israel khan dôngma man a tuam tâka; dôngma man hrang khan belra a ienkol a ni.
Deipu hmangin Israel kha Aigupta irthokin
Efraima lak khan a ninginmur tak taka, khasikin a thisen insua kha ama chunga a chum tâka. A hrilsiatna kha ama chunga
Efraima’n thu a hrilin chu inthingna hrang dôr a dên rak ngai, Israel mihai laia chu irngai roiinpui tak a lei ni ngai. Baal kuanga a tûk tena hin chu a ithi tâk a ni.

Atûn khom hin an sualtir ual ual tâka, an tangkarua’n millim sûnna’n an irsiam chopa, anni ngaidân angzia zêla millim kha; khahai murdi kha kut theithiamhai kut suak a ni pumin, irbôlna inhlantu murdihai khan sehrât têhai kha tum ri se, an ti ngai.
Khasikin, zînga sûmpui ang le irdo inrang taka boi nôk ngai anghai, hruizôla bu’rsi, kêllaiherin a isêm irhmang ang hai, meikhu suakna meikhu anghai ni an ti.
Kei rêk hi chu Aigupta ram ata kha,
Ramchâr irkhêl tak ramchâra nang chongpui ngaitu kha ki nia.
An fâk hrang tena chu an khopa, an ikhop kha an milungin a lâlirpâk puia, khanchu a ni irnghil tâk a ni.
Khasikin an ta hrangin kâmkeibaknei ang ki ni, kâmkeite angin lam laia anni kha inruang ki ti.
Savomte inchân angin anni kha bei ki ta, an milung tuamtuhai kha kai thêr zit ki ta, kha hmuna khan kâmkeibaknei angin anni kha fa zoi ki ti; ramsahai khan an ikai darh zoi hrang a ni.
O Israel, nangma changpuitu ni doi hi ni siatna a ni e.
Ni khopui murdia saninzôk theitu hrang kha, ni rêng kha atûn hin khôn mo a iom? Reng le hruaituhai ni pe ro, ni iti hai, ni roirêltuhai kha khôn mo?
Ki ninginmurna rêng nang ki pêk, ki ninginmur ki lâkpai nôk tâk a ni.
Efraima pualoina kha bukkhôm a ni, a sualna kha siakhôm a ni.
Nupang nâiha irvei chardongna ang kha a chunga zuang tung a ti: ama kha nâipa vâr loitak a nia, a zoro taka nâi hong suakna hmuna om mah.

Seol kut ata anni kha ki irtan hrang ma ni? Thina ata ki isansuak hrang ma ni? O thina, ni hripuihai kha khôn mo a iom? O sual, ni thân kha khôn mo om? lung nang inkham viat no ning, irlet khomsian uksak no ning.
A urênghai laia irhniang tak ni khomsian, nisua tianga phâivua hong pût a ta, ramchâr ata
Samaria ram ata a Pathian chunga tehel a zonga, khandaia intûktirin om an ta, an nâitesenhai kha pai inthek zit ni an ta, an nupang, nâivong laihai kha kaithêr ni an ti.
O Israel,
kuanga khan kîr nôk unglân, a kuanga khan hiang hin insîr ro: a tho’nsualna murdi kha la paiin lan a sa ka kai kha pom ro; khanchu ei hmûr rahai kha sehrât chalpa irthûlin ki hong inhlan e.

Assuria khan ni saninhring no nia, sakor chuanghaia chuang no ning; kin kut suakhai kuanga khan, kin Pathian nin ni e, ti ual ta no ni ung. Farahai khan nangmaa hin lungkhamna an hong ihmu ngai a nia.
An hnungtôlna hi indam ki ta,
Anni ata ki ninginmurna kha ar kiang tâk sikin,
anni kha lung ki ithung hrang rêng rêng a ni.
Israel hrang khan irdorfîm ang ni ki ta,
ama kha lili angin sa a ta,
Lebanon tâng thing irzung angin a’rzung thâk irzar a ta.
A zarhai kha inbûk ngêt an ta,
a satzia kha Oliv thing ang dên ni a ta,
Lebanon tâng angin a mirim hoi a ti.
A’rhlîma lênghai kha hong kîr an ta,
bu angin hong hring thar an ta,
grep hrui angin hong irnoi a ta.
Lebanon Uain angin an irhming inthang a ti.
Efraima khan millimhai le irnâina imo a inei ta hrang?
kei hi a chongchaina sâmtu ki nia,
a indingtir hrangtu khom ki ni.
Kei meisâr thing hring mur ang ki nia,
Ni ra sahai kha keima ata a ni.
Tu mo vâra hihai hi inhre thiam thei hrang; tu mo fing vâra inhre thei hrang?
Pethuela nâipa Joela kuang
Putarhaio, hi hi inhre roi, hi rama om murdihaio, nin mikuar sung roi. Hi hi, nin zoro lai le nin puhai zoro lai khomin a om ta ngai mo?
Kha kha nin nâihai hrilhai unglân, nin nâihai khan an nâihai hril sianlân, an nâi nôkhai khan irlo dang hril nôk thiai ri sehai.
Thing irnge irlungin a ifâk mihlia murdi chu khâihmimsein a fâka; khaihmimse’n a ifâk mihlia murdi chu irlungin a fâk zoi, thing irnge’n a ifâk ban ka kai kha irlungin a fâk zoi.
Inruihaio, har unglân, chap roi; uain in murdihaio, a uain thum sika khan khêk rak rak roi; nin bâi ata lapai a ni tâk sikin.
Nam hrât tak, tep zoiloi, ki rama a zuang suak tâka, a hâ chu kâmkeibaknei hâ ang a nia, kâmkeibaknei lian tak hapui ang a inei sa a ni.
Ki grep hrui an siattira, ki theipui thing hôk a khêt infâi zita, a pai irhmanga; a ônhai khom a khêt invâr zoi ta.
Dôngmate’n, bora puan boma, a sat lai pasal a isûn angin chap rak rak roi.
Baidi inhlanhai, in hranga inhlanhai kha
Loi kha insiat a nia, ram khan a charindonga; bu kha insiat a nia, uain thar kha a kanga, hriak kha a châra.
O nangni, loi neituhaio, inzak unglân; o nangni, grep hrui enkoltuhaio, bu le faôi sikin khêk rak rak roi; loia bu ât hrang kha ar hmang tâk sikin.
Grep hrui kha a thêma, theipui kung kha a châra; dalim thei kunghai, tûmhai le apple thei kunghai, loia thing murdihai khom kha a chuai tâka; mihriam nâihai laia lômna kha a chuai irhmang tâka.

Nangni ochaihaio, bora puan sil unglân, chap roi; nangni, maichâm sinthotuhaio, khêk rak rak roi; nangni ki Pathian sinthotuhaio, hong unglân, bora puan silin zân sôtin zâl roi: nin Pathian in ata kha baidi inhlan le in hranga inhlan kha khap a nia.
Bu nghei zoro ser irthiang unglân, inkhômpui ir-up siam unglân,
Kha nikhua kha a chung a rike!
Ei mithmua fâk hrang inboi a ini loi ma ni, a ni, ei lômna le ei lômna kha ei Pathian in ata inboipai a ini loi ma ni?
Chîmuhai kha irnêng châr hnuaihaia khan a hmona; panghai kha a rama, fasiarhai kha insiatin a oma; a bu kha a thêm tâk sikin.
Sial le lôihai kha an inrûm bâka na! sehrât pâlhai kha an char a donga, sûlhring hmun an nei no sikin; a ni, belra rualhai kha an chapa.
O,
A ni, ramsahai kha nangma irngaiin an inphu huan huan a ni: vadungtehai kha a kang zoi tâka, mei khan ramchâr ram hloisûl hmun kha a kâng fâi zit tâk a ni.
Zion-a khan bekul tum unglân, ki tâng irthianga khan râl irdîpna inpuang roi; hi ram sûnga mi murdihai kha inthing ri sehai:

inthimna le khor-uina nikhua, inthimna le khor-ui, sûm zîng le izîng irsa khak angin mi huaisen tamtak pâl la hmu ngai loi, itiklai khoma hmu nôk ta loi hrang hong pût an ta, tâng kha kôlirsal ituam angin hong tuam an ti.
An maton tiang le hnung tiang kha a kâng fâi thiaia; an hmabâk ram kha Eden irhuan ang ni khomsian, an khêl hnung chu ramchâr ram chârkhohroi a ni thiaia, ite hôi nei mahai.
An inlang dân chu sakor inlang lam dân ang a nia; sakora chuang mi angin an intân a ni.
Irdoina tâli irhâi angin tâng chunga an irchôm mer mura, fapôl kâng chok luai luai ang le irdoinaa mipui hrât tak irsiam diam angin.
An matona mipuihai kha an kamanga: an hmêlhai kha a hong dông zita.
Mi hrât tak angin an intâna; irdoi mi angin banga an lôna; mâni irdîn senga an fea, an irtâng dân buai mahai.
Irhneng ual loiin; mâni lampuia fe senga: hriamhreihai an paltana, lôi mahai.
Khopui chunga an irchôma; kul chunga an intâna; in sûnghaia an lôn kâia; inru angin tukverhaia an lûta.
An makunga irnêng an thinga; irvânhai an hnînga; misa le tha an thima, ârsihaiin an vâr an thupa:
Khan,
nin puan ni loiin nin milung thêr unglân,
nin Pathian kuang baidi inhlan le in hranga inhlanhai khom khan, kîrin, lungrîl irhei kîrin, satvurna mâksanin om no nih ti tu’n mo an hriat?
Zion-a khan bekul tum unglân, bu nghei zoro ser irthiang unglân, inkhômpui ir-up tak siam unglân:

mipuihai buk unglân, inkhômhai kha irthiangtir unglân, putarhai, nâipanghai, irhnu nêk laihai buk unglân: moi neitu khom a chontan ata hong suak sianlân, moi khom a chontan sûngrîl ata hong suak ri se.
Ochai,
khan a mihai kuang, “Irngai unglân, nin kuang bu hai, uain hai, hriak hai zuang intung ki ta, kha khan, khop nin ta: namhai laia khan hrilsiatin nangni inomtir viat no ning:

aniachu, nin kuang ata hmâr tiang ata zuang mi huaisenhai pâl kha irzûlpai zit ki ta; ramchâr le chiaia infetir ki ti, a masa pâl nitâk tianga tuipuia, inhnung inta pâl thang tianga tuikhangliana; hong innam suak a ta, mirim se takin hong innam a ti, thil irkhêltak a tho tâk sikin, tiin a sâma.
O ram, chi no’n lân, raifânin lôm ro;
Sahaio, chi no roi; ramchâr hloisûl hmun a hong inchera, thing kha a hong raa, theipui kung le Grep hruihai kha an hong indôn a ni.
Nangni, Zion nâihaio, lôm roi,
Hruizôlhai kha buin sip a ta, uain le hriak khurhai kha sip lêt a ti.
Nin laia ki sipai rual tamtak ki tîr, khâihmimse hai, thing irnge hai, longak hai, thing irnge longakhaiin an ifâk zoi kumhai kha nangni thuan nôk ki ti.
Tam tak fa nin ta, khop nin ti, irkhêl taka nangni ngaitua ngaitu
Khan, Israelhai laia ki om ti le

Kha zoi tika chu hiang hin ni a ta, mi murdi chunga ki’rtha buak ki ta; khanchu nin nâipahai, nin nâinuhaiin ki thu hril an ta, nin putarhaiin irmanga phan an ta, nin ruathartehaiin inlârnahai hmu an ta:
kha nikhuahaia khan ki suakpahai, ki suaknuhai chunga khom ki’rtha buak ki ti.
Irvâna le irnênga thilirkhêlhai irhmutir ki ta, thisen hai, mei hai, meikhu inding hai leh.
Misa inthim a ta, tha thisena chang a ta,
Khan, hiang hin ni a ta, tukhom
“Irngai u ta, kha nikhuahai le kha zoi tika chu Juda le Jerusalem inding nôk hrang tika chu,
nam murdi buk khôm ki ta, Jehosafata irhôra hruai ki ti. Ki mi, ki’rchon dongtum Israel chunga an thiltho sikin an chungthu rêl ki ta; ram danga ki mihai an indartira.
Tasânin ki mihai an irsema; nâipanghai kha nupang pasalin notizuar le uain lâkna hrangin an zuara.
Nangni Tura le Sidon, nangni Filistia ramhaio, ki chunga phubâ lâk nin itum ma ni? Ki chunga phubâ lâk nin itum a niin chu inrang takin nin chunga phubâ la kîr nôk ki ti.
Ki tangkarua le rângachak nin lâka, ki thil satak inditomhai nin biak in sûnghaia nin chôi lût sa tâka,
Juda nâihai le Jerusalem nâihai khom an ramri ata hlataka nin sonpai theina hrangin, Grik nâipahai kuang nin zuar lik tâka.
Irngai u ta, nin zuarna hmun ata kha kaiharin insuaktir ki ta, nin thuanna kha nin lu chung ngeia thuanna ki ti;
nin nâipahai, nin nâinuhai kha Juda nâihai kuta zuar ki ti, anni khan hlataka Seba mihai kuang, anni kha zuar an ta”:
Hi hi namhai laia inpuang unglân; irdoina sinsiam unglân: mi hrâthai inphût unglân; irdoi mi murdihai hong nâiin hong kâi ri sehai.
Nin irnêng âlkaina hmor irzumhai khandaiin incher unglân, nin thei kung tanpaina chemtehai kha ufeiin incher roi: mi hrât loi khomin, “Ki hrât a ni,” ti ri se.
A kôla nam murdihaio, hong irhnot unglân, pung khôm roi: O,
Namhai kha irphût irhlômhai sian, Jehosafata khurpadopa khan hong kâi ri sehai: kha khan a vêla nam murdi chunga roirêl hrangin ki itoi hrang a ni.
Nin kôite kai dok unglân, bu ât zoro a ni tâka: hong unglân, hong sirpha roi; grep sômna khur kha a sipa, bêlhai kha a sip lêta, a sân an sual sikin.
Mi sâng tamtakhai kha Jehosafata irhôra an om khôm ta; kha khan a ni,
Misa le thahai an inthima, ârsihaiin an vârna an thupa.
Pathianin a mihai satvur a ti. Khan,
Khanchu
Kha nikhuaa khan hiang hin hong ni a ta, tâng irsânghai khan uain thum inzungtir a ta, tânghai kha irhnutuiin luang a ta, Judai ram vadungte murdihai kha tuiin luang a ta:
Juda nâihai chunga saloi taka thoa an rama mi thiam thisen an insua sikin, Aigupta ram kha hong ram a ta, Edom ram kha ramchâr ram chârkhohroi nih a ti.
Judai ram rêk chu kumkhua’n om mai a ta, Jerusalem khua kha irlo tin tin dênin.
Khan, an thisen ki infâiloi kha infâi ki ta:
Juda rêng Uzia inlal lai le Israel rêng Joasa nâipa Jeroboama inlal laia, hnîngnu mâna kum hnina khan, Tekoa sâ rual enkoltu laia om Amosa’n thu Israel chungchânga a ihmu chu.
Khan, ama khan “
Jerusalem khua ata ar hâi suak a ta;
belra enkoltuhai sâ lêngna hmunhai kha an char a idong a ni,
Karmel tâng sîp kha châr a ta,” a tia.
Khannisianlân Hazaela ina mei tîr ki ta, Benhadada rêng inhai kâng zoi a ti.
Damaska khuaa mikot thîr kha inkhiak ki ta, Aven irhôr ata a luatuhai le Eden in ata rêng khianghrol chôitu kha inboi ki ta; khan Suria ram mihai kha Kir rama suaka om an ti,
Khannisianlân Gaza khua kul chunga mei tîr ki ta, a rêng inhai kha kâng zoi a ti:
Khan, Asdod khua ata a luatu le Askelon khua ata rêng khianghrol chôitu inboipai ki ti; khan, Ekron khua chunga ki kut irlek ki ta, Khan, Filistia mi la omhai kha inboi ki ta, R
Khannisianlân Tura kho kul chunga mei tîr ki ta, a rêng inhai kha kâng zoi a ti,” a tia.
Khannisianlân Temana hmun chunga mei tîr ki ta, Bozra khua rêng inhai kha kâng zoi a ti,” a tia.

Khannisianlân Raba khua kul chunga mei sêm inchok a ta, khan irdoi nikhua khêk leh, kêllaiher nikhuaa phâivopui le, a rêng inhai kha kâng zoi a ta; an rêng kha sala chel an ta, an mi lianhai leh a pâlin,
An rêng chu a mi lianhai leh sala hruai an ti,”
Khannisianlân Moab chunga mei tîr ki ta, Keriot khuaa rêng inhai kâng zoi a ta; khan Moab kha buaina le khêk le bekul irhâiin thi a ta;
khatak ata roirêltu kha inboi ki ta, a mi lianhai murdi kha, ama leh that ki ti,
Khannisianlân Juda chunga mei tîr ki ta, Jerusalem khua rêng inhai kha kâng zoi a ti,” a tia.
mi inrianghai lu chunga pildi ten khom an hnarsaa, inrianghai an inrûkpai pea, pa le nâipa’n dôngmate inkhat an inmai irhlôma, ki’rhming irthiang an porinchetir a ni.
Maichâm omna kipa puan siakhôm chunga an zâl ngaia, an pathian ina khan mi an inchôitir manhai khan uain an in ngai a ni.
“Khannisianlân anni makunga Amor-hai, Sidar thing anga irsâng le thing sesua anga hrât khom kha ki’rhmangtira; a chung tiang ata a ra le a hnuai tiang ata a’rzung khom kin boitira.
Khan, Amor-hai ram nei hrangin Aigupta ram ata nangni ki hruai suaka, ramchâra kum sômminli sûngin nangni ki hruaia.
Khan, deipu ni hrangin nin nâipahai laia mi le Nazarit ni hrangin nin ruathartehai laia mi ki siama. O, Israel nâihaio, khaangin a ini loi ma ni?
Khannisianlân Nazarit mihai kuang uain in hrang nin pêka, deipuhai kuang, thu hril no roi, tiin thu nin pêka.
Irngai u ta, bumûta sip, tâli ichîl angin, nin hmuna nangni nam ki ti.
Khan, mi’ntân hrâthai hrâtna boi a ta, mi hrâthai hrâtna boi a ta, mi hrâtin irtha sêng thei ual no ni, mi hrât tak khom irzôk thei ual no ni,
thal ngul hmangtu khom inding thei ual no ni: fe hrât thei mi khom irzôk thei no nia, sakor chung chuang mi khan irzôk thei ual hliak no ni:
Kha nikhua khan mi thilthothei tak laia mi huaisen khom kha silkai boiin intân no ni,”
O, Israel nâihaio, Aigupta ram ata ki ihruai suak in sûngkuahaio,
“Nangni vai hi rammuala sûngkua murdihai laia nangni ki inhriat nin nia; khasikin nin itho’nsualna murdihaia khan nangni hrem ki ti,” tiin.
An irngei no’n chu mi inhni an ife suam thei hrang ma ni?
Kâmkeibakneiin ram hnuaia sa a man no’n chu an hrûm ngai ma ni? Kâmkeibaknei vânglaiin ite a man no’n chu pûka irthokin an hrûm ngai ma ni?
A ta hrangin châng a om no’n chu vate kha irnêng chânga khan an ôk ngai mo? châng kha ite in-ôk loiin irnênga irthok khan chim ni mo?
Khopuia mi chi loi hrangin bekul an tum thei ma ni?
Dik takin R
Kâmkeibaknei an hrûmin tu mo chi loi hrang? R
Asdod khua rêng inhai le Aigupta ram rêng inhaia khan hril unglân, Samari tâng chunghaia irbuk unglân, kha khan buaina lian tak omhai leh kha laia opbea omhai kha enhai roi, tiin.
Opbena le nakhrâta an irchipuihai kha an rêng inhaia an siakhôma, dik taka tho tum viat mahai,
Khasikin R

khan hiang hin a tia: Belrapu’n kâmkeibaknei bâi ata a belra ke inhni mani, mikuar hlek mani, a isan suak angin, khaang Samari khuaa zâlhmun kila le zâlhmun irlung êk puan irphân lukham chunga Israel nâi omhai kha sansuak a ti.
Irngai unglân, Jakoba in sûng mihai chunga khan inhriattir ro, Sipaihai Pathian R
Israel tho’nsualna kha ama chunga ki hremin chu, kha nikhua khan Bethel khuaa maichâmhai khom hrem seng ki ti; khan, maichâm irkihai kha koi a ta, irnênga tâk a ti.
Khan, phalbi in le kholum in vîksiat ki ta, sâihaa irvô inhai kha irhmang a ti, in roiinpuihai khan mongna nei an ti,”
Nangni Samari tânga lêng nuhai, Basan sehrât infa’n mar anghaio, inrianghai manêpa, irsamhai hnenga, pasalhai kuang, “Hong la unglân, in ei ti,” tituhaio, hi thu hi inhre roi.
R
Khan, bang ir-ônghaia fe suak nin ta, mi tin kha intûn takin fe an ti, Hermon hmuna khan irpai nin ti”,
Bethel-a khan hong unglân, tho’nchâi roi; Gilgal-a khan hong unglân, tho’nchâina kha inpungtir roi, khan nin irbôlna kha nîtin hong la unglân, nin sôma inkhathai kha sûn thum danh zêla hong chôi roi.
Khan, chol kop loi lômthu hril irbôlna kha inhlan unglân, mâni nuamlama inhlanhai kha hril unglân, inpuang roi: O Israel nâihaio, hi hi nin nuamlam tak a ni, R
Khan, kei khomin nin khopui murdihai châmna le nin hmun murdihaia irsamna nangni ki pêka; kha tena khom ki kuang hong kîr mak chêia,

Khan, bu ât hrang zoro tha thum a la ni laiin nin chunga rotho hrang khom ki khapa; khopui inkhat chunga kin thotirin, khopui dang chunga inthotir ma ung: hmun khat chunga kin thotir ngaia, a tho no hmun kha a châr ngaia.
Khanchu, khopui inhni mani, inthum mani kha khopui inkhata tui in hrangin an irvâka, khop mahaia: kha khom khan ki kuang hong kîr mak chêi,

Chârkhohroina le duichûtna’n nangni ki hrema: nin irhuanhai, nin grep irhuan hai, nin theipui kung hai, nin oliv thinghai murdi kha thing irnge irlungin a fâk zit tâk a ni: kha khom khan ki kuang hong kîr mak chêi,

Aigupta ram angin nangni laia hripui ki tîra: Khandaiin nin ruathartehai kha ki that tâka, nin sakorhai ki hruai irhmang tâk a ni; khan, nin sipai hmun mirimsia kha nin hnâra innam rak dôrin nangni kin omtira: kha tena khom khan ki kuang hong kîr mak chêi,
