Khanchu, tuikhanglian khan a sûnga mithi omhai kha an suaktira, thina le mithi khua khan an sûnga mithi omhai an insua saa, an rêngin an sintho ang sengin roirêl pêkin an om tâka.
Kha hnung chu thina le mithi khua kha meidîla an pai thâk ta. (Meidîl kha thi inhnina a ni).
Tukhom hringna lekhabua ar hming chuang loi ka chu meidîla khan an pai thâk sa ta.
Khan, irvân thar le irnêng thar ki hmua; irvân masa le irnêng masa kha a boi tâka, tuikhanglian khom om ta mah.
Khabana, Khopui Irthiang, Jerusalem thar kha, moiin a pasal don hranga a irvô ngai ang khan irzoi diamin Pathian kuang irvân ata zuang chumin ki hmua.

Rengtoihmuna irthokin hnukirhai inringtakin, “Atûn chu Pathian in kha mihriamhai laia a zuang om ta! Ama chu an kuang om a ta, anni chu a mihai ni an ti. Pathian ngei kha an kuang om a ta, an Pathian ni a ti.
“An mit ata mitrithi murdi huipai pehai a ti. Thina om ta no nia, beidongna hai, chapna hai le natna hai khom om ta no ni; thil miluihai kha a boi zoi ta,”, a iti kin hriat.
Khanchu, rêngtoihmuna toitu khan, “Atûn chu thil tinrêng ki siam inthar ta!” a tia. Khabana, “Irziak roh, hi thuhai hi iam a omin an idik kêng,” a ti saa.
Khan, ki kuang, “A’rzoi tâk! keima a maton tak le a hnungkhôn tak, a bul le a mong ki ni. Tuiinhrâlhaiin chu hringna tuikuang ata manboiin pe ki ti.
An hnêtuhaiin chu hihai hi ki kuang ata dong an ti: Keima an Pathian ni ki ta, annihai kha ki nâihai ni an ti.

Khannisianlân, mi thâidôphai, iamloihai, irdit saloi thohai, mi thathai, felloihai, dôi hmanghai, millim biakhai, milakhai murdi omna hrang hmun chu mei le kâta kâng dîl kha a ni; kha kha thi inhnina chu a ni,” a tia.
Khan, berbu sari hremna hnungkhôn tak sari chôitu, vântîrtôn sarihai laia inkhat kha ki kuang a honga, “Hongin lân, Moi, Belrate dôngma hrang nang irhmutir ki ti,” a ni tia.
Khanchu, ama khan Irtha’n tâng irsâng lianpa sîpa a ni fepuia, Jerusalem, Khopui Irthiang, Pathian kuang irvân ata zuang chum kha a nin entira.
Khopui khan Pathian roiinpuina a neia, lungmantam, Jasper lung angin, Krustal lung angin a vâra.
Kulpui irsângtak a neia, kha kulpui khan mikot sômhleihni a neia, mikothai nghâkin vântîrtôn sômhleihni an oma. Mikothaia khan Israel nam sômhleihnihai irhming a chuanga.
Kha mikothai kha nisua tiang inthum a oma, hmâr tiang inthum a oma, sim tiang inthum a oma, nitâk tiang inthum an iom a ni.
Kulpui khan lungphûm sômhleihni a neia, kha lungphûmhaia khan Belrate tirtôn sômhleihnihai irhming a chuanga.
Khan, vântîrtôn ni chongpuitu khan khopui le a mikothai le kulpui irkhîna hrangin rângachak irkhîna khianghrol a chôia.
Khopui kha a dung le a khang ar ang chaka. Vântîrtônin a irkhîna khianghrol khan a’rkhia: a dung kilometar sânghni irza minli a ni, a khang le a’rsânglam khom a dung dôr a ni.
Vântîrtôn khan irkhîna khianghrol a ichôi dên leh khan kulpui kha a’rkhî nôka, a’rsânglam kha mûk irzakhat sômminli minli a ni.
A kulpui kha Jasper lunga siam a nia, a khopui kha rângachak irthiang, hlîmen ang dôra irthianga siam a ni.
Kulpui lungphûmhai kha lunghlu mantam chi tinrênga irvô a ni. Lungphûm masatak chu Jasper a nia, inhnina chu safir a nia, inthumna chu agate lung a nia, a minlina chu emerald lung a nia,

a ringana chu sardonuk lung a nia, a kirukna chu karnelian lung a nia, a sarina chu kruso lung a nia, kiriatna chu berul lung a nia, kuakna chu topaz lung a nia, sômna chu krusopras lung a nia, sômhleikhatna chu tarkois lung a nia, sômhleihnina chu amethus lung a ni.
Mikot sômhleihnihai kha sailungvâr sômhleihni an nia, mikot tin kha sailungvâr inkhat senga siam a ni. Kha khopui tual kha chu rângachak irthiang hlîmen eninhlenthalthei anga hi a ni.
Khopui sûnga khan tempil hmu ma ung, Rengpa Pathian Itinrêngthothei le Belrate chu a tempil a ni sikin.
Khopui êl hrangin misa le tha nang ta mah, Rengpa roiinpuina khan a êla, Belrate kha a meiser a ni.
Khan a vâra khan nam tin om an ta; irnênga rênghaiin an roiinpuina chôiin lût an ti.
Khopuia mikothai kha sûn sôtin irhongin om mai a ta, itiklai khom khâr ni no ni, zân reng om ual ta no ni.
Khopui sûnga khan nam tin roiinpuina le chôiirsângna chôiin lût ni a ti.
Khannisianlân, thil porinche ite hong lût thei no nia, thil intirom thohai le milak insîr uarhai lût thei no nihai; Belrate hringna bua irhming chuanghai vai kha Khopuia khan lût thei an ti.
Khan, vântîrtôn khan hringna tui vadung krustal lung anga irtêk, Pathian le Belrate rêngtoihmun ata zuang luang kha a nin entira,
Khopui kholai inlaina taka a luanga. Khan, muang kiang tiang, kiang tianga hringna thing , thatin voikhat, a kuma voi sômhleihni ra a oma; kha thing hnahai kha nam tin damna a ni.
Khopuia khan Pathian khomâksâm rêng rêng om ta no ni. Pathian le Belrate rêngtoihmun kha om ta a ta, a suakhai khan chubai mûk an ti.
A hmêl hmu an ta, ar hming an michala chuang sa a ti.
Zân om ta no nia, meiser le misa khom nang ta no ni; Rengpa Pathian khan êl invâr ta a ta, kumtuang kumtuangin rênghai angin roirêl ta an ti.

Khan, vântîrtôn khan ki kuang, “Hi thuhai hi iam a omin a idik a ni. Deipuhai kuang ama Irtha pêktu Rengpa Pathian khan thil hong tung zôi hranghai kha a suakhai kuang en hrangin vântîrtôn a itîr a ni,” a tia.
Jisua’n, “Irngai roh! Ki izuang zôi zel hrang tâk kêng! Hi lekhabu lei hrilna pomhai ka chu an vân a sa,” a tia.
Kei Johana hi, hi thil murdihai hmupu le inhrepu ki ni. Kin hriata ki hmu zoi le chu kha thilhai nin entirtu vântîrtôn ke bula chubai mûk hrangin kin boka.
Khannisianlân, ama khan ki kuang, “Khaang khan chu tho no roh. Kei khom nangma le ni urêng deipuhai le hi lekhabu thu pom murdihai suak chanpui kêng ki ini, Pathian chubai mûk roh!” a tia.
Khanchu, ama khan ki kuang, “Hi lekhabu lei hrilna thuhai hi ip no roh, hihai murdi hong tungna hrang hi anai tâk sikin.
Tukhom mi felloi chu thil felloi sin mai a ta, tukhom mi porinche chu porinche om mai a ti; tukhom mi sa chu thil sa tho mai a ta, tukhom mi irthiang chu irthiangin om mai a ti,” a tia.
Jisua’n, “Irngai roh! Ki izuang zôi zel hrang tâk kêng! mi tin an sintho ang senga pêk hrangin ki lômman ki kuang a om.
Kei Alfa le Omega, a maton tak le a hnungkhôn tak, a Bul le a Mong ki ni,” a tia.
Hringna tuikuanga thei ra kha an fâk theina hrang le khopui kha an lût theina hranga an puan irsûk infâihai chu an vân a sa.
Khopui pên tiang chu uihai, dôi theihai, irdit saloihai, mi thathai, millim biakhai, chong le sinthoa milakhai kha om an ti.
“Kei, Jisua’n, hi thuhai hi Koiindanghai nin kuanga inpuang hrangin ki vântîrtôn ki zuang tîr a ni. Davida bulpui le a chi, sikhovâr vârtak ki ni,” a tia.
Khan, Irtha le moi khan, “Hong roh!” an tia. An hriat murdi’n, “Hong roh!” ti sa ngêt ri se. Tukhom a tuiinhrâl murdi chu hong roi; a nuam murdi’n hringna tui hi manboiin in ri se.
Kei, Johana’n, tukhom hi lekhabu lei hrilna thu inhriat murdi’n chu ngar takin kin hriattir: Tukhomin hi thuhai hi a bôkin chu, hi lekhabua a ihril hremnahai hi a chunga Pathianin bôk pe a ti.
Khan, tukhomin hi hrilna lekhabua thu a paiin chu hi lekhabua a ihril a dongtum hringna thing kunga thei ra le Khopui Irthianghai kha Pathianin indoktir a ti.
Hi thu inhretuhai hin, “A ni tak tak! Ki izuang hrang tâk kêng!” a ti. Amen, zuang ta roh, Rengpa Jisua!
Rengpa Jisua lungkhamna kha mi tin kuang om ri se, Amen.
